1a1(rnying rgyud): bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa thams cad kyi snying po rig pa 'dzin pa'i rje snod rdo rje theg pa snga 'gyur rgyud 'bum rin po che'i rtogs pa brjod pa lha'i rnga bo che lta bu'i gtam bzhugs so//
1b1(rnying rgyud): rnam pa rgyas sa gsas ba rgya sa nan nga rangs rgya bya nyis pa nus thag sa ma na
1b2(rnying rgyud): rnam mo// mam na ma ma chog sa nomaH Dom na mam rnas
1b3(rnying rgyud): mo ma/ mam ca migs ma
1b4(rnying rgyud): k+Sha
1b5(rnying rgyud): ni/ / kr-irba kr-i kr-i sr-i rtsa
1b6(rnying rgyud): ba ba de maHsu ShA baHyaH3k+SharashA shat+pade rni \u0f7fsa rbaHtA to shas
1b7(rnying rgyud): mi 'gyur rtag brtan gdod ma'i 'gog bden 'dus ma byas dbyings gang du rab zhi rdul bral ye shes bde ba chen pa thugs chud pas/
2a1(rnying rgyud): mam/ maco sa ma/ ma ma sa kyi N+Di ma// mam mnam
2a2(rnying rgyud): b+hA ba nA ga ma5 \u0f7f
2a3(rnying rgyud): srid zhi'i khams su mi gnas bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' dag yon tan chos kyi rgyal srid dpal gyis rtag tu 'byor pa nyid gyur cing /
2a4(rnying rgyud): tudado nyo
2a5(rnying rgyud): phug cu rgya
2b1(rnying rgyud): mam ma
2b2(rnying rgyud): a rbaM tam cu pa la D+ha kA riHkr-i bAHsa hA beHbAn+daHyai hAr/ shrI ba tha ba sata/
2b3(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i tshul gyis dmigs pa med par kun khyab thugs rjes srid gsum 'jigs 'phrog du ma'i dpal ni nyer gnas pa/
3a1(rnying rgyud): na ma zun ma na tu rung
3a2(rnying rgyud): ze yi ba ma sa
3a3(rnying rgyud): pas rang la niHdzinarnamaHthAs mdzag de/ 18/ badz+ran sA k+Sha da
3a4(rnying rgyud): rab 'byams rgya mtsho'i bde bar gshegs pa'i mi mnyam mnyam pa med pa'i sku gsum tshul la mchog tu dad pas phyag 'tshal lo//
3b1(rnying rgyud): sna chags smras pa rnams kyis mthus btag par 'a dus shes byakun la domanyam snang pa gang dmang bzhi dngas dadang / rnyogabral mo sa dang gi dag pas chas snyan nyi phrul dang bral rgyan gnyis su ma gzigs pagang byed pa kyang tshul can// bang pa
3b2(rnying rgyud): dmigs pa spangs pa nyid kyis 'du byas khams su nyams par mi 'gyur rtogs pa dam pa tshes mchog gzhan du mi g.yo ba// de der bkri byed ngo bo rgyu byen 'brel par bcas pa'i rjod byed nyid gyur lung gachos la'ang rtog tu gus pas rim gror gyi// rang bzhin mi 'jub
3b3(rnying rgyud): za bzhi spros bral 'od gsal khams su gnyis snang blo yis dri ma rab bsags glo bur dang ldan 'khor ba'i chos// rab ring tshogs dang mngon par mtshungs pa'i kun nas sgrib byed thabs mkhos chen po'i mig sman bsten pas rim pa bzhin du rabasbyangs pas// dkar po
3b4(rnying rgyud): phyogs kyi cha shas ji bzhin phyogs mtshon tsam nas mtha' dag yon tan kun tu rdzogs par rim pa nyid kyis mngon snang ba'i/ gnas lugs bden pa gzigs tshul nyid kyis rim par phye ba zeg gsum 'phags pa phyogs su bslan bcas dge 'dun la yang gus pas 'dud//
3b5(rnying rgyud): zad dang mi skye'i ye shes shes pas brtag dka'i yon tan pa mtha' mi mngon de lta na'ang // sangs rgyas gsung gi sgra dbyangs chos kyi 'khor lo nyid kyang nges dga' slob dpon gzugs kyis dang // zhi ba'i dbyings su rtag par mnal kyang la ler 'bar dang la lang de
3b6(rnying rgyud): bzhin chags tshul gyis// spyod tshul gcig pa'i mthar mi gnas pas sems can khams gzung grub pa mchog brnyes rnams la 'dud// sems can rnams la mdza' ba nyid gyur pa sgrub bya gang yin dam bca'i ri mo snying bkod nas// rab tu 'bad pa du ma'i/
3b7(rnying rgyud): ba dan g.yo ba ga zhig par rab dka' snying stobs chen po'i gzings// zab cing rgya che byang chub spyod pa'i chu gter cher zhugs gang gis thob pas gtan ba de yi// 'dod 'jo'i gzhir gyur rgyal bstan rin chen 'dren pa'i ded dpon gang yin de la snying nas 'dud//
4a1(rnying rgyud): grags pa' ma tog 'dzum pa'i gter gyur legs byas brgya le 'bras bus bdag nyid 'byod pa na// srid pa gsum gyi zug rngu gzhil ba'i chos mchog sran byin pasang rnams thong drud+ha zhugs pas// srang dang klog pa'i la
4a2(rnying rgyud): chen gyis kye thub bstan snang bas lha ngan la dga' kunA'i tshal// cig car zum byed chos ldan rgyal po chos bzhin mdzad rnams rnam thar dran pas dang phyag brtsegs// gang yang gdong nas gzhan don la goms snying rje chen ngos lcags kyu'i dbang gyur glang po
4a3(rnying rgyud): bzhin// ma lus 'gro rgyud chos la 'bab phyir legs gsung snang ba bla na med sbyin srid pa 'dir// snyigs ma'i skyon gyis bag la zha ba'i drang srong chen po'i ring lugs slar yang slong byed pas// 'jig rten gsum gyi mchod sdong nyid gyur tshad ma'i skyes
4a4(rnying rgyud): bu de la dad pa'i 'dab brgya grol// gang zhig don dam ngo bo yul dang yon tan la gnas de yi rang bzhin drug gyur pas// / khams dang phung po'i chos las rab ba rgal gang du shes min spros pa rnams kyi mthar ma lhungs// dngos dang dngos med
4a5(rnying rgyud): gnyi ga ro mnyam shes rab dbyings su bde chen su ni khyab cing rtag/ chos la rmongs pa'i kun rtog mun bral mi mnyam 'bras ster sngags kyi theg pa mchog tu bstan// gzhal bar dka' ba'i rin chen zong gis rab 'byams rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten nyul yang
4a6(rnying rgyud): thob dka' ba'i// thub mchog bstan pa yongs kyi dbus gnas thun mong ma yin grub pa'i skyes bus bsten gyur las// cha shas tsam zhig byang phyogs 'dir snang mi yi bdag pos rgya chen legs byas 'du bgyis te// skye bo'i tshogs la bdud rtsi'i
4a7(rnying rgyud): bgo ska la mi 'dod brtse ba'i ngo mtshar gang zhig 'dir brjod bya// de la bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa thams cad kyi snying po gsang chen bla na med pa rdo rje theg pa'i rgyud sde rin po che 'di nyid thog mar gang gis bstan pa'i ston pa dang des ji ltar gsungs pa'i tshul
4b1(rnying rgyud): de dag gnas yul so sor ji ltar bab cing 'phel ba'i tshul/ de las kyi mo'i tshogs ji snyed pa par du bsgrubs pa dang / glegs bam so sor ji ltar bzhugs pa'i rnam grangs/ legs spyad don ldan du bya ba'i shis brjod dang bcwo smon gyis mtha' brgyan
4b2(rnying rgyud): pa bcas skabs lnga rim pa bzhin du gleng bar bya'o// dang po la'ang gsum ste/ gdong ma'i mgon po chos kyi sbyar mngon par byang chub tshul/ de'i rnam 'phrul rdo rje 'chang gis zhing 'dir zhi ba brnyes tshul/ de las gzugs sku gnyis kyi sprul pa
4b3(rnying rgyud): snang tshul sku dang ye shes kyi khyad par dang bcas pa 'chad pa la/ spyir theg dman rnams kyi 'dod par/ 'o skol gyi ston pa 'di lta bur yang / so so skye bo grangs med gsum du thar pa cha mthun bsags pa zhig srid pa tham par gyur pa byang chub snying po rdo
4b4(rnying rgyud): rje'i gdan du srod la bdud btul/ gung la bsam gtan bzhi'i dngos gzhis sbyor lam rgyud la bskyed nas/ tho rangs skya rengs 'char ka'i skad cig gcig la pha rol tu phyin pa drug mngon du mdzad nas chos dang gzugs sku'i bdag nyid can du sangs rgyas te/
4b5(rnying rgyud): kun shes nas rab bzang gi bar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba sogs las sku gsum gyi rnam gzhag tshang bar khas mi len la/ theg chen gyi mdo sde rnams su gsungs pa'i sku gsum dang / sngags la'ang gyi nang gi mngon kyang lnga dang / rgyu 'bras rdo rje 'dzin pa/
4b6(rnying rgyud): lus rtsa sbrul sku/ yid longs sku/ khams bdud rtsi chos kyi sku/ snying po ye shes rlung ngo bo nyid kyi sku sogs gdul bya dbang po rno rtul dang lam pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i mos pa'i dbang gis de ltar bstan pa tsam du zad la/ re zhig theg mchog bla na med pa'i 'od
4b7(rnying rgyud): gsal rdo rje snying po thun mong ma yin pa'i lung ltar 'chad pa'i dbang du byas na/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan 'das pa gnyis gang du'ang dbyer mi 'byed pa kun gyi sngon rol du srid zhi yongs la mnga' dbang sgyur ba'i ston pa kun tu bzang po nyid dbyings rang byung gi ye shes bde bar
5a1(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa'i steng pa gdod ma'i gzhilas gzhi sdang dra shar ba'i skad cig la rang snang dung zhes pas rang byung dag pa'i la shes nyid dngas krol bas dras gsum/ mtha' dbus/ thog mtha' sogs shes bya thams cad la rnam pa/
5a2(rnying rgyud): mi rtog pa'i rang byung gi ye shes su sangs rgyas pa ste/ rgyud bla ma las/ thog ma dbus mtha' med cing rnam dbyer med// gnyis med gsum bral dri med rnam rtog med// ces gsungs pa dang / 'jam dpal rgya 'phral dra ba las kyang / rnam pa
5a3(rnying rgyud): rtog med lhan gyis grub// dus gsum sangs rgyas las byed pa// sangs rgyas thog ma tha ma med// dang po'i sangs rgyas ris med pa// zhes so// de'ang don la med kyang 'khrul snang glo bur ba'i sgrib gnyis bag chags dang bcas pa rang ngo la yod
5a4(rnying rgyud): su dag pas spang ba chen po/ shes dang shes bya gnyis su med pa'i ye shes chen pos srid zhi ris su ma chad pa kun khyab tu gzigs pas rtogs pa chen po/ de dag gi mthus 'gro ba thams cad kyi don dmigs pa med par rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i dzin
5a5(rnying rgyud): las mdzad pa ni sems chen po ste/ mngon rtogs rgyan las/ sems can kun mchog nyid sems dang // spangs dang rtogs dang gsum po la// chen po gsum gyi rang byung gi// ched du bya ba 'di shes bya// zhes so// de nyid ci
5a6(rnying rgyud): yang mi dmigs pa spros pa'i mtha' thams cad dang bral ba chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes dang 'khor 'das bzang ngan med par mnyam pa nyid du gzigs pas srid zhi'i mtha' la mi gnas pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te ji lta ba'i mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dbang 'byor
5a7(rnying rgyud): bas rgya'i theg pa bdag gis 'jug pa thams cad chos kyi dbyings su zhi ba'i 'gog pa dam pa la gnas par bshad pa'i stong rgyang tsam las 'das pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi so so rang gi ye shes kyis gzigs pa'i yul sa bcu'i dbang phyug rgyal
5b1(rnying rgyud): sras rnams dang / gdul bya'i tshogs la gzugs sku mig la snang ba dang / rna bar gsung thos pa dang / 'phags pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri snom pa dang / chos kyi ro myong ba dang / ting nge 'dzin bde ba'i reg snang ba dang / rtog dpyod kyi shes rab kyis chos
5b2(rnying rgyud): la 'jal ba sogs kyi gzhi 'am rgyur gyur pa'i thi ma la marmugs pa'i ye shes phra ba'i rang bzhin nang gsal gzhon nu bum pa sku'i zhing khams chen por shel 'od nang du bsdus pa'i tshul can du bzhugs so// de'i byin rlab las rang snang zhing khams lhun grub
5b3(rnying rgyud): stug po bkod pa bsam brjod dang mtshan ma'i yul las ring du song ba rgyar ma chad cing phyogs su ma lhungs par sangs rgyas nyid kyi ye shes kyis bsdus pa'i rang snang longs spyod rdzogs sku'i dkyil 'khor nges pa lnga ldan gyi bdag nyid can rigs lnga'i ston pa rnams kyang sku
5b4(rnying rgyud): ye shes tha mi dad kyi rol pa chen por bzhugs pa las dus gzhan du gdod ma'i gzhi las gzhi snang du shar ba'i rtsa la rang ror ma shes pas rmi lam lta bu'i sems can rnams 'khrul pa'i rgyu med bzhin la 'khrul pa ltar snang ba'i sdug bsngal gyi 'khor lo g.yo bar
5b5(rnying rgyud): gzigs te/ brtse ba'i thugs rje skyes nas de dag gi don du zhing khams kyi bkod pa rgya chen po sprul pa ni rang snang longs spyod rdzogs sku ye shes rigs lnga gang chen mtsho'i phyag rgya'i gnas rnams dang ba spu'i khung bu re re la'ang 'byung ba bzhi'i rdul phra rab ji snyed
5b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i go thams cad na zhing khams chen po dbyibs dang tshad dang thog tha la sogs pa brjod pa'i yul thams cad las 'das pa kho nas rgyas par bltams shing / de dag kyang rnam pa tha dad pa ste/ phan tshun 'dres pa dang / rnam pa gzhan du skye zhing 'gyur ba dang /
5b7(rnying rgyud): 'pho zhing ltung ba dang / rdzas gzhan gyis gos pa cung zad kyang med par zhing dang sku rgya mtshos chos kyi dbyings gang bar gyur pa ste/ sdong po bkod pa'i mdo las/ spu yi rtse mo gcig la yang // zhing rnams bkod pa bsam mi khyab// sna tshogs
6a1(rnying rgyud): dbyibs kyang thadad de// de dag 'dres par gyur pa med // ces dang / gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mdo las/ zhi ba'i blo zlos/ nam mkhas ca tsam khyab pa nam dra// dbanan gshegs pa
6a2(rnying rgyud): zhing dang sgras khyab bo// zhes gsungs pa ltar/ de dag kyang sangs rgyas sku gsum gyi so so'i zhing khams mi 'dra ba gsum du bkod pa ni chos su'i dus su 'od gsal rdo rje snying po'i zhing dang / rang sdang longs sku'i dus su tshangs pa rba k+ta'i zhing dang /
6a3(rnying rgyud): grul bu'i dus su tshangs rkyen gyi bskal ba zhes bya la de dag rnams su gdod ma'i mgon pa nyid kyi sprul pa'i sangs rgyas rgya mtsho dus gsum du byon pa rnams dang / sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho yang yod de 'byung ba bzhi dang nam mkhas khyang tshad thams cad
6a4(rnying rgyud): tshangs chen bskal pa 'di'i khongs su 'dra la/ der ma dag pa'i sems can rnams 'che 'pho ba dang / skye zhing 'byung ba dang / sangs rgyas rnams mya ngan la 'da' ba dang / bstan pa gnas pa dang / nub pa dang / lam sgrub pa
6a5(rnying rgyud): la sogs bde sdug gi snang ba sna tshogs la spyod pa'i tshul dang / de ltar rdul phran re re'i go na 'ang ri gling rgya mtsho sogs zhing khams tshad med pa snang zhing der ma zad rdul gcig gi steng gi 'jig rten de'i rdul phra ba gcig la'ang sems can gyi khams tshad med
6a6(rnying rgyud): pa gnas pa rnams bde bar gshegs pa'i rnam 'phrul dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi zhing skyong ba'i smon lam gyi mthu chen po dang / sems can rnams kyi 'khrul snang gis las kyi tshogs mngon par 'du bgyis pa dang / chos nyid
6a7(rnying rgyud): kyis rab tu thob pa la sogs pa'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis rab tu tshogs pa ste/ sangs rgyas phal po che las/ sangs rgyas ye shes yul ni bsam yas pas// byin zlab rnam 'phrul de dag 'di lta bu// zhing khams rgya mtsho bstan pa
6b1(rnying rgyud): mtha' da byas ma rnam pa nga spyad dmas kyis 'das sa kya / nga chubs sa spyan pan gyibasas pa nas/ nas sam bas pa rnams da// mas panapa sarnams ca ba chubs pa dang /
6b2(rnying rgyud): phyogs san ni rnams rgyamathathams cad byung / byang chub sems dpa' dran byin ma 'gyul dang / thams cad mtshan pa nyid la 'jug paldanan sa mam mthams cad pa ni bsgrubs dang /
6b3(rnying rgyud): mkha'i byings pa rtsal mas shing 'byung gi/ spyod pa na ma tshas mtha' dang dbras ma na nas/ sbyid ci med med pade ri gshegs rnam la 'dzi/ phyogs kyi na rnams rgyam na na/ bags ba ma' yas
6b4(rnying rgyud): rnams rer byed// sems can pas ma dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ las kyi zhing rnams ca mtsho thams cad 'byung / zhes dang / nga ba rtsonamams/ blatsamatshan ma dus gsum pa // sangs rgyas sa
6b5(rnying rgyud): nga rnams rgya mtsha dang // blon lam rtsam spyod rlung rabacwa 'dug/ ma pa// de dag kya don la med pa gas la snang yin tu chos kyi dbyings la pan rdzob pa rnams 'arjod napa thub ma myong ba ra ro// gnyis pad las zhing 'di
6b6(rnying rgyud): 'chang gis sangs rgyas brnyes rgyas ni// zhing 'di'i gdul ba'i don du thog ma'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po nyid kyis thabs la mkhas pa'i rnam 'phrul chen pos mo sbya rang gams sems pabyed pa ltar bstan nas sangs rgyas pa'i tshul dang mdzad pa'i dzim
6b7(rnying rgyud): pabartse ba tu rgyal de sa than ci mang githeg par yang ga te/ bsas mangs ba'i ma dums/ dang ba pabs pa bams mangs sa rgya babazhi'i rgya sa
7a1(rnying rgyud): nyid du brtan gyur spyad// dadang du yang 'dran pa rgyan// sang+yas rgyas mdad pa mang nyan ma // ces pa dang / 'phags pa ma la ba rgya las/ byang chub rgya mtshor ba brgyas gyur nas cang// sems can ma
7a2(rnying rgyud): tusmin bya'i phyir// byang chub sems bskyed rgya mtsho ston mdzad cing // mi 'grib spyod pa rgya mtsho dus kun ston// bde gshegs rnams kyi rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o// zhes gsungs pa bzhin/ 'dri nas bskal pa dpag tu med pa'i sngon rol du zhing khams rang /
7a3(rnying rgyud): bzhin rnam par bkod pa zhes bya bar thog ma'i mgon po'i rnam par 'phrul pas sangs rgyas me tog mdzes pa chen po la gser gyi rdo rje gcig phul nas dang po byang chub mchog tu thugs bskyed do// de nas skye ba gnyis nas khyim bdag legs sbyin gyi sras nor bu'i phreng ba zhes
7a4(rnying rgyud): par gyur nas sangs rgyas 'khor lo legs par spyod pa'i drung du chos mnyan/ de nas glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i sras bram ze'i khye'u legs byin ces par gyur te sangs rgyas dge ba'i blo gros la chos nyan cing lo bdun du ting nge 'dzin la gnas shing / bdun cu rtsa lnga'i mthar gyis
7a5(rnying rgyud): rin po che'i phung po rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ri bo'i rtse mor mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas pa'i tshul bstan nas chos sku'i dgongs par bskal chen gcig tu bzhugs shing longs spyod thams cad rdzogs pa'i sku rgyan dang kha dog gi 'khor lor rang byoni cing de nyid kyi ngang las rang
7a6(rnying rgyud): snang gi rgyal ba rigs lnga dkyil 'khor grangs las 'das pa rang byung la/ sbrang cha las mtshan dang dpe byad yongs su rdzogs pa rdo rje 'chang gi sgrar byung ba ni thugs bskyed pa'i rten rdo rje phul ba las byung ba'o// de dag kyang sku gsung thugs mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo'i
7a7(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa sum cu rtsa drug la dbang 'byor pa ste snying thig gi 'chad tshul phyogs gcig yin la/ don la gong du bshad pa ltar thog ma'i mgon po'i thabs la mkhas pa'i sgyu 'phrul tsam las ze mi dad cing gsang sngags kyi rgyud phal cher ston pa'i rdo rje 'chang dang snying thig yang
7b1(rnying rgyud): gsang gi rdo rje'i gnas za' ma ston pa la kun tu bzang po dang gzhan du dam pa dang po'i sangs rgyas dang / rdo rje sems dpa' sogs mtshan gyi rnam grangs du mas bsnyad pa ste/ rtog bsdus las/ rab tu dag bkun gyi mchog/ gdod nas grol ba da nga byan/
7b2(rnying rgyud): gshegs// kun tu babang po na gyi bdag/ bya ba chub sems nyid ngas pan// zhes dang / sems dpa' dzin ma tham med// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' brtse// kun na bzang bcan gyi ga// da byung ban dzin no// gdod /
7b3(rnying rgyud): mtham med phyir yang // dam pa'i dang po zhes 'dod de// 'khor lo kun gyi gtso mar na// dam padam pa'i dbang phyug yin// zhes gsungs bltar ro// gsum pa gzugs sbrul gnyis te/ longs su dang sbrul bu'o// dang po ni/ sangs
7b4(rnying rgyud): rgyas gsang ba'i la rtswa'i ma las/ lhan rdzogs rig par byung ba'i// zhing dang gzhal yas gdan rkyen// 'ad par dmar snang ba ste// nas bshad pa lta chos kyi chen pa ning gsam gyis nyid kya dang du bzhugs pa nyid man brel sbyinang das
7b5(rnying rgyud): dog lnga zer gyi rkyen gyis gsal bltar rang snang gi phral la gyi rigs la mchad pa'i ye shes kyi snang ma sru dang shing khams tshad med pa ma yongs sgra spyad pa'i gnas sa sprul ba'i bkod pa nam par snang snang gang chen mtsho'i phyag gi mthi la na bdu'i sdong po skyes pa'i 'dabapa
7b6(rnying rgyud): dang ni 'bosal rnams la zhing khams d+d+hi thu rtsa lngar brtsegs mar gnas shing zhabs kyi skyil grang men chad mus thos nu'i rgyan 'bab pa dag tu 'du zhi khams bcu drug yod pa de rnams su rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas nges pa lnga ldan gyi rang bzhin mtshan dang da byad byam po'i bdag
7b7(rnying rgyud): nyid / gabacu zungs song sa spyod pa bgrang kyis zil ra da pa ga ni legs gang can ma 'i zhing dang da mangs su zin pa mtshanan na spyod dag rdul gcin gi steng na ra thams rgya mdza rnas skye rkyen pa pa ma 'ga' zhing sdugacag sa
8a1(rnying rgyud): 'thams cam myong zla 'dra ba dang / spur ris kyang dab byams na mthor khyab pa sogs sgyu 'phrum na tha lam gsang ba bsam kyis mkhyab pa'i gnas sngags pa bya / gsang ba snying po las nyon gsum spangs 'bur 'dug la
8a2(rnying rgyud): kyis// dbyings nas dkyil 'khor spyan drang mchod// ces dang / phal po che las/ rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed sangs rgyas dag/ ces sogs gsungs pa bzhin no// zhing khams de dag la mnga' dbang mdzad pa'i ston pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i
8a3(rnying rgyud): sku de'ang rang bzhin bdun gyi khyad par dang ldan pa yin te/ de bzhin nyid du nar son pa'i rang bzhin/ yon tan ma btsal bar lhun gyis grub pa'i rang bzhin/ ye shes mtha' dbus dang bral ba'i rang bzhin/ 'bras bu la mnga' mdzad kyang rang gi ngo bo bstan du
8a4(rnying rgyud): med pa'i rang bzhin/ mnyam pa nyid mngon du mdzad kyang spyod yul dang bral ba'i rang bzhin/ gcig dang du ma las grol ba'i rang bzhin/ dus gsum 'du 'bral med pa'i rang bzhin te bdun gyi bdag nyid chen por lhun gyis grub pa nyid gdul bya'i dbang gis/
8a5(rnying rgyud): sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma sna tshogs par snang ba'i rnam 'gyur gyi cha las mtshan dang dpe byad kyi rnam pa 'bar ba'i gzugs kyi sku la phyag zhabs 'khor los mtshan pa sogs mtshan bzang so gnyis dang / sen mo zangs mdog sogs dpe byad brgyad cu rnams te thun mong gi
8a6(rnying rgyud): mtshan dpe rnams dang / ston pa'i thugs ye shes bzhis bye ba'i rtsal las kyi'i mtshan dpe/ rtsa 'khor rnams dag pa'i cha las nang gi mtshan dpe/ khams byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pa'i cha las gsang ba'i mtshan dpe ste longs spyod rdzogs pa chen po laH khams rnam
8a7(rnying rgyud): par dag pa bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du ro mnyam pa ni rgyan gyi nang nas mdzes byed mchog tu gyur par bshad de/ sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho las/ a la ka li bde ba gnyis// phan tshun ma 'dres gcig par shes// bcu drug ngos gnyis mtshan dang ldan/
8b1(rnying rgyud): phyogs gcig ye shes lnga ldan pa// brgyad cu'o bzod sogs rgyu las 'phags// zhes so// rtog tshogs las shin tu 'das pa'i zag pa dang bral ba'i rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po dang / tshul khrims kyi phung po/ ting nge 'dzin
8b2(rnying rgyud): gyi phung po/ shes rab kyi phung po/ rnam par grol ba'i phung po lnga po yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung thugs yon tan phrin las lnga'i bdag nyid chen po rnam snang / mi bskyod/ rin 'byung / snang mtha'/ don grub lnga dang / khams lnga yang / dbyings
8b3(rnying rgyud): phyug/ spyan ma/ mA ma kI/ gos dkar ma/ dam tshig sgrol mar rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pas mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba chen po dang rnam kun mchog ldan gyi stong pa nyid kha sbyor du bzhugs pa las/ dkyil dang / 'khor dang / so so'i tshom bu dang / yab dang / yum
8b4(rnying rgyud): dang / sku mdog dang / phyag mtshan chags can/ chags bral/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ gshegs ma/ sems dpa'/ sems ma// khro bo/ khro mo sogs rol pa rmad du byung ba'i 'khor lo'i bkod pa rnams kyang yul yul can las 'das pa'i ye shes rang snar
8b5(rnying rgyud): gi yul la kun tu longs spyod pa'i cha nas bzhag pa ste mthong thos snom myong bzhi yang rim bzhin/ sa snying / phyag rdor/ nam snying / spya na gzigs bzhi dang / yul gzugs sgra dri ro bzhi yang / sems ma sgeg mo/ phreng ba ma/ glu ma/ gar ma bzhi dang / de
8b6(rnying rgyud): bzhin du spyan dang / snyan dang / shangs dang / ljags te/ dbang po bzhi yang / byams pa/ sgrib sel/ kun bzang / 'jam dpal rnams dang / 'das pa/ ma 'ongs/ da lta/ ma nges pa'i dus bzhi po yang / me tog ma dang / bdug pa ma/ mur me ma/
8b7(rnying rgyud): chab ma rnams dang / gzhan yang rdo rje btsun mo dang snyoms par 'dug pa'i gsang ba'i yul dbang rnam shes gsum 'dus kyi reg pa dang / reg byed/ reg bya/ reg shes kyis dga' ba chen po'i ro nyams su myong ba yang mthar byed kyi khro bo chen po bzhi dang / rtag chad
9a1(rnying rgyud): bdag mtshan bzhi yang khro mo chen mo bzhi'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa sogs mtha' yas pa'i 'khor gyi rnam pa rnams kyang ston pa nyid kyi rol pa dkyil dang 'khor gyi tshul du snang ba mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo las gzhan du ma gyur pa ste/
9a2(rnying rgyud): zhes dang / khog gzhung las/ 'bras bu mthar phyin 'og min na// bzhugs pa dkyil dang 'khor gyi tshul// zhes bshad pa ltar dang / de dag kyang
9a3(rnying rgyud): gsum/ kun tu zhal dang / kun tu phyag dang / kun tu zhabs dang / kun tu rgyan dang / kun tu mdun te/ dbang po re res kyang dbang po thams cad kyi bya ba byed pa ste ye shes kyi rtsa la 'gag pa med pas chos kyi dbyings mtha' klas par khyab gdal ba'i phyir te/ ser
9a4(rnying rgyud): ge rtsal rdzogs las/ kun tu bzang po'i zhal ni phyogs bcur gzigs// kun gzigs kun bzang sku la mdun rgyab med// phyogs bcu gang bar spyan gyis rnam par gzigs// zhes dang / dus kyi 'khor lo las/ thams cad nas ni phyag dang zhabs//
9a5(rnying rgyud): kun nas spyan dang dbu dang zhal// kun nas gsan ldan 'jig rten mtha'// thams cad khyab par bzhugs pa ni// zhes gsungs pa ltar ro// sangs rgyas kyi yul de ni sangs rgyas kho na'i rgyud kyis bsdus pa'i phyir sa bcu'i dbang phyug rnams kyis kyang mi
9a6(rnying rgyud): mthong ste/ sgrib pa mtha' dag las ma grol zhing ji lta ba dang ji snyed pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi spyan rdul dang bral ba ma ma rnyes pa'i phyir te/ theg pa chen po'i bstan bcos rgyud bla ma las/ ngag yul min phyir don dam gyis bsdus phyir// rtogs gnas min phyir
9b1(rnying rgyud): dpe las 'das phyir dang // bla na med phyir srid zhes ma bsdus phyir// rgyal yum 'phags rnams kyis kyang bsam mi khyab// ces gsungs pa ltar ro// gang du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i zhing khams phun sum tshogs pa de rnams kyang rang snang gzhi'i 'od
9b2(rnying rgyud): gsal chen po'i snang cha dag pa rab 'byams kyi 'khor lo'i snod bcud du shA ra ba rmi lam dag pa dang chos mtshungs pas gang gi tshe gzung 'dzin bag chags cha bcas rnam par byang ba'i gnas skabs der snang ba las phyogs gzhan shed du rdul rdzas rang mtshan du grub pa zhig yod par
9b3(rnying rgyud): mi bsams te/ sgyu 'phrul rgyas pa las/ yang dag shes pa'i rang rig blo med na// bde chen zhing yang ngan song gnas su mthong // theg mchog mnyam pa'i don nyid rtogs pa na// ngan song gnas kyang 'og min dga' ldan gnas// zhes
9b4(rnying rgyud): gsungs pa bzhin no// gnyis pa sprul ba'i sku la'ang gsum ste/ rang bzhin sprul pa/ 'gro 'dul sprul pa/ sna tshogs sprul pa'o// de yang gdul ba rang rgyud kyi bder gshegs snying po la sgrib byed kyi drim ma dag pa dang / cung zad dag pa/ shin
9b5(rnying rgyud): tu dag pa gsum gyi go rim la ltos nas 'dul byed kyi ston pa yang de ltar snang ba yin te shin tu dag pa chos kyi sku la 'khor 'das ro mnyam chen po nyid kyi phyir don dam pa'i dbyings las ma g.yos bzhin du gzugs kyi sku ni rtsol ba med pa'i thugs rje chen po'i rnam 'phrul
9b6(rnying rgyud): 'gag pa med pa'i rol pa ci yang bkye ba las gdul bya 'dul byed gnyis lhur snang ba'i gzhan dbang gi tshul du mos pa'i chu snod rtog pa med pa ji snyed du sprul pa'i zla gzugs de skyed 'char ba chos nyid de/ rje btsun gyis/ ji ltar bai DUr sa gzhi gtsang ma la// lha dbang
9b7(rnying rgyud): lus kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba ltar// de bzhin 'gro sems sa gzhi gtsang ma la// thub pa'i dbang po'i sku yi gzugs brnyan 'char// zhes dang / mdo las/ rgyal ba'i chos nyid lus med rab zhi pa// gnyis med rang bzhin med par thugs
10a1(rnying rgyud): chud nas// gzugs su bzang ba mamanaHsa bcan pa las// 'thab ma lus paka shing tan pa dam da// ces gsungs pa sta / das rlung byazhin smram pa nan ga dbyings snang langs su ldan pa'i ston tad
10a2(rnying rgyud): ji ltar dngas shel la gzugs brtan 'phos pa ltar cung zad dag pa'i gdul byas brtsi'i dbang phyug rnams la snang ba ni 'di ltar rang bzhin sbrul sku'i zhing khams dbus na 'og min dang / phyogs bzhir rim pa bzhin mngon par dga' ba/ dpal dang ldan pa/
10a3(rnying rgyud): brtsegs pa/ las rab grub pa lngar ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi rgyal po la sogs pa lnga po mtshan dang dpe byang rgya mtshong bdag nyid can zhi ba dang khro bo'i rnam 'gyur dpag tu med pa'i sbas chos rnams 'jal zhing ston pa dang / gdul bya'i nyon mongs
10a4(rnying rgyud): pa lnga'i gnyen por che ba'i zhing khams lnga dang / sku lnga dang chos lnga dang ye shes wal sog pas brjod du med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de nyid ston pa longs spyod rdzogs sku dang 'khor rgyud gzhan gyis bsdus pa'i phyir phyed snang rang bzhin sprul pa zhes nyi zla
10a5(rnying rgyud): sbyar chen pa'i rgyad las rtse bar mad da pa yin la/ de dang mtshungs par dbum pa chos kyi bshes gnyen gyis/ byung sams mthong lam pa yan chad ma byung khri'i yongs su btags pa par 'and pa rba mau nga nangs tshogs kyi 'dzin pa ma bzhid tsam gyis kyi
10a6(rnying rgyud): 'og men gyi gnas gcig kho nar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir rnam pa rab tu mang po'i longs spyod rdzogs su 'og min rnams na gnas pa'i sprul pa'i sku 'ba' zhig rgya chen por snang bar zad do// zhes gsal bar bshad ci pa/ 'di la lang gshegs su/
10a7(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs med du// sangs rgyas rnam par 'tshar miH// gzugs kyi khams kyi 'og min du// 'dod chags bral rtsod 'argya rgya'o// zhes pa 'i sogs kyis mi yul du mchog gi sul sras des ma byas pa'i gdural du 'og min du
10b1(rnying rgyud): 'tshang rgya bar bshad pa'i lung don skabs 'dir sbyor bar mdzad do// de nyid kyi ngang las 'gro ba 'dul ba'i sprul pa'i sku ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus par gdul bya'i tshogs yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i phyir tshad med pa'i thabs la mkhas pas rnam par rol pa bsam gyis
10b2(rnying rgyud): mi khyab pa'i tshul ston pa ste/ rje btsun ma pham pas/ khams rnams kun tu sna tshogs shing // dpag med bsam yas sprul pa yis// sems can kun gyi don sgrub pa'o// zhes gsungs pa ltar/ dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa dang //
10b3(rnying rgyud): 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / dka' ba spyad pa dang / byang chub snying por gshegs pa dang / bdud kyi dpung bcom pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las
10b4(rnying rgyud): 'da' ba dang / chos gnas pa dang / chos nub pa ston pa la mkhas pas dus gcig tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul ston pa mchog gi sprul pa'i sku ste/ de re re la'ang gdul bya rigs drug so so'i dbang shes la
10b5(rnying rgyud): rang rang gi rigs dang mthun pa'i 'dul byed rig pa'i skyes bu thub pa drug tu sprul nas don mdzad pa ste/ glang po'i rtsal lta bu'i mdo las/ 'jam dpal 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chen pos pad+mo chen po zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sems can dmyal
10b6(rnying rgyud): ba'i gnas yongs su bzung ba'ang yongs su 'dzin te/ de lha'i bde ba gang cung zad yod pa de dag thams cad de na myang bar byed do// sems can de dag kyang de dmyal bas dmyal bar mthong ste/ de cha lugs des sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag dmyal ba
10b7(rnying rgyud): dang bral bar gyur pa la chos 'chad do// zhes dang / sangs rgyas phal po che las/ kye rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni tshad med de/ 'gro ba gang dang gang 'dul ba de dang de'i gzugs dang kha dog dang ming gis don mdzad do// zhes gsungs
11a1(rnying rgyud): pa bzhin no// don 'gro bdug gi gnas der thub pa dri lta bus 'gro don mdzad can/ sgyu 'phral bla ma las/ lha yi gnas na brgya byin+ya mgon// lha ma yin la thags zangs ris// mI la bdud 'dral shAka'i mngon/
11a2(rnying rgyud): yi dwags gnas na kha 'bar te// byol song seng ge nyid du sgra// dmyal ba las kyi gshin je mgon// zhes so// de ltar gnas ris drug po ni gong du bshad pa'i ye shes gang chen mtsho'i zhi khams rdul snyed kyi dbus kyi phyag mthi la bad+ma'i snying po la
11a3(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyud nyi shu rtsa lnga brtsegs mar yod pa'i bcu gsum pa mi mjed 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid de/ de la mi mjed ces pa bzod pa dang / rtul phod pa ste zhing 'di'i sems can rnams 'dod chags la mi mjed pa dang / zhe sdang la mi mjed
11a4(rnying rgyud): pa dang / gti mug la mi mjed pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba rnams la mi mjed pa zhes bshad pa ste/ swA ha'i sgra ni bzod pa'am nus pa la 'jug pa'i phyir de skad du grags so// 'gro ba so so'i las snang yang / phal chen las/ las kyi bye brag pas
11a5(rnying rgyud): mi khyab// dmyal ba'i 'jig rten thur 'phyang dang // gAshin rje'i 'jig rten snrel zhi nye/ byol song lha min gyen thar 'gro// zhes dang / yang na/ mgo gyen bstan du 'gro ba mtho ris/ 'phred bstan gyis 'gro bdud 'gro// mthur bstan gyis
11a6(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba dmyal ba dang yi dgas te/ de drug po stong gsum 'jig rten gcig gi nang du tshang ba ste/ snying po'i 'grel chung las/ stong gsum gcig la chags tshul drug/ sbrul sku gcig gi zhing du grags// zhes gsungs pa ltar/ rlung dkyil nas
11a7(rnying rgyud): 'og min gyi bar gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams te de stong phrag gcig tu bgrangs pa 'khor yug gcig gis bskor ba stong dang po dang / de 'dra ba stong la stong par ma ste mu khyud gnyis pas bskor ba dang / stong par ma de 'dra ba stong la stong gsum pa'i 'jig rten gyi
11b1(rnying rgyud): khams mu khyud gsum pas bskor ba dang / de lta bu bye ba phrag brgya la rab 'byams mtshams sbyor/ de nyid bye ba phrag brgya la rab 'byams rgyud/ de yang bye ba phrag brgya la rab 'byams rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi khams/ de 'dra ba dung phyur phrag bcu la gzhi dang snying
11b2(rnying rgyud): po me tog gis brgyan pa'i zhing gcig ste mchog gi sbrul sku gcig gi zhing du bshad cing gnas de dag tu gdul bya'i khams dbang spyod tshul ji snyed pa de snyed du 'dul byed kyi sgron ma rnam par bkod nas 'dul ba rnam pa bzhis sems can gyi don la spyod pa ste/ de yang sku bsod nams chen pos
11b3(rnying rgyud): 'dul ba/ thugs mngon sum pas 'dul ba/ rdzu 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas 'dul ba/ gsung rig pas 'dul ba dang bzhi las dang po ni bdag cag gi ston pa sprul pa'i sku'i mdzad pa'i tshul ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas yin pas grangs sogs
11b4(rnying rgyud): mtha' gcig tu nges brgyang byar med cing theg chen gyi mdo sde rnams su'ang mang nyung ci rigs 'byung ba 'gal bar mi 'dul/ 'dir gtso che ba dag bsgrubs/ sru bltams pa/ rab tu byung ba/ dka' thub mdzad pa/ bdud btul ba/ sangs rgyas pa/
11b5(rnying rgyud): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/ cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba rnams ni sra bsod nams chen pos 'dul ba ste de dag dngos su mthong ba'i gdul bya rnams bsod nams tshad med pa dang ldan pa'i phyir de ltar du brjod do// gnyis pa
11b6(rnying rgyud): thugs mngon sum pas 'dul ba ni/ dus gsum lam chags mthogs pa'i ye shes kyis shes bya thams cad la 'jug pa nyid kyis dus gsum so sor mi rtog bzhin du kun tu sgrib pa med pa dus mkhyen pa'i mngon shes/ kun tu ma bsgribs par gzhan sems mkhyen
11b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i mngon shes/ thams cad kun tu gzigs pa spyan gyi mngon shes/ thams cad kun tu gsan pa snyan gyi mngon shes/ kun tu sems can gyi don la spyod po cho ga'i don spyod pa'i mngon shes/ sgrib pa dag pa zag zad kyi mngon shes drug po ni thugs kyi
12a1(rnying rgyud): rjes su 'gro zhing zhes bya thams cad la mngon sum du gzigs shing dbang bsgyur ba'i phyir thugs mngon sum pas 'dul ba'o// gsum brdzu 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas 'dul 'an/ kun tu sru bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
12a2(rnying rgyud): kun tu gsung bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun tu thugs kyi gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas gdul bya'i don mdzad pa ste lha rnams la tshangs pa dang / dbang phyug sogs dang / mi rnams la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal ro/ lha ma yin la thags tha
12a3(rnying rgyud): sogs dang / de bzhin du bya rnams kyi ched du shing rta mo dang / ri dgas rnams kyi ched du seng ge'i rgyal po yi dam brtan pa sogs 'gro ba gang 'dul ba de'i rigs mthun du sprul pa dang gzhan yang zhal gyi dkyil 'khor zhi ba dang / khro do dang / ma men ma sog
12a4(rnying rgyud): pa rang snang dang mthun pa'i ston pa dang / rang rang gi skal ba dang rjes su mthun par phye zhing 'pho ba dang / gnas pa dang / gshegs shing bzhugs pa la sogs dus ma nges par ston pa sku'i gsang ba/ gdul bya de dang de'i sgo rtog dang rjes su 'tshams par
12a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i chos ston pa'ang so so'i skad dang brda' yi tshul gyis go bar mdzad pa ste/ phal po che las/ lha yi skad dang klu dang gnod sbyin skad// grul bum skad dang mi yi skad rnams dang // 'gro ba kun gyi sgra skad ci tsam pa// thams cad skad du bdag gis
12a6(rnying rgyud): chos ston to// zhes gsungs pa ni gsung gi gsang ba/ zag pa thams cad dang bral ba'i ye shes kyis gdul bya'i blo rgyud ji lta bar mkhyen pa'i tshul gyis kun tu mthun par 'jug pa thugs kyi gsang ba ste gsum po rdzu 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas 'dul ba//
12a7(rnying rgyud): bzhi pa gsung rig pas 'dul ba ni/ rigs can lnga'i gdul bya rnams kyi 'du shes dang mthun pa'i theg pa lnga'i sgo nas mdor bstan/ nyon mongs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gi gnyen por chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gsungs te rgyas par bshad pa dang / dbang
12b1(rnying rgyud): kun bstan pa ni// cho ga 'bru gcig kyang bstan pa med/
12b2(rnying rgyud): sa
12b3(rnying rgyud): bo dang //
13a1(rnying rgyud): las gnas ris bcu gnyis su sprul pa'i sku ston pa bcu gnyis sprul pa de dang dus mtshungs par sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa'i bstan pa chen po gsum du snang bas 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa ste 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir chos dru zhi brta
13a2(rnying rgyud): dngos rdzogs pa chen po'i byin rlab las rang shar ba rin po che brgya rtsa las 'khrungs pa'i rdo rje phyag gang ba dang / longs yongs su rdzogs par spyod pa'i bstan pa dngos rang byung bstan pa bu gcig pa'i byin rlab las rang shar ba'i rin po che brgya rtsa gcig las 'khrungs pa'i glegs 'am
13a3(rnying rgyud): gor bzhi pa chos nyid kyi rang sgra sgrogs pa/ sprul pa'i sku ston pa bcu gnyis kyi byin drab las rang shar ba rin po che brgya rtsa gcig las rang byung ba'i sku gzugs 'gro ba'i lus phongs dang mnyam pa ste de gsum ni 'dus byas pas skye 'jig med cing byin rbab las rang byung du/
13a4(rnying rgyud): shar bas rdzu 'phrul dang yon tan dpag tu med pas gang dang 'phrad pas 'jig rten gyi khams su gyon dang 'byon 'gyur gyi sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku rnams kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bstan pa 'phel bar byed pa'i rten yin la mthong thos reg pas rdos bcas rang dengs su 'gro ba'i phrin
13a5(rnying rgyud): las kyi bdag nyid can zhig go// de yang rtag pa rgyun gyi 'khor lo'i rang bzhin can te gang du bzhugs pa'i gnas ni sku gsung thugs kyi bstan pas 'dul ba'i dus kyi dbang gis gnas so sor bzhugs shing / gru'i bstan pa'i dus su rdo rje ni u rgyan gyi yul
13a6(rnying rgyud): mtsho'i gling na bzhugs shing 'od dang sgra dang / dge slong rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i sprul pa grangs med pa 'byung bar byed/ gsung gi bstan pa'i dus su ri ma la ya lag na rdo rje'i gnas su gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnams kyis phyag byed do// thugs kyi bstan pa'i dus su
13a7(rnying rgyud): rdo rje gdan gyi steng gi nam mkha' la gnas so// glegs pa ma ni sku'i bstan pa'i dus su rdo rje gdan gyi steng du dpag tshad lnga brgya 'phags pa'i nam mkha' la DA ki ma rnams kyis bzung nas gnas so// gsung gi bstan pa'i dus su 'di nyid dang lhan cig tu
13b1(rnying rgyud): gnas sa// thugs kyi bstan pa'i dus su rgyas pardang thang gzug par gnas sa// sgra gzugs ni/ sgra'i bstan pa dus pa/ 'dod kyi byin nub kyis sangs cas kyi sku dngas dra / da nyid kyi sprul ba dang / yang sgral rnams dang skan cig tu
13b2(rnying rgyud): gnas shing / de dag gi zhal gyi dkyil 'khor dang dngos su spong ba'o// gsung gi bstan pa'i dus su/ gcig tu ma nges par 'jam gling kun tu 'khor bar gnas te/ lha dang mi'i 'du ga khyad par can rnams kun gyis mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur zhing /
13b3(rnying rgyud): skabs su bstan pa la gnod pa byung ba'i tshe sgra las 'od 'byung / zhal nas hU~M 'byung / spyan nas ye shes kyi me 'byung ngo // thugs kyis 'dul ba'i bstan pa lA/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang lag na rdo rje'i khang brtsegs kyi yang
13b4(rnying rgyud): thog na mnyam pa'i rang bzhin dpal chen po zhes bya bas phyag mdzad cing cho 'phrul rgya mtsho'i bdag nyid du bzhugs so// de dang dus mtshungs par sprul pa'i sku ston pa bcu gnyis kyang gnas ris bcu gnyis su byon te/ sprul pa'i sku'i gdul bya'i/
13b5(rnying rgyud): gnas bskal pa dang po la dga' ldan brtsegs pa zhes bya bar ston pa khye'u snang ba dam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ 'khor sangs rgyas stong rtsa gcig/ bstan pa kun gyi rtsa ba spa thal 'gyur/ sdud pa rdo lha'i bu dga' byed dbang phyug/ grogs lha'i bu
13b6(rnying rgyud): nyi ma rab tu snang byed/ sems can rnams tshe lo dpag tu med pa thub pa'i dus na'o// gnas 'jig rten mi mjed du/ ston pa khye'u 'od mi 'khrugs pa/ 'khor mkha' 'gro ma 'bum phrag gnyis/ bstan pa sku gsung thugs yon tan hri na las kyi
13b7(rnying rgyud): rgyud lnga dus kyi lo bye ba'i dus na'o// gnas drod gsher 'dus pa 'od kyis spangs par ston pa dpal 'jigs pa skyob pa'i yid/ 'khor byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag drug/ bstan pa 'khor ba dong sngags dang / rma bya mjing bsnol/
14a1(rnying rgyud): Ta/ dpal 'byung bzha zang pa'i rgyud rnams dang / dus tshal 'brum pa'i dus sun// gnas chags 'byung mngal du snang bar/ ston pa gzhon nu rol pa rnam par zab/ 'khor gnod sbyin dang ldan pa stong phrag gcan
14a2(rnying rgyud): bstan pa sems sbyirtsa pa'i rgyud lnga dang / yan lag gi rgyud drug/ dus tshol brgyad khri'i dus su'o// gnas 'tsho byed gzhon nu'i lha ma rang / ston pa drug pa rdo rje 'chang / 'khor sangs rgyas rabs bdun la sogs pa/ bstan pa pa
14a3(rnying rgyud): rol tu sbyin bajug sogs dang / dus mo lo brnyan gyi sa su'o// gnas gsang chen rol 'dumathong me ri 'bar bar/ ston po gzhon nu dpa' bo stabs ldan/ 'khar byang chubs las dpa' sprin pa thags can brdzun/ chos brgyad ma
14a4(rnying rgyud): rgya la sogs pa rgyud sde du ma dang / dus tsho la drag khri'i dus su'o// gnas srin phrag ru lu'i sgra dang ldan par/ smyon pa drang srong khros pa'i rgyal po/ 'khor srin po b+ha ba gcig la chos rags pa 'dul ba'i spyad brgya la sogs pa/
14a5(rnying rgyud): rgya khwa'i dus na'o// gnas bya rgod phung po'i rgyal po'i khab na/ ston pa dgra bcom pa gser 'ad ma pa/ 'khor 'phags pa nyan thos rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa dpag tu med pa la/ dam pa'i chos 'dul baN+DI sreg dpag tu med pa/ dra
14a6(rnying rgyud): rgyam snang thub ba'i dus su'o// gnas so ga zug sa'i sprin ma na nga nab kyi shing rnam par rnam pa'i \u0f7f/ byo pa pa ngom pa'i rdzogs/ mdzongs parjo pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam sus/ chos panyid 'dzin pa 'i migs
14a7(rnying rgyud): pa rnams gsungs/ dus tshal stong gi ngas su'o// gnas tha rgod spungs par/ stan pa 'od srung ba kris pa/ 'khor cha dang ldan pa badren/ dam pa chos med sde dang / gra ya/ lung me nu chos khri zag brgyad miso gas pa gsu
14b1(rnying rgyud): ma ba ba smrams// gnas dag byung chub 'byung ba gad dus kun pa lab ba na rdugs nasu/ 'bar gsugasas mthun pa la/ ma ngas pa 'du la gagags pa/ dus mas sa btu 'das so// gnas
14b2(rnying rgyud): mgon med pas sbyin gyi gan dga'ar byar/ smyon pa shAm thu ba/ 'khor rnam pa bzhi la/ chas bden pa bzhi'i 'khor lo lan bcu gnyis su parko/ t+te/ sdug bsngal ba/ stong pa/ bdag med pa/ g+han 'byung / d+ha rkyen gyi rnam pa/ lam na
14b3(rnying rgyud): pa/ sgrub pa/ 'gog pa/ zhi ba/ gya nom pa ste bcu gnyis su bskor/ dus tshe lo brgya pa'i dus na'o// de ltar na gnas bcu gnyis su byon pa de dag la phun sum tshogs pa lnga re bsgoms pas chos kyi rnam grangs du 'byung zhing mdzad pa zin
14b4(rnying rgyud): las kyi sgo yang sku'i mdzad pa bcu gnyis ni gnas mi 'dra ba bcu gnyis su ston pa nyid sku mdog phyag mtshan mi 'dra ba bcu gnyis su sprul nas gyon pas gdul bya rigs mi mthun pa bcu gnyis kyi tshogs mi 'dra ba dpag tu med pa'i don mdzad pa mi 'dra ba bcuganyis
14b5(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa'i mdzad pa zhes sku'i gzi sadangs la bsten nas su'i bstan pa 'phel ba'i don du byung ba na// skra de dag gi dus su gsung chos kyi 'khor lo mi 'dra ba bcu gnyis gsungs pas 'gro ba'i dag gi bcings pa mi 'dra ba bcu gnyis las grol bar mdzad pa'i mdza
14b6(rnying rgyud): pa zhes gsung gi bstan pa 'phel ba'i don du byung ba ni// g.yung de tsam zhig gi tshe na thugs kyi dgongs pa mi 'drab bcu gnyis kyis 'gro ba'i rigs mi 'dra ba rnams kyi rtog pa bcu gnyis las grol bar mdzad pa'i mdzad pa zhes thugs kyi bstan pa 'phel ba'i don thu
14b7(rnying rgyud): ba ste de ltar bstan pa nges pa'i sprul pa'i sku gcig la chos kyi rnam grangs dgu bcu rtsa drug tshogs dgos te/ de dag dang ldan pa ni bstan pa'i bdag po zhes bya'o// gal te mi ldan na sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byon pa khol bu'i bstan pa zhes bya ste de dag
15a1(rnying rgyud): kyang sngon gyi sems bgyed rdzogs pa las byung ba'o// zhes khyad par du ma dang bcas pas bshad cing / bkod pa chen po las/ phyi la sogs pa dgu yis ni// mdzad pa'i bye brag dgos par 'gyur// zhes
15a2(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa la'ang sku gsung thugs la byi nang gsum re re dbye ba dang / de re re la'ang bzhi bzhir dbye ba sogs mang du gsungs kyang 'dir mi spro la/ de dag rnams kyang khyad par gyi dgongs pa'i phyogs gcig tu mngon cing bde bar gshegs pa thabs la mkhas
15a3(rnying rgyud): pas gdu' bya'o zhing khams rab 'brums rgya mtsho'i rdul gyi grangs dang rjes su mthun par 'tshams pa'i gzugs kyi sgra snang zhing / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ston pa ni tshul gcig la tshul tha dad pa dag kyang 'gal bar mi bsams te sangs rgyas kyi rnam 'phru
15a4(rnying rgyud): ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir so skye lta zhog 'phags chen rnams kyi blo'i spyod yul kyang ma yin te dus dang gdul bya sogs mtha' gcig tu nges gzung ma mchis pas phyogs gcig mthong bas cig shos la smad par mi bya ste/ 'di sbyar
15a5(rnying rgyud): 'phags pa chos thams cad yang dag par sdud pa'i mdo las/ 'jig pa'i bskal ba 'chags pa'i bskal bar mos na'ang 'jig pa'i bskal ba 'chags pa'i bskal par 'gyur te/ sems can de dag gis kyang 'chags pa'i bskal par shes so// /
15a6(rnying rgyud): 'chags pa'i bskal ba 'jig pa'i bskal par mos na yang 'chags pa'i bskal pa 'jig pa'i bskal par gyur te/ sems can de dag gis kyang 'jig pa'i bskal bar shes so// 'jig pa dang 'chags pa yang gzhan du 'gyur ba ma yin te/ mos
15a7(rnying rgyud): pa de ltar yang 'gyur ro// de bzhin bskal pa gcig snga dro tsam du mos na yang de na sems can de dag gis bskal pa gcig snga dri tsam du shes so// snga dro bskal pa tsam du mos na yang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ de na sems can de dag gis de
15b1(rnying rgyud): bzhin du shes te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa las byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul zhes bya'o// zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro// de ltar sku gsum po sku lngar dbye ba la 'chad tshul gnyis te/ zur gyi mkhas pa rnams ni/ sku gsum mo na
15b2(rnying rgyud): snang cha ma 'dres pa'i cha nas mngon par byang chub pa'i sku dang / ngo bo dbyer mi phyed pa'i cha nas rdo rje'i sku ste lngar bzhed pas chos sku longs su sprul sku gsum ni sku mtshan nyid pa yin la/ gzhan gnyis rnam pa'i ldog chad 'ang largya khyer mi phyed pa'i tshe nas bzhag
15b3(rnying rgyud): pas su btags pa bar bzhed/ kun mkhyen chos rjes/ chos su mngon byang rdo rje'i sku gsum po sangs rgyas rang snang gi sku mtshan nyid pa dang / longs sprul gnyis ni gdul bya gzhan snang gis bsdus pa'i phyir sku btags pa bar bzhed/ gang ltar bshad kyang
15b4(rnying rgyud): 'gal bar ma mthong mod kyi/ 'on kyang mtshan nyid kyi sgo nas rnam par bzhag na/ gdod nas dbyings rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa grol sa'i ka dag chen po sangs rgyas thams cad gang du dbyings gcig pa'i klod/ lam thams cad kyi bgrod pa mthar
15b5(rnying rgyud): byin pa'i chos nyid de ni rnam pa kun tu mi 'pho zhing mi 'gyur bas rtag brtan 'dus ma byas pas mi 'gyur rdo rje'i sgra dang / gdod nas dri ma dang bral bas rang bzhin rnam dag dang / glo bur grib gnyis cha bcas shin tu rnam par byang bas na dag pa gnyis ldan gyi sangs
15b6(rnying rgyud): rgyas zhes kyang bya ste/ ye shes dra ba las/ dbyings kyi dag pa rdo rje'i sku// mi 'gyur mi shigs bsam las 'das// zhes so// dag pa gnyis ldan de nyid kyi ngang las snang cha mkhyen pa'i ye shes ma 'gags pa'i rtsal gyis bral ba'i yon tan
15b7(rnying rgyud): rtabs brgya/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad/ thugs rje chen po la sogs mkhyen brtse nus pa'i yon tan rnams mnga' ba'i cha nas mngon par byang chub pa'i sku zhes bya ba ma 'dres pa'i chos thams cad kyi 'char gzhing gnas
16a1(rnying rgyud): su 'du/ dumathas kyar byang // don tan rnas pas rngubapa te// gtas mang 'dus sa 'dug cam/ mangs kyang rlabs bad// zhesu pa ga / na
16a2(rnying rgyud): nas bzhag na/ chos dbyings ye shes ji lta ba mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / ye shes phyi ma bzhi pa rten brten pa'i cha nas ji snyed mkhyen pa'i ye shes su bshad cing / gyis kyi ngas don smra ba'i rmongs pa chen po dag gis kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes na
16a3(rnying rgyud): don dam pa dang / phyi ma bzhi po la kun rdzob kyi cha ci rigs par 'dres par bshad pa dang don gcig la/ ye shes de dag kyang sgyu ma ni/ gyad bla ma las/ thog ma dbus mtha' med cing rnam dbyer med/ gnyis med gsum bral dri yad rnam rtog med
16a4(rnying rgyud): zhes sogs gsungs pa lhur chos kyi gru dang / phyi ma bzhi po rim bzhin/ mdo sde rgyun du/ me long ye shes nga yi med// yongs su mched rtag tu ldan// shes bya kun lam rmongs la// rtag tu de la mngon phyogs min// ye shes sun
16a5(rnying rgyud): mtshan phyir// ye shes 'byung gnas chen po 'dra// longs spyo rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid// ces dang / mnyam nyid ye shes sems cacul// bsgom bdag pa la 'dod do// rmyi gnas bar bzhugs pa ni// mnyan nyid ye shes yin
16a6(rnying rgyud): par 'dod// dus rnams kun+na thathams pa dang // thugs rje chen po dag dang ldan// sems can rnams la mos pa bzhin// sangs rgyas su ni nges par ston// ces dang / so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes ni// shes bya kun la rtag mi thogs/
16a7(rnying rgyud): ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs rnams kyi// gter dang drag kho na yin// 'khor gyi dkyil la por thams cadadu// 'byor ba thams cad ston mdzad // the tshom thams cad gcod pa yi// chos chen char ni rab tu 'babs// zhes longs spyod
16b1(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sgra dang / natad las/ byab grub pa'i ya shes na// khams rnams kun d+ha m+b+ha chags shing // dpag mad pas mA yas sprul pa yas// sems can kun gyi don sgrub bya'o// zhus pa ni sprul pa'i sgra'o// 'dul can bakhan cha dngas/
16b2(rnying rgyud): chos dbyings mnyam nyid gnyis gnas lcogs gzigs pa'i cha nas ji lta ba mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / ye shes gzhan gsum po 'char gzhi dang / yul gzigs pa dang / 'gro don mdzad pa'i cha nas ji snyed mkhyen pa'i ye shes su bshad de/ thal
16b3(rnying rgyud): 'gyur las/ ji ltar mkhyen pa'i dngos po yis// gnas lpags rang gi don du shes// ji snyed pa yis gdul bla mi// bsam pa ji ltar gnas pa shes// de ltar thugs rje'i 'char tshul las// gdul bya'i 'thob pa dad pa// 'dul na
16b4(rnying rgyud): sgra yang de tsam mo// zhes gsungs pa bzhin no// de ltar sku gsum ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid chen po'i go 'phang de nyid rgyu'i theg chen gyi lam lngas bcu mthar phyin pa'i rgyun ma pa'i bar chad med la ma la brten pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'tshang rgya ka ma de la phyogs
16b5(rnying rgyud): bcu rab 'byams ci de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'od zer chen po'i dbang bskur bar mdzad pa mdo las gsungs pas rang sa'i sgrib pa gnyis byang bar gyur kyang / dkar da mar rlung gsum la brten pa'i 'gyur ba de myong ba'i snang gsum 'pho ba'i bag chags pa
16b6(rnying rgyud): ba 'dod chags chen po'i dbang bslar la ma brtan par spong ba'i thabs med par rdzogs tha med kyi rgyud dang 'grel pa rnams su ci rigs par bshad pa/ 'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba las kyang / theg pa gsum gyi nges 'byung gi// theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur
16b7(rnying rgyud): gnas// zhes pa'i dgongs pa dang yang 'byor ba'i phyir rgyung theg pa'i mthar thug sngags la brten nas 'grub dgos pa tsam ni rgyu 'bras kyi theg pa so so'i ming gis kyang shes nus la/ 'on rgyu'i bag chen du 'bras bu'i rnam gzhag gsungs pa don med du 'brur
17a1(rnying rgyud): ro snyam na/ skyon med de/ dbang rdul rgyu'i theg par mos pa dag gi ngor de ltar bstan du zin kyang mdo'i nges don mthar thug pa sngags su gnas shing / dang rang bzhin yangs grub dang / chos nyid 'od gsal/ dam
17a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i bdag sogs spyi tsam zhig gsungs nas gnas lugs shin tu rgyas pa chen po dang / de nyid rtogs pa'i thabs kyi sgo yongs su rdzogs par sngags su bstan pa'i phyir sngags kyi sangs rgyas de nyid mdo lam gyi sangs rgyas ma yin par mi 'gyur te lam ring ba'i sde
17a3(rnying rgyud): nye lam dang 'phrad pa zhig la de gnyis gang nas byin kyang don gyi gnas su gcig pa bzhin no// 'o na sngags ma gtogs mdo'i lam bstan pa don med do snyam na/ de yang ma yin te/ bgrod thag shin tu nye yang ngam grog dang g.yang sa'i lam la skyes bu
17a4(rnying rgyud): lus dang blo stobs che ba ma gtogs 'jug mi nus pa bzhin sngags kyi gdul bya dbang rnon blo stobs che ba ma gtogs khe nyen che ba'i phyir dang / bgrod thag ring yang ngam grog sogs kyi 'jigs pa med par lus dang blo stobs nyams dma' bas 'jug
17a5(rnying rgyud): pas dal bus phyin pas khe nyon chung ba ltar mdo'i ring lam bstan pa thams cad mkhyen pa thabs la mkhas pa'i phyir chos ston tshul bla na med pa nyid du shes par bya ba'ang ga nad dam pa yin la/ de ltar ma yin na rgyu 'bras kyi theg pa gnyis dgongs gzhi 'gal ba
17a6(rnying rgyud): can du 'gyur zhing mthar thug theg pa gcig tu mi 'du ba dang / nges don gyi phyogs kyang gnyis su 'gyur ba sogs kyi skyon chen po gnas pa'i phyir rgyal ba'i phrin las chud mi gsan pa la mkhas par bya dgos so// 'on kyang sngon gyi chen po dag gyu 'bras theg pa'i
17a7(rnying rgyud): khyad par dang blo gros rnam 'byed kyi ched du mdo dang sngags su bshad tshod kyi sangs rgyas la khyad par 'di ltar dpyad de/ tshes sku la ngo bo'i mtshan nyid/ byin rlab kyi khyad par dang gsum las dang po ni/ mtshan nyid theg pa'i chos su spros pa dang bral ba'i stong nyid
17b1(rnying rgyud): nam ma pa' ba ste \u0f7f/ 'jug pa las/ gas pa bud gang ma lus skam pa dag/ bsags pas na dang rgyal rnams chos pan+tu/ dam rtsub med kyang 'gag pa med// sems 'gags pa dgu yis mngon sum mdzad// pa ta /
17b2(rnying rgyud): ro// sngags kyi chos sgra ni dbyings dang ye shes kyi rang bzhin snang stong zung du 'jug pa ste/ sgyu 'phrul rgyas pa las/ 'jig rten brtan g.yo la sogs pa// snang ba nyid ni dngos po med// ces gsungs pa bzhin no// gnyis pa ni/
17b3(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid theg pa'i chos sku stong pa'i mthar lhungs la/ sngags kyi chos sku ni snang stong gnyis su med pas rtag chad kyi mthar ma lhung ba'o// gsum pa ni/ mtshan nyid kyi chos sku las byin rlab gzugs sku gnyis las mi 'char/ sngags kyi chos du ni
17b4(rnying rgyud): dbyings dang ye shes snang stod zung du 'jug pa'i byin rlab las sku lnga la sogs pa ci rigs par 'char ro// longs sku dang sprul sku'i khyad par yang 'di ltar yod de/ rgyu mtshan nyid kyis gzugs sku gnyis rgyu rkyen gyis bskyed par 'dod la/ sngags kyi gzugs gru
17b5(rnying rgyud): ni rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyed par ma byung ste/ snga ma las/ thu rkyen rag lus med pa'i phyir// zhes so// gsum pa la'ang gnyis te/ longs sku'i khyad par dang / sprul sru'i khyad par ro// longs su'i khyad par la'ang gnyis te/ yongs su spad bya
17b6(rnying rgyud): khyad par ni/ mtshan nyid theg pa'i longs skus dkar po'i phyogs la longs spyod pa las nag po'i phyogs la mi spyod/ sngags kyi longs su ni gnyis ka la longs spyod/ skyong byed thabs kyi khyad par yang / mtshan nyid theg par nag po'i phyogs la longs spyod pa'i
17b7(rnying rgyud): thabs med/ sngags la dkar nag gnyi gar longs spyod pa'i thabs yod pa'i phyir ro// sbrul sku la'ang khyad par gnyis las/ gdul bya yul gyi khyad par ni/ mtshan nyid theg pa'i sbrul grus dkar phyogs kyi gdul bya 'dul ba las nag phyogs kyi gdul bya mi
18a1(rnying rgyud): sa sa su na su sa sa na sa /
18a2(rnying rgyud): sa / sa sa sbyi sa sa
18a3(rnying rgyud): gsuM bsdus pa min pa dang / zhal smra yang 'dul ba rnam pa bzhin sgonas zi na las rnam pa bzhi ba 'byams kyi yang spang ba la mnga' dbang bsgyur nas gdul ba'i don mdzad pa la dbang babyor bya sogs byeng par gzhan yang yod par shes par bya'o// nyid ces
18a4(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba don na rad pa de yang/ gangag cad de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad mkhyen 'jig 'bang mngan d+ha mdzad pa na rang ga bar chu las gtsul bya sems can gyi khams rab 'byams namachod nga 'dril byed thapas kyi byang pa di snyed kyang thugs rje med po'i rim pa
18a5(rnying rgyud): la gzhan du ma gyur ba ste thams nga pa la thaMng na pa nas pas gdus bya bsad na pas kyi tshogs dang / rgyal ba'i rnags pabyed kyi byung pa rdzogs rgyu dang can la ma stos pa/ sems can thams cad te sems kyi bzhin ga 'i
18a6(rnying rgyud): zhes 'a gshegs pa'i tha~M pan ma gyi tsuzhin da byi thun ma pa sa kyi banas la rnam gyis tham pa pazhi rna par byer shi pa'i 'das da 'a bzugs pa zhig gis grags su zab pa'i sbyin las 'das byas pa 'i mi du
18a7(rnying rgyud): pa dang / thab nga / lhun gyis zab pa'i dritshan byed ba / dang du 'gro'i byed pa la 'dug pa'i sa/ 'angs dnga'i phyogs bcu'i ga rten mi khams pa rnams thams cadan stegs kyi nas mams dadag
18b1(rnying rgyud): ston pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las bya ba thams cad gang ci 'byung bar dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyis 'byung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// zhes dang /
18b2(rnying rgyud): bla ma las/ gzhan gyi dbang gis ngas 'byung dang // bdag dang sems can mtshungs gzigs dang // mdzad pa yongs su ma rdzogs phyir// 'khor ba srid du mdzad mi 'chad// ces rtag pa'i don dang / de ltar nam mkha'i mthang zlas kyi/
18b3(rnying rgyud): brtab tu lhan grub par// thogs med blo ldan da yis ni// sems can don ni yang dag 'jug/ ces khyab pa dang lhun gyis grub pa'i don dang / mdo sde las brgya pa las/ rgya mtsho chu srin gnas kyi drab// dus las yol bar 'gyur srid kyi// gdul
18b4(rnying rgyud): bar bya ba'i sras rnams la// sangs rgyas dus las yol mi mnga'// zhes gsungs pa bzhin spyan gyis grub pa'i phrin las de nyid gdul bya so so'i rgyud la skal ba dang 'tshams par sad tshul la ltos nas myang 'das kyi rgyud kyis bsdus pa'i 'bad rtsol dang rnam par
18b5(rnying rgyud): mo rtog bzhin du gshegs snying gi rtsal 'khor ba ltar shar ba glo bur gyi chos dang 'dzom pa las rnam grol gyi lam ston pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / lam gyi stegs dang / lam gyi rnam par shar ba dri ma skyong ba'i gnyen por 'gro bas byang chub kyi myu gu srin
18b6(rnying rgyud): da / smin pa dang / smin par 'gyur ba'i thabs tshul ni bde bar gshegs pa'i sprin las dang thugs rje'i rol pa rmad du byung ba ste/ sgyu 'phrul rgyas pa las/ thugs rje chen po'i byin rlab kyis// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rdul snyed du/
18b7(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba 'phrin las bsam mi khyab// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // lhun gyis grub pa'i phrin las kyis// gdul bya rnams ni chud mi gson// ngan song spongs shing byang chub zhing // ye shes tshogs rdzogs kun tu ston// zhes gsungs
19a1(rnying rgyud): dang gyun// gzhan du nyam gzugag shes lags pa mang dugan rdzas thab kyis sums ldan kyad namang dbar 'do pa/ ngas dang / seM TIg pa dang dman// rdzas d+ha 'a nas sa 'ad// slab shang
19a2(rnying rgyud): dang / gdul bya'i dka po rnam par 'phel ba'i rgyu dang sangs rgyas kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi rkyen las 'gro ba'i don 'byung bar 'dod pa ni/ 'jug pa las/ zhing sku dpag bsam shing ltar gsal gyur pa// yid bzhin nor bu de bzhin rnam me rtog/ @
19a3(rnying rgyud): sgrol bar du 'jig rten 'byor skad tag// 'di ni skus dang bral la snang ba yin// zhes gsungs pa rnams kyang thun mong gi gdul bye la ltos pa'i 'chad tshul phyogs re tsam las nges don mthar zag yin dka'// gnyis paston pa de dag gis bstan pa dam pa'i
19a4(rnying rgyud): chos ji ltar gsungs pa'i tshul la phyir 'khor 'das kyi chos ngos bzung ba/ bye brag tu dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor tshul lo// dang po la'ang gsum ste ngo bo dang nges tshig dbye ba'o// dang po ni/ gang la dmigs pas zag pa dang bcas pa'i las kyis khams
19a5(rnying rgyud): gsum du 'khor zhing sdug bsngal 'ba' zhig la spyod pa'i skyon gyi rang bzhin can ni 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid/ gang gis rgyud la brten pas sgrib gnyis 'jig cing 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las skyob par byed pa'i rnam dkar gyi yon te na mnga' ba ni 'jig rten las
19a6(rnying rgyud): 'das pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid de/ ji skad du/ sdug bsngal dag ni thams cad dang // sgrib kun sel byed dam pa'i chos// zhes so// nges tshig ni/ Dutr-I tra 'dzin pa la'o// zhes pa'i byings las bsgribs pas d+harma'i sgra ni chos la 'jug ste rang
19a7(rnying rgyud): dang rtsi'i mtshan nyid thams cad 'dzin pa'i 'phyir/ de yang sa sra ba dang chu gsher ba lta bu'i rang mtshan dang / 'du byas thams cad mi rtag pa/ zag bcas thams cad sdug bsngal ba/ chos thams cad bdag med pa/ mya ngan las 'das bzhi
19b1(rnying rgyud): sa pa sam can na thams da ma 'as / daya nga sru la g+sa / ga su dang / lamadag/ rgyang 'das dang/ da rdzu dang / na sa nga/ da/ gsung ba dang / n+d+ha dang /
19b2(rnying rgyud): nga pa gru ma// / sa gsas ma sa ldan m+b+ha/ bla g+sa ga ba ba sa gas pa 'i pa 'a du migs pa / sa pa'i
19b3(rnying rgyud): shes pa nga shes pa san ma sa pa/ kun byugs pa ma ga pa ma sa gzhanas pa ga ma bag sa zlog pa dag gas sas ga nga pa ci mas ga sa
19b4(rnying rgyud): gle pag ni/ mas gzhan sa mas ya byed ga khyod rigs pa'i / ngas par 'a pa gro bdug sa/ gal po sa la sa slong gas
19b5(rnying rgyud): ma pa mags pa pa dag pa kyimam spang pa da gan bya kyi d+hAg rdu na sa sas thum te/ gyur pas/ 'byung bab // pa dugs// 'ang / ga
19b6(rnying rgyud): sa/ nga yin par sashes byas// din ma pa nga ga // nas dang / pab che pangs/ kun ni rtso ba smram 'grang// de nan bzhi bya byor bas/ 'dzin pa myed pangs pa'i bya'o// nas so/
20a1(rnying rgyud): pa 'os pa na la sa sum gagasang / lbu ba'i rnalas 'bral pa dab/ ba mams gaskul pa dang rags/ martogs pa'i tshul sul rnal pa ga ga rgyud rdzogs s+ho ngas pa pas pa du na
20a2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa'i sems dang / dran pa rnams rjes su 'dzin pa'i yid dang / mtshams sbyor ba'i bag chags dang the tshom rnams kyi gzhir gyur pa'i rtog pa dang / yul dang dngos por 'dzin pa'i cha las sogs pa dpag tu med la tog tshogs kyi rim pas bzang khring
20a3(rnying rgyud): stong ste/ drug gsum kAm mnyam pa la ti khri tshig stong du mches pa rnams bag la nyal gyi char shar ba'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / sgo sde'i shes pa byung zhing / de nyid yul la 'jug pa na snga logs pa'i shes pa drug gang yang rung ba'i rgyun yod pa yul dang /
20a4(rnying rgyud): de nyid skad cig gis de dang dang rnam par 'dzin pa da sgra'i shes pa dang / de'i rjes la bde sdug par ma gsum gang rung tshor ba ni reg pa'i tshor ba zhes bya ste de ltar drug tshan gsum du dbye ba'i khams bco brgyad dang / rdul phra rab tshogs pa gzhig cing gzhom du mu pa'i gzu
20a5(rnying rgyud): nga / myong zhing sred pa 'byung ba tshor ba'i ltung ngo / g.yo zhing yul la 'jug pa 'du shes kyi phung po/ byed cing bag chags sogs pa 'du byed kyi phung po ste lnga dang / tog tshogs gang zhig skye zhing mched par byed pa'i yul gyi rnam pa las rang gi skad /
20a6(rnying rgyud): gyi logs kyi rgyun dang de byed 'dzin byed kyi shes pa gnyis skye zhing mchod par byed pa'i mig gis bzung yul gzugs sogs drug dang / shes pa'i rnam pa las skad cig gyi logs su ste zhing yul la mchod rlung du skye ba'i gzugs la gzugs su shes pa mig gi rnam
20a7(rnying rgyud): shes la sogs drug ste bcu gnyis po dang / yul 'dzin pa la dbang byed pa'i mig gi dbang po sogs lnga dang / rnam par rig byed shes pa dang po'i gzugs can gyi bdag po'i rkyen las byung ba yid kyi dbang po ste drug dang / las cang / bad
20b1(rnying rgyud): rnams dang / bsod nams ma yin pa/ mi g.yab gsum ste dang ba nA 'khor ba'i bde 'azlas skyed byed dge brdal sogs dang / gnyis pa ni/ de las rdzog pa yas ngan 'gror 'ben byed/ gsum pa khams gang mar 'ben rgyad gyi las so//
20b2(rnying rgyud): rnams ni nang sems kyis bsdus pa yin la/ de dag gi snang cha dang rten gzhir gyur pa kyi yul gyis bsdus pa'i khams 'byung ba chen po lnga chags pa dang / gnas pa dang / 'jig pa dang / stongs pa bzhis gya dang rkyen dang rten dang dngos po byed pa/
20b3(rnying rgyud): las yul snang sems kyi bag chags brtas pas rmi lam lta bur 'dod pa'i khams gling bzhi rab khor yug dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / gzugs kyi khams 'od lnga rang gsal 'ja' tshon lta bu dang / gzugs med pa'i khams srid ce'i ting nge 'dzin gyi cha
20b4(rnying rgyud): las byung ba sogs mdor na khams gsum gyis bsdus pa'i snod bcud brtan g.yo'i bkod pa thams cad 'phags pa rnams kyi don dam pa'i gzigs dor mi snang yang sems can rnams kyi glo 'khrul pa'i sdang tshul smig rgyal chur 'khrul pa dang / thag khra la sbrul du
20b5(rnying rgyud): mthong ba'i shes pa phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i gzung 'dzin gyi dbang gis sna dza ste/ mu tig phreng ba las/ de ltar snang ba sna tshogs rnams// thag pa la ni sbrul mthong ster// de ma yin la der bzung bas// gyi nang snad bcu gnyis su chags/
20b6(rnying rgyud): de yang brtag na thag pa nyid// snod bcud y-i nas stong pa ste// don dam kun stong gzugs can no// rgyal mi bo de nyid mthong bas badren// bag mthong yang dag nyid du bden// dper na mthol zla bzhin gnas// bden pa gnyis kyi ra zhin
20b7(rnying rgyud): ga tan pa 'dzamadun/ ya dag nyid pa 'brel 'dzid// nyid kyi byings las ni// de mer bajams cad kyi'o// zhes dang / 'am pa 'i dge lung da / 'pho 'i gyis rnams thag tung // sbrul
21a1(rnying rgyud): pa nyid du 'dod// ces gsungs pa bzhin no// de yang 'a khor rababad stug mtho dman sogs snang tshul mnga' dag pa rnams skyed mkhan ni klan nas nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i zag baHsa kyi las gsum pa ste
21a2(rnying rgyud): las kyis byas pa/ las kyis sprul pa/ las kyis rnam par smin pa/ las kyis ltung ba las gzhan du ma gyur pa ste/ mdo sde las brgyu ba las/ 'jig rten sna tshogs las las skyes// bde dang sdug bsngal las kyis byas//
21a3(rnying rgyud): rkyen rnams tshogs nas las 'byung zhing // las kyis bde dang sdug bsngal byas// zhes dang / dbu ma la 'jug pa las/ sems nyid kyis ni sems can 'jig rten dang // snod kyi 'jig rten sna tshogs las la bgo// 'gro ba ma
21a4(rnying rgyud): lus las las skyes par gsungs// zhes bshad pa ltar ro// gnyis pa 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las myob par byed pa kyang 'das dam pa'i chos te/ de ni chos thams cad kyi rab dang / mchog dang / phul du gyur cing gzhan
21a5(rnying rgyud): las khyad par du gyur pas na dam pa zhes pa'i sgras brjod pa'o// de lta bu'i chos de la'ang gnyis te/ slob dpon pa su brgyus/ ston pa'i dam chos rnam gnyis te// lung dang rtogs pa'i bdag nyid do// zhes bshad pas/ brjod pa rtogs pa'i chos
21a6(rnying rgyud): dang / brjod byed ldeng gi chos so// rtogs pa'i chos la'ang gnyis te/ 'phags pa rnams gang du gshegs pa'i 'gog bden bsam brjod kyi yul las brgal ba'i myang 'das chen po gnyis snang gi mtshan ma thams cad nub pa'i dbyings su snyoms par
21a7(rnying rgyud): zhugs pa rtogs pa'i yon tan gyis thob pa gang yin pa de dang / gang gis gshegs pa'i lam bde na rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i 'od gsal ba'i snying po can so so rang gis rig par bya ba'i spyod yul sgrib pa'i gnyen por gyur pa'i zag med kyi ye shes
21b1(rnying rgyud): 'khor bcas rtogs pa'i ngo bor gyur pa ste snga ma ni 'phags bzhi'i thugs rgyud kyi spang bya spangs pa'i zad mi skye'i ye shes te chags bral gyi ngo bo dang / phyi ma ni gang gis spong byed chags pa dang bral bar byed pa'i gnyen po'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin te/ 'phakra
21b2(rnying rgyud): pa ma pham pas/ bsam med gnyis med rtog med pa// dag gsal gnyen po'i phyogs nyid kyis// gang zhig gang gis chags bral la// bden gnyis mtshan nyid can de chos// chags bral nyid ni 'gog pa dang // lam gyi bdenapa
21b3(rnying rgyud): ngag gis bsdus// zhes gsungs pa bzhin no// lung gi chos la'ang ngo bo'i sgo nas legs par gsungs pa'i bka' dang / de'i dgongs pa 'grel pa'i bstan bcos gnyis su 'byed de/ snga ma ni/ brjod bya gang zhig don chen po dang ldan cing khams
21b4(rnying rgyud): gsum gyi nyon mongs pa mtha' dag spong ba'i thabs su gyur pa/ zhi ba mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyogs ston par byed pa tshad mar gyur pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung gi mtshan nyid khyad par du 'phags pa ste/ rje btsun gyis/ gang zhig don ldan chos
21b5(rnying rgyud): dang nyer 'brel zhing // / khams gsum kun nas nyon mongs spong byed gsungs// zhi ba'i phan yon nyon par mdzad pa gang // de ni drang srong gsung yin bzlog pa gzhan// zhes gsungs pa ltar ro// des tshig ni/ su b+hA Shi ta ces pa byin nyi ma log
21b6(rnying rgyud): pas na legs par gsung pa ste/ dam pa'i chos ni thog mar duge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su bying ba la sogs pa'i tshul
21b7(rnying rgyud): can dang / gzhan yang mde las/ bcom ldan 'das kyi chos ni legs par gsungs pa/ yang dag par mthong ba/ nad med pa/ dus chad pa med pa/ nye bar gtod pa/ 'di mthong ba la don yod pa/ mkhas pa rnams kyis rang gis rig par bya
22a1(rnying rgyud): nga // zhes gsangs par bye // dastan/ zhal nas gsungs pa dang / byin kyapa brgyabs pa/ rdzas su gnang ga gsus ma// drung pon/ gsurab tu la turgyan pa rgyud bstu dang / gtas dadu
22a2(rnying rgyud): sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlang las byung ba/ sa bcu pa'i mdo dang / ma skyes dgra'i 'gyod pa bsal ba'i mdo dang / kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa ston pa'i mdo lta bu'o// gsum pa ni/ bsgrub po rnams la chos kyi tshul yang dag par sdud pa'i tshul/ mgor
22a3(rnying rgyud): gleng gzhi/ bar du tshig dang don rgyu rkyen 'brel pa dang bcas pa/ mjug tu bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// zhes bris shig ces rjes
22a4(rnying rgyud): su gnang bar mdzad pa dang / gzhan yang gnod sbyin rnams kyi rig sngags dang / nam mkha'/ ljon shing / rnga bo che/ gaN+DI/ pi waM sogs ci rigs par chos kyi sgra 'byung ba rnams kyang rjes su gnang ba'i bkar bsdu'o// yang brjod bya rjod byed kyi sgo nas
22a5(rnying rgyud): dbyen/ lhag pa tshul khrims kyi bslab pa brjod bya'i gtso bor ston pa 'dul ba'i sde snod/ lhag pa shes rab kyi bslab pa gtso bor ston pa mdo sde'i sde snod/ lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi bslab pa gtso bor ston pa mngon pa'i sde snod de/ mtshan gzhi yang /
22a6(rnying rgyud): lung sde bzhi sogs dang / sher byin stong phrag brgya pa sogs dang / mngon pa sde bdun lta bu'o// rnam pa gcig tu na bka' thams cad sde snod gnyis su'ang dbyer rigs te/ nyams su len pa po gang zag gi dbang du byas na/ nyan thos dang / byang chu
22a7(rnying rgyud): sems dpa'i sde snod gnyis so// dman dang mchog gi skal bar 'tshams pa'i phyir pogs med zhabs kyis/ gsum po de ni theg pa dman pa dang / theg pa mchog gi bye brag gis gnyis su 'gyur te/ nyan thos kyi sde snod dang / byang chub sems
22b1(rnying rgyud): dpa'i sde snod do// zhes gsungs pas so// khyad par 'byed byed dngos ni/ blo stobs chen po theg chan gyi bsam sbyor rgyud la skyes pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang / rang nyid zhi ba de'i bsam sbyor 'ba' zhig don du gnyer ba la nyan
22b2(rnying rgyud): thos kyi theg pa bstan pa'o// de la theg pa'i ngo bo dang / nges tshig/ rnam grangs dbye ba'i sgo nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor tshul dang bcas pa 'chad pa'o// dang po ni/ 'khor ba las 'phags te myang 'das kyi phyogs su 'gro ba'i lam bden gyis bsdus
22b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i chos so// nges tshig yA na'i sgra ni/ bzhon pa dang / khyogs dang / lam sogs la 'jug pa'i don can gyis 'gro ba'i don du 'gyur te rnam mkhyen gyi bar du 'gro ba'i lam dang bzhon pa lta bu yin pa'i phyir lam bden thams cad la theg pa'i sgras
22b4(rnying rgyud): bsnyad pa ste/ brgyud nas mya ngan las 'das pa dang / gzhung gi tshogs dang / brjod par bya ba lta bu la yang 'jug par shes par bya'o// dbyen slob pa'i rgyud kyis bsdus pa'i lam bden 'dis bgrod byed kyi theg pa dang / mi slob rgyud kyis bsdus
22b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i lam bden 'dir bgrod bya'i theg pa yin pa'i phyir/ 'phags pa sdud pa las kyang / de gang zhon nas sems can thams cad mya ngan zlo// dga' skyed bde ba mngon par sgrub byed yon tan mchog/ theg pa 'di ni mkha' 'dra gzhal med khang chen
22b6(rnying rgyud): no// zhes gsungs pa bzhin no// dbyen/ dman pa'i theg pa dang mchog gi theg pa'o// drang po ni blong man pa nyid kyis sgri ba gnyis lhag med du 'jom pa'i nus pa med pa'i phyir dang / don gcig pu zhes pa'i phyir dang / thabs chen po dang /
22b7(rnying rgyud): mi ldan pa'i phyir dang / bdag med pa gnyis char ma rtogs pa'i phyir dang / brtson 'grus dang snying stongs chen po mi ldan pa'i phyir sogs kyis theg pa dman pa zhes gdags so// theg pa chen po ni byang par gyi yon tan bdun dang ldan pa'i phyir te//
23a1(rnying rgyud): chos kyi tshul rgya chen po'i don dang ldan pa'i phyir dmigs pa chen po/ bdang / gzhan gyi don chen po dag sgrub pa'i ste sgrub ba chen pa/ bdag zang pa gnyis rtog pa pab kyir pa shas chen po dang / grangs mang bya gsum
23a2(rnying rgyud): sogs su tshogs chen po bsag pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rtul ba med pa'i phyir brtson pa chen po dang / snying rje chen pos 'khor ba yongs su mi gtong bzhin du nyon mongs pas mi gos pa'i phyir thabs la mkhas pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi sa'i chos rnams
23a3(rnying rgyud): cang 'dis bskyed pa'i phyir grub pa chen po dang / rgyu na mi 'char ba'i mdzad pa ston pa'i phyir phrin las chen po dang ldan pa'o// yang na khyad par gsum gyis 'phags par bstan te/ ji skad du/ dmigs pa rnam par dag pa dang // thogs kyi mthu dang spyod
23a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i sa// blo ldan rnams kyi theg pa ni// chen po'i chen por yongs su bsgrags// zhes so// de la theg pa chung ngu dang chen po gnyis sam/ nyan rang byang sems sngags kyi theg pa ste bzhi'am/ yang na theg pa'i rim pa ni lnga zhig ste/ lha dang
23a5(rnying rgyud): mi'i theg pa/ nyan thos kyi theg pa/ rang sangs rgyas ci theg pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa/ gsang ba sngags ni theg pa lnga'o// yang na nyan rang byang sems gsum dang sngags la nang gses drug tu dbye bas dgur bstan pa sogs gdul bya'i skal bar
23a6(rnying rgyud): ltos nas theg pa'i dbye ba sru bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhig bstan mod kyi gang ltar byas kyang 'gal ba med de ji skad du/ chos kyi dbyings la dbyer med phyir// gtso bor theg dbyer ma mchis kyang // khyed kyis theg pa gsum po ni// 'gro ba 'dul gyir bstan
23a7(rnying rgyud): na// zhes gsungs bsgyur ro// / kha cig gis skyed 'tshal dra/ sangs rgyas pal bzhi bdang // ldang rngub pa'i dgongs pa min// zhas gsungs pa'i dun gyis theg pa gsum las grangs gzhan pa 'thad par dbang car yang / lung /
23b1(rnying rgyud): naM/ zag dman nyan dang dang / byang chub sems dpang theg par gas sngags kya don gyis bsdus nas skabs der skye tsam du de ltar bstan nas/ bye brag tu sangs rgyas pa la zhes pa'i chog gi nus pas kyi rol lta ba log pa'i rtsa ba'i grub mtha' la sogs grangs
23b2(rnying rgyud): mtshungs 'gog pa'i ched dgos dbang gis de skad gsungs pa yin la/ gal te theg pa gsum las grangs gzhan nges par 'gog pa yin na/ lang kar gshegs pa las/ lha yi theg dang tshangs pa'i theng // nyan thos kyi dang de bzhin du/
23b3(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs dang rang rgyal gyi// theg pa de dag ngas bshad do// zhes theg pa lngar gsungs pa dang / 'jam dpal rgyu dra las/ theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis// 'gro ba'i don la brtson pa po// theg pa gsum gyi nges 'byung gis//
23b4(rnying rgyud): theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas// zhes gsungs pa'i theg pa gcig 'di gang la ngos 'dzin/ nyan rang 'khor ba las nges par 'byung ba gang zhig gdod theg chen gyi bsam gyor rgyud la phyes nas rnam mkhyen sgrub pa la bsams na mi rung ste/ theg pa gsum
23b5(rnying rgyud): kyi nges 'byung zhes bshad pa'i phyir dang / byang chub sems dpa' mtha' gnyis las nges par 'gyur bas rgyu'i theg chen rang lam gyis sangs rgyas 'phags pa'i go 'phang mngon du byed pa la bsams na theg pa gsum gyi rjes su theg pa gcig bkar nas gsungs pa
23b6(rnying rgyud): la don gyis dben par 'gyur te/ 'dir gang bzhag ce na/ gnas skabs su theg pa du ma'i rnam gzhag mdzad pa'ang de dang de'i gnas skabs dang gtso che chung gi dbang gis gdul bya drang ba'i thabs su bstan nas de rnams dang rang gi lam gyi 'bras bu rjes mthun re thob tu zin
23b7(rnying rgyud): dang dung de'i gong du sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gang du bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam rdo rje'i theg pa mchog bstan du yod pa la dgongs pa ste gzhan rnams de nyid la bkri ba'i lam stegs can du bstan cing rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar dri bgrod bya'i lam rnams mas kyi gdang
24a1(rnying rgyud): star gnas shing / klu zlab kyis/ thabs 'ad rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// klas kyi gdang m+b+ha bur bstan// zhes dang / mdo d+ma dkar po las/ zang srong rnams kyis theg pa gsum bstan pa// rnam
24a2(rnying rgyud): 'dren rnams kyis thabs la mkhas pa ste// theg pa gcig las gnyis su yod ma yin// bsti ba'i don du theg pa gsum bstan no// zhes dang / lang gshegs las/ srid pa'i lam gyis dub pa rnams// ngal ba so'i don dede nyid min// zhes bshad
24a3(rnying rgyud): pa bzhin no// gzhan yang theg pa gsum kho nar bzhag pas ma khyab ste/ dkon mchog brtsegs par/ 'od srung theg pa ni gnyis te chung ngu dang / chen po'o// zhes sogs gsungs pa'i phyir dang / de bas na rang lugs 'dir nyan rang byang sems sngags kyi
24a4(rnying rgyud): theg pa ste bzhir grangs nges pa'i phyi ma la rgyud sde 'og ma gsum dang / zla med la bskyed rdzogs gsum du dbye bar mdzad nas de theg pa'i rim par bzhag pa la 'gal bar 'du ba'i cha shas tsam yang gnas pa'i skabs med de/ sangs rgyas kyi sas bsdus pa'i chos thams cad
24a5(rnying rgyud): la spyir theg pa gcig gi bla sbyar ba'am bye brag ji snyed pa la theg pa so so'i sgra sbyar kyang rung ste thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar du bgrod byed kyi lam yin pas so// de 'ang phyi mtshan nyid kyi theg pa gsum pos rim bzhin dgra bcom pa dang ne tso'am bse ru lta bu'i rang sangs rgyas dang /
24a6(rnying rgyud): bcu gcig kun tu 'od kyis mthar 'degs pas na theg pa dang / gnyis pa phyi nub pa rgyud kyi theg pa gsum pos rim bzhin rigs gsum rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa dang / rigs bzhi mkha' la spyod pa'i sa dang / rigs lnga stug po bkod pa'i sar 'dags par byed pas na theg pa
24a7(rnying rgyud): dang / gsum pa nang pa thabs kyi rgyud rnam pa gsum gyis rim pa bzhin yi ge khor lo tshogs chen gyis dang / bde ba chen po sa dang / ye shes bla ma'i sar 'degs par byed pas na theg pa'i sra bshad bzhag la/ 'di la dgongs nas/ lang gshegs su/
24b1(rnying rgyud): ji srid sems can 'jug pa'i bar// theg pa dag la thug pa med// ces gsungs pa sems kyi rnam par rtog pa ji snyed pa dang rjes su 'tshams par theg pa'i sgo yang de snyed du yod par gsungs pa'i phyir skabs 'dir dbang po 'bring dang rnon po dag la'ang dbye ba gsum gsum du ches
24b2(rnying rgyud): pa gdul bya'i zla tshod la dgongs nas sngags kyi theg pa gong 'og rnams de dang mtshungs par bstan nas rang rang gi gzhung lam du lta sgom spyod 'bras tshar re tshang bar lam so so rang rgya thub pa'i don tsam du bshad nas mthar byin pa blo zang chos zad 'phags pa'i lam bden sra je bzhin pa'i
24b3(rnying rgyud): mthar thug par bzhag pa yin te/ der ma zad nyan rang theg pa'i myang 'das ni gnas skabs tsam las mthar thug ma yin cing des rnam par grol ba'i myang 'das 'thob par byed pa la rang lam gyi 'bras bu mngon du byas nas gdod theg chen la 'jug dgos pa'i phyir theg chen du don gyis
24b4(rnying rgyud): 'dus la rgyu'i theg chen dang rgyud sde 'og ma gsum du 'bras bu'i rnam gzhag rnam grangs par bstan kyang de dag tu 'bras bu de bgrod byed kyi lam sbas don zab mo khyad par ba rnams ma bstan la 'bras bu dngos la'ang yongs su rdzogs pa dang ma rdzogs pa'i khyad par che la bla med kyi theg par ni thabs
24b5(rnying rgyud): yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa'i phyir dang / 'og ma rnams kyi lam dang 'bras bu'i tshul thams cad kyang 'di nyid la tshang zhing bla med kyi thun mong min pa'i chos rnams de dag la med la de dang de'i dod thub kyang gzhag tu med pa'i phyir der 'du la/ bla med la'ang ba phyed rdzogs gnyis
24b6(rnying rgyud): po lam gang zhig sgrub tshul blos byas las ma 'das pas bsgrub bya 'du byas su 'gyur bas ye shes mthong ba la khyad par shin tu che ste/ rdzogs pa chen po ni blos byas chos kyis reg pa'i skabs med pas chos nyid kyi bden pa gnas lugs ltar rtogs pa'i stobs kyis thob pa
24b7(rnying rgyud): 'phags rgyud kyis bsdus pa'i lam bden zag pa med pa'i ye shes te lam 'og mas mngon du bya rgyu rnam grangs mang pos bstan pa'i chos nyid ma nor ba 'dir mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ba'i phyir theg pa ma lus pa theg pa chen po bla na med pa 'dir 'dra ba yin la de'i phyir 'di la ye shes
25a1(rnying rgyud): rgyu zag pa sa bshad pa'ang yin te/ sangs rgyas bal pa chub mdolas/ ye shes kyi thug pa dang / bag pa chen po la rab cag dol ba'i sems kyi dge pa rtsabadangadagu yongs su brtsal// zhes dang / wa
25a2(rnying rgyud): sems sdes zhus pa'i mdo las/ theg pa chen po'i theg pa 'di// sangs rgyas theg pa bas ma mi khyar// sems can byin gro skabs byed// theg pa chen po zan med// theg pa'i snyed ci yod pa// 'di ni de yi mchog tu dgongs// de kyi thag pa tshan
25a3(rnying rgyud): las// theg pa thams cad rab tu dbye// zhes dang / 'phags pa rtogs chen phyug rgyalas kyang / theg pa ni gcig kho na bas te/ gnyis dang gsum du ba mchis so// zhes dang / de'i 'grel par/ de yang gdul byar theg pa gsum gyis 'drang bas
25a4(rnying rgyud): nyan thos dang / rang rgyal dang / theg pa chen po bstanato// yang dag par theg pa gcig ste 'bras bu rdo rje'i theg pa'o// zhes dang / mangs par ma las/ rab 'byor theg pa ni gcig kho na ste/ bla na med pa sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o// zhes dang / lang
25a5(rnying rgyud): ka rag gi zha' pa las/ theg pa gcig las gnyis pa yod ma yin// gsum pa nam yang yod min 'jig rten na// sna tshogs 'gro ba 'bub bar mdzad ma gtogs// zhes pa la sogs skabs 'ag theg pa gcig tu gsungs pa dang / yang kha cig tu gnyis dang
25a6(rnying rgyud): sum dang lnga sogs su grangs kyi maca' ma bkag par gsungs pa'ang yod de/ byis pa rnams ni drang ba'i phyir// theg pagadang dngas bshad do// de sa dang / lha yi theg dang tshangs theg dang / sogs sngar smos pa bzhin dang / la la grangs med par yang gsungs te/ dzi sad sems ni 'jug gi par//
25a7(rnying rgyud): zhes sogs gsungs pa dang gnas lpags ma 'khrul ba mthong ba'i gang cag la dgongs nas theg pa med pa ra/ sangs pa'ang yod de/ lang gshegs las/ sems ni ba tu gyur ba na// theg pa med cing 'dra ba'ang med// tsas gsungs pa bzhin dgos pa'i dbang
25b1(rnying rgyud): gsar byabs stan pa rnams lam bdag N+Da'adas ma nags n+tal/ 'ang tsam dasayon na sa thAzhag bigs migs sa ba yad yang dag tu gnas sas sa la cugs pa phyogs sunas par kyadang / na na ba
25b2(rnying rgyud): ma pa ya byu ba ga / rin pa na byu na/ na pa dang// na pa rgyas pa / ma sa \u0f7frna
25b3(rnying rgyud): kyis ri ba nas rje med/ brjod med pas ma 'das rten pa'o// byas patsun pa 'di skar te// dAHba nam par bur da da// naHsa dang n-i nam dang // de bzhin rgya chub sems dpa na// kaul+yA dang ni u ba dang // deyinan yo
25b4(rnying rgyud): par bshad// mahA a nu yog dang // de bzhin rdzogs chen A ti'o// de ltar rnam pa dgur bshad do// chos kyi bstan pa chen po yin// zhes gsungs pa ltar/ gdul bya dbang pong man dring mchog gi gnas skabs la gsum gsu mdzad
