25b5(rnying rgyud): 'dral byed kyi theg pa'ang de dang mtshungs par ston par mdzad de/ e ti bkod pa chen po las/ nga yis bstan pa'i chos rnams ni// sems can ma ma ba las// tshe dang rlung gi byung par gyis// rim pa gnyis kyi tshul du bstan// rang rang lta dang /
25b6(rnying rgyud): sa bzhag go// zhes gsungs pa'i rang rang gi lta ba la b+hin kyi la ga dang yang dag pa gnyis srang byu 'i khyim ni/ de nyid las/ yang dag pa nir ma gsum ste// rlung ba'i zla dang chen po dang // deng bzhin dbring po ba can la// rim pa gsum gyi tshul tu
25b7(rnying rgyud): bstan// chung ba'i rim pa rnam gsum ste// de mi slong mthun pa'i chos// rtog pas sngags la nyan thos so// 'du shes can la ra shul te// tig 'angad chen la byang sems so// 'bring po gsuma'i bstan pa ni// rab tu dman
26a1(rnying rgyud): A // dman pa rnams la d+mo nga // rnam shes na // nanamamasaldan gas padag la// sems las pal bsgru rgyu// sems pacad ngan la grus paste// maT+wA~Mgag
26a2(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa che// zhes gsungs pa bzhin no// gnyis par theg pa'i rim pa de dag gi chos kyi 'khor lo sku gsum gyi ston pas ji ltar bskor ba'i tshul la rgyu'i chos 'khor gsum bskor tshul mdor bsdus pa dang / 'bras bu'i gsang sngags kyi chos 'khor bsgo
26a3(rnying rgyud): tshul rgyas par bshad pa'o// dang po ni/ spyir chos kyi 'khor lo zhes pa ni dam pa'i chos kyi mtshan gyi rnam grangs te/ thar pa dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs 'joms shing 'khor ba'i rgyun gcod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rgyun mi gcod pa'i don gyis de ltar
26a4(rnying rgyud): bshad la/ de'ang bye brag smra ba rnams kyis lung gi chos 'khor la mthong la ma kho nas khyab par 'dod cing / mdo sde bas mthong sgom mi slob gsum char la chos 'khor du 'dod la/ theg chen pas lam lnga po thams cad la chos 'khor du bzhed pa yin no//
26a5(rnying rgyud): yang thog mar thub pa mchog gi sbrul sras rgya'i theg pa'i chos 'khor gsum rim pa can du bskor te/ dang po bden pa bzhi las brtsam pa dang / gnyis pa mtshan nyid med pa/ gsum pa legs pa rnam par bye ba'o// dang po ni/ ston pas chos kyi 'a
26a6(rnying rgyud): lo bskor ba gang zhig/ yongs su ma dag pa'i sems can gyi khams gzigs nas mi rtag pa/ mi gtsang ba/ sdug bsngal ba/ bdag med pa/ mi sdug pa sogs yid 'byung ba'i gtam gyis bskul nas 'khor ba la mngon par chags pa'i khro 'dor bar
26a7(rnying rgyud): byed pas don dam bden pa mthong rung du bsgrubs pas theg chen gyi lam stegs su 'gyur ba la dgongs nas yul bA ra NA sir drang srong lhung ba ri dwags kyi nags tshal du 'khor lnga sde bzang po la sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / lam dang / 'gog pa bzhi po
26b1(rnying rgyud): lan gsum du ba zlas nas chos kya rdul rtan pa theg dman tan rang gi sde snod de lung sde bzhi la sogs pa rnams so// gnyis pa ni/ ston pas chos kyi la khor lo bskor ba gang zhig chos kyi 'khor lo dang po brko/ rab daca kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtson 'phrus rgyan zi gtsang
26b2(rnying rgyud): de'i 'og tu chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i tshul rgya chen po'i gtam gyi me sangs rgyas kyi tshul khong du chud nam bdag 'dzin 'phrog pa'i phyir spros pa'i phyogs gcig 'gog pa rnam grangs pa'i don dam bden pa rtogs pas chog ca
26b3(rnying rgyud): lam dngos gzhi la dgrongs te rgyal por 'ab rbo phung dza'i ri sogs sragatso por byung chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams la gzugs nas nam mkhyen rtsi bar kyi rnams dang gi da pos shin du dben pa'i skabs ma brjod med de bzhin nyid kyi rgyam bya ma par ston pa thag
26b4(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i sde snyed de/ klas pa sher byin bye ba phrag brgya pa dang / stong phrag brgyu ba/ 'bring ba / rje lnga stong sogs dang / bsdus pa brgyad stong pa la sogs pa dang de las 'bros pa bsam gyis mi khyab par shes par bya'o// gsum pa ni/ na
26b5(rnying rgyud): pas chos kyi la kho lo bla me'i skor ba gang zhig/ chus kyi 'khor po gnyis pa bskod bud tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pas brtson 'grus kyi rgyun mi gcod cing / de'i 'og tu phyir me ldog pa'i dakhor lo'i gtam dang 'khor gsum yongs smra dag pa'i gtam gyis so
26b6(rnying rgyud): nang ngag sangs rgyas kyi yul la 'dza pa byed pas yod med la sogs sna 'di gzhu thams cad bzlog nas rnams sa ma yin pa'i don dem bden pa dngos su ston pa theg pa chen po'i lam gyi snying po la dgongs te/ ri pa la ya dang / byang chub snying po dang / yangs brtan
26b7(rnying rgyud): gas srungs ngasapa med par snying po'i gdul bya byang chub sems dpa' tshogs la gnags nas kun mkhyen gyi bar gyi chos rnams kun tu btag pa dang / gad dbang dang / yongs su grus gsum du legs par gyes nas gzhi la sgra bras
27a1(rnying rgyud): tshul du gtan la bab nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i gnas lugs rgya che bar bstan pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sde bdus pa chen po byab phrag brgya dang / sangs rgyas pal poche dang / lang kar gshegs pa dang / rgyan stug
27a2(rnying rgyud): bkang ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po dang dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa la sogs pa rnams so// chu'i theg pa de la grub mthe'i sgo nas dedaben bzhi ste/ nyan thos pa gyi brag sla ba dang mdo sde pa gnyis/ theg chen dab sems gnyis te na //
27a3(rnying rgyud): dag so so'i bden pa gnyis kyi 'jog tshul sogs grub mtha'i khas len mi 'dra ba re ra yod cing / bye brag tu skabs/ shes b+ha thams cad gzhi lngar 'dod pa ste/ snang ba gzugs kyi gzhi/ gtso bo sems kyi gzhi/ 'khor sems byung gi gzhi/ ldan pa ma yin
27a4(rnying rgyud): byed kyi gzhi/ dadus ma byas kyi gzhi ste lnga las/ dang po ni/ rdul phra rab 'dus pa'i bdag nyid can gyi rags pa'i dngos po bcom pa'am blos so sor bsal ba na/ der 'dzin gyi glo ba dor rung gi chos su dmigs pa kun rdzob bden pa'i mtshan nyid/ bcom pa'am zlos pasal bas der
27a5(rnying rgyud): 'dzin gyi blo 'dor du mi rung ba don dam bden pa'i mtshan nyid de/ mdzod las/ gang la bcom dang bro yis gzhan// bsal bde blo mi 'jug pa// bram chu bzhin du kun rdzob tu// yod de don dam gzhan yin no// zhes bshad pa bzhin dang / 'dis kun
27a6(rnying rgyud): rdzob bden pa don dam du ma grub kyang bde na grub tu 'dod de dngos po thams cad la bden grub kyis khyab par khas blangs pas so// gnyis pa ni/ sgo lnga yid dang bcas pa'i rnam shes kyis phyi'i don mthong ba dang / gsum pa ni/ tshor ba 'du shes sogs sems/
27a7(rnying rgyud): byang lnga bcurtsa gcig po thams cad gtso bo rnam shes dang lhan cig yul la 'jug pas dmigs pa mtshungs pa dang / dpyod pa mtshungs pa/ dus mtshungs pa/ rten mtshungs pa/ rdzas mtshungs pa'i sgo nas dbang pos don la bltas pas rna rma shes kyis
27b1(rnying rgyud): nga/ mas byugs brnyan bsun ma pa nga sa nas pa sa nga / smra / sa gangs mag nan/
27b2(rnying rgyud): sa gams pa dang byung na/ ma pa rnam pa'i 'dus pa'i sa su 'dis/ dus sung na/ su so na ma pa sa ma
27b3(rnying rgyud): sas sa gsu du sa
27b4(rnying rgyud): dang mnangs ni/ / ga 'i gakyang pa'i TI gas kyims pa na gas sa ma pa'i kyi yi yang ba migs
27b5(rnying rgyud): sa rnam panam gas kyi 'jig can seMn pa da tsun rnams cid shes pa la rnam pa kyang ci dmigs pa'i ni / ngas bying sems nang gan na pa ma di la sashes pa sel yang dwags tug zugs
27b6(rnying rgyud): laphyogs bya ma gyi la mthong bu med ma pad pa bzhin nga zla ba'i rnam page tud pa ltar/ gangs tshogs su gzugs sogs kyi na gyi ma da byed pananams gta pas/ gad sna la gzugs grags dang rnam pa
27b7(rnying rgyud): bayin cing / spyad mda' ma rangs pa la ka ga tad byin kyi rgya lags srin pa pa rgyad pas gas pabyor ba na pa rnam par shA kyil da dpags pas gzung ni yul yul che dpa' yi rtogs so zhes btogs pate/ namangs las/ 'a /
28a1(rnying rgyud): sanang ga/ do gas na pa na yas// skang bags pa nga ldan sa pa bad 'a ma byed pas zhal bas smras pasanas nags pa gdu ya
28a2(rnying rgyud): dod/ ldan min 'du byed rnams kyang gzugs dang / sems dang / sams byung gi gnas skabs tsam las rdzas gzhan du mi 'dod cing 'dus mabyas gsum na po gsham gyi ltar rdzas su med pa // zhes snang // de ltur nyan nas rig sang sa rnams cang
28a3(rnying rgyud): ma bar ba cud gang rung la gnas shing bden pa bzhil mi rtag pa stsogs bzhi ba sgoms pas gang zug rang thub pa'i rdzas yod kyi bdag gis dben par rtogs shing ba nyid go byas pas drag gsums pon dang bcas pa dang / nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i mi shes pa
28a4(rnying rgyud): mebang gnyis lam la mthar byin pa na nom la mardo rje ste bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bcoms te thob pa chad pa'i tshul gyis grangs te lhag bcas dang lhag med kyi dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byed pa yin la/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bden pa ni nga rtag sogs rted
28a5(rnying rgyud): bar 'byung ba'i tshul bcu gnyis bsnun nas bsgoms pas lam bgrod tshul spyir snga ma dang mtshungs kyad nyan thos pas 'dzin pa gang zag gi bdag spang bar 'dod kyang / gzung ba yul gyi dngos po rdul phran ma med don dam du 'dod pa gang zhig/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyi
28a6(rnying rgyud): don bslus pa sems snang tsam las de na dam du mi bden par 'dod kyang nang 'dzin byed kyi shes pa bden par 'dod pa sems tsam pa dang phyogs mtshungs te/ mngon togs rgyan las/ gzung don rtog pa spang phyir dang // 'don pa ma spangs byir du ni/ rten gyi bse ru wA
28a7(rnying rgyud): bu'i lam// yang dag bsdus par shes par bya// zhes gsungs pa bzhin no// de lta bus tshogs lam chen po man chad dra bdag med pa bsgoms nas sbyor la mdzod nas mo slob lamaci bar stan thog gcig tu mngon du byed pas dbang po na rgyal gyi dbang gis
28b1(rnying rgyud): shA gnyis pag pa thang du zad pa yin pa/ bsam pa da rtogs rigasas za pa car bung 'i dbang gis kya ga gag/ glusum pabyang chub sems dpa'i thag pa 'ang b+han mthA sgon gas// rnam dag klu du dpamapag/ nga
28b2(rnying rgyud): ni/ the blag skabs 'dod pa'i shes pa dus cha dang rdul than phyogs chas gzhig na mi rnyed pa mdo sde bas bkag pa ltar de na la ma ga cing bag na mo'i rdzas cad dam bca' tsam s+t+waM/ de'i phyir na ting nge 'dzin rgyal po'i mdo las/ ce rgyal ba'i sras dag khams
28b3(rnying rgyud): kAbum po 'di ni sems tsam mo// zhes bka' skal ba ltar chos thams cad sems kyi snang cha tsa ma du 'dod pa'i phyid rnama'irig smra ba'i grub mthar btags shing 'dis kyang 'khor lo tha ma'i lung gi rjes su 'brangs nas chos thams cad kun tu brtag pa dang / gzhan
28b4(rnying rgyud): yin par dang / yongs su grub pa gsum gyi rnam par gzhag pa khas len pa yin la/ kun brtags la'ang dbyen rnam grangs pa'i kun brtags dang / mtshan nyid yongs su chad pa'i kun btags gnyis las snga ma ni tha snyad gdags pa'i phyir chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid nga pa
28b5(rnying rgyud): bye brag tu ming dang brdar btags pa don la med bzhin du bros sgo btags pa rnams so// khyi ma ni bdag gnyis lta bu'o// gzhan gyi dbang la'ang gnyis te/ ma dag pa'i gzhan dbang dang dag pa'i gzhan dbang ngo // snga ma nI/ chos rnams rten cing 'brel
28b6(rnying rgyud): par dbyung ba ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed byung / zhes pa lta bu sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig 'di byung bar gyur te// zhes gsungs pa ltar zag bcas nyer len gyi phyung po lngas bsdus pa rnams so// khyi ma ni/ shin tu dag pa'i
28b7(rnying rgyud): rgyal pa rnams kyi sku dang ye shes zhing khams la sogs pa rnams te rdza ma las dang bag chags kyi rkyen gzhan dang / gyi mdzod ni sgrib pa bral stobs kyi rkyen las byung bas na de ltar btags pa'o// yongs su grub pa'ang gnyis te/ 'gyur med dang / byin
29a1(rnying rgyud): ci ma log pa gnyis so// snu ma ni/ gnas lugs kya ngan te/ chos dbyings 'gyur med rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i snying pa can te/ rgyan stug po bkod pa las/ snying po de la kun gzhi grus/
29a2(rnying rgyud): brtag par gyur pa yin// zhes gsungs pas/ de'i steng na nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur pa ris su ma ched pa'i ma rig lung ma bstan gyi shes pa sa bon thams cad pa'i kun gzhi zhes pa rtog pa dang bral ba/ yul las 'dzin pa'o// de las
29a3(rnying rgyud): mched pa sgo lnga'i rnam shes dang / de'i rjes la skyes pas gyi nang gi don la spyod pa'i yid kyi rnam shes/ de la dpyad pas chags sdang bar ma gsum gang yang rung ba las byung ba dug gsum mam lnga gang yin pa skye ba nyon yid do// byin tsam log pa'i
29a4(rnying rgyud): yongs grub ni zag pa med pa'i lam mthar phyin nas 'bras bu'i dam pa kun gzhi'i steng gi nyon mongs pa cha dang bcas pa rnam par byang bas snying po de nyid phyin ci ma log par mngon du gyur pa la bshad do// sems tsam pa'i bub mtha' 'di la dbyen/ rnam
29a5(rnying rgyud): bden pa dang / rnam dran pa gnyis so// snga mas sngon por 'dzin pa'i mig shes la sngon po sngon por snang ba ltar grub par khas len/ phyi mas ni sngon por snang ba sogs thams cad don dang blo gnyis ka'i ngo bor med de ma rig pa'i bag chags la sgro btags
29a6(rnying rgyud): nas de ltar snang ba sme ma rig pa'i bslad pa zhugs pa'i shes pa las rdzas gzhan ma yin par 'dod pa snga ma las cung zad 'phags shing de la dgye na gzung 'dzin grabs mnyam pa dang / sna tshogs gnyis med pa/ sbeng phyed tshal pa sogs yul shes gnyis
29a7(rnying rgyud): sa dbye bas tha dad pa dang / rnam rkun pa la'ang sems kying ba ma rig pa'i bag chags kyis jims bslad pa dang ma bslad par 'dod pas dri bcas dri med gnyis su dbyel/ gzung 'dzin grangs mnyam pa la rnam shes tshogs brgyad spa ba dang cho gas drug
29b1(rnying rgyud): slab gnyis so// sna tshogs gnyis med pa la tshogs drug 'dod pa dang rnam shes gcig pur 'dod pa gnyis sogs dbye bas mtha' yas par 'gyur ba 'di nyid nyan rang gi theg pa las cung zad 'phags kyang yongs gru 'don dam pa'i bden pa ji bzhin ma rtogs te rnam bden ldan gnyi
29b2(rnying rgyud): kas phyi rol yul gyi rnam pa bden med du rtogs kyang gnyis su med pa'i shes pa rang rig rang gsal don dam par bden pa dang yongs grub tu khas blangs pa'i phyir ro// gnyis pa dbu ma la'ang / rags pa byi'i dbu mngo bo nyid med par smra ba dang / phra ba nang gi nges don
29b3(rnying rgyud): dbul chen po'o// dang po la'ang rang rgyud smra ba'i dbye ma dang thal 'gyur gnyis so// dang na ni/ kye mdo sems gsum gyi grub mtha' ni dngos por 'dzin pa'i mthar lhung ba'i phyir 'dzin zhen gyi spros pa las mi ldog la/ 'dir cho sra thams cad mtha' gnyis gang bya
29b4(rnying rgyud): ma ltung ba'i dbus ma nyid khas blangs pa'i phyir dbu ma ste/ de yang chos thams cad kun rdzob blo 'khrul pa'i shes ngo la yod cing / don dam par blo ma 'khrul pa'i rig shes su med par 'dod pa gang zhig/ rang rgyud smra ba'i dbu ma'i 'dod pa ste/ snga na de
29b5(rnying rgyud): dbyen lung la don byed nus pa yang dag kun rdzob dang / sdang la don byed mi nus pa log pa'i kun rdzob gnyis dang / don dam la 'ang myu gu bdag las mi phye ba sogs spros pa phyogs re gcod pa rnam grangs pa dang / myu gu bdag las mi skye gzhan las kyang mi skye ba
29b6(rnying rgyud): sogs mtha' bzhi'i spros pa rnam gcod pa rnam grangs ma yin pa'i don dam gnyis su 'dod la/ mtshan nyid ni/ dpyod byed kyi rig pas dgag par nus pa la dpyad mi bzod pa kun rdzob dang / rig pas dgag mi nus pa la dpyad bzod pa zhes don dam bden pa'i mtshan
29b7(rnying rgyud): de/ 'di ltar chos can ku ni rdzab kyi snang ba thams cad dgag bya med pa la med par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir te bden dngos med pa la med pa shes par byed pas phyi rol gyi don dang zhes pa'i dngos po gnyis kas stong ste yod med kyi sgo slar gang dzu'ang ma rtse ba'i ye shes tsam
30a1(rnying rgyud): zhig khas phan pa yin te/ 'phral chung bas/ so so rang gi rag pa ye shes kyis// zhes sogs gsungs pa bzhin dang / dgug tu 'gog zang gyi rig pa yang / chal dbyung ba rda rje 'azags pa/
30a2(rnying rgyud): la dpyad pa yod med sde 'gog/ gnyi gar dpyod pa mu bzhi phye 'gog/ ma yin dgag gtan tshigs su bkod pa rten 'phel chen po/ maud dgag gtan tshegs su bkod pa gcig dang du bral la sogs/ gtan chags dang rig pas bslabs pas pa
30a3(rnying rgyud): rnam pa sogs yongs dpyod ma yin par dgag pa ni ma yin te bden pa'i dngos po bkag brtsam gyi rnam byed yid dgag bsrubs pa yin te reg shes rjes dpags kyis rang bzhin gyi med nam mkha' m+b+ha mra spos bral don dam bden pa'i mtshan nyid du dbu ma rang myed pa'i bzhadapa
30a4(rnying rgyud): yin la/ 'dis don dam par med la kun rdzob tu yod par bslabs pas rtag chad kyi son gnas shing blos dbang pa'i rig shes kyis spos bral med dag gtsam rtogs pa'ang nges pa'i don du mi gnas la spros pa 'gog pa'i rig shes kyang spros pa'i bye brag las mi 'da'o//
30a5(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa thal 'gyur ba'i bzhed pa'i phyogs ni/ blo 'khrul pa dang ma 'khrul ba gnyis kyi dbye bas bden pa gnyis su 'byed de/ thang 'phags kyi mnyam gzhag dang sangs rgyas kyi rnam pa kun tu mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul du shes dang shes bya yul yul can/
30a6(rnying rgyud): gyi gzung 'dzin du snang ba gang yang med de dper na gtod du ma log pas rmi lam mi mthong ba bzhin te/ slob dpon chen po klu rgyab kyis/ dper na gnyid log gnyid dbang gis// bu dang bud med gzhal yas khang // gnas la sogs pa mthong gyur
30a7(rnying rgyud): na// sad nas seMs sa ra// de bzhin su rdzo ba shes padag/ tha gros mig gyu zhing // migs gted deng thal thar das// maud pa'i rkyen ga mas sa// zhes gsungs pa bzhinano// yul can gnas kyi 'jug papang nyi na
30b1(rnying rgyud): na na nas tu tu na na du na tu rgyu na sa na/
30b2(rnying rgyud): na
30b3(rnying rgyud): na mas rnam sa sa
30b4(rnying rgyud): man
30b5(rnying rgyud): sa myi gas na mas na
30b6(rnying rgyud): ma ma sa
30b7(rnying rgyud): khris su
31a1(rnying rgyud): na/ bas rdzug gu stugazhan gas sa pasta 'khrum par gas/ kun 'du na na pa dang bsags ldan dang/ sadu ya na tu na /
31a2(rnying rgyud): shes ngol snang yang mi bden par grags pa rlab gnyis dang rmi lam la sogs dang / khyi ma ni 'jig rten shes ngor snang la bden par grags pa zla ba gcig tu snang ba la sogs pa'o// de 'ang gnyis su 'dzin pa'i 'khrul blo'i gnas skabs su bden pa ltar snang ba med
31a3(rnying rgyud): skyon can la sgra shad du snang ba mig dag pa la tsa yang med pa bzhin du blo 'khrul ba la sna tshogs su snang ba nyid 'phags pa'i mnyam gzhag dang 'khrul pa zad pa'i sangs rgyas la dmigs par zla ba ci yang med pas 'khrul snang cha dang bcas pa mi snang ste/ 'jug pa las/
31a4(rnying rgyud): rib mthu yis sla gde la sogs pa// dngos po log pa gang zhig rnam brtags las// de nyid gang gis bdag nyid mig dag pas// mthong bag yin de bzhin 'dir shes bya// zhes dang / glu ba kyi dbu ma 'khrul 'joms su 'dra/
31a5(rnying rgyud): bzhin ma bas pa yang dag gis// shes pa nyi mas mi shes pa'i// bag chags ma lus bcom pa'i maM// sems dang sems byung yul mi gzigs// zhes gsungs pa ltaragazung 'dzin smos pa thams cad dang bral 'dzidzi ba d+hA
31a6(rnying rgyud): 'amigs pa dngos su mi ga pa'i cha nas gzhan pas shes pa ma yin pa sems dang sems byung gi rtag pa ma lus pa chos kyi dbyings su zhi ba/ rnam par rtog pa las 'das pa/ smos pa thams cad da bal ba/ sleb pa'i mthas ma reg pa ste/ chos nyid
31a7(rnying rgyud): gnas lpags don de na dam bden pa'i mthon nyid de/ rtsal shes rab la / gzhanasas shes minazhi ba dang // smos pa rnams kyis ma spos pa// nam rtog med don tha dad min// den de yi mtshan nyid de// zhes bshad pa ltar mdor bsdus
31b1(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyan 'phags par thugs rgyab pa thams pa ga ba sa pa / 'a sad/ dasmras da rnam pa ma sas bya nga ba lags/ grus pa gzhagagasanas kyang so / nga dru
31b2(rnying rgyud): spang brtag mthang gi rnam par gyur rnaMngam pa'i ban pag// de yang gartan rdzoms lnga pa sa kyis chos thams cad dang bzhin med par 'das mdaH/ rang rgyud pA ltar kun rdzob bdun pa bkag nas dran pa bsgrabyas pa dang / dan garnam
31b3(rnying rgyud): sa nas skyes mangs mu pa sags ras 'jag can pa yin pa gyis thams cad yi sbyin med min gang du nga mi rna bar brjod ba pa gnas lags bas pa kyis pa ltab par byem pan pal 'gyur ba 'jal ba'i dgongs pa 'dis las sbyangs pa'i klub mtha
31b4(rnying rgyud): da ste/ tho brjig pas/ grul ti ma dam pa ma ga da/ de de la ldan 'di yid// de la dpe nga byed pas na/ den srin yin// nam dang / ban gags/ ya dang myed dang ming bas su/ ga
31b5(rnying rgyud): phyogs ni yad min pa// de la yan ni ring po na 'ang // man ka brjod par nus ma yin// zhes padang/ rin chen sngon mal sa// khaMs drangs pa ma dngas pa// tha rab tsam yang yod min te// gdod nas smrab med pa'i ster/
31b6(rnying rgyud): ma gyini pa bzhin no// zhes bshang ba stu na// don ban pa banyis kyinam gzhag kyang me pa rang byu wAn/ gdas lcags pa bden gnyis sogs gnyis rgyas thams cad la 'das sang / 'jig rten sna gas mi ba / chas ma
31b7(rnying rgyud): sa pa nga ba su su / man / c-i nga gags pas gyug// rnas pa/
32a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i chos rnams la// nyan pa gang dang ston pa gang // 'gyur ba med la sgo btags nas// nyan cing ston par byed pa'ang yin// zhes gsungs pa bzhin na// de lta bu 'tshas nyid la mnyam par bzhag pa shes rab
32a2(rnying rgyud): dang thabs snying rje chen po zung du 'jug cing bsgoms pa ye shes kyi tshogs dang / zas thob tu chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur shes pas bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa las mthar gyis chos kyi phung de gzugs sku rnam pa gaN+DI sa 'thob par ba gyu ste/ rin
32a3(rnying rgyud): chen phreng ba las/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi gzugs sku 'di// bsod nams tshogs las byung ba ste// chos kyi sku ni mdor bsdus nas// rgyal po ye shes tshogs las 'khrungs// zhes gsungs pa bzhin no// de yang gzhi dbu ma bden
32a4(rnying rgyud): gnyis/ lam dbu ma tshogs gnyis/ 'bras bu dbu ma skya gnyis zung 'jug tu 'dus pa yin no// gnyis pa ngos don dbu ma chen po'i tshul cung zad rnam par gzhag par bya ste/ de la slob dpon skal ldan gyis dbu ma'i bstan bcos rin chen smon
32a5(rnying rgyud): mar/ thal rang gi dbu ma ni rags pa byi'i dbu ma ste/ thos pa las byung ba'i rig par smra bas kyi rol pa dang rtsod pa'i dus dang / bstan bcos chen po byed pa dang / rig pa chen po'i gzhung 'dzugs pa'i tshe smra bar bya ba yin la/ phra ba nang gi dbu ma nyams su len
32a6(rnying rgyud): ba'i tshe ni rnab 'byor spyod pa'i dbu ma nyid bsgom par bya'o// zhes dbu ma la gyi nang tha rags gnyis su gsungs pa'i phyi ma ste de yang 'khor lo tha ma'i dgongs pa phyir mi ldog pa dang 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i gtam gyis chos thams cad mtshan nyid gsum du bstan pa'i don rgya
32a7(rnying rgyud): nga gnas nam rgya mam pa kyis da kya gas brgyam pa rgyas hU~M/ la ra sle pa'i sa 'i thugs skyong bzhig na kyang grug mas kyi ngas songs thub pa gang pas pa/ rjes nyid sangs tha dgas kyi/
32b1(rnying rgyud): ku btags kyis snang bar bzhed nga 'di ltar gzhan dbang nga rtog pa'i thung gi thams dang skye mched kun brtags padag dang bdag gipas stong pa'i gzhir gsungs la/ stong gzhi gzhan dbangags stong pa'i gan chos nyid yongs pab yin te/ da nyid stong pa gzhanan pa
32b2(rnying rgyud): mr-id dngo bo dri ma dang sgron gyi dngas pa rnam par dbye ba dang bcas pa'i 'khor ba'i chos glo thur ba'i mtshan tid can gyis stong la ye nas lhan grub tu gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs kyis mi stong pa ste/ b+h+ya tha ma las/ rnam dbyer bcas pa'i mtshan nyid
32b3(rnying rgyud): glo bur dag gis khams stong gis// rnam dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis// bla med chos kyis spyod ma yin// zhes pa dang / de'i 'phel par/ 'dis ci bstan zhe na gang gi phyi rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i khams 'dis
32b4(rnying rgyud): bsal bar bya ba kun nas nyan mongs pa'i rgyu mtshan ni 'ga' yang med de glo brar ba'i dri ma dang bral ba 'di'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro// 'di la rnam par byung ba'i rgyu mtshan can gzhag par bya ba cung zad yod pa ma yin te/ rnam par dbye ba med pa'i chos dag pa'i
32b5(rnying rgyud): chos nyid ni rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro// des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni rnam par dbye ba yod pa dang bral ba shes pa nyon mongs pa'i sbubs thams cad kyis skyong ba yin la/ rnam par dbyeb med pa bral mi shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos gdus
32b6(rnying rgyud): klung gi bye ma snyed las 'das pas mi stong ngo // zhes gsungs pa bzhin no// de yang kun tu brtags pa ni mtshan nyid ngo bo nyid med pa/ gzhan gyi dbang ni skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa dang / yongs su grub pa don dmango bo nyid med par gsungs pa'i snga ma gnyis ni bcis
32b7(rnying rgyud): mgro zung bar gyur pa'i gzung 'dzin sbam pa'i cha rnams rang gi dpos stong zhing / gyi me ni rang bzhin gtsug ma dngos po med pa'ingo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pas stong cha nas chos sku'i yon tan dang snang cha nas spu dang zhing khams gzhal yas
33a1(rnying rgyud): sogs kyi 'char gzhir gnas shing rig pa'i cha nas stobs bcu mi 'jigs bzhi sogs ce ten gzhir gyur pas bral rgyu dang bral 'azas gdod nas lhun grub tu bzhugs pas sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin bde bar gshegs pa'i snying po zhes
33a2(rnying rgyud): bya ba de ni skye 'jig 'pho 'gyur 'phel 'grib rgyu rkyen sogs kyi khams su mi gnas shing tha snyad dang bas ma brjod kyi yul yang ma yin pa rtag tu gos pa med par yod pa yin te/ 'jam dpal rnam par rol pa las/ sring mo gang rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba la glo bur gyi nyon
33a3(rnying rgyud): mormongs pa byung yang rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal ba de ni glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa des kun nas nyon mongs par byed mi nus so// zhes dang / rgyal tshab ma pham pas/ 'dus ma byas shing lhun gyis grub// gzhan gyi rkyen gyis rtogs min pa// mkhyen dang brtse
33a4(rnying rgyud): dang nus par ldan// don gnyis ldan pa'i sangs rgyas nyid// ces gsungs pa ltar ro// gzhan du rang stong pa ltar chos thams cad rang gi ngo bos stong pa kho nar bzung na mtha' gcig tu chos kyi sku yang rang stong du 'gyur zhing sku dang ye shes zhing khams sogs kyang
33a5(rnying rgyud): med par 'gyur ba dang der brten po'i tshogs bsags pa dang sgrib pa myong ba rnams kyang med par 'gyur zhing rgya dang 'bras bu'i theg pa dag gis gzhi gang du lam gang gis dri ma skyod pa'i thabs ji snyed bstan pa rnams kyang nyams par 'gyur te sbyang gzhi med pas skyong byed dgos pa med pa
33a6(rnying rgyud): dang / ye shes kyis stong pas gzhan don mdzad pa dang mkhyen par mi 'gyur ba dang / ma dag pa'i gzhan dbang kun rdzob tsam du'ang med pas dag pa'i gzhan dbang gnas yongs su 'gyur ba'i yon tan rnams kyang med par 'gyur ba dang / bcings pa dang grol ba'i gzhir
33a7(rnying rgyud): gyur pa'i bdag med par 'gyur ba dang / so so rang gis rig par bya ba'i chos med par 'gyur ba sogs skyon gyi rnam pa du ma gnas shing lte ba mo zad pa'i 'byung gnas skye ba'i bdag nyid can du gsungs te/ 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i 'od srung gis
33b1(rnying rgyud): lus pa'i mad las/ 'od srung gang zag / stong pa nyid du dmigs pa'i stong pa nyid la rton pa de dgu ni da gsung rab 'di las nyams rab tu nyams zhes bshad da'od srung gang zag tu smra ba re rab tsam la gnas pa smra'i/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal stong pa nyid du bstsu ba ni de la ma
33b2(rnying rgyud): yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srung lta bar gyur pa thams cad las 'byung ba ni stong pa nyid yin na 'od srung gang stong pa nyid kho nar ba// ba de ni gsor mi rung ngo zhes ngas bshad do// zhes gsungs pa sogs ces shes par nus shing / 'onam snang pa yin nas
33b3(rnying rgyud): zhe na ma yin te/ 'phags pa la kar gshegs pa'i mdo las/ chos thams cad kyi don dam pa 'phags pa'i ye shes chen po stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ 'di lta nye so so rang gis rig pa 'phags pa'i ye shes thob pa ni lta ba dang nyes pa thams cad kyi bgra
33b4(rnying rgyud): chags kyis stong ste 'di ni chos thams cad kyi don dam pa 'phags pa'i ye shes chen po stong pa nyid ces bya'o// zhes pa dang / de lta bu'i don dam pa gzhan gyis stong pa'i tshul 'di 'khor lo bar pa'i mdo sde nas kyang 'byung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
33b5(rnying rgyud): spyod phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ de la gzhan gyi dngos po stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos skyon med pa
33b6(rnying rgyud): dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / ga rjem yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de ltar chos nyid de dag gzhan gyis stong pa gang yin pa de ni gzhan gyi dngos pos stong pa nyid ces bya ste/
33b7(rnying rgyud): 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po'o// zhes dang / rgud pa ma las kyang / rnam dbyer bcas pa'i mtshan nyid can/ zhes pa sogs na smos pa ltar rgya cher gsungs so// de lta bu'i dbyings de ning sems can
34a1(rnying rgyud): ma sna ga / shA / Shag na na smra ma / sa// /
34a2(rnying rgyud): 'jam pa // du gagags // sa / pa/ da pa/ na / dag na/
34a3(rnying rgyud): na sa shes ca/ de bzhin ma me pa ga / zhes pa la migs pa sa da bye ba rnams sa bzugs rnaMs pas ma shes seM pa'i ngas ni na sa nam 'bar 'dis dbang
34a4(rnying rgyud): na / du rdzas/ na/ yod nas // da sa
34a5(rnying rgyud): ga shegs pa nas rgyu nga ma sa di nga gagags ga/ zhes pa dang/ ga sa na padzin/ rgya
34a6(rnying rgyud): da pa cung pa 'das yin// tshang l+h+wa da ga du tu/ danapa rjes du sbyinargyas // ga sa mi gcings brnams kyi
34a7(rnying rgyud): ngas rgyas ngas la'i / byang ba sas/ nges pa 'a'an ma na// grangs 'du su ma/ gag su 'o// ma ma sa bdag //
34b1(rnying rgyud): mdag ma dag dag pa dang // shan d+ha rnam dag ga rim bzhan// sems can byang chub sems dpa' dang // de bzhin gshegs pa zhes brjod do// zhes pa dang / de'i 'grel bar/ 'di ltar ma dag pa'i gnas skabs pra ni sems can gyi khams zhes bya bya dang /
34b2(rnying rgyud): ma dag pa dang dag pa'i gnas skabs su ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba dang / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i gnas skabs su ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o// zhes bshad pa bzhin dang / de bzhin du theg pa gsum sogs tha dad pa dang / su brtsal ma lnga sogs
34b3(rnying rgyud): gong 'og gi dbye bas tha dad par bzhag pa rnams dang de bzhin du 'gro ba bzang ngan nyan rang dang byang sems sangs rgyas 'phags pa la sogs gong 'og bzang ngan ltar du snang ba thams cad kyang / dper na rdza snod dang / shing snod dang / rin po che'i snod la sogs pa zad
34b4(rnying rgyud): bzang ngan ltar du snang yang snod de dag gi nang gi nam mkha' la bzang ngan med par mnyam pa ltar chos kyi dbyings don dam pa'i bden pa rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal ba de ni bzang ngan dang dge bsnan med par kun la khyab par yod de/ chud bla ma las/ ji ltar tog med bdag nyid can/
34b5(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' kun tu rjes song ltar// sems kyi rang bzhin dri med dbyings// de bzhin kun tu 'gro ba nyid// de spyi'i mtshan nyid nges pa dang // yon tan mthar thug khyab pa ste// gzugs kyi rnam pa dman pa dang // bar ba mchog la nam mkha'i
34b6(rnying rgyud): bzhin// zhes gsungs pa bzhin no// 'o na gong du gnas skabs gsum smos pa ci zhe na/ snying po de nyid sgrib byed kyi drim las grol ba dang ma grol ba'i khyad par gyis 'khor ba dang kyang 'das gnyis su phye ba yin te/ de nyid las/ nyon mongs drabs
34b7(rnying rgyud): g.yogs pa la// sems can zhes ni nges par brjod// de nyid nyon mongs bral gyur na// sangs rgyas zhes ni rjod par byed// ces gsungs pa bzhin dang / gnas skabs gsum po yang / sgrib pa'i mun pa chen pos bsgribs
35a1(rnying rgyud): paras sa skye ba la yang yon tan na shas tsam las med pa las/ snang ba'i drim bas la ga'am gtun pa rnam pa ci chung ga bang gas ram pa bzhinas pa tu sang bas nyan rlung gangag tha tsam yon tan 'bags pa dang /
35a2(rnying rgyud): dag gis kyang mi shes pa thams cad ma spangs pa las gong mar gyur pas thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'phags par snang ba dang / de bas sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba'i sabs rgyas 'phags par snang ba'o// de lta bas na dbyings dod dam pa'i bden
35a3(rnying rgyud): da tan thos rang rgyal/ byang chub sems dpa' ste 'phags pa 'og ma gsum gyis gnas lpags de lta ba bzhin mi ma tshogs myong ci sngal gnas pas yid dpyod bye mos btsam las mngon sum du mi mthong / mthong gom gnyis su phyogs re mthong pa/
35a4(rnying rgyud): 'od kyang lam dpas bu chung gis mabangs ka'i ti 'ur mthang ba tsam las yangs la khab pa'i nyi ma mi mthong ba bzhin dbyings kyi yon tan cha shas tsam las yongs su rdzogs par 'byong ba'i skabs med de/ dag yul min byor do na dum gyis pa thus ter// togs/
35a5(rnying rgyud): ga yin byer dbulas 'das cing dang // rgyal tha ma 'brags rnams kyis kyang bsum thab// ces gsungs pa gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi mar ni rang bzhin pa yin pa mngo sum d+hi bur nas yongs su gas pa gzigs pa te/ blang ba ba rnal
35a6(rnying rgyud): sprin mthongs mapang la nyi bzhin 'di khyod phyogs gci gro nas can// blo mag dag pa'i 'phags rnams kyis kyang thams cad rab tu mthang ma lags// bcom ldan 'das khyong chos sru dam dag blo gros mapa' yas pas// shes byam pa' med
35a7(rnying rgyud): dbang dbyings thab pa de dag gis kun mtha// nam bshad pa bzhin no// de ltar mams can ni khams pa dbyings rang bzhin kyang 'dags pa 'di rang rdzas su bzhugs pas sems can nams tshogs gnyis bsags shing snying gnyis sangs pa'i sangs cas su bye
35b1(rnying rgyud): nan/ dngang maman par gyum ngan/ tha lagatas yid nga na nga ma thar mas sa// nga na tu kyang bal gdodas ca / 'ad pa gtun pas la sa nga na na dung sa nya sa dag paca pa gshes lugs su gnas pa la rna
35b2(rnying rgyud): myed pa te/ sas sa mas nAb ng+gA 'jug pas shes snang ba rnyan sa mad las/ rang ma ba las skyes ni nga bzhin gyis 'dogs la ba'i phyi nan ma nyi bangs pa mams cad kyis pa ci pangs pa da kyis/ rang na kyis spya
35b3(rnying rgyud): gagadan ci ngag na kun dngas da na// ma 'a ni ga na nga nyi da 'ad/ sa nga/
35b4(rnying rgyud): nga mas nag yi pa'i sa kyi nga ga ba ga sa//
35b5(rnying rgyud): nyi las/ ga rdzus rang bzhin sa spyod mal pa dadapa par dag pa bam sbyin mangs pan / dang shes dang 'durgya dang rnam pa nas byed zhan mam dgas khyed ma dag pa panam nyin mdas 'am
35b6(rnying rgyud): ra mas 'i sas dgapas pa bye pa dang pa nyi seM / phyogs nga 'dug da na nga sa gang su/ zhes pa
35b7(rnying rgyud): sa sas sa su san su
36a1(rnying rgyud): zhes nas pa dag dudubyas// sa tu ngan tha kyim cad nga rnabs pa gtan pas bsal bsnolasakyis gaspangs pa dgas su ya nga lam sunam na mo gyur sa sang ba gang pa bananasams
36a2(rnying rgyud): bas snang ba das thab mtha' 'ad sa blan pa 'gyugasams can napas slo pas nags kyis rjes su m-i ng+ge da pa kya // de bzhin tsugs pa'angag N+DIs tag namams nyid ma sa pas rdzogs par nga bya lags dang / ya
36a3(rnying rgyud): skyes kyi sa rtogs pa gzhan byung ye shes pati te/ da n+ti/ den dang chos nyid ga su byungasas rang gi rin pa zhes rabar byu gas shes 'a rten pas 'das pa'i batshan nyid chen te/ ba ga ga gzhan gnams pa / san shes par rag
36a4(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs pabar da mapa'im sa tes brdung shi ni ma ma 'a na/ dan papas pas/ 'di' bas la zag pasang bye/ zhag par bya ba dang / yang nyi sa pa ga /
36a5(rnying rgyud): dag 'thong na rnam par grol// zhes gsungs pa bzhin no// rtogs pa gnyis pa ni/ lam brkom skyabs kyis rtogs pab cas 'gyur gyi rigs de mnyam gzhag gis yang nas kyi tshogs dang / rdzas thob tu bsod nams kyi tshogs gnyis bsags pas mapa
36a6(rnying rgyud): kyis yi tan pa bya pa sa 'i seM shug na sung smrang ma sa/ pa byud/ byu nga me ga/ de'i srid dpangs ca 'ad/ thun da/ ngal ma ma
36a7(rnying rgyud): nga ba nga / don mi gzhan sa sa nga ba rlol 'di nyi ma sa pa bag sa das ga par spya pa/ khang par dang gzhi pa gzugs sbyang ba 'jigapal gnyis su med pa'i migs kyi brgyags tshul bag rnas rgyal 'a gzungs
36b1(rnying rgyud): dang bsu thams ca sams kyi snang rtswam mjug sungs pa la tho kyi ba pan 'ga' gag gis dgas pa dbang gas ma mas dan dam par 'am blangs pas dang sang thub mtha' bzhir grags pa'i nadu sa nam ga sla bar brjod pa'adabyung ba smod lanan pa dag sa byun
36b2(rnying rgyud): spongs te chos thams cad sems kyi snang cha tsam du gsungs pa'i sems dkun gzhi'i rnam shes srang gongs pa'i skabs dang / chos nyid yongs grub la dgongs pa'i skabs gnyis yod de snga mA la dgongs nas 'khrul ba'i yul dang yul can gra rjeb
36b3(rnying rgyud): yin pa'i phyir rtag pa mi srid pas don de ma bden par ma gsungs te/ ye shes snang ba rgyan gyi mdo las/ shA ra t+na t+na'i bu/ sems zhes bya ba ni sems dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid dang / yid kyi lus dang / yid kyi dbang po dang / yid
36b4(rnying rgyud): kyikhams te/ 'di ni sems zhes bya'o// des stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems ni sems kyis stong ste/ de la byed pa po gang yang med do// gal te de'i byed pa po 'ga' zhig yod na ni des byas na gzhan gyis myong ba de lta bur 'gyur ro//
36b5(rnying rgyud): sems kyis kyang sems mngon par 'dra mi byed do// zhes pa la sogs gsungs shing / chos thams cad sems kyi snang cha tsam du gsungs kyang dedon dam pa'i bden par gsungs pa'i skyabs med la/ sems dang / yid dang / rnam shes thams cad
36b6(rnying rgyud): las 'das pa'i ye shes la don dam pa'i bden par bstan te/ 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo las/ sems dang / yid dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / 'du shes med par gyur pas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur/
36b7(rnying rgyud): te/ blo gras chen po sdang ba med pa rnam par rtog pas dben pa'i chos bstan pa 'byung don dam pa 'di pa ga rim dang ga rim gyi mtshams sbyar ba med do// zhes dang / sems dang yid dang rnam shes dang // 'du shes teg pa sangs pa ste/ rnam par rtog pa
37a1(rnying rgyud): thob pa// nyan thos rnams ni rgyal sras yin// zhang dang bzad pa'i khyad par las// de bzhin gshegs kyi la shes dag/ zhes sogs gsungs pa bzhin na// gzhan yangs mas rnam par grub mtha' slab gang
37a2(rnying rgyud): zhig/ don dam bden par 'dod pa ni rnam shes las ma 'das la de ni 'khor ba'i yul can gyi shes bzang ka ma ste 'jig rten las 'phags par mi nus pa'i phyir dang / don dam pa'i bden pa ni zag pa med pa'i dbyings dang de rtogs pa'i sgrib bral gyi ye shes 'phags pa rnams
37a3(rnying rgyud): so so rang gi rig pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid can te/ de gnyis kyi khyad par ni theg pa chen po'i mdo sde las/ de la blo gros chen po ye shes ni rnam pa gsum ste/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mchog go//
37a4(rnying rgyud): de las skyes nas 'jig pa ni rnam par shes pa'o// ma skyes mi 'jig pa ni ye shes so// gzhan yang blo gros chen po mtshan ma dang mtshan ma med par ltung ba dang / yod pa dang med par ltur ba dang / mtshan nyid sna tshogs kyi rgyu las skyes pa rnams ni rnam par shes
37a5(rnying rgyud): pa'o// mtshan ma dang mtshan ma med pa las shin tu 'das pa'i mtshan nyid ni ye shes so// gzhan yang blo gros chen po de la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid ni rnam par shes pa'o// bri ba'i mtshan nyid ni ye shes so// de la rnam pa gsum ni 'di lta ste/ rang dang lci'i
37a6(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid rtogs par byed pa dang / skye ba dang 'jig pa rtogs par byed pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med par rtogs par byed pa'o// de la 'jig rten pa'i ye shes ni yod pa dang med pa'i phyogs la mngon par chags pa mu stegs byed dang / byis pa so/
37a7(rnying rgyud): ma'i skye bo thams cad kyi'o// de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes ni rang dang sgra'i mtshan nyid du ltung ba'i bsam pa la mngon par chags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi'o// de la 'jig rten las 'das pa mchog gi ye shes ni sangs rgyas dang byang
37b1(rnying rgyud): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snang ba med pa'i chos la rab tu rnam par 'byed pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med par mthong ba dang / yod pa dang med pa'i phyogs dang bral ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bdag med pa thugs su chud pa'i phyir 'byung ba'o// gzhan
37b2(rnying rgyud): yang blo gros chen po chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid ni ye shes so// yul sna tshogs la chags pa'i mtshan nyid can ni rnam par shes pa'o// gzhan yang blo gros chen po gsum du 'dus pa'i bya ba skye ba dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid ni rnam par shes pa'o// mi ldan pa'i ro
37b3(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni ye shes so// gzhan yang blo gros chen po thob pa med pa'i mtshan nyid ni ye shes te bdag gi so so rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis rtogs pa'i spyod yul du mi 'byung mi 'jug pa'i phyir chu la chu rna bzhin no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// sems kyis su ni
37b4(rnying rgyud): las la sogs// ye shes kyis ni rnam par 'byed// shes rab kyis kyang snang med dang // mthu yang rab tu thob par byed// sems ni yul dang 'brel pa ste// zhes pa la sogs pa rgyas par gsungs pa dang // de bzhin du 'phags pa dkon mchog
37b5(rnying rgyud): sprin gyi mdo las/ chos 'di ni yi ge thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ smra ba thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ tshig gi spyod yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ ngag gi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ sngos
37b6(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad dang bral ba/ blang ba dang dor ba thams cad dang bral ba/ bye ba dang btsum pa thams cad dang bral ba/ rtog ge thams cad dang bral ba/ brtag par bya ba ma yin pa/ rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa/ rtog ge'i spyod yul las yang dag par
37b7(rnying rgyud): 'das pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ mtshan ma dang bral ba/ mtshan ma'i spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ byis pa'i spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ bdud thams cad kyi yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ nyon mongs pa thams
38a1(rnying rgyud): da kyi khyo tham las yang dag na/ nam pa gas pa shA phrul las pa dag pa du / ga su ma du/ ma / 'ag zugs pa kyad gyu te/ dun mas chu
38a2(rnying rgyud): rig pa/ dri ma med pa/ mgos pa dang / rnam par dag pa/ gya zhom pa/ mchog/ dam pa/ bral/ rtag pa/ brtan pa/ zer zug/ mi 'jig pa'i chos can te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung ste chos kyi dbyings 'don
38a3(rnying rgyud): dug gakho na// zhes pa la sogs pas don dam 'phags pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khya pa'i tshul rgyas par bstan pa dag ni sems tsam pa 'dong pa'i lam ng+ga mi gnas te gzung 'dzin gnyis med shes pa rang rig dang gsal de nyid sangs rgyas sir+g+ha glang por khas /
38a4(rnying rgyud): spangs shing yul can gzhan dbang bden par 'dod pas rnam shes rdzas grub don dam par 'dod pa gang zhig chos kyi bdag med spa de bzhin pa yang rtogs par dka' ba'i phyir ro// de ltar yang yang gshegs las/ sems tsam yin te spang ba med// snang ba
38a5(rnying rgyud): srid pa sa mi s+yA ste// dbu ma yon lam 'dzi // nga dang gzhan dag gis kyang bshad// sems tsam dun rtogs pa dang // rtsa rol dngos po rnam bsal ba// rnam par rtog rmang ldog pas// lam de nyid ni dbu ma'o// zhes bshad pa bzhin
38a6(rnying rgyud): bka' ba ma'i dgongs pa 'di nyid nges don dbu ma chen por gnas pa ni bya rlab sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'grel pa dang theg rten gyi slob dpon shing rta gnyis rjes 'brangs deng bcas pas rang gzhung rnams su gsal ba rang ston pa yin la/ na par slob dpon 'ga'
38a7(rnying rgyud): zhes gis dgos dbang la bton nas rnam gzhag gzhan dang gzhan du smra ba dag byung srid na'ang de dag rnams skye 'phags ji ltar yin tshad gzung dkar la/ 'phags pa'i sar bzhugs par grub na dgongs gzhi gzhan dang gzhan gyis de ltar gsungs pa'i skabs srid pas ra gyis
38b1(rnying rgyud): ba rnams kyis mapa' gcig tu bzung nas chos srang gi las nganam bsog pa nyid dugand du ga la/ gal ta da tha ma rgyad gsum bstan pa 'gyur thamasas ma pa'o zhes smras kyang / yum par ma las/ byams pa/ yangs su brtags pa'i gzugs gang yin pa
38b2(rnying rgyud): dani rjes med par bstan// rnam par brtags pa gzugs gang yin pa de ni rnam par rtog pa rdzas me pa'i byi rjes med par shAlta la~M ring dbang dung drug pa ni sayinano// chos nyid kyi gzugs gang yin pa de ni rdzas med pa yang sa m+lenangs yod pa yang ma sbyin na pa
38b3(rnying rgyud): rang tu bayin par blta bar byar// zhes sogs gsungs pa dang / bkre god don bsus srungang/ gas 'ab ba rol pyod pa ni// bstan pa gsum sa yang dag brten// brtags pa dang ni gzhan dbang dang // yongs su thab 'banan// me 9
38b4(rnying rgyud): rgyal rigs tshig gis// brtags pa thams cad 'gog pa ste// su ma la sogs dpe rnams kyis// gzhan gyi dbang ni yang dag bstan// rnam par byung ba bzhi las ni// yongs su grub pa rab tu bsngags// shes rab pha la yin pa ni/
38b5(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyis gzhan ba stan med// ces pa la sogs pa bo nyid gsuM pa kyi tshul pa ba yanas cang byas par bstan pa dang / de bzhin du gzhan yang snying dpon shASh+Ti ba shes gnyen gyi thugs pa la 'jug pa'i sgor yang / ngo ba nyid gsum gyis su gsum dpas
38b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyur ba sdus pa dang / de'i 'grel ba dbum pa chen po ye shes zlabs mdzad par yang dadang do na gcig par bshar pa sogs dbu mo'i gzhung chen po thams cad du ngo bo nyid gsum ni nam gzhag mdzad pa thams cad kyang dbu ma'i lugs su de med cings mas tsam gyi phugs kho nar
38b7(rnying rgyud): zhes smra mas kyi sags da ma tho das/ gzhan yang lang gshegs las sapapasas 'dibarten dag pa/ gyur ba dananami brta go// snang med pa'i brten das// sems tsam la ni 'di bar bya// yang ga migasapa
39a1(rnying rgyud): sa na ma na/ sla du rgyu na
39a2(rnying rgyud): sa su
39a3(rnying rgyud): med dbu ma dang / de las kyang 'das nas sdang bcas dbu ma sbyin cing / de la ma sleb na thog chen gyi ni tha ma mi ma tha dpa gsungs pa yin lA sems chags pa ca dang nas ji gnas pa thams kyin pa snyan pa'i glen sa mdzo/ @

39a5(rnying rgyud): der ma dza

39b1(rnying rgyud): 'as pathams ca dang thal ba dang / bdag rgyas sa pasags na rgyun pa drung gyur pa pa la gas/ na shA las 'dus pa rnas su byas sngags sa lang shA dus par rgyan du spyad na na byu
39b2(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten pa'i sems tsam smra ba dang rnam parab tu 'gal ba can yin no// kyi phyogs sum srung ba'i thams cad par gyur ba dag gis snang lpags gnyis ka yang zhing khrims sa pa brten pa'i bu mtha bzhi glings ngas bdag na ci med myer ba da
39b3(rnying rgyud): bla nas pa la khyad par med dri gnyis ka'i sbubs su yod pa dang bden par yod pa la khyad par med de/ nges don gyi dgongs pa 'grel pa la rgyal bas lung bstan pa'i slob dpon chen po klu thogs rnam gnyis so so'i bstan bcos kyis gsal ba rtogs shing /
39b4(rnying rgyud): dedang mthun par byed dus kyi thams cad mthen pa na chen 'byung gnas zhi ba dang / legs ldan zhabs dang / gser gling ba dang / jo ba rje migs kyis cang ba shudang/ ba po nas ge bzang posle pa zhal gyi ban / des can
39b5(rnying rgyud): gyi dgongs pa 'chad pan/ gnyis su ma dpa' la shes 'ba' zhig 'di yang dag par yod par nge po yin no snyam du nges par byas nas zhes pa 'di rnal 'byor gyis gsum pa'i sgor byung gi rnal 'byor ram pas ma byung gi rim pa gang drang du bzhed pa'i phyir dang /
39b6(rnying rgyud): bzhin nyid kyangs 'dzin ye shes la bshad pa dang / drob nyid sku'i 'grel pa gnas tshul gyi sku lhag ma gdub po ches nyid du bshad pa'i phyir/ da'i phyir 'khor la pa ba nas dngos su bstan pa'i sto nyid kyis lus can rnams kyi sgo lhan skyes
39b7(rnying rgyud): nga / gra sngags byed rnams kyis grub mthas gsar dri btags pa'i bdag tu smra da / ring sde sa par sgru ba'i zlab mtha'i 'dzin zhen gyi smras pa gcod pa'i dan du la don med dag ga yon ga bar gyi yang mi'i sgom pa pa stong byed 'asgom
40a1(rnying rgyud): pa dang / ci yang ma mthong ba la de kho na nyid rtogs par bstan pas de dang de'i din mthong bas bdag med tshul bzhin du rtogs par byed pa'i go yul gyi lta ba ste mtshan 'dzin gzhag par dada' ba yang thos bsam las byung ba
40a2(rnying rgyud): shes rab kyis 'gog par byed pa la thal rang gi rig pa spos pa gcod byed la rno ba dang / bsgom pa nyams myong gis gtan la 'ben pa'i tshe ni 'khor lo gsum par gsungs pa'i dbu ma chen po'i lugs 'di nyid mchog tu zab la rgya che ba yin te/ rnga khrings
40a3(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa don dam pa'i bden par ngadabyung gi ye shes de nyid ni chos thams cad kyi thog ma'i gnas lugs yin pa gang zhig/ so so rang gi rig pas nyams su myang byar yod pa'i ye shes yin pa'i phyir te/ sgra gcan zin gyis yum
40a4(rnying rgyud): la bstod par/ skabs ma brjod med shes rab pha rol byin// maskyes mi 'gag nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid// so so rang rig ye shes spyod yul ba// dus gsum rgyal ba'i yum la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes pa dang / za bzhi sbas
40a5(rnying rgyud): gal 'od gsal 'dus ma byas// bdud rtsi lta bu'i chos shig bdag gis rnyed// ces gsungs pa sogs kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes mtshon par byas shinga'adi nyid kyi rang bzhin mthong bas don dam bden pa mthong ba zhes bya'i
40a6(rnying rgyud): ci yang med pa'i stong nyid tsam la don dam bden par mi rung ngo // de'i phyir chos nyid yongs grub ni gnyis su med pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes yin pa'i phyir rnam shes kyi chos las yang dag par 'das pa sangs rgyas chos kyi sku dang / ngo bo nyid
40a7(rnying rgyud): sku'i sbas bstan pa/ gsang sngags su gsungs pa'i rgyud gsum gyi rnam par gzhag pa dang / lha dang / sngags dang / rdo rje'i bdag dang / bde ba chen po dang / rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid dang /
40b1(rnying rgyud): gnyug ma'i lus ngag yid gsum gyi rten mi shigs pa'i thig le chen po sogs rgyu 'bras kyi theg pa chen po dag gis skyang gzhi dang / spyod byed dang sbyangs 'bras sogs kyi rnam par gzhag pa dang / gzhi lam 'bras bu'i rnam gzhag thun mong ma yin/
40b2(rnying rgyud): pa rnams kyang sems tsam par grags pa'i grub mtha' dang 'gal ba'i chos su gnas shing / rang stong pa ltar 'dod pa'i lam du'ang mi gnas par 'khor lo tha ma'i dgongs pa sa bcu'i dbang phyug chen po rnams kyis bkral ba dang sngags kyi rgyud de/
40b3(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis bstan pa gcig la gcig ltos kyis mi 'gal bar gnas pa ni shes par bya dgos la/ de lta nyid phyir bka' tha ma'i dgongs pa 'jig rten pa'i sems tsam smra ba dang rnam pa kun tu gcig pa ma yin par theg pa'i rim pa 'og ma
40b4(rnying rgyud): ma'i dgos pa gong ma gong ma'i nang du rim gyis 'du zhing mtha' gcig tu grub pu las 'gal ba med kyang 'og ma la gong ma ches khyad par du 'phags pa bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa rin po che'i khyad par du nges pa khong du chud dgos te de
40b5(rnying rgyud): ltar min na 'khor lo dang por/ sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / mi gtsang ba dang / mi rtag pa zhes bstan nas/ bka' bar par thams cad stong pa nyid du gtan la pha ba nas slar yang mtha' mar/
40b6(rnying rgyud): dang / gtsang ba dang / rtag pa dang / bdag dam par bstan pa'i don gyi dgongs pa rton pa bzhi la gdeng du gyur pa'i blo gros kyis blangs ma shes par sgra ji bzhin par bzung na gdul bya mgo rmongs par 'gyur ba dang bstan pa
40b7(rnying rgyud): 'gal bar dpyod pa'i rnam par rtog pa can du 'gyur te/ 'di la dgongs nas rgyud bla ma'i 'grel bar/ mdor bsdu na gang zag bzhi po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po mthong ba la mig dang mi ldan par bzhag ste/ bzhi gang
41a1(rnying rgyud): zhan 'das ste/ mas kya ba dang / nyan thos dang / nAng sa sa rgyas dang / thag pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chud sems dpa' ste/ da da du/ sa sbyal pa
41a2(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'di na/ 'jig tshogs la blta bar ltung ba rnams dang / rkyen ci 'og la mngon par dga' ba rnams dang / stong pa nyid la sems rnam par g.yengs pa rnams kyi rjod
41a3(rnying rgyud): gas so// nas gsungs pa yin no// zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa bzhin gzhan yang tshul 'di nyid b+hakang dang bsnyen pa tsapa rnams pad nas shin tu sgrub tu yo sang 'dir nga tsam zhig las ma pa da la ga gas
41a4(rnying rgyud): dan bstan pa de dag drang nges gnyis su rnam par gzhag na/ tsho wa~M langar lo rim pa gsum po de dag gis gong du hU~M'i phreng ga bur ba'i dri ma rags pa dang / tha ba dang / shin tum pa'i tshul rnams rgyang zadaH
41a5(rnying rgyud): chung las don du gshegs stong gcig pa'i steng gi rjem ba lags ma ga mthun zhing / 'di ltar nga popa mi rtag pa sogs kyis 'khor ba las yid 'byung zhing mya ngan 'das pa'i sgor 'jug 'du rgyamed/ gnyis banan par byer pa
41a6(rnying rgyud): gsum gyis 'jigarten pa'i bdag tu lta ba dogs mtshan 'dzin ciganyen por 'gyur zhing / gsum pa spyir mi ldog pa'i gtum ces bad par gshegs pa'i tshul na chen po khong du chud par byed pa la dgongs pa ste/ gzung sa kyid b.rang drug
41a7(rnying rgyud): rgyal po sa zhus pa'i mad las/ rigs kyi bu 'di ltar dper na nor bu mkhan mkhas pas nor bu sbyor ba'i tshul legs par shes pa des/ nor bu rin pa che'i rig pa nas yongs phra me dag pa'i nor bu blangs te lan tshwa'i chu ston por grangs nas
41b1(rnying rgyud): rabs yongs su sbyong bar byed do// de bzhin du de'i 'og tu zas kyi khu bar spangs te bal gyi zhabs yongs su sbyong bas yongs su myong bar byed do// de bzhin du de'i 'og tu smyan bzang po'i khu bas grangs te ras zab mos yongs su myong bas yong
41b2(rnying rgyud): su myong bar byed do// yongs su sbyangs te dri ma dang bral ba ni bai DUr+ya rigs chen po zhes brjod do// de bzhin du sems can la dang po mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba sogs yid 'byung ba'i gtam gyis 'dul ba la 'dzud par mdzad pa dang / de
41b3(rnying rgyud): 'og tu rnam par thar pa gsum gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul rtogs par mdzad pa dang / de'i 'og tu phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo'i gtum gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la 'jug par mdzad do// zhugs par gyur cing chos kyi/
41b4(rnying rgyud): rtogs ni ni bla na med pa'i yon gnas so// zhes pa la sogs pas rgyas par gsungs shing / de bzhin du bka' rim pa gsum po drang don dang nges don du rnam par dbye ba yang / dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa'i mdo las/
41b5(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa la zhugs pa rnams la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ston pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo dang po bskor ba de yang bla na mchis pa/ skabs mchis pa/ drang ba'i don rtsod pa'i gzhi'i gnas su gyur pa lags la/ ba
41b6(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das kyis chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa las brtsams te/ theg pa chen por yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la stong pa nyid ston pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa bskor ba de yang bla na mchis pa/ skabs mchis pa/
41b7(rnying rgyud): ba'i don/ rtsod pa'i gzhir gyur pa lags kyi bcom ldan 'das kyis chos rnams ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa nyid las brtsams te theg pa thams cad pa yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la legs par rnam par phye ba dang ldan pa'i shin tu ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i
42a1(rnying rgyud): chos rgyal bar lo gsum pa bskod te/ chas kyi' bar la bskor bdon tha na ma mchis pa/ sbubs ma mchis pa/ ngas pa 'dan/ rtsod pa'i / zh-i ma gyur pa lags so// zhes pa la sogs pa nanas rna
42a2(rnying rgyud): ris kyi rnam par gzhag par mdzad la/ de ltar 'khor lo bar pa drang don du bzhag pa'i rgyu mtshan ni chos 'khor 'dir dgos pa'i dbang gis bde bar gshegs pa'i stobs sogs don dam gyi yon tan rang stong ma yin pa rnams kyang phal cher rab stod
42a3(rnying rgyud): dang de dag legs par gyi ste nang bgal med par ma bstan pa sogs kyis bla na mchis pa la sogs pa gsungs la/ gsum par ni kun rdzob kyi chos rnams rang stong dang don dam pa'i chos gzhan gyis spyod pas de dag gi yul nyid legs par rnam pa ji lta bar
42a4(rnying rgyud): gyes nas bstan pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis kyang de ltar du bzhag go// gal te 'khor lo bar bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i phyir nges don yin la/ de las bzlog nas ston pa'i phyir nga mdzad don gongs pa can yin no zhes sgra
42a5(rnying rgyud): pa ni legs par pa brtags pa ste/ ma gyis mi 'gag gdong nas zhi ba la sogs pa shed gyi na sra ji bzhin pa ni 'khor lo bra ma nyid du mchog tu rdzas shing / shin tu zab pa'i tshul ni rdo rje theg par bstan la/ de nyid mi gsal ba dang / gas
42a6(rnying rgyud): pa dang / rab tu gsal bar ston pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis bla na yod med dang yubs yod med kyi khyad par gsungs pa yin gyi sher byin gyi ngo bo la khyad par yod pa ma yin te/ gang bde gshegs snying po dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / 'od gsal
42a7(rnying rgyud): ba'i sems dang / rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i rigs dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la sogs pa ming gis bstan pa mtha' yas pa thams cad rang byung gnyis su med pa'i ye shes su gcig pa yin la/
42b1(rnying rgyud): de nyid shes rab kya pha ral tu phyin pa ste/ slob dpa na phyogs kyi glang pos/ shes rab pha rol gyi na gnyis med// ya shas dani de bzhin gshegs// bskul don da dang ldan pas// gzhung lam dgu la de'i grwa yin// zhes gsung dang /
42b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir ro// de bas na bka' ma mangs den mthar thug tu lung dang reg pa thams cad kyis 'grub ste rgyal ba nyid kyis drang nges dbye bar mdzad pa dang / gzhan yong de srid du/ thugs med ces pa'i dge slong ni// bstan bcos de yi don la
42b3(rnying rgyud): mkhas// mdo sde drang don nges pa'i don// rnam pa mang po rab tu 'byed// ces rgyal bas drang nges 'byed par lung du bstan pa'i 'phags pa de nyid kyis tha ma nges den mthar thug tu bzhag pa yin cing / bar pa des don dang tha ma drang don yin
42b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i lung gang yang med mod kyi/ 'on kyang bka' tha ma 'di nyid rnam rig smra bar 'dod pa dag gis de ltar byas pa yin srid kyang gong du drangs pa'i nor bu myong ba'i dpe dang nad pa'i sman dang yi ge slob pa'i dpe sogs kyis bstan pa'i go rim dang 'gal ba dang /
42b5(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba nyid dang 'phags pas rnam par gzhag pa la'ang dgos pa med par 'gyur ba sogs skyon mtha' yas shing / der ma zad gardal bya rnams la dang po drang don dang / bar du nges don bstan nas slar yang dang don zlos te bstan pa la dgongs
42b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i len lugs dang dgos pa ci yod kyang bsam dgos so// de bas na nges don mthar drug la dngos por smra ba'i grub mthar bzhag pa dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams la kun rdzob bstan pa'i slar zhus dang / snying po'i chos 'di
42b7(rnying rgyud): spang bar 'gyur pa sogs sdig to mi zad par shes par bya'o// gzhan yang theg pa gsum gyi sgo nas kyang nges don 'khor lo tha mar 'du ba'i dbang du mdzad pas kyang nges don mthar thug tu grub ste/ phyir mi ldog pa 'khor lo'i mdo las kyang / de na
43a1(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das da'i bstan pa kur pa snang chub sems dpa' chen pa mad 'angs snyan pa zhes pa dang dra'i stan las langs te gsal pa/ bcas ldan 'das/ 'dug tan po khams ma ma da 'dang sa na mchis
43a2(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas chub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las 'das pa nano// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams de na bcom ldan 'das gang ces ston/ de bzhin/
43a3(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya'o// chos ston pa ci 'dra zhig lags/ bge ba gsum las brtsams te'o// zag pa gsum po gang lags/ nyan pos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po ste theg pa gsum pod las brtsams
43a4(rnying rgyud): ta chos ston to// sangs bus bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa mthun lags sam/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos bstan pa ni mthun no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos bstan pa ci tsam zhig mthan/ bkang sa pa/
43a5(rnying rgyud): pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos bstan pa ni phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lor mthun no// zhes pa la sogs pas rgya cher gsungs so// bzhi pa rdo rje theg pa'i sde snod bshad pa langang gsum ste/ rgyu'i theg pa las khyad par 'phags tshul/
43a6(rnying rgyud): dbo nges tshig dbye pa'i sgo nas bshad pa/ mtshan nyid de dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor tshul lo// dang po la'ang gnyis te spyi dang bye thag go// dang po ni/ spyir theg pa chen po de la rgyu mtshan nyid dang 'bras bu dzi rje'i theg pa gnyis te/ legs par grub pa'i
43a7(rnying rgyud): byud pas/ kye dang 'bras bu'i dbye ba yis// pha rol phyin pa'i theg pa dang // rdo rje 'theg pa bla na med// ces pa'o// gnyis pa ni/ chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa zab cing rgya che ba'i gnas lugs 'jal ba na/ mtshan nyid theg pas gtan tshigs kyi sgo nas gzhal pa'i
43b1(rnying rgyud): bsam shas ces ngas sung dpag bangs par chad mas btun la lab pa'i don dam bdun pa thos byas cig na dang / da langs shes kyi 'o skyes pa la 'bad bas 'jog pa'i zhug nas dang / dal tog dpyod lhag mthang dru btags pa tsam gyis t+tang 'dzin dang / dral po dag/
43b2(rnying rgyud): tu tshogs grangs med pa 'du byas pa'i rgyu las thob pa la phyogs pa'i 'bras bu la dmigs pa'i zab pa tsam dang / rgya che ba'i phung khams skye mched la sogs kyang kun rdzob kyi bden par gtan la phab nas blang dor gyi 'du shes dam pos dkris pa tsam las med la/ sngags
43b3(rnying rgyud): su gtan tshigs dang blos byas pa'i bas ma byung gi shes rab la ma ltos par/ dbang gsum pa dang / ye shes btsan thabs su dbab pa dang / rdo rje'i lus kyi rten 'grel las rtsa rlung thig le la gnad du bstun pas blos ma byas pa'i ye shes rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos
43b4(rnying rgyud): nyid dam chos kyi sku'i snying po gtan la phebs nas/ de nyid kyi ngang du rang bzhin gyis blos gnas pas don dam pa'i bden pa rtogs nas tshe gcig la sogs pa la byang chub mngon du byed pas zab mo mngon sum du skye ba dang / rgya che ba yang dbyings 'od gsal gyi dkyil
43b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor du ye nas gnas pas gzhi rgyud gtan la phab nas/ de la brten pa'i kun rdzob ltar sdang ba'i snod bcu dbye mched thams cad spang blang dang bral ba'i sgra dang gzhal yas khang dang zhing gi bkod par rtogs pas lam gyi rgyud rnams nyams su blang byar bstan
43b6(rnying rgyud): pas/ thun mong gi dngos grub grub pa brgyad sogs dang / thun mong ma yin pa mthong la ma nas mi slob pa'i bar gyi 'bras bu'i rgyud gtan la 'thebs pa'i phyir zab cing rgya che ba'i don la rmongs pa med pa yin no// rnam pa gzhan du/ myur ba dang / bde ba
43b7(rnying rgyud): dang / thabs la mkhas pas kyang khyad par du 'phags te/ ji ltar myur ba yin zhe na/ skye ba 'di'am/ skye ba bcu drug gam/ bskal pa gsum mam/ bskal pa brgyad kyis byang chub thob pa ste/ rgyu chis myur pa yin zhe na/ cho ga'i khyad par gyis lha rnams dngos
44a1(rnying rgyud): su mchod pa len pas yongs su spyad pa las byung ba'i bsod nams yod pa dang / sngags kyi mthus chu thigs pa gcig kyang gtA'i bye snyed du 'gyur bas de snyed kyi bsod nams 'byung ba dang / las dang po bas ma dag pa'i snang ba 'gog pa'i zhing
44a2(rnying rgyud): myong ba'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du byed pa dang / sngags dang ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par rengs kyang sems can rnams smin pa'i rgyu shad par can 'di dag theg pa 'di nyid la zhugs patsam la'ang yod cing / ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyis gzugs bden pa gnyis ka'i tshul gyis 'azas bu'i
44a3(rnying rgyud): rnam pa la dmigs pa'i shes rab rnams dang po nas tha ma'i bar du yod pa dang / ji ltar na bde ba yin zhe na/ lus dang sems la tshor ba rtsub po med pa nyid de/ rgyu cis bde ba yin zhe na/ 'di la skal ba drug dang ldan pa'i lus kyang 'grub pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang ting nge 'dzin
44a4(rnying rgyud): mang po 'thob pa dang / sngags kyi mthus sangs rgyas rnams mngon sum du bzhugs pa dang / sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor bas sems can gyi bsam pa thams cad sgrub pa'i phyir dang / thabs la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ 'pho ba med pa'i bde ba sogs tshul khrims
44a5(rnying rgyud): bslab pa dang / mtshan bcas dang mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bslab pa dang / bden gnyis gdod nas dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa dang / spyod yul la 'jug pa rnams so// gzhan yang ra li bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
44a6(rnying rgyud): chud las/ nyen thos la sogs theg chung la// man ngag yod pa ma yin te// lta ba smod pa sems bzung dang // chu dang lam dang 'bras bus// dus dang longs spyod rnal 'byor dang // bdag gzhan don dang dgos pa dang // ngas dub
44a7(rnying rgyud): maze' spangs tshogs chung dang // tshogs bsags pa dang khyad par dang // khyad par rnam pa bco lnga yis// rig 'dzin theg pa khyad par 'phags// zhes bstan pas/ lta bas khyad par du 'bags pa ni/ sems nyid don dam bden pa dkor
44b1(rnying rgyud): bdun nga ba nyid du gdod nas lhun gyis grub pa ste/ de yang nga ba rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i cha nas dbyings don dam/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad kyi 'char gzhir gnas pa nyid dngas gsal sgrib g.yogs thams cad dang bral ba'i cha nas ye shes don dam/
44b2(rnying rgyud): de yi sgra dang ye shes kyi yon tan 'char rung ma 'gags par gnas pa 'bras bu'i don dam ste/ phyi ma 'di la sangs rgyas kyi sku gsung thugs yon tan zin las lnga'i gsang ba chen po 'bras bu'i chos rnams lhun grub tu bzhugs pa ni rang bzhin gdod ma'i
44b3(rnying rgyud): 'gog pa don dam bden pa chen por gtan la bab nas/ sems nyid don dam bden pa de nyid kyi rtsal lam snang cha snod bzud byis pa rnams la kun rdzob pa ltar snang ba rnams kyang sku dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen por rang snang bas 'khor 'das bzang ngan dbyer
44b4(rnying rgyud): med par mnyam pa nyid du rdzogs par gtan la dbab pa kun rdzob kyi bden pa/ de gnyis kyang blang dor res 'jog can ma yin par gser dang gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang / g.yu dang g.yu'i sngon po dang / mar me dang mar me'i 'od lta bur zung 'jug ngo bo gcig pa'i
44b5(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid du gdod nas gnas pa ni bden pa dbyer med lhag pa'i chos sku chen po ste/ der 'dzin gyi bsam brjod las kyang yang dag par 'das pas na ji snyed tsam du bden pa dbyer med pas ma brjod las 'das pa zhes gdags pa yin la/ de nyid sangs rgyas
44b6(rnying rgyud): kyis bzang por la mdzad/ sems can gyis ngan par ma bcos pa'i phyir bcos ma glo bur gyi chos ma yin par gdod ma khungs thub kyi chos sems nyid gnyug ma'i gshis lugs su de ltar du gnas pa'i phyir te/ sangs rgyas gsang ba'i la me sa
44b7(rnying rgyud): dra// rgyal 'gros ma mdzad ma bcos phyir// rang bzhin rang gis dbyer med la// de ming zhen pa dgrol gyi du// tha snyad gnyis par bsam brjod 'das// zhes so// bden pa gnyis ci gnas tshul de sngags kyi lta ba khyad par du 'phags pa yin kyang / ngan
45a1(rnying rgyud): kyi mkhas pa 'ga' zhig gis phyir phar phyin theg pa'i lta ba dang gsang sngags gnyis khyad par mi 'byed par 'dod pa dang / bye brag kun rdob ji ltar snang ba de ni lta bar mi rung ste/ yul kun rdob pa la dmigs pa'i yul can
45a2(rnying rgyud): sa bsgom pa'i blong yin pa'i phyir byams snying rje byang chub kyi se mas sogs sgom pa bzhin no// zhes 'chang mod/ 'di ni rdo rje theg pa'i grub mtha' la glo sa phyogs pa'i gtam ste/ gong du bshad pa de sngags kyi sgrub shes par bya ba'i gnad dgal
45a3(rnying rgyud): yin la bsgom par bya ba'ang shin tu yin te/ lta ba zhes pa chos thams cad kyi gdod ma'i gnas lugs ga 'dzin pa de la de dang rjes su mthun pa'i shes rab kyi mig gis blta ba'i don yin pa gang zhig 'phags pa rnams kyis ma 'khrul ba'i ye shes la spang
45a4(rnying rgyud): bAni chos thams cad kyi gnas sregs don dam par bden pa tshad ma yin la/ sems ca nan nus kyi lakhrul blo'i rnam shes ce yul du snang ldan chos rnams ni sbung lags pa rjeb par ldan pa yin pa ma byer/ dper na chug cig la'ang 'gro brdzus
45a5(rnying rgyud): gis sdang tshul du mar ma zang la/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis yum mAmra kI'i dbyings su sdang ba bzhin no// yang ga nas lugs pa ci yang mi dmigs pa'i spos pa bye bral gso no // de ni mad+mo la mdub shad pa'i man ma ny-id Sh+T+rI la po yin pa
45a6(rnying rgyud): mad sngags kyi lta ba la khyad par med par grub zer na/ dbyings thos pa thams cad dang bral ba'i che nas chos kwa'i rnam pa la ma b+he Tu thig cem ba shad pa ltar yin tu zlos bral med dag gi kho na la zag srid kyi chos thams cad kyi 'chi ga zhing gyur pa'i
45a7(rnying rgyud): rnapa'i kun gyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid dang / sngags ces khyad par du byas pa'i bde ba chen za yon tan kyang ma 'i ste// dri ma med pa'i 'od las/ nam mkha'i khams la rnam pa thams cad pa'i stong pa nyid dang me 'ong gi phrabab pa bzhin du skye ba
45b1(rnying rgyud): na su dum nga sa su / dusmra du chu sa smra sa sa
45b2(rnying rgyud): gebade dug ga pa 'byab chos la rnam sa chags pa/ byar ma gyi dbang byos meng dag par bya ba'i ba par cas yongs sa ngas pa/ zhes ngogs gsungs pa'i ni dang / lha 'dud ma basbyin du/ zung po ma dpang stong pa nyid/
45b3(rnying rgyud): she bzhin du rnying ba mad// rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa'i// stong nyid de ltar 'gyur ba yin// skye ba myed pa 'gag med pa// shes thug shig 'dir mthong ba// stong pa 'dings mi 'i stong ba nyid// rlung po rnam par dbyed pas
45b4(rnying rgyud): mun// ces bshad pa ltar dang / glan rdzob kyi mtshan nyid med par gtan la phab pa tsam las ngag mnyam chen por gdod nas gnas pa'i gnad mi shes dem shes pas gzugs sgo gnyis kyi rten 'bral mig pa'i rnam pa la mthod thom pa
45b5(rnying rgyud): mra shes/ des shes pas 'dod yon mongs su sdod pa'i tshogs zad par can pasags pa'i thabs gangasamam ga nyen gyi 'ching bas grangs med gsum gyi mtha' la ltos 'cha' dgos pa yi nas/ sags su parda skang zung du 'jug pa'i dbyings dang /
45b6(rnying rgyud): gas gtus sum pa khrin nyid kyis 'a zlas tha ma pa yenas spyan gyis thab pa bathugs pa'i cig sa gnas sa/ su shin byanam par dag pa nyid rgyu ba'i yul du shes par zas nas de na te la bas / gas pa 'a gi
45b7(rnying rgyud): srin byar nga dang da rnam pa las byed kyis sgra ma ste bu'i bskyed 'i sa dngas rlung cig la la gnang du bstan pa'i rdzogs ris kyang per ban la thu spangs pas ma dag pa'i gzhan dbang las byung ba'i labul tog tu phrer ba'i spang tshul glid ba spyod du legs
46a1(rnying rgyud): nargyang thams cad bya tha rnas sangs sbyangs pa'i nga pan da kyilal ba gdang 'a ga sulags na du na gan sa sa dgas mas cad par nga dugs par gas pa sa pa
46a2(rnying rgyud): bu'i thag par grub ste/ pad+ma tsa mo las/ dris dang byings kyi rang bzhin ni// skrag sum ye shes bzhi du cas// gang po dag pa de nyid du// ra gas la mngon du 'char ba dang // 'drab pa me byed ba la// 'an cu theg par yang dag brjod//
46a3(rnying rgyud): sa ga ngas pa'i phyir dang/ thams nyid khyed cu gyis rnas pasgom pa ni snang ba la dmigs pa'i yul kun myi shes pa mdag pa'i ba sus thung ba yin pa'i phyir sngags kyi sku sgomathun mong ma yin pa ga nyi pa'i zhabs pa da ni mda'i gsu la
46a4(rnying rgyud): gsungs pa'i kun rdzob sems brgyad kyi thebrag yin pa gyis pa'i blo gas kyis kyang rtogs nus pa der zad la/ da'i byer/ sgra 'phrul la ma ri madra/ bla me theg pa'i nang na ni// don dam du ni mnya ma rdzogs la// kun rdzob kyi ni thams cad du/
46a5(rnying rgyud): dgra dang ma dag gnyis su 'dzin// thabs kyi zag pa chen por ni// rnam par byung dang sdug bsngal dag// kun rdzob tu yang dbyer med pas// lta ba mtho man de tsam mo// zhes bshad pas so// da rgyang nga las kyang ches byed par du bla ra pa ni/
46a6(rnying rgyud): dbyings dag mnyam rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i 'od gas la rang gnas chen po bcos bsgyur med pa'i ye shes byas chos blo las 'das pa'i bcings grol gzod nas dag pa'i ngang la yid dpyod zlos btags kyis bzo 'chos mi dgos par rang babagashis kyi
46a7(rnying rgyud): thugs su bzhag par dus gsum las 'das pa'i rig pa dri ma med pa de la zlos pa thams cad dang bral ba'i gnas lugs kyin ci ma log par gnas pa dang / sla dang yid dpyod kyis rtag chad kyi mtha' bsal bar rlom pas sems dang sems kyang blang do
46b1(rnying rgyud): na du sprul na sa sa smra sa sasu tu
46b2(rnying rgyud): su smra sa
46b3(rnying rgyud): sa sa pa sa sI sa ma
46b4(rnying rgyud): ba na na sa na zhis pa
46b5(rnying rgyud): byags sas sadungs su /
46b6(rnying rgyud): du nga rgya na sa su sa na na su su sus pang na su / ba dug gas
47a1(rnying rgyud): ltung nyams sulan pas 'phags par bsta // zhes bkral la/ yang nacan pa'i chan po bzhes 'phags par btun tu/ 'phags pa rnams gas pabyas// dmags pa da pa ma ca
47a2(rnying rgyud): dang / de bzhin du sgrub pa dang / ye shes dang / babs rnams kyi chen po'i yang chen por gyur pas 'phags par bstan la/ slebs kyang / 'di ni snod ce khyad par dang // snod byed pa'i nas dang de// gzung dang sem tha
47a3(rnying rgyud): dang // 'bras bu dag gi khyad par gyis// sngags kyi theg pa khyad par 'phags// zhes gsungs pas/ gnas lugs rtogs pa'i lta ba ni 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir de la khyad par bstan pas lta ba la khyad yod par grub bo// de bzhin du spyod pa yang
47a4(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid la spang bya drug lnga sang 'geg gis 'du shes la gnas pa'i zag bcas kyi tshul khrims la blang dror byed la/ sngags su dag mnyam snga ma'i rang bzhin gyis kun 'thung lam du bskur bas tshogs dang / mchod pa dang / 'phob med par
47a5(rnying rgyud): tshul khrims sogs kyis 'phags/ sems bzung ba yang / mtshan nyid kyis ni wAg gi tI nge 'dzin la sems bzung ba'i 'brad rtsol gyi ngal ba chen pos dus ring por sgrub dgos pa nyid/ sngags su rim pa gnyis dang zung 'dug gi nas
47a6(rnying rgyud): 'byor khyad par can gyis skad cig la ye shes rtogs pa'i phyir 'phags/ chu'ang mtshan nyid kyis tshogs sogs sngon du meng bas don de ma mthong bar 'dod la/ sngags su bral gu'i ye shes rang la gnas pa nyid bcan thabs su de sbed pas chos
47a7(rnying rgyud): bden pa rtogs pas 'jug/ lam yang mtshan nyid kyi rdzogs bsags pa la mata mdzes nges 'jog gis lam ba skal chen du mar bgrod dgas pa nyid/ sngags sa mnyam ngas dbyar med kyil ma la thugs pas myur du 'grod pas la 'gas/
47b1(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu'ang mtshan nyid du dus ring po zhig tu phyis 'byung bar 'dod/ sngags su gzhi 'bras dbyer ma dang lta lhan grub tu 'dod pas 'phags/ sa'ang mtshan nyid du wang gnyen rim can gyis dbyibs bcu gcig tu 'dod la/ sngags sra brtsa
47b2(rnying rgyud): gnyis ma chags pad+ma can gyi sa dang / bcu gsum rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs kyis 'phags/ dus kyang mtshan nyid pas bskal chen grangs med gsum sogs 'gor la/ sngags su dam tshig ma nyams pas tshe gcig sogs kyis 'grub pas
47b3(rnying rgyud): 'phags/ longs myong bar mtshan nyid la 'dod yin spangs te phur/ sngags la grogs su byed pas 'dags/ rnal 'byor kyang mtshan nyid pas mnyam dzes pa dang byed la/ sngags su dbyer med bsam gyis mizapa pa'i rnas 'byor pa
47b4(rnying rgyud): du phyed pas 'phags/ bdag gzhan gyi don grub pa'ang mtshan nyid pas gnas skabs cung zad phan pa tsam las cher mi 'grub/ sngags kyis las gang yang rung bas tshar gcod dang rjes 'dzin gyi sgo mang pos rang dang gzhan gyi don la spyod pas 'phag sa/
47b5(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa'ang mtshan nyid la chu'i bregs tsam las ma shes paN+Di/ sngags la 'bras bu gseng chen nges par byed pas 'phags/ pra slabasang la dub kyi skyon spangs pa dang / tshogs chung ngus don chen po 'gra pa'i phyir yang mtshan nyid
47b6(rnying rgyud): lam+b+ha 'brags la/ phyogs bsags pa yang mtshan nyi la/ smi mags par bye drug gi spyod pas pa/ pang grangs med pa rnams sa su mar bsngags dgos panyid/ thugasas nga ngu tsam yang thugs kyi byin na na gyis rnams ma
47b7(rnying rgyud): mdzod du spel nas sbyin pa byar yod pa'i phyin rgya che zhing yul thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing du shes pa dang / longs spyod thams cad tshogs su 'gyur ba dang / nyon mongs rnams rang bzhin gyis ma spangs par dag pas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs
48a1(rnying rgyud): myur du 'dums shing rdzogs pas 'phags so// gzhan yang mtshan nyid du sgra snang la sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dang / lus byab tha lal gyi sgo nas dag pa la 'jug pa las dad/ sngags pa pa'i gsang bad
48a2(rnying rgyud): bzang du sang ba thams cad dang gzhal yas khang / was dkyil 'khor du rdzogs pas m+b+ha'i rgyag rgyu bdu 'gro las ma 'das pas 'phags/ mtshan nyid mang byug cha ltar stong pa dang / dag smra ba'i 'jug pa bcad dadag pa la 'dzag pa rna
48a3(rnying rgyud): med/ sngags su gsung gi gsang ba sgra dbyangs mi shigs pa'i nAd chen po'i rang bzhin shes pas chos kyi char 'bebs pa dang / ngag gsung gi dkyil 'khor du gdod nas glanas pas su tshig grag pa thams cad sngags kyi rang gdangs su shar bas ci spras
48a4(rnying rgyud): thams cad nus pa thogs pa med pas don sgrub pa'i phyir 'phags/ mtshan nyid pas thugs dran rtog thams cad rang bzhin med pas rgyas 'debs pa dang / yid tha mal gyi rnam rtog 'du 'gro bkag nas zhi stag gi ting nge 'dzin sgrub la/ sngags su
48a5(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi gsang b.ras nyid mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba chen po dang rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan pa'i dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid thung du 'jug pa'i rang bzhin du shar bas/ yid kyi dran tog thams cad chos nyid kyi rol pa 'geg pa med par shang bas ting
48a6(rnying rgyud): 'dzin rnam tshun gyi rnal 'byor mnyam rjes gnyis med rnam par mi rtog pa'i dkyil 'khor du lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir 'phags so// de tsam gyis mtshon pas khyad par gzhan yang bsam gyis mi khyab par shes par bya ste/ mdor na/ dgongs pa lung ston pas/
48a7(rnying rgyud): shin tu grangs med bas pa pa ru// sangs rgyas rnams kyis gang mkhyen pa// sngags pa rnams kyis dus gcig tu// tshe gcig rdzogs pa'i byang chub tho// ces gsungs phyas sdud par bya'o// gnyis pa de bo ni/ ston pas gsungs pa
48b1(rnying rgyud): thig chen gyi sde stong gang zhig rgyu 'bras dbyer med lhan grub tu blta bas kun 'byung bden pa'i rang bzhin lam bden dang sdug bsngal bden pa'i rang bzhin 'gog bdan du snang bas byed las gzhi'i gnas lugs la spang blang med par nyams su blangs pas 'bras bu myur na
48b2(rnying rgyud): 'grub par byed pa zhig go// gsum pa nges tshig ni/ ma na yid dang tra ya skyob pa la 'jug pa yi ge gyis bstan gyi dbang gis man+t+ra zhes pa/ gsang ba 'dus pa las/ dbang po dang ni yul rnams kyi// chen cis gang dang gang byung yid/
48b3(rnying rgyud): yid de man ces bya bar bshad// tha ni skyob par byed pa'i don// ces dang / snga 'gyur thig le kun gsal chen po las kyang / sngags gsum dag gi nges tshig ni// shes skyob byir na der brjod pa'o// zhes bshad pa ltar yid shes pade myur du
48b4(rnying rgyud): skyob pa'i phyir na sngags so// de yang bde bas skyob pa ni ma hA mA yA las/ 'dod pa'i longs spyod lnga po la// ci bde bar ni spyad pas 'grub// ces pa dang / myur bas skyob pa ni/ grangs med pa gsum gyis tshogs sogs la ma ltos par
48b5(rnying rgyud): thabs la mkhas pas tshe gcig sogs kyis 'bras bu mngon du byed nus pas na myur ba dang 'bras bu'i theg par bzhag pa yin te/ dpal kha sbyor thig le las/ bskal pa bye ba du ma ru// bsgrub par dka' ba'i sangs rgyas kyang // tshe 'di
48b6(rnying rgyud): nyid la ster bas na// 'bras bu'i theg pa zhes bya'o// zhes pa dang / sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor las/ bskal pa bye ba grangs med kyis// sangs rgyas kun dngos mi thob pa// gsang sngags tshe 'di'i cho ga yis// tshe 'di nyid la
48b7(rnying rgyud): thob par 'gyur// ces gsungs pa bzhin no// yang na/ e waM gyis mtshon pa'i rnam kun mchog ldan gyi stong gzugs phyag rgya chen po zhu ba des drangs pas 'dod chags chen po'i thig le'i 'gros las shar ba'i lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba dang stong pa
49a1(rnying rgyud): ngo bo gcig tu gyur pa'i zung 'jug ye shes mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba chen po de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa yin la/ des spang bya 'gyur ba de 'pho ba'i bag chags dang mtshan rtog sdom par byed pa'i yid bde myur gyi sgo nas byab
49a2(rnying rgyud): pas kyang sngags te/ dus kyi 'khor lo las/ dbyangs dang gsal byed kyi tshogs ni mi 'gyur ba ma yin te mi 'gyur ba'i sgras ni mchog tu mi 'gyur ba bde ba'i ye shes rdo rje sems dpa'o// de bzhin du yid khyab par gyur pa nyid kyi phyir sngags kyang
49a3(rnying rgyud): mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes su brjod do// zhes pa dang / rdo rje rtse mo las/ sngags rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs yin te// chos kyi snying po sgrub byed pas// chos kyi dbyings dang yang dag ldan// zhes so//
49a4(rnying rgyud): rgyas par ston pa'i bka'i tshogs la rig pa 'dzin pa'i sde snod dam rdo rje theg pa'i sde snod ces btags te/ pi To ka zhes pa gang bu dang bre bo che la 'jug pas don gyis 'di ltar phung po khams dang skye mched kyi chos nas sgra dang ye shes kyi bar gyi shes bya'i tshul
49a5(rnying rgyud): rnams gnas lugs ltar gtan la phab cing zhib par bstan pa'i phyir shin tu rgyas pa'i sde snod dang / sde snod 'og ma gsum gyi brjod bya thams cad 'dir 'dus shing rdzogs pas sde snod thams cad kyi ma mo 'ang yin te/ sgyu 'phrul rgyas pa las/
49a6(rnying rgyud): mnyam nyid don rtogs rang rig rgyal po ni// rgya mtsho chen por chu klung kun 'ab ba ltar// bla med don rtogs thabs chen 'di dag tu// rnam thar theg pa bsam yas ma lus 'dus// zhes so// de la rig pa 'dzin pa ni/ gang zhe na 'jig
49a7(rnying rgyud): rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa gnyis las dang po ni/ ril bu mig sman dngos grub dang // sa 'og ral gri dngos grub dang // mkha' la 'phur dang mi snang dang // shi ba med dang nad 'joms so// zhes las chen brgyad bub pa rig
49b1(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa chung ngu dang / 'bring ni 'dod par rig pa dzin pa phal pa dang / chen po ni tshwa dang longs spyod la sogs pa bskal pa drug gram dpag tu med par 'dod pa dang / gzugs kyi reg pa 'dzin pa gsum dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa
49b2(rnying rgyud): mthong lam nas bzang slob pa'i sar gnas pa zung 'jug gi sems can nam dri ma med pa'i ye shes kyi sku ste rig pa 'dzin pa dang / de nyid 'ja' lus yin mod kyi khams gsum pa'i gzugs can ma yin cing de la yon tan ci khyad par bdun dang ldan te/
49b3(rnying rgyud): de 'dzin la gnas pa dang / mngon shes lnga dang ldan pa dang / zhing sna tshogs su 'gro ba'i don spyod pa dang / 'dod ci 'chums pa med pa dang / 'dod pa mtha' yas pa la bde chen po longs spyod pa dang / tshe tshad las brgal pa dang / yid
49b4(rnying rgyud): kyi lus su gnas pa'o// de yang phung po'i ze tog ma nyams pa ni/ ye shes kyi mu tsam dang / las sa ma ting nge 'dzin gyis nyams pa de'i tshe rig pa 'dzin pa'i ye shes kyi sgra zhes bya ste 'di la ma hA yo gar rnam sden/ tsho dbyung / phyag chen/
49b5(rnying rgyud): lhan pa pa ste lha dang / mnyam sbyor du bdun du dbye bar mdzad la/ de dag rnams kyis bslab par bya ba'i gzhir gyur pas sam theg pa 'di la zhugs pas bran mong dang mchog gi grub pa de// khu thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir reg pa 'dzin pa'i ni stong te/ dpung
49b6(rnying rgyud): bzang gi rgyud kyi 'grel pa las/ rig 'dzin gyi sde snod ces bya ba ni rig sngags 'char rnams kyis bslang pa'i gzhi dang / lta ba'i rlung gi grub pa'i mtha' 'di nyid kyis ston to// zhes bshad pa ltar ro// de nyid rdo rje theg pa yini te/ rdo rje mi byed pa
49b7(rnying rgyud): dang mi shigs pa'i don du bshad na gang tha dad du mi phyed pa ni 'khor 'das gnyis sngang tshul la tha dad kyang gnas lugs su sems nyid las nam yang g.yos pa med pas na/ tha dad med pa'i rang bzhin ni// rdo rje zhes su brjod pa yin// zhes pa dang / mi shig
50a1(rnying rgyud): panamatshan pa shA ba mas ga bas kyang mashogs pan ma tud kya man pas sangs rgyas thams cad tsu thugs te/ byed rdo rje dang bzangs sa sangs rgyas pas smra tugags nas pad pa ni sa
