50a2(rnying rgyud): gnas pa gong du smos pa bzhin dang / de 'thob byed kyi rten nam bgrod byed du gyur pa'i phyir theg pa'i sgras spros pas brjod pa dang rjod byed kyi tshul te/ 'dus pa'i 'grel pa las rdo rje'i theg pa zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po ma lus pa bsdus pa ni pha rolan
50a3(rnying rgyud): phyin pa drug yin la/ de rnams bslus pa ni thabs dang shes pa yin zhing de dag kyang bsdus pa ro gcig pa de ni byang chub kyi sems yin te/ de yang rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin yin la de nyid ni rdo rje yin no// rdo rje yang yin la theg pa yang yin par ma
50a4(rnying rgyud): theg pa ste sngags kyi theg pa zhes bya ba'i don to// bla med ces bya ba ni/ theg pa thams cad ci mchog nyid du gyur ba'i phyir ro// zhes bshad pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyis dri ma med pa'i 'od las/ rdo rje zhes pa ni me med pa'i ye shes
50a5(rnying rgyud): bsam du med pa'i thugs rdo rje'o// de gang la yod pa de ni rdo rje can te/ zhes dang / rdo rje ni mi byed pa dang michod pa chen po yin la de nyid theg pa yin pa ni rdo rje theg pa ste sngags kyi tshul dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'bras bu dang chu'i bdag nyid gcig tu 'dres
50a6(rnying rgyud): par gyur pa'o// zhes dang / rdo rje zag pa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ci theg pa ste/ mu stegs dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams kyis mi phyed pa'i phyir rdo rje theg pa ste/ thar par 'dis 'gro ba'i phyir rdo rje
50a7(rnying rgyud): theg pa'o// zhes sogs rgya cher gsungs so// yang na tanA'i sgra las sems skyob pa la 'jug ste/ tsi tan sems dang tha yi skyob pa la 'jug pa'i phyir/ dka'i 'grel ye shes ldan las/ de sems rnam par rtog pa las skyob par byed pas ne
50b1(rnying rgyud): ga ngasardzun nadu su na su na tu du su sadu sa/
50b2(rnying rgyud): pa da pa bul par nas pa sa / dewA / khyod dedam dgas dag / 'phrog pa'i
50b3(rnying rgyud): hU~M/ su / / na/ nas su sa
50b4(rnying rgyud): zhesas// ji nyi thabs kyi rgyan gyis zin pa dang mthon pa la ltos nas gzhi lam 'bras gsam nga ste/ brang rtogs par byab gzhi mthu'i rjud/ gang gis rtags shing bamed pa thabasas mal chud/ gang dri mapar byed pa
50b5(rnying rgyud): 'brang bu'i nyud dang gsum ste de yang brjod byal ltos nas gzhi dang 'bras tha'i rgyud dang rjo byed la ltos nas thabs sem lam gyi rgyud de sngags rnams dang de'i chog la sogs pas 'jig rten dang 'jig tan las 'das pa'i dgos pa me lus par 'grub par byed pa/
50b6(rnying rgyud): rdo rjetsam pas/ 'brel dang macad med kyir dang // zan su 'tshogs pas byud bas bya// zhes so// de la gzhi'i lce dag zhe na/ theg sa med pa'i dris rnams nas babyed da'angs / sems kyi rang ba zhini 'odag
50b7(rnying rgyud): grangasan pad/ sems dngas mas las sbyang brnams dang / spyod nga bachung bya'ong bzhin nga / sa dang / spyang / khrim ni/ chos kyi dbyings pa len pa nasas spying btu gradusu zin/ gzhing byal du
50b8(rnying rgyud): mtshamamams ca #
51a1(rnying rgyud): gnas lugs rang rig pa byang chub kyi sems bden pa dbyer med blo'i spyod yul dang bral bar rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar ye nas gnas pa gang yin pa ste zhing dang / sku dang / ye shes la sogs pa 'bras bu
51a2(rnying rgyud): chos mthun pa'i khyad par can rang bzhin bde ba chen po rgyan 'chang ba med pa chos nyid kyis thob pa ste khyad par gyi chos bzhi dang ldan pa de nyid rtogs ma rtogs kyi dbang gis 'khor 'das gnyis kyi gzhi 'am rgyar 'gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang rang bzhin la
51a3(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ba med par rgyun chags pas na chu'i rgyud ces bya ste/ de nyid sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo yin pa'i cha nas bde gshegs snying po dang / stong chas chos sku'i yon tan dang / snang chas gzugs sku'i yon tan 'char rung du gnas pas rang bzhin gnas rigs dang / 'khor
51a4(rnying rgyud): 'das gnyis kyi 'byung gzhi yin pas kun gzhi'i ye shes dang / kri ya'i bdag gi de kho na nyid dang / u pa dang yogs don dam mtshan ma med pa'i byin rlab kun rdzob rdo rje dbyings kyi lhar blta ba dang / ma hA yo ga'i bdan gnyis dbyer med lhag
51a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i chos sgra chen po dang / a nu yo ga'i dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i sras rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor dang / a ti yo ga'i ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje gsum la sogs pa'i tha snyad gang la'ang 'jug pa'i gzhi ste bye brag lus
51a6(rnying rgyud): can rnams kyi snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo'i dbus su chu'i rgyud kyi rten dngas ma lnga ldan gyi dbus su chos sgra byang chub sems nyid thig le mi shigs pa'i rang bzhin du bzhugs par bshad cing 'byung lnga sems dang bcas pa'i dngas mjug yang gnyis gnyis ngo
51a7(rnying rgyud): gcig tu 'jug pas shin tu phra ba'i sgo gsum rdo rje mi shigs pa gsum gyi rang bzhin du ye nas gnas shing rnam pa kun tu mi g.yo ba ste/ rdo rje phreng ba las/ lus can snying la gang gnas pa// rang byung zag med ye shes gzugs/
51b1(rnying rgyud): ma shags thag la bar ru nag// nam ma 'a ga jam na khyab pa// ma gnas nas sna'i rang ba nayi na// zhes pa dang / dpal dus rtsol bar lo las/ tha bya mAn man par byung ba na yang nam mkha' 'gro bas na pa lta bar/
51b2(rnying rgyud): mkhar khrab mkha' mo rdo rje can ni yul dang rnam par thal ba lngas ste dbus su de bzhin no// zhes pa lnga sogs pas rgyas par gsungs pa de nyid grol gzhi lpa bapa kyi chos nyid ma shes rang la gnas pa 'bras kyang nye la nam nar nges pa ste/
51b3(rnying rgyud): mang gA nye ma las/ dngos pa rnams kyis stong pa nyid kyi pon rang bzhin dang rnam pa'is don gzhan ma yinate/ rang gi zhes pa'i don te/ den ste/ nya bar yin pa'i thud pa po rje 'dzin pa tu/ gang 'di rnams
51b4(rnying rgyud): med pa'i dris nas rnams mgos pa'i ngab nyid kyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas ny-i dang yon ni d+ham med pa thob pa'i mtshan nyid pa nasangs rgyas nyid kyi // zhes gsangs pa'i phyir dang / byung gzhe 'bras rgyud nyer len de la skab byed ma ni ma 'khor ba lta
51b5(rnying rgyud): bA'i chos rnams ni gzung yul bden par med bzhin du 'dzin byed log pa'i rnam shes kyis de dang der btags nas bzhag pa'i phyir sbyang bya yin la/ des bsgribs pas 'dam rdzabs kyi khrod kyi nor bu bzhin gnas pa ste/ g+ha srab kyis/
51b6(rnying rgyud): yin do na gnas pa'i chu// dri ma med par yang dag gnas// nyon mongs nang na ye shes kyang // de bzhin dri ma med par gnas// zhes bshad pa ltar ro// gnyis pa lam gyi chud ni/ gzhi chu la spel byed kyi dri ma de nyid spong byed kyi thabs su
51b7(rnying rgyud): la bya sdug she shes par byeng ba dang / 'bra sru rdzob par byed pa dang mar 'thal bas gzhi 'bras par gyis myong 'brel ba can druganas pa'i gyur rnal myi du ma ga ra/ dbang spor ba dang /
52a1(rnying rgyud): rnams dang / sdom pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / las dang dngos grub kyi sbyor ba rnams sa// de la dbang bskur ba ne/ bum pa dang / gsang ba dang / shes rab ya shas dang / ngakho na nyid dang / 'jag
52a2(rnying rgyud): rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / slob ma'i dbang dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / tha mal gyi dbang dang / mchog gi dbang dang / 'jug pa'i cho ga dang / dngos gzhi dang / rjes sgra gnang ba dang / lung bstan pa dang / gzengs
52a3(rnying rgyud): baM stod pa dang / yon dbul ba dang bcas pa rnams te/ rdo rje lus rim las/ dbang thug 'jug dang bzod gsol dang // byas dag ba rje dang lus dbul dang // bgegs paskad ltar rlob dmachog sbyin// de nyid dbab dang mnan dang / dad+ya
52a4(rnying rgyud): dang rin chen dor ba dang // lha dbab pa dang nan tan dang // mig dbye dkyil 'khor legs mthong bstan// tshogs mchod yon dang rnam bco brgyad// 'di yis yan lag rdzogs par 'gyur// ces pa lta bu'o// de ma thi ga le yang
52a5(rnying rgyud): skye nas dbyen/ bsrung ba'ong mchog dang / bsgrub pa'i dam tshig gnyis las/ dang ba ni/ rtsa ba'i ltung ba dang yan lag gi ltung ba gnyis so// de yang drim pas ltung ba bzla bzhi dang / sbom po brgyad rnams so// dri skad du/ rjod
52a6(rnying rgyud): dpon spyad par mi bya zhing // bdag shegs bka' las 'da' miH// spun la phrad par mi bye zhing // sems rten rnams la byams ni spong // byang chub sems ni dor miH// rang gzhan chos la smad mi b+ha// ma smin pa la gsang mi bzlas
52a7(rnying rgyud): phra po rnams pa spang saH// dag pa chom la sam ta spangs// gdug pa chen pa thams pa yangs// mngamags bral lador martog/ dang ldan sems ni na med byung / nga nga da/ ba'i srung bags brdzurjo / sa/
52b1(rnying rgyud): bshad pa la sogs pa rnams dang // gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin dang / spyod lam dang / bza' ba dang / mi 'bral ba'i yo byad sogs sgrub pa'adam tshig dang / rigs lnga sa so'i brtul zhugs te ting nge 'dzin gyi dmatshig dang / las dang po pa dang / chung zad
52b2(rnying rgyud): brten bzod pa dang / brtan pa cher thob pa'i dam tshig dang / skrag srung thugs rdo rje'i dam tshig dang / bra ma dbang dang / gsang dang dang / sher dbang gi de ma tshig dang / gzhan yang bsnyen pa'i dam tshig dang / 'jig rten pa so so'i bgrub pa'i/
52b3(rnying rgyud): las so so'i/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsgrub pa'i/ sgrub pa chen po'i dam tshig la sogs pa rnams dang 'dri las thun mong ma yin pa gzhan rnams kyang shes par bya'o// sdom pa ni/ sngags kyi tshul khrings de 'thob par byed pa'i cho ga ni rig pa 'dzin pa'i
52b4(rnying rgyud): stod 'dir bshad pa'i dbang bskur ba'o// thob pa'i dus ni dbang so so'i dngos gzhi rdzogs pa na'o// ngo bo ni byin gyis brlabs pa'i sems kyi rgyun gyi khyad par nyes pa rnams zlog par byed pa yon tan gyi rten mthu brtas pa'o// dbyen/ thun mong dang thun mong ma yin te
52b5(rnying rgyud): gnyis las/ dang po ni/ bya ba sogs kyi rgyud kyi sdom pa dang / gnyis pa ni/ bla na med pa'i rgyud 'dir bde bas byin gyis rlob pa ste/ bum pa dang / gsang ba dang / shes rab ye shes kyi sdom pa rnams te/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa gting
52b6(rnying rgyud): gnyis su rtogs par gyul/ gtong ba'i dus ni spyi rtsa pa'i ltung ba byung ba dang / bye brag sngags kyi theg pa spang ba de'i tshe na'o// gso ba'i cho ga ni sdig pa yongs su spangs nas slar yang dbang bsku gyi tshogs blang ba yin no// ting nge 'dzin kyang / mtshan mad
52b7(rnying rgyud): bcas pa dang mtshan ma med pa gnyis po// de la bya ba'i rgyud du khon nyid bzhi la sogs pa dang / sgra med du kun brtags bskyed rim gyi rnal 'thor dang / yongs grub rdzogs ris rtserna la 'byor gnyis su byung ba'i dang po la'ang / ngo bo dang / yan lag dang /
53a1(rnying rgyud): ba dang / gnas skabs dang / dngos btags kyi khyad par ro// dang po ni/ snang ba res med la snying rje chen po'i 'phen pa dang ting nge 'dzin gyi zhung de dang mtshungs ldan du gyur pa'i lha sku'i rnam pa can srid pa gsum dang chos mthun du bsgoms
53a2(rnying rgyud): pas su gsum gyi sprin byed du 'gro ba gang zhig bskyed rim gyi ngo bor gnas pa yin te/ yan lag ni/ thun mtshams sam mchod pa dang bstod pa la sogs pa dang rnal 'byor chen po brgyad la sogs pa rnams so// dbye ba ni/ dang po sbyor ba dang / dkyil 'khor
53a3(rnying rgyud): la mchog dang / las rgyal mchog dang / bsnyen pa dang / nyer sgrub dang / sgrub pa dang / sgrub pa chen po dang / rnal 'byor dang / rjes su rnal 'byor dang / shin tu rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor chen po rnams so// gnas skabs su sbyor na/ las
53a4(rnying rgyud): nang po pa dang / ye shes phebs pa dang / ye shes la dbang ba dang / ye shes la ches dbang ba'o// bskyed ri ma dngos ni yan lag bdun dang ldan pa nyid yin la gzhan rnams ni btags pa ba'o// gnyis pa la'ang ngo bo/ dbye ba/ rang bzhin dang
53a5(rnying rgyud): gsum las/ dang po ni/ rlung yid sems gsum dbu mar thim pas bde stong gi ye shes mngon du gyur pa gang zhig rdzogs rim gyi ngo bor nges pa yin te/ dbye na/ dngos dang / btags pa dang / mtshan ma can dang / mtshan ma med pa dang // bya ba byed
53a6(rnying rgyud): dang // khyab bya'i rim pa rnams so// de la dang po ni/ zhu ba'i bde ba lhan skyes chen po dang / sgyu ma'i sku dang / rang bzhin lhan skyes dang / zung 'jug gi sku dang / rlung tu tir thim pa'i mthar thob pa kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i
53a7(rnying rgyud): spang ba gsum dang / dga' ba gsum dang / de rnams dngos su thob pa'i lam gang yin pa de rnams la rdzogs pa'i rim pa dngos zhes bya la/ gzhan du rtsa dang / rlung dang / phra mo dang / thig le'i rnal 'byor dang / phyag rgya rim pa rlung dbu mar 'jug pa dang /
53b1(rnying rgyud): gnas pa dang / thams kyad pa'i las cananasanan gas ma nga myang bu dang la ma byad san sajugs madrwa tags pa la dang / macan can mags pa la' dngas gas patus sa/ na/ sam pa dang sa bas las byung ba
53b2(rnying rgyud): nyid can gyi snang ba gsum na 'ad gsal bar gnas yongs su mgyur pa stes sa'i gyi bothams cad dang gzhan la yang med do// kye ma ni/ su don panaci rtog pa dang mardungs ldan dzur pa gang yin pa ster na gyi 'odogs la mthob pa'i bar dag tu rigs par podzod/
53b3(rnying rgyud): rkyecanam mdeng 'ardzogs ma la yang dang ma dang btags pa gnyis las/ da man/ 'phags rgyung rtogs pa dang / khyi ma rnam sbyang gnas skabs sa'ang 'dud// khab thang legs par yapa ni/ so sor spyad pa dang / bsam gtan dang/ drog
53b4(rnying rgyud): rgyal dang / 'dzin pa dang / rdzas madran pa dang / ting la dang / dga'a' bzhi dang / snang ba da / snang ba mched pa dang / snang ba nye bar bab pa dang / 'odagasal pa dang / drang thugs dang / gong rdzogs dang / bdapa'i tshogs dang / thugs
53b5(rnying rgyud): zalang rnams hA gang jugs pa'i ris pa dathams cad 'khyung pa phyir / khyab kying rdzogs dris ni/ lhag dag sems gsus nims byar dab da ba dang / dag bye zlas pa pa drem pa dang / 'dag stsab ba dang / zla ga dang /
53b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i rim par spyod pa 'i ting nga 'dun dang / bdag sbyin gyis brlab pa sgo dang / snatshogs de rjed de/ nor zla 'gangs pa dang / dza la d+hA dang / mas ma mi thab dang / rang bzhin gyis brjeb pa dang / dkyil 'khor la bar la dang / glang
53b7(rnying rgyud): pa dang / sngags dang / ya gas nga/ gsang ba'i rim pa dang / dbying sa dang/ srid / nga ga la'i rim pa dang / me dang / lamau / ye shes dang / dmachog dang / thag tu zin pa skye bad dang / snying ga' zug sa / ra
54a1(rnying rgyud): sprul ba dang / m-i shegs pa 'al 'thun ma lags ba rdzunanas dpa / ma 'ang dag ga gan gang la bstan pa la phral nus cags gan su ga pa tshul ljang / gnang du ba rdum nan/ yul dang / rdzam dan
54a2(rnying rgyud): lus dang / rlung dang / dmigs pa'i gnad rnams so// de rnams kyis yon tan mngon du byed cing dri ma rnams sbyong bar byed pa yin kyang da dung rtswa rkyen la ltos dgos pa'i phyir 'du byas pa'i mtshan nyid can no// de dag rnams kyis ye shes sebs pa ni tshogs la
54a3(rnying rgyud): chung ngu ste dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / ye shes la ches dbang bas yang dag pa'i spong ba ste tshogs kyi lam 'bring po dang / de nyid spyod pas mthar phyin cing lta stangs rnams la thogs pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams mngon du gyur pa dang / skyed
54a4(rnying rgyud): gcig gis thogs pa ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa can tshogs lam chen po yin no// rdzogs rim dngos kyis sems dben pa thob pazhu ba de'i mthar thug pa dbang po lnga'i rang bzhin drod dang / rtse lo zhes bya la/ ye shes kyi su ni nam mkha' mdzod thong ba stobs lnga
54a5(rnying rgyud): dang ldan pa bzod pa dang chos mchog ste 'dir rtsa rlung thig le'i 'gros rnams thil pa'i ye shes yon tan gyi gzhir gyur pas gong ma'i lam dang mthun pa bcu gnyis su dbye ba yod la/ de'i tshe ye shes kyi sgra la sangs kyis zhes btags so// don dam pa so so rang gi
54a6(rnying rgyud): rig pa thams cad stong pa 'od gsal ba ni byang chub kyi yan lag mthong ba'i lam ste 'di la dga' ba'i rang bzhin ba den pa bsu drug dang ldan no// slob pa'i zung 'jug nas lhag ma dgu dang / sa bcu tsam dang / rgyun mtha'i ye shes dag las rnam grol lam dang /
54a7(rnying rgyud): khya par kyi las rnaMs bcug nyis sam ba gas ni lag bdun dang ldan pa'i ba shes gang ma'i ga churab kyi denams ni drim pa'i lam ladags lam yan lapa / rgyu kyi sbyor ba ni/ las dang thong rgyud // de dzin/ bas rbag
54b1(rnying rgyud): nga nam nga/ ma snyam nga shA sa // na / ga sa ga
54b2(rnying rgyud): du 'ad dang/ bajanas kyi ga man pa nga/ gdugs med pa thar// da nga / mang bring nga/ ma la rnags pa pa nga / 'a dang / lag mdang/ la gas pa dang/ rin pa du du
54b3(rnying rgyud): rnams kyi mtshon cadang/ yi ge dang ming gi zugs kyi rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa da/ gzhan sa ma dang / klu dang / gnod dang / srin po la sogs pa bsgrubs pas gzhan la bden pa'i 'jig rten pa'i dadus grub mtha' yas pa dmas dang / rnam
54b4(rnying rgyud): tsam bzlas pas ril rgyardzogs las can pa brgyad rnams dang/ 'dadu pa'i rig 'dzin de/ gzugs nga gi 'don na mnan// de labyed ni/ smras bcos dang / med de/ d+mo// yangan/ brgya da/ nga
54b5(rnying rgyud): dang / phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba ste gsum mo// gsum bya 'bras bu'i chu nAM/ de ltar gzhi chung sgri b+hid rtsi ni ma las bsgom stobs kyis dag pa las gzhi la ji ltar yod pa'i yon tan mngon du gyur ba ni 'bras bu ste/ snying po'i 'brel gyi log gzung
54b6(rnying rgyud): grub ba mthar byin 'bras zung brjod// ces pas blan mang bu mchog gi 'bras de don du gnyer ba rnams bsam pa yangs su rdzogs pa'i phyir 'bras su du/ nam yang sbyin mi 'chang bas na d+ha dang // dbyen dang sa dang btugs pa gnyis las/ dngas
54b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i zung 'jug rdo rje 'chang chen po sgyu ma'i sku dang / slob pa'i zung 'dug gi sems can 'bras bu dngos min kyang der btags pa ste khams gsum pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang yon tan brgyad tshan gnyis la dbang 'byor pa'o// mi slob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa'i yon tan tu
55a1(rnying rgyud): ca chags rnams dang / tshad med pa dang / dbang brgya dang / stobs bdu dang / shes pa bcu dang / ma 'dres pa bco 'a rgyang dang / yi 'jigs pa dang / nyan mongs me pa dang / mkhyen pa dang / brags rgya da ngag
55a2(rnying rgyud): zad par dang / zil gnon dang / namathar la sogs rgya'i sde snod las ji ltar bshad pa rnams dang / sngags su bshad pa'i zung 'jug ge yon tan khyad par ba yang / ji skad du/ rtag pa dang ni mi gdung dang // bsil ba dang ni gcig pa dang / @
55a3(rnying rgyud): dang ni ji zed dang // dga' ba dang ni yid dngas pa// zhes ro myong brgyad dang / sku yi dbang phyug dang ni gsung gi dbang phyug dang // de bzhin du ni thugs kyi dbang phyug dang // rdzu 'phrul kun 'bro gnas kyi dbang phyug dang // ci 'dod byed dang yon tan bcad pa'o//
55a4(rnying rgyud): zhes dbang phyug pa brgyad dang / longs spyod rdzogs dang kha sbyor ba de chen rang bzhin med// snying rjes yongs gang chun mi 'chad dang 'gog pa med// ces kha sbyor bdun dang / gzugs phra reg pa yang ba dang // khyab pa yang dag thob pa nyid// rab tu
55a5(rnying rgyud): gsal ba nyid bstan pa// dbang phyuganyed dang 'dod dgur bsgyur// zhes yon tan brgyad la sogs pa dang / gzhan yang / rang bzhin med pa la sogs pas zab pa rnams dang / bsod nams dang ye shes la sogs pa chu che ba rnams dang / yul
55a6(rnying rgyud): thams cad la sogs par khyab pa rnams dang / rgyun mi 'chad pa la sogs kyis rtag pa rnams dang / kha sbyor chen po la sogs pas bde ba rnams kyi bdag nyid chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul pa dang / bde ba chen po la sogs pa sku'i bye brag rnams
55a7(rnying rgyud): de dag rnams kyis brjod bu rgyud gsum gyi rnam par gzhag pa spyir nges par byas nas/ de dag rjod byed sde snod kyi sgo nas bye brag tu dbye na/ dgos pa'i dbang gis rgyud sde gnyis dang / bzhi dang / lnga dang / bdun du dbyer sogs mang zhing /
55b1(rnying rgyud): dang po ni bya ba dang / rnal 'byor gnyis so// de la'ang gnyis gnyis te/ bya ba dang / spyod pa dang / rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor bla na med pa'o// da ltar yang / rje snang ba bkod pa'i rgyud las/ bde bar gshegs pas dgongs pa
55b2(rnying rgyud): rnyed// rnam pa bzhi ru yang dag bshad// bya slong rnal gyir zla medzod// zhes gsungs pa bzhin/ dbye tshul che 'drab dum yod kyang/ yangs su grags brgyad sde bzhir dbye ba de dag gi dgos pa yang / dbang po tha mya dang / 'bring dang / rang
55b3(rnying rgyud): dang / ches rab tu gyur pa rnams la ltos nas lam de dang des rim gyis 'bras bu'i bar bkri ba'i thabs su bstan pa ste/ gur las/ dman pa rnams la bya ba'i rgyud// bya min rnal 'byor de lta ga la// sems can mchog la rnal 'byor gyur// rnal
55b4(rnying rgyud): 'byor bla med de lta ga la'o// zhes pa dang / dus bzhir ltos nas kyang rgyud sde bzhi bstan par gsungs pa yod de/ ji skad du/ rdzogs ldan dang por bya ba'i rgyud// gsum ldan gnyis par spyod pa'i rgyud// gnyis ldan gsum par rnal 'byor rgyud//
55b5(rnying rgyud): rtsod ldan bzhi par bla med do// dus bzhi la ni dgongs nas kyang// rgyad ni rnam pa bzhir bshad do// zhes 'byung ba ltar ro// ngo yang 'dod chags rigs bzhi'i gdul bya rnams 'dul ba'i phyir rgyud sde bzhir bstan par gsungs pa'ang de la don gyis
55b6(rnying rgyud): 'dus pas logs su mi spro la/ dbye ba'i dgos pa gzhan dang gzhan yang mang du yod mod kyi spros pas chog go// re zhig rgyud sde bzhir grangs nges pa de dag gi dang po gsum ni dka' thub rig byed kyi dag pa'am lus ngag gyi'i bya ba gtso bang ston pa dang /
55b7(rnying rgyud): phyi'i bya ba dang nang gi sems gnyis mnyam pa dang / nang gi sems gtso bo sbyin cid kyi'i bya ba'ang mi 'dor pa rim pa bzhin ston pas kyi rgyud sde gsum du bzhag pa ste/ bya ba dang / myong ba dang / rnal 'byor gsum mo// de dag kyang dgyes zor don bsdus kyi
56a1(rnying rgyud): 'grel ba las/ nga la na ny-id bskum pa'i nus pa chung na mtshan ma can gyi spyod pa la mngan par dga' ba rnams la rgya'i stong ba dadag shes d+hAr ston pa byub 'chud/ ces pa dang / gang zhig bya ba 'i khyad par la rang
56a2(rnying rgyud): mos shing thabs shes rab kyi spyod pa rgya chen po la'ang sbyor ba'i nang dge bdag nyid can gyi tshulA yang mi 'dor bar spro ba de dag la ni bya ba dang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud cha gnyis las mthun pa'i gnyi ga'i rgyud/ ces sogs dang / rnam snang mngon byang gi 'brel
56a3(rnying rgyud): las/ 'phags pa de nyid bsdus pa la sogs pa nang gi sbyor ba gtso bor gyur pa yin mod kyi/ phyi'i spyod pa rnams kyang med pa ma yin no// / zhes bshad pas so// de'i phyir kr-i yA zhes pa bya ba'i don te lus ngag gi b+ha ba gtso bar ston pa'i
56a4(rnying rgyud): dang / lta ba don dam par mtha' bona'i spros pa dang bral ba'i dag par bdag gi de kho na nyid rtogs pa'i yon tan las/ kun rdzob yongs su dag pa lha'i mtshan nyid du blta bas dngos grub gzhan la zhing tshol ba'i thabs pa bladas ste/ sangs rgyas
56a5(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i lam rim du// gnyis med mnyam par ma shes pas// don dam dag pa chos nyid tsam// ye shes yon tan kun rdzob lha// res bsgom byab las kyis// zhes bshad pa bzhin bsgom sa kun rdzob dag pa'i lha rigs gsum gyi rnal 'byor te/
56a6(rnying rgyud): stong pa'i lha/ yi ga'i lnga/ skra'i lha/ gzugs kyi lha/ phyag rgya'i \u0f7f/ mtshan ma'i lha ste drug gis bdag lha tshugasal ba ma migasal bgeng du shes ye shes brjo bo dang / bdag 'a 'angs kyi rnam pas dngos bu ba don du gter ba ste/ rang sha
56a7(rnying rgyud): las/ lha dang rdul 'byor dag pa gnyis// rje dnga'abangs kyi tshul du blta// zhes so// spyod pa khrus dang / gtsang sbra dang / smyung bar gnas pa la sogs dkar thub kyis lha mnyes par byang ba dang / brtul thugs dang rjes su mthun pa la gnas pa
56b1(rnying rgyud): nam na bya dang mdang / sa dang / gsas mams gzhas pa dang / bas ga na da du/ ngas dan/ gsang gsaso nang ngas ba // sangs na na gas byad// thum sa da // na
56b2(rnying rgyud): gsum mo// de dag lam du byas pa'i 'bras bu gnas skabs su 'dad pa'i lha dang skal ba mnyam pa'i rag 'dzin mkha' spyod 'grub cing rten de la thugs kyi spyod pa sud pa'i nya rgyal brten nas mthar jug 'dir bshad pa'i rigs gsu mdzong dadzin pa'as mngan bya
56b3(rnying rgyud): gal po las/ mi tshe bdun na sangs rgyas sa// rigs gsul mgon pos 'gro ba 'dul// zhes gsungs so// de dag ston pa'i rje snod kyad/ dpung ba zung gi rgyung dang / spel ma 'byung ba dang / du mchog gsum rgyal dang /
56b4(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa rnams so// rigs kyi sgo nas dbyen drug tu 'byu hU~M/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i/ badz+ra'i/ dzo dza'i/ nor bya/ rgyas pa'i/ 'jig rten pa'i rigs te drug go// de dag nga la'ang rigs smigatso bo dang / bdag po dang / ma
56b5(rnying rgyud): gtsug tor dang / khro bo dang / khro mo dang / pho nya dang / pho nya mo dang / bka' zhan po dang / bka' nyan mo rnams su dbye ba yod la/ de rnams kyang bsdu na gsang sngags dang rig sngags gnyis su 'du'o// gnyis pa ni/ u b+ha ya
56b6(rnying rgyud): lci ba rnal 'byor dang spyod pa bya ba ltar stod pas na cha mnyam gyi rgyud dang / gaN+DI ga'i drung du brjod pa de gnyis kyi mtshams byor du gyur ba ste/ rang shar las/ u pa ya ni 'di ltar te/ bu yi gar blta ba la/ spyod bkr-i yAr spyod pa'o// de byi
56b7(rnying rgyud): gnyis ku cu drungs// sa/ byang dgag zhiganas sa pa lag dang / / gas kyis rnams sa / la pa byor ba nga man ga pa gar / rnam
57a1(rnying rgyud): na sog na tu sa // sa parnams pas pang panan// bsas su thug sa can pa ma/
57a2(rnying rgyud): dam pa'i pha la sems 'dog pa sogs la goms par gyur pas 'bras bu rig pa 'dzin pa'i lus 'grub pa sogs gnas skabs dang / rten des sngags kyi spyod pa spyad pas mthar thug mi tshe lnga 'am/ 'gor na bskal pa gsum ma ma gcig gis rigs
57a3(rnying rgyud): bzhi rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa mngon du byed de/ gal po las/ rigs 'azhi rdo rje 'chang sar gnas// zhes so// de dag ston pa'i rdo snod rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa dang / phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba la sogs pa rnams so// gsum pa ni/
57a4(rnying rgyud): yog zhes pa rnal 'byor te/ slob dpon kun dga' snying pos/ rnal 'byor gyi rgyud 'di ni bsgom pa gtso bor ston pa yin pas/ ci dga' ba'i bzlas pa bstan pa'i phyir/ zhes dang / de kho na nyid snang ba'i don bsdus las kyang / klung 'don tang
57a5(rnying rgyud): dzin pasgom pa gan po ston pas na rnal 'byor gyi rgyud ces bya'o// zhes gsungs pa ltar/ lte ba don dam par chos thams cad spros pa dang bral ba'i rade bzhin 'od gsal ba stong pa nyid du rtogs pa'i ye shes kyi byin rlabs kur rdzob rdo rje dbyings kyi ltar blta 'a
57a6(rnying rgyud): rtog pa bzang ngan gyi rtsol bas 'bras bu sgrub par 'dod pa ste/ lam rim las/ lhun grub mnyam pa ma rtogs pas// chos kun rnam dag ye shes kyi// byin rlabs rdo rje dbyings srul lha// blang dor byed pa las kyis// zhes pa ltar bsgom pa
57a7(rnying rgyud): ga rgya bzhi dang 'brel ba'i rim pa mngon byang lnga dang / rnal 'byor bzhi'i rim pas bdag lhar bsgom pa 'khor bcas thabs kyi rnal 'byor dang / sems kyi de khon nyid mngon par rtogs pa so so rang rig pa'i ye shes mnyam par 'jog pa sogs kyi nang gi ting
57b1(rnying rgyud): nga 'dzin lag tha bar byed pa dang / spyod pa gtsang sgra sogs phyi ltar grogs su brtan pas 'bras bum kha' spod rig pa 'dzin pa stsogs gnas skabs dang / mthar thug ma che gsum mam bcu drug gas phyag na chen po thub nas rim gyis rigs rdza mug pa zag dang
57b2(rnying rgyud): sar mngon par byang chub pa lnga'i sgo nas ye shes lnga'i ngo bor 'tshang rgyab ste/ kun byed rgyal po las/ yo ga phug po bkod 'dod pas// mi tshe gsum na grol bar 'dod// ces so// de ston par byed pa'i snga snod ni/ de kho na nyid 'dres pa dang / dang
57b3(rnying rgyud): mchog dang po la sogs pa rnams so// rigs kyi sgo nas dbye na/ rtsa ba'i rigs dang / sangs rgyas dang / rdo rje dang / rin chen dang / chos dang / las kyi rigs te lha dang / de ro re la'ang rigs chung lnga lnga/ de yang / snying po dang / phyag
57b4(rnying rgyud): rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / rig sngags bzhi bzhir phye bas brgyad du 'gyur la/ bsdu na thabs shes gnyis su 'du ste/ de kho na nyid 'dus par yab dang / shes phyin tshul brgya lnga bcu pa la yum gyi sgras smos pa bzhin no// gnyis pa
57b5(rnying rgyud): dbang bsgyur thabs kyi theg pa'am rnal 'byor bla na med pa ni/ rgyad sde 'og ma gsum du blang dor dang spang gnyen sogs gtsad sde'i 'du shes kyis bkris pa dang / thabs shes ya bral bas/ bde ba chen po'i gnas lcags la rmongs pa sogs kyis mtshan nyid kyi
57b6(rnying rgyud): theg pa dang tshul mthun pa nyid shas che ba'i phyir phyi rgyud sde gsum mam rgyud sde 'og mar bzhag pa yin la/ khyad par can gyi lam 'di ni nye ba'i lam dang thabs kyi rgyud kyang yin te/ rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i lam 'di nyid la zhugs nas theg pa gzhan sngon mi
57b7(rnying rgyud): dgos pa pa 'di nyid kho nas 'bras bu la sbyor ba'i phyir dang / theg pa gzhan du dug gsum spang byar byed la 'dir ni dmigs med lta ba'i gzer btab pas 'dod chags bde stong / zhe sdang gsal stong / gti mug rig stong gi ngo bor dug gsum mi spangs
58a1(rnying rgyud): gas nanas nga ma gyun pa nga byu byung phyog sa sa sa gas sa na /
58a2(rnying rgyud): med pa'i lam 'di du 'dag dunas pas zag pa 'di nyid gas nas rang ba'i lamags pashad pa yin no// ga/ ya bas dang byung gis shes dang shes rab stong ba nyid zung pa'i mtshan gyi rna mas sul lji zhes dang/
58a3(rnying rgyud): la sa spyod pa'i thabs kun la 'thang blang bar ched cog sa mas 'phags pas/ gas pa ma pa sa/ thAbs dang gas rab mas 'das pa/ rjod sa nab shad pa 'di/ gang gi m-i napa hA//
58a4(rnying rgyud): das pa'i mtshan nyid de// zhes so// dbyen/ thabs pa yi rbud dang / shes rab sa yi nAd dang / zung 'dug gnyis med kyi chung ba gsum mo// rigs kyi sto nas dbyen/ bad+hA pa mi bgrong pa'i/ rnam snang gi/ rin 'byung na/ 'o
58a5(rnying rgyud): med kyi/ don grub kyi/ rdo rje 'chang gi rigs te drug dang / de bzhin du ma rgyad phyogs su 'ang / rdo rje sems dpa'i/ rnam spang gi/ rdo rje nyi ma'i/ pad+ma gar dbang gi/ rta mchog gi/ he ka'i rigs te drug tu dbye ba bsdoms pas chud kyi rab tu dbyi ba bcu gnyis su
58a6(rnying rgyud): 'thung la/ de las kyang byin rigs mtha mas pa gsungs pas d+d+ha kyang dagling du gyuH/ brdzun mas shis she nyis dang ming bzung rdzogs gtas sum 'dus pa med pa/ de dag kyang rdzogs po tsho bas 'as so// desas nga
58a7(rnying rgyud): sa nga rje zub tu bshad pa/ dang pos log sun la 'byur chen po na ni rlud kyi gnas lugs de nyid phyogs kya ltab gtam pa' bebs pa zung ton ga dang ga dgis ga ma nga kyang tshang pags sa gyis gtan la bab cing /
58b1(rnying rgyud): mngon sum gyis rtogs dgos pa'i phyir // gtan la 'bebs byed kyi btan tshogs kyang / rtogs pa bzhi'i/ dag pa gsum che/ mnyam pa bzhi'i/ bdag nyid chen po'i gtan rdzogs dang bzhi las/ dang po ni/ snying po'i gud las/ rgyu gcig pa dang yig
58b2(rnying rgyud): 'bru'i tshul// byin gyis brlabs dang mngon sum pa// rab tu rtogs pa rnam bzhi yis// thams cad mngon rdzogs rgyal po che// zhes pas/ rgyu gcig pa'i gtan tshigs kyis chos thams cad rang byung ste med du gtan la phab/ yig 'bru'i tshul gyi gtan
58b3(rnying rgyud): tshig+sa kyis chos thams cad rol pa 'gag med du gtan la phab/ byin gyis brlabs kyi gtan tshogs kyis chos thams cad ngo bo dbyer med du gtan la bab/ mngon sum pa'i gtan tshigs kyis chos thams cad mtshan nyid blo bral du gtan la phab pa ni rtogs pa bzhi la
58b4(rnying rgyud): gten tshigs so// gnyis pa ni/ snod bcud rgyud rnams dag rtogs shing // zhes pas/ dag pa gsum gyi gtan tshigs kyis phyi nang skrod bcu daphung khams skye mched thams cad dag pa chen por gtan la phab/ gsum pa ni/ mnyam gnyis lhag pa'i mnyam
58b5(rnying rgyud): gnyis kyi// dkyil 'khor kun tu bzang po'i zhing // zhes pas/ mnyam pa bzhi'i gtan tshigs kyis kun rdzob dang don dam kyi bden pas bsdus pa'i chos thams cad mnyam pa chen por gtan la bab/ bzhi pa ni/ rang byung ye shes gnas med ljang //
58b6(rnying rgyud): zhes pas/ bdag nyid chen po'i gtan tshigs kyis chos thams cad sems nyid rang byung gi ye shes chen po gcig gi bdag nyid du ye nas gnas par gtan la phab pa ste 'jal byed kyi gtan tshigs de rnams kyis rang bzhin rgyu'i rgyud kyi gnas lugs mngon sum du rtogs pa ni
58b7(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor chen po'i thub pa'i mtha' thun mong min pa ste/ rgya mtsho las/ rgya mcho dngas pa'i gzugs parnyan ltar// s+tha birtan yid la byed min par// rang rig mngon sum dmigs bral ba// rang gsal gsum bral mi bsgral bar// nges par gdang
59a1(rnying rgyud): na / dug byed pa// zas pas ma bsgom pa'i samathar zin// zhes dang / dzam mrag las/ mnganas ma dag par zag cad na// rdul 'brangs la slob pa san// zhesas// dkang ltab dun sa pagan nag dang /
59a2(rnying rgyud): la la thabs kyi rim pa dang / grol ba'i rim pa gnyis las dang po la'ang / grol lam thabs su dam par bstan// zhes pas/ 'ching byed kyi las la skyed pas grol ba'i 'bras bu thob pa ste/ gtso bor thabs kyi khyad par btul zhugs kyi stong pa blang
59a3(rnying rgyud): du byung ba'i 'bras bu myur du 'grub par byed pas dug gsum ma spangs thog pardzis kyi spyod pa'i brtul zhugs gang zhig/ lta ba'i gdeng dang ldan pas spyad na mi 'ching bar ma zad grol ba'i 'bras bu myung du thob la/ de ltar ma yin pa zhig gis myang na grol ba mi rjong
59a4(rnying rgyud): par ma zad ngan song du ltung ba'i nyen chen po dang ldan pas mak+Shi ga'i sbyor ba bzhin khe nyen che zhing de lta bu'i thabs lam de la gnyis te/ gdams ngag steng dang 'og gi sgo// zhes pas/ snga ma rim gyis ltar bsgom par da lus steng sgo 'khor lo drug la brten nas 'bar
59a5(rnying rgyud): 'dog gi sbyor bas bde ba chen po'i ye shes nyams su myong ba bshad chung rgya mtsho nas bstan pa dang / phyi ma cig car ltar gzhan lus 'og sgo mkha' gsang gnyis la brten nas bsnyen pa dang / nye bar bsnyen pa dang / sgrub pa dang / grub pa chen po'i sbyor ba
59a6(rnying rgyud): bzhis skad cig la bde stong gi ye shes pa tsan thabs su skye ba'i sa la ma tshig chod du rdzogs pa'i thabs lam cig car ba ste bshad rgyud thal ba nas bstan pa bzhin no// gnyis pa grol yam la/ gtso bor shes rab gsum gyis gtan la phab cing rtogs pas
59a7(rnying rgyud): rjid kyang tshir ba rang sangs su song nas chos nyid kyi klod du grol bar 'gyur ba/ thabs lam lta bu'i mur khyad med kyang ji zhig na 'bras bur spong ba la khyad med cing le nyen chung ba rin po che ko su bya'i dpe bzhin no// de la'ang dbang po'i rim pas cig car dang
59b1(rnying rgyud): sums sa sub zud pa nga du/ dang rdzums zu// gnas dan/ pa// dngas/ shes 'a gas na da nga da// sa na nga du spya// maman ga sa/
59b2(rnying rgyud): 'don rgyal ba'i zhing du sags// zhes so// de lagasum ste/ rgyu shes pa'i mtshan nyid lta ba/ rkyen 'dug pa'i mtshan nyid ting nge 'don dang / lam 'gyur gyi 'bras bu rig 'an na// dang po ni grong du gros zin la/ gnyis pa ting nge 'dzin pa
59b3(rnying rgyud): mos bsgom dang / des rdzogs gnyis las/ dang po ni/ don gyi'i rnam pa tsam de dang de mos pa lam byed kyis bsgom pa'o// gnyis pa ni/ rim pa gnyis po'i ting nge 'dzin nyams lnga mthar byin gyi bar du slob pa ste/ bi ma la'i phyag rgya
59b4(rnying rgyud): bsam gtan gyi 'grel pa las/ g.yo thob goms brtan mthar phyin lnga// bsam gtan nyams kyi skye tshul yin// zhes pa ltar bsgom bya'i lam ni/ snying po'i rgyud las/ srid pa rim par smin tshul gyis// 'jug pa'i yan lag lnga dru ba
59b5(rnying rgyud): gang dag dngos kun rang rig phyir// shi ba don dam bden pa ste// skyeb par ma kun rdzob yin// skye ba'i rim gsum gnyis med don// zhes pas/ 'chi bar skye gsum gyi srid pa cig cad du myong ba'i lam rdzogs par ston pa la/ 'chi ba 'od
59b6(rnying rgyud): gsal dang rjes su mthun pa'i lam stod pa chen po dang / bar do dang rjes su mthun pa'i lam snying rje chen po dang / skye ba'i rim pa gsum dang rjes su mthun pa'i lam phyag rgya gcig pa dang / phyag rgya spos bcas dang / chom bu tshogs bsgrub ste lnga'o//
59b7(rnying rgyud): de'ang dgas pa bskyed rim dang / phra ba rdzogs rim gyis skyong tshul gnyis las/ dang po ni/ lus can rnams 'chi 'pho ba'i tshe rkye nang gi thi ma ri ma rnams rdzogs pa'i mthara'i tshe srid chos spu'i 'odags pa 'char la/ de nyid lam du 'byed ba'i phyir snang breg gas
60a1(rnying rgyud): bzlas pa'i rgyas thams cad kyis/ thos pa la ban dzin pa sgom pa dang / 'dugasapa ngas mngon par ba da mad lus sgyum ba gnas skabs bya ba gzugs byung byadamags pa mang pa nga
60a2(rnying rgyud): gi ting nge 'dzin gyi bo snying rje chen po mngag khyab du bsgom zhing / gzhing las par dor ma grol bar ma'i mngal du skye bzung ba nas btsas pa'i bar gyi bag chags snod byed phyag rgya gcig pa la phra rags gnyis ti gang du lte bar 'brang ba'i gnas la srid pa sres pa'i rgya ces
60a3(rnying rgyud): der 'jug ma rag gi bar srid kyi gnas skabs spyod byed phrab rgya'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bo yig 'brugasal brtan gyi tshad brgyad dang ldan pa la bslab pa dang / de nyid la ma'i khwa rdul gyi bar du zhugs nas phyi rol dbang ba yul las kyi gnas skabs byeng bang rags
60a4(rnying rgyud): sbrul bslab pa mngon pang bzhi dang / tshog gsum sogs kyis bskyed pa skye gnas rigs bzhi'i tshul dang mthun pa la bsgrub pa dag/ btsa mas na so pa'i la gzugs ste byang phyag tums bcas la bslab pa'ang bzhi / lam ma pas/
60a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo chom bu grangs zhal phyag/ ces bshad pa ltar/ dkyil 'khor spro ba dang / chom bu spro ba dang / grangs spro ba dang / zhal phyag spro ba ste bzhi la rim bzhin zhi ba dang khro bo'i dkyil 'khor rgyas 'bring bsdus pa dang / chom bu gcig gsum
60a6(rnying rgyud): pa dang grangs pa'ang / zhi ba la spyong dang nyi khri bzhi stong dang / bsam las lhan grub rnams dang / khro bo la'ang / stong bzhi brgya lnga bcu dang / bdun khri drug stong brgyad brgya lnga bcu dang / bsam yas lhan grub la bslab pa rnams dang / zhal phyag
60a7(rnying rgyud): nga rgyas bring thus gsus kyi tsu // nar gyi nas rkun po'i bar gyi gcugs byed chom phyotshogs kyi sgrub pa la/ phran du mchogs pa lngas sgrub pa'i gzhib cwa dun bsnyen sgrub lan lag bzhis gzung bsrang ba dang / 'bras
60b1(rnying rgyud): sa bang gsum tshamangasas yan la ga dang thab mapa 'angs bya // dashA thA pas kyi snyam po sa myur mapo dang rnam pa mtha pas dang mi gzugs nga shing ga/ yangs rgyas su gsus dang yang snang gas
60b2(rnying rgyud): shes zi pas 'das pa gas pa / ba ngul marnon sa na mthos ring shegs bas tha~M byang du 'thab // nyis pa zlabasta pa makyis / da dang sa pa na pa'i bas la
60b3(rnying rgyud): nam gyu dang rgya gapa pas pal 'ang thog pa ga bri thag dang / mis// badzin pa byas nas pa sa ga pa na pa ma la 'dag bas nan bya sa gang pa gang gas rnam pa slopa
60b4(rnying rgyud): mi'i yi da slong bzhin gsul nga TI pa zhin pa ba mas sa bas nas sa ma dus ba ga / dgas pany-i 'brangs pa 'ang pa
60b5(rnying rgyud): nga mi dag 'a ga shang yin kyi rgyas sa / sbyang mngal sgra can pa nga ga thas da sa byam 'a ga ca gabs pa dashA
60b6(rnying rgyud): 'i pa gag su sanas nga su ga rnamags 'dag ga na banas sa
60b7(rnying rgyud): la/ ma rus nasasasu ma thugs pa'i yin du/ sha sgom mdar ba'i 'gyu 'bye ba sa du bdum ba mchos kya rgyabyang bang 'argyang mi sathas
61a1(rnying rgyud): bdag gdus su spyod pa yang/ thubs lam 'dul grags kyi spyod pa nga / grol lam ngag ma spyod byags las ma la/ dang can kyi stong bad shes bdang shA ca/ spyad dadang mthun pa dgas
61a2(rnying rgyud): brtsib pa'i/ gros bcas kyi/ tshogs kyi/ rdzu 'phrul nAM// cig car ba'i byung ba dang bdun du byas nas bshad do// de dag gis spong ba 'bring na ma'i dbye bas/ zla badrug/ mo gcig zla ba gnyis/ lo gcig nub bzhirnams kyis gag pa med pa'o
61a3(rnying rgyud): mthong lam la sbyong bar byed de/ lam rim las/ zhag ni sum sna phrag drug gam// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu dag gis// dbang bsgyur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub// ces gsungs pa yin la/ gsum pa lam 'gyur gyi 'bras bu rig 'dzin ni/ de ltar
61a4(rnying rgyud): bsgoms pas zag pa med pa'i mthong sgom mthar lam gsum gyis bsdus pa'i rig 'dzin bzhi mngon du byed pa ste mthong lam la blo'i nus stobs che chung gis rnam ljin gyi lus dngas ma'i lus su ma gyur pa rnam smin rig 'dzin dang / dngas ma'i lus su gyur pa lam mchog
61a5(rnying rgyud): yongs su rdzogs pa tshe dbang rig 'dzin gnyis dang / sa lhag ma dgu bsgom lam phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin gyis bsdus shing / de 'das gnyis pa nas lnga pa'i bar la rdo rje'i rig 'dzin dang / drug pa dang bdun pa gnyis la 'khor lo'i rig 'dzin dang / brkyang
61a6(rnying rgyud): pa rin po che'i rig 'dzin dang / dgu pa pad+ma'i rig 'dzin dang / bcu pa ral gri'i reg 'dzin du mdzad spyod kyi sgo nas dbye bar yod la/ sa bcu'i rnam grol lam tshun chad phyag chen du bsdus shing / sa bcu'i khyad par lam mam mthar lam lhan grub rig 'dzin
61a7(rnying rgyud): ni sgra lnga lhun 'grub rdo rje 'chang gi cha lugs 'dzin pa drug pa'i rgyal tshab mdzad pa gsang ba'i bdag po bzhin no// de yang rtswa'i theg pa'i 'phags pa rnams dang / rnal 'byor chen po 'di nyid kyi rig pa 'dzin pa rnams sa'i mu chod mtshungs kyang dgengs pa la khyad par
61b1(rnying rgyud): nA/ rtswa'i thog pa'i sa dang ba dang rnam ston dag 'dzin ga nyis dgongs pa mnyam la/ chu'i sa brgyad pa dang rmed pa ga/ 'angan/ bcwa pa dang phyug con ga 'an/ mthob pad+mas spyan 'ang dang stan thab dag 'an gtsapa grangs pa shA
61b2(rnying rgyud): lam chung las/ de lta dang podang po dang / skal mnyam gnyis pa'i rigs can dang // brgyad pa'i sems dang phrul pa mnyam// gsu mya rba dab sbrul mnyam mo// dgongs spyod na mdzes kyang bar lags// zas bshad pa na
61b3(rnying rgyud): ngas la mthong mar sbyor ba'i mthar/ chos sna dang / longs spong dang / sprul ba dang / mngan byung dang / 'i sgra ste sa dang / skye mang ngos ni gsungs gas gsung sa dang / chos byings ye shes sogs thugs lnga dang // rnam par dag pa dpa
61b4(rnying rgyud): khams sogs yon tan lnga dang / lhan grub sogs phrin las lnga ste 'bras bu'i chos nyer lnga'i bdag nyid chen po'i go 'phang mngon du byed ba yin no// de dag ston pa'i sde snod la rgyud sde dang srub sde gnyis las/ dang po ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' bu 'phrul ba
61b5(rnying rgyud): sogs rtswa 'phrul sde brgyad rnams dang / gnyis pa sgrub rje bcud ste bya thag rnams dang / gzhan yang 'dus pa dang / gshi rngagashing dmang nag 'jigs gdul sogs dang / thag seng thig le sogs pa rgyud dang / ba 'jog dang dus kyi 'bar la rdzogs
61b6(rnying rgyud): surbud dbus cang 'ding spang par shes par bya'o// gnyis brdzogs pa a mra la pa ste/ rjes pa nal 'byor na/ brjod pa nal 'byor chen po dang / yongs zhugs pa shin tural 'byor gyi zag padag gi marnams myong du gyur ba yin pa/ 'di nyid
61b7(rnying rgyud): rgyags pa'i skab/ dbyings dngas shes drang du 'dug pa'i mtshan med can dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum byed med pa'i rtsababyang chub sems ci dkyil lapor du chos thams cad mi gang ngomanas sangs rgyas padzi phyis da dngas pa 'dus pama'o/
62a1(rnying rgyud): thams cad bdag nyid de gcig pas// ya nas sangs rgyas pade can nyid// kye 'gag med pa'i snying po yin// bzed med pa'i dkyil 'khor gsam// ye nas grub byin ldan gyis brag// ca so// de langs la 'ju
62a2(rnying rgyud): pa bdu ma ni/ sdang sring 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad sems kyi rang rtsal du 'dra zhing sems nyid lce med smos pa'i mtha' thams cad dang bral ba yum kun tu bzang mo'i mkha' klong rnam par dag pa ni ye bzhin pa'i dkyil 'bo dang / de nyid thams cad nas thams
62a3(rnying rgyud): rang pa 'gags par dang snang ris med kun khyab tu shA ba ni kun tu bzang po rang byung gi ye shes rang bzhin lhan chub kyi dkyil 'khor dang / de gnyis kyang ngo bo tha me dad par zung 'jug tu gnas pa ni dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i sas bde ba chen po rtsa ba byang ba
62a4(rnying rgyud): mas kyi dkyil 'khor ro// rtogs bya'i gzhi de dang rtogs byed kyi lam gnyi ga rnal 'byor gsum du bsdus nas bshad de/ spyi mdo dgongs 'dus las/ grogs po dag/ de bas na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam pa gang zhe na/ 'di ltar bas
62a5(rnying rgyud): kyis mi khyab pa'i chos thams cad kyi rnam pa ni/ rnal 'byor rnam pa gsum gyis yongs su 'brel pa ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ bya ba'i rnal 'byor dang / bya ba byed pa'i rnal 'byor dang / bya ba med pa'i rnal 'byor ro// zhes pa dang / yang rgyu'i rnal
62a6(rnying rgyud): 'gyod dang / rkyen gyi rnal 'byor dang / 'bras bu'i rnal 'byor gsum du rtsa rgyud kun 'dus rig par gsungs shing / rtsa bshad kyi rgyud de gnyis kyi dgongs don gcig tu bsdus nas bstan pa ni/ don bsdus las/ kun bzang thugs rjes 'gro don du// theg
62a7(rnying rgyud): nga snang 'dul mdzad pa'i// don dam nges pa'i theg pa las// gsang sgo mtshon pa'i mdo rgyud don// rnam pa gsum du shes bya ste// bya ba rgya dang byed pa rkyen// bye bral 'bras bu'i rnal 'byor dag/ ji snyed chos kyi rtsa bar bshad// ces
62b1(rnying rgyud): gsungs pas/ bya ba cu'i rdul 'byor dang / byung ba rkyen gyi rnal 'byor dang / bya bral 'bras bu'i rnal 'byor te gsum las/ dang pon/ chos thams cad kyi gnas lpags dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum gyi rang bzhin du ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs par gnas pa ti
62b2(rnying rgyud): yin te/ de nyid las/ phyi nang bye brag ji snyed pa'i// chos rnams thams cad byang chub sems// ji bzhin dang du ye gnas pas// shes par bya ba rgyud don yin// zhes so// gnyis pa ni/ lam gyi rtsol ba dang bcas pa'i byed pas srid pa las bca
62b3(rnying rgyud): zhi ba gnas skabs kyi 'bras bu la 'jug par byed pa nyan rang byang sems kyi theg pa gsum ste/ snga ma las/ rtsol bcas spyod pas 'dren 'jug pa'i// theg pa de ni bya byed rkyen// zhes so// gsum pa ni/ sems kyi chos nyid gdong ma nas rang bzhin gyis rnam
62b4(rnying rgyud): par dag pas 'bras bu gzhan nas btsal ba'i rtsol sgrub kyi ro dogs dang bral ba sngags phyi nang gi theg pa ste/ de nyid las/ gzhan du 'bras bu re rtsol med// bsgrub bya nyid la lam gnas pas// thabs chen theg 'di bya bral lo// zhes so// de ltar rnal
62b5(rnying rgyud): 'byor gyi ma gnyis po de la thun mong spyi'i lam zhes bya zhing / de'i nang nas kyang khyad par 'di'i lam la dbye na/ de nyid las/ ngo bo thabs dang shes rab ste// zhes pa/ thabs kyi nges pa'i lam dang / shes rab rnam par grol ba'i lam gnyis su grangs nges pa
62b6(rnying rgyud): las/ dang po ni/ mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba chen po lhan cig skyes pa zhu ba de'i ye shes sgrub pa'i thabs gang zhig// 'khor lo bzhi'i sgom thabs kyis lhan sdes ye shes rim gyis 'dren pa'i thabs steng sgo'i man ngag dang / mkha' gsang gi snyoms 'jug
62b7(rnying rgyud): la rten nas spyan skyes rgyaye shes cig car du 'dren pa'i thabs 'og sgra'i man ngag gnyis te/ de las/ rol pa'i gang la sogs pa// man ga thabs kyis der 'drug dang // zhes so// gnyis pa ni/ gong gi de'i 'gros sa/ thos pas la bsgom
63a1(rnying rgyud): na du du rgyu rku na gyun smra /
63a2(rnying rgyud): 'don pa/ shes byed rig pa'i gtan gyista rnams kyis so sor brtag pas chos thams cad kyi gnas lpags nas nyid yang bzhin pa dkyil lakhor ga gram gyi rang bzhin ska bas ma brjid bral dugatan la phebs pa ni 'di ny-id kyi bub ma 'o//
63a3(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa don gyi rjes
63a4(rnying rgyud): pa ga na la gnas pa// bzlam sa nyid dus kyang rlo bzhin ga pa / dbyungs 'dis
63a5(rnying rgyud): ga/ da me du gyun/ 'du sa/ / sa pa'i na nanas / sna ba d+hA sa
63a6(rnying rgyud): la ma mas rdza sa ma sa
63a7(rnying rgyud): sa tsu sum myong babamis dus kyi sa thal phyo sa / dang/ dri yi ngasas pa sadang / gzhi ga yin sa pa 'dun pa nga ma mobyas sa ni ma sunas sa
63b1(rnying rgyud): du bya na/ nas su sgyu
63b2(rnying rgyud): da sa
63b3(rnying rgyud): s+ho// / du
63b4(rnying rgyud): chen po a ti yog ni/
63b5(rnying rgyud): sa /
64a1(rnying rgyud): ya shes 'gyur ba med pa la rtags pa man pa'i gzhang 'ad pagang zhig/ theg pani rgyal po 'di nyid kyis gzhal na dam pa 'og ma brgyad pa'i zag pa rnams kyis dran la yad makyang ba'i sems tag/ gsung pa 'bang zhig gis 'jang
64a2(rnying rgyud): ba med pa la zlo ba bzo 'chos shing bsgyur/ spang du med pa la gnyen pos bcos nas spangs/ bsal du med pa la bsal 'dod kyis blos skyon du dmigs/ thob tu med pa la gzhan nas thob byar yod pa'i ro dogs kyi dbyen bcug/ rtsol slab dang bral
64a3(rnying rgyud): bar 'bad rtsol gyis ma rig pa chen pos rang gnas kyi ye shes la bsgribs pas rnal ma'i de kho na nyid la reg pa'i skabs med pa ste/ 'di ltar theg pa 'og ma'i nyan rang gis rtogs pa'i bdag med ni shes pa dang rdul rdzas la don dam du 'dod la/ rna ma rig bla
64a4(rnying rgyud): sa dang shes dang gsal nyid kyi rnam shes la don dam yongs grub tu 'dod pa dag ni 'jig rten pa'i sems dang sems byung las 'das pa med cing / dbu mas bden pa gnyis kyis gzhal ba'i skye med/ 'gag med/ yod med/ med min la sogs
64a5(rnying rgyud): gtan tshigla chen po bzhi la sogs pas dpyad pa'i 'gog bden dang / mtha' bral dang / spros bral sogs kyi mtshungs dpe nam mkha' lta bu'i stong par 'dzin pa dang / sngags 'og ma'i bya bas dag pa gsum gyi lha gtsang sbra sogs dka' thub kyis mnyes
64a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i dngos grub 'grub par 'dod pa dang / nye ba'i rnal 'byor gyis lta spyod gong 'og ya cha bas mtshan 'dzin dang / rnal 'byor gyis don dam pa'i byin rlabs lhar bltas nas phyag rgya bzhi'i rnal 'byor la dmigs pa dang / rnal 'byor chen pos bskyed rim
64a7(rnying rgyud): dang / rdzogs rim rtsa thig rlung gsum la gnad du gtsun pas ye shes skye bar 'dod cing / rjes su rnal 'byor gyis dbyings ye shes bskyed bya skyed byed lha'i dkyil 'khor du blta ba sogs mdor na a nu man chad kyi ram pa de dag thams cad zlos
64b1(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i grub mtha' kho na ste/ de dag thams cad kyang blo dang 'di na meng do// stong ngo // bden no// snyam pa'i snyam byed dang / yang byed dang / rtog dpyod kyis yul yul can la mos nyid yin par brnams pa las gzug ma'i gnas lugs ji bzhin 'dzor
64b2(rnying rgyud): ba ni med de/ ji skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i mdo las/ rgyal pos long bdu ma bsags te glang chen bstan te/ mtshan nyid so ser gros shig/ ces bsgos pas/ de dag rnams kyis glang po che'i lnga la reg pa rnams ni lcags kyu 'dra'o//
64b3(rnying rgyud): zhes zer/ mig la reg pa rnams ni bor ba 'dra'o// rna ba la reg pa rnams ni zhib ma 'dra'o// rgyab la rig pa rnams ni khyogs dang 'dra'o// mdug ma la reg pa rnams ni thig gu 'dra'o// zhes zer ro// de rnams kyis glang po che gzhan la smras pa pa yid yang /
64b4(rnying rgyud): thams cad du rtogs pa ni ma yin no// de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yang / stong pa nyid dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / 'od gsal ba la sogs tha dad par smras kyang thams cad du rtog pa ni ma yin no// zhes gsungs pa ltar ro// lam de dag gis rdzogs pa chen
64b5(rnying rgyud): po'i don la bsgribs shing rdzogs pa chen po'i lam la gnas bzhin par de dag gi rtog pa skyes na gol bar bshad de/ kun byed rgyal po las/ nges pa thob pa'i theg pa drug/ rdzogs pa chen po'i gol sar bstan// da yang ji lta bu zhe na// byang chub sems
64b6(rnying rgyud): dpa'i mdo sde ni// kun tu 'od kyis 'dod pa// bden pa gnyis kyi rtog dpyod kyis// chos nyid stong pa nam mkhar 'dod// a ti yo ga'i bde chen ni// rtog dpyod 'das pa'i byang chub sems// tog dpyod 'das la mdo sdes bsgribs// rdzogs chen rtog
64b7(rnying rgyud): dang dpyon pa ni// mdo sde dag tu gol bar bshad// kI ya rdo rje 'dzin 'dod pa// dag pa rnam gsum sgor zhugs nas// gzung 'dzin dag pa'i yul la gnas// a ti yo ga'i bde chen ni// gzung 'dzin 'das pa'i byang chub sems// gzung 'dzin 'das la
65a1(rnying rgyud): du na/ bas 'brings// dogs nag chud sa // snam dang sus lab bshas/ sgrub pabs rdzu sa bras sri kya bag bcug gsung ba ba don mdus// gtus su bya ba 'dra pa
65a2(rnying rgyud): togs// a ti yo ga'i bde chen ni// gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems// gnyis su med la u pas bsgribs// rdzogs chen gnyis su byed pa ni// u pa ya ru gol bar bshad// yo ga stug po bkod 'dod pa// mtshan ma yod med sgor zhugs
65a3(rnying rgyud): sa// phyag rgya bzhi la gtsor byed de// blung dor med la 'jug ma nus// a ti yo ga'i bde chen ni// glang dor med pa'i byang chub sems// blung dor med la yogs bsgribs// rdzogs chen blang dang dor byed pa// yo ga dag tu gol bar bshad//
65a4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'chang 'dod pa// thabs dang shes rab sgor zhugs nas// rang rgyud dag pa'i dkyil 'khor la// bsnyen srub rnam bzhi sgrub par byed// a ti yo ga'i bde chen ni// rtsol thub 'das pa'i byang chub sems// rtsol sgrub 'das la ma nyas bsgribs//
65a5(rnying rgyud): rdzogs chen rtsol slab byed pa ni// ma hA yo gar gol bar bshad// a ru dbyer med pa 'dod pa// dbyings dad ye shes sgor zhugs nas// 'di ltar sdang ba'i chos rnams la// rgya ni dag pa'i dbyings lta ba// 'bras bu ye shes dkyil 'khor blta// a ti
65a6(rnying rgyud): yo gA'i bde chen ni// rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i byang chub sems// rgyu 'bras 'das la a nus bsgribs// thogs chen rgyu 'bras gnyis blta na// a nu yo gang grol bar bshad// ces gsungs pas/ de dag rnams ni sems kyis byas shing bcos pas sems
65a7(rnying rgyud): ni tshogs brgyad kun du rtog pa dor bya'i dri ma yin la/ 'di ltar rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po ni sems las 'das pa'i sems nyid rig pa rang byung gi ye shes 'od gsal 'dus ma byas par gshis kyi yon tan thams cad lhan grub tu bzhug pa las bskyed bya phyed byed kyi chu 'bras dang
65b1(rnying rgyud): gzhan gyi rkyen la sogs pa'i khams la rang bzhin gyis grol bas ltos mi dgos pa nam mkha' lta bu'i mtshan nyid gnas lugs 'pho 'gyur med par grub pa'i gnad kyis thog ma'i mgon po kun tu bzang po nyid kyang byas pa med par rang byung gi ye shes rang ngo rtogs pa'i cha
65b2(rnying rgyud): nas sangs rgyas pa las thos bsam dang 'du byas pa'i tshogs bsags sogs rkyen gzhan gyis ma byung bar bstan pa ste/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul la 'jug pa ye shes sdang ba rgyan gyi mdo las/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni chos 'ga' yang ma gzigs/
65b3(rnying rgyud): ma gas na/ ma dgongs/ rnam par mi mkhyen/ kun tu mi mkhyen to// sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni ma gsungs/ ma brjod do// sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni mi gsung mi brjod do// sangs rgyas rnams ni gsung bar mi 'gyur brjod par mi 'gyur ro//
65b4(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi mdzad do// sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang ma rgyas so// sangs rgyas rnams ni nyon mongs pa ma spangs so// sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni rnam par byang ba mngon sum du
65b5(rnying rgyud): mdzad do// sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni chos gang yang ma gzigs// ma gas na/ ma myangs/ ma mnams/ ma rig/ mi mkhyen to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni gzod ma nas yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro// zhes dang /
65b6(rnying rgyud): mnon po byams pas/ ji ltar sngon bzhin gyis de bzhin// 'gyur ba med pa'i chos nyid do// zhes dang / 'dus ma byas shing lhun gyis grub// gzhan gyi rkyen gyis rtogs min pa// zhes pa la sogs gsungs pa ltar chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang / gnas
65b7(rnying rgyud): lugs sam/ gshis lugs sam/ chos nyid gang yin pa de ni 'dus ma byas pa/ glu rkyen gyis ma bskyed pa/ gzhan la rag ma lus shing / rkyen gzhan gyis mi rtogs pa/ blos bsgrubs pa'i mtha' la mi gnas pa zhig ste/ 'phags pa
66a1(rnying rgyud): ngag nam cig bcags pa zag pa can pa ra dzam 'od srung gas byas pa las/ gang 'dus mabyas pa den 'phags pa rnams kyi dgas so// 'phags pa rnams kyi rigs gang yin pa de la bsgrub pa yang med bslab pa las 'das
66a2(rnying rgyud): yang med do// gang bslab pa yang med bsgrub pa las 'das pa yang med pa de la rgyub yang med mi grub yang med/ rab tu chub yang med / gang la chu ba yang med/ mi chub yang med/ rab tu rgyab yang med pa de la sems kyang med/ sems las byung ba'i chos rnams ca
66a3(rnying rgyud): med do// gang la sems mang med/ sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang med pa de la las byung med/ las kyi rnam par smin pa yang med do// gang la las kyang med/ las kyi rnam par smin pa yang med pa de la bde ba yang med/ sdug bsngal
66a4(rnying rgyud): pa ldang med do// gang la bde ba yang med/ sdug bsngal ba yang med pa de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rigs te/ 'phags pa rnams kyi rigs gang yin pa de la ni las kyang med/ las mngon par 'du byed pa yang med do// zhes dang / dgongs pa nges
66a5(rnying rgyud): par 'grel pa theg pa chen po'i mdo sde las/ 'phags pa rnams kyis 'phags pa'i shes pa dang / 'phags pa'i mthong bas brjod du med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa gang yin pa ste/ brjod du med pa'i de nyid mngon par rdzogs par rtogs
66a6(rnying rgyud): par bya ba'i phyir 'dus ma byas zhes ming du btags so// zhes dang / rtsa ba'i shes rab las// rang bzhin rgyu dang rkyen las ni// 'byung bar rigs pa ma yin no// rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba ni// rang bzhin byas pa can du 'gyur// rang bzhin byas
66a7(rnying rgyud): pa can zhes byar// ji lta bur na rung bar 'gyur// rang bzhin dag ni bcos med dang // gzhan la ltos pa med pa yin// ces sogs rgya cher gsungs pa 'dis rang bzhin gshis kyi gnas lugs rdzogs pa chen po'i grub pa'i mtha' rgyu rkyen las 'das
66b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'dus 'azlas kyi shes mngan par rtogs pa'i na byangs ma dasas klags par ma nga de nyid mtha' bral drugatad la bab pa'i tshul dang / gang dag nga bzhin gzhan dang sa dang // dongs dang ngas sa smra ba // dadags pa rgyas ma pa
66b2(rnying rgyud): de nyid mthong ba ma yin no// zhes dang / dpal rjeng pas khon nyid sgrub pa'i thabs shes zla parjogs pa chen po'i mamathu ma pa las kyang / sangs byas sems can rang bzhidag cig/ sems kyi yi gas gas pa di// po'i din ngas zang dadang /
66b3(rnying rgyud): ba bdag nyid su// rang rig pa de brdzogs pacwo// drags byung ba skal ba'i sgra// dab ma thub gsang pa'i sems// srang dang mi nga dbyer ma do// zhes pa dang / denyid la lam gyi migs pa ldog pa ltang mig nas pa'i rlom yang / par de/ par
66b4(rnying rgyud): mai shes nyi po ni// rim pa'i las med mthar byin pa// zhes mi// ri na rim pa rag ma de dag bstan pa la dgos pason na/ gdul ba'i blor mas smyos pa'am 'og mas rjes nas rim gyis lamya 'di dzug pa'i thabasas pa yang g+sa su 'ab ba pa go pa ba ste/
66b5(rnying rgyud): bdabang gshegs pa'i bstan pa thams cad byagang por ma brjod bya'i mthar thug pa ni shes rab rgya pha la du mun pa'i ma shes gzug ma dbya na nyi gcig pa yin pa/ nyid ra ga mang nasum gyis rdzogs par gtan mche'as pa martson bachen po'i bang 'as gzhir
66b6(rnying rgyud): byeng / sdom pa gsum dang / phung zin drug dang / bskyed pa'i rim par du/ rdzogs pa'i dris pa dag thams cad kyang rdzogs pa kyi rtogs pa'i thabs dang stong gang du myong ba'i ngal rtags tsas dra san de/ bas sbyong ngas/ sa rnams cad par
66b7(rnying rgyud): da pa dang / gas zer mo// zhes du/ nga nga gi nga bar bas gangs/ ngan kyis 'o bsu pa dag// rdzogs paci pong sathang drugapa// na gapa 'gas / de rdzab sa
67a1(rnying rgyud): bshAn/ mngan ba na/ lag // snrubs gas pa rdzus/ sa shang dang/ shAng pashA gas pa can pa du ba gagags pas da
67a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo bar par spros pa'i mtshon ma mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bas ma gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas lugs rgyas par bstan mod kyi/ gshis kyi bzhugs tshul ma bstan/ 'khor lo tha mar gshis kyi bzhugs tshul bstan kyang de mngon du byed pa'i lam mtshan nyid pa ma bstan/
67a3(rnying rgyud): de'i phyed 'khor lo bar pa'i dgongs pa 'phags mchog grus bkral ba'i rig tshogs kyi dgongs pa ma 'gyur ba dang / rje'i chos dbyings bstod pa sogs dang / tha ma'i dgongs pa rgyal tsha ba byams pa dang 'phags mchog thog med sra mched sogs kyis bkal ba
67a4(rnying rgyud): shing rta chen po rnam gnyis kyi dgongs pa mthar thug 'gal bar mi 'du bar rdzogs pa chen po nyid du don gyis gnas te gang gi phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin chos nyid zab mo'i gnas lugs de las gzhan slob dpon de dag mi bzhed cing / de las gzhan du rdzogs pa
67a5(rnying rgyud): chen po'ang mgrub pa'i phyir ro// 'on kyang de nyid mngon du byed pa'i lam sngags khon khyad par du 'phags med kyi/ de ltan 'ang sngags phyog ma'i mtshan bcas dang mtshan med kyi rim patsum po dang / b+h+ra med mchog sngagrags pa rdzas kyi 'khor lo'i sbyor ba yan lag
67a6(rnying rgyud): drug dang / gzhan yang rim pa lnga pa sogs kyis rtswa thig drung gsum gyi byed pa bcings pas 'od gsal rtags bcu dang stong gzugs re khA nag po'i nang du srid pa gsum gyi gzugs brnyan mthong par bshad pa tsam ste de'ang shes nyams 'phel 'grib can te ji ltar bsgoms
67a7(rnying rgyud): 'phreng ba dod du dengs pa'i rdo rje'i sku sgrub mi ngus pa'i phyir de dag skal dman rnams 'di drang ba'i don tsam las nges pa'i don la mdzeg ste/ ra pas/ nges pa'i thabs cig snying po 'don// phyag rgya rim zhe sbyor ba drug/ bsam pa'i theg pa sna tshogs
67b1(rnying rgyud): pa// nga da byung sa paman// ngab nyid lamathad man med// sa 'dag bsam pa'i rtog par byud // zas gsangs pa bzhin no// dang pa dad la ma 'og ma'i bstod ngas bamam pan rtags ngas tu gan byung tsas dang / ngab skams pas las nga
67b2(rnying rgyud): rgya'i khyad par gyis 'dod pa'i rig 'dzin dang gzugs kyi rig 'dzin gang rung gi rten des mkha' spyod 'grub pa tsam las med la/ rdzogs rim rtsa thig rlung gsum gtun pas ye shes skye bar 'dod pa yang rtsol bcas kyi rkyen khar ma 'das la/ dbang gsum pa'i bde stong
67b3(rnying rgyud): gi ye shes kyang dbang po gnyis sbyor gyi dga' ba'i rjes su skye bar 'dod pa gang zhig/ khams gsum las ma grol ba'i phyir 'pho med kyi bde ba chen po mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes ni des rtogs par ma bstan cing snga ma de dag bde ba'i bsam gtan tsam du bshad pa ste/
67b4(rnying rgyud): dpal nA ro pas de kho na nyid sgrub pa las/ nges par spos bral rang byung sems// chags pa'i lam gyis shes mi 'gyur// rang byung 'od gsal snying po 'di// mtshan ma med pa'i rang bzhin pas// shes rab thabs kyi chags pa bral// thig la 'a
67b5(rnying rgyud): rtsol sprob su med// shes rab thabs la snyoms 'jug pa// bde ba'i bsam gtan chen po yin// lha ma'i rol ma chags par// chags med ye shes rdzogs pa'i lam// zhes gsungs pa ltar ro// de ltar grub pa nyid kyis rang bzhin yongs su dag
67b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i shes rab rdzogs pa chen po'i gnas lugs gang zhig ma rtogs par ni blo'i yul du dmigs pa'i sdom gsum dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang bskyed rdzogs sogs lam bden gyi rnam pa de dang des nyon mongs pa'i tshogs nyan rang gis spang / byang sems kyis
67b7(rnying rgyud): 'geg/ gsang sngags kyis lam du byung ba sogs ci rigs pa'i thabs rnams dran pas ma dang chud pa'i rtog dpyod kyis bsgrubs pa'i dag rtsa 'du byas pa las ma 'das shing / dbu ma rgyan las/ ngo bo 'dus byas ma yin pa// 'ga' yang gang na yod ma yin/
68a1(rnying rgyud): zhes pag // gnas lcags na nyid rtogs pa skabs thob pa nas kyang gas nga nga/ nganag dag ga gsang tha ma sogs spyod pa'i mthu' la zhen mA p+na shAs kyi tshogs dam pa'i gsung golas can sna ba sha sa
68a2(rnying rgyud): dad rdzogs pas/ de nag shegs sna ngas pa'i ma ngas 'di 'jug pa // dgra 'a sa na 'i kyis rnams la mngon pa zhin pa ma / midag pa tsas rnams la mngan pa shanapas/ da
68a3(rnying rgyud): nams la mngon par zhen par 'gyun to// mi dge ba'i thos rnams la mngon par zhen pas sdug bsngal dang / yid ba na'i chos rnams mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'dri dag ni sdug pasngal 'phags pa'i bden par btags pas du bzhi ga shegs pa
68a4(rnying rgyud): dge ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs su bsten to// dge ba dang mi dge ba la mngon par shin pa med pa dang / sred pa 'gog pa 'di dag ni bran 'thung bas shing 'phags pa'i bdon pa gnyis brtags par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas dge ba'i chos kyi sa grangs su
68a5(rnying rgyud): bstan no// zhes so// ya de nyid las/ de la dag pa yang sto sa/ mau na 'i ma myod / dge pa yang rnam par dadzin mo/ mi dge pa yang rnam par byen/ dge bya yang mi dag pa dang mi 'dul/ mi dge pa yang dag pa dang mi 'drazhing / sa
68a6(rnying rgyud): bdang myi ge par mngon pa bzhin pa'i rgyudang rkyen med do// nas nga / theg paca pa'i rdzi sno la zhes dmya 'i mngoms/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes tog gis su rnam pa/ bsod nams kyi tshogs kyang lags/ bka sngal pa/
68a7(rnying rgyud): pal sogs dkar ba'i chos mtshan mang cas pan// ye shes kyi tshigs gang mags/ shes rabal sogs mtshan ma med pa'o// gsol pa/ de gnyis rje s+yA ga sog par brtse// bka' phul pa/ bsod nam gyi tshogs ni mor ba
68b1(rnying rgyud): gsasas rnas dab na pa sa gargyas rdzas mya drung mdul // rdzu nas/ da ba gas pa/ zadag / smram 'a sa ngan byung byu ba med/ dran sa
68b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshogs zhes bya ste/ dper na dum gyi can pa'i chu swAT/ mi brlag pa/ pi 'dod pa/ mi bslab/ mya na las 'das pa thob par byung pa'o// ye shes rtog ye shes kyi tshogs ljon pas ga par bya'o// zhes gsangs pa dang / deng
68b3(rnying rgyud): lcags nI rlung shi nyid bcu yang rnal ma'i don la sgrib byed kyi mtshan mar gyur ba ste/ kun byang las/ skyab sgom med nga mchog bsrung du byed// sAl sbrang med la ma la bgrod du med// sri las rtsol med dbangs bskur du med// sogs pa
68b4(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'bang bskyed myed// 'bas gnyis me nam mab 'a ltarngan// zhes dang / 'jigs pa'ang med pa ma gyis kyang // dmyed kyil lanang m+b+hi sngag dang / gtor ma bzlas pa bzang ba // kyim po ba sogs
68b5(rnying rgyud): na
68b6(rnying rgyud): pa pa ying byed// mu mang sngags kyang med ma yin// zhes dang / thig la mnyam gnas kyi rgyung las/ bde ba chen po'i dngag m+b+ha nA// dam tshig mad cing sdom pa'i byed// bu dung byed dang rtsol ba med// nam mapa' lta thar 'thub par 'gyur// zhes dung
68b7(rnying rgyud): du sa/ skyes kyang kyi ma nga/ sa byeng / byang myu gas ra// nga shi sa ra 'gyur// nas nga mas
69a1(rnying rgyud): gal / 'a ga pa// sa nga/ sa/ nupa yang na sa/ jug 'du zhin gshegasapas sanamanyam par byung bar// zhes ga yang nga ma // ga #
69a2(rnying rgyud): po/ nga gis ma rnam par byung ba med du// gang pa ra ya bye meng // ngan tshos kyi phyog kya ni tsa sna thams cad kyi zug Na b+he/ cig rgya med pa yin no// mabyas pa'i phyag tu yin no// kye rnyed pa'i phyag na sbyin no// n+ya ga go gang cu rgya 'atab pa pa
69a3(rnying rgyud): ni mya rlung sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin// rigs btsun pa yin/ mI mi seng gi yin/ smod pa gcig pa yin/ bag cho ba med pa yin/ sgra spags pa yin/ ga'an ma stegs can dag sgeg par byed pa yin/ bdud kyi rje 'dul bar byed pa yin/ gzhan stegs ca
69a4(rnying rgyud): sa tu 'dug par byed pa byin/ dmigs pa na ga cig par byud bzhin/ lhag pa'i kyil nga na 'brigs pa byeng ba yin/ rdeg pa byung ba snyen/ sbyangs rgyas kyisas padu sa kyi pa dag ma ba gra'i ba khyod pa men/ sa pa
69a5(rnying rgyud): pa byeng ba yin/ thogs 'bya ma rgyal batshan pa phreng bar byed pa 'in/ da dzub zud payin/ rnas kyi brgyad 'byu ba byed ba sbyin/ zhes pa legs kyis rgya tsho rab tun sa/ de la gro bya chung bdag gis thab dang snang pa'i rgyang sogs rnga theg pa mtshan
69a6(rnying rgyud): ga phyil ma nga thu 'byub ba ga ra ba/ ba / gyur bags cis sa da pa'i thus bar gsus pa ga byas ded 'ang ba gi zlas ba mam
69a7(rnying rgyud): mas
69b1(rnying rgyud): bya pa man pa san s+ho// na 'azung dang/ ma naldan// yas sa tu// gas shi gas na du na da/ nga / ba
69b2(rnying rgyud): ngangs rgya/ mar / batshig pa myi rtsibs tung dang // nga lajug tu mi na pa// na ma pa' 'thab par 'gyur// nyes pa lamathas pa 'thung dang ba ma dzub pan 'ang ma pa ma pas ngas
69b3(rnying rgyud): gis ni gyur dab minam gyi bangag shes lags grol ba'i nga 'os rgyalan chen por mazig brdung mchims dang / ga nga ga le tha la las 'das pa'i yod med sde khon nyid martogs na babyur rdzogs sogs mi su gyung ba bag ma mags bya tshul
69b4(rnying rgyud): bar bstan zhing / dadang mtshungs par pa ma dpal tu 'phrul du ba las byed/ lag rje/ ngas sems pa rnams kyi lnga byung par dang rigs kyi kyi thag gis theg pa'i thang par rnams bstan la 'gyings pa // pa gnyan pos rjen
69b5(rnying rgyud): lal rang sangs kyis hUM theg pa dang / gan pa 'am phyir pa'i theg pa dang / rig pa 'dzid pa byu pa ga d+hA me ba na kyang rjes badzin pa la sa me pa brdang dang bral bsna gnyis pa myed par yangs rgyas pa sdig par byeng // zhwa rdorje'i wang gis tod
69b6(rnying rgyud): dramang pa'i nA kyis rdzogs pa ya sa to rtogs pache pa'i/ nga nyar ba khyis la stong ga ma' bas maphyogs rnangs phyung babar mi dra te/ rang gyu gi ma nga rdzobs pa mong ma bya la ma byang ga ba'i mad da dmas sun
69b7(rnying rgyud): thugs shing pangs rgyas sgra gsum pa gyis su mdangs logs ras btsal zhing bsgrub mi dgas 'ad zhing bla ma'i mnangag gis rtogs par byed ba'i skab nyid dudu/ dag minya chen pa kyil 'char smos pa med pa'i bdag nyid la lcang nga grogs kyi da /

71a1(rnying rgyud): 'khor la// ye shes 'du 'gro med par gsal// bas ma thal rang bzhin rgyal ba'i grags// byang chub sems las 'da' ba med// ces dang / nga bzhin du n+ya'i thub pa'i spyod pa'i phyogs kyang chung bar bsgyur te/ de nyid las/
71a2(rnying rgyud): nga nyid snying po'i don ldan pas// 'dod pa'i tshogs la yid mi 'jog// de bzhin pha rol phyin pa drug// rang byang rdzogs pa'i sems laganas// bas mthal gyi lkog dgongs pa la// de nyid phyi rol byin drug ldan// mi rtog 'don myed tshul la gnas// ma
71a3(rnying rgyud): rig pa rgyan mi 'chad// dmigs med shes rab pha rol phyin// zhes sogs gzhan dang gzhan du 'ang rgya cher gsungs kyang 'dir de tsham mo// de ltar yin pa nyid kyis gnas lugs de bzhin nyid kyi lta ba'i gzhi 'di ni dmigs pa med pa'i ngo bo'i mi mthun phyogs na ma rtog
71a4(rnying rgyud): gis dben pa/ yul gyi mi mthun phyogs mtshan ma'i snang bas dben pa/ yul can gyi mi mthun phyogs gti mug dang bral ba'i sgo nas 'khor ba'i sa bon drung nas 'byin pa dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi lta ba zhes bya ba ste/ ngo bo ni bsam brjod chu 'bras dang bca
71a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i rnam shes tshogs brgyad kyi rgyal khams las 'das shing rig pa'i chos nyid rang bzhin rtogs pa chen po'i ye shes su gnas pa yin te de skad du'ang / slob dpon 'phags pas// 'jig rten pas ni gang spangs so// de ni don dam yin par bshad// ces dang /
71a6(rnying rgyud): de'i 'grel par/ byin ci ma ldog pa de nyid/ 'jig rten tha mal pas gang la martogs par gang yin gyis bsam par mgyur/ yid kyis bsamagyis mi khyab pa// dbang po'i yul du ma gyur pa// ma rig pa'i ling tog gis murnapas ma mthong bas spongs pa/
71a7(rnying rgyud): dbang po shin tu rnon po 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis mthong ba'i yul don dam pa'o// zhes gsungs pa ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa gzung 'dzin gnyis dang bral badzes so rang gi rig pa'i tshe shes kyis nyams su yang bya dang / don dam pa'i bden pa dang / yang dang
71b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i mthu' dang / stong pa nyid kyang gad dang / chen po stong pa tad sanas mtshan byas rgyad pa gang yod pa / sangs rgyas rnams kyi sa nga mams ldan pa yod pa'i sa shes kyi sgo gzugs can ga zhig/ 'phags pa dag na mjug kun byas las/ byas
71b2(rnying rgyud): byin mi ga thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ smra ba thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ ga gi sung yul ma ca las yang dgu pad+mangs bya/ dag la sa sa las yang dag par 'das pa/ rlos pa thams cad dang bral bzung ba
71b3(rnying rgyud): do bathams cad bral ba/ thA ba dang / btsumapa pathams cad dang thal ba/ ga gnams cad dang bral ba/ rtag sa byab ma yin pa/ ga ga'i spyong rnalas yin pa/ rtog 'i spyod rgyal las yang dag par 'das pa/ mtshan ma ma
71b4(rnying rgyud): mtshad mad bral ba/ mtshan ma'i spyod bral las yang dag par 'das hA/ byis pa'i lhang yul las yang dag par la.u ba/ bdu thams cad kyi yul las yang dag par 'dus pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi stod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/
71b5(rnying rgyud): rna byung shes pa'i khyod thal las yang dag par 'das pa/ gnas ma smin pa/ skyig na bri ba/ nab/ 'jigs pa'i mashes kyi stod kyar te/ de dag nyid kyis gis gyi ba/ d+hI m+le pa/ myags pa dang / rnam par dgu / !rna
71b6(rnying rgyud): mchog dam pa/ thul/ d+hag pa/ gnub/ ther chug/ ma 'ag pa'i chos can te/ dra babadug shegs pa rnyas ya / mabyung ya byu ste/ gyi zhings 'di ni 'jug ga // zhes gsungs zhing tshig tham sa rgyags pa chen pom
71b7(rnying rgyud): kyang ba ga na pa sa radang ba'idri su/ 'dzun pa rdzun bya bya / gro la nas myong rgyan nga me pasang me sri zhig ba ga yin ga kyi sri sa thos byas pasas

73a1(rnying rgyud): rim pa de kho na zhes so// lam ring ba rnams kyi thabs che ba 'di bsgom par gsungs pa/ sdug bsngal zhes pa la sogs pa'o// sdug bsngal zhes pa ni mgo sbyin pa la sogs pa'i sgo nas lam rnams la bskal pa gsum du yang gsungs te/
73a2(rnying rgyud): dngas spyod pa dang / dang po nas bdun pa dang / brkyang pa nas bcu pa'i bar du grangs med pa'i bskal pa rang gi rjes su mthun pa'i byang chub thob kyang de'i gong na bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang chen po yod pas na bla dang bcas zhes so// de'i bde ba ni bdab chen po'i sbyod pal ltos na/
73a3(rnying rgyud): nga zung tsam ste de la rab tu chags pa'i rnal 'byor pa de yis 'di lta bu dpal dang ldan pa kun nas bkra shis pa 'di/ tshe gcig gis 'grub pa'i lam 'di ci'i phyir mi bsgom ste bsgom par bya ba kho na'o// zhes bi ta pa das legs par bshad do// de bzhin
73a4(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi chos nyid zab mo'i gnas lugs ni tshad ma dang rtog ge'i rig shes ltar sdang gis rtogs bya'i yul du mi gnas pa'i tshul yang / 'phags pa dgongs pa nges 'grel las/ so so rang rig ye shes spyod yul ba// brjod du med cing tha snyad yongs chad pa/
73a5(rnying rgyud): da dang bral ba don dam chos yin te// de ni rtog ge kun las 'das mtshan nyid// ces dang / lang kar gshegs pa las/ byis pa ngan pa rtog ge ba// ro dang 'dra bas de ltar brtag/ ces gsungs pa bzhin no// gang dag rtog ge'i bsam zung gi
73a6(rnying rgyud): shes rab ni sgra tshig tha snyang dang mtshan ma'i chos kyi rjes su rnam par rtog pa'i sems dang sems byung gis kun tu bskyed pa'i/ phyogs chos dang / mtshan mtshon dang / rdzas ldog dang / 'gal khyab sodas kyi rtog pas btags pas chos thams cad rang bzhin
73a7(rnying rgyud): med pa dang / rnam rig med pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / kun gzhi med pa la sogs stong pa nyid du blos bzhag cing rjes su dpag par byed pa ni byis pa'i skye bo dag gi rtog pa'i phreng ba tsam du slob dpon 'phags pa nyid kyi zhal gyis bzhes shing / ji skad du
73b1(rnying rgyud): slob dpon nyid kyis// skye ba dang ni 'gag pa la// rkyen ni rtog pa gcig pu yin// rnam rig tsam du 'byung ba ni// dngos po'i rang bzhin yod ma yin// rtog par byur ba'i tog ge ba// btags pa tsam du bsgom pa na// rang bzhin med cing rnam rig med// dngos po
73b2(rnying rgyud): med cing kAdrug ni med// 'di dag byis pas rab tu btags// rtog gang na pas kun tu bskyed// ces gsungs pas so// de ltabs na don dam pa'i bden pa ni spros pa nye bar zhi ba/ mtshan ma'i chos dang bral ba/ tshig dang tha snyad kyi lam du mi gnas pa/
73b3(rnying rgyud): tog pa'i rjes su 'brang ma myong pas na rtog dpyod dang rjes dpags kyi yul dang shin tu 'gral ba can yin la/ de nyid kyi phyir gnas tshul de lu bu'i ye shes de nyid la mnyam par bzhag pa'i gnas skabs gshis labu rtsol dang bral ba'i grub mtha'i 'jog lugs 'di ma shes na
73b4(rnying rgyud): tog dpyon rtsi thos pa thams cad ni chog gi sun pa bsam pa dang gi pa ni rngam rtog gi yo lang bsgom pa ni der 'dzin/ myong ba ni 'ol tshod du song bas blo'i ngol 'thad 'thad 'dra ba ji ltar shar rung gnas lugs zab mo'i phyogs te tsam du phyin par yang shi
73b5(rnying rgyud): shudaka' ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi snying po'i mdo las/ gang so so'i skye ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi snying po mthong ba ma yin no// dper na dmus 'o
73b6(rnying rgyud): zhig gis gzhan la mar gyi kha dog dris pas/ kha ba 'dra'o zhes sbas pa dang ris kha ba la reg pas mar gyi kha dog zang mor 'dzin to// dris pa/ kha ba'i 'dog ci 'dra/ spras pa/ rang ba'i gshog pa rbA'o// dang pa'i gshog/ rma zos pas kha ba'i kha dog 'ur khur por 'dzin to// dris pa/
73b7(rnying rgyud): gshog pa'i kha dog ci 'dra/ dung dang 'dra'o// dung la reg pas 'jam por 'dug pas/ de yang 'jam por 'dzin to// ji ltar smras kyang dbus rong gis kha dog ji lta ba bzhin mi shes pa de ltar sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin mthong bar yang rab tu dka'o// zhes
74a1(rnying rgyud): gag rgya 'ang / nga bzhin du 'phags pa'ang mang pa byas mkhon nyid grub pa 'thabs nal ma rung ud/ da' ba ga sa shes na// sa sa snrums ga lags// nyan byas rnams byas mags pa//
74a2(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi shes// rjel 'byor spyod dang dbu ma pa// byang chub sems dpas me shes so// bla bcas sangs rgyas kun gyis kyang // 'di ni cung zad mi shes so// zhes sogs tshul ba sras dang bcas pas rgya cher bstan la/ de ltar rdzogs
74a3(rnying rgyud): pad+ma dka' ba yang 'bad rtsol dang / zhe 'dong dang / rtog dpyod dang / chu 'bras su dmigs pa'i rtog pa 'ba' zhig pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i nyid len smos pa'i mtshan ma sna tshogs pa lta ba'i yul dang yul can du bzung ba'i re dog kyis dbyen bcos shing
74a4(rnying rgyud): bsgribs par gyur la/ 'dir ni rdzogs pa chen po'i lce'i lamadub cing grol med pa'i gnas lugs gshes kyi bzhugs tshul gtan la phabs pa'i dang de las ma g.yos par mnyam par bzhag pas spros pa thams cad rang gi dbyings su zhi ba las bya ba thams cad
74a5(rnying rgyud): dang bral ba'i blo 'das chen po'i dang la rang gnas chun bzhag tu spong ba las bzo mi 'chos/ rgyal snang blo bur gyi dri ma mtha' dag kyang rang rig ye song 'pho 'gyur med pa'i klong du chu dang rlab bzhin sdang gnyen du ma grub parangang sangs/ rang dngas/ rang grol
74a6(rnying rgyud): ru 'gyur btsam lasaM/ gzhan du mi btsal/ ched du mi bsgom/ gcig tu mi gnas/ blos mi gzhag/ rnam par mi tod/ skyon du mi 'dzin/ phyir mi bas la/ nang du mi bsrub par dnga'i ba rang lugs su 'jog pa tsam la bsgom pa dang mnya
