75a3(rnying rgyud): zad med// yang dag nyid la yang dag blta// yang dag mthong na rnam par grol// zhes dang / slob dpon rA rota pyas kyang // 'dzin pa'i cha la gang gnas kyang // 'khor ba'i 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur// dang 'dod don gyis mthar mi byin// ye shes gsang ba
75a4(rnying rgyud): 'de ba'is// 'dod pas mi 'grub thob pa med// 'dod med rang bzhin nyid las 'byung // shes pa dang lugs so ma nyid// kun bzang rgyal ba'i dgongs pa'o// zhes dang / dam pa'i don la gang 'dug pa// nges pa'i gdams dab zab mo yas// btsam/
75a5(rnying rgyud): med rang bzhag btsal ba dang / mi bsgom rang lugs bsgol pa dang // mi gnas tshul la 'dug pa dang // gzhag med mnyam gzhag rang byung bar// mi rtog don la phyin pa// dge mi dge yi na la rtog thal// byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid // zhes sogs kyi cher
75a6(rnying rgyud): gsungs shing / slob dpon pa'i dbu ma las kyang / grub pa med pa'i rjes rnams la// gnyis dang gsum sogs ga pa snod// skang sems khas len sngas dang bral// chos nyid blo 'das bsgom du med// ces no 'das chen po banom du med pa'i donagasapa
75a7(rnying rgyud): bar baspyan cing / gzhan yang slob dpon klu'i brang grub kyis kyang / a ti'i rdul 'byor rig pa yod// ji ltar ba zhag pa de ltar yin// gnyis med sems la rtag lnga dang // chad par 'gyur ba ma yin no// zhes gnyis rmugs pa rab tu bzhag panyid kyis
75b1(rnying rgyud): 'dzub pa na// des panag pas rjo 'dug pa ma gsungasas pa sa na' nga yun sugasapa 'o da/ la gnas bya gagasapa gas pag
75b2(rnying rgyud): thams cad der 'dra zhing gnas pa'i tshul yang / zla ba sman ma'i mdo las/ 'jig rten khams ni stong dag tu// ngas ni mdo sde gang bshad pa// tshig 'brutha dang don gcig ste// thams cad brjod par nus ma yin// tshig gcig rnam par bgror na ni// de dang
75b3(rnying rgyud): thams cad bsgom par 'gyur// ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// chos rnams mang po rab bshad pa// chos rnams thams cad stong pa nyid// mi gang don la mkhas pa dag/ tshig 'di bslab par gyur pa na// sangs rgyas chos ni dkon ma yin// zhe
75b4(rnying rgyud): so// de la dbang po'i rim pas grub mtha'i 'angal lugs gsum du byung ste/ bkod pa chen po las/ 'on kyang nga 'das 'og dag tu// 'di ltar rnam par ldang bar 'gyur// yid can rnams pa sems kyi rje// nam mkha' can la glong gi sde// rim rtsol
75b5(rnying rgyud): bral ba man dag sde// zhes pas 'di ltar chos thams cad sems nyid las byu na med pas spang bya'i mtha' las grol ba sems ci ste/ chos ban thams cad chos nyid kun tu bzang mo'i klong du'u ba chub pas gnyen po'i mtha' las grol ba bya bral klong gi dza/ don rang gi mtsha
75b6(rnying rgyud): nyid yan lugs ltar gtan la 'bebs pas sang gnyen gnyis ka'i mtha' las grol ba zab pa man dag gi sde gsum mo// dang po ni/ theg pa'i rim pa dang / bden pa gnyis dang / phar phyin drug dang / rim pa gnyis sogs la der 'don gyi 'du shes dam pos dkris
75b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i zag pa dang bcas pa'i lam bden 'du byas pa gang zhig dag mnyam chen po'i ye shes gnyug ma'i byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin chos dbyings spos pa dang drang ba don dam bden pa'i gshis de nyid chu 'bras dge sdig grang dor mi cha las rnam par grol ba'i dbyings chen por la bzla ba
76a1(rnying rgyud): sems sa tha'i thab ma tha ste/ ma nagadu 'du gnyis snang ga chos thams cad pas 'das pa'o// de'i tshul ni/ gan byin pas/ sas rgyang na bsams byung ba'o// lha ba sgom sa spong ba dmang / nga
76a2(rnying rgyud): ba wA med sa la bgrod du med// dkyil 'khor bskyed med bzlas brjod rdzogs rim med/ dbang la bsgyur med dmatshig bsung du med// ye nas ldan grub dag pa'i chos nyid la// glo zur ri brtsol nu 'bas chos las 'das// zhes dang / sog shin tu la
76a3(rnying rgyud): phyogs chen la// rgyu dang 'bras bu yod zer sna byed na// deni rdzogs chen rtogs pa don mi ldan// don dmathun rdzob gnyis sus byed na// spro dang spang pa gdabapa 'a chog yin te// de mis gnyis su med par rtogs bzed// dus gsum sangs byas rnams kyis /
76a4(rnying rgyud): rtogs pa yang // gnyis sul mthong rnam gzhag gcig tu rtogs// zhes dang / 'phags pa kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa bstan pa'i mdo las/ 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu don dam par na de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / shin du
76a5(rnying rgyud): g+hu ba gang dang mnyam pa/ don dam par rna mtshams med pa lnga po dag kyang nga dang mnyam mo// dan dam par na de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / shing ngu'i wu ba gang dang mnyam pa/ don dam par na lta bur gyur pa rnams kyang de dang mnyam mo// zhes dang /
76a6(rnying rgyud): lhar bstan pas zab mo'i gnas la blta ba'i blo gros kyi spyan tha ba 'ga' zhig gis rdzogs chen gyis thabs kyi mcha yal bar dor bas las chu 'bras la thur ba btab bo// zhes nan gyis 'gog par byas so// zab mo'i gnas la byis pa'i blogos skrag pa skye ba den kya
76a7(rnying rgyud): 'di pas nam shes rtog pa'i yul las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi rgyal khams don dam pa'i bden pa chos kyi dbyings 'dus ma byas su sba ba gang zhig/ khams gsum dang dkar nag las kyi cha 'du byas pa'i khams su mi gnas shing de las yongs su grol ba'i bdag nyid
76b1(rnying rgyud): can du 'dod pa'i phyir gya rkyen gyis ma bskyed pa sngar gyi lung rnams kyis kyang rtogs par nus la/ gal te der 'dod na/ slob dpon klu sgrub kyi dbu mas sha las/ las dang nyon mongs rnam rtog las// de dag spos las spros pa ni// stong pa nyid kyis 'gag
76b2(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// zhes/ las dkar nag gi chu 'bras thams cad rnam rtog gi mtshan ma tsam las byung bar gsungs nas de dag thams cad spros pa dang bral ba'i stong pa nyid kyis zhi bar gsungs shing / de nye bar zhi ba'i tshul yang / gzhan las shes min zhi ba dang /
76b3(rnying rgyud): spros pa rnams kyis ma smos pa// de ni de nying mtshan nyid do// zhes dang / yang de nyid las/ nyon mongs las dang lus rnams dang // byed pa po dang 'bras bu dag/ dri za'i grong dang smig rgyu dang // mig yor chu zla ji bzhin no// zhes dang / de nyid kyi da
76b4(rnying rgyud): srid pa 'pho ba las/ cir yang mi rtog stong pa ste// yid la mi byed lha 'chi med// sdang ba sdu ma dge sdig bral// stong dang snying rje 'khor 'das stong // snga ma gsal stong brjod med dri// chos nyid gsal dngos rtog pa med// ces sogs don dam bden pa
76b5(rnying rgyud): chos nyid rtogs pa'i don 'dus byas pa'i dkar nag gi las thams cad kyis 'ching grol med par bzang ngani ro mnyam chen por rtogs pa sngar smos pa ltar chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid can du la bzla ba'i chos nyid drung thad du ston pa'i skabs te/ 'di ltar byang chub
76b6(rnying rgyud): sems dpa'i spyod pa dam pa las/ rin chen byin gyis sbas pa/ 'di skad ces slu bar bya ste/ 'dod chags masangs shig/ be sdang ma gzhil cig/ gti mug ma bas la cig/ rang ga lus las byin du ma bskyod cig/ mi dge ban cag/ sna ba tshar ma
76b7(rnying rgyud): gcod cig/ kun tu sbyor ba rnams maston cig/ phung po rnams yongs su zung zhig/ khams rnams ril por byes shig/ skye mched rnams la spyod cig/ byis pa'i sa pas 'da' bar mabyed cig/ yi dge ba'i rtogs shig/ dge ba la spongs shig/ sangs
77a1(rnying rgyud): du dun du rnam tun na du
77a2(rnying rgyud): sa ga

77b1(rnying rgyud): nan/ 'grol dang bzhag 'ab rtsom med par la bzlaba'o// gnyis bgol sgrib la ban pa ni/ an man chang po ma ba brgyad po rnams zlos btags pas gzilas grol ba yin la/ 'dir ni dang byu ga la shas dang thal bas rgya rkyen la bathabs rgya 'ja ma
77b2(rnying rgyud): po dran pas mgyogs 'don byung tshor sngogs las 'das pa'i gshis sum bsgribs pa'o// gsul/ gtan tshigs pa ba ni/ gzhi sems nyid spos bral chen po la bcos su med pa'i don rtogs pas rje med stsol/ rtsal 'gag med rgya la na zer por bya
77b3(rnying rgyud): bas bag chags kyi rtan med pas rnam smin dkar nag gnyis ma thub pas chos nyid la rgodang / rang sangs/ mtha' grol chen po'i gtan tshigs kyis 'khor 'das mnyam pa nyid du grol bar 'dod pa'o// bzhi brgya rang phyogs srung med par 'dod par/ sems nyid
77b4(rnying rgyud): gi ye shes kyis 'khor 'das kun la khyab kyang / sdang ba dngos por rgya mtshad/ stong pa dngos med du rgya mchad/ gnyis ka ma yin pas zung 'jug gi phyogs su'ang ma lhungs/ ngo bo stong pas rtag pa'i mtha' las zol/ rtsal ma 'gags pas chad mtha' pas sol
77b5(rnying rgyud): bya bral bde sdug las 'das pa'i chos nyid do// lnga pa phyogs 'dzin grub mtha'i sa ni/ sems kyi ngo bo gang du'ang mi gnas shing gang du'ang ma grub par cir yang snang la cing yang la 'gags par bcang ba ste/ sgyu 'phrul bla ma las/ cir yang med la cir yang
77b6(rnying rgyud): spang // la bskyed sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs snang // rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyang // sems kyi cho 'phrul chen po yin// zhes gsungs pa ltar shA ri yang mi dgag mi 'dzin mi rtog pa'o// drug pa d+mo grol phyogs 'dzin las 'das pa'i/ rang byung
77b7(rnying rgyud): ye shes blo dang bral bas ji ltar snang yang bden dun gang du'ang ma grub pas yod med mtha' grol chen po'i rol pa'o// bdun pa sems kyi phyogs yin tu smra ba ni/ 'di ltar snang ba thams cad sems kyi rol pa yin pas sna tshogs su snang yang sems nyi dang po med

78b1(rnying rgyud): thams cad snang ba'ang bo 'di// ye shas snang ba nyid du mthong // nga ba nyid la brjod pa bral// zhes so// gnyis pa slong gi d+hA bo ni rang byung gi ye shes chos nyid kun tra bzang ba grong yangs par chos can da ltar snang ba thams cad rang sa dang gang pa'i chan
78b2(rnying rgyud): las 'ching grol dang / shar bya shar byed du mgrub pas/ sems sde ltar rtsal dang rol par snang bar mi bzhed cing / ltos grub dang / yod med dang / yin min dang / dag ma dag gang d+ha'ang mi dpyod par ye gro 'phyogs 'byams chen por gtang
78b3(rnying rgyud): bab pa 'di nyid kyi grub pa'i mtha'o// de yang slob dpon nA ro ba chen pos de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i thabs las/ rtsol bral rig pa mi rtog pa// ma bcos rang snang bde ba'i klong// ye shes lhun grub klong du shar// rang byung nam mkha' lta zar khyas// rang
78b4(rnying rgyud): spang rol pa byang chub sems// sgra la'i ye shes bde ba'i grong // rang rig ye shes 'dzin pa yi// ra bung sgra mar mngon su ma gsal// zhes so// de la dbyen/ klong nag po rgyu med du smra ba/ klong khra bo sna tshogs su swa pa/ klong dkar po sems
78b5(rnying rgyud): ba/ stong rab 'byams rgya 'bras la bza ba'o// dang po skyong nag po'i ngo bo ni/ rang byung gzhug ma'o ye shrIs de nyid 'gyur med rgyu dang rkyen las 'das pa'i rang bzhin phyogs char med pas chos can dang chos nyid gnyis kar mi ltos par 'dod pa ste/ de la
78b6(rnying rgyud): naHmdzad pa klong nag/ thugs rje klong nag/ sprul pa klod nag gi sde dang gsum mo// gnyis pa klong khra bo'i ngo bo ni/ rang byung gi ye shes de nyid kyi rol par snang ba rnams/ yin sna tshogs rang shar du snang ba chos nyid kyi rgyan dang rol pa la/ min rtogs
78b7(rnying rgyud): ma kun khyab tu shar pha rol pa dag ga sbub las 'das par 'dod pa // de la dpyan/ yod spu sems sde dang mthun pa'i klong khra bo dang / med sbyar gnas dang mthun pa'i klong khra bo dang / yod med man dag dang mthun pa'i glong khra bo gsum mo// gsum bzang /
79a1(rnying rgyud): da// bsems sumapa ban/ rang byung rig pa yod / nga dang / nang sde par shar ba thams cad pamama'ab/ byung bdang rgyan dngas sa la ba byur med sa dag tu gnas lugs la bsnga med par 'ad pa'o//
79a2(rnying rgyud): de la dbyen/ brjod med rang shar chen po'i klong dkar ba/ lha sgom gnyis su med pa'i slong dkar po gnyis so// bzhi pa klong rabang byams rgyu 'bras la bzla ba'i ngo bo ni/ rang byung baye shes kyi dang las shing ba'i chos thams cad mang ba sems kyis shes la/
79a3(rnying rgyud): mai lta ba dganas lpags kyis shes par 'dod do// de la'ang dbyen/ bya ba dang bral ba phye'i rab 'byams/ grub mtha' rang gsung zla ba nang gi rab 'byams/ grags bsal ba gsang ba'i rab 'byams/ gnang bgro lnga nga de kho na nyid kyi rab 'byams so// dadag
79a4(rnying rgyud): kyangs thun/ rol pa/ rmAn/ chos nyid/ bya bral gyi grong bzhi las/ dang po ni/ sems srid kyi rol pa 'gag med tu shar ba'i ngang nas 'pho 'gyur med pas yin la/ dngos med kyi rol pa mthar 'don du mgrub pas min/ phyogs yang nam mkha' dang 'dra
79a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i dgongs pa'o// gnyis pa ni/ snang ba/ sems/ rang byung / bcos bsdad med pa gi drim pa bzhin menas kun du sharabs ste med kyi dang las 'ugag med du sha rabs snang sems mi dgag/ pa bsgyad/ rang 'gro sa rang gsal rkyen po'i dgongs pa'o//

80a6(rnying rgyud): yang dag min// yang dag yang dag ma yin nyid// yang dag min min yang dag min// de ni sangs rgyas rjes bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs shing / 'jam dpal gyis/ rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba// gdod nas dag pa nAm mkha' bzhin//

80b1(rnying rgyud): nga bar mi nus shing / dmathangs pas mi zad pa dang byab bdag tad canang 'byur bar byed pa'i rtsa ba 'byin par marnas par byur/ nga nyid las/ rgyal ba rnams kyi sta na na// lhaganangs par 'dzin pa gsungs// zhes gsu khams// da

80b4(rnying rgyud): pa yongs la bor ba'i kha gtam dang / khar cog dus med pa'i lagatam gnyis so// gsur pa/ rgyang rang gzung du bstan pa'i dab bka' thalas cad kyi byungs 'gyur pa/ rang bzhin 'khor 'das thal bas thang thang ba srol med/ chos nyid sra dang tshig tu mag
80b5(rnying rgyud): pas stong nyid 'gyod pas mi reg pa'o// dbyed/ lta ba skang dril ba dang / gta ga gigs sel ba dang / gab pa mngon du byung ba dang / bshad pa rang gsal gyi tshul dang bzhi'o// 'di dag la'ang ste bsgom sprod gsum gyi gnang gab ba dang / mngon du byung ba dang /
80b6(rnying rgyud): dro tshad dang / yul shes gnad la bor nas rig pa rjer la 'byin pa'i gnang / 'khrul bag dril bzlog pa/ thig le gnad la dbab pa sogs zab ma rgya che ba'i nang gsas kyi dbye ba mang du yod byang mdor 'ardzun/ lus dang 'dra gyi rkor/ mig dang 'dra ba ma skor/
80b7(rnying rgyud): dang 'dra bags dong / thams cad rdzogs pa dang 'dra ba yang gsang blan med pa'i sgor te bzhir// das rgya no bye rim rten mongs mthub pas drug spangs gyur/ rang bzhin pasro sgrub medapas ci snang tsho ba nyid du gang / mtshad nyid rtsog pa thad pa
81a1(rnying rgyud): nyi gang du 'gyu pa nag// nan myong ba gnags sa na las 'das bas mtshanam mngasatshu / rang bzhin po'i ma bas rtag bdu ga bya nas // dang/ ma 'as danas la
81a2(rnying rgyud): btu ba/ rang ngo tho dang nga 'phel bas sdang ba/ chal spyang cing yang rgyas pas yal ga/ gas lan mi 'gag pas martog/ sna tshogs gcig tu sbyin pas 'bras bral // gsang na gying po spang pa dung rtogs padas mnyam pas shes rab ga ma lA ltos/

81a4(rnying rgyud): mngon sum mthong bas chos nyid yid dpyod du mi gnas/ mtshan nyid snang ba bzhis 'bras bu phyis dus la re ba mi 'cha' bar tshe 'di nyid kyis gdod ma'i gzhi dbyings su sbyor ba'o// de lta bu'i tshul larjod byed tshig gi rgyud kyi phrag gnyis/ la'u stong phrag sum 6/ @

82a3(rnying rgyud): chos zad par byed pa khregs chod dang / skang ngos lhun grub kyis rdos bcas 'od gsal du dngas pas snang ba'i chos nyid zad par byed pa gnyis kyi dang po ni/ theg pa'i mchog 'di'i dgongs pa rig pa'i ngo bo 'ching grol med pa'i gshis lugs ka nas dag pa'i ngo bo de nyid ma bcos pargya gang
82a4(rnying rgyud): dudu'ad ma chad/ rang gi rang bzhin la ngo bo 'di zhes gdags su med pas phyogs gang du 'ang ma lhungs shing / rtog pa'i blo dang bral bas bas ma brjod las 'das pa'i zad thal rjen pa'i rig pa de nyid stong pa nyid dang / lam dus tshig dang yi ges mi mtshon pas mtshan ma med

82a6(rnying rgyud): chos rnams mi 'grub cang khaltas pas mi mthong / bsgoms pas mi rtogs/ spyod pas phan mi btags/ 'bras bu sgrub tu med la/ de medapas sa la sbyang ba dang / lam la bgrod pa dang / 'bras bu la dmigs pa dang / de dang de'i rim pa'ang byar med pa ste/
82a7(rnying rgyud): dpalas rags kyang / gya mthu dang 'bras bu gnyis la ma lta zhig/ dngos por skye ba'i rgyu dang 'bras bu yod min te// re dang dogs pa'i sems kyis rnal 'byor sems byos na// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes gnas der 'ching bar 'gyur// kye ma rang bzhin bral bas ni/
82b1(rnying rgyud): nyid bsgom du yod ma zer// gal te bsgom par bya dang sgom byed gnyis rtogs na/ gnyis su 'dzin pa'i yid kyis byang chung tu sems na// phyes bu de yi rang gis rang la sdig pa byas// zhes so// gnas tshul de lta bu thor ma chud pa kha cig gis chub byed rim sogs tshogs
82b2(rnying rgyud): gnyis ma bsags na 'bras bu gzugs sku mi 'grub par 'dod pa sogs rdzogs rim zab mo rnams la skur ba gdab pa chos spang gi las te/ lam 'dis sangs rgyas rnams kyi mthar thug pa chos kyi sku yin na de ni thob la/ gzhan du gang dag nga la gzugs su mthong // gang
82b3(rnying rgyud): dag da la sgrar shes pa// log pa'i lam du zhugs pa yi// skye bo de dgang mi mthong // sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi sku// zhes gsungs pas so// de'i phyir rdo rje snying po ka dag gi rig pa ni gdod ma'i chos kyi sku'i yin lugs ji lta ba la goms su 'jug pa ste/ spong
82b4(rnying rgyud): sgrib byed las grol ba nyi ma rang bzhin gyis gsal ba lta bu yin la/ rim pa brgyad po'i nyer len sems kyi kun du rtog pa 'ba' zhig gis bskyed pa'i mtshan bcas kyi rim pa la brten pa sgrib byed kyis sgrib pa sbyangs nas gzod nyi ma mthong bar 'dod pa lta bu'i khyad yod pas rang nyung
82b5(rnying rgyud): gi ye shes la rtog pa'i lha bsgom spyod 'bras kyis ma bcos par rang bzhag nyid du la tho ba ste rig pa de nyid rgya yan/ ma bcos/ mi 'dong ba/ mi bsgom/ mi yengs/ mi 'khrul/ rtog dpyod ma zhugs pa/ lhag ge/ rjen ne/ lhod de bar rang bab tu bzhag pa
82b6(rnying rgyud): tsam la lta ba dung bsgom pa'i bla dwags btags pa tsam ste/ rang shar las/ rig pa spos dang bral ba la// 'khrul dang ma rig ga la yod// ye shes sems dang bral ba la// ma rig bag chags ga la yod// ces so// de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa nyid kyis rig
82b7(rnying rgyud): pa ka dag chen po'i gshis ma bcos pa'i gnas lugs bcar phog tu ro 'grod pa la gzung 'dzin gyis 'ching mi nus shing / de la bsgom bya sgom byed kyi slad mi gzhug pa'i tshul rdo rdo'i gad mo chen po bcu gnyis sogs kyis legs par ston cing / lam 'di nyid la goms
83a1(rnying rgyud): babartan par gyur ba na mthar gyis las ga dag rgyun par spyad pani 'byung ba'i dgas pa 'dral ldan ma gas byamastabs sa thar pas spang te/ 'thal can po dang bcas nyanyams par 'ar laga'an dmang 'gru las nga
83a2(rnying rgyud): ring bsrel rnam bzhir sprul nas 'jog pa'ang yod la/ rig pa ni chos sku'i dbyings su 'khyil nas sprul ba'i sku rgyun chad med pas 'gro don mdzad pa'o// gnyis ba lhan grub kyi sdang ba gtan la phab pa thod nal gyi man ngag ni/ de yang khregs chod kyis ga
83a3(rnying rgyud): yul 'khrul pa'i snang ba gzhi med rtsa bral ga shis thog tu grol ba yin la/ 'dir ni khams gsum gyi pAng cha de dag thams cad rig pa'i rang gdangs 'od lnga'i thig le chen po'i 'od gsal du grol ba'i phyir 'og ma las khyad par du 'phags pa
83a4(rnying rgyud): las/ 'di ni dang yul bstan pa las// 'khor rkyen 'jug pa ma yin par// zad ma nyid dang thal byung du// yul dang shes pa'i snang cha las// thad ka so so'i gzhi las sgrol// zhes dang / dpal na ro bas kyang / dngos pa rang
83a5(rnying rgyud): bzhin thams cad ni// chos kyi dbyings kyi thig le yin// de nyid sgrub pa'i thabs su ni// snying po rig pa nyid sharabs// mtha' yi mun pa dang gis dag/ sgrub med rang byung sgrub pa 'dis// khams gsum 'ong gsal thugs su spya // ces
83a6(rnying rgyud): bshad pa 'dis dbyings kyi snang ba dang / snying po rig pa rdo rje lu gu chud smin pa'i mthar chos nyid zad pa'i snang bas khams gsum gyi nang gi 'byung ba rnam 'od gsal du dengs pa'i lam mdor bstan cing / de yang bca' ba lus kyi gnang gsum/ 'khrid pa dbyings kyi
83a7(rnying rgyud): gnad gsum/ sdang ba yul gyi gnang gsum du bsdus te nyams su blangs pa las phyi ma 'di la sgron ma bzhir dbyen/ rgyangs zhag chu'i sgron ma/ rig pa dbyings kyi sgron ma/ thig le spyong pa'i sgron ma/ shes rab rang phyung gi blon ma bzhi las dang po ni 'char
83b1(rnying rgyud): rgyan du/ rag Na'i gdangang bya la kyilam la mthang ba byar dang / gnyis pa na dbyings kyi dbyas pa bya ga sa ga na/ gangam n+ya nam la cad da du/ byas ba ngas laphral med du
83b2(rnying rgyud): zhugs ma nor ba sted de dag gi dbye ba'ang / rang shar las/ nam mkha' stong pa'i dkyil 'khor du// bcos med skyon ma rnam pa bzhi// ma 'gags pa yi don gyis gsal// rig pa dbyings kyi sngon mni// nam mkha' stong pa'i slong kyi 'adz+ra/ @
83b3(rnying rgyud): rang bshin 'od kyi sgra// ma 'gags 'gag med rnam pa dgas la// ye shes lnga ldan thugs kyi suM// lngag rgyang gi tshul du 'char// du lang 'gro dang 'ong ba dang // 'phrul ba dang ni 'phyig pa'o// rig pa dbyings kyi blon ma ru// bcug ste rig pa ma 'bralan/
83b4(rnying rgyud): mang rtogs pa'i rab tu ba shad// shes rab nga byung sgron ma ni// sgro 'dogs thams cad gcod pa dang // thig la stong ba'i sman ni// rtsol ba yang par sha kur na// rgya la gag d+ham sngon ma yis// de la blta ba la yengs ma// mthang byin pa sgom pa'i tshang drugasungs/
83b5(rnying rgyud): bsgyur/ lhag mthong rig pa d+mo la rgyud la smras pas goms pa'i dalangs srung ba bstis rmongs zhing / chos nyid mdon susakyis shing kham par tshwa/ de 'a ma thig 'i su smin du ba tam sa gong 'phel sbal phra/ sgra sbyin pa reg patshang babs yongs smra/ dem
83b6(rnying rgyud): blang brnams cad cig la chen pa gcig skyed kyil 'khor du dganas zlos btags pab gyis sa cig thams cad cad cing chos nyid du 'don bcom yang zadapas chos bu'i blang ba masong ste/ thal 'gyur las/ tshas nyid me nasum mthong ba mas// yid khyod 'dzin pa'i mang+gal las
83b7(rnying rgyud): 'das// nyams spang gong du 'phel ba yis// 'khrul pa'i sdang banub pa dang // bar de'i ye shes mngon byed// rig patshad thabs snang ba yis// phrug su ma rtogs pa'i lam sdang 'das// chos nyid zad pa'i sdang ba yis// khams gsu
84a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ 'khor ba'i rgyun thag chang // cas gsungs pa bzhin na// theg la skur smin pa'i tshul 'di dang phyogs mtshungs tsam dus kyi langar khor yang gsungs pa yo pa/ nam mapar kun nas zhan pa'i sems dang mig ni med kyi
84a2(rnying rgyud): lam du kha tu zhugs pa yis// stong pa las ni dubasmig gyur pa gsal dri ma med pa'i mkha' snang nyid dang mar me dang // 'bar ba dang ni zla ba nyi mardo rje rnams dang mchog gi cha dang thig le mthong bar 'gyur// de yi dbus su sangs rgyas gzugs ni yul dang rnam pa dpral ba
84a3(rnying rgyud): du ma longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// zhes gsungs so// 'di ltar gsang ba bla na med pa 'dir thog ma nas 'khor ba'i sems las 'das pa'i rang byung gi rig pa nyid bcar phog tu lam du byed pa la mkhas pas myang du 'bras burang thog tu theb pa'i gnad pa dang yir la/
84a4(rnying rgyud): da ltar ma yin na nyams su len dus 'khor ba'i sems dang sems byung las ma 'das pas 'bras bu 'khor ba nyid de nu 'bras mi bsgru bar gcig pa'i phyir 'gal bar 'dra 'a'i skabs med la/ khyad par mngon sum 'dagasal la blta ba'i rag pa skad cig mang nyid kra ba nas/
84a5(rnying rgyud): gsum pa'i sems sems byung kun gzhi dang bcas pa ldog pa ste/ mngon sum la bltas pas nang kun tog gi 'gro 'dra med pas 'dod pa'i sems log// gsal ba'i ngang la gsal bar 'jog byed kyi gnyen po med pas gzugs kyi khams las 'o/
84a6(rnying rgyud): ga med rtse gcig la chos nyid rdzing nan pa'i sgo med pas gzugs med gi ba mas las log/ dngas la rig pa'i phyi dkun gzhi las log/ rang byung gi ye shes su cag chod pas kun/ zhi'i rnam shes las log// snang ngo dgasal gyi phul las nga ya gyi
84a7(rnying rgyud): rjes su drang ba med pas sgo lnga'i rnam shes las log/ de'i tshad pyod byed kyi rtag pa dang chags drang gi san tog me pas yid shes dang nyon shes las log ste/ mdo na pams gsum gyis mas dang sems thung thams cad pas rnam par grol ba ni sangs rgyas kyim nas
84b1(rnying rgyud): zhib nyid las gzhan ma yin pa'i mthar thugapa ste/ de'i byer/ dkon mchog bcags brtson pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs las/ zhi ba'o rna thos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thugs cigasang pa 'dis mas dang / yid dang rnam par shes pa dang yang bram pa/
84b2(rnying rgyud): dzin gyi gnad kyang mi 'dor la/ 'dan bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs ci gsang babs ma chis mi thub pa'o// zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro// gang dag grags kyi sgrub mtha' rgyud rje 'og marnams su byang gi rlung dab mar dzad pas bdegasal sa rtog pa'i ba shes la la
84b3(rnying rgyud): skyes pa'i ye shes sa 'dod pa gang ma// tshogs brgyad kyi rnam shes las myalog ste/ tshe bab ba ni yid dang nyon yid kyis rdzas su bskyed ci / sems tog med kyi m-ini bra dag ni las gzhan du pa 'dus shirang/ rlung dag mas rnams rong gal sa nas dbum 'a gdang /
84b4(rnying rgyud): de'i rdza mang do krol stobs kyis sa bcu'i ldang sa togs 'char bar 'dod pas 'gro drug gi rtsa 'dab tu rlung sems zhugs pas ma dag pa'i 'khrul snang 'char ba'i phyir gol mgol gyigand kyang yin la/ 'dir ni dang rnams dang zhing 'dog pa las dgra mar 'jug pa sogs med cing
84b5(rnying rgyud): yo pa ngangs nga shes rnam sum dgapa' bas dgapa la shi kyi dang bsrungs zhing byams da kyi bzhin las mdag pa'i parnam snang ba ra badzin pas me bya das rnams 'phe dus/ @
84b6(rnying rgyud): rnam pa rnams rim gyi ma 'od du mal ba ma yon tan las sa'i mngon las rnams dang spang du brgya du de yangs mang dang poganyis 'od nga lal bas/ skye nga ma gang nga sangs byas pa 'a bams brgya zag 'chi la/ de dag tu'ong bar 'byeng ba dang /
84b7(rnying rgyud): sIng+ra du 'dres pas bgrod pa dang / lus 'grel pas zhing bcug mo ba dang / nang du chas nyid mi rtog pa ti nge 'dzin brgyal 'jug cing ldang ba la sogs 'byung ba'i bya de dag gis mamed pa'i lan gong ma rnams car theg pa 'og sa las ches byed par du 'phags par shes
85a1(rnying rgyud): pang bya gas pa/ dasar rung bab zhi mas papar rtsod pa dang mnan pa kyad byas sasangs ma da ngas ma mang nga sa pad/ des ngangamapas tan sa 'a 'a nga sas cal gzhan dan mas pa gang sang
85a2(rnying rgyud): pas/ gan ma ga na yo nga gag gas pa na pa sa ma khyen mngon nga mau ga pa'i phyi po ga / sa pas su na/ da gas
85a3(rnying rgyud): nyid 'i nas las sa ma
85a4(rnying rgyud): 'a rje dbang gi shes gang shin rje me na thams mag pas panan du bzugs parje chos nyid da byangs dang migs gnyis sa me 'i chos kyi bu'i mtha ga pad+ha/ ga ga dung na gnyis ma kyi thams ga na nga/
85a5(rnying rgyud): nyid du ma nga du sa nga ga pa
85a6(rnying rgyud): sa / sa
85a7(rnying rgyud): sa na yus mas sun su smra
85b1(rnying rgyud): 'gyu ral dum mngon pa bzhin gnas pa yin la/ ya shes nyid yod pas smyu dang la shas thams cad kyi 'thung gnas su yur pa dang / chas kyi sba las ma g.yas bzhin du gzugs su gnyis phrin las dang bcas pa gdul byal snang ba'i nus pa 'ad nyid pas 'thung ba/
85b2(rnying rgyud): de ltar yin pas ye shes yod pas gdul bya'i don dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan tshad med pa rnams kyang ma 'byung bar la gyur pa de ltar dzin na spung ba las/ ye shes med na yon tan 'phel med byang chub dang // rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i sangs rgyas chos kyang med par 'gyur// zhes
85b3(rnying rgyud): pa dang / sgron ma snang byed las// de ltar ye shes cha med na// phyi rol nam mkha' stong pa dang // khyad par nyid ni yod ma yin// de phyir gzhi nas ye shes khyab// ye shes med na chad pa dang // khyad par ci yang yod mi 'gyur// zhes pa la sogs mtha' yas par
85b4(rnying rgyud): gsungs so/ yon tan ldan grub kyi tshul 'di la mnyam sbyor 'grel chen las kyang / thabs dang shes rab gnyis su mang ba'i mtshan nyid bde ba chen po'i sku 'di ni rnal 'byor gyi bdag nyid can te gnyis can du rtog pa'i mtshan ma bdud la sogs pa'i tshogs rnams ngang gis bcom
85b5(rnying rgyud): zhing / legs pa'i yon tan gyi bkod pa thams cad la mnga' brnyes pas yon tan gyi bye brag gzhan med de rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa dang rtogs pas mngon du gyur pa'i tshul du bzhugs shing / zhes pa la sogs pa rnams kyis legs par bshad do// chos kyi bu de'i
85b6(rnying rgyud): ngang las rang snang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur bzhengs pa'i byin rlabs las dag pa'i zhing khams su de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga dang / mdag pa'i zhing du mchog gi sbrul sku sogs phrin las rgyun mi 'chad du 'byung ba yin no// rjes mtha' rten bzhi'i man ngag kyang / mi 'gul ba
85b7(rnying rgyud): gsum la gzhi bca' ba/ sdod pa gsum gyis tshad bzung ba/ thob pa gsum gyis gzer gdab pa/ gdeng bzhi'i grol tshad bstan pa la sogs pas mjug bsdu ba yin no// mdor na rtogs pa chen po'i gnas lugs ni lta ba yongs grub/ rgyu 'bras dag mnyam
86a1(rnying rgyud): 'du // / sa sa dang//
86a2(rnying rgyud): khyod tshad gams ca gapas bags pa cad mang bas thas pa kyis kya migan pa rnam ban btsug pa/ dedamams dpa' byu nam ma ma / gas cing sems cad pa na ga gakhyong she pa ga na/ mas/
86a3(rnying rgyud): 'dab ma rgya bag nam mthas thab kyis grub par rtsom pa mi mas nyid dul ga tum bapas mjug par snrus lham gyi bapa 'gas dngas pan pa sna pa la ba ma chags gnas
86a4(rnying rgyud): tumanga' 'a ma yin pa gartog gi 'groms ltar snang dang lhan cig tu dus ma kyi tsa mul bang phrag pa dag pa 'daka' thab sa 'ga' mayin par sbyar lan ba dag zung ma \u0f7f/ 'phags pa 'angam dpal gyis/ b+ha ba rnams parnal 'byor pa// pa
86a5(rnying rgyud): dag tu yongs 'dzin ma// ringags smig tu sgeg pa ltar// rtag tu snang yang mi zin no// de bas de dag thams cad kyang // yang dag min pa'i blo dang bcas// 'og mjog ma'i rnal 'byor na// / gong mgong ma'i khyad par 'phags// ngog ma'o//
86a6(rnying rgyud): blon gang ma ma/ shes rab kyis ni sa na byin no// zhes gsangs pa bzhin shes par bya gang rtsod pa kun gyings chos nyid bas mchis mi khyab pa'i rang du zhib la mkhas par bya// 'dir smras pa// yon tan ngan thang bral ba'i rin chan tshogs kyis
86a7(rnying rgyud): ba gtams bzlab pa'i chos tshul gang chenam/ nyes pa'i dang lhan cig mi gnas 'phags pa pag 'gro'i dbang po rnams kyis brtson pa nyid gyu rabs/ zug pa rda la cu branang zung rten mongs rdul gyis chags bsel byed 'gog lam rgya ma
86b1(rnying rgyud): du nga ngas pa'i bar comachags sasas sasas rgyusmras mam gsum thun sa padu smra du na 'du 'thu rdugangs na rnags pa dang nas kun d+ha pa ba ba nasu/ zu 'a byas susmras
86b2(rnying rgyud): bdi bras stong pa'i chos la thalas stong par gang bsdus pas/ rdegs pa'i thung chub dpa la las nyams gcigs dbyer 'as mad kun byas pad bcan par khyad par kyis// sangs rgyas shes rab gang 'ang mi gdas gas dbu tugs kyi cigag so
86b3(rnying rgyud): theg pa ston par mdzad// de las cha shas com re thub mchog gi// sras kyi thu bo gsang ba 'dzin rnams dang // blo mthu cheb rnyes dgra bcom mchog rnams kyi// mos rab 'byed pa'i yul las gzhan gyis ci/ ji lta'i chos nyid ltos pa med mkhyen
86b4(rnying rgyud): grang rdob rnaMm 'gyur nga byed smras tshal gyis// ma 'dres mkhyen pas gdul b+ha'i khams dbang dang // rdzas mthun dud rtsi bag ba shang ma dang 'ad ni// 'ad kyang nga thom pas rmo'angs shing // zung du gnas lar byud pa'i bag gams pas// 'ang 'i gan pa
86b5(rnying rgyud): sa grang sa// rnags pam rnags par bslabs pa 'dim/ 'a rgyu pa bsha ga na da// rnam pa dag pa nas g.yas// man gzugs pas lags pa gang 'grus ga/ gnyas pa dang ba ga
86b6(rnying rgyud): ma man/ dan+ya mang ba de sngags kyis ting ba pa'o// gzhan byung 'chang ba srid pa 'ang bangs la// la rnams gang sa dang gzugs // rgyang ma pa' lam bang 'dir 'jug mdang / ba ba gshegs pa bzhan thams sa bya nga pa ga
86b7(rnying rgyud): mdzin pa'i ba sdod rje rje zag pa las spa byed byung sngar nam cha rtags pa brjong ba lgang rngab cha la bu'i gtam las srug sum gyi gyon pa dang rang lastan pa de ltar byung ba'i tshul rnam gzhag rags pas mthas brjod pa'i skabs nying mam/

87b1(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems kyis bris pa'i bdud rtsi'i sprin// chos dbyings sa bla'i lam kun 'gengs pa las// mi 'dzad 'gro rgyud dri mas nog pa gang // dag byed rgyud du 'bab pa'i phrin las can// brjod med chos 'khor nA da rtag pa'i sgra//
87b2(rnying rgyud): pa kun thal rdo rje'i spyan dbang gis// yul du mdzad pa'i brtsu bag la brten nas// skal ba ldan la gdams pas rab mtshon te// bshad dang sgrub pa'i lam chen gyis phye ba'i// smin grol 'od zer bye bas 'jig rten 'dir// mun pa'i
87b3(rnying rgyud): brtan pa 'phrog pa'i chos mchog nyi// 'dren pa'i shing rta che rnams rmad du byung // rgyal ba'i legs gsungs rgya mtsho'i pha rol du// mngon par son nas don mchog gabyig gi char// gang du skal ba ldan la 'bebs mdzad pa'i// ded dpon de dag
87b4(rnying rgyud): su yis phyag 'os min// gang gi rnam thar nyi 'od kyis bye ba'i// blo gros chu skyes 'dzum brgya grol ba las// dang pa'i ke ser phang phung rnam bkod pas// tshul rnams mnyes pa'i phyogs su rab basmin te// gzhal dka'i tshong gis tshe rab
87b5(rnying rgyud): bye bar yang // rnyed par sgra min thub mchog bstan pa'i tshul// srid gsum kun dgar byed pa'i gtam bzang ngo po// thos pa'i rna ba de yang bdud rtsir byed// da ni rim pa de dag gi nang nas gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo gang du
87b6(rnying rgyud): bskor ba dang / gang gis bskor ba/ bstan pa de nyid ji ltar bskyangs tshul dang bcas pa'o// de la rang lugs thun mong ma yin pa 'dir bstan pa'i bab lugs chen po gsum du gnas pa ste/ rgyal ba dgongs pa'i brgyud pa/ rig 'dzin pa rda'i
87b7(rnying rgyud): brgyud pa/ gang zag snyan khung gi brgyud pa dang gsum mo// de'ang bshad rgyud rgya mtsho las// rgyal ba sems dpa' rnal 'byor pa// dgongs pa rig pa rna bar brgyud// ces so// de la dang po ni 'khor 'das yongs kyi spyi dpal
88a1(rnying rgyud): grub bdag rigs drug pa kun rgya bzang po dang snang dbyings kyi zhing khams shin tu dgapa rdo rje 'jog min chen po ma can rdzogs don 'thung gi rnam pas rang bzhin gnyis su med pa'i 'khor rgyal zhab rigs ldang /
88a2(rnying rgyud): ston pa dang rang sbru ga 'khor rgyal ba'i rdo'i dkyil 'khor mang med pa'i rnam pa dang brgyas par snang ba rnams la/ 'odags la rdo rje'i snying po chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas grags rdzogs pa zin pa n+yag dang skas parjong ba thams cad dang bral
88a3(rnying rgyud): 'arje khon nyid kyi ye shes dgongs pas byis kyi brlabs kyi sa pa mdzad pa la chos sngab gsung du ba rdas btags pa ste/ thal 'gyur las/ des na ches nyid nam mkha' la// khyab 'jug chen po'i gsungags ni/ b+hud kyis pargyu
88a4(rnying rgyud): gyis rang slar snang // zhes pa dang / snying 'grel las/ ston pa chos kyi smras 'khor mi shes rgya mtshol sgyum don gyi gsung gas pade spong pa'o// zhes dang / sgra 'phrul pas rim las kyang / brjo dang 'dra bar brda' sprod pa// ngas
88a5(rnying rgyud): nyid kyis bsad pa'i phyir/ mdzongs don dugatan tshegs dzes// zhes gsungs so// bye brag 'od gsal rdo rje snying po'i gnas thab cing na che ba'i phyogs rnams ni gnas dang ston 'khar chos rnams rang byung rig pa'i ye shas ldan sra ba rin po che'i sbubs sgra gsum
88a6(rnying rgyud): rang sngar bkod pa chen po'i rang bzhin 'byams klas pa las spu la pa sogs sgra rnyog gi yul las brgal pa'i chos nyid mnyam pa chen por ro gcig pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la g.yo ba med pa ste/ rdzogs pa chen po'i rgyud nyi zla kha sbyor las/
88a7(rnying rgyud): gangagis kyang ma byas pa yongs su 'god pa chen pa gnas/ rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa// khad ga dang gzugs brtan rnams cad dus gcig lags sa pa/ bkang ba rgya chel dkyil yangs pa/ 'jog ma drim mongasas
88b1(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa/ ldem bzhin pa/ mer bzhin pa/ 'gul bzhin pa/ 'phrig bzhin pa/ shin tu mnyam pa chen po na/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par byang chub pa chen mo/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lta ba dang / dgongs pa dang /
88b2(rnying rgyud): mdzad spyod mi 'dod pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo chen po nyid/ rig pa rdo rje lu gu rgyud dang / rig pa khyab gdal chen po'i sku dang / rig pa mngon sum du snang byed kyi sku dang / ma bkod pa'i rang bzhin gyi ye shes chen po lnga dang / chos thams cad sto
88b3(rnying rgyud): nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / mi dmigs pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid dang bral ba dang / mi gnas pa'i stong pa chen po dang / mi 'gyur ba chos sku'i tshul 'dzin pa dang / kun tu gsal ba longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i tshul 'dzin
88b4(rnying rgyud): pa dang / mdzad pa ma lus pa sbal ba sku'i tshul 'dzin pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa ci yang ma yin pa'i rigs las/ de bzhin gshegs pa rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i rigs dang / rdo rje rigs kyi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i lha dang lha mo dang /
88b5(rnying rgyud): rin po che'i rigs kyi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i lha dang lha mo dang / pad+ma'i rigs kyi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i lha dang lha mo dang / las kyi rigs kyi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i lha dang lha mo dang / mi mdzad pa'i mdzad pa chen po las/ rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i sgra phyag rgya
88b6(rnying rgyud): dang bcas pa/ rdo rje mi bskyod pa chen po sgra phyag rgya dang bcas pa dang / rin chen 'byung ldan chen po sku phyag rgya dang bcas pa dang / snang ba mtha' yas chen po sku phyag rgya dang bcas pa dang / don yod grub pa chen po sku phyag rgya dang bcas pa dang / sems dpa'
88b7(rnying rgyud): chen po rol pa'i lhastangs rnams dang / sems ma chen mo sgeg ma'i cha lugs rnams dang / rang byung gihe rug chen po lnga dang / spu'i phung po du ma rnams dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i theg pa chen po'i yan lag bsam gyis me khyab pa rnams dang / 'dul ba'i
89a1(rnying rgyud): da na du dang na sa sa/ rga yangasu pa stsa dang/ nga/
89a2(rnying rgyud): rnam par btul ba dang / rnal du phab pa dang / mi gnas pa'i reg pa chen po la sogs te/ thugs rnams dang / nam mkha' la dngos por dbang bskur ba dang / chu la srag byad du dbang bsgyur ba dang / me la sdud par byed par dbang bsgyur ba dang /
89a3(rnying rgyud): sa la bstod par byed par dbang bskur ba dang / rlung la brtan par byed par dbang bsgyur ba rnams te zin las rnams dang / ma bzlas par rta bla rnams rang byung ba dang / ma bsgrubs par dngos grub chen po rang byung ba dang / ma bsgyur ma brdal du ba pa
89a4(rnying rgyud): dbang rnams rang thob pa dang / ma~M bsrabs par chos thams cad kyi don dang shes pa dang / ma bsgoms par sangs rgyas nyid rang gis rang thob pa la sogs te/ yon tan dpag tu med pa rnams dang / mi 'byung ba khyen gyi ting nge 'dzin la thabs ci
89a5(rnying rgyud): par zhugs so// de nas mi rtog pa'i thub pa chen po zhes byab/ sngon pa rdo rje 'chang chen po de la/ ma chags pa'i mchod pas ni mchod/ ma bskul ba'i dbyangs kyis ni gdung / mi gnas pa'i bsam pas ni bzung / ma 'atong ba'i stan las
89a6(rnying rgyud): ni langs/ ma byas pa'i thu gros ni gzung / ma bsgrags pa'i grwa yis ni baphrul/ ma gleng ba'i tshig ni zhus/ zhes pa la sogs gsungs pa bzhin no// de las ma g.yos bzhin dus bcu rgyun mtha'i 'phags chen rnams la sdang ba'i gzhan sdang gis
89a7(rnying rgyud): bdus pa'i yongs yongs rdzogs par gyud pa'i zhing khams zad par can rgya gcin rdzogs drug pa'i rnam pa dang / rigs 'i da pa'i rnam pas rig pa blang par can gyil kho byang chub semame dpa' chen po rgyagananan dang / spyan ras gzigs dang /
89b1(rnying rgyud): 'angs dbyangs sogs dbang po dang bral nga dag pa 'azas pa'i rnams dpa' rnams pa brjod du med pa do zlog pa rnal 'byor blan meng pa'o sa ma ra mo dgongs pa pa nas b+hag brtan pa 'khor long bskor ba na te/ rkang pa lus/ dran
89b2(rnying rgyud): min bu med gnas mchog tu// sku nyid rnam par snang mdzad tshul// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams la// de bzhin gsung mchog mi smra ste// b+ha yis chos rnams 'jal bar ston// ces gsungs shing / 'di ni gtsang ba'i
89b3(rnying rgyud): gnas ris rnams spangs pa'i gnas gang na bar dbang bsgyur chen po'i 'og min du bshad pa yang yod de/ sgyu 'phrul rdo rje las/ gtsang ma'i rigs rnams rnam spangs pas// 'og min chen po'i gnas mchog tu// rigs bdag phyag rgya lhan
89b4(rnying rgyud): waM// gcig dang du ma rlom spangs pa// sangs kyis sman gyi gzugs ste ste// gdo nas theg chen mdzod yin te// slob pa mtha' wangs gdul byal// skad cig gcig gis snang bar mdzod// ces gsungs pa dang /
89b5(rnying rgyud): thag chen gyi mdo sde rnams su shAkya thub pa 'og min du longs spyod rdzogs slar sangs rgyas zin nas slar mi yul du mdzad pa bcu gnyis bstan par gsungs pa rnams kyang phyogs ra tsam la dgongs pa ste/ rgyan sdug las/ yang dag sa
89b6(rnying rgyud): rgyas 'og min du// sangs rgyas ma gyur 'dod khams su// sangs rgyas mdzad pa mi mdzad do// zhes gsungs pa dang / lang gshegs 'grel pa las/ gtsang ma'i gnas nas byung zhes pa ni gtsang ma'i gnas kyi bye brag
89b7(rnying rgyud): tshig min du longs spyod rdzogs pa'i spur sangs rgyas pa'o// zhes bshad pa dang yang mthun no// de bzhin du byang sems sa dgu pa la snang ba'i 'og min tsam po dang / sa brgyad pa la snang ba'i btags pa'i 'og min dang / rdo rje
90a1(rnying rgyud): btsun mo'i thA ga d+ha chos kyi dbyings thar pa chen pa'i pho brang rnams su drag po dang 'jigs byed la sogs pa'i gardul bya gdug pa rgyan rnams kyi bang shes su snang bar cha mtshad margyag dngagayon du
90a2(rnying rgyud): dpa' bo stobs ldan dang / pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug sogs dang / gzhan yang he badz+ra dang / tsakra sam+ba ra dang / dus kyi 'khor lo sogs rdo rje'i gnas gang ston pa de'i gtso bo'i rnam pa dang rnam 'gur las 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor sprul
90a3(rnying rgyud): te nA da mi shigs pa'i sgra'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ste/ bder 'dus rtsa rgyud las/ nga ni che ba'i rgyal po ste// 'chad dang nyan pa'ang nga nyid yin// ces dang / dgyes rdor las/ 'chad pa por chos kyang nga // rang gi tshogs
90a4(rnying rgyud): lnga ni nyan pa'i dang // zhes gsungs pa'i tshul gyis so// de dang mtshungs par dga' ldan dang / ri rab kyi rtse dang / oM Di yA na dang / shag+ga la la sol+la kun rdzob kyi gnas rnams su'ang bya ba dang / spyod pa dang / rnal 'byor gyi
90a5(rnying rgyud): rgyud rnams chags bral gyi gzugs kyis sam/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rnam pas bstan kyang rung ste/ gsang snying las// de tshe me mthun sna tshogs la// so sor 'dra bar snang ba ni// de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos kyang // las kyi
90a6(rnying rgyud): dbang gis so sor snang // zhes bshad pa bzhin no// de'i phyir 'og min sogs dag pa'i zhing khams rnams su rang bzhin gnyis su med pa dang / rig pa khyad par can gyi 'khor la gsang sngags kyi chos 'khor bskor bar mdzad pa
90a7(rnying rgyud): de las ma g.yos bzhin du 'jig rten du mchog gi sbrul sku'i rnam pas mdzad pa bcu gnyis bstan pa dang / gdul bya dag ma dag sna tshogs la ci rigs par theg pa gsum gyi chos kyi 'khor lo rim pa gsum du bskor bar snang ste/ gsang
90b1(rnying rgyud): spring las/ thugs rje chen po'i byin gyis byas zhes bya ba rig pa'i sras bu thub pa drug de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra gsung thugs rterda las thon to// thon nas kyang las kyis dbang gas sbrul gzhi dang yas kyi 'jig ta
90b2(rnying rgyud): phyogs bcu mtha' med pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen por reng thub pa chen po bcom ldan 'das re res 'dul ba rnam pa bzhis 'gro ba lnga'i 'don mdzad da// zhes dang / 'jam dpal skya dra'i bshad rgyang las/ grong gzhirnam pa gsum
90b3(rnying rgyud): 'og min gnas dang ri rab rtse// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir grags pa yin// byang chub sems dpa' lha rnams dang // ston pa yang ni rnam gsum ste// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang chen dang // sbrul su 'khor los N+Da ba dang// shAn+ya thub pa nyid
90b4(rnying rgyud): kyis gsung sa// dras ni gdus bya 'dul ba'i tshe// 'khor rnams 'dus pa'i dras der gasbyangs// zhes gsungs pa dang / gzhan yang slob dpon nyin byeng sang gis 'og min du longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sgras rdo rje theg paston pa dang dus mabyangs
90b5(rnying rgyud): par mi yul du mchog gi sbrul skus byang chub snying po rdo rje gdan du 'tshang rgya tshul mya bstan pa'i gong rol du btags pa'i lus dka' thub kyi gnas nir lda na'i 'gram du bzhag nas ye shes kyi lus 'ogro min du gshegs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byed kying
90b6(rnying rgyud): brlabs pas/ rdo rje dbyings chen por sangs rgyas te ri rab kyi rtse dang rgya mtsho'i 'gram du yo ga'i rgyud rnams gsungs/ de nas oM Di yAn dngas ho ra'i yul rnams su gshegs nas in+d+ra b+h+ya ti la sogs pa rnams la gsang sngags bla med kyi rgyud lnga tham
90b7(rnying rgyud): stan nas/ smer btags pa'i lus la thugs rdo rje gdan du 'byang chuba'i tshul bstan par bzhang la/ de dang mthun par slob dpon ye shas thabs kyis kyang / de nga martogs nir k+Shar// ci yang ma yin teng 'dzin ga sa/
91a1(rnying rgyud): ma bdag shugs pan mas kyang // thal thangs can bzhugs// nam mkha' dbyangs ltar rnam dag pa'o// thabags la gnas med dupa btsunaH// ma byudangs pa tan mang
91a2(rnying rgyud): pas zo rings su// skad cig gis na yang dag rtogs// byang chub snying por bzhugs byas nas// mthu chen bdud rnams rab bcom ste// sems can gzung bar bya ba'i phyir// chos kyi 'khor lo mamar ba'o// zhes gsan sa pa dang
91a3(rnying rgyud): slob dpon chen po sgeg pa'i rdo rjes/ ston pas 'og min du gsang sngags ston pa dang dus gcig tu mchog gi sbal sras 'jig rten tu thun mong gi theg pa bshang bar bzhed de/ ngas mdzad pa'i snying po'i 'grel pa slar khab sa/ drag pa
91a4(rnying rgyud): pa lhun gyis grub pa'i thabs dang / smon lam gyis go phyes nas/ le'u dang por rgyu snang bar mdzad/ gnyis par rkyen sbyar/ gsum par thun mong bca' gzhi'i ston pa dug snang bar mdzad de dus mtshungs par tha dad pa'i gyang rnams byung
91a5(rnying rgyud): pa'o// zhes bshad pa 'dis mdo dang sngags kyi sde sdod thams cad spad par 'gyur pa ring re theg chen ngos don la mos pa lam du byed pa rnams kyis ston pa gdod ma'i mgon pa gcig las tha dad du mibasam zhing / chos kyi 'khor mo ji snye c-ig dus
91a6(rnying rgyud): gcig tu basbyor ba yang gdul bya'i bsam pa'i dbang gis tha dang ltar snang ba las dus su gyi so grwa rnam gzhag smrig tu med par shes par bya ba nyid legs so// gnyis pa bka' de rnams bsrub pos sos b.lus tshul ni/ bla med kyi rgyud rnams phal
91a7(rnying rgyud): cher sprad pa po tha dad sbya rabasdu bkyang bye brag rdzogs pa chen pongs gas nges na ngag gis rnams dang / gsang ba snang po sogs rgyud pa 'ga' khrig ston 'khor dgongs pa tha med dpa'i phyir/ gsang snying las/ 'di sa bdag gis shad pa zhes
91b1(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba dang / byang mamag ca chud las mas danas gsang 'a bshad par bya/ gas 'byung bya nga dag gis bshad pa'am thas pa la nags sa skad nga namasas pa mthun pa'i sdug 'phra nga gyud da ba 'angs bya don thams cad tshang bar
91b2(rnying rgyud): rkyong ngam/ glang slong gi skabs sbyin dag pa'i 'khor rgyan ma tha'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gca pa yab yum gyis yab kyithabs kyi cangadang sram gyis shes rab gyi cha bathang nas sbyor ba'i lam khris 'dod chags chen po'i dbang 'phur ba dang nga/
91b3(rnying rgyud): zhes rnabyung med kyi cha bzung nas zab pa'i dbang gsum bskur ba'i mthar khu rdul rlung gsum 'gyur ba de myong ba'i sems dang bcas pa bcom pas ston 'khor dgongs pa dbyer med du gyur pa thun mong ma yin pa'i khring slong du bshad pa ste/ bras kyi
91b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor khoms/ byed rnams dag las 'di skang bdag gis thos zhes gsungs pa gang de 'di ltar bdag gis shes pa ste/ don canani zla baphrulas rdo na gang zhig kyi mthun sa ga'i bu khres tegs dang // thugs me rnams kyi sa
91b5(rnying rgyud): zhug pasapa pag ses kyis mchogag pa la ga spyad/ rgyas margyas thaM 'a zugs papa sa 'das sa nal byu sa kyi rlo pa / gas dang / dbang na cigangam thas di nyi pa
91b6(rnying rgyud): su ga sha pa kyar thud pams sna pa'i cag khan mna' gcig d+hA 'ad pa su lags shing 'di ga ba dgags rdzam pa 'is 'bar gyi tshig ltar masmras pas kyang ma yin par yi mi 'gyub / dpa' gas bkru das
91b7(rnying rgyud): nga bar byed pa pa// gzhan ga yong ba ma yinate/ bdag nyid 'ba'aphag smrabar byed// srung mdzad pa ni thugs da// zhes dang / dkyis dor // 'chad pa pang chos kyang nga // zhes pa la sogs gsungs pa'i phyir nga
92a1(rnying rgyud): ba po yang na pa nyid las gzhan du mthur te/ gsung ba grub pa las/ rgyud 'chad pa de thugs rngon// 'chad pa po srung ba dang // las gsungs byas pa// gzhan pa 'ang bzhin pa byangs pa
92a2(rnying rgyud): kyithugs kyi gsang ba 'dzin pa dang bka'i bathub po byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje ni ston 'khor gang du bshad kyang mi 'gal te/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs rdo rje las gzhan du ma gyur pa'i phyir ro// dengs na rdzogs pa chen po sogs kyang
92a3(rnying rgyud): pa mo che gsang ba'i bdag po dang / rdo rje chos dang / rdo rje spring ba dang / 'jam dpal dang / spyan dus gzigs dang / skal ba'i sgra dga' rab rdo rje la sogs pa rnams dang / mkha' 'grol snyan nye bar zhi ba la sog /
92a4(rnying rgyud): 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs dang / gzhan yang gdul gyi lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin la sogs rigs can ma nges pa'i tshogs kyis bzhu bar mang dul/ mtha' dag pa'i thud rnams gas papa'i brang ba go kho nas bzhus pa
92a5(rnying rgyud): ste bde bar gasnyegs pas bsang sngags kyi bstan pa gtad cing ma 'das pa na 'jig rten du gsang sngags spogs par dbang bskur ba dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i stan gcig tu bsdus par gsungs pa dang rgyud sde rnams glags ba ma la 'god pa
92a6(rnying rgyud): rjes su gnang ba sogs drug pa'i rgyal cheb chen mo yin pa'i phyir te/ gsang snying las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la// gsang ba 'di las gzhan mo mnga'// sgo dang lgang pa'i ba'i phyir// gsong ba'i snying po de khon// nying
92a7(rnying rgyud): seMs byung/ thang bcwan sa patu 'du yag zug la 'du ngas pa'i dus lugs pa'i byungagal par ldad pa rnams 'as da/ na gyu pa/ drug slong ga ngas na
92b1(rnying rgyud): byed/ ces pa dang / oMn+da b+ha ti'i bde mchogs rgyud kyi 'bral ba las/ gud rnams ma lus sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs// bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu rtsa drug sogs// 'dus ta rnga btsun gsang pa'i bdag po la// gsol pa
92b2(rnying rgyud): tshe 'di skad bdag thos zhes// rab tu gsungs pa gser gyi glegs bam la// baiDUr+ya ni zhun mas yi ger bkod// ces gsung ba'i phyir ro// bye brag rgyud rnams zhub po gang yin pa de nyid bsru ba po yang yin te// dus 'khor dra ba bzar
92b3(rnying rgyud): po/ brtag gnyis rdo rje snying po/ sdom 'byung phyag rdod/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro phag mos bsdus pa bzhin no// de dang dus mtshungs par rgya'i theg chen gyi mdo sde rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' gtso bo gtso bo dag dang gzhan yang byang chub sems
92b4(rnying rgyud): dpa'i dge 'dun lnga brgya dag gis bsdus par bshad cing / 'jig rten du mchog gi sbrul sku mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu nyan thos dgra bcom pa gtso bo rnams dang so skye ci rigs pa dag gis theg dman gyi sde ldod gsum kyang ji snyed pa bsru ba byas
92b5(rnying rgyud): so// gnyis pa bstan pa de nyid 'jig rten du ji ltar byung ba'i tshul la gnyis te/ rig 'dzin brda'i brgyud pa dang / gang zag snyan khung gi brgyud pa'o// dang po la'ang gnyis te/ rig 'dzin mi ma yin pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin
92b6(rnying rgyud): ba gnyis ka las byung ba'o// dang po ni/ rgyal sras sems dpa'i 'khor de dag gi nang nas ston pa nyid kyis sprul ba rigs gsum du snang bar mdzad pa des gdul bya lha klu gnod sbyin gsum la brda'i sgo nas bshad cing bstan pa ste/ 'jam dpal
92b7(rnying rgyud): kyis gtso bor zab mo'i phyogs kyis gdul bya'i don mdzad pas lta ba'i phyogasaspyan ras gzigs kyis ming rje'i stsogs kyis 'a la bya'i don mdzad pas slob pa'i phyogs ston/ phyag na sa thags la mkhas pas drag
93a1(rnying rgyud): phyogs kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pas spyod pa'i phyogs snyan/ nga yang 'jam dpal gyis lha'i gnas su lha grags ldan maHga sbyong la bshad/ dka smra tshangs pa'i nacan 'od 'bar la bshad/ ngas bye bu'i bdag pa tshangs pa
93a2(rnying rgyud): rgyas pa sgrol dang / pag nga kyi nga/ dab so'i mi gas kyi ga pa rtson tshul tha ngas bshA/ pag gi kyi gnasas rgyal ba pa gsol bdang / ngas sa / da/
93a3(rnying rgyud): dga' ba dang / 'dog pa stsogs pa shA' sa lam mdzal pa dang / sa ga du tha~M gyi gdas sa ga nga skye kya po sa sa pan kyin la gas myi gang pa ngos na rna pa kyi
93a4(rnying rgyud): cing / de dag rnams kyis so so'i 'khor gyi rtogs la'ang bshad pas rlom byu cas pas rdo rje 'byung gis brnyes par gyung / rdzogs pa chen po'i skur ni sum dum gsum gyi lgang ba bzang stong ga zu lhag sems can la sti ltas khang ba ma kyang ba dang brtso
93a5(rnying rgyud): gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad dang rigs lha'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rdo rje sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs pa la brtan nas/ rdo rje sems dpas lha'i bu lhag sems can la rgyal thabs kyi thugs kyi dbang bskur zhing rdzogs pa chen po'i man ngag rnams gnang nas lha
93a6(rnying rgyud): du dar bar gyur to// de yang ye shes zhabs kyi grol thig tu/ de nas bzung ste don mchog 'di// skal bar ldan pa 'ga' zhig la// zhal nas zhal dang snyan nas snyan// brgyud de nges pa'i don bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs pa ltar ro// gnyis pa ni
93a7(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa lung ston pa'i mdo las/ 'dzin pa'i theg pa gsum po dag/ bcom ldan nges par gsungs lags na// rgyu 'bras spun grub tu spyod cing // sangs rgyas gzhan nas mi 'tshol ba'o// nges pa'i theg pa
93b1(rnying rgyud): ma gsungs// zhes zas pa'i len du/ rgyal mos par gyu chos kyi/ 'khor lo rab tu bskor byas nas// rdo rje thug pa'i nya lam zhig/ ma 'ongs dus na 'byung bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs pa bzhin/ stan ma
93b2(rnying rgyud): srul bu mya ngan las 'das nas lo nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'das pa na lha grags ldan mchog skyong / klu rgyal 'jog po/ gnod sbyin skar mda' gdong / srin po blo gros thabs ldan/ mi'i reg 'dzin li tsa bi dri ma med par grags pa ste/ dam pa'i ring
93b3(rnying rgyud): can dri ma lnga pos 'jig rten na mgon po yongs su mya ngan las 'das par rang gi mngon par shes pas shes nas nang du yang dag par 'jog pa las langs te lang+ka'i yul gyi ri ma la ya'i rtse mor rdzu 'phrul gyi bya bas 'dus te/ kye ma ho// kye ma 'jig rten blong /
93b4(rnying rgyud): pa sgron ma'i 'od nub tshe// 'jig rten mun pa gang gis bsal// zhes pa la sogs pa'i gdung tshig nyi shu rtsa gsum bton cing rmag chad par dus so// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten na gsang sngags kyi sgra yongs su grags pa phyis 'byung bar du
93b5(rnying rgyud): bstan pa bzhin dus la bab pa de'i tshe gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes sangs rgyas kyis gsang sngags ston par dbang bskur ba brnyes pa'i phyir der mngon sum du snang bar mdzad nas rigs can lnga dang gzhan yang rig pa 'dzin pa'i dge 'dun phal mo tshe la sngon
93b6(rnying rgyud): ston pas 'og min la sogs par gsang sngags kyi theg pa bstan pa rnams slar yang bzlas te ston par mdzad la/ de rnams srin po blo gros thabs ldan gyis gser gyi glegs bam la biDUr+ya zhun mas yi ger bris te dgongs pa'i rtsal bdun gyis nam mkha' la ma
93b7(rnying rgyud): mngon par rgyas btab ste sbas so// tshul 'di ni in+d+ra b+hU ti'i bde mchog rtsa rgyud kyi 'grel pa'i lung gong du drangs pa bzhin no// ri ma la ya yod pa'i larta'i yul de yang dzam+bu'i gling gi glid g.yog rnga yab kyi lang+ka de ni ma yin te bcom ldan 'das lang+ka'i bdag po
94a1(rnying rgyud): saphyogs sa tham smin bcas san dngasu blams can pas byas pa mas mas parnyan pa ma sa / gzugs pa gsangs pa gnas su mau gag stsa la rnams kyi rnam pa snab da pa'i gling gdunag napa/
94a2(rnying rgyud): drang yang/ sa rjod / nas maung dang / kyi snod da / pa ye / sa nas nga shAr de dag rnams sa sa pa dun pa ngagatsun ma ldan ponapa gas kyis pa dpa byas
94a3(rnying rgyud): sa seMn po'i zhal sto tra nas ded dpon seng gas bzung bas dang sang si la 'i ming du 'bod pa yin cing sa ma di sro ba dpon rten po ka d+ha bldan nas beg rngu rtsi zhes pa'i srin ma chen pa 'khor sna brgya'i tshogs dang brtsis pa brtul ba dang / sngags kyi bstan pa sre bas gsam
94a4(rnying rgyud): sa breg chen gyi pa don thal babazang po'i khrangs pa/ srong de nim / seMs rgya ma di rtson/ coM ba dang nga/ rten nags kyi chen ya dz+yon ras sngags kyi bstan pa skye bas gas mdzad bye sngon sde'i rgyal da ma he sa la shrIn ba tu dzums pa 'dus
94a5(rnying rgyud): de gnyis kyi pa dbya ma cha chen po la rdo'i zam pa btsugs nas kyin bsad ste rgya mtsho'i nang du rdo'i phung po chen po mngon sum du snang zhing skabs 'gar rdo'i phung po la gzings thogs pas byol nas 'gro dgos pa dang der srin po mgrin bcwa bsad pa'i khrag gis sngags pa yin zer
94a6(rnying rgyud): dodamar po kho nas sa gzhi khyab pa la snga dro tsam 'gro dgos pa yod cing de'i dbus su sra mnaHku Ta s+ye yid bzang brtsegs pa zhes pa'i ri sul gcig yan chad zag ri'i phreng bas bskor bas sde bo phal gyis bgrod par mi nus pa zhig yod la/ der pa Na chen
94a7(rnying rgyud): dpon slob kyang byin nas lo thug bzhugs nas kyi gar du gyon pa yi na// der med pa'i rotha~M yang thun mong du ming de ltar grags kyang don du drug yul la dpa' ma mal ya'i rayin cing mtshan nyid thams cad kyang kyang ba ste/ ji skad du/ can rtsal
94b1(rnying rgyud): rgyal po gnas// ngas la khrag dkar gyi tshigs pa// seng ge gnam du 'apyod 'dus pacan// rtse sran rtsa brgyad rtsa bar 'grangs// 'dra ba'i nad kyis yangs mi chags// b+hi bo kA lAn ka ni// mi gnyis gcig pur gnas pa mi// mdzad ldan de
94b2(rnying rgyud): yis tshangs bcas pa// skal ldan rnams kyis bgrong bar sla// skal med rnams kyis yongs mi thar// zhes bshad pas so// gling gzhan las bsngags par 'os pa'i yon tan gzhan gyis kyang 'phags par yod de ri de'i rtsa ba dang nye ba'i bya dngos
94b3(rnying rgyud): su gu rdza we ra zhes pa'i mchod rten chen po sogs de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel bzhugs pa'i mchod rten mang po dang / de'i nub phyogs su pra d+ha sha ra NA zhes de bzhin gshegs pa zhag pa bdun du mnyam par bzhag pa la bzhugs pa'i shing stong dang / nga lI mu ti
94b4(rnying rgyud): ka ta lI ma Ni ka/ ra Ni be na kuny+dza ra g+hi ra g+hi ra pad+hI nAn rI/ b+hA la de sha sing+ga la/ chu rnams mu tig khyim rnams nor bus gang ba/ nags rnams glang po khyim rnams bu de med pad+ma can gyis gang ba'i yul sa t+pal/ zhes ched du brjod par grags pa dang /
94b5(rnying rgyud): byang shar dukaN+Da la zhes pa'i phug nags 'jug po zhig na b+hag phug 'drag pa der shrI pA du ka ste sangs rgyas kyi zhabs rjes shin tu che ba zhig yod cing der zhabs rjes kyi dus ston byed pan dge slong stong phrag bcu gnyis re tshogs pa sogs sngon nas dang+ka/ 'i bar du theg pa che chung
94b6(rnying rgyud): bstan pa shin tu drar ba yod do// zhes pa ni 'phros don no// gnyis pa bstan pa de mi yul du bab pa'i gang zag snyan khung gi brgyad par ji ltar byon pa ni/ spyir thun mong gi bka'i bsdu ba gnyis pa'i mjug tsam du nyi 'og gi rgyal po pad+ma chen po'i dus su o Di bsha' yul/
94b7(rnying rgyud): gyi rgyal po n+da ra b+hi ta'i khyim du 'phags pa 'jam dpal dge slong gi gzugs kyis gyon te rdeg pa chen po rigs par bshad cing sregs pa ma zhig kyang bzhag go// de 'gal zhig gis 'phags pa brgyad stong pa yin par 'dod la/ gsang sngags pa rnams ni de kho na nyid
95a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ bsdus pa yin zhes zer/ 'di ston pa myang na las 'das pa'i 'og tu byeg pa chen po mi yul dubyung ba'i bog ma yin/ de tsal zhig nas sngags kyang tha ba dang spyod pa'i rgyud rnams kyang zad byung bar mngon mod kyi yongs sugrags
95a2(rnying rgyud): par ni ma yin no// de nas bka' bsdu gsum pa'i 'og tu rgyal po ka ni Sh+Tha'i bu'i dus su breg chen smra ba'i slob dpon lnga brgya byon zheng thams cad kyang gsang ba'i bdag po sogs las lung len cing rdzu 'phrul thob pa sha stag ste de rnams nub phyogs kyi rgyal po la Na a shwas spyan
95a3(rnying rgyud): drangs te a bru zhus pa'i ri'i rtse ma ga drug lag pang byas te bzhugs sags pa/ rang gi mthor mirno ba wAng n+d+ha yang kyang nas sra ba dpon lnga bcu pa de dag lug dag rten mi chos mnyan du brtag/ der tha' ras sde sdong rnams mi ga 'a b.rabs ste na
95a4(rnying rgyud): mo/ phyir tshad gzung bar mi nus kyi// 'dir yod pa ni 'bum phrag bcu'o/ rgyal pos mang mod kyi ze bar bya'o// zhes thams cad yi ge bris ti de rnams nyid la phral mo// 'di skabs nas brtsams cig pa rkyen po shin tu rabar gyur la ma grod 'i chu
95a5(rnying rgyud): rnams kyang gsang nas nyams su len pa ches mang bar byung zhing thob pon na rnams kyis yulas sa nas sngags chud de dag nam grangs tu mablangs shing sel bar mdzad/ tha med kyi byud sdeni gyis kyi bar dras lapa ma chog dang ldan pa re gnyis la dza nal du lhag pu'i wa sogs
95a6(rnying rgyud): gyis bstan zhing rang nyid gcig pus nyams su blangs pas dngos grub thob pa las rjes su gdams pa bzhag pa dang / bcud pa rim can du 'dom pa sogs cung zad kyang med pas mngon mtshan du darab lha ci/ mtshan tsam yang thams cad kyis mi shes so//
95a7(rnying rgyud): gang gi tsog pa ba'i bdag pos rim la yang rigs can lnga lagasang sngags kyi chos 'khor bskar ba de'i chos rko ri'i rgyal po 'ogs pa sngags kyi phud kyi srub par bzhugs pa la rmi ltas ngos tsha rab bdun byung ste/ de yang / sregasung thugs rtags brim pa dang / rin
95b1(rnying rgyud): na thegs pamabapa pa dang / sa kyis gyu bye pa dang / na sa dam par 'a'ags pa dang / mdzad panan pa thas pa dang / da da/ sangs nasas lams na du//
95b2(rnying rgyud): nga thams cad nas lung bstan pa ste/ bde mchog snyam 'byung gi skad dkyim las/ ngani 'di nas ma snang nas// lo sangs paca dang bcwag nyi ni// lhag nas gas ma dugrags pa mi// bstan pa'i steng po dpa pazhig// 'angs kyi
95b3(rnying rgyud): mtshams kyi// rgyal par zhes byab la// bsod nams chen po'i mthas snang bas// gsang ba'i bdag pos snang bar 'gyur// zhes pa dan de ma tshungs par gyi mdzo dgongs 'dus las kyang 'byung // de yang rgyal po shes pa 'ga'aphag gas
95b4(rnying rgyud): ston pa dngos kyi dbang bskur pob pa 'i in+da b+ha ti chen po la byed pa dang / kha cig gis de nyid kyi sas yin par yang byed/ 'ga' zhig gis in+d+ra t+ya ti bar pa la 'dod pa sogs mi 'dra bar byung ba 'phags chen gyi rnam 'phrul so skyes bsam par mi nus pas de bar yin
95b5(rnying rgyud): du'ang rung la/ 'on kyang dus dang bsun na slob dpon sus rlung dang dus mtshungs su bshad pas de ltar na/ in+d+ra b+ha ti ba dpal byed dgos pa 'dra zhing / grub thob chen po la ba pa'i zhabs dang rgyal po 'di gnyis gcig gam tha dad gang ltar dus gcig cing / rol pa
95b6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje dang / mtsho skyes dang / dz+wa la d+ha ri ba rnams dang yang rol su tsam du dus mtshungs so// gang ltar kyil po de nyid rgyang sde log ma'i rnal 'byor bsgom zhing bzhugs pa'i tshe sngar gyi thigs dang mthun par dngos su rgyal po'i khang par sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor la sogs pa
95b7(rnying rgyud): gang sngags kyi sde snod chen pa rnams kyi migs pa ma dang gas pa'i bdag pa'i sra khra gang bzhig bab par gyu // de nas gsol ba btab pas rdong sems zhal babong gi le btogs nas de dang phyag na rdo rje'i'ayul brten nas thab bdun bsrubs pas do sems dpa'i zhal nga
96a1(rnying rgyud): zhing ye shes kyi dbang bskur bathob pas glegs pam rdzi brda' dang don ma lus pa mkhyen par gyur te// de dang dus mnyam par a na? ya ga'i sde snod rnams kyang mid pa'i gling du bab par gyur te/ kun pazang ye shes gsam
96a2(rnying rgyud): par ston pa'i thabs kyi lam mchog 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi le'u lnga par/ ma hA yo ga'i rgyud rnams ni rgyal po dza'i khang steng du 'bab par 'gyur la/ a nu yo ga'i rgyud rnams ni sing+ga la'i nags tshal du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan pas kyang ngo // de nas rgyal
96a3(rnying rgyud): gos rgyud don ma lus pa mkhyen par gyur kyang dge ba'i bshes kyi rkyen la ma ltos par gdul bya rnams chung la rang dgar 'jug pa dgag pa'i phyir ma rtogs pa ltar mdzad nas glegs pa ma rnams za hor gyi yul tsam na mkhyen pa che bar grags pa slob dpon u pa rA dza la bstan pas brda dang
96a4(rnying rgyud): don ma mjal/ de nas slob dpon ku ku rA dza la bstan pas des rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rdor sems zhal mthong gi le'u rtogs te bslabs pas rdo rje sems dpes zhal bstan nas da ste rgyud kyi don rnams gsang bdag gis ston par 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan/
96a5(rnying rgyud): da drang bsgrubs pas gsang bdag dngos su gyon nas don gyi bstan pa dang / theg pa thams cad rdzogs pa'i dbang bskur nas tshig gi bstan pa li tsaM bI dri ma med pa la zhus shig ces lung byin pa ltar slob dpon gyis gsang bdag gis bka' ltar kyad sde chen po bco brgyad du
96a6(rnying rgyud): gyes nas rgyal po ngo la bstan par bshad de/ shes byin tshul brgya lnga bcu pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ye shes pashes gnyen gyis mdzad pa las/ sngon sangs rgyas mi yul na lo brgyad du bzhugs pa'i tshe na/ sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo ga dang / gu h+ya sa mA dza la sogs pas
96a7(rnying rgyud): 'dul zhing theg pa de dag gi snod du gyur pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi yul na med pas rgyal chen bzhi dang sum cu rtsa gsum dang / dga' ldan la sogs pa'i gnas na lha rnams dang skal ba bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa snod du gyur nas de'i tshe mdo sde de na bzhugs
96b1(rnying rgyud): so// skad kyi sangs kyis myangan las 'das pa'i 'og tu bgar rgyal ba 'khar drang bcas pa mtshar bu tshas la dad pa dag cig 'jug pa pag pa de'i 'dral gal du gyur cing sda du gyur nasas rbatha b+hAs ma yog la sogs pa lnga snong can pa btsa brgyad phrag na rdo rje'i thun du
96b2(rnying rgyud): rlabs kyis ma tor gyi yul du gshegs pa dang / za shar gyi rgyal po in+da thA tI sa mad rje dag bltas nA brdam 'phrad nas sngon gyi las kyi dbang gis na ma ngan par shes pa thob pas bltas ni rtsal gyi dbus sa yul mal ba na.a tsacas su nga nyin gis kyi
96b3(rnying rgyud): la chos 'chad/ mtshan zhing ni khyi de dag la dam tshig gi longs spyod mang dpa khri'i slob dpon mdzad pa zhig bzhugs pa de theg pa'i snod du gyur la/ bdag gi 'dul skal du gyur pa yang 'dra nas rgyal pos pho nya btang ste slob dpon gshegasasu gsol ba dang /
96b4(rnying rgyud): na ya can gyilas kyid pa gas na ma ngan pa rags pa da ldan napa/ rgyam pa byeng dag gi 'du gam mabapa mi bya na thang dag go slo ba dag shAr na / da/ dus smram du yang da/
96b5(rnying rgyud): mdo sde'i sdod du yang gyur/ rgyal po'i the tshom yang sel bar 'gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang mdo sde dag sngar ma bltas na brgya la rgyal po'i be tshom dag ma sol bar gyur na shin tu mi legs pas pho nyal slar sringad ba/ mdo sde dag kho bos sngar b.las
96b6(rnying rgyud): gyis tshur skur zhig ces springs pa dang / de nas mdo sde dag phas gshegs te bltas na mgo mjug gar blta ba'i cha ma mchis na de nyid du was brdabs te mgon med do// skabs med do// zhes bos pa dang dpal rdo rje sems dpa' mngon par gshegs
96b7(rnying rgyud): da/ ba di nga pa nga/ de ga nga da rgyas ma ma gas grag mche dag ga du
97a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ sa mdzugasal bar gyu s+ho// de nas srub dpon da n+na hA gyi sbrul dug shegs nus rgyal bul bar dang bcas pa rnams lan ma de dag bshadad+ha/ rdo rje sems dpas lang bstan nas rgyal po 'khor dang banas pa rnang /
97a2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ltar sgom du stsal te dbus su rgyal po nyid/ btsun mo dam pa bzhi yum gyi sar bkod/ blon po bzhi rigs bzhi'i sar bkod/ sras mo rnams nang gi lha mo'i sar bkod/ btsun mo phal pa rnams phyi'i lha mo'i sar bkod/
97a3(rnying rgyud): blon po phal pa rnams sgo srang bzhi dang / bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' ltar bkod pa dang / rgyal pos bsams pa bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa rig 'dzin gyi gnas su grub pa'i phyir dang dam pa'i chos 'di mi nub par bya ba'i phyir sras sha kra bu tiHla
97a4(rnying rgyud): cho bu dbang bskur nas/ A tsa tsags pas lung dang man dag bstan brgyal bu de la bstan te bzhag nas bsgoms pa dang / rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa stong sA la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rig 'don du grub po// de'i sras sha gra Ta nyis kyang de bzhin du ba rnams
97a5(rnying rgyud): pa dang / 'khor sgom pa bdun brgya dang yang rig 'dzin gyi gnas grub po// yang rgyal bu sha kra ba tis sras ni chung ste sras mo go ba de phyil dpal dam pa'i nang na tshul brgya lnga bcu pa bkod de bshams nas in+da b+hU ti'i lung de sras mo yul dngas 'dzin du sAl de la bstan
97a6(rnying rgyud): pa las sras mo de yang 'khor dang bcas pa brgya dang yang rig 'don gyi gnas grub bo// de nas sras mo des/ rgyal ba la lung man ngag bzhag pa las 'phel ba ni deng du 'di lags te/ zhes bshad cing / de dang mtshung bar mnyam sbyor 'grel pa las kyang /
97a7(rnying rgyud): sprul pa'i sku 'das phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe// rgyal ba'i bka' gsang 'dzam gling gnas su shar// rgyal po'i khab tu spyan drangs mchod byas te// dga' zhing gus bstod legs bltas brda' ma mjal// thugs rje'i 'brel shugs gsang sngags 'dzin
97b1(rnying rgyud): bAr grags// dam par kyang te glegs pa sa gzigs par / sgyu 'phrul pag lo spong ba'i dkyil labar gzhang / grub ba ba lhag pa'i lha las srung bstan 'dun/ dang ga pa gzung gas su thugs mdzang// dmang rnams
97b2(rnying rgyud): kyis gdams pa ji bzhin pa// ma~M 'gal legs par bsdus shing rab bathol te// 'grel dang bzlas don sgrub papas mang du bsan// zhes gsungs pa'i phyir lugs de gnyig 'gal ba med kyang rgyal po dang nyid kyis rtogs pa'i phyogs legs par
97b3(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi mdzad pa 'im marnam pagad na/ shar phyogs i ng+ge'i thang ban// rgya kyang rna rdzogs paH/ ri ldan mim ngas/ gsang ba'i bdan mas mngon pa can ngas// mung bral dra ba'i bsra pa yang // rtso mthal brgya
97b4(rnying rgyud): bcas// thag du dang mngon sa ste// srang snyen bcu le thugs kyad pa'i dbang // dge bar bsgyur nas theg pa med// nganasas la reg par thus/ rnas pa sangs rgyas sa pa'i ma ma ma las/ 'thal pa snang ba yo dgas
97b5(rnying rgyud): pas// thugs kyi sgrub pa ma / gas te// de ti nas de nyid byug// brtan pa'i dngas sra ba de nas pab// don dam brgyad kyis de nas rgyas/ na pa'i bsam pa de ru 'thug// lhag pa'i snang mngal// shes pa lasags pas
97b6(rnying rgyud): ga / samapa sheg nga chung dag
97b7(rnying rgyud): gas dru thong kyi gnas rnams su ga shegs nas tshogs kyi 'bar po la sags pa dang cig gisu rjod pa 'gros bab gnyis sa sud pas sa par byag kyi na pa dang sa gras pa rnyes pa yinadu/ yanga'i theg gis sma da na 'as
98a1(rnying rgyud): pa la gnas pa / a kun du tshun nas slar yang spyad sde tshon pa bco brgyad kyi nang nas sangs rgyas mnyam spor ma lags pa'i nang kyad rdu la rtsa cher bshad cings par mas thags dacig le la brten nas mchogs
98a2(rnying rgyud): do/ grub pa rnyes pa yin no zhes kyang zer/ slob dpon 'dis mnyam sbyor la rtsal du bton cing gsang don rnam par dgod pa drug dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i tshig lnga pa sogs pasan bcos du ma mdzad do// de ltar ma hA yog
98a3(rnying rgyud): la rgud sde dang srub sde gnyis su yod pa lngas snga mA tA na chen po snga bco brgyad ni sdugasang sngags yon tan zin las lnga'i gzhi nga khar gyur pa'i rgyud sde chen po lnga dang / slab pa'i yan lag tu 'gro ba'i drud sde lnga dang / spyod par yan lag tu 'gro ba'i rgyung rje
98a4(rnying rgyud): lnga dang / mtshang ba kha skong ba'i phyi ma'i rgyud gnyis dang / thams cad kyi bsdus don lta bu'i rgyud sde gcig dang bco brgyad do// de thams cad rgyal pos ku ku rA dza li bshad/ nges sras sha kra pu tri 'am in+d+ra b+hu ti chung ba la bshad/ des seng haH
98a5(rnying rgyud): dzal bshad/ nges sha gra pu ti 'am u ba rA ngo la bshad/ des sras mo go ma dwe bI la bshad cing so so'i tshom bu dang bcas pa tsho gas sgrub kyi lam gyis rdo rje 'chang gi sa la gshegs so// de ltar yang lam rI mi las// de nas rdo rje gdan steng gi/
98a6(rnying rgyud): 'dzam gling shar gyi gyogs mtshams su// pho brang dam pa rin chen nang // bkra shis dam pa'i khang bu ru// ku ku rA dzon+d+ra b+hU ti// sid+d+ha u pa rA dza dang // sras mo go ma de bI sogs// sgra 'phrul dra ba'i dbang thob nas// tshogs kyi dkyil
98a7(rnying rgyud): rjod bslabs te// rdo rje 'chang sar mngon du gshegs// zhes so// rgyal po 'dis sku 'phrul lam rnam pakod dang / rim pa gnyis pa la sogs pa mdzad cing tha med kyi bstan pa chos gzhan yang bde mchog rtse chud kyi 'grel pa dang /
98b1(rnying rgyud): ye shes grub pa dang / lhan cig rjes srab sogs mchog tu gsang ba'i don slong nges pa mang po mdzad/ 'phags yul gyi grub chen rnams la khyab gdal du gyur pa'i rgyud dang / gdams ngag ci rigs pa thams cad las phal mo che rgyal po'i rigs kyi
98b2(rnying rgyud): slob dpon 'di nyid las byung ba shas che zhing / bde ba chen po dang 'od gsal gyi gdams pa'i bka' rnams rgyal po 'dis grub thob byis pa'i zhabs sam dza lan+d+ha ra~M pa la gnang / des nag po spyod pa slob ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa la brgyad nas/ ti rbi
98b3(rnying rgyud): pa dang nA ro pa slob ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad bachung pa'i sol ka 'di nyid las byung ba yin no// de bzhin du las kyi phyag rgya'i bka' bab sa'i khungs kyang de nyid do// sas mogo ma de bris rgyal po ku ku rA daM/ des slol dpon sgeg pa rdo rje dang /
98b4(rnying rgyud): sangs kyis gsang pags ma la ba shad de/ de la slob dpon sgeg pa rdo rje ni wal Ni/ Thar la grangs/ u mun gyi gnas su rab tu byang zhing sde sdong gsum la spangs/ zad par pog med lugs kyi grub mtha' la mkhas shing bran mong gi rig pa'i gnas tham
98b5(rnying rgyud): cad kyang mkhyen/ u rgyan gyi sring phran ma ti ma zhes bya bar 'phags pa 'angam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub pa mdzad pas grub par nye ba na'ajam dpal gyi bris sra'i zhal las 'od zer byung ste gling de yun ring du sdang bar byas pas nyi ma dang 'dra ba zhes bya
98b6(rnying rgyud): bar mtshan gsol/ dus gzhan zhig tu lta ba log pa'i sgrub pa po zhig la nang pa'i paN+Di ta'i dbang po lnga bsrub rdzas la dgos babyung nas slob dpon bzong du 'ongs pa na glang po che dang / rta dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / ma he dang / ma bya sogs snga tshogs pang/
98b7(rnying rgyud): gzugs su spang bar mdzad pas slob dpon gang yan ma shes par phyir log pas sna tshogs gzugs can zhes mtshan du grags shing sku tsha'i skad la oM rgyan gyi yul du 'gro ba'i don rgya cher mdzad/ slob dpon chen po 'di spyir rgyad sde thams cad dang khyad par smra 'phrul ba
99a1(rnying rgyud): spyan / na'ardza nas sa/ na ga sa sa / sa das
99a2(rnying rgyud): shig chen po'i rim pa dang / 'dus pa la gud kyi bshad pa bla ma'i man ngag gi bshad pa dang / lhan skyes sgrub thabs sogs rgyang gzhan dang / gsang ba snying po'i 'grel pa sbar khab dang / thugs thig dang / rim pa drug pa dang / dam tshig gsal
99a3(rnying rgyud): pakra dang / phra rgyas sogs sgyu 'phrul phyogs la'ang bstan bcos mang du mdzad cing rgya cher bshad/ mabar gyis rdo rje'i sgra brnyes pa yin no// 'di rab tu byung ba'i mtshan dpal ldan byang chub mchog gi skal ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba dang / gsang mtshan sgeg pa'i
99a4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje dang / bstan bcos rnams su sgeg pa'i rdo rje nyi ma dang 'drag sna tshogs gzugs can zhes 'byung ba yin no// 'di la slob dpon ye shes zhabs kyis kyang / sgyu 'phrul dra ba dang / mnyam sbyor dang / gsang ba 'dus pa dang / zla gsang thig le ste taH
99a5(rnying rgyud): sde bco brgyad kyi gtso bo nang chud sde lngar grags pa rnams gsan cing bsgoms pas ye shes la dbang pob pa yin te/ zhal gyi lung las/ de nas yon tan kun 'byung u rgyan yul du bgrod// 'jo skag rdo rje zhes byar mtshan gsol rab tu grags/
99a6(rnying rgyud): las mang pos rnam par dpyad cing de nyid du// zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa'i phyir ro// gang gi tshe sgeg pa'i zhabs kyis u rgyan du sngags kyi bstan pa skyong ba de'i tshe gdol pa'i bu zhig gis AHde ba mngal/ byin gyis brlabs pas chos rdol shes su
99a7(rnying rgyud): srung / 'phags pa kye srub yab sras kyi sngags gzhung rnams ci rigs par bshad pa'i mata de ba dang / kong+ka na du bsrung ba'i zhabs kyis kyang tha grags las dngos su mnyan nas/ smon gsal gyi glegs pa ma thog mar rnyed cing / de bzhin du baN+Di ta spa ga can
99b1(rnying rgyud): 'dzin gyis kyang su byang mngal ber te 'dus pa 'phags skar zag par byung ba'i skabs ka yen/ slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang ba ni yul dbus su 'khrungs shing na la rlung rab tu byung / 'di dang srab dab na sangs rgyas zhi ba gnyis kA ye shas zhabs kyi su t+ya'i
99b2(rnying rgyud): gyi slob ma yin/ wA ra \u0f7f si'i gnas shig tu 'phags pa 'jam dpal bsgrubs pas nam zhig na bris sra bzhad cing / dngas srab kyi rdzas pa dmar po'i mar khwa yang kha la/ me tog rnyid pa rnams kyang kha 'bus pas dngos srab gyi sa sras pa
99b3(rnying rgyud): gas ra tog 'phral la mam khrag sos snyam pa'i the tsam gyi dang chung za sras pas gtong then bzhig gas gegs byas teslo ba kyi 'gram pa ra la lag/ bstan pas cung zang brgyal/ desangs can bris su rdul gyis gos/ me tog nyid/ @
99b4(rnying rgyud): de srabs shid oM rgyan du gyon nas slob dang
99b5(rnying rgyud): pa yang gzigs/ 'on kyang rdul gyis me tog dbul phul/ mar khu gang yod gsol bas swa lus nad thams cad dang bral zhing shin tu stobs dang ldan pa dang blo shin tu rno zhang mngon par shes pa la dbang sgrarab byung /
99b6(rnying rgyud): 'an/ sa 'dus
99b7(rnying rgyud): der sangs rgyas gsang bas zhabs sa la
99b8(rnying rgyud): gas cos ston pa dang / me dpar tho ga nye canamasan ma yin dang gnod sbyin pa gas sacas ston ma du/ rtse ma 'phags pa mngon suman btsugs pa yang dang gi snang ba nga mthun par mangs/
99b9(rnying rgyud): gas du sa sa sa su na sa sa gas pas ma
100a1(rnying rgyud): skal mas kyang bstan pa ltar bskul bas/ ra ti ser byon nas slab pa mdzad pas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen pa lan grangs na mar gzigs shing 'jam dpal dbyangs dang mi dang mi lab pa bzhin du zur /
100a2(rnying rgyud): mi ma yin pa rnams kyang bran du khol/ slob dpon 'dis gsang ba snying po la 'grel pa rnam dbye 'grel dang / rdo rje las rim dang / dkyil 'khor chos don dang / dam pa rgyan dang / dra chen du chung dang / lam rim che chung gnyis dang / zhi bad
100a3(rnying rgyud): jo bo'i mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa dang / rnal 'byor rgyud la'ang rdo rje dbyings kyi sgrub thabs yo ga la 'jug pa dang / rnam snang mngon byang gi bsdus 'grel dang / bsam gtan gyi ma'i rgyas 'grel sogs shin tu mang bar mdzad cing bod la'ang bka' drin che
100a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshul 'og tu 'chad par 'gyur la/ mthar su lus mi snang bar gyur skad/ yang rgyal po ku ku rAngs/ ro langs bde ba'i dngos grub dang / drang srong b+hA Shi ta gnyis la bshad/ snga mas badra ha s+ya la bshad/ slob dpon 'dis gsar pa 'dus pa
100a5(rnying rgyud): la'ang 'grel ba dgongs pa thams cad nye bar len pa dang / bde bachen po'i sgrub thabs sogs mdzad nas rtsal du bton cing bshad pas 'phags yul du 'dus pa la bka' sol mi 'dra ba lugs nyi shu rtsa bzhi yod par 'dod pa las bod du drug byung ba'i bzhi pa 'dus pa rdo rje
100a6(rnying rgyud): bzhad pa'i nor gyi srol ka zungs de yin/ 'dis na la nra'i nub sgo srung bdag gi dbang phyug grags pa la 'khar mo sdom pa'i dbang bskur ba mdzad cing rgyad kyang bshad/ gdams pa dang rjes su gdams pa rnams kyang bsngal/ man ngag bsgoms pas ngag gi dbang
100a7(rnying rgyud): phyag cher po sogs grub pa thob cing sgra lus de nyid kyis kyang 'jug gi spu phrag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin du thar pa yin no// srab dpon de dang drang srong b+ha Sha ta gnyis kas ba hor \u0f7fla po wags la bshad/ mang ni nub phyogs su rgyal rigs su spu 'khrungs/ tsi ta pa?/
100b1(rnying rgyud): rlung yul gyi slob pa man pa 'ad dang mam yul gyi 'jus 'don chen pa bas drarnams grags pa las rab tu byung zhing mtshan shAs 'od du grags/ sde snong gsam kA la mkhas par sbyangs shing srab dpa na rdo rje bzhad pa sogs sngags kyi rdza badzin pa yang rjes mad papa
100b2(rnying rgyud): cing byung sde thams cad thugs su chud pa dang mchog gi dngos grub brnyes pa yin zhes grags/ sngags su zhugs pa'i mtshan phra thA ba k+ki zhes 'byung / slob dpon 'di'i slob ma hAs pa shes gnyen gyis nal sabyor chud de mon nyid bsdus pa 'i 'grel bgos
100b3(rnying rgyud): rgyan zhes b+ha ba 'dra brtsams/ 'di gnyis kas kha cher rtson nas 'grodon na chen po mdzad de/ sa ma las stob po na sangs rgyas gsang ba dang slob dpon chen po 'adz+ras prA pa gnyis kyis gsan zhing slob dpa ni mardzas rgyal ba tsha nyid la'ang gas na no// de yang
100b4(rnying rgyud): dpan chen po 'di ni 'jam dpal sgra 'phral dra ba las/ dpal ldan sangs rgyas pad+ma skyes// kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa/ rgyal po sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang // che ba sangs rgyas rig sngags 'chad// zhes lung gis bstan pa'i
100b5(rnying rgyud): don du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyigasung rdo rje'i bdag tid sangs mas 'od dpag tu med pa'i sprul pa'i su ste d+ha na ko sa'imatsho'i dbus sa pad+ma'i sdong po las mangs kyi dri mas mgos par bcus te 'grangs so// de la gter ma'i phyogs phal che bar rdzus kyis kho
100b6(rnying rgyud): grags rjedaka' ma thar ba'i nas bshad sogs sa mngal skyes kyi tshogs kyang gsungs shAgade dang mthun par 'phags pa'i yul gyi gtam du 'ang klags mod/ rnam 'phral bsam gyis mi khyab pa la dbang 'byor ba'i rtsir gang ltar yin kyang du
100b7(rnying rgyud): bdus skyes sbyaran du mdza dang / saM kau d+he dang / d+han gos dang / chu ga sogs sring ban nga kya ma 'i Adza'i yul dngas sa yinabang de rnams sa rigs par mdza // zhes 'byung sa/ u b+ha kyi la nyid du 'ad nga @
101a1(rnying rgyud): gsum du rgya mtsho chen po re yod pas/ de dag gang du 'khrungs pa'i tshul gsal ka 'phags yul ba'i gtam chud du mthung / gang ltar o Di yA na'i 'phral skad du sra do zhes pa rgya gar ba rnams srig d+ha ra me tog phreng ba
101a2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin zhes pa o rgyan gyi rgyal po'i rigs su gyur pa'i blon po dkon mchog gsum la bla mar byed pa zhig gis thog mang rnyed cing mjal/ mngal skyes kyi phyogs su de'i sras yin par 'dod/ 'di'i ming zur chag pas kr-iSh+Na 'dzin du gyur pa de yin/
101a3(rnying rgyud): nas rig pa'i gnas yan lag dang bcas par so so'i slob dpon brten nas sbyang ba'i tshul gyis nyams dog tu chud par mdzad/ ShaM ra ga Sha zhes bya bar 'dul ba 'dzin pa zhig las skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi lnga blangs/ sde snod gsum kyang bslabs/
101a4(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi slob dpon shAn+ti rU pa las bya spyod rnal 'byor rgyud kyi dbang bskur ba mang po zhus pas/ me tog thams cad pad+ma'i rigs kyi lha kho nar phog/ gzhan yang grub thob chen po su kha de ba zhes 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dang gnyis su med pa zhig dang / u
101a5(rnying rgyud): rgyan gyi yul nyid du spad 'tshong ma su kha d+ha rI zhes rdo rje 'chang las dngos su chos gsan pa'i grub pa mo chen mo de la gsang sngags nang gi dbang dang gdams pa mang po yang zhus so// dge slong ma kun dga' mo zhes pa'ang 'di'i mtshan gyi rnam grangs so// de nas gnas
101a6(rnying rgyud): dben pa rnams su bsnyen pa dang / nye bar bsnyen pa dang / srub pa dang / sgrub pa chen po rnams mdzad pa na thog mar cho 'phrul gyi rigs du ma byung yang rnam par mi rtog pa'i lam du btang nas bsgoms pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med sogs sangs rgyas
101a7(rnying rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' du ma'i zhal gzigs/ khro bo'i rgyal po ha ya grI ba dngos su gzigs/ mkha' 'gro ma dang 'byung po rnams bran du khol ba sogs byung / skabs der rgyal srid kyi bya ba'ang ci rigs par mdzad/ dus gzhan zhig tu yul de'i
