101b1(rnying rgyud): sbyin pa'i chogs dang ma 'tshams bltar mdzad nas sred grangs te nga khan can bu bsrel ba'i tshal rnga can/ der rig sngags 'azlas shing sud pa mdzad pas khams gsas nam nyal dang ga shin po ga gang la sags rdza rje gan thams cad kyi zhal gzigs shing gdu
101b2(rnying rgyud): thos/ ma hA kA la dang re ma ti sogs phran bzhin byed/ gru dang gnod sbyin thams cad kyang mngag gzhug tu khol/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i drag sngags 'bum phrag brgyal dbang pob/ 'dzam bu'i gling na gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod chen
101b3(rnying rgyud): po gzhan rnams su'ang rdzu 'phrul gyis byon cing der grub pa'i slob dpon rnams dang mjal zhing ral gri sogs thun mong gi grub chen brgyad po'ang nyams 'og tu rgud par mdzad/ de tsam na rig pa 'dzin pa'i lus su gyur kyang da ni spyod pa spyad de zung 'jug gi go 'phang 'do ba
101b4(rnying rgyud): par bya snyam du dgongs pa na sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas kyis de kho na nyid ma mthong bar drag shul spyod pa'i las kyis 'dod pa'i don la bar du gcod pa yin gyi khyod kyi 'di tsam gyis mchog gi dngos grub mi thob pas sngon gyi las 'brel yod pa'i slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes yin pas des
101b5(rnying rgyud): bstan pa bzhin sgoms shig/ ces lung bstan pa ltar yul dbus su byon cing slob dpon shAkya 'od las rgyud sde 'og ma gsum sogs sngags phyi nang thams cad la sgro 'dogs chod par mdzad/ slob dpon chen po ye shes zhabs las pha rol phyin pa'i sde snod rnams
101b6(rnying rgyud): dang / sgyu 'phrul dra ba dang / zla gsang thig le dang / sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor dang / gsang ba 'dus pa dang / karma mA la sogs rgyud dang man ngag thams cad gas na/ sangs rgyas gsang ba las kyang rnal 'byor rgyud dang gsang ba snying po la sogs rgyad sde
101b7(rnying rgyud): mang po gsan cing mtha' dag pa thugs su chud par mdzad/ khyad par sprul pa'i sku dga' rab rdo rje dang / 'jam dpal bshes gnyen dang / shrI saMng ha gsum las rdzogs pa rgyan po don brgyud kyi man ngag rig pa rgyal thabs kyi thugs kyi tshul du thob pas rbab gsal
102a1(rnying rgyud): gnyis su med pa'i la gas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa la rang dab ba rjes shing rdong bzang dang mi gnyis par na/ skyer slob dang naman po 'di ni sprul pa'i sgra yin pas dran mang drim gyis pa ltar gus nabs pa 'am ru
102a2(rnying rgyud): ba'i re zhig gdul bya'i dbang gis thun mong ltar bshad pa yin gyi thun mong ma yin pa'i rnam thar kyang 'chad par byar yod mod kyi spros pas chog go// de la ye shes zhabs kyi slob ma mthong ba'i chos su mya ngan las 'das pa bzhi'i ya gyal bde ba chen po pad+ma ka ra zhes pa
102a3(rnying rgyud): slob dpon 'di nyid yin ces 'phags yul du grags mod/ slob dpon de nyid kyis lung bstan pa ltar grong khyer paN+Da ba'i byang ngos parnyi bya ba'i nags kyi mthongs su ri de'u zhig yod pa der yin zer/ don du brag phug ma ra ti kar pad+ma can gyi las rgya man+t+ra re la brten
102a4(rnying rgyud): nas bde ba chen po'i lam gyis zla ba drug tu sgrub pa chen po mdzad pas phra yang sogs kyi yon tan dang ldan pa'i rdo rje'i skur gyur/ ti ra hu ti sogs tha ru'i rgyal khams dang / ka ma ru dang bal po sogs byang phyogs kyi yul rnams su'ang chos ston pa dang / thun
102a5(rnying rgyud): mong gi grub pa rnams kyis phan 'dogs par mdzad/ tsa.Ar+Na'i yul du krung chen po k+She taM zhes pa nyin lam gcig tsam sa'i 'og tu bcug pa dang / tsha la ma tsam du bcug pa gnyis yod/ de skabs tsam du rgya gar lho phyogs tri ling ga dang nye ba tri ma la'i yul la
102a6(rnying rgyud): k+Sha mAn gyi gnas dang nye ba na shi ba s+thA na zhes par dbang phyug gi ling+ga rang byung du byung / des nang pa'i sde rnams dang lha 'ang sogs la shin tu gnod pa zhig yod la/ yang shar phyogs b+hang ga lar nye ba bA re n+da'i lho nub bA ga la zhes bya bar mtsho chung zhig gsar du rdol zhing
102a7(rnying rgyud): der mu stegs la dga' ba'i grwa gzhug pa can zhig kyang gnas bcas/ de'i mthus shar phyogs su mu stegs kyi sde gsar pa mang du byung / sangs rgyas pa rnams la klu de shin tu cho 'phrul che bas gnod par gyur/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po'i khab na shel gyi pha wang
102b1(rnying rgyud): gcigal su stegs pa'i sgra 'byung ba mang du gnas pas bsgrub medanas par mig mthong dang na sngags dang ma rdzas kyi mngan thos sogs snyan pa zhig byug/ de rnams 'dul par dgang sa dz+haiM gdan du sub khang mdzad nas 'khar las sgyur bajug gi dbu'ang nga
102b2(rnying rgyud): zhal phyis nas dpal yang dag he ru ka bsgrubs pas 'bar ba dang / ha ha hi hi sogs bzhad pa brgyad kyis bzhad pa'i dpal he rukas zhal bstan/ phur bu gsum byung ba las khro bo khams gsum rnam rgyal gyi gur bu slob dpon nyid kyis blangs te tri ma la la
102b3(rnying rgyud): ling+ga dang nye ba'i shing sdong gcig la btab pas de skor gyi nags thams cad tshig/ ling+ga phyed lhag tsam thal bar sod/ phyis nang pa la gnod pa med cing ma chod pa nyams pa rnams kyang gsos/ khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phur bu dkyil 'khor gyi gzungs
102b4(rnying rgyud): ma man dA ra ba'am dang tshul can gyis blangs te b+haM ga la'i mtsho de la btab pas klu 'khor bcas thal bar song / zhag bdun nas mtsho yang bskams/ mu stegs kyi sde de rnams zhig/ phur bu chung ba de sgrub g.yog kA ma ru'i rnal 'gyor pa rat+na shwe las blangs te/
102b5(rnying rgyud): rgyal po'i khab kyi shel gyi pha wang de la btab pas sil gyis zhig/ de gnyis kyis kyang sangs rgyas pa'i sde rnams la phan par byung / gnyis ka'ang rig pa 'dzin pa'i lus su gyur te mi snang la/ 'dod na sbal pa'i lus kyis snang bar byed do/ slob
102b6(rnying rgyud): dpon gyis tri ma la dang bi kra ma shI lar thogs re bzhugs shing lha khang re'ang bzhengs/ de nas slar yang oM rgyan du byon/ skal ba dang ldan pa rnams la gsang sngags phyi nang gi chos mang du bstan cid thams cad kyang dngos grub sna re ma thob pa med/ lha 'ang
102b7(rnying rgyud): chen po gcig kyang bzhengs/ de skabs oM rgyani dang nye ba'i yul kats+tsha na sangs rgyas pa'i sde bzang bzhig yod/ yul mo la tA na'i grong khyer bA ga nga'i rgyal po stag gzig tu mun yin pa de'i dmag gis yul rnams bcom/ chos grwa 'ga' zhig ni
103a1(rnying rgyud): bshigs/ mang po 'jom la khad kyi skabs dmag mi rnams nI la zhes pa'i chu grang la gru dang rgyal gyis byung bar/ tshus pa nas smrab dman gyis la stas dang sdigs 'ang 'jug na mdzad pas su chab dang dad
103a2(rnying rgyud): Ta lnga brgya rtsam dang / rgyal zhing 'ong ba'i mi dang bcas pa thams cad chu byings nas rba sarba'i dpa' bo thams cad shi'o// de phyin chad phyogs der hu mrang+ka mi gnod pa mthung ngo // ba la~M phral tshugs sa phebs nas yang ma shad rnga dpal yang dag
103a3(rnying rgyud): 'i sgrub pa chom thu pa'i tshogs kyi spyod pa smos bcas thu bcug tu spyad pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad zhal rtag tu ston cing gsung phreng mdzad pa dang / 'di gsal gyi spalas zung bajug gi sur bzhengs te ga tu chen po mchog gi dang sa krung ma na
103a4(rnying rgyud): mdzad do/ de nas rgyag shar nub ste dbus rnams su 'gronan gyi rigs par ma dang/ de nas chu bo gang gu'i byer phyogs ni pa lnga'i yul phan chad du 'gro ba'i don cher mdzad/ zhabs kyang 'gro ming gi sal du 'grod naH/ debs kyang bod sa yul
103a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i don rgya che/ de las kyang rnga yab gling phran sogs su mi mra yin gyi 'gro blon mdzad pa shin tu rgya ches che ba yin te/ snga ma rnams ni yul nyi tshe ba dang skye pho nyung ngu tsam dang / dus kyang lo grangs brgya stong snyed sogs yun bu dra yin la/ gyi ma 'di la ni yul
103a6(rnying rgyud): phul s+yes sogs dag zhal bar dka' ba'i phyir slob dpon 'di nyid gtso bar mi ma yin 'dul ba'i zin las can no// de la slob dpon 'di rab tu byung ba'i mtshan pad+ma 'byung gnas dang / gsang ba'i mtshan pa dras s+tha ba dang / ma hA su kha dang / pad+ma badz+ra la sogs
103a7(rnying rgyud): rnam pa phyis oM g+har+tha d+harmag ldi nas dgyes rdor gyi rgyud stan 'dren pa po slob dpon mtsho skyes su grags pa oM rgyan du rgyal pos gson bsreg byas pas slob dpon yab yum he ru ka'i rnam par bzhugs pa sogs tshe 'phral khyad par can bstan pa
103b1(rnying rgyud): da yang 'di nyid yin nam sems shing gzhan yang slob dang na chen po padru badz+ran cung dang / 'osra pa dang / sbyin pa dang / nag po skrod pa chen po la sogs pa rnams kyang zla ba dpon nyid bu nam la gzhan das can grazhan gyispangs rigs par 'gra myangs dang /
103b2(rnying rgyud): mdzad par grab la/ de dag kyang rnam pa 'di dang mtshan 'dis mtshan pa'i rnam par gyid pang dums pa yin mod/ dngas rgyad kyi khyad par tsam ma gtags sprul pa'i sku 'di nyid myi gsum gyi'i zhing du mgyur pa gcig kyang med pa'i phyir zung 'jug gis 'bar
103b3(rnying rgyud): lnga bzhugs pa rnams kyi rnam par thar pa'i maba' ni sras kyang brjod par mi nums// de bas na srab tho ba rgyan po rnams gsul bu phal gyi mngan sum du mi snang bas yan ring bar song ba na slar yang lha snang bar mang de nas dus ring par bzhugs pa dang /
103b4(rnying rgyud): re yul la la mi snang bar la lar snang ba dang / kha cig tu 'pho ba'i tshul mdzad nas bci tu skye bar ston pa sogs rnam 'phral mapa'ayas pa'i phyir sngon bI nub mi srung bar gyur nas slar yang sra dngos kyis lan gsul brtson pa dang / dza lan+ta ri pa lan
103b5(rnying rgyud): byin pa dang / skyed pa pa chen po de TI/ ra rmongs pa'i tshul mdzad nas slob marnams kyis sug drang ba sregs pa bcas grub pa na sngar yang yul gzhan du snga ma'i sgo de nyid kyis 'gro don mdzad pa dang thal la ltar skye bags du bzang nas mchog gi dngas thub brnyes pa'i
103b6(rnying rgyud): tsum mdzad par grags pa sogs las g+ha'i snang tshul dang bstan pa'i dus pa rdzi dang gnas yul sogs khrig khrig kang kang sdig tu mi btub cing bal ba'i rnam gzhag rgyal po la 'phrigs pa'i skabs med pa bzhin no// de yang sems can rnams kyi mos pa dang /
103b7(rnying rgyud): thosam pa'i dbang she rjes sa kun gro ba'i rdzu 'phrul las dbang phyug pa nyid kyi te/ 'jigs pa rgyas thams cad yang dag par sdud pa'i mdo sde las/ 'jig pa'i bskal bcags pa'i bstsal bar mos na yang 'drig pa'i bskal ba chags pa'i bsnga
104a1(rnying rgyud): bangs ste/ sems can de dag gi cang nags pa'i maskal bar gsas// chags pa'i bskal pa 'angag pa'i bskas par mas na yang chags par shal pa 'a ga brje ga pa dang / sa
104a2(rnying rgyud): can de dag gis kyang 'jig pa'i bskal par shes so// 'jig pa dang chags pa yang gzhan du gyur pa ma yin te mos pa de ltar du 'gyur ro// de bzhin du bskal pa gcig sa rdo tsam du mos na yang de na sems can de dag gis bskal pa gcig matsam du
104a3(rnying rgyud): bskal pa tsam du mos na yang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ des na sems can de dag gis de bzhin du shes te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa la byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul zhes bya'o// zhes pa la sogs pas gsungs pa'i phyir ro// slob dpon 'di nyid
104a4(rnying rgyud): lde'adu legs pa'i lnga gyi gang yin mi gsal zhing 'dir grags pa ltar na thod kyi spangs 'di nas srin po'i yul du gyon par 'dod la/ 'gro lding pa rnams 'gro ldi nyid nas der byon par 'dod la/ sru'i bkod pa gnyis dus gcig tu bstan par byas kyang ma 'gal mad/
104a5(rnying rgyud): gang lta ru/ phyagar lho phyogs nas nu ba drang ba du bres pagal te tu mtsho lnga phyin pa na rgya mtsho'i dbus kyi gling chung drud+ha mi Do dri ba zhes bya ba yod de sngon du srin po dang mkha' 'gro la rnams nam mkha' la sri zhing 'gro ba kho nas gang ba'i phyir ba skad du grags shing
104a6(rnying rgyud): 'byung po mi'i gzugs can gyi skyes pa dang / bud med rnams ni rigs sngags sna tshogs pas dran babs byed pa gdug pa'i mkha' 'gro ma'am sngags 'tshang mo shas che/ yul der slob dpon gyis thog mar byon te gling de nyid kyi bdag mo sngags 'chang
104a7(rnying rgyud): drug su po'i blon mo'i tshul gyis yod pa thams cad bkug nasas gzirate dbul nas gtso mo gzhan rnams kyang bskur bzug nas dam bzhag dang po mdzad/ lan cig slob dpon grong khyer du gyon pa zhig la/ sngag
104b1(rnying rgyud): chang ma mang bas 'dam bu gling gi me mang ba za ba gzigs te/ de bams cad dbang med du bzhug nas bsdigs pas de rnams 'bras par brtsamA pa na yan lag la phur thas btab cing srin chad nga ma bu gleng pa rnams la gnod pa mi byed pa'i mna' bar du bajug cang
104b2(rnying rgyud): sems paskyed kyang log ste dam bzhag gnyis pa mdzad/ yang dus gzhan zhig tun mgron yang zhig tu ljon pas bud med mang pas snod du mar chu bzhol gyi na 'jug pa 'i zhig na chung rnams la la khrag tu 'arko/ la 'tshal du 'dra/ de bzhin du la lajig sa
104b3(rnying rgyud): dang / sha dang / mar bu dang / bur ma dang / 'bras chan dang / chang la sogs par 'gyur ba gzigs nas de rnams la dris pas slob dpon yin pa ngom shes te 'di dag ni 'angam bu gling pa'i mi rnams kyi lus dang zas kyi bcud dkug pa yin zer/ khyod rnams
104b4(rnying rgyud): kyis slob dpo na pa d+ma ka ra'i thung du man 'bor ba ma yin nam byas pas/ bad rnams kyi dpon mos man 'byor yang kho mo cag gis mthor rathar bas/ yang sngar gyi phrag pa der sngags 'chang ma po nag sog bsdus pas 'bum phrag pa cu gnyis byung / de
104b5(rnying rgyud): thams can kyi srog sngags dang sgrub bapas grangs/ dpon mo rnams dkyil 'khor du bcug/ g.yog rnams la sems bskyed cig/ thams cad kyang mna' 'dodar du ba cug ste ma bzhag gsam pa ma dzang/ gzhan yang yal de'i mam yin pa bams
104b6(rnying rgyud): cad btul/ mi rnams kyang 'dul bar dgongs te yi dwags par+b+ba re zhes bya ba yul de'i rgyal po'i pho lha mabu rtsal che ba zhig yod pa'ang btul/ rgyal po'i btsun mo rnams dkyil 'khor mchod pa'i gzung ma'i ched du bkug pas rgyal po khros te dmag gi
104b7(rnying rgyud): tshogs dang bcas te byung ba la slob dpon gyis yungs kar gtar bas go cha dang mtshon cham khas pa tshig/ dmag thams cad kyang lus rangs/ ngag lkugs/ sems myos te shi la thug par gyur pa na skye bo thams cad kyis gsol ba btab bas slob
105a1(rnying rgyud): na kyis thas pa'i rnas pams pas skad cig pa bad par gnasas/ de nas rgyal ba 'thar ba rdzas kyis zhabs la zag brtsal nas bka' bzhin sgrub par byas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi stan bajug
105a2(rnying rgyud): shig gsungs/ bi d+ha/ ar+d+ha/ sud+d+ha zhes pa'i gtsug lag khang gsum bzhengs/ rab gnas slob dpon gyis mdzad/ ma ga d+ha nas sde snod gsum gyi mkhan po spyan drangs te bshad pa dang lag len rkang tshugs pa btsugs/ slob dpon
105a3(rnying rgyud): nyid kyis rgyal po 'khor bcas la gdams pa mang du gsungs/ skal ba dang ldan pa drug la rgyud drug bshad/ de drug po yang grub pa thob/ yul so sor lha khang mang du bzhengs/ de ltar yul der lo bcu gnyis su bzhugs nas mthar bla gos
105a4(rnying rgyud): kyis gshog pa'i tshul mdzad de nam mkha'i lam la gya gyur gshegs te/ lho nub srin po'i gling du bzhud do zer/ yul der phra men ma rnams dam bzhag dang po mdzad dus kyi me thab phrag las bcos pa yod/ gnyis pa'i skabs mkha' 'gro ma rnams
105a5(rnying rgyud): la phur bu btab pa'i rjes stong phrag tsam dang / grub pa'i phur bu gzhan rnams yal nas med kyang / gcig ma 'ongs pa'i spyod yul du bzhag pa mi'i lus bongs su ma 'gyur tsam yod pa rdo shing zangs lcags sogs gang yin mtshon du med pa zhig yod
105a6(rnying rgyud): skad do// gling der slob dpon chen po pad+ma'i lugs kyi sngags gzhung rnams dang bar yod cing / dges rdor dang / blagasang thig le dang / dpal mchog rnams shin tu dang / phyes su rgya gar lho phrogs pa bud+d+ha nA thag byas kyang der phebs shing
105a7(rnying rgyud): slob dpon blo gros bzang po la slob dpan pad+ma lugs kyi dgyes rdor dang / bde mchog gi dbang bskur ba dang / rgyud kyi bshad pa mang po zhus shing gzhan yang phur ba dang / khro bcu'i rgyud dang / rta mgrin dang / yang dag dang / ma mo'i sgor sogs
105b1(rnying rgyud): na ma grags pa'i slad sde mang sa bzugs slong mad nam pa pon na daklu la ba da tho zhi'i nyan pa gang pas mgrus mashin dang sha sa pa k+ta' bar du 'dag/ pa pa rgyad sa mthu das sa nas pa panamanam 'ad da la nga
105b2(rnying rgyud): ba dpa na rad+na shI las zhus/ des ka ya rba bi N+Da la gdams/ 'di kyi rdor 'grel pa kha sbyar dri med mdzad mkhan de yin/ des dur ha ri lag dmas/ des rdo rje gdan pa che ba lagadams/ des rdo rje gdan pa bar pa lag dmas/ de nas
105b3(rnying rgyud): dpon at+ma ka ri slob ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa las byung ba yin la/ de bzhin du las kyi phyag rgya'i bka' yang slob dpan 'dis sus la la gnang / de la gras la b+ha nga chung bas zas/ de la slob dpon a si ta g+ha nas zhus/ de la ye shes
105b4(rnying rgyud): bshes gnyin gyis thus nas dem bzhin byungs seMn cing dka bab de rnams pazhugs pa'i slob dpon nam dag chen pa 'ang nyid gikyis 'grangs su don kyis 'gyur ba ldan na/ ma rje phyogs pa 'ang bklung gter gnyis kyi babadz+ra
105b5(rnying rgyud): dang po ni/ slob dpon hU~M ka ra la thugs mi bgyod pa'i rigs he rug gal po sogs yang dag thugs kyi bka' babs te/ slob dpon 'di ni bal po'i yul du bram ze'i rigs su 'khrungs shing rig byed sngags dang mu stegs kyi gzhung lugs la'ang
105b6(rnying rgyud): shin tu mkhas shing nus pa'ang thob/ phyis sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mchog tu dad pas yul dbus san la n+dar slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes dang paN+Di ta sma gcan 'dzin bzang po las rab tu byung / pha rol phyin pa nas bzung gsang sngags phyi nang gi
105b7(rnying rgyud): bar gyi bos pas rgyud sbyangs/ dbang bskur ba nod cing gdams pa dang rjes su gdams pa mtha' dag gnang / khyad par dpal he n+yaka'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i tshe me tog blo hU~M mdzad la phog/ yun ring du bsgoms pas rim pa gnyis
106a1(rnying rgyud): te 'dzim zad par can gyis ga/ tha ba drug tusgrub pa byas pas dngas gab thob par dgangs tra lus sa gdam pa thamasangs ldan pa 'dan du 'drags kyi phyag tu nya kya bzhag
106a2(rnying rgyud): sa tshugs ga 'an ga sa pacal bad pa pas la ba ngas pa / ra cang grub nan/ dedag pa pa'i rigs sarnapas cad nyid mas lam sa sa
106a3(rnying rgyud): ma du
106a4(rnying rgyud): nye bar bsten pa dang / srub pa rnams phra ba drug gi reng byas pas ya rang 'i chos brgyad kyi tho rangs kyi dus su nam mkha' la tsug sa chen po zag badz+ra ha drag sogs dkyil 'bar thams cad kyang mngon sum du mtha/ sgrub pa chen po'i lam gyis phyag tu chen po chog
106a5(rnying rgyud): gi dngos gru thob bo// sgyu 'thul lam rim las// zhag ni sum cu zag drug dang // bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis// dbang sbyar rig kyi dam pa 'brub// ces bshad pa'i sa ma'o// slob dpon 'dis pa kye jogs gsum dang thugs chud
106a6(rnying rgyud): gzhan gyis kyang 'gro ba mang po'i don mdzad la/ yang dag ru lug ser phreng dang sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor gyi man dag yan lag pakri'i don snang bar byed pa dang / khrag 'thung chen po'i sgrub thabs yang dag par grub pa sogs rim pa gnyis kyi bstan bcos kyang mngang/
106a7(rnying rgyud): mdzad nas mthar gyis spu lus de nyid kyis sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i zhing du khrung gi rgyal po 'phur ba ltar bzhud do// 'di las bskyed rim gyi bka' rnams slob dpon sa btu ti pa dang / oM rgyan gyi slob dpon sangs rgyas dpal zhi bas thu/
106b1(rnying rgyud): las rdo rje gangan pa chen po so re bas zhus shing de las slob dpon chen pa 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pa slob ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa 'ablangs pa yin no// slob dpon 'jam dpal ba shes gnyen la skra rnam snang gi rigs 'jam dpal khros pa gsang rgyad pa
106b2(rnying rgyud): sogs gshin je gshed kyi bka' rnams babs te/ slob dpon 'di yang rgya gang nub phyogs rim pa gnyis pa zhes bya ba'i grong khyer du ya bsA d+ha swa sI dang yum snang ba sgron me zhes bya ba'i skas su 'khrungs/ rig byed lan lag dang bcas pa la mkhas pa zhig ste slob
106b3(rnying rgyud): chen po ro langs thal mdog la sogs pa las sngags kyi nang gi dbang bsur ba dang / gdams ngagasran mong dang thun mong ma yin pa thams cad kyang thob/ slob dpon rol pa'i rdo rje las dgra ga dong 'jigs gsum sogs kyang gas na zer/ gang ltar thun mongag/
106b4(rnying rgyud): grub pa rnams nyams 'og tu chud cing zung 'drug gi go 'phang po per sheb na stod pa la gshegs pas su stegs kyi kha 'dzin mchog tucha ba'i rgyal po zhig grang ba chal zhon nas 'angs pa dang zam pa gcig gi steng du 'phrad pa na la mA ba thar res ma byung bar slob dpon gyis sdigs
106b5(rnying rgyud): mdzub bstan pas/ rgyal po glang po che dang bcas pa byed tshal du bkas te zam pa'i g.yas g.yon nas lhung ngo // der rgyal po'i 'khor rnams kyis bzod par gsol zhing gsol ba btab pas slar gsos te nang pa'i bstan pa la bkad// de yang ji skad du/
106b6(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten lha la phyug mi 'tshal// grang po byung yang lam mi bzar// kha nas gsang sngags rgyal po zlos// rkang pa brag rir thogs med 'gro// zhes pa'o// ji zhig na 'phags pa 'jam dpal dbyangs dang mi gnyis pa'i zung 'jug gi go 'phang mthon par
106b7(rnying rgyud): shegs pa yin cing 'jam dpal ya mAn+ta ka mngon sum du snang bas dbang bskur zhing rgyud dang man ngag thams cad bstan/ srul pa'i las gshin mang pos bskor ba byed cing srog snying yul/ ri ma la ya nas las bzhi tshong ba'i gser gyi glegs pa ma bai DUr+yas
107a1(rnying rgyud): rdzas ba gzugs pa na lugs sa dum gas 'dus pa lags sa sa gas sa nga/ gsapa pa da rlong dan nga da
107a2(rnying rgyud): btab // 'di sa gram ze phreng ba grub par grags pa de ltar nas padang na rgyun po thum pa skyed pa 'bras yin pa mngan zhing sa pa dpon de nyid kyang mang mdapas kyi sa/ sngags grang las rgyas brtan pA las na pa nas rang sa seMs yang ma
107a3(rnying rgyud): du sa smra nas / ba pa sudus ma ngadu da/ tha da/
107a4(rnying rgyud): gyu pa ma ma sag shi ga ma pa / sa ga yi me rgyas rnam pa mas pa Sh+T+ri shA kyig gang na da / na ca su ba
107a5(rnying rgyud): ba ga ma ga nigs pazlasarnamapa na/ des na de ga 'jig 'i sa sab ba po na // sa pa za sa ma ya
107a6(rnying rgyud): ra bstod kya gas pa 'i de kyi pa pan sa pa ma da pa sa canapa smra gas pa thas stong bzhis pa drug pa nas pa dang / dang cwan pa mnad rnam par dgas bltar nas
107a7(rnying rgyud): kyang gyi ba nga sa pa ga pa'i rgyang ba dang/ das pa dang / badz+ra me'i tig pasags rdzun rnas grangs gzhin yang mang ze rdzas/ na la sas das tha ga mam can/ hUM ba
107b1(rnying rgyud): ga ma kun na nasas na na rdzun ra tu rgyu dus sapa smras sun sa dag/
107b2(rnying rgyud): ma pa badzin na sring ga na 'i khanam ma te/ bdag 'di rnas la pa pa sa pa
107b3(rnying rgyud): rnya / na sa / 'du pa sa pas rgyad ga
107b4(rnying rgyud): lha 'phrul labyed par dumapas shing snying po'i la pa lag gsungaganas ston dang / bla ma ring pras pa tsun ses dang / ye lag gi sbyin 'gre dang / brtan rje pa'i bzlas grel dang / shes pa gyu byed de/ rib 'gasas ba
107b5(rnying rgyud): nubasam brdzun dang / byin cig dang / ga sa/ ma pa/ klus tsun sa mang ba mjas/ kyis rgya pa rgya tu rnams kyi / tsa da ya
107b6(rnying rgyud): da thabs sa ma 'i ga nga pa bye 'dukyis mang bu sardzug cacan po pa mtho / khyo ma du ma da pa'i gas kyang bad/ gnad kyi go sa sa ba slas dus slo pa pad
107b7(rnying rgyud): kyi nga byos te tsha rtsams pa dri 'i'i rgyab ya rje spyod pa nye dus grub pa da ba pa' ba ba kyis carnams / sas brjig nyis dang yi rgal bani bags dpa sa tu/
108a1(rnying rgyud): slob dpon pa b+ha ha sti la'ang kI la ya'i rgyud kyar bco brgyad gsan par grags shing phrin las phur pa'i bka' rnams na lus pa'i bdag nyid du gyur/ de rnams slob dpon so sos rang gis nyams su grangs shing
108a2(rnying rgyud): skal pa dang ldan pa'i gdul bya gzhan la'ang rgya cher bshad do// gnyis pa gter ma'i phyogs ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje chos kyis srub sde spyi bye brag rnams glegs bam du bkod pa re zhig me'i 'jig rten du bstan pa'i yul ma gzigs nas ma
108a3(rnying rgyud): 'gro las kyi dbang mo che la gtad/ des sgrub pa bka' brgyad kyi spyi rgyud lnga dang / dgos rgyud bcu rnams rin po che sna brgyad kyi sbom bur bcug dgos rgyud rnams tha dad pa'i sbom bur bcug nas dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal gyi mchod rten bde byed legs
108a4(rnying rgyud): tsal du mi snang bar rgyas btab bo// dus kyis grub pa'i slob dpon chen po brgyad kyis mngon par shes pas shes te gnas der 'dus shing dgongs pa'i brtul zhugs bskyed de 'jig rten pa'i mkha' 'gro ma dang dregs pa'i tshogs rnams la bden pa'i tshig dang mthud
108a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i rdzas kyis bkrol/ gzhan don du dgongs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus mkha' 'gro ma las kyi dbang po che mngon sum du byon nas sgrom bu rnams blangs te/ che mchog gi bas slom bi ma la/ yang dag gi dngul sgom kA ra/ gshin rje'i lcags sbom
108a6(rnying rgyud): 'jam dpal bshes gnyen/ rta mgrin gyi zangs sgrom nAg rdzun/ phrar pa'i g.yu sbom pad+ma 'byung gnas/ ma mo'i bse sgom tan so kr-ita/ mchod bstod kyi mchod smos rab thagrAH/ drag sngags kyi gzi sgrom zhi ba'i snying po rnams la
108a7(rnying rgyud): sa mar gtad de rang rang gi don la mkhas shing sngags kyi dngos bu'i brnyes par gyur pa yin te/ rin pa che sa brgyad kyi sgros bra las bde gshegs 'dus pa chom phra gcig tu 'dus pa'i rgyud dang man ngag gi bka' rnams byung bslab dpon pasgral babs pa yin no//
108b1(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa rdzogs pa a nu yo ga'i skor rnams gsang ba'i bdag pos rgyal po dza'am lung bstan rdo rje la dbang bskur zhing bstan pa thams cad kyi don thugs su chud pa yin mod/ 'on kyang tshur mthong gi ngor gsang sngags la rang dgar 'jug pa dgag pa'i
108b2(rnying rgyud): phyir mi'i rig 'dzin dge bsnyen li tsa bI dri med grags pa brten pa'i tshul gyis dbang bskur ba dang tshig gi bstan pa thams cad kyang zhus/ spyi mdo'i 'grel pa sogs bstan bcos kyang mdzad/ des sngar li tsa bI la brten pa'i dus kyi grogs slob dpon A
108b3(rnying rgyud): dadad ngas gi sras shwA kra pu tri dang / nA ga pu tri dang / gu h+ya pu tri gsum la srul pa'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur zhing gdams ngag kyang bstan/ u pa rA dza la shrI d+ha na'i gling du dpal ldan 'bras spangs sam mchod rten dpal yan can du dbang bskur zhad chud
108b4(rnying rgyud): gtad do// grong khyer skyid pa'i 'byung gnas su rang gi sras gsum la dbang bskur/ de yang shA kra pu tri ni in+d+ra b+hU ti chung bar grags pa de yin/ 'dis grub pa brnyes pa'i tshe slob dpon lwa ba par grags pa yin zer/ lhan rtsig skyes grub kyi
108b5(rnying rgyud): 'grel pa las kyang de ltar bshad de/ gang ltar 'khor lo sdom pa sogs rgyud sde 'ga' zhig in+d+ra b+hU ti sa lam srol dbye bar mdzad pas bram ze rin chen rdo rje sogs brgyad srol de'i rjes 'brang yin no// de yang rgya gar gyi pa ma gyis byon pa 'ga' zhig gis
108b6(rnying rgyud): slob dpon la pa pa de rgyal po'i sras zhig yin/ yul yang o rgyan gyi nang tshan zhig yin ces gsungs pa ltar na in+d+ra b+hU ti chung ba yin kyang rung ste/ des thog mar sngags kyi slob dpon chen po zhig las dbang bskur ba nod cing gdams pa bsgoms pa
108b7(rnying rgyud): ye shes rtogs par gyur pa na dus gzhan zhig tu o rgyan gyi d+hu ma s+thir mkha' 'gro ma'i grong khyer du song bas mu stegs kyi mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis me tog gi phreng ba lag tu gtad pa de blangs pas sangs rgyas pa'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis bu me tog blangs pa
109a1(rnying rgyud): ma legs/ dmu stegs kyi rjes su 'jug dgos na zer/ der slob dpon gyis ting nge 'dzin bsgoms shing bzhugs pas na ma phyed tsam na mu stegs kyi mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis rdo char pha nga bskyed rim gyi srung
109a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor bsgom pa'i mtshams tshun la ma gnod/ bskyed rim gyi phan yon de 'dran rdzogs rim gyi nus pa bstan par bya'o dgongs nas mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas rdo thams cad nam mkha' la chags so// deng sang yang oM rgyan gyi yul slob dpon
109a3(rnying rgyud): 'di'i sgrub phug gi steng gi nam mkha' la pha wang chen po rten med du yod pa dang / prag me long ltar 'jam pa'i ngos la'ang pha wang mang po chags pa mngon sum gyi spyod yul du gyur pa yod/ lan cig rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo zung kho dar gzim nas bzhugs shing
109a4(rnying rgyud): pho brang du phyin pa thams cad slob dpon la phyag ma byas na byin pa rengs 'gro ba kho na byung bas thams cad kyis phyag byas nas 'gro dgos 'byung / gzim log pa'i yun ni lo grangs bcu gnyis yin te slob dpon gyi ni 'od gsal thun gcig go// skabs shig o rgyan gyi
109a5(rnying rgyud): yul gyi phra men ma lnga brgyas slob dpon la bar chad brtsam par 'dod nas btsal bas slob dpon gyi shul dul ba gcig las gzhan mi 'dug pas/ kye ma dge slong 'di'i sgyu ma la ltos/ rang gi lus lwa bar bsgyur nas 'dug na 'di dum bu so sor bgos nas bza' bar
109a6(rnying rgyud): 'o// zhes/ lwa ba de dum bu lnga brgyar byas nas zos so// der slob dpon gyis lus snang bar byas te de rnams la da mod pa bor bas phra men ma lnga brgya po rnams lug ma mo lnga brgyar gyur/ de rnams rgyal po'i drung du song nas dge slong dur khrod bdag pos bad
109a7(rnying rgyud): cag rnams 'di ltar byas pas lhas dgrol ba'i thabs 'tshal lo zer/ der rgyal pos slob dpon la zhus pas slob dpon gcer bur bzhengs nas rgyal po khyod kyi yul gyi sngags 'chang ma rnams kyis/ dge slong la nor la ba gcig yod pa'ang zos so//
109b1(rnying rgyud): bas na sngags 'chang ma rnams khrag cig gsungs/ der thams cad bkug nas re re la sdigs mdzub re bstan pas mgo brnyan sna tshogs su gyur nas lwa ba'i dum bu so sor spyugs so// de dag tshe ma bu byas pas cung zad ma 'gri // dazung gsum yod
109b2(rnying rgyud): ba khu gcig gsungs pas btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na'ang gsum yod pa'ang bkug nas snga ma bzhin skyugs sra bcug pas 'grigs nas su la gsol pas rje btsun lnga ba bar grags shing / gzhan yang 'di dang rgyal po in+d+ra b+hU ti gnyis kyis grub pa thob pa'i rtags kyir
109b3(rnying rgyud): rnams la bstan pa'i lo rgyas dang / slob dpon rol pa'i rdo rje thun mong gi dngos grub thob pa'i skabs shig o rgyan gyi yul du slob dpon 'di dang lhan cig par gyon pas ri murbaN+Da ka la rdzu 'phrul 'gran pa'i lo rgyas sogs shin tu mang bar yod cing rol pa'i rdo rjes kyang
109b4(rnying rgyud): slob dpon 'di la phyag mdzad pa dang gdams pa zhus pa'i 'og tu mchog gi dngos grub thob pa yin zhes grags shing / phyag chen thig le'i sgor rnams kyang 'di dus swa oM rgyan gyi yul du dar ba yin/ gyis o D+yan gyi yul der rgyal po dang slob dpon gnyis char gyis
109b5(rnying rgyud): gdams pa bstan pas thams cad rig pa 'dzin par gyur nas o rgyan gyi yum de tsam du che ba'ang stongs su nye bar gyur skad/ 'di gong du smos pa'i rgyal po dza'i sras in+d+ra b+hU ti chung ba 'khor tshom bu dang bcas pa rig pa 'dzin par gyur par gsungs pa dang don gcig
109b6(rnying rgyud): gam snyam mo// de ltar in+d+ra b+hU ti chung bas seng ha pu tra dang ku kur dza phyi ma gnyis la rgya mtsho'i 'gram du dbang bskur zhing rgyud bshad/ phyi mas slob dpon chen po ro langs bde ba la dbang bskur zheng bshad/ 'di sbal pa'i su dga' rab
109b7(rnying rgyud): rje'i mtshan gyi rnam grangs so// 'di yan chad kyi brgyud pa de rnams rang rang gi 'khor tshom bu khri phrag lnga nas gcig gi par gyi thams cad kyang spos bcas kyi spyod pa tshogs kyi sgrub pas zung 'jug gi srub nyes te mi snang ba gyur da / slong dpo ngas slob dpon bzhed pa la sraHsa
110a1(rnying rgyud): sa du dbang bslar na sh+yad kyang bshad/ des kyang das rtson pa'i mas kyis mchog gdang snyas bco cing nal 'byor rig pa'i nyi ba zhes bya pa'i bstan pa rgyas mdo'i bab lam gtan la dbapa bsreg sang pa dang / rnams na
110a2(rnying rgyud): til gyu ra na'i yul gyi makrung sa m+bu'i 'amam nga dbang bskur ba dang thud bshad/ 'di sngar thos pa bzhin da byung ba'i mtshan shAs 'ang byas grags shing / des slob ma thag 'od chung ba dang / shAs ba shes gnyen dang / gags dge gapa
110a3(rnying rgyud): bstun/ bar pa 'di rnal 'byor rgyud la shin tu mkhas pas de nyid 'dus pa'i 'grel ba ko sa la'i rgyan ces bya ba yul ko sa lar brtsams shing khong nyid kyis tha ma bcu gcig tsam la zhus par bshad cing skra tshe'i slang du kha cher byon nas 'gro don cher med de/ gyi ma
110a4(rnying rgyud): ni slob dpon chen po bad+ma sam+ba pa'i mtshan gyi rnam grangs te/ nges lha'i bshos khang dgu thog tu slob dpon d+ha na rak+Shi ta la bshad/ 'dis mdo'i rnam grangs 'chad pa'i bstan bcos mdzad/ des oM rgyan gyi rdo rje'i phrag tu slob dpon hUM mdzad la bshad
110a5(rnying rgyud): 'dis rtsa chung la rgya bdun 'grel pa dang / rnal 'byor sa'i sgron ma la sogs mdo'i bstan bcos mang po mdzad/ rgya gar dang ta sig gi mtshams a su ra'i brag phug tu phyag rgya mo ga ga sid+d+hi la brten nas sgrub pa mdzad pas rig pa 'dzin pa'i spar gyur/
110a6(rnying rgyud): de'ang lus mi sdang ba ni bcud len dang / thig le dbab bzung dang / sgron ma rlung gi 'khor lo sogs 'jig rten pa'i lam las kyang 'byung mod/ 'di dag ni mthong lam rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes te rgya'i spyod pa la brten nas rnam srin gyi lus 'od gsal du gnas
110a7(rnying rgyud): yin pas khyad par che bar shes par bya'o// slob dpon des bde ba gsal mdzad la grong khyer dpal yod can du dbang bskur zhing spyad gtang/ 'dis slob dpon d+ha ka ra la 'angags na/ rig sngags grub pas rig pa 'dzin pa'i slar gyur/ mdo'i yig
110b1(rnying rgyud): swa bco brgyad dang rnal 'byor gyi rim pa beg chen sgron ma sogs mdzad/ des skal ba mchog dang ldan pa'i thugs sras bzhi la bshad de/ ma ga d+har mdo'i mkhan po d+harmA bo d+hi la bshad/ 'dis mdo'i don bslab dang / shes rab sngon mngan
110b2(rnying rgyud): bkol mdo rnams mdzad/ shrI na la n+dar mkhan po d+harma rA dza pA lar dbang bskur zhing rgyud rnams bshad/ bal po'i rgyal po pa su d+ha ra dang gtsug lag dpal dge gnyis la rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer du dbang bskur zhing rgyud kyi bshad pa bstsal/ khyi ma gsum
110b3(rnying rgyud): pos slob dpon d+ha narak+Shi ta las kyang gsan ces grags/ bshad ma thag pa'i brgyud pa de thams cad ni dbang bka' dang / bshad bka' dang / man ngag gi bka' thams cad 'dus pa'i brgyad pa yin no// yang slob dpon de gsum kas b+ha sha'i slob dpo
110b4(rnying rgyud): btsan skyes la yul dbus su dbang bskur zhing rgyud bshad/ bsgoms pas grub pa thob pa la gyis slob dpon tan rati ta pra sha'i yul bu spyan drangs shing mdo dgongs 'dus la sogs pa bsgyur bar brtsams pa na mos pa chung bas ma 'gyur te bal yul du gyon/ pa sa d+ha
110b5(rnying rgyud): dang nam po ti la bshad/ gyis pra shA'i yul du d+ha rma po d+hi dang d+han ra Ni ta'i drung du thob dngan che ba can gyis kyis bu ga'i skang dang yi ger bgyur ro// / gsum pa rdzogs pa chen po a ti yo ga'i skar ni/ gang gi tshi bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag
110b6(rnying rgyud): phyag na rdo rjes ri rab kyi bya 'phyogs dur khrod me ri 'bar bar mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'phro ma dang / grub pa dang / rig pa 'dzin pa'i tshogs la gsang ba sngags kyi chos ston pa de'i tshe 'phags yul nub phyogs o rgyan gyi yul d+han ko sa'i gling zhes bya bar ko sha zhes pa'i
110b7(rnying rgyud): srog chags lus mi la gdong dred kyi rnam pa slar mo lcags kyis gtams pa kho nas gang zhi tsan+dan la sogs shing ljon pa mang pos bskor ba'i phyir de skad du grags so// zhes kyang byung / yul der bde byed partsegs pa zhes bya ba'i lha'ang chen po gcig la lha khang chung du snying bug
111a1(rnying rgyud): brgya brgyad kyis bskor ba dpal dang 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas su rgyal po u ba rA dza dang btsun mo snang ba gsal ba'i 'od ldan pa zhes bya ba gnyis la sras lo su d+harma bya ba rab tu byung nas yun ring por ma lon par bsnyen
111a2(rnying rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i dge slong ma zhig yul de nas dpag tshad tsam 'das par gser gyi bye ma padal ba'i rgya mtsho'i gling zhig tu rtswa'i skyil bu chung ngu zhig la gnas te g.yog mo bde ba'i snying ldan ma bya ba dang lhan cig tu rnal 'byor bsgoms shing gnas pa'i tshe rub gcig dge slong ma'i rmi lam du mi
111a3(rnying rgyud): dkar po dri ma dang bral ba zhig gis shel gyi bum pa oM AHhUM swA hA'i yi ges rgyas btab pa gcig spyi bor lan gsum bzhag pas bum pa de las 'od 'phros pas khams gsum po gsal bar ma thong ba zhig rmis/ de nas mi ring bar dge slong ma la rdzogs pa chen po lha yul du
111a4(rnying rgyud): dar bar byed pa rdo rje sems dpa'i sgral sku lha'i bu sems lhag can rgyal ba'i sras su btsas so// de'i tshe dge slong ma nyid shin tu ngo tsha nas mi rigs pa chen por mthong ste// pha med bu 'di 'jig rten 'dre bas gzhan na su// 'jig rten bdud dam tshangs pa la
111a5(rnying rgyud): sogs sam// rgyal po btsan nam dmu la sogs pa'i rigs// khams gsum dag na 'dod ldan su zhig yin// gal te lha dang lha min sna tshogs gzugs// 'di ltar byang ba'i dpe ni sras mthong med// rgyal khams chos med 'di ni su la srid/
111a6(rnying rgyud): kye ma/ bdag ni khrims gtsang 'gro las rgyal 'dod pas// 'di ni log sred 'gro bas dpyas 'gyur sdig re che// zhes pa la sogs sde sngags mang du bton nas g.yog mo des 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi sras yin pas de ltar mi rig so zhes sbas kyang mnyan par
111a7(rnying rgyud): thal dong du bsgyur/ de'i tshe sgra dang 'od la sogs pa'ang byung bar gyur to// gang gi tshe zhag gsum song ba na ci yang mnyes par 'dug pa mthong nas skul pa yin par shes te bkur sti chen po dang bcas pas spyan drangs pa na bar snang nas lha rnams kyis/ mgon
111b1(rnying rgyud): po ston pa bcom ldan 'das// rang bzhin sdang mdzad 'jig rten mgon// bdag kyang rab tu skyabs pa dang // nam mkha rdo rje dang bdag gsal// zhes ched du rjod par byed cing mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / lha dang / kla nga/
111b2(rnying rgyud): gnod sbyin la sogs pa'i 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis kyang mchod pa'i yo byad du mas rjed par byed do/ zhag bdun song ba na sras kyis yum la/ kye ma bdag gi sa pa N+Di ta rnams la chos kyi gtam slob par 'tshal na yum bdag la ci bder gnang ba stsol cig
111b3(rnying rgyud): zhes gsung ba na yum gyis bu khyod ni shin tu gzhon gyis paN+Di ta rnams mkhas shing gzhung pas khyod kyis thub par dka'o// cis kyang bgyi bar gsol ba na/ sngar smyos pa'i rgyal po'i mchod gnas su mkhas pa lnga brgya yod pa de dang chos kyi gtam gyis shig
111b4(rnying rgyud): de nas sras kyi yul de nyid du byon nas rgyal po dang mjal nas lo rgyas snga ma bzhin bsnyad do// rgyal pos kyang khye'u 'di na gzhon pas paN+Di ta rnams dang chos kyi gtam 'ong bar dka' mod kyi/ 'on kyang lus la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan mang po bdug pas sbal pa
111b5(rnying rgyud): yin kyang srid snyam nas mchod gnas rnams la tshul de bzhin bsnyad pas de rnams gsung ma mthun pa las mkhyen pa che ba gcig gis/ ltas shin tu bzang ba zhig kyang byung / byis pa de yang thor dang sprul pa yin te 'od gsungs nas mjal ba na paN+Di ta rnams la
111b6(rnying rgyud): phyag mdzad cing 'gro gleng dang brgal brtag gi rim pa mang du mdzad pas paN+Di ta rnams kyi spobs pa bcom pas zhabs spyi bor blangs shing bkur sti rgya chen pos mchod nas pradz+nyA b+ha ba zhes mtshan gsol/ rgyal po'ang shin tu ngo mtshar zhing dga' bas slob dpon chen po dag la
111b7(rnying rgyud): rab rdo rje zhes bya bar mtshan btags/ sngar yul gyis thal dong du bsgyur yang mnyes pa la ngo mtshar bas ngo langs bde ba'am ro langs thal mdog tu gsol/ de nas byang phyogs ri bo nyi ma rab tu snang byed ces bya bar brag ri shin tu 'jigs pa yi dwags kyi tshogs mngon
112a1(rnying rgyud): sum du rgyu ba zhig gi steng du rtsa'i kyil bur lo sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bar du ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs pa'i tshe/ sa lan bdun du g.yos shing nam mkha' las mu stegs kyi bstan pa nyams par byas so zhes pa'i sgra grag pa pos
112a2(rnying rgyud): pas mu stegs kyi rgyal pos gshed ma btang nas slob dpon bkrong bar brtsam na nam mkha'i lam nas gshegs pa mthong bas rgyal po 'khor bcas mchog tu dad nas sangs rgyas pa'i bstan pa la zhugs so// de nas theg pa phyi nang gi sde snod rnams dang / khyad par
112a3(rnying rgyud): sa sa du nas gas na ma ma da
112a4(rnying rgyud): ma la ya'i rin chen srungs pa rgyas pa'i rtse mor slob dpon nyid dang / rdo rje dbyings kyi mkha' 'gro ma 'jig rten bde ba'i ro dang ldan pa dang / bde byed ser mo yon tan mtha' yas pa'i mkha' 'gro ma gsum gyis lo gsum gyi bar du tshig dang yi ge dkar chag tu btab/
112a5(rnying rgyud): rang phyung rang bab kyi yi ge sprul pa'i sku dang bcas pa phyin ci ma log par legs par bkod nas mkha' 'gro ma mngon par 'byung ba'i phug tu bzhugs su gsol/ dus gzhan zhig tu rdo rje gdan gyi byang shar mtshams dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal zhes bya ba dbus su mchod
112a6(rnying rgyud): rten chen po yod cing gdug pa'i mkha' 'gro ma dang sems can rab tu gdug pa du ma'i gnas su gyur pa zhig tu byon nas mkha' 'gro ma nyi ma'i 'od zer la sogs dpag tu med pa la chos ston cing bzhugs pa na slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen la 'phags pa 'jam dpa' rnom
112a7(rnying rgyud): pos lung bstan te/ kye rigs kyi bu/ 'bras bu tshe gcig la sangs rgyas par 'dod na dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal du song zhig/ ces gsungs pas/ 'jam dpal ba shes gnyen gyis dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal du byon nas slob dpon dga' rab rdo rje
112b1(rnying rgyud): mjal zhing lo bdun cu rtsa lnga'i bar du chos nyan cing / gdams pa dang rjes su gdams pa mtha' dag pa bstsal nas chu ba dan tig bya bar slob dpon chen po zag pa med pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad do// de'i tshe 'jam dpal ba shes gnyen
112b2(rnying rgyud): gyis/ kye mgyi hud kye mthong // zhes pa la sogs gdung tshig lan gsum brtson pas nam mkhar 'od phung gi dkyil nas slob dpon gyis sgra mngon sam rba snang bar mdzad nas gser gyi za ma tog se na gang ba gcig phyag tu babs pas tshig gsum ga/ na du brdeg pa
112b3(rnying rgyud): 'das rjes kyi gdams pa bzhag go// de nas slob dpon chen po 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i grangs las rdzogs pa chen po sde gsum du phyes te/ sems gnas rnams la sems kyi sde// bya bral rnams la grong gi sde// gnad gtsob
112b4(rnying rgyud): la man ngag sde gsum dang / de las kyang khyad par du bsdus pa thig le rang gnad du dbab pa 'di las spyan brgyad dang bshad rgyud gnyis su phyes nas snyan bachud rnams mtshan du btang / bshad rgyud snying thig gi bka' rnams re zhig gtad pa'i snod ma rnye da nas rdo rje gdan gyi byang sha ra ba wang
112b5(rnying rgyud): do tsags gyis rgyas btab pa'i 'og thasmras te mi sna byar byas/ slob dpa na nyid do gdan gyi drub phyigs du bad zin pasas ming drag shegs shing der mi sdug pa'i maba' 'tho ma rnams dang sems can pagra sa med pa dang snad pa 'a gnas pa'i sgrub pa pa yang mang chub
112b6(rnying rgyud): rnams la chos ston cing lo brgya rdza dgu'i bar shing nge 'dzin la bzhugs sa/ srib dpan 'di'i skyob ma ni dkyil 'khor chen po'i danas pa dpon sangs rgyas y-i shes skabs yin cing thog mar tho ba dpon pa la cu ri pa dang / oM rgyan gyi mabang por smrig pa rdo dang /
112b7(rnying rgyud): 'byor ma gru ne su sogs tha ma mang po bstan nas gsang sngags kyi tshul rnams mang dugs na/ yo byad rnams kyug 'dzin dang nor rgyun mas sbyor/ lan cig kong ka na'i slob dpon pA li ta pA lo dgu'i bar brten cing 'dus pa'i rgyud tshar bco brgyad mnyan kyang de kho na
113a1(rnying rgyud): pa na sa ga/ nan tu sa sa gdus sa/
113a2(rnying rgyud): spyod bas drug ste bco bcang du bsgrubs pas dpon nyid rtags par 'ad na 'phags pa'ang sa dpal ladzes shig ces kyang bstan byung bas na medapapa ba rdzas thams papa pa gas dgang nyin rdzogs sum ngamang ban// ma thang ma
113a3(rnying rgyud): tsogazhig gi ngams nu dum dpas ba shes gnyen gyim btsun nanas cagags kyi po thus pa bud med ngan po gcig dang shAn cigazhing ma par garigs pas byung bdam dang/ de'i 'thas zhig tu po dkar ba na ma zhig gang hal nas 'ju/ deb
113a4(rnying rgyud): drus pa thams pamang nyom slong bzhig la/ yur ba nas te zhig brgya te the mo mabyin/ des skyugs pa sgob dpon la zangs pa rnam par rtag pas ma spangs pas/ kyi bzhinade/ dngas tha grang pa nam nyin / zas pabang po rmongs pas
113a5(rnying rgyud): te gzhan sdig tu mdag/ de byung me de sa 'ams can dang dang sams solanas 'thabar brtsams pas/ nga'i nyis byis pas tho na ra/ sang zhinas nga shi 'azhugs tegs ngas bad pa pa sems sa mang po dang ti rnam ba'i
113a6(rnying rgyud): gar mo ba bud dang thad med des par mi dga' ba'i rnam 'gyur byas ngas/ 'dis gzhan sems shes par nga'adrug dgongs ti thos pas sa par nus pa rgyas migs/ daci byam btsun dang mam la gan pa yang sa/ na ma pa thong pas rnam thamam
113a7(rnying rgyud): chen ga ma sa nga bya pa mgad pa sa sa pas ca gas gsus/ gzhan pa / byed
113b1(rnying rgyud): dbang bslar dgos gsungs nas khang pa zhig tu song / srod kyi dus su slob dpon nang du bos pa la/ 'jam pa'i rdo rje lha bcu dgu'i dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i drung na khyim btsun bud med khyi mo dang bcas pa sdang ste dbang sA la len gsungs pas/ dkyil 'khor ba
113b2(rnying rgyud): lo zhus pas 'o na longs shig gsungs te gsum ka khang pa gzhan zhig tu song dkyil 'khor yang mi snang bar gyur/ der slob dpon thugs skyo ste/ khyod ni sems can kun gyi yab gcig la sogs gdung pa'i lus kyis gsol ba btab pas slar yang sngar bzhin
113b3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor sprul te dbang bskur/ rdzogs pa chen po sems sde'i man ngag bshad pas rtogs pa nam mkha' dang mnyam par gyur/ 'jam dpal zhal lung zhes rim pa gnyis kyi de kho na nyid bsgom pa 'di nyid slob dpon gyis sbad pa po'i tshul mdzad pa yin/ des chos
113b4(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi gting sleb/ thog mar khyis skyugs pa'i zas dang khyim btsun gyi spyod pa sogs la ma dad pa'i rten 'brel gyis sku lus de nyid kyis mchog gi dngos grub ma thob kyang bar dor rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang mngon du mdzad pa yin zhes grags/ sngar bsrung ba'i zhabs
113b5(rnying rgyud): kyis kyang slob dpon 'di las gdams pa zhus pas grub pa thob bo// bstan bcos kyang grol ba'i thig le dang / sgrub thabs kun bzang sogs shin tu mang bar mdzad/ slob dpon 'di'i rdzogs rim gyi man ngag sngon chad bod du 'gyur ba rnams sems sde kho na'i grang
113b6(rnying rgyud): mtha' gtsang sing de bar gnas shing rgya mtshan des rjes 'brangs slob ma'i tshogs dang bcas po'ang rdzogs pa chen po'i don gyi brgyad par 'gro la/ 'ga' zhig gis slob dpon shrI se d+ha yang 'di nyid kyi mtshan gyi rnam grangs su 'dod pa thos shing lo rdzas kyi bab
113b7(rnying rgyud): 'gar brtag na de ltar yin tu rung snyam pa'ang 'dug go// dus de tsam na rgya nag po'i yul grong khyer sho khyam zhes bya bar khyim bdag dge ba'i yid can dang bud med snang ba gsal ba rab tu mkhyen ma zhes pa gnyis kyi sras slob dpon shrI si ha zhes bya ba sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang ldan
114a1(rnying rgyud): pa zhig lo bco lnga lon pa'i tshe slob dpon ha ri b+ha la las sgra tshad sogs bun mong gi rig pa rnams lo gsum du mnyan nas mkhas pa chen por gyur pa'i skabs shag nub phyogs kyi grong lngar gser gling pa bar 'gro ba'i lal bar du 'phags pa
114a2(rnying rgyud): spyan ras gzigs nam mkhar byon nas skal ldan 'bras bu nges par 'dod na rgya gar gyi dur khrod sos gling du song zhig/ ces lung bstan pas slob dpon nyid yid tshim par gyur te da dung 'bras bu bla na med pa de nyid go sla ba'i phyir gsang sngam kyi gud gzhan la'ang mkhas par byasnyam du dgo
114a3(rnying rgyud): te ri bo rtse lngar gdol pa'i rigs kyi slob dpon b+he la ki rtir sngags phyi nang gi chos rnams ma lus par gsan cing nyams 'og tu chud par mdzad/ rab tu phyung nas dge slong sde snod 'dzin pa mdzad cing lo sum cu'i bar du 'dul khrims kyi brtul zhugs su gnas/ sngar
114a4(rnying rgyud): yang 'phags pa'i lung gis sngon bzhin bskul bas rgya gar du bgrod pa'i lam la dka' ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul zhig bsgrub par bya dgongs te lo gsum du sgrub pa mdzad pas rig pa 'dzin pa'i skur gyur/ de nas zhabs sa la khru gang tsam gyis ma reg par dur khrod sos gling
114a5(rnying rgyud): gyon nal slob dpon chen po 'jam dpal bshes gnyen mngal zhing bla ma'i bya ba rnams byas/ rjes su gzung bar gsol ba btab pas bla mas kyang dgyes bzhin du gnang / lo nyer lnga'i bar la gdams pa dang rjes su gdams pa rnams bstsal ba'i 'og tu slob dpo
114a6(rnying rgyud): chen po nyid skra 'od phung du yal/ de'i tshe shrI siM has smre sngags kyi gdung dbyangs bton pas nam mkha' nas slob dpon gyis sku dngos su bstan te rin po che'i za ma tog sen gang ba gcig phyag tu gtad par sgom nyams drug pa zhes bya ba'i 'das rjes bab pas slob dpon nyid don gyi
114a7(rnying rgyud): gdeng dang ldan par gyur to// de'i 'og tu rgya ga nub phyogs gser gyis brgyan pa'i gling du slob dpon 'jam dpal ba shes gnyen brdzus te skyes pa la'ajam dpal bshes gnyen gyi mar grags shing / des slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas la sngags kyi nang thams cad gsungs
114b1(rnying rgyud): shing slob dpon sa byed pa la'ang rdzogs pa chen po bstan pas zag pa cas mi snang bar gyur skadang / de nas slob dpon bris has rdo rje gdan gyi 'og nas sngar sbas pa'i rgyud rnams bton ta n+ya nag tu gyon cing rdzogs pa chen pa man dgrag sbrul/ kyai skor/ nang / ga
114b2(rnying rgyud): gsang ba bla na med pa bzhir phyes nas skor snga ma gsum spos bcas kyi don du bsdebs nas byang chub shing gi lha khang bya 'dabs su gter du sbas/ gsang ba bla na med pa'i skor mkha' 'gro'i lung bstan pa ltar bkra shis khri sgo'i ka bar smon lam gyis rgyas btang ste sras
114b3(rnying rgyud): slob dpon nyid bsil byin zhes pa'i dur khrod chen por gdug pa'i mi ma yin rnams kyi bkur sti dang bcas pas ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so// de'i tshe 'phags yul nub phyogs glang po'i sgangad zhes bya bar yab khyim bdag bde ldan 'khor lo dang yum bdag nyid gsal rig
114b4(rnying rgyud): ma'i sras bi ma la mi tra zhes pa dang / shar phyogs ka ma shI la'i shar gyi grong khyer du yab gdol bzhi pa'i lag pa dang / yum dge ba'i sems can ma gnyis kyi sras ye shes mdo zhes bya ba gnyis shig bzhugs pa la dpal rdo rje sems dpa' mngon sum du byod nas/
114b5(rnying rgyud): rigs kyi bu gnyis/ khyed gnyis skye ba lnga brgyar paN+Di ta'i lus blangs shing dam pa'i chos spyad kyang 'bras bu sngar yang ma thob/ da yang mi 'thob pas tshe 'di nyid kyis zag bcas kyi phung po mi snang bar 'tshang rgya bar 'dod na rgya nag po'i byang chub shing drung gi lha khang du song zhig/
114b6(rnying rgyud): ces lung bstan pas bi ma la mi tras de nyid du lung dazed blangs te byon pas slob dpon shrI si d+hi mjal zhing lo nyi shu'i bar ba stan brgyad kyi nang gsang gsum gyi gdams pa ma lus par bsngal mod kyi/ 'on kyang de dag gi dpe ni ma gnang ngo // der bi ma la thugs tshims te slar rgya gar
114b7(rnying rgyud): nas dz+nyAn s+phuja la ji ltar gyur pa rnams bskyed pas khong nyid kyang 'bad rtsol chen pas bya nag tu byon nas mkha' 'gros srang bstan pa bzhin dur grong byer po bsel byin du slob dpon dang mngal/ lo gsum gyi bar bra ma'i byang ci rigs pas mnyes par mdad cing na bar gser
115a1(rnying rgyud): maN+Dal phul nas gdams pa gnang bar zhus pas lo dgu'i bar du snyan brgyad kyi gdams pa dpe dang bcas pa gnang / de tsam gyis thugs tshims te 'gyon par brtsams pan slob dpon gyis rab tu tshim mam gsangs pa
115a2(rnying rgyud): zhus pa na/ bla mas gtad pa med do// gsungs pas dz+nyA na su tra rtog pa skyes te da dung rab tu zab pa'i gdams pa gnang bar zhus pas 'di la dbang bskur thob dgos gsungs nas phyi spos bcas kyi dbang rdzogs par gnang nas gsang ba bla na med pa'i man ngag rnams
115a3(rnying rgyud): lo gsum gyi bar du gnang / de nas nyams su drang bar zhus pas spos med kyi dbang rdzogs par gnang zhing ri bo ko sa la'i rtse mor 'khor 'das chu shan dbye ba'i spyod pa mdzad cing rab tu spros med kyi dbang dang / rim pas shin tu spos med kyi dbang yang rdzogs par gnang / de nas
115a4(rnying rgyud): lo bcu drug tu nyams su blangs nas bsgoms/ slob dpon ni khyad par gyi spyod pa sna tshogs pas gnas shing dus gzhan zhig tu li yul gyi rgyal pos spyan drangs nas der bzhud pa'i zhag bdun na sgra dang lhas chen po byung bas ye shes mdzes seng gi nam mkha' la slob dpon bzhugs pa mtha
115a5(rnying rgyud): bas su mya ngan las 'das par shes te smre sngags kyi gdung tshig bton pas/ gzer bu bdun pa'i zhal chems phyag tu bab pa dang / snying thig gsang ba'i man ngag gi dpe rnams bkra shis khro sgo'i ka ba'i nang na yod pas de longs la dur khrod b+ha sing du song zhig/ ces lung
115a6(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'ang thos/ der dz+nyA na sU tras gsang ba'i dpe rnams bton nas rgya gar gyi dur khrod b+ha sid du byon cing der 'jig rten rang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro ma rnams la gsang ba snying thig gi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bzhin du bzhugs pa la de'i tshe bim la spyod
115a7(rnying rgyud): pa la gnas par mkha' 'gro'i lung gis/ kye skal phrin/ sde bas zab pa'i snying thig gi gdams pa bzhed na du rjod chen mo b+ha sing gi nags su song shig/ ces kyang bstan pa bzhin de de nyid du gyon pas dz+nyAn wang dang mngal zhing ches zab pa'i gdams pas rjes su gzung bar gsol
115b1(rnying rgyud): ba btab pas/ slob dpon gyis cho 'phrul sna tshogs pa snang bar mdzad cing spos bcas dang spos med kyi dbang rnams bsgyur/ ri bo snang byad kyi rtse mor 'khor 'das shan 'byed pa'i spyod pa dang / shin tu spos med kyis dbang rdzogs par mdzad pas thun mong ma yin pa'i rtogs
115b2(rnying rgyud): ngas// shangs kyi rtse mor yi ge a dkar po zag la khad pa gcig kyang byung / de nas rab tu spos med kyi dbang rdzogs par gnang bas sems kyi de nyid rjen par mthong / dbang de dag gi rim pa bzhin rdzogs pa chen po skor bzhi'i gdams pa dpe dang bcas pa ma lus pa ga
115b3(rnying rgyud): lo badz+ra'i bar la zhun par bcad cing de'i 'og tu dz+nyA na swa tra nyid 'od phung du yal ba rabi ma las smre sngags dang gdung dbyangs bton pas slar yang su mngon sum du snang bar mdzad nas rin po che'i za ma tog rin chen sna lngas rgyas btab pa gcig bskul ba phyag tu bab pa las bzhag thabs bzhi pa zhes pa'i
115b4(rnying rgyud): 'das rjes thob pas tshig la lhag chad med cing don la 'khrul pa med pa'i gdeng thob par gyur to// de nas slob dpon bi ma la shar phyogs ka ma ru'i grong khyer du rgyal po seng ge bzang po'i bla mchod du lo nyi shur bzhugs shing / de nas nub phyogs su grong khyer b+hin+da zhes par rgyal po d+harma
115b5(rnying rgyud): la'i mchod gnas kyang mdzad/ de'i 'og tu rab tu snang byed ces pa'i dur khrod chen por phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba'i brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa smad cing gdug pa'i tshogs la chos ston cing bzhugs/ gsang ba mchog gi dpe rnams tshar gsum du bris nas/ tshar gcig
115b6(rnying rgyud): o rgyan gyi yul rgya mtsho gser gyi bye ma bangal ba'i gling du sbas/ tshar gcig kha che'i yul gser gling zhes pa'i brag skyibs su sbas/ tshar gcig dur khrod der mkha' 'gro ma rnam kyi mchod pa'i rten tu bzhugs so// slob dpon nyid kyis mthar 'pho ba chen po'i sku grub pas
115b7(rnying rgyud): 'phags yul du ci rigs par bzhugs shing bod du byon pa ni 'og tu 'chad par 'gyur ro// // spyir 'phags pa'i yul gyi gsang sngags spyod pa rnams gsang ba bsrung ba la blo shin tu brtan pas dngos grub ma thob kyi bar gsang sngags spyod pa gzhan gyis mi shes shing gang gi tshe
116a1(rnying rgyud): rgyu da na sun na tu /

116a7(rnying rgyud): nyi rgyas kyi kyi 'dris / rgyas sa nas su ga sung sa la
116b1(rnying rgyud): drang ldan pa'i slob dpon de dag la zhas nas nyan du cig brgyad ma gtogs glegs pa ma bstan pa'ang mang de slob dpan re re'i mtshams su dpa rnams ni snang bar sbas pa'i mying du// shrIn zab pa'i mun dag rnams ni 'das rjes zhal sems kyi tshulatra ba 'asus
116b2(rnying rgyud): sgru pa kyim dang/ 'gru mas dang/ chags na sa pargya ma nga sa nam sam pa du/
116b3(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi spyod yul las gzhan du ma gyur zhing / de las cha shas tsam zhig mi dang mi ma yin pa'i gnas rnams su byung la/ de las mi yi yul du byung ba ni nyung ngu tsam zhig yin par mngon te de dag kyang phal mo che u rgyan nas 'phags yul du phebs pa mang zhing / de
116b4(rnying rgyud): sad ni yul de'i mthil d+hu ma s+thi ra ste du pa'i gnas zhes bya bar grong khyer chung ngu zhig yod cing / rgyal po in+d+ra b+hU ti'i pho brang sogs ni shul tsam las med/ yul de kla klos dbang byed pa las phyi nang gi grub mtha' 'dzin pa ni su yang med/ bud med rnams ni sngon gyi mkhang /
116b5(rnying rgyud): 'a ma gas sa yod pas stang sa dang / rdzo gas par dag sngags thababs sras gzhan du gyu ba dang / yis cad chog su sa dbang byed pa zhing gi mkha' 'grom 'bal jig san/ gnas dang mapa rje sngags kyi klu zhanas pa'i yo yang mngon bram gyi nga
116b6(rnying rgyud): yul du med pas ltar snang du phal pa'i grong du gyur pa yin na ma snyam zhing / da dung sngags kyi rgyud sde 'phags yul du ma byung ba yang ci rigs pa yod par grub la/ de yang thun mong gi spyod yul du ma gyur par mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis ma mngon pa'i dbyings su bzung nas gnas so//
116b7(rnying rgyud): der ma zad rgya gar na gtan ma grags pa'i rgyad mang po 'gro lding gi gling sogs na yod par mngon sum gyis grub pa la mtshon na mi'i yul gzhan dang gzhan sngags kyi gdul byar gyur pa rnams su'ang de ltar 'byung bar nges pa'i phyir mtha' gcig tu tshar gzung bar rlom pa ni phyis pa nyer spyad kyi blo gros kyi
117a1(rnying rgyud): na/ nab te/ mdor nabs ma bya ma yin par shes par byadagos pa ti dang / bAd mchag sdom pa 'byung ba'i slad las/ rnal 'byor chung rnams kyi ni tshang / bye ba khrag ni drug pas te// de bzhin rna la 'a ltar ma cu grags /
117a2(rnying rgyud): ba phrag ni bcu drug grangs// theg tshen las gzhan mdo sde rnams// dung phyur phrag brgyad gsungs pa yin// de bzhin pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// sa ya dang ni drang phyar lnga// 'di dag thams cad thub dbang po// sru gsum bdag nyid can gyis shesangs//
117a3(rnying rgyud): zhes pa lta bus mtshon pas so// gyis yul dbus su bstan pa dngos gzhi nub pa ltar gyur kyang shar phyogs su mtha' 'khob kyi yul dang yul phran mang po'i spyi'i ming ko ka'i yul du grags pa dang / lho phyogs su TA mi Do dri ba dang / d+ha ma shrI'i gling dang / tsan+da dz+r-i
117a4(rnying rgyud): la sogs dang / byang gi phyogs su su ngo rna ba sogs ci rigs par theg pa che chung dang gsang sngags kyi bstan pa ldan nas dar ba ma nyams pa dang / gsar du byung ba sogs da lta'ang bstan pa rnal ma bzhugs pa las gsang sngags pa rnams ni slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas zhebs
117a5(rnying rgyud): ci bka' grol 'dzin pa shas che zhing / phal cher khrig ni sub po bachen po go ra Sha'i rjes 'brang ngo ki sde can bcu gnyis ci rigs pa dang / khyung par natha pan+d+ha'i nang tsan na De shwa ra'i sde las rdo rje slob dpon chen po shArta grasta thugs sras dang bcas pa'i rjes 'brang gi dza~M ke kho na shin tu
117a6(rnying rgyud): mang ngo // dus phyis 'phags yul lho phyogs kyi 'big byed ri bo'i khongs su b+hi da kyi yul du hrul srid byed cing rig sngags grub pa'i rgyal pa b+ha dra zhes byab sgo phyogs kyi rgyud pal cher la lung bsgyur ba zhig byung / des zhib sbas pa slob ma'i tshogs dang bca
117a7(rnying rgyud): pa mam thar zhing bde par gshegs pa'i bstan pa rin po cigs dri sel bar byed la/ ma 'ongs pa na lho phyogs kyi rgyu dang b+hu d+ha'i nang du ngam pa'i chos gsar du ngar bar byed par rgyal pos srang bstan pa nyid min no// zhes 'phags yul ba rnams ldog par byed la/

118a1(rnying rgyud): sbyar bas slob dpon ri'i khang seng du gzung nas lha 'dre rnams ting nge 'dzin gyis bcing shing dmal bzhin// de nas bzung lam gyi mi ma yin thams cad 'dul zhing gyon/ 'a khrag gi zad kyi rtsa can pa nyi mo ba'i dmyal /
118a2(rnying rgyud): dro par snying rje bya'o gsungs te dgongs pa gtad pas chu khol ba 'jam nyil gyis song / chu mtshams su lebs/ gangs dkar 'jigs nas thag ring du bros/ gnam du phebs nas dmar thab mdzad pas zang lha khros nas gangs la zug tshom dang glo zar du sbyin na
118a3(rnying rgyud): 'jigs pa las thog dang ser ba mi bzad pa byung ba na slob dpon gyis gangs la sdigs mdzub bstan pas gangs cher zhu/ snying dung gi klu gdug pa can chos la 'tshe ba zhig 'dul bar dgongs pa gtad pas klu phyi'i chu mtshor bros/ der zhag gsum dgongs pa mdzad
118a4(rnying rgyud): pas bu dang zang lha bcas dam 'og tu chug cing chos la bkod/ gzhan yang gnam mtsho dang jo mo gangs dkar la sogs pa'i lha sran rnams btul/ de nas le shod dang / 'phan yul sogs nas rim bzhin byon nas 'byung po rnams dam 'og tu bcug pa dang / sa
118a5(rnying rgyud): nyes pa rnams kyang bcos/ dam sho du phebs nas zung mkhar mad rdo'i mchod rten la bzhengs/ pho brang dmar 'om bu tshal du po rnga dang mjal 'thad mdzad/ phug lam 'tshams par rgyal po'i na bza' la phrug ma rad bas na bza' tshig pas btsan pos slob dpon gyi
118a6(rnying rgyud): zhabs la phyag phul/ brag dmar mgrin bzang gi lha khang la rab gnas zhal bsro mdzad par lha su rnams sngon mo'i sar spyan drangs pas nub mo lha khang stongs par song / nang par lha khang du lha rnams bshes gsol zhing gtum mdzad pa dngas sa mthong / de'i nyin mo
118a7(rnying rgyud): brjod pa'i yo lu thams cad rang sgra sbags shing 'phel bar gyur/ dbang ba gsal pa'i bris pa 'ga' la tha sen phabs pas sdang mkhan po byang chub sems dpas tshas bshad pa la 'khrug pa'i bod kyi lci su mi sun pa thams cad kyi ming dang spyod tshul gnas la sogs pa sbas pas de
118b1(rnying rgyud): rnams bsdigs shing gzir bas dam 'og tu bcug cing chos la bkod/ so so'i srog sngags dang chog rnams blangs/ des kyang ma thul ba rnams sbyin sreg gis btul ba sogs mdzad/ de 'dra ba lan gnyis mdzad/ madros gzi can la sogs pa'i khru rnams btul/
118b2(rnying rgyud): rgyal po dang grogs po byas nas lha khang bzhengs pa'i gser phye dre wal la bcu bzhi phul/ skabs der be har dang lar lha sham po'ang btas/ de tsam na rgyal khron rje 'bangs skal ba dang ldan pa rnams la sngags 'og ma dang bla med ci rigs pa'i dbang bsrur ba dang /
118b3(rnying rgyud): pa 'bum sde dang man dag lta phreng sogs gsungs/ de dag gi kyi dkyil 'khor mchod pa'i gzungs ma mchims papa' rnam pa can dang / mkhar chen bza' 'tsho rgyal gnyis kyang bying de 'dzin gyis mthas bdug sde dkyil 'khor khyi ma par slob/ kha na nyi te
118b4(rnying rgyud): la'ang spya kyis grub pa'i rtogs pa 'thungs nas grub pa ma can mar gyur/ bsam yas gtsugalag khang gis cog mngad pan pag sung 'ben par srog ro ba chung sran dang lhamus na gnyis ting nge 'dzin gyis ba gaste bgasu babs/ dus gzhan zhig tu slo dpon gyis
118b5(rnying rgyud): bcan gyi khyod kyi yus 'di dbang por bya/ ngamagad kyi zim na la dang ni seng draH/ gdal sa lags ma sogs chu med pa rnams sa chung byung / tham pa thams cad ga/ bi rba ba Na las na blangs ten 'byung grangs / gsang ba sgrubs
118b6(rnying rgyud): la mas cad yod kying bang ba ba// zhes pa la sogs bka' ma cheng bstsal ban/ de lta tshal la zhes pas/ sadra tsam dgangs par bzhugs pa na/ zag dmar gyi sems ga ga pa/ thag da ma mi 'byu
118b7(rnying rgyud): sman Te thang yin pa nas dras pa/ theg zla pa'i gang du ga khyen pa sma cig 'thung / drang ma par sa na med par namyang bye pa pa gyis byung bcogs phyags rnams kyang bag shi byung nges pa la sems pan skyes dun gyisas byas/ nig rgyag kyi na/
119a1(rnying rgyud): pa rnams kyis par zad ba rtsams pas chen byas te lhag ma rnams pa srung sa// 'on kyang 'dis pas gog tung pal bsam las myo'as mus gyis grub pa'ogazug lag khang yang 'thongs te tu gnas par ba /
119a2(rnying rgyud): dang ngo mtshar bsam gyis mi khyab pa byung / rje 'bangs skal ba dang ldan pa rnams la gsang sngags kyi nang gi chos bas ma las 'das par gsungs/ 'on kyang lkog tses kho na las mngon mtshan du bstan pa ni ma yin no// 'on kyang sngon tu rgyal brgyad mnga' bang 'phel ba'i
119a3(rnying rgyud): sbyin sreg mdzad 'phro la lus/ lha klu dam bzhag lan gsum pa'ang ma grub pa dang / bod kyi blon po smon lam log pa rnams kyi 'bras bu la brten nas bod kyi bde skyid la sked nyag 'ong / chos 'khor chen po gcig tu 'byongs te bar skabs su 'khrug pa chen po 'ong /
119a4(rnying rgyud): klu dang rgyal po 'di sugA zhe ba nag/ rgyal brgyad kyang khrims la mi gnas pas sil bur 'bor ba 'byung bar 'dug gsungs te ma 'ongs pa mkhyen pas drag sngags kyang mang du gsungs/ chos dang drag sngags kyi dpe mang po gter du sbas shing rdzu 'phrul gyi bkod pa kho
119a5(rnying rgyud): nas chos dang nor gyi gter kha brgya rtsa brgyad dang phra mo grangs las 'das pa yul tha dad du sbas nas phyi ma'i dus su skal ba dang ldan pa rnams dang 'phrad pa'i smon lam gyi rgyas btab par mdzad do// spyir slob dben chen po bod yul du bzhugs yun sogs la 'dod pa mi 'drab tu
119a6(rnying rgyud): ma 'byung yang gcig tu tshad gzung bar nus pa ma yin te/ rnam 'phral bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir gang ltar byas kyang rung mod/ dus yun thung ngu tsam la'ang yul thams cad du byon pa dang / de dag tu dngos su chos ston pa dang / gter ba mang po
119a7(rnying rgyud): sras pa dang / yul so sor gyon pa dang / srub gnas so sor bzhugs pa dang gshes pasos mngod pa mtha' yas par de lta bu ston pa'i yod med snyam pa dang / dus thung ngu las ma bzhugs par 'dod pa dang / yun ring por bzhugs pa sogs 'gal po sbrum du mi sems
119b1(rnying rgyud): ti zung 'dug grub chen pa 'di snyas cu 'phrul mtha' yas pa la yang rnas pa'i phying bu/ dus pas dag tu gzhan yang 'phags pa'i tha la rnams pa pa na gyul ba'i gnyis gnyen dang / thams cad mthon pa'i lha dang / smyon pa nga rtsams nas
119b2(rnying rgyud): slong 'don pa chen po rnams da/ bi ma la med dang / shAtsug ta las gas nan 'dzin pa ma du ldan rdzong te/ ma sngags kyi bstan pa dngas gzhi tsugs thugs ring kyi me 'a mthab shes
119b3(rnying rgyud): bASh+Ta ba nyams sad pa'i tshor gzi gzigs rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogasamatshan dpal dbyangs sam tshar tAr yang grags/ de nas rim bzhin nags la snang / bar can/ rgyal ba mchog dbyangs/ za rin chen mchog la sogs pa drug rab tu kyang
119b4(rnying rgyud): zhing bsnyen par rdzogs/ ye shes dbang po sogs su med sris/ de las dmi ga rdza grags pagyur/ de nas pad lar ba byung bathub par dgongs te sgrogs la ba sam pa tsha tsham rab tu byung / skra tsag sags kyis 'dul ba wang sde bzhi bskur te ga zhan
119b5(rnying rgyud): rgyud yod par smra ba'i lags kyi bshad pa dang / lag len btsugs shing bstan pa'i gzhi bgeng ba/ zar rdzas/ sangs rgyas ye shes dang / sa badzad mchog dang / de'i ma khan bu gtsang g.yos rag sum rnams la bshad cing / tshul 'dig su
119b6(rnying rgyud): kyis mang d+ha gyes pastan pa bsgrubs pa'i tshe 'jal ba rjes pa la gcig pakal na khams sa zlas khebs pa zas pa an byang gnam dzu nga// dan tIg/ shel mi yang dag na du bskams shing bzhugs pa las/ bris tha ma rmugs lnga 'bar kyis rab
