120a5(rnying rgyud): 'gror med kyi sor rnams so// de 'ang ba byed rdzogs gsumal/ bskyed pa ma hA yo ga la chud sbe dang srub sde gnyis kyi dang ba tan chen ma brjo btur de dag ga skye'am rtsa bar gyur pa rdorjesams dpa' gyu phul rnga ba gsang bas l+r-ing sor sna dul rje brjo rnams na
120a6(rnying rgyud): bi mkhas mngon chen mchog la bshad cing 'gyur/ mas gtsugs rin chen gzhon nu dang kyi mchog gang gnyis la bshad/ de gnyigs zhid rgyal ba'i yon tan dang dari dpal ni grags pa gnyis la bshad/ de gnyis sa sngags dbus gtung du na mang po sha kyi
120a7(rnying rgyud): rnams su byo pashad pa mdzad/ zhing gi brgyad pa rnams pa bka' mamachi dum ram man ngag brjod par grags so// yang slob pan pargyas gtas kun sum la gsungs shing man gsu 'i phre ra grags pa la ba tun/ gnyus kyis rig po dpas kyi yogs
120b1(rnying rgyud): la bshad cang / de dang nang gnyigs parnas sangs kyis ye shes rin po chel bshad de/ yang srab dpon sangs rgyas gsang bas gangs te sor dpas 'jam dpal dang / phran ka chu g+hi sogs pa sgra 'phral lam rnam pagad sogs gsang snying gi skar rnams bshad/
120b2(rnying rgyud): bzhin du dpal gsad pa 'dus pa slob dpon rdo rje bzhad pa'i lugs kyi bshad srol dang / pi shwa mi tra'i 'grel pa rnams la brten pa'i nyan bshad dang sgrub pa'i srol ka dang / sangs rgyas mnyam s+yo ku ku rA dza dang hUM ka ra'i bka/ 'asrol gyi gzhung 'grel rnams dang o rgyan gyi rtsa
120b3(rnying rgyud): po'i grub thob brgya byin sdong po'i mnyam sbyor 'grel chen sogs la brten pa'i 'chad nyan dang sgrub pa'i srol dar bar mdzad cing he ru ka dang rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor la brten pa'i yi dam skal ldan gzhan rnams la bstsal bas btsan pos rta mgrin grub pas rta skad 'dzam gling
120b4(rnying rgyud): khyab par thos pa sogs byung // gnyis pa srub sde'i skor la/ spyir gshing skor rnams ni slob dpon shAn+tiM ga rgyas bod du dang bar mdzad/ bdud rtsi'i sgor slob dpon bi ma las gnyigs dz+nyA na ku mU ra sogs la bstan cing dang ba yin la/ gzhan rnams
120b5(rnying rgyud): ni phal cher slob dpon pa rma bo nas dar zhing rgyas par mdzad do// bye brag tu btsun po khri srong lde'u btsan gyis gsol ba btab pas dpal gyi mchi mra pu'i bre dgu dge 'ur skal ba mchog dang ldan pa'i rje 'bangs brgyad la sgrub sde chen po brgyad kyi phyi nang gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du dbang
120b6(rnying rgyud): bsrur ba'i rim pa rnams rdzogs par mdzod cing so so'i me tog phog pa'i lha'i sgrung thabs dang man ngag gnang ba nyams su blangs pas lha so so'i zhal gzigs/ mnga' bdag btsan pos che mchog grub pas ting nge 'dzin khyad par can skyes shing skom byung gi shes rab klong rdol bas/
120b7(rnying rgyud): bka' yang dag pa'i tshad ma'i bstan bcos mdzad/ nam mkha'i snying pos yang dag grub cing nyi per la bcings/ sangs rgyas ye shes kyis 'jam dpal grub cing brag la phur babebs/ rgyal ba mchog dbyangs kyis dbang chen gru bcing dbugatsug nas
121a1(rnying rgyud): mgo byin cing ta skang grogs/ mkhar chen bzas phrar pa grub cing shi bslong nas/ dpal gyi ye shes kyis ma mo grub pas mtshogs las 'a khol/ dpal gyi seng ges bcad bstod grub pas ste bcad mang ga gzug ra
121a2(rnying rgyud): skyegs pa sa shes sa med sa sa sadus pab zlas pa chu
121a3(rnying rgyud): dpal brtsegs/ 'the pal gyi thogs/ sngan mardo rje bdud 'joms/ 'bre rgyal ba'i mo gros/ rkang khams pa gan/ gtsug ngu rin chen gzhon nu/ ma rin chen mchog/ gnyen dpal dbyangs/ sgra lung dpal ni rdo rje la sogs nam
121a4(rnying rgyud): mkha' labru bzhin 'grub dang / rgyal gyi 'a thal gyis 'gro ba dag/ ri thag la mi thogs par 'jal ba dang / lus 'i dkyil 'khor du skye pa mang po la sbyin nus pa dang / lus de nyid kyis thakyang 'dug gig 'phang brnyes pa shas gzung shing /
121a5(rnying rgyud): rgyab dang 'jog bapa' la sogs thang med/ yub pathob pa 'ang mang dubyung // klubs khyim gsum la 'jig rten ldegs ma shes bong du srob dpon can pos sgra 'dzirnams dam la btugs nas dkyil 'khor du bzhag pa kho na yin par 'arjod kyang / sa ma thang gtong la dbyings
121a6(rnying rgyud): dngu le gas kyi mkha' 'grogs kyi shing ga' nyan sri pa'i dman no dang mkhal ma rigs sa gtugs pa'ang ma pa'i mkha' ma ma'i kyil la mar yi da/ 'di la 'jig rten gyi dman mo lnga bcwal sogs srid pa'i la la rnams bkod pa ni/ sno
121a7(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten dang / nang rdzamig srung gsum/ gsang bsems kyi 'byung 'jug da rten 'brel las rgya dgasu ma dregs pa'i mamo ltar sdang ba'i rnam shes kyis bsdus pa rnams don dum sris kun tu bzang po'i dbyings mkha' klong rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor las
121b1(rnying rgyud): mi 'da'abar ga dodanas gnas bu'i phyir dzarje 'chang thabs pa mkhas pas de lngar bstan payin te/ mkha' 'gro rgyam po'i rgyud las// stong pa nyid ni mkhas pa so// legs rnam gas pa'i phyid// drang grangasatsam ldan 'das shid // sprul pa mtham
121b2(rnying rgyud): la ni// zhes gsungs shing / de dang mthun par lhagasang thugs kyi 'khor lo rnams su bkod pa'i ma mo'i nges pa yang / de nyid las/ dbang po gshin rjem chu mo// gnod sbyin 'byung mo drang srong ma// srin mo rlung gi chung ma ste// zhes pa dang /
121b3(rnying rgyud): dang chung ma sring mo dang // bu mo sring mo'i bu mo dang // pha yi sring mo de dang ni// zhang po yi ni chung ma dang // chung ma'i spyan bla ma dang ni// de nyid kyi ni pha yi ma// chung ma yi ni gyi mo dang // ma yi ma dadag nyen mo dang // ma yi sran bla'i bu mo dang
121b4(rnying rgyud): rang gi phyi mo'i sun b+ha dang // spun rtswa'i bu mo de'i bu mo// pha yi mdang gyi mo dang // khu bo yi ni chung ma dang // bu mo'i Ta yi chung ma dang // slar yang chung ma'i sman zla dang // rang pa'i sring mo'i bu mo dang // de nyid kyi ni rang rig skyes/
121b5(rnying rgyud): spyan zla'i chung ma'u mo dang // bu nyid kyi ni chung ma dang // bu mo'i khro yi ma dang ni// bu nyid kyi ni stug mo dang // bu mo'i bu mor yang dag bshad// pho nya sam cu drug rnams so// zhes dang / yi dwags dmyal mo mnar med la// thig nag mo
121b6(rnying rgyud): mau mdag mo// tsha bo mo dang rab tshwa mo// bu 'bod ma dang du 'phod che// mar nag tu 'tshor ri gnyis 'tshir// zhes pa la sogs thugs kyi 'khor lor bkod pas mtshon/ 'jig rten 'khor ba'i tshul gyis dkyil 'khor du bzhag pa ni mnyam pa tshan po dan /
121b7(rnying rgyud): la spyod pa'i sngags kyi pa tshig ste/ dgyes nor las/ 'di nyid 'khor ba zhes bya la// 'di nyid mya ngan 'das pa zhes// 'khor bsngangs pa'i pha rol tu// mngan 'das pa yod ma yin// zhes gsungs pa'i don la bsam dgos shing / de bzhin du
122a1(rnying rgyud): sa cad bad dang dam pa dag zugs cang rgan gyig gasmon du dpal tshon pa nA phyugs gangs cagadug pa nanamasul tshur grol sa na las dang byu cos btsun ni gtan lams ga nga/
122a2(rnying rgyud): dus gcig tu brtul/ rang rang gi srog gi snying po dang / sngags rgyud kyi sbyor ba dang / las kyi tshogs dang / cho ga'i ldog pa rnams grangs/ dkyil 'khor du bcug/ dbang bskur/ rigs dang mthun pa'i mying rtags/ lung bstan ga
122a3(rnying rgyud): zas kyi pa 'bab byin/ las kyi gnyer gtad nas 'gro ba tha dad pa dang / rigs dang / skye gnas dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / skrod pa dang / bsam pa dang / brtul zhugs dang / tshul dang nges pa'i tshig brjod pa dang / tshig gi lam tha dad pa
122a4(rnying rgyud): rnams tshul bzhin du mkhyen nas de dang de'i yul la 'tshams pa'i sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor bstan nas thun mong gi las tshogs dang dngos grub rnams srab pa'i phyir 'di tsam du mazad 'jig rten pa'i sngags rgyud du ma gsungs pa yod cing / de dag rang ngos nas
122a5(rnying rgyud): myang 'das kyi lam mtshan nyid pa ma yin kyang byang chub sems kyis zin pas de la bstan pas sgo du mas sems can rnams rjes su 'dzin pa la ma rmongs par grub pas rnam mkhyen gyi rgyad glang por 'gyur ba la dgongs nas thams cad mkhyen pas bstan pa yin te gsang sngags thabs
122a6(rnying rgyud): lA ma rmongs pa'ang 'di rig su dgongs pa ma yin na gang la ngos 'dzin/ de ltar yang phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud las kyang / lag na rdo rje ti nge 'dzin de las langs te nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
122a7(rnying rgyud): dri za dang / wa ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lho phye chen po dang / mau dang mi ma yin pa la sogs sems can thams cad kyi srog sa dbab pa'i tshogs kyis bye ba bsreg pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas
122b1(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi wa sbas pa'i mad la thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khar dacu shing gi tshal rtsa ba bcad pa lta bu dang / rlung chen pas bskyod pa bzhin du khrus zab tu 'char mtshan po'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bsgyel to// de'i tshe de dag rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi na
122b2(rnying rgyud): 'debams cad dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang tshig ste thal bar gyur pa mthong ngo / de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis la can rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba brjod de bka' stsal ba/ sngags kyi snod pa rgya mtsho yi// snying pa stabs cas
122b3(rnying rgyud): ldan pa 'di// bstan pa 'di ni srang byed cing // theg pa chen po'i gnas 'di la// gdul dka' rtag tu 'dul ba ste// dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bshad// de nas ldangajam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de dag byin gyis brlabs te lag na rdo rje la 'di skad
122b4(rnying rgyud): ces sbas so// rigs kyi su 'khor 'di la dam tshig la 'jug pa'i sgo cung zad sngol zhig dang / des bstan pa 'di la srog gi rab thob cing dad pa' ba nas rang rang gi gsang sngags kyi snying po 'phrul bar 'gyur ro/ zhes smras pa dang / lag na rdo rjes
122b5(rnying rgyud): 'jam dpal la smras pa/ ting nge 'dzin la dbang po bcing // nam mkha' lta bur chags med la// kun tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// smon lam rtag tu rdzogs byed pa// gsang sngags kun gyi spyod pa dang // de bzhin gsang sngags sgrub pa dang // brtul zhugs
122b6(rnying rgyud): dang ni rtags dang gzugs// dus dang yul dang cho ga shod// de nas 'jam dpal gyis de rnams la byin gyis brlabs pas de rnams langs te/ kye ma ye shes kye ma skyid// kye ma sngags shes bsam mo khyab// des ni bdag cag thams cad kyid// mgon dang pasam gtan
122b7(rnying rgyud): dang dang ldan/ sems zhi tshogs ni ma mchis par// sangs rgyas bstan pa lhur len gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar ni// bdag cag thams cad mchis nas su// cho ga'i rgyal po tshul chen 'dir// snying po dag ni dbul lo// zhes gsor te/ de nas 'khor gyi gnod sbyin dang / shazad
123a1(rnying rgyud): myam+bo dang / mkha' 'amam dang / sran po dang / reg sngags 'chang ba dang / me 'am dang / d+hIHdang / klu dang / 'byung po dang / seng mo bzhi lasogs pa rnams kyis rang rang gi snying pa rnams thal te/ sgo dang brag gi sgrub 'bras dang /
123a2(rnying rgyud): dag sngags dang/ phyag rgya dang / cho ga rtog pa rnams gsungs so// de lta bu gdad nas grub pa'i rgyud gzhung du 'byung bzhin 'jig rten pa'i lha dang dkyil 'khar yod pa'i gzhung de bo mar 'gyur ba'i rnam rtog 'dis kyi kun byung bar mngon le/ slob dpon chen zas yod ma ljongs rje la de dag
123a3(rnying rgyud): la yang skyon gyis tshul gyis btwa l+la shing gtso bo gtso ba rnams sngon smos pa'i cho ga de dag gis dkyil 'khor du bcug pa yod sring kyang de tsam gyis rgyud gzhung de med lona'i dbang du mi 'gyur te/ bya rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor du gnas gtsang gi lha rnams yod pas de kho na 'i rgyad du mi 'gyur ba bzhinas//
123a4(rnying rgyud): pra a ru yo ga'i nor rnams ni/ mngom panan ma d+hi dang / bisad+ha dang / mu shor slob pa nam brtson skyes gas makar gyis gzungs na sangs rgyas ye shes la ba ga da pong du rtson pa yin no// rdzogs pa chen po a tI le ga le sde gsum gyi dang po sems sdong gi sde gnyis na/
123a5(rnying rgyud): skye mo bye mkhar du la byungs pa'i dngos su brnyes pa'i slob dpon chen po por tsan pa can po khri grong lde zhu btsan gyis bsngal pa bzhin 'jigs pa chen po brgyad sogs bzod du med du med pa'i dka' ba lnga thug parnalas bdun gyis lhag pa khyad du bas nas rgya gar gyi yu la du brtol bar
123a6(rnying rgyud): kro sha'i tsun+dan bsipa byed kyi nags su slob dpon shrI si d+ha sa rdzu 'phrul gyis bkod pa'i ki'u tshang chen po dgu brtsegs dang nye bar sleb/ der chu len gyi rnal 'byor ma la phrin bzangs kyang lan ma byung bar bai ros lha stangs mdzad pas chu stong sa la 'byar/ rnal 'byar mas rang gi mar
123a7(rnying rgyud): seM na rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ba stan cing des grogs pus te slob dpon dpal gyis ge dang mngal/ gser gyi maN+Da la phul te rtsol med kyi zag pa gsang bar zhus pas btag par blagasungs/ nang par gas pa'i rtses t+ya tab nas zab mo'i gnad rnams bstan pa masu mod kyi/
123b1(rnying rgyud): sngon kyang shin tu ma gsang na rgyal pa'i chang pas srog ge nyen du 'gyur bas nyin par paN+Di ta gzhan rnams las kyu 'bras kyi chos nyan/ mtshan mo ma nA ngag gi chos bstan par bya'o gsungs te gzhan gyis mi rtog pa'i thabs dang rten 'brel rnams mdzad/ slob dpon
123b2(rnying rgyud): gyis mtshan mo man ngag sems sde bco brgyad rnams dar dkar po la ra dkar mo'i 'o mas bris shing bstan srung rnams la chad po blangs te shin tu gsang ba'i rgyas btab po// da dung yang bai ro'i thugs mtshim ste bzhugs pas rgyud sde drug tu'i dbang dang man ngag thams cad dang /
123b3(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu rang chas su ston pa klong gi sde dkar nag khwa gsum rnams bstan pas chos thams cad kyi gting mthar phyin/ dadung ma tshim pa ltar mdzad pas slob dpon gyi zhal nas/ chos kyi dbyings la zad med kyang // de bzhin nyid ni gcig shes na// ma lus de la yongs
123b4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// de las yod na sid+d+hi kan// ces gsungs nas/ gdams pa btsa' lugs gsum/ sbyin pa'i gnas bzhi/ mi sbyin pa'i gnas bzhi rnams gsangs/ du ba'i gnas kyi phung khrod chen por slob dpon dga' rab rdo rje dang yang mjal nas rdzogs pa chen po 'a
123b5(rnying rgyud): phrag drug tu rtsa bzhi'i don ba rgyud thob cad de nyid du rtogs grol dus mnyam gyi dngos grub chen po mngon du brnyes so// 'di sleb dpon gyi ye shes kyi su yin kyang rung ste kye 'chi med pa'i zung 'jug gi sgras mkha' khyab tu bzhugs pa'i phyi dus su kyi sogs mo skye star mi bsam/
123b6(rnying rgyud): skye mchog gzigs rnams kyi spyod yul yin bsaso// de nas ze ros rkang mgyogs kyi grub pa la brten nas bo du byon nas btson po la nyin mo rgyu 'bras bun mang ba dang / mtshan mo rdzogs pa chen po lcig chos kho nang gsungs/ sems sngo snga 'gyur lnga bsgyur/ de'i cho
123b7(rnying rgyud): gang bas gdams dge bod du shor ba la phrag dog gis bod rnams the tshom bskyed pa'i phra ma dang / chos la gnag pa'i btsun mo dang blon po rnams kyi dbang las slob dpon tshe ba rong du byon dgos pa byung / rgyal rong brag la mgon po'i dgon par g.yu sgra snying po rjes su babring ba sogs 'gro ba
124a1(rnying rgyud): rnams smin grol la 'dod// rtsa rong lhag ce mkhar dugs rton la shes rnam 'jigs pa chen pa'i sgor rnams gsungs/ stod zung dong gargyag dam da/ na rdzong du sranganan srung sa rgyas chaganapa lanasungs/ dbus sugan ga dz+nyAn ku m+bA dang le bza nas
124a2(rnying rgyud): mar gsungs pa ste rim pa lngar grags shing / phyi ma 'dis bai ro li yul du spyan drangs te/ mthar bal po b+ha sing gi nags su zung 'jug gi skur gyur to// gnyigs gyis sog po dpal gyi ye shes/ gra dpal gyi snying po/ lha lung dpal gyi rdo rje/ 'o bran dpal gyi gzhon nu sogs las ril bzhin
124a3(rnying rgyud): pa gcig dang / yang sog ngos gnubs cen la brgyud pa'i lugs gcig dang / yang rtsangs shAka nor gyis spang dany+dziti/ ya zed ram shes rab/ zer mo dge slong / mar pa shes rab 'od/ de nas bung sgo phrag par brgyud de byung ba yin no// yang bo ro'i slob ma srang sangs rgyas mngon po'i cho
124a4(rnying rgyud): rgyan las 'ja' lus grub pa sha stag byung ba ni/ spang rgan po'i slob ma dan lam byang chub rgyal mtshan yin/ de ni yul dbu ru ngan la mar la gsum pa dge slong lo drug cu rtsa bdun lon bzhig gi rgyal mo stag rtsa mkhar du byon/ sbrang mi pham mgon po la gdams bzhus bsag
124a5(rnying rgyud): da yul du ma 'gro/ wa seng ge brag la sgom gsungs/ slob dpon gyi bka' bzhin tan te der byon nas bsgoms pas lo brgya dang bdun cucu gnyis lon pa'i tshe phung po lhag med du gshegs/ de la slob ma zad ma rin chen dbyig bya ba mdo khams stong pa zhig byed/
124a6(rnying rgyud): ngan lam la gdams bzhus/ zag de nyid du tha ma dang 'bral ba med par sgom bzhin bzhugs pas/ lo brgya dang bzhi bcu zhi bzhi lon po'i tshe phung po lhag med du gshegs/ de la yar krung 'gyos nas / khu 'gyur gsal ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i slob mnyen dge slong yin pa/
124a7(rnying rgyud): ma lnga bcu rtsa bdun lon pa gcig byung / zad marin chen gyis gdams ngag gnang bas yul du log pa'i bsam pa spangs/ wa seng ge braganyid du bzhugs nas pa sgoms pas khu 'gyur gsal lo brgya dang bcu bdun mon tshe/ phung po lhag med du gshegs/ de
124b1(rnying rgyud): lhar slob dpon gsum ka wa seng ge thag ces bya bar sbrul gyi mo gcig par gcig ting ma gcig sun bun nam 'da' tshon yal ba bzhin du gshegs so// del slob ma byang chub grags nas b+ha ba// yul nyang gsu 'thun stod na dge slong mo bzhi bdus gtas
124b2(rnying rgyud): lon pa zhig byung / khu 'gyur gsal ba la gdams pa zhus nas yar log/ bsam yas mchi mas phur sgom gyi na bzhugs tsa na/ dbu du zhwa'i nyang shes rab 'byung gnas zhes bya ba dge slong bgres po gcig bzhugs 'dug pa dang mjal/ khong na'o//
124b3(rnying rgyud): bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo ngargan yang gdams pa khyed che bar 'dug/ rdzas su gzung bar 'tshal zhus pas/ nyang byang chub grags kyis khong la gdams pa rnams byin/ phug po che dang yang rdzong du bzhugs/ rang gi slob ma dang yang slob dag la 'byung bzhi
124b4(rnying rgyud): zad par gyi sbrul bsgyur bstan/ mthar rang nyid gtsang rgya ma nye du kha'i phung po re bo che la da lta rang 'dug pa'i 'phro la ri zur na lar sku lus sbyin chad pa bzhin du phung po lhag med du gshegs so// der nyang shes rab 'byung gnas kyis mchi mas phu dpal gyi nags khrod/
124b5(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi yang rdzong/ phug po che rnams su bzhugs/ der rdzogs pa chen po rang snang ris med kyi dgongs pa mngon du shar nas/ phug po che lha ri'i rtse mo la yod pa'i shug pa gang gcig par na bza' dang / phreng ba dang / kA pA li rnams gzur nas/ rba na
124b6(rnying rgyud): mkha' la 'ja' tshon dengs pa bzhin song ngo // de la slob ma yul lo mo ba/ rus sra yin pa gcig byung bas slob dpon snga sgom du grags/ de rang gi yul na yod pa'i tshe la blag pa yod pas/ yum na re/ ku 'di sring mo drug ge ming gcig po yan/
124b7(rnying rgyud): slob dpon shes rab 'byung gnas la 'grol/ ma shi ba rang gis cho ga zer lo bcu drug pa gcig nyang la bcol nas yod can/ kyi nyang byang chub grags pa de phrug po cha dang / yang rdong dang / mchims pu rnams su sha pa gcig khring nas byon pas/ ha
125a1(rnying rgyud): sha bcan zhes kyang grags/ phug bachar phyi ma dzes byin can/ ngas khyo gnyis la snyas ma gcig brtan gyi ltos shig gsungs/ dang slob pon shA thung dang / sra nam gnyis kyis g.yas gaman nas bzlas pa dod
125a2(rnying rgyud): dpon dbus na yod pa de mi snang bar song/ dang mtshar skyes nas yod tsan/ rlung 'tshug zu gang pa gcig tu gyur nas par brtsil tshur ba phyis byas/ da med song / de'ang chu gtod gting ba'i 'khar gzhing gcig tu bos nas du shas kyis nga/ nas tshung
125a3(rnying rgyud): gi dang la slob dpon rang du grong gis song/ de ltar 'byung bzhi zad par gyi skye mched la dbang bsgyur nas 'di skad du/ 'byung ba'i snyigs mdangs nas drangs ma ma yal pa'i bar du de ltar 'ong ba yin/ shes rab kyis skom rgyu med pa'i danamathang yang / baja
125a4(rnying rgyud): la yengs pa med par bskyangs na de ltar du dang dbang thob pa la tshogs med/ ma yengs par myong ba gal che ba yin gsungs/ de nas re zhig na sna sbom gyis bal bu'i nagasal shing 'thub phyin pas/ khong rang gi 'dag skyil ma dam bun thun 'jug pa mthong / slong dang
125a5(rnying rgyud): ni me mi 'bud ma shor ba yin nam skam bstad sbyin pas/ 'dag skyil srang bzhin las ma mi snang / slob dpon la de ci thug yin dris pas/ ngas mi'i ting du 'dzin la matam par bzhag pa yin/ da'i byam hang byang chu ba sgrags pa'i dman nam gzungs/ yang skabs nis
125a6(rnying rgyud): slobang po kyi bzhugs sa d+hA ske ma ma 'dug pa 'thod/ gabar grub pon skyes/ nga mi 'dug nas ri'i ni ma la smras shig gsungs/ re zhig na slob dpon ma byung nas ngas spos ngas pa bzhud pa yin gyisang dgongs 'byon du 'ongs ma can yangs byin/ bskar bye /
125a7(rnying rgyud): datha dang / ba'i phreng ba la sogs pa thug pa lag / slob dpan srung ba lkog meng du gshegs / 'di rang bayin rdzogs pa chen po la nam mkha' dang / mkha'a'i gro'i bkyi lugs/ me byung dang rig 'dzin gyi
125b1(rnying rgyud): shes pa'i las la gcig yin na/ sra za ma lan thun bzhil na can nyad shad 'byung gas gdams pa btab pa zhes u ma 'atan dag bstan du bzhugs mtshan ma shes kyang chubadu grags/ rdzogs pa khyad par rna
125b2(rnying rgyud): mnga'/ rdo la 'dam rdzab ltar mdzad/ zag la bu'i bar 'dabs/ dgrang mo dgu bcu rtsa brgyad lon pa'i cho su ldan pa med par gshegs/ jom gang mas kyi rol gyi mi rnams la bur maN+Da lam btang par
125b3(rnying rgyud): khang du bur me la sbyangs pas/ 'od rdza matsam zhig nam mkha' la 'gro ba kyi rol gyi mi kun gyis mthong / shul du gdung dus gcig kyang ma byung ngo // de'i slob ma ni 'dod te/ sem mtshang dgu kyad de zhes bya ba yang

125b7(rnying rgyud): yin ga sa gyur gyi// gnas gyur pa la gnyis 'dzin man/ ces gasrengs nas mag zug len gnyis brgyab pas/ sems tad da' ye shes pa ba phags la bzhig kyang / kha nang na du khrel la sdang / ni rna rnam pas byin gyi
126a1(rnying rgyud): brlabs/ rdo rje rnam pa dang 'dul ba'i lung bstan par 'jug na/ dus byis las mgo gsungs/ dam pas rten 'brel 'ga' tsam dang / sngags kyi gnang mang du gnang / 6
126a2(rnying rgyud): tshal mar yi ge drug pa'i gdams dag gnang nas bsgrubs pas byin rlabs chen po byung / yang chu bo chen po 'di'i shar tshogs na tsan dan gyi nags yod/ de na khyod kyi tha ma yod gsungs nas lung bstan/ de nas dbus su
126a3(rnying rgyud): A.A dpal 'phrul la khrag 'brang dang be na/ gzungs shangs pa rgyal kr-i ya dang kha'abyar ma'i gtod can khrus/ khong gis gcang du ba rabal 'phrul ba sgral du btang bas/ ba ri la 'ang 'jam dpal dang lhang sgrub zhas/ dge bshes

126a5(rnying rgyud): lhas ma yid byer/ nang par rdza bar byen can/ bud med gcig / nas sa mthar 'di nas yang sbyin na/ ma po nas som bya ba lta ste pa la yangs pa zhig yong byed/ phyin pas la 'brar ba zlo gtsigags kyang/

126a7(rnying rgyud): gang byin/ ma tha bapa byin nas pagacagacig tu / nang par 'gro gas sa ma rgyan/ ya kyi 'i gnas pa cu chu ga 'ad yang gseng med du sa kyar rjes pas gyugashing gcag zlas gas so/
126b1(rnying rgyud): rtags ldad nas shang khar rtse ba gcig bsngal bas/ !/ zlum mnyes nas phyag tu chen pa brda'i mnang ga dung / rdzogs pa chen po snang bdun dang rdzas bya ba bshad/ dU shA ga nas kyang thug/ dang mthab bas ba pan brgyal byadang /

133a2(rnying rgyud): bcung 'dzin gyi slad dusras nyi 'bum bstan/ ngas tshogs pa ma baspangs na phung po lhag med 'ong ba yin gsungs/ lus shin tu sbyangs pa byang chub kyi yan lag la dbang thob pas res 'ga' rgyal ba rigs lngar gsal/ sku lus la grib ma gtan mi mnga'/ rdzogs
133a3(rnying rgyud): pa chen po'i chos gsung dus 'ja 'grur 'khyil ba sogs ngo mtshar gyi lhas mang po yod/ dgung lo bdun tu don gcig pa me po phag gi los ga zla ba'i nyer gnyis le shar phyogs kyi nam mkha' las sgra chen po lan bdun grags shing / sa chen po 'di lan gsum ga
133a4(rnying rgyud): 'ja' dang / 'od dang / sel snyan gyi sgra dang / dri zhim gyi dang la sogs pa gdod ma'i sa la mngon par byang chub pa'i rtags ma lus pa bstan te gshegs so// de'i gyi nub pur sbyangs pas gdung chen lnga dang / ring bsrel kha dog wa pa lu lnga'i rgyal zab rgya
133a5(rnying rgyud): me tog gi/ char dang 'anga'i gur la sogs pas 'gro ba mang po da pa'i gnas la sbyar zhing dang bzhin gyis bstan la gnas pa byung // de'i slob ma zas nyi 'bum ste/ yum rgyal mo ga yang de'i lhums su zhugs pa'i dus khyi ma mang po dus gcig la shar ba rtsu
133a6(rnying rgyud): bas yab kyis sems can gyi ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal bar lung bstan nas nyi ma 'bum du btags/ lo lnga nas rim par yab las gsang ba stir tig gi dbang khrid gdams pa nyams 'og tu chud par mdzad/ dgung lo bcu pa la che sar bton dus chud ba
133a7(rnying rgyud): bdun la bshad pa mdzad pas bu slob kun ngo mtshar skye ba byung / lo nyi shu'i bar du bsgrub pa kho na la nan tan mdzad/ de nas rjes thob sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin dang 'grogs nas rngog rgyal rtse'i sar gsar ma'i chud mnang ga dang bcas pa la gsan pa mdzad/ nyi shu
133b1(rnying rgyud): gnas pa la byas tug dngas srung kyi rten dung da burtsa bdun la lab lags pa rgyal mtshan dang / mam lhags pa bstan nas rgyang gsum gdams ngag dang bcas pa dang / bad mchagam sa kyi lugs mthun par mdzan kha gag 'jug tan ba
133b2(rnying rgyud): pa la 'ang bcag dang / rje bathun pa lpags/ ye shes mgan pa sogs lus/ wang gsu zag pa dang ga zhung ba dag na rjes gi lasags te sakhas grub kyi tham mang ba bsnyen nas mang byung du ma la thos bsam grags med yang de/ rkyeg dan chen po zhes bye
133b3(rnying rgyud): bstan bcas kyang mdzad da dpung po sa bcu na drug la gshegs/ pur blangs pas gdung rigs lnga byed/ 'anga' man gyi grang phub/ tsha rdul tha ba la khug tshas me tog byas pa sogs byung ngo // 'di thab la 'gyur nas byagardad gyi sprul babang pa la sa
133b4(rnying rgyud): bden pa la dag 'dzin pa phags pa// de'i stong la su du dzong bar nig sung zlab 'bum gyi mas yin/ lo bdun man mad lug pa 'dra ba zod pa la brkyang nas shes rab mi ltar 'bar/ bco brjod kyi bar du khu ba ste 'bum dang 'grogs/ gsang bcwa
133b5(rnying rgyud): gyi dbang rjod gdam ma pa dang cas rdzogs par mang dacing / gle ci bshad ba la thus pas sgra 'dags gcad pa dang / san ngan sa ngan la brnams pas nyams pa blangs pa la na/ da granas kyi bu bangs pa tud gsum pan
133b6(rnying rgyud): dang bcas pa dang / bde mchog mal gyi lugs nyan/ dbu ched la sogs pa'i rig pa'ang khong du chud par byas/ de bzhin du khro pu lo tsA ba la mi badz+ra ga'i gdams pa dang / chu mig pa la tshad ma bsdus pa/ bal po grags 'bum la nga
133b7(rnying rgyud): phyag cad kha 'thar sogs mkhas grub du ma la sde snod dang rgyud lung ma po lo sum cu rtsa drug tsun mnyan pas rig pa na gang thos bzhin tu mang ba grags/ bsgrub pa mdzad res yid mchi sta zhal mthangs yin te grags zlum pas mi gsung / lhas rang bal zang/
134a1(rnying rgyud): da phul dus 'od kyi thig le'i khong nas 'phags pa lag na pad+ma dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa zhal gzigs/ tho rengs zhig tshe dpag med kyi zhal mthong bas/ ded cag la tshe ring chud med kyang kho bo legs par byung ba de'i byin pa rlabs yin
134a2(rnying rgyud): gsungs/ de ltar tshad med pa'i mkhyen rab dang thugs rje'i mnga' bdag gis 'gro ba 'dren pa'i ded dpon du gyur nas drug cu ba la gshegs/ zhag bdun du 'ja'i dra bas 'brel/ su gdung la oM AHhUM dang ring bsrel mang po gyon to// de'i slob ma 'bral zhis
134a3(rnying rgyud): ge rgyab pa yin te/ g.yo ru gra'i phu so gad phreng gi grong du nyi ma rtse shar la 'ja'i gur phub cing 'khrungs/ lo dgu nas rigs sad de dag snang dang mos gus dpag med shar/ bcu pa'i tshe snang ba 'di rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu la sra zhing 'bras 'bras 'dra ba mi bde
134a4(rnying rgyud): snyam pa dang / bcu gnyis pa la 'khor ba la skyo ba tshad med par skyes nas chos 'ba' zhig las gang gis kyang mi phan par nges shes rnyed/ bcu gsum gyi tho rangs nyi zla dus gcig la shar ba'i rmi lams dbus/ 'phags pa thugs rje chen po'i zhal mthong /
134a5(rnying rgyud): cho gcig gis grol ba snying tig gi don sgoms shig gsungs/ de nas bzung snying rje phyogs med du rgyas/ 'gro ba kun la bu gcig pa'i 'du shes shar/ rkyen re la brten nas gzhan la mtho 'grogs dang khyad gsod mi byed pa'i dam bcang byas/ lus
134a6(rnying rgyud): bu dag nyid rje chen pos mi 'dor zhing / long spyad dang dam nu pa kho na la byams pa sogs theg pa chen po'i rigs sad dpa'i rtags khyad par can mda'/ bco brgyad la snang ba bden med du rtogs pas skyon pa klog langs pa lta bur song ste/ pha mas lha gsol ba'i yo byad
134a7(rnying rgyud): bsags pa gtor zhing / pho gdon rgyal po mchod/ mo gdon pasen mo mchod/ ces byas pas/ khyod 'dra ba bu skye bzer 'tha' sa/ nyi shu la mkhan po lde'u spang ba dang / slob dpon 'gras spangs pa las rab tu byung/ nyi shu rtsa lnga lon mo sra nas
134b1(rnying rgyud): sidage chub tu b+h+yoH/ sang ga byab ba par pal chal ba'i chos kor/ tha masbyor ba las seng ge mdzang basbyor/ rus pa dri med 'ong / snar dpal/ gzhon nu 'tham/ skyon 'byur byang yin/ ngo sras s+ya grags pa rnams pa/ gsang gas gas
134b2(rnying rgyud): byed/ gcod yul/ phyag chen mang du nyan/ khyad par thugs rje chen pos lung bstan bzhin du dru rdo 'berd las rdzogs pa chen po thos pas rtogs pa thod rgal du skyes/ khro bo ma la sogs pa'i ri khrod dang lung stong rnams su lo mang po'i bar du srub pa kho na lag 'o
134b3(rnying rgyud): bas dgongs pa ka dag gi sar gshegs/ skal ldan mang po srin grol la bkod nas/ drug cu rtsa bzhi pa la theg pa mchog gi 'bras bu thob pa'i rtags khyad par ba rnams mngon du bstan nas gshegs so// de'i slob mgrub chen me long pyod ni/ lpags kyi phung rna
134b4(rnying rgyud): 'byor pa bsam yas kyi sras su bcos/ lo dgu na grub thob za lung pa dang / mkhan po se lung pa las rab tu byung / de bus gshin po'i dge kyang yum rgyas 'bring bsres gsum kho na spogs pas lo bcu drug gi dus sbags kyi bu'i zhogs sted bya bar brgyad stong ba
134b5(rnying rgyud): rtsa mdzad pas gnas lugs kyi don rtogs/ zangs mchor bsgoms pas nyams 'bar zhing mngon shes phra mo 'dra shang / de nas phyogs med du 'brims te/ mtshur su'i do phongs pa sogs bla ma mang po bskyen/ sha 'ug lhag mo dang / mnga' chu la sogs pa
134b6(rnying rgyud): gnas chen mang por gyon/ nas the gung gis zla ba gcig dang zhag nyi rgya'i 'tsho ba byas pa sogs dka' thub la shin tu bzod pa gcig yin/ dka' ba spyad pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab/ lo bco brgyad pa'i cho so ge khyab pa sangs rgyas dpon po mngal nas man ngag nying tig
134b7(rnying rgyud): nga men dag gis rmongs bsams pa'i slob pa skyes te bsgoms pas sngon 'gro'i dus rang nas zhag drug tu rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal nyin mtshan med par bathod/ dngos gzhi'i dus brgyud pa'i tha ma rnams rmi lam du mngal nas byin gyis bdangs/ nyi shu byag sum ra
135a1(rnying rgyud): rgas na sa
135a2(rnying rgyud): na ba / na sa sa dang/ sa sa ga gas zhi sa
135a3(rnying rgyud): bzong pa cang nganamam khang rjod du mang la/ dar byang na bzhugs pa'i tsami la man pag mo ci yo la dzong/ de mna' ba dunas/ 'od kyang ga so ngas su gra dgas/ srabs nas rje sems dang sa rna pas rdzojogs song da
135a4(rnying rgyud): sbyi tha ma mang po bsten cing khyad 'phags kyi tham bcu gsum bzhugs/ bka' drin 'gran na bral bzung rdzobabazang ba/ mthong bu 'ang bangs pa/ 'phral ni gas ga rgyab pa gsum las ting po 'don rnyed pa lad/ 'di brgyal grags che bas dan sa
135a5(rnying rgyud): slo zang do med pas gsang pa sngags kyi dmachog la grang bzhin par grod cas/ ko nag na ma mkha' ba lding ba mchong pas rig pa btul thugs kyi sogs nas nam mya ba'i lam la 'gro ba dang / drag la 'dang ltang byad pa zung / mngon pa s+hos dang / ma
135a6(rnying rgyud): pagling dang / seng ga rdzod dang / mkhan rgya rnams su sgrub pa'i rgyal mtshan btsugs shing 'gro don mdzad/ tshe tshad sum cu rtsa bdun yin pa la/ slob dpon kun dga' zhes pa'i skal ldan zhig gis gsol bzebs pas/ dgrang lo drug tu rtsa gcig pa
135a7(rnying rgyud): 'dzung rtsod la ba dag gags pa ma pa pa sgra cas pa gyi rgyags sa la la sas kyis na nga gyinas pa byu m+bu/ nem 'i ma nas the shing pa de 'i'i snrel zung ninas dang nga tus dpag tu da byang ni/
135b1(rnying rgyud): rtags kyi gdung yang rgyud las ji skad bshad pa bzhin byon to// 'di grub zob a rgyan pa dang dus mtshungs/ u rgyan pa bcu phrag lhag bcas kyis bgras la sku tsha yang ring ngo // ma long ba'i slob ma ni rig 'dzin ku mU rA dza ste/ gam ru 'on par gsar rdzing kha ce/
135b2(rnying rgyud): bya ba'i grong rdal du 'khrungs/ zar ba rgyan du btags/ chung ngu nas dad pa dang snying rje dang shes rab la sogs te 'phags pa'i nor gyi khyad chos mang po mda' bas klog yig ma bslabs par mkhyen/ lo bdun pa la kong po'i shod mtho stengs dgon pa'i bla ma
135b3(rnying rgyud): rdor ba las/ kye rdo rje dang bde mchog gi dbang zhus/ lo dgu pa'i tshe mkhan po gtsang ba las yongs rdzogs kyi dge bsnyen blangs/ spyan ras gzigs 'khor ba dod sngags kyi chos skor la sbyangs/ bcu gnyis pa la phag mo gu'i mkhan po ye rab ba dang
135b4(rnying rgyud): dpon mang 'dris pa las rab tu byung / mtshan gzhon nu rgyal por btags/ 'dul ba bslabs/ rin po rje thugs yob la lo wa'i bar dun rdo chos drug la sogs pa dang / mtshar stangs pal btag gnyis nywan/ dpon sangs shel bcwo dag pa bsgrubs/
135b5(rnying rgyud): yi ge drug pa bzlas pas shel gyi khang bu gcig na thugs rje chen po zhal 'dzum pa mthong / khyed nag shag dang la rnying ma'i rgyud lung man dag mang du zhus/ dang phug tu me long rdo rje dang mjal/ phyag rgya chen po'i khrid zhus pas sems car mthong du ngo 'phrod/
135b6(rnying rgyud): de nas grub chen ba mon gyi mkha' 'gro gling la gshegs pa'i phyag phyir byon/ rdo rje phag mo'i chos skor sogs zhus nas bsnyen pa mdzad pas/ chos bcu'i nub cig u rgyan pad+ma dang mjal/ e ma rigs kyi bu/ rtag tu chos kyis shig gsungs/
135b7(rnying rgyud): nas mtshur bur byon nas gnyen ras dang / daras mgon po la kar+sa pa'i chos slong rnams byas/ de nas la spyod dang ri dang / spu drur byon pas/ srub chen su can pa dang / rdegam pa dang byung brje krung mo bdun pa rab tu byung ma thag par
136a1(rnying rgyud): mdal/ un+ta palas gdams pa mang ngan/ denas so 'ga'an mo nyan pa sdu gnyan sa la byung te gsus pa'i tha chung ba thog/ sman pa nam mkha'ad pasags klo gan byung zla dang / la ldan nga rgya dag
136a2(rnying rgyud): ba gnad kyi me long sogs rdzogs chen gsang ba'i sgor zhus/ sbyar mkhang byar bubaze me long rdo rjer gsang ba nying tig dbang khrid gdams pa dang bcas pa legs par thong / 'bul zla gzhan med pas lus ngag gi zhabs tog dang / dbyar ming po gnyis su ri mo
136a3(rnying rgyud): byed/ nga ltung du sa kya rtog / dpanipa pas pa med dgasgom padradad pas drub bkyi cus kyis nang sa zheng/ gas das par byangab sa padras
136a4(rnying rgyud): mnyes nas 'gro don gyis shig pa'i rjes su gnang ba thob/ dbang bral du tha ma'i dbu'i bar snang la mgon po phyag bzhi pa dang / sgo'i zad na ye ka rdo nI mthing mo zhing dbyug dang lung mo bsdams pa 'ongs nyis thog tsam pa/ phyi dos na las kyi ma mo khrag ral can pa
136a5(rnying rgyud): pas sdug brtsas nas 'thung ba rnams mthong / lo brgyad du bla ma 'du 'bral med par bsten/ u D+yan gyi srub gnas srug chol sdug tu dgun thog cig bzhugs pas rdo rje phag mo zhal gzigs/ de nas shes rab gyogs med du byas/ re zhig sa krung sa mdzang ste
136a6(rnying rgyud): gyi re khrod btab nas bzhugs/ de nas bla ma 'da' bar mkhyen nas mkhar cur gyon can/ bla ma'i sras gnyis sa skyugs su dajom/ slang log nyi shu lnga'i dus mchod btsugs/ tsa ri la gyon pas thig mo lha'i ni rgyag song gi rdo mu la 'ang 'dzin sA lnga Tu
136a7(rnying rgyud): sogs byung / de nas mtshur phung chos rje rang byung rdo rjes gdan drangs te snying tig gi gdams pan yul/ shangs su byon nas lce sgom nag po'i brgyud pa slob dpon sgom pa la gsang skod snyan brgyad rnams dang / bsam gtan mig gi blon me zung / ding ri ldad mang
136b1(rnying rgyud): byad sgrub la yang dgon pa'i ri chos rnams nyan/ u rgyan pa rin chen dpal dang yang mjal/ mar lam bla ma bkra lung ba las gshin rje dgra nag la sogs pa zhus/ slob dpon ye mgon la sogs pa bshes gnyen mang dag las gsang skor dang / rgod
136b2(rnying rgyud): tshang ba'i khrid kyi skor/ a ro'i khrid mo che don skor la sogs pa bod na grags pa che ba'i rdzogs rim phal mo che khong du chud/ chos phyir dka' spyad bzod pas tsa ri gsar ma bgrod nas rnying ma'i g.yu mtsho 'gram du gcig pur zla ba brgyad bzhugs/ cho 'phrul chen
136b3(rnying rgyud): gshis thog tu ro snyoms pas gzhi bdag dbang du 'dus nas khang par gdan drangs bsnyen bkur byas/ dza ma b+ha las nor bu byin/ mtsho nang du 'od lnga'i lbu ba sel po tsam zhig thim 'gro ba gzigs/ thugs nges 'byung dang skyo shas kyis rgyud brngan
136b4(rnying rgyud): pas dus rtag tu sham po la sogs gdas khrod dang lung stong 'ba' zhig tu lhag skyob tsam la brten nas bzhugs pas slob ma'i tshogs mang po 'khor ba mtha' can du mdzad/ sbal ba'i skur gdon mi zab karma ba dang byang rdo rje dang / rgyal ba klong zan
136b5(rnying rgyud): gnyis rdzogs pa chen po'i slob ma'i gtso bor gyur pas bstan pa 'ang spel ba'i phrin las la mu dang mthar ma son/ de skad du 'bri gung pa chos rgyal rin chen phun tshogs kyis/ chos 'di'i bstan pa'i bdag po kun mkhyen grong zin pa yin/
136b6(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba dbyung rdo rje'i dus phran las chu rje/ zhes gsungs pas mtshan no// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la shin tu goms pas snying rje chen po'i dbang gis grong dang yul 'khor mang po dag la'ang thabs la mkhas pas thar pa'i sa bon 'debs pa
136b7(rnying rgyud): na lhar mdzad cing / kong po nas e la thug gi bar 'jigs pas nyan pa'i lam phrang la 'gro ba dag gi dbu ga 'byin pa dang / ri dwags dang nya la sogs pa'i sems can nyam rkyang ba de dag la thugs shin tu brtse bas bdog pa la 'phangs sems med pa
137a1(rnying rgyud): ri r+g+ha dang / lam cu dang / rgya rgya la sogs pa mdzad nas bde'angam la bkod/ gang du bzhugs pa'i ltung ba dang / yul grong thams cad kyi sa da sar yam+ba nad la sogs pa zhi bar mdzad cing pana' 'ba' jig ra
137a2(rnying rgyud): snying tig gi gdams pardzogs rim gzhan dang ma 'dres par rang skad kyi grub mtha' bslang ste 'thad nus pa dang / shangs la sleb ma ri mo can mnga' bsngags bdag gza' dang das can rnams kyis bka' la nyan cing mi dang si la ba pa bzhin du yod pad
137a3(rnying rgyud): par shes pas gdul bya'i bsam pa mkhyen nas 'dul lugs mkhas pa dang / gzhan rgyud byin gyis rlobs nus pa dang / rjes su bzung ba'i skul ldan kun la 'das dus rtags khyad par can 'byung ba sogs slob dpon be ma la'i sku'i bkod par grags shing /
137a4(rnying rgyud): bal 'gyur las dge slong dpal ldan zhes phreng bstan to// de kar don gyi ma na pas ma gyis mirtsub pa'i nga nas brtan ca rtsa brgyad pa rgya cwo mug ni ma'i ston tha bying ba'i nyi shul la rtswa dang 'od dang / thar tham la sogs pa dgas ngos pa nga dang pa
137a5(rnying rgyud): skrag she sa/ ga zhes du pamigs pa na nams kyis rgya ga nga kyis ma / nas kyi du bya sa pa
137a6(rnying rgyud): gzhal ta ci rigs partson/ zhag bcu gsum su ma slar la bsrings/ dar chos bdun gyi sbyin gshegs pa'i phye na ltar bci/ zla stsug nam khyen paglad na 'dren du ma zhas pas/ nga thal du phywa ga da da rgyas kyi kun tha mchod pa
137a7(rnying rgyud): mdan dang song / btemang po thar nas byas ban macom ma smragasungs/ drang srong tsog pa'i 'dug stangs dang / chos su'i gzigs sbyangs gyi ngang las 'dzus par ma da/ chos brgyad kyi thongs na gdod pa'i grong khye gan pade gnas
137b1(rnying rgyud): ma su du na tu su du sa na nag du sas su smos su
137b2(rnying rgyud): 'al ba'i sa ga' cu 'drin/ gas pabre na gtsu du ci bye ci ma kyigs skyes pa'i sa ma pa sa skyed dung bsu pa larnas sebs nanapa la ba pa ci
137b3(rnying rgyud): hAstan snron gnyis ni bzhi ba'i rol skyong 'dug gi rnam pas gshegs can/ mig g.yonal ba cad kyi mya ngan yi zeng nas rtsi/ khab kyis gcags/ dal 'byor gyi mos bco brgyang byung ba'i sras las gzhan du bya bas gas te/ rnal
137b4(rnying rgyud): gnyis kyi phreng srid pa bzung / sngon gnas rdzas su dran pa la grib byed bu'i rtse mo tsam yang med pas mngal gyi khrims gtan nas mgos pa rgya ga na shA ba thub pa dang / grod du skyes bu chen po 'di las med par tha / rgya bod gnyis gang sangs kyis
137b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i srog shing gcig pur bzhugs/ bsam lusu ma phyims rba dang gala'am wang sogs nas tshe rje'i gter ba nas nas gong maN+Dal ze coM'i sri sa/ bri ma la mi b+hang shi mdzod srung thim pa ga bus pa'i nod la snying shig gi dgongs pa 'i ltab 'dzin
137b6(rnying rgyud): gyur/ 'on kyang gsang sngags bla ma la bsten pa'i mig ltos tsam ste nA pa'i skad du bcom bsgyangs nas rig 'dzin kra mA rA dza las gsang ba nying tig gi man ngag yongs su rdzogs pa gsan/ 'di ni slob dpon chen po pad+ma las brgyad pa gcig 'ong ba dang la dgo
137b7(rnying rgyud): sa sa dun sa su byan kyi du na su sa du sa su
138a1(rnying rgyud): gsungs/ bka' las/ chos 'dis bu nub tu 'phangs pas gsung ston rdo rje dpal gyis gtsang / ye rgyal bas khams kong / ye shes rgyal mtshan pas hor dang rtsa nag/ phul sra bas dbus su dar bar gyis zhes phran lung
138a2(rnying rgyud): pa shAkya gzhon nu sogs la rdzas su gdams/ sa la gnas pa'i byang sems kyis// rgya mtsho'i bar du spel bar byed// ces pa de yin par grags/ kun tu bzang po thugs kyi klod na rang gsal te dgongs pa'i gter mdzod chen po la dbang bsgyur nas ka ma
138a3(rnying rgyud): snying tig ces grags pa'i gdams pa yang byung / 'di dag kyang bstan pa'i rgya mgo gcig yin no// rgyal ba gnyis pa dpal bas ma yas pa kun mkhyen dag gi dbang po'am/ klong chen rab 'byams ni/ g.yo chu ga'i tshe stod grong du ngan lam bcan po 'od kyi bkyi
138a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor can zhes bya ba ma smad pa'i rigs kyi yon tan can no// rus ni rog ste sad ma bdun gyi nad tshan dz+nyA na in+d+ra rak+Shi ta'am/ bod skad du ye shes dbang po bsrung / slob dpon chen po'i dngos slong dge slong rgyal ba mchog dbyangs dang gdung gcig pa'i rabs nyer
138a5(rnying rgyud): lnga pa/ mes po lha srung zhes bdud rtsi'i bcud len grub pas po brgya dang lngar 'tsho ba de'i sras slob dpon bsten pa phreng zhes rig gnas dang sngags kyi rnal 'byor la rang byan chud pa zhig/ 'brem skyon rin po che kyal ba'i 'byung gnas kyi gdung las byon pa 'gro ma bzad ma bsod
138a6(rnying rgyud): nams rgyun zhes b+ha ba dang 'dus pa las gyi ba'i myu gu bzung ngo // de'i tshe yum la seng ge chen po gcig gi dpral ba na nyi ma mdzad zer 'bar bas med pa gsum lhag ger gsal ba zhig rang nyid la thim par rmis mo// de nas rab kyad lnga pa'i phur byas spre'u jo zla tshang
138a7(rnying rgyud): ba hrIn mngal ma rgya 'ing ni las rnam par no/ gzhon nu don grub la sgra'i dang thos zab bzhin dun ma su ma tes ngas bsrung ba lan zhes lag tu grangs/ sla rgyas la gtud nas mi spang bar mang / mad skyer byang rgyam sems dpa' ni bags pa na
138b1(rnying rgyud): tu / san rgyu du
138b2(rnying rgyud): rgyas ma sogs pa me pa yo da/ dgra pa'i snying dun rdzid nga rgyang shing bas mar bston pas kyig med gas la 'ad+has/ bcuganyis pa'i mas mams pa sa' babasan chen dang / 'i pon pa dga' 'a sa
138b3(rnying rgyud): nangs po banyes/ mtshan tshul khrims tho gros su zags/ dam pa chos 'dul ba la legs par sbyangs pas yo bcu bzhi par bshad pa'i bdan bzang chog pa byung / bcu drug par slob dpon 'ab shis rin chen la la ma 'a bras dang / rdzas drug gnyis/
138b4(rnying rgyud): phag mo'i chos drug/ bde mchog dril zab/ phyag rdor 'khor chen ma mags pa'i dbang khrid gdams pa mang du ta nA/ slob dpon dbang ye/ ston tsal/ khro bu pa la sogs par/ byA hrI/ rnal 'byor/ rdo rje grar/ mnga'

138b6(rnying rgyud): pa mang du nyan/ bcu dgu par gadra ri'i khrod na tshad ma smra ba'i rig gra chen po jog/ legs pa'i shes rab kyis legs par bskrun pa'i gnas gsang phu ne'u thog gi ma lA ya'i nah+la kyang chen por zhugs nas gling stod gdan rapas bco lnga pa slob dpon btsan dgon pa dang

139a7(rnying rgyud): skyes bu chen po ni rnam par grol ba'i lam la gang nye ba'i phyogs la 'jug par rtsom ste/ phyogs bral gyi gnas su lha gra nas byang chub sems dpa' tag tu rnam par tha ba la yid gzungs ngas/ tha ma dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen du pa la mdo dang / rgyud dang /

145b2(rnying rgyud): sngon la 'gro zer/ der nam gram ba bas nas thab mi gshegs par bu zer/ khyed sa ma yin rnams la ngas chos de 'dra bshad kyang mgo/ dga' mi dga' blo che 'phrul yin/ ngagang yongs 'ongs pas ga gsungs nas ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang bcur

146'b1(rnying rgyud): dang / brtag tu dang / sran byin pa'i sder po nan bdudu nas kyang mi smra ba dang yul yul po'i gnas la 'god nga sngon dung grobs/ smon pa 'jig rten gsum gyi mag gcig zang dra bda'i mthang theg pa gsum gyi kha pa dang byen por/ blan med pa'i theg pa'i byed

150a4(rnying rgyud): pagasum du bsdus pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bcung ba bzhi lhag bcas te/ kun dril bas sde tshan brgya phrag gnyis dang drug cu rtsa gsum tsam mo// de dag kyang mdo tsam smos pa ste/ gzhan du chos 'byung rin po che'i gtar mdzod ces bya ba dang / chos
150a5(rnying rgyud): rab tu gsal ba dang / shi gson gyi bsngo ba rin chen phreng ba dang / rgyal khams 'dus pa me tog theng ldan dang / rkyen la khams 'dus pa ka tha sum cu/ gru rkyen gnyis kA la khams 'dus pa dus la mngon par skyo ba'i rabs la sogs pa shin tu mang la/
150a6(rnying rgyud): dus dag tu bsdu ba'i brtson 'grus nyung pa'am/ mkhas rmongs kyi bstan bcos la bye brag mi phyed pa'i shugs kyis nub pa'ang shin tu mngab yod mchi ste gsung rab kyi dkar mag rin po che'i mdzod khang zhes bya ba la shes par bya ba ni gyi mtha' 'di'i gtan tshigs tsam mo//
150a7(rnying rgyud): babs lugs chen mor sgra ma khas dpal 'dzin du lung bstan pa la sngon gyi bla ma rnams kyis ngos 'dzin par 'dug ste/ go rim gyi nges pa ltar na blo gros mchog tu ngos bzung na 'thad la/ ku ma dang deng gnyis kyi bar la lo la rgya bcu'i gtan tshigs mi 'grub snyam
150b1(rnying rgyud): dru'ang dog par mi byaH/ mo brgya ni spyir bstan pa 'di yid dpyod dang 'dres pa'i tshe de'i gsal byed de 'byon pa la dgongs kyi/ gzhan du ni gnas skabs de dang de'i gdul bya'i ten 'brel khon la smos nas sprul bsgru ba lta bas don mdzad par byung ngo // don la dran ma
150b2(rnying rgyud): po 'jig rten dubyon nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yin pas 'di'i gsung rab tshig bzhi pa yan chang la'ang gces spras su bya ba yin no// de la gsung gi bdud ci myangs pa las byung ba'i slob ma'i gtso bo dag smos pa ni/ zhog thar gling pa mkhas grub pa de legs rgyan tsho/ mtha
150b3(rnying rgyud): grub chos kyi grags pa/ mkhas khrag khya gad la sprin thub ste grags pa thob pa'i mkhas grub gsum/ mdo khams pa 'dan sbom chos kyi grag pa/ rgyal sras bzod pa/ tha ma ngapal mchog pa/ gu r+ya ye shes rang 'byar ma/ gzhon nusangs rgyas te
150b4(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi sras hA/ ska la skud pal 'byor rgyam gyi/ slob dpon sangs rgyas kun dgra'/ slob dpon blo gros bzang po/ ste go bya bral sa / bstan pa spel ba'i bshes gnyen pani/ pha rgod rtogs ldan rgyal po/ rnal 'byor pa 'od zer
150b5(rnying rgyud): rig 'dzin 'odags la rang grol/ zla btang bsod nams dod zer te grub pa rdzob pa de rnal 'byor ba bani/ gzhan yang ste gdong gong ma dang mtshams sbyor ba'i sangs rgyas dpal rin dang / grags pa dpal/ glu mkhan bsod nams sa dgrel song ba/ na
150b6(rnying rgyud): gyipa shes gnyen du ma byur/ gyis chos rgyal 'bri gung pa rin chen bun tshogs pa zhal bstan cing / rang gi sras mul su zla ba zhes dbu gtsug rta mgos mtshan par ston pa de'i phye ba yin par lung brtan/ dbu khwa bskon te byin gyis brlangs pa las dngos kyi slong mar gyur
150b7(rnying rgyud): te sre rab rnams la 'dzin skyong spel ba'i gces spras dpag tu med pa mdzad/ de las bad+ma rgyal thob rnyan ta bu ba 'am/ gter chen shes rab 'od zer la brgyud/ dpal ri theg pa mchog gi rming baspyan nas bstan pa'i phyin pa dag zhabs drung rgyar byung pa

151a2(rnying rgyud): gyi lor dpal gyi mchims phur ye shes kyi sral na gsum bstan cing shing rta chen mo so gas bab pa'i man ngag thams cad 'dis gsal zhes grags pa ma zhig kyang gtad/ gdams pa dang rjes dra ga dmas pa thams dang paskal nas chos tshu mchong spang par ldan
151a3(rnying rgyud): bla ma nyid kyi gzhung lugs dang gdams pa mtha' dag la rang bran chud/ shin tu te brgyad kyang chung ste 'phags pa lhas ma ti kri pa rjes su bzung ba bzhin no// man ngag snying gi thig le'i skabs ci ga tam ba ka// / da ni mdo lnga sems 'a
151a4(rnying rgyud): bstan pa spyi'i babs tshul la/ gangs ri khrod 'dir snga 'gyur rdo rje theg pa'i bstan pa dang por gtag la babs/ bar du gnubs la babs/ tha ma zur la babs zhes 'chad pa'i dang po slob dpon gnyis ma ku mA ra ni/ yul yang ngadra shal ba
151a5(rnying rgyud): 'gyis/ rus las ming du chags pa gtags stag sla lta snang dang / sru bza' sgron sgyid gnyis kyi sras su byung / mgrin pa na sle ba rdo rje rgya gra ma yod/ mtshan rgyal ba'i blo gros su btags/ mkhan po bo d+hi satwa las rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs/
151a6(rnying rgyud): mdo sngags kyi chos mang po'i 'gyur byed spobs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/ slob dpon chen po dang / bi ma la dang / bai ro dang / g.yu sgra snying po kun la bsten pas bka'i chu bo bzhi 'dus pa yin/ dkyus bshad gzhung gi chu bo 'grel ji ka stong
151a7(rnying rgyud): brun dang bcas pa/ spyan bcud gdams ngag gi chu bo gnang yi ga dmam glid dang bcas pa/ byin dbang gi chu bo lhung thabs ngo sprod dang bcas pa/ phyag bzhes phrin phung kyi thu bo bstan srang hra/ sngags dang bangs pa'o// da la slob dpon chen pos be
151b1(rnying rgyud): yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor du smin par mdzad pas yar sbyang sa shel gyi drag phug rdob skam po'i khong nas brub chu ba ton/ 'di las brgyad pa'i sgyu 'phrul kyang yod dgos te/ gtso bor phur pa las mngon rtags brnyes pa yin/ bcang po khri srong gshegs pa'i gyi zhig na
151b2(rnying rgyud): btsun mo che spong bza' bsam sbyor mi srun pas lo pa Na phal cher dbu 'phang smad/ gnyigs dz+nyA na ku mA ra sa yar 'phrog tu bzhugs pa la/ rang gi pha spun gnyag dge ston dgrar langs te 'dri mu stegs kyi sngags mkhan yin no zer g.yo can gyi khaskas byas/ bse
151b3(rnying rgyud): zhos byugs pa'i b+han+ta nang dmar ba yod pa de brkus nas phye bo blun por gyur pa dag la ston cing / b+han+d+ha'i nang gri rtses drung nas 'di ni zag zog gi las so zhes dbyen bcos/ skye bo rnams the tshom sel ba'i ched du/ gang du bzhug sar rin po che'i rnyed pa srul
151b4(rnying rgyud): pas mi rnams kyis rdzu 'phrul du shes nas kho'i ngag la yid mi gtod kyang / da dung bya ba mang po bsogs nas sru lab rdo ba'i thabs sna tshogs byed pa mkhyen nas gshegs/ kong po mchims yul gyi phran phebs ce na/ lung stong gcig nar ma bdun 'gro zhing
151b5(rnying rgyud): 'dug/ g.yog po glal mig 'og btsan bya bar 'di ded cig gsungs pas/ kho na re/ ra la bdag po yod mchi 'dis ci 'tshal zhus pas/ lung stong gi ra la bdag pog na 'od ded cig gsungs/ der bdag po mchims bya rog
151b6(rnying rgyud): gis shes te rkun khag phab/ ral bdun 'jal dgos zer/ bdun 'jal sprad tsan/ dadung ma tshims par dben pa bshigs/ lcags kyi thob bzung nas 'ded du byung / gnyigs kyis bros nas gzog lag khang gi nang du chud/ sgo bca
151b7(rnying rgyud): pas them pa la thobs brdeg cing ba tsun chung gi mgo la de'u thebs zer/ der yang bzhugs su ma ster bas/ dbus su gtad de byon tsan/ 'gro sras chung bya ba sha ba gcig ded nas byung ba phrad/ kho'i rta 'drogs/ sha ba shor bas/ khro yang spos te/

152b4(rnying rgyud): mdzad byin tu mtshan nyid tu chos bshad pas bong rna pa mi du ma byung / bre yog sde gsum bshad pas ris 'gang tsam nyan cing gzhan thobathems tsams brdung skang / nad kyang rje gsum bshad byin lcags kyi lkug ma stod pa rnams gyur med byas dang / kho mam
152b5(rnying rgyud): skyes te 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul ci las byung zer/ da lta bshad pa'i chos de nyams su blangs pa las byung smras pas/ kho shin tu dang de lag cha thams cad phul nas slob mar byas/ lha dpal gyi ye shes su ming spos/ de bzhin du 'o bra na dpal gyi gzhon nu yang phur pa
152b6(rnying rgyud): sgrub pa'i mtshan ldan du shes nas dpon slob gsum kas bslabs pas/ de dge ston cis tshor te gsod du 'gro ba'i sta gon brtsams pa na/ gzhan dag gis ban+der brnyas pa mi rung zer nas bshol btab kyang mnyan/ nang par 'gro chu'i nub bud med mang pos mtha'

154b7(rnying rgyud): rdorje rtse dgu pa zhig rang gi zad khru gang gi sar byung ste lan gnyis sum zin/ gsum pa'i tshe phyag g.yas pa'i mtheb srin gyibar du chags pa'i mod la daphyag na rdo rje dngos kyi slar gyur/ dbang bslar/ byin gyis brlabs/ sangs rgyas ye shes su ming

155a4(rnying rgyud): mon nag kha khri'i thod pa'ang dam tshig gi rdzas su spad/ mngon shes dang rdzu 'phrul thogs pa med par grub/ bod yul dbus kyi gnas sngags kyi yang rjong du srub gnas kyi mthil mdzad/ de bzhin du nyug gi rdo rje sbom bur zla ba dbus sems ta

155b2(rnying rgyud): chos gos kyi gnas srang lding gi zang bung toH/ ngam can rnams kyi song snyeng rdzangs/ dpag 'or ba'i logs na rdzaldas pab/ ribs med pa po nga te gagarnams thams pa ba kra ga par / snang btang po sa bsam
155b3(rnying rgyud): gtan mig gi smon ma 'ig sbyong du mdo dang grags/ dru dgra thul rjes lo gsum gyi bar pa dbul zhing yongs/ son po dpal gyi shes ras sems phyogs dang rtswa 'thul la sogs pag pa na/ grags yang rtsong du de kho na nyid pe ting nge 'dzin la gzhol/
155b4(rnying rgyud): mnga' bdag ral ba can gyi bar yan chong du rgyag dang bod kyi bar du 'byon bzhud kyi dang du yod pa la/ dang mas bstan pa bsgrubs pa thugs kyis ma bzod nas slar yang dag sngags su'i gnongs po tshogs pa 'thung nas ma na gas nas mtshams kyang bar dgongs pa la
155b5(rnying rgyud): sdig brtson rgyal po lha lung dpal gyi rdo rjes bsgral zin pas drug sngags bcol gyi dogs nas gter du zas/ mdo rgya sems gsum gyi bstan pa'i rgyan slob ma'i tshogs la mi nub par rjes nas mthar rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po'i lam nas lhan ba 'od kyi phung por ma du
155b6(rnying rgyud): las 'das so// 'di la rgyud 'dzin gyi slob bu bras kyi dam pa gcig/ thugs zin gyi sras bzhi dang lngar byung ba las/ sras kyi dam pa yon tan rgya mtsha ni skye ba snga ma ya sras su 'bral/ 'dir gzubs pa du'adzas/ gye bsnga ma
155b7(rnying rgyud): phu r+ya gar d+ha na d+ha las gnod sbyin mo'i rkang mgyogs bsgrubs nas grub kyang gzhog pa bcag pas ma nuH/ slar nang mgyogs cig zhos bsgrubs pas khos thu ba'i na dang rtan N+Dal khur nas mtshon gang gcig la khri lung yon tan gyi mtsho'i char bsngal/ de
156a1(rnying rgyud): yon tan rgyu mtsho'i skyeb snga ma rang gi gsung por gyur ba la rjes su bcabs dbang bskur/ yon bdag lathun myong gi dngos grub byin pas ma rabasu bdun chud zadang ba phyags/ yon tan kyam tsho la srab gnas
156a2(rnying rgyud): spyo du mi kyang gsungs nas mkhar gdongos yon mo'i gtsug du ma lta bu'i sa gan bstan te/ brtan brang ga shin rdo mar nag dang / mi gzhin gyi sgong sogs byin nas rgya gar du gshegs/ der yon tan po lo mas 'o na ga'i la 'argya ma
156a3(rnying rgyud): sa ma
156a4(rnying rgyud): phyung / star gagegs sel gyi tshul te bzhi ka bshad pas gdams ngag thams cad rdzogs par grags/ 'di la'ang khengs log byung ste gshed ma bcus bskor ba'i tshe yang 'bar ba lta stangs kyi rdzu 'phrul mngon sum du grub pas/ snyun g.yas pa
156a5(rnying rgyud): g.yon panas rgya ma ba skam bas rnags pasta dzi bus ma rnyed pa 'a ga tshor ba'i du gros 'dzunabyur ming ma mang po'i dral mi dati tu du 'os/ nyid kyi 'don pa mag
156a6(rnying rgyud): bas dngos grub chen po gnyis ka brnyes pa zhig yin te/ rnam thar byas pa yi ge'i lam du 'dren par mi nus pas so lugs kyi yig cha sogs las shes so// thugs zin gyi sras bzhin/ so ye shes dbang phyug la lta ba skad dril te bshad/ pa gor
156a7(rnying rgyud): na pags leg slong ming rjogang gyu nas bad/ dran mi ma tshogal sa khri sa pa ju / ga/ 'azhi ba don tan 'ad// 'al sa
156b1(rnying rgyud): dang / pazla pa rnam sa nga / gas rnam pa'ims na rnamasto bcan sa sa / sugatanamasas rgya phyogs na nga / yo/ la sas sa sa nya na /
156b2(rnying rgyud): gsum ka la mkhas par grags shing dog lag gongs kyi gtsug lag khang yang bzhengs/ ha'o grol gyi zug la grub pa mdzad pa'otsho/ rdo rje bur ba'i dkyil 'khor zhal gzigs/ brag la rdorje brgyab pas 'jam pa la zlas pa bzhin them gyis song bsogs
156b3(rnying rgyud): ba'irnyes pa'i lo rgyas mang du yod/ de'i slob ma thos lung nyang shes rab 'byung gnas yin/ bla ma'i thugs 'i na ting / bskyed rdzogs gsum ka la mkhas pa'i grags pa zog/ de ga las ba byung ba thal mo rje 'od lcags sam/ nus pas
156b4(rnying rgyud): btags te nyang lugs kyang zer ro// yang so ye shes dbang phyug gi slob mang na thung byang chub rgyal mtshan/ kong brtson shes rab ye shes/ ra thung shes rab tshul khrims te gsum ka yin gyi phreng chags su mi 'dren zhes 'gos gzhon nu dpal ba bzhed/
156b5(rnying rgyud): yon tan rgya mtsho yab sras dang / so yi dbang gnyis ka'i slob ma nyang shes rab mchog/ de'i slob ma ye shes 'byung gnas/ de'i slob ma lha rje zung po che ste zur po che ni stong tsha ba 'phags pa rin po che la'ang thug pas/ gnubs chen dang zur po cha
156b6(rnying rgyud): byor na bla ma gcig yod pa yin no// da ni tha ma zur la babs pa'i rnam gzhag bshad par bya ste/ de la phur po che shAkya byung gnas kyis bstan pabagyi ngaral snga 'gyur gyi bstan pa'i rtsa ba btsugs/ zur chung ba shes rab grags kyis yal ga brgyangs/
156b7(rnying rgyud): rlo gyikyas dgas mo 'bras rgyas par mdzad pas zu sa se pon rnam gsus sa grags la/ spyi thur ces tha ga 'di nga ga nas lcags bzhin hU~M 'phags pa'i yul du 'dags la spyad ba dgazhon nug cug tur can/ de sus
157a1(rnying rgyud): mar+tha zangs zhu can/ de'i sras mdo khams su byung bzur rgyal ba gsum glags/ de'i sras zur ba shes gnyen stug sgra can/ de'i sras bur rin chen ma mtsho/ de'i sras mtsho bzang min kho cha/ de bsngon dun rje zur
157a2(rnying rgyud): po che di'i sras su 'chad cing / gzhan du a tsa rari'i sras su 'dod kyang / 'dir zur pa'i rabs nyi shu rtsa bdun gyi yi ge zhig mthong ba de nyid btson par bgyis te mig po che la zu a tsar/ brar la yan lag can/ zur bzang shes rab 'byung gnas te sras gsung
157a3(rnying rgyud): byung bas tha chung sher 'byung gi sras lha rje zur po che/ zur ston bla ma/ thur sgom rdo rje 'byung gnas/ zur sgom rgyang dang bzhir byung la/ che ba a tsa ras rgya gar la byon pa'i sras nyi ma'i snying po/ slang bong du byon nas thag lud par bzhugs pa'i sras zur thag pa
157a4(rnying rgyud): sgom che na/ de'i sras zur chung shes rab grags pa yin zhes sla'o// de la d+ha rje zur po che ni dpal chen po 'jig rten du mngon sum byon pa yin te/ yul mdo khams kyi sa'i cha yang rdzong ngam g.yar mo zhes bya bar yum yon bdag mo bde ba lha ma zhes bya ba'i
157a5(rnying rgyud): sras su 'khrungs/ skams su zhugs pa'i tshe yab kyi mnal lam du gser gyi 'khor lo cibs stong pa phyag tu byung ba dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs yum la thim pa sogs byung bas skul ba'i chur shes nas mtshan shAkya 'byung gnas su btags/

157a7(rnying rgyud): ce mtsha rje nas mtshan nyid sde gsum/ kr-i ya/ rnam 'joms/ rnam snang / s+yAd/ dpal mchog dang po rnams dang / gsang sngags nang gi man ngag thabs lam la sogs pa dang mkhas par mkhyen/ de yang gsung las/

157b2(rnying rgyud): gseb nas lha'i bu gnyis kyis lam bstan te dbus phyogs su brtol/ yar krung na mo lung du kr-i ya la sgrub pa mdzad pa'i tshe/ theg pa chen po gsang ba bla na med pa'i rigs sad de/ spang len rtsol byas kyi lam 'di ni 'ching ba'i rgyur 'dug/ tshegs rgyang
157b3(rnying rgyud): rgya slab gsang sngags bla med kyi lam zhig dang mnga' bar dog dgongs pa'i nub/ nags tsa can gyi la sgo ma zer bzhis byung / de re gtsang po la lam rgyas bcol nas gcong la gtung de rtson/ gsang sngags kyi chos la mkhas grub brnyes pasu yod nges pas
157b4(rnying rgyud): nags tshal gsum sgril bye ba na yod na/ der sngar gyi rmi la madran nas byon/ dge gong gi sre shag mchog la bdud ci sman sgrub la sogs pa zhus/ spyi bur chen la bla ma mang du bzhugs te/ khyad par du chos lung gi tar ye shes 'byung gnas pas
157b5(rnying rgyud): zur ba'i me tog thog pa'i chos sgyu 'thung dang sems phyogs rnyed pa yin/ tho gar rnamamapa' spel rje la do ngang par khab/ rdzogs chen mnang ga dang bcas pa/ yul gser gyi gtan nag dbang drug dang / lce kAk+Shu N+Da la mtshan la sagasang bang dang thabs
157b6(rnying rgyud): las/ kyang snod kyi 'dzin chung pa bdag dang ldan 'am/ sku 'phrul la ma m+ba/ mchims pa'i dog shA 'byung dang ldan ma shir tshul las yang sa// lha ston bsod nams sh+tsa ba de yongs rdzogs/ snong tshab byung rgya/ rgya sto rje zas
157b7(rnying rgyud): bka' sdong ye shes nga po rnams la'ang mdo lung / dbang sgrub/ zung 'grel phrin las dang bcas pags na ning / the me de dag kyang rta la sogs 'ang bdag/ dgra'i 'bral ba dang / 'khor gsum yang dag gi mchod pas mnyes par byas pa bal
158a1(rnying rgyud): zhig go/ tshul de lta bus mkhas pa mang po'i man dag byangs/ dgongs pa nyams 'og tu chud/ sde snod dang / rgyud sde'i grub mtha' kun la mkhas shing byang chub par byas nas/ tha rgyang dang bshad kya thebs/
158a2(rnying rgyud): bdang 'grel pa sdebs/ rgyud dang grub thabs su sdebs/ rtsub thabs cho ga yig la sogs par rdzobs nas lag len du jebs par byas/ nags tshal can gyi ri la dpal yang dag gi grub pa kho na la gcig tu gzhol bas bskyed rdzogs bzlas gsum gyi gdeng chen
158a3(rnying rgyud): po stobs su gyur/ mgrin pa longs spyod ci 'khor lo'i rtsa mdung grol nas shes rab phyogs med du rgyas/ slob ma mang du 'dus pa la mdo dang sgyu 'phrul gyi 'char nyan gang mdzad/ rgyun du g.yeng ba'i las thams cad rnam par spangs/ che thabs

160b3(rnying rgyud): stedaka ba brgyad kyi sar bla ma brgyad pa'i yang ris/ skor khang la parla brgya ldan la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa gsum/ khyams smad ka ba nyi shu'i sar sangs rgyas stong \u0f7f/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas tshong dngag med pa nye sras kyis bskor ba/ sangs

160b5(rnying rgyud): dani nga rgya khang thang ka yan chod gser gyis 'brug pa yin/ gser 'grong ri tshugs po la 'do na gsungs nas dgongs pa mang pas/ nam byeng nag zhi bdag pa can de tub nas pa gcig tu byas nas byung / zang po chel phyag dang bskor ba byas nas lha khang ga tsan
160b6(rnying rgyud): 'alan mod gser du thugs na/ deng kyi gser 'dzad pas/ lha'i sku rnams khyab des zhig babul zer bas de bzhin du mdzad/ rab tu gnas pa'i tshe rgya ya bzur che chung gis kun rig rnam snang gi dbug tsug nas zhugs thugs kar thon/ pugra ka nas zhugs dbu
160b7(rnying rgyud): gtsug tu thon pa la sogs rngu 'phrul gyi kong bzang mi shes pa bstan pase zo bo rnams snying zag pa nas dad par gyur te/ bla ma'i lha khang rir ba tsam pa/ mchod rten gyi 'degs byed zer/ bas ma yas mchod rten rngon mo la dpe byas/ bkra shes gom sa
161a1(rnying rgyud): b+ha nga gi thang phyogs su dang zhangs kyis phul/ bla ma' mtshan gang nas la chags pas dpal thag tha lung nas yongs sa grags/ wa thAng ba cha'i rang la dab ba nas/ bur chung pas so btu/ za shAs su gas
161a2(rnying rgyud): dang byas su mdzad byer bde gdan rabs 'dis lnga 'gyur rdo rje theg pa'i bstan pa la bya ba nab po che mdzad pa'i rnam gzhag yin no// de nas 'chad nyan la sogs pa'i 'gro don rgya chen po mdzad/ re zhig nang pon stong glan gyis yang dben ser mo'i yang dag gi lo sgra
161a3(rnying rgyud): pas mur bad de mchod me ma byung bas/ chu mi gzhag bdun du mar khur byin gyis brlabs nas mar khwa 'dzad med blangs chog pa byung / ter thog mar 'chad nyan pa rnams bshad pa la gtso bor 'don pas dang po can zhin las shes pa nyung te/ 'od rnams chos
161a4(rnying rgyud): rangab gro glang byed zin las shes shing ba mo thang med bdag ma shes pa'i phyogs pa lang/ rgyun ga tud spyan cig tu gting po'i tshe phrin las shes pa mos kyi nga mnyan rje tham zhal nas/ gang la mthar phyin pa gcig gis grol ba yan
161a5(rnying rgyud): gcig gis gcig la khyed gsong mi rung / theg pa dgu'i grub mtha' rangs na yod kyi/ bge ba'i kha 'dzin pa ma yin/ gsungs pas thams cad la don gyi go bzhang par can byas nas zhi dul drug nas pa byad/ de'i dus su bla ma'i zhal

167b5(rnying rgyud): par ba dang bcas pas btus/ lo bdun par 'bri 'og dang / dgral lo khro'i zin las cer shes pa byung / bcugasum lon pa'i skabs gcig nag zims malan phyag dpe gzigs shing yang can/ jo mo zhig yong pa b+ha gang zung ste zhing la b+ha log shor 'drang

167b7(rnying rgyud): par gos 'phangs na rten mod ces bsgyur bas/ mo thos tang la brnyas pa yin zer nas rang yul du thos/ zur chung ba lakhor ba la sgrib skye gnas gdung langs nas 'ad lud pa de khyer rjes la wa btang bas/ mo ya shog ces 'bod du re nas chos
168a1(rnying rgyud): na / mar badzad pa la ba ga tu nga/ phan ba pa na martsa ba yin pas thad tha cag smras pas ma la chad nas yul dumang / ngan byar nad pas pa lams mjud/ sa sa sa mnas tu
168a2(rnying rgyud): bltas par sbyang srog zhig yod pa khyer nas zur po che la gtad dbyon pas/ lam du canag gi 'thog pa ga mu dang zangs khyer ba gnyis dang / shangs pa khrab khyer ba rnams sdebs su blang ste byon/ der za chung bar spyang sngog las 'bra' bu med/ gzha

168a4(rnying rgyud): bla ma'i zhal nas srung srog dang khra ba gnyis zhog/ g.yu dang zangs bdag po la gtod gsungs pas/ 'phrog pa ma dga' ste phyag rten klog pa lu cag la chos mi slob pa'i rtags yin zer nas song / rten 'grel de las zung ba'i chos la gshe ba zung / de
168a5(rnying rgyud): zung chung pa la khyod kyi rus pa ci yin gsungs pas/ bla ma dang zas gcig par brjod na 'gran par song dogs nas/ zur chung chung zhig lags byas pas bla dgas su de ltar thogs/ de las can du mkhyen nas slob gnyer byed du bcug pas blo gros kyi spobs pa

168a7(rnying rgyud): pas/ bla mas/ de ring zur chung ba shing thus shog gsungs/ shul du zur chung pa'i skyil bu g.yeng du bcug pas/ bes po zhig gi 'og na zan chang ka pA la gang las gzhan ci yang med skad/ der bla mas zur chung pa tsho ba chad na rang re'i thab la
168b1(rnying rgyud): shog gsungs pas/ da b+h+ra ma'i dkor la 'bag ri zer dka' spyad 'ba' zhig / khur bzod par mdzad/ nyin gcig thablams pas por bral dgagra shong ba zhig bsdams nas khyod la skom ste snum yang gsungs/ zan chang zhus pas snod dag sol/
168b2(rnying rgyud): dung khyer shog gsungs nas gsol/ da e 'dug gsungs pas bre grang tsam gda' zhus pas/ dmi yog par 'jug/ yog na khyod la bsod nams bod tsam na che ba 'ong ste/ 'on kyang ngal bsnyen bkur mi rten 'brel las bsod nams chen po 'ong
168b3(rnying rgyud): gsungs// der nas kha la gsum gnang nas 'di zad pa dang yo byad mi 'jogs pa yong gsungs/ der zur chung pas thos pa dang / bsam pa dang / sgom pa'i gnas gang yin pa la grags gcig tu nyin dang mtshan med par brtson pa bskyed pas/
168b4(rnying rgyud): sprul ba'i sgra yin pas mkhyen rab kyi klong rdol/ nyams rtogs bsam gyis mi khyad pa 'khrungs kyang dpe che tsam 'dri ba 'i yo byad kyang rngom rdzogs par yod tsan/ lha rje zur po chel pa na 'i khang sngon bya ba na jo mo g.yu mo bya ba'i sgom ma thug mo ma spang gnyis yod
168b5(rnying rgyud): pas/ khyod rang 'di'i steng du sdong gsungs/ da khyim thab mi byed zhus pas/ 'du shes ma chung / ston pas gnang ba dang bkag pa'i mtshams ngas shes/ khong gnyis kyi yo byad la spyad nas dbang zhus/ dpe khris/ chos thams cad

169a2(rnying rgyud): nyan pas bla ma'i dgongs pa ji bzhin du longs/ skabs shig na lha rje bzhugs pa'i sgom na mchod rten gcig yod pa la zur chung bskor ba byed nyin 'dug pa gzigs/ zhabs sa la mi reg par khru gang tsam nam sba rar gda'/ bla ma'i thugs la 'di
169a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i sku gcig yin nyan 'dug pas ngo mtshar che snyam du dgongs shing dgyes so// de bzhin du zur chung ba phyogs gshed na 'byon bzhud kyi lung srong bye ma'i gseb tu tshad pas shin tu gdungs pa la zhal phyems 'dren par byung ba dang / bstong gi rtse mo la sbom du

169a5(rnying rgyud): mdo dgongs 'dus gsungs pas dus gcig la dpe 'grems sum brgya byung / de'i tshe zur chung pa la bla mas bsngags pa chen po mdzad pas/ bla mas dpon pa'i dbu 'phang bstod ces cung zad mi gus pa'i rnam pa byed pa byung / bla ma la spar ba byas na bsod nams
169a6(rnying rgyud): ma yin pa chen por mkhyen nas/ nam zhig e dmar rdo rje spo zhes bya bar dpon slob thams cad chos 'khor la byon tsan/ srang kha gcig na khyi mo ma sdad ro sprad la 'bu zhugs pa zhig 'dug/ bla ma zur chen gyis reg pa tsam mdzad/ zur chung pas khyi mo ma sprad

169b2(rnying rgyud): mtshar skyes sam gsungs pas/ mig 'phrul du gdab zer/ der shangs chu rgyas pa dang thug pas zur chen gyis chu pha ri ra ka pA la rdzu 'phrul gyis bsgyur nas/ 'di sras lon la nga'i bshad gra 'phog pa yin gsungs pas/ se mo gzhan gsug ngos

170b6(rnying rgyud): gnyis/ sta gar me gnyis/ go mchod gsum la sogs pa mang kyo te/ klub bal po ni/ dang po dag pa shes byung ba rmugs sa thab sa tshan da pa chen po tha thos shin rdzo ba yin/ bde gshegs tho ba dang / dge bshes byung

171a7(rnying rgyud): spobs pa dang ldan pa 'di lta bu'i bshes gnyen ni rnyed par dka'o// 'on kyang da sti dngos su phyinan slob dpon mi dgyes su 'ongs pas/ sang phod thabs kyis rtog ge ngan pa'i slob dpon dang dpral bar byas la/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug srid pa'i dral
171b1(rnying rgyud): gtsang ba'i mgon mngon po'i dpal dang 'grogs par bgyi ba la gdon mi za ba'i dam bca' ltar/ lan te zhes mna' thos pa cang nas dengs so// de ltar dengs pa'ang me tog zas can pang+gA'i tshal la byab bzhin du sang 'od las 'gro dang sngon la ma bzang po'i pa srog pa

171b3(rnying rgyud): rlung drag pos yid rnal du mi phebs pa tsam du gyur nas zur chung pa 'dra ba'i lta ba ngan pa can skye bo thams cad log pa'i lam du 'a khrid pa 'di bsad na sangs rgya nges zer ro// de zur pa'i grwa pa dag gis thos nas snyan du gsol bas/ rgyud rang bzhin gyis grol
171b4(rnying rgyud): bi'i byang chub sems dpa' la khong khro ba'i rnam par rtog pa med pas cad me gsungs pas la na btang / nang par chos khri'i kha nas bzhad kyi na 'dug/ bla ma ci la dgyes zhus pas/ chos bya ba nga'i theg pa chen po gsang sngags 'di yin par 'dug/ srol
171b5(rnying rgyud): brten nas sangs rgya bar 'dod pa 'di gsang sngags kyi lcags yin/ mtshan nyid pa la med sgra mtshan/ zur chung ba lta bu bsad na sangs kyi gsungs nas khyur po grags se lta bu'i mtshan nyid pa chen po yang blo grags pa'i chos la gtod par 'dug pas nga dka' ba

173a1(rnying rgyud): 'khri shing sa la 'byar ba bzhin du gyur pas kun kyang phyag byed pa la mngon du phyogs so// de ltar ston mo gyes tsan gzhan dag na re/ zur chung ba la phyag mi byed pa'i dam bca' rang res mdzad pa la sngon la nyid kyis mdzod pa ci yin
173a2(rnying rgyud): dris pas/ kho'i drung du gyin tsan bcom ldan 'das dpal chen po'im de 'di ka yin par 'dug snyam pa las/ mi yi 'du shes ma skyes gsung skad/ lar rdzu 'phrul shin tu che bas nyi zer la 'byon bzhud mdzad par grags te/ 'ug pa lung

173a4(rnying rgyud): ka ba bdun dang / khyad 'phags gnyis te dgus btegs pa zhig bzhengs pas/ mkha' 'gro lha khang du grags/ sangs rgyas bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dang / bka' srang legs ldan lde gur bzhengs/ dkyil 'khor rgyas bsdus

186b7(rnying rgyud): la ba thogs mang du mdzad/ ma skyes pas ni dus kyi btan pa la byab chen pa med cing / slob ma'i sras sangs rgyas ca dang / gtal pa pa de lags pa la mags te tsun pa migapa la byed dgyur pa'i slob ma yang dag brdzud nas dpung sa sum
187a1(rnying rgyud): brgyad la gshegs/ gnyal ba bde legs kyi cho ga khrigs kyang yod do// / yang sgrol chen ba'i sras brgyad ltar byas na/ sras sangs rgyas rin chen rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po zhes grags pa de nyid dang /
187a2(rnying rgyud): kyi lnga bcu rtsa drug pa lcags po stag la gnas gsar du 'khrungs/ mi rnams kyis khyed kyisas 'dis pan ni mi thogs/ de tsam gyi gtsigs kyis ci bye zer bas/ 'gro ba la phan thogs pa gcig 'ong gsungs/ dkrung lo drug pa la gsang ba snying po'i rgyud thugs /
187a3(rnying rgyud): tshud/ zur shAka 'byung ba'i spyan sngar byon/ nga'i bla ma'i sras zhes gces par bskyangs pas chud bzung ba de g.yengs/ yang lo brgyad lon pa na bsgyur te bzung / cho ga phrin rnams yad kyis bslabs pas lo bcu bzhi par gzhan la dbang bskur ba'i slob dpon pher
187a4(rnying rgyud): ba byung / yab las sgyu 'phrul gyi chos skor rnams thugs su chud par mdzad/ dang rab tu byung nas mtshan nyid kyang sbyang / gsang ma'i rgyud rje'ang slob pa yin zhus pas/ re zhig mi rung / gzod rab tu byung bas chog gsungs/ der ma gcig
187a5(rnying rgyud): zhig bdag gir bzung bas sras kha shas 'khrungs/ dge bsnyen gyi rten la bsgrub sbyang rdzogs par mdza/ slar chos 'khor skad du tshig rdzogs mdzad/ s+phA shin tu btsun par bzhugs/ sgyu 'phrul la mkhas par gyur pas dpung lo bzhi bcu sgor lagasang pa
187a6(rnying rgyud): steng pa la Ti ka rtse ba gcig dang / lam rnam bkod la'ang rnam pa gad can po zhig mdzad/ de bzhin du ni na las shar ba brgyan las/ khro bo la mngon par rtogs pa rgyas pa zhig mdzad pa dang / gnas lung la'ang chog rgyas pa zhig mdzad/ yab dang thag+sa
187a7(rnying rgyud): pras thub pa ni rje sogs laman dag mang du mnyan cing nyams su bstod/ dgung po bcu bdun pa la 'gas mo la bzang rtse ba rjes su bzung ste/ 'di ltar sgyu 'phrul zhi khro'i dbang dang / spu 'phrul gyi tshe bang / dong sngags kyi dbang / tshe bdag dang /
187b1(rnying rgyud): yang dag me gcig gi dbang / spra bo ba'i lugs kyi na mgrin dang / zla rgyal ma'i lugs kyi rjes gnang / phu rapas grags kyi dbang drag po'i rjes gnang dang bcas pa/ sems sde bco brgyad kyi reg pa'i rtsal dbang / gsang nying chud 'grel pa dang bca
187b2(rnying rgyud): bshadang / lam rnam par bkod pa'i TIka nyid kyis mdzad pa'i thog nas bshad pa rgyas pa/ gzhan sgyu 'phrul gyi 'og gzhung bzhi bcul sogs pa'i gzhung chung bzhi ban+d+ha tsam/ mdo dgongs pa 'dus pa dang / de'i rtsaba'i nA gran 'dus dang / gnags
187b3(rnying rgyud): chen gyi mdo 'grel mun pa'i go cha/ sgyu 'phrul brgyad cu pa dang / bla ma gnyis/ yang dag rtsa ba'i lung rnams kyang gnang / snying thig spros bcas la sogs pa'i dbang bzhi dang / me long bas mdzad pa'i yi ge'i steng nas khrid pag/ rdzogs chen a
187b4(rnying rgyud): ro'i man 'ag kyang khrid du mdzad/ de bzhin du byang sems ye rgyal ba nas brgyud pa'i thugs rje chen po'i slar khrid kyang gnang ste/ rgyu mtshan la brten nas 'gos lo ye bzang rtse bas/ gsang sngags ting ma zhes grags pa'i phyogs la lhag par mos pa thob cing /
187b5(rnying rgyud): chos spangs pa'i sgrib pas ma sbags tsam mo// zhes thos pa'i pha rol tu son pa'i mthar thug don dang ldan par song ba yin zhes nges pa brten pa'i tha tshig go// de ltar chos rje sangs rgyas rin chen pas bdun bcu rtsa gnyis palcags mo glang gI lo la dbus su phebs/ gas
187b6(rnying rgyud): bsam gtan gling du dbang grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis zhabs nas btegs/ 'dus pa mdo la sogs pa'i dbang mang po dang / gsang snying la sogs pa'i bshad pa dang lung mang po byin/ brgyad cu rtsa gnyis pa lcags mo phag gi lo la gtsang du su gshegs/ zung
187b7(rnying rgyud): chung ba 'khrungs nas dus 'di na charga la lo bzhi brgya dang bcu bdun song // bdag nyid chen po 'gos gzhon nu dpal ni yab 'gos skyon 'byung gnas rdo rje dang / yum sring thar srid gnyis kyi sras su chu sbrel la 'khrungs/ sran g.yas
188a1(rnying rgyud): mkhan chen las rab tu byung / ka ma ba de bzhin gshegs pa las byung ma dang / chos drug gastan/ jog byang chub dpal las rtags rnamapa gas na/ khung par pa Na chen ba naran las bla med kyi rgyud ts+tshe da rlung/
188a2(rnying rgyud): dbang bskur ba rnams zhus/ mtshan brjod dang dpyid thig/ dbang mdor bstan/ dpe med 'tsho'i sbyor drug rtsa 'grel rnams zhus shing bsgyur/ rje 'di nyid kyis sgrol chen sangs rgyas rin chen dpung lo bdun cu pa las mo phag gi lor sgyu 'phrul zhe khro'i dbang
188a3(rnying rgyud): dang / sgyu 'phrul gyi tshe dbang / na ragadong sbugs tshe bdag yang dag me gcig/ rta mgrin/ lha mo dang zla rgyal lugs/ phur pa 'kho na lugs/ sems sde bco brgyad kyi rig pa'i rtsal dbang sogs lnga 'gyur rgyud sde'i dbang bka' thams cad ma
188a4(rnying rgyud): pa med pa gas na/ bshad pa'i bka' gsang ba snying po rgyud dang 'grel pa so sor bshad pa dang / yam rnam bkod kyi Ti ka khong nyid kyis mdzad pa dang / gzhan yang khog gzhung gsal smon sogs rgya bod kyi gzhung chung bzhi bcu skor gyi bshad lung rnams dang / mdo
188a5(rnying rgyud): dgongs 'dus dang de'i rtsa ba'i rgyud kun 'dus rig pa dang / ga nu pas sangs rgyas ye shes kyis mdzad pa'i mdo'i 'grel pa mun pa'i go cha/ sgyu 'phrul brgyad cu ba dang / bzhi bcu pa dang / bla ma gnyis/ yang dag rtsa ba'i lung rnams kyang gas na/
188a6(rnying rgyud): snying thig la rtsa ba'i dbang spros bcas spros med bzhi'i dbang bskur ba dang / grub thob me long rdo rjes mdzad pa'i khrid yig gi steng nas khrid dang / a ro'i lugs kyi rdzogs chen man ngag gi khrid kyang gsan zhing mdor na gsang sngags snga 'gyur gyi bstan pa'i bdag po
188a7(rnying rgyud): lta bur gyur zhing rje nyid kyis kyang gsang sngags rnying ma zhes grags pa'i phyogs la lhag par mos pa thob cing / chos spangs pa'i sgrib pas ma sbags tsam mo// zhes gsungs pa'ang bod kyi mkhas rlom phyogs lhung can 'ga' zhig la dgongs pa yin te/
188b1(rnying rgyud): don du'ang rje 'di ni grub mtha' phyogs snum srung ba'i bshes gnyen gzhan las zad par du 'phags pa yin cing bstan bcos rnams cad tshad mar gyur pa'i legs bshad mab yang mngon sum gyi sa gru / je 'di bkan pa chos thags rgya mtsho la sems 'grel
188b2(rnying rgyud): skor gsum sogs chos bka' dbang khrid mang po phul/ zhwa dmar cod pan 'dzin pa bzhi pa chos kyi grags pa ye shes dpal bzang po bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i mkhan po dang sgyu 'phrul gtso bor gyur pa'i gsar rnying gi rgyad sde rgya mtsho'i dbang bka'/ bshad bka'/ man
188b3(rnying rgyud): ngag gi khrid sogs bsam gyis mi khyab par gnang / rje zhwa dmar nas kyang bka 'drin che ba'i bla ma gcig pur mdzad/ gzhan yang bka' gter gyi bstan pa sgo du ma nis spel bzhin par dkrung lo dkrub tu rnam pa lugs glang lor sku gshegs so// / nadamar
188b4(rnying rgyud): bzhi pa spyan snga rin po che tre kod khang dmar du/ yab ldong dgon pa skyabs dang yum dgra bza' bsod nams sgrol ma'i sras su 'khrungs/ zur mang dgon du rje bdun pa chos grags rgya mtsho dang mjal te rab tu byung / mtshan chos kyi grags pa ye shes dpal
188b5(rnying rgyud): bzang por gsol/ mkhan po gau shrI grags dpal pa dang / than skar pa las kyang chos gas na/ dgung lo nyer bzhi pa la 'gos po chen po yid bzang rtsi bas mkhan po mdzad de bsnyen par rdzogs/ rdzas kyi 'khor lo// bde dgyes/ gsang
188b6(rnying rgyud): 'dzidz+ra sogs gsar ma'i rgyud sde rnams dang / sgyu 'phrul gsang ba snying po'i dbang bka' dang bshad pa'i bka' thams cad sogs snga phyir gas na pa mtha' yas pa mdzod/ ngan lam rgyal ba mchog dbyangs kyi gdung rigs lo chen bsod nams rgya mtsho las kyang gsar
188b7(rnying rgyud): rnying gi chos mang dugs na/ rje 'gos las phur pa'i dbang gsan tshe mnal lam du slob dpon pad+ma zhal gzigs shing gdams pa'ang bsngal/ gsar rnying gi chos tshul mtha' dag gdul bya rnams la ston bzhin pa'i ngang nas dpung lo don gsum pa la gzugs
189a1(rnying rgyud): su brtul/ don dam des 'byed dbu ma chen po'i lha med rgyal tsha ba chen po'i chos lnga la brten cing / chos skad mthar thug pa phyir mi ldog pa'i gtam gtso bor bzhed pa rje 'di kun ma khyen ched pa slong chen pa/ ka ma pa bdun
189a2(rnying rgyud): pa/ kun mkhyen dol bu chen po sogs mthun no// / de nyid kyis 'bri gung zur pa rin chen phran tshogs la bstsal ba ste/ 'di ni dpur stod 'bri gung sgra gnyer skang zhes bya bar skya ra'i rigs su slu blta mas/ dgung lo brgyad kyi steng du sran snga rin
189a3(rnying rgyud): chos kyi grags pa las rab tu byung / bcu gsum par gyis thang bas ma gtan sring du dkar po bas/ Na 'brug gi zhig gsos mdzad pa'i rab banas lA stan drangs pa'i tshe ngo mtshar ba'i tshe 'phrul ci yang byung / yangs pa can dang / grung zhid/ gzho ti la bro sogs na
189a4(rnying rgyud): chen rnams su sgrub pa la snying por mdzad/ tri grol bzhugs pa'i skabs shed 'phags yul gyi grub thob rdo rje mgon po byon nas dza bi ra'i b+hu zung gi man ngag sogs gdams pa dang rjes su gdams pa bstsal/ mkha' 'gro'i lung bstan bzhin sku rten dkar chag tu
189a5(rnying rgyud): bsgyur zhing yangs pa can du gter gyi kha byang babs pa bzhin gu ru rin po che'i sku gsung thugs bcud dam tshas dgongs pa yang zab shog ser rigs lnga til gr-i'i DA ki'i tshogs khang chen mo nas spyan drangs/ dus gzhan zhig tu zangs mdog dpal rir byon nas gu ru rin po che he ru
189a6(rnying rgyud): ka'i rnam par mjal zhing ga Na tsakra'i 'du bar longs spyad cing / rtsa ba gsum gyi dkyil 'khor la brten nas dbang bskur zhing gdams pa dang rjes su gdams pa thams cad bstsal te he ru ka'i sku slob dpon pad+mar gnas 'gyur bas zhal gyi man ngag kyang mang du gnang nas slar rang
189a7(rnying rgyud): gnas su phebs/ bka' gter gnyis kyi bdag por gyur/ mdo sgyu sems gsum la bshad srol thun mong ma yin pa dang / bka' brgyad lugs dbu/ snying shig la bzhi/ gter kha gong 'og sogs la rtsal du bton cing 'chad nyan gyi phrin
189b1(rnying rgyud): na ma na/ rna sa yun tu / ma nan la sa/
189b2(rnying rgyud): sa smra
189b3(rnying rgyud): gas pa da mardzos/ dadang sa rtsi sa pa'i mam mthon pa na mchos sa nga rgyal da cir sna byud/ thugs ban sa 'a gag bya smra ga
189b4(rnying rgyud): cu 'arnam pa mas cadags ni/ sgra'i rim ga sa bamazhabs/ gas gshegs la sa nga kyi sbyin par da/ lda par ya naji 'dzin du las gyu tha lags ba da / de'i 'bram ba'i
189b5(rnying rgyud): band par ldan mam 'i nga gyi ma thus / yon ci pa tham sbyi dugs sa kyang rig ste da du sa byas pagasanapasamyo thams da spyanas grus rgyags pa na drub
189b6(rnying rgyud): sa gzhin 'a baba'i tshe tshe ga ma yin / thob ni pa dang / mtshan ga ci da pa bag srungags ga kyi gzung mug na tho na sa

190a2(rnying rgyud): pa dngus da / thags thags sa
