190b1(rnying rgyud): zhal gyis ma bzhes shing rnga yab pad+ma 'od ci gzhal gas su 'gro dgos pa zhes gsungs la/ me smyung zlab brgyad pa'i chos bcu gcig la ngo mtshar ba'i lus dang bcas gzugs sgra chos byed dbyings su thim par gyur/ rje 'di nyid kyis mdzad pa'i brtan ces kyang
190b2(rnying rgyud): phyag rdzogs dbu gsum gyi lta ba ste khyab tu ngo sprod pa'i khrid yig dang / dbu ma'i lha khrid dang / tha skad rig pa'i sgor yang mang po yod/ je de'i thugs kyi sras slob ma ni zur chen chos dbyings rang grol yin te 'di nyid bur gyi rig 'dzin paskyed pa'i gdung rabs ma chad pa las
190b3(rnying rgyud): yab rig 'dzin chen po ku mA rA dza'i rnam 'phrul zur chen gzhon nu don 'grub dang yum mkha' 'gro'i rigs las mtshan ldan yid 'dzin gnyis kyi sras su shing 'brug lor sru bltams/ thung ba dkon mchog rin chen pa'i sku bye bar ngos 'dzin mdzad/ rim gyis yi ge 'bri srog dang /
190b4(rnying rgyud): 'phags yul gyi yig rigs rnams kyang dka' tshogs la ma ltos par thugs su chud/ yab las nyer mkha'i sgrub tor rnams kyang bslab/ dkrung lo dgu par byang ba rig 'dzin dag gi dbang po mjal zhing // // zhal nas spu skye bas lnga 'gyur gyi bstan pa pa
190b5(rnying rgyud): phan rtogs chen po zhig yong zhes lung bstan/ lha ris deng rtsis sgor rnams dang drug sngags kyi sgor 'ga' zhig kyang mkhyen par mdzad cing dgung lo bcu gnyis tsam nas snang gsal rin po tsho ga dbang sde shes grub pa'i zhabs su bcar te bka' brgyad pa der 'dus nor dang / mkha'
190b6(rnying rgyud): 'phro snying thig bka' gter gnyis/ bla mnor bu rgyamache/ kAr krI pa ni blo dgongs pa rang krol sogs kyi dbang phung dang / nyams khrid mthar byin pa gsen/ gzhan yang ci rigs pa'i gter chos rnams gsan/ de khro'i dbang bskur ba'i gsang
190b7(rnying rgyud): na chos dbyings rang grol du phog/ phyag chen lnga ldan dang gcod khrid sogs su nyams su bstar/ zing pa stag mgor lo gsum phyogs gsum mdzad ci ngan tu bang rdzogs chen mkha' 'gro snying thig gi ka dag dang snyun grub gnang du bskrun pas chos thams cad kyi rdzun
191a1(rnying rgyud): phrag nig/ rang rig gdod ma'i mgon po'i rang zhal mngon du gyur pa'i rtogs pa brnyes shing 'od gsal du longs su'i zhing khams nyul ba'i rtsal 'byongs par gyur/ dgung lo bcu bdun pa la rdo rje 'chang ba wang kha pa dpal 'byor mtshan
191a2(rnying rgyud): can gyi drung du byon te bla ma sku 'das kyi bar la rim gro ba mdzad cing mnyes pa gsum gyis bsten/ bla mas kyang thugs dgyes pas rjes su bskyangs nas bka' gter gyi chos tshul rgya mtsho lta bu bum pa gang bya'i tshul gyis gnang / gtso bor dpal snying po'i rgyud rtsa ba dang / 'grel
191a3(rnying rgyud): pa spar khab/ bod 'grel g.yung Ti ka rnams sbyar ba'i gsung bshad mdzad panyin de rje bzhag thun gnyis re bstsal/ zin dka' se ba la re zeg rgyab oM chog zhus pas/ rgyad tsam ma song bar zin bris byas na 'dzag chen po mi long bas re zhig nas nged kyis tshod byed
191a4(rnying rgyud): gsungs// gzim chung thog khar lhor skyeng gnang nas shog bu sum cu tsam song nas rje'i bka' bzhin zin bris kyang mdzad pas leru lwa ba yan chad sodang / de man chad kyi zin thos 'phro can du lus/ chu khyi lor dgung lo nyi shu ba zhes par mar yang dge bsnyen na
191a5(rnying rgyud): bzung bsnyen rdzogs kyi bar du bsgrubs par mdzad/ snying 'grel phyogs bcu mun sel sogs la gzigs rtogs dang / 'dus pa'i 'grel pa smon gsal la bzhi sgrags kyi bshad pa/ rim lnga gsal smon/ bde mchog smras don kun
191a6(rnying rgyud): gsal/ nor bzang gi dus 'khor spyi don sogs dang / gsang 'dus bskyed rdzogs sogs kyi bshad pa zhus shing thugs pa nges par mdzad/ shing byi lor chos grwa chen po dpal gyi rtses dang du dkun chos chen mo'i thog gsang ba snying po'i rgyud kyi bshad pa
191a7(rnying rgyud): mdzad pas ston chen tshig la rton pa rnams kyi spobs pa bcom shing snying po'i bstan pa la bya ba cher mdzad pas gzu bor gnas pa rnams bsngags pa brjod cing byang ba rig 'dzin chen pos kyang legs dar dbyangs/ rje pha srang kha pa las kyang klong gsal snying thig gi dbang lung man
191b1(rnying rgyud): dag gi khrid rnams zhib par gsan zhing bsgoms pas nyams rtogs logs sngar las kyang cher 'khrungs/ ster ba'i 'khrul 'khor sogs gsar ma phyogs kyi drag sngags kyang mang dugs na/ dge 'bri gnyis 'gras che zhing 'gre gung zlar par tA'i zhabs sogs kyu
191b2(rnying rgyud): ra hu la'i las sbyor mdzad pas dga' ldan khri pa mang po steng grib kyis gshegs pa la rje dkon mchog chos 'phel khyab 'jug gi 'jigs pa las grol ba'i srung 'khor kyang mdzad/ kaHthog pa stag bla padA ma te lhas dbyon nas snying po'i 'brel ba phyogs bcu mun sel
191b3(rnying rgyud): sogs gsan cing khong gis lho brag gsung sbrul la'ang de'i bshang lung phul ba sogs chos rgyun de ka ma chad par byung ba 'di'o// tshur// thog pa las dgengs 'dus po ti'i lung dbang dang rgyud dgu bcangs thabs bcas pa dang / las kyang me tog phreng mdzes sogs kya
191b4(rnying rgyud): kas na// lhag par bka' brgyad bde gshegs 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor la brten pa'i ra sa ya Na'i sgrub pa mdzad/ 'di skabs tsam nas rgyal mchog lnga pa chen pos bla mar bkur zhing zil gnon sogs chos bka' rnams gsan zhing dag sngags kyi sgor so
191b5(rnying rgyud): zhi rgyas dbang drag gi srin las rab 'byams kyi lung phyag khrid thams cad phul zhing thugs nyams su bstar/ kAr gtsang mchod yon gyis dge lugs spyi dang bye brag dge ldan pho brang ba la snang zug che bas tsi kum par sde gzar gyi skabs su las sbyor mtha' yas pa
191b6(rnying rgyud): mdzad pas/ rgyal dbang lnga pa'i phrin las dus bab dang je 'di nyid kyi byin rmab lhag par myur bas dge ldan pho brang gi lung las bod khams yongs la khyab pade byung / sku ma zan grong pa'i rkang 'thung 'khrig pa'i grang // khe nyen gsher gyis don chen 'grub pa'i/
191b7(rnying rgyud): zhugs// 'bar min ma babs las kyi rta gdong mes// skar gtsang srid sde'i chu bo skem de mtshar// zhes lnga pa chen pos dge phyogs rnams kyis mngon spyod kyi nus pa mngon du ma gyur par 'os med kyi rje 'di pas bstan pa spyil slan yon chen por gyur pa'i ched du/
192a1(rnying rgyud): na/ nas smran/ smra smra ma ga sa smra sa pa /
192a2(rnying rgyud): kya bajugs kyad pa ldangs ging la bar 'das rigs da pral ba'i gdang 'azungs so// zhesan 'akyis ba zhes/ gnasags rab ma ngan pa pa so na pas mchog ldan dang yang kyis kyi na brten pa dus pa de/
192a3(rnying rgyud): sprul pa'i rtsa ba 'gyur bstan pa'i nyi ma rig 'dzin pa bla phrin las ngos 'dzin par mngon cing thub bstan rdo rje thag gi gdan sa bkod nas/ bka' gter gyi chos mtha' dag bstsal zhing bstan pa'i bdag por mnga' gsol/ sru tshe'i maHna gyi med
192a4(rnying rgyud): gdanas srung thang tu bzhugs/ da snying tig 'dzin chen po 'dzin las sun grub la snying po'i rgyud kyi sha pa nang/ glung yang bka' brgyad sogs dbang lung mang dugs na pa dang / rgya bong tor gsu gyi thas skye su sa sogs chos dan nyi rnam
192a5(rnying rgyud): gter ga par byu gis rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi dngas paci ga par spyor byur ma don ses byab bung pa dug lani pan nga bltas dang sam badz+ra da kyi zhing khams su gshegs so// je 'di nyid la thugs pas slo ma'itshogs bgrang shi mthod pa
192a6(rnying rgyud): bcugs kyang gtso bar gyur pa rnyen la nargyog lnga ba chen po ste zhing khams gzhan du gshegs pa'i tshe yang ye shes kyi sras rjes su bzung ba gsungs ning rnam thar rgyal ba mchog gi zhal gsung mar/ legs byas 'di mdzus rig rtsal kun tu brta/
192a7(rnying rgyud): na/ na na/ pa na / sa/ 'dags kyinas lus pa na la
192b1(rnying rgyud): las lhan 'grub la gsang ba snying po'i bshad rgyun sba khab dang g.yung Tika gnyis ka'i steng nas bstsal zhing / de las bai ro dang g.yu s+tha'i thugs bskyed dus su smin pa rig 'dzin 'gyur med rdo rje sku mched kyi bka' drin las deng sang gi bar du rgyun ma chad par byung ba
192b2(rnying rgyud): yin no// / yang sgo phug pa chen po'i slob brgyad 'phyong byas rgya sman pa sangs rgyas grags zhes bya ba ni/ chus gnya' yul rgya sman stag rtse sar 'khrungs/ gzhon nu'i dus tsa m+b+ha la bsgrubs pas zhing chung zhig yod pa de'ang rgyas byer/
192b3(rnying rgyud): bral la byon pas spu gu dor phyug po mdzes khyer ba zhig gi ro khur mi ma byung bar 'dug/ snying rje drag po skyes te rtog med mdzad nas rolas byas bsal la 'gram nas gser mang po byung / des dzaN+Da las dngos gru ba byin par 'dug/ slar log te bru rtse khang
192b4(rnying rgyud): dmar du khyung po khro bor thung // khong yang dag bsgrub pa'i phyag phyir bsgrub pa mdzad pas/ yang dag mar me dgu bas zhal gzigs/ de nas gtsang du byon/ gsang bdag sgo phrag pa'i slob ma bya chen po'i dpon po zhig la mdo dang skye 'phrul la sogs
192b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i gsan pa mdzad/ der phyug po zhig gis nas khal brgya tham pa phul/ cha rkyen gyis mi 'thogs par byung bas sgo phug pa'i skyob ma nyang nag mdo bo/ de'i slob ma lha rje mda' seng gi las sgyu 'phrul nyan/ mkhas pa chen por gyur nas/ rang yul
192b6(rnying rgyud): durdo thig thel btab/ gnyal ba khrig po'i slob ma rgya 'ching du pas kyang rdo thog pa'i zhabs la gtugs te thos pa mang du mdzad/ khyad par du 'di la so ba ma mkhas shing grub pa'i dpa' bo spyi chos kyi seng ge bya ba zhig byung / des gong ma sa chen gyi spyan sngar byon pas/ rgyal pos nus pa brtag
192b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir thub tshod mdzad de mchod rten gyi nang du bcug nas sgo brtsigs te lo gcig bzhag/ lo dus na phye ste bltas pas/ rdo rje phur bu'i skur gyur 'dug pas ngo mtshar chen po skyes/ rdo thog pa la dang ring chen mo la sogs pa'i dngos po tshan cher gnang / 'ja' sus bcad pa'i dgon gnas
193a1(rnying rgyud): kyang mang du yod de dang rgyas shin tu che ba zung / dak+ta ni ming du grags pa'i rjes shul tsam ste bskrun pa'i 'brel 'grub 'di yang rgyob bskul ba'i rang bzhin no// skye chos kyi seng ge'i slob mne/ sman ljang pa shAkya 'dod/ 'di ni 'byung po kha ru'i tang skyon che par
193a2(rnying rgyud): sras lnga byung ba yar klung sbrul sku mched lngar grags pa'i cha shes yin// yul yar krung dgon pa sman lung yin pas de skad du grags/ tshigs gnyis pa chos ldan pa'i gdanas da lta chos ldan zhes pa'i dgo na rol 'di ka yin/ mtshan dngos mgon po rdo rje zhes bya ste grub pa shin tu brnyes
193a3(rnying rgyud): bas kyang la sku grub gtad pa'i rjes thim gyis song ba da s+thA'ang yod/ sngar 'dir rjes gre chen po chags par snang ste rgyud 'byam gyi ras ma'ang shin tu mang par mthong / sman bsla ba mdzad pas yul 'di sdig pa dang grog skur kyang dkon pa yin zhes thos/ srang ma shin tu nus pa che bsad lta
193a4(rnying rgyud): dgon shul kyang bsrung bar snang ste/ lha 'dre rnams dam tshig la shin tu gnas pa zhig go// tshigs 'og ma gsum la skal ldan pa/ dur khrod pa/ dbang rgyal ba zhes grags/ de las 'dir tshigs dang po spyan lung pa shAkya 'od kyis spyi chos kyi seng ge la mdo sgyu 'phrul rnams legs par
193a5(rnying rgyud): bslab// phyis klan shAkya 'od po'i sras blan mkhas pa bsod nams rgyal la'ang gsan nas/ gsang ba snying po'i khog dbu ba dang / Tika rgyud don rnam nges la sogs pa yig cha mang du mdzad/ 'di'i slob ma dgas po'i sangs rgyas gong la ba yin/ de la dgas po nyid du slob ma bu/
193a6(rnying rgyud): ma gnyen la sogs pa mang du thon zhing / gtso bor gon 'jo bdag po'i bla mar gyur nas khams su shin tu dar bar gyur to// yang sman lung ba la dpon shAkya 'bum pas gsang ba snying po'i bshad pa mkhas par bslab/ de la mkhas grub chos dpal yab sras gnyis kyis kyang gsar
193a7(rnying rgyud): snying gi bshad pa legs par nod/ smad lung pa'i bskud pa de dag ni gter kha gor 'og la'ang gnas dus der chen gyi bdag por gyur pa zhig go// spyi chos kyi sang ge'i gdanas brgya ye shes mgon pos kyang spyi dang sran chos rgyal gnyis ka la gtugs nas mdo dang sgyu 'phrul mkhas
193b1(rnying rgyud): ma da rgyams ma ma rgyab dan rdum ma tus ma nam pa ma sapa salagargyas nasasanan pa mam du myu thus bags pa ga na nabya mas gas ba dag gdang /
193b2(rnying rgyud): shi gam rdzu tshul ba la / de dzin sa 'di dgas pa gra sa dpanag na nga gas masal bzud pa na pa ng+gA gas po phyogs da pa 'od ra rlo
193b3(rnying rgyud): sa sa rgyam can kyi gan shA na/ sa snu gal migs 'dis gdo sa gags te// 'ang 'as sa bya bas na/
193b4(rnying rgyud): sa na pa na ma lag shA mas/ ba rtag sa rgyabs nasa'ang ga
193b5(rnying rgyud): pa gzhigs pashes cang na/ tham nar tho sapas bul un ma shes na te ma ma na nA sa bas med da sa na gag ga rgyas gnyis su ga pa ma med
193b6(rnying rgyud): na
193b7(rnying rgyud): sa
194a1(rnying rgyud): zlab mtha' del bslabs nas nyams 'og tu chud ba dang bzod rtsod pas btul tanang par chug/ yang su rtags kyi mkhas pa 'gang zhig dang brjod pa'i tshal la dang la byangs mdud pon sas par byon pa yong bum thabs pa/
194a2(rnying rgyud): bcom/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa gsungs nas lho phyogs su gyon pa sogs slob dpon chen pozhi ba ltar gyur pa dang / dga' rab rdo rje'i slong shod tu bar gyur nas bsam gyes 'i khyab pa'i gzhung mdzad pa dang / bod kyi ljongs sus mi bdun mi
194a3(rnying rgyud): nang nas rma rin chen mchog tu gyur nas gsang ba snying po'i rgyud la sogs pa bsgyur nas nyan bshad byas bdud / 'phags yul nub phyogs par NA sa'i rgyal por gyur pa'i tshe/ glu mchod paN+Di ta dang / ba ral phra ma bcug pa'i sgron po'i lce bcad pas da lta ljags
194a4(rnying rgyud): cung zad mi bde ba yin gsungs pa dang / ri dwags kr-iSh+Na sAr dang / drang srong gad+hA ri'i drung du na tso zhig tu gyur pa la drang srong gis rig sngags bslabs pas shes shing nus pa'ang thob/ dus gzhan zhig tu ri de'i shar phyags kyi mtsho zhig la gnas pa'i chu
194a5(rnying rgyud): sems can la byams pa zhig yod/ de'i lho phyogs su nag po'i phyogs kyi glu gdug pa can zhig kyang yod de des sems can la gnod pa rtsom pa'i snga rol du klu dkar po'i steng du dmag drangs nas 'jigs pa'i cho 'phrul dang bcas pas 'ongs pa na gyud kAr thos ni tshol sbubs su
194a6(rnying rgyud): song bas/ des gdug pa'i bu'i phyogs su bltas te rig sngags bzlas shing gshogapa brdabs pas gdug pa'i lag 'gro 'khor dang bcas pa de nyid du brlag par gyur to// // de'i 'og tu 'phags yul nub phyogs su rgyal rigs kyi paN+Di ta rten rab byung la sngags
194a7(rnying rgyud): ma nus pa rlababs nA ken rjes la dbang bskur bar dz+wa la zhes pa dang / phyogs kyi rgyung gas kyi ba gnan nus ngag zhes sngags pa ma byin pa che bzhig / nam chog tu rteta chen pa su ti tu mamatshanan 'das pa ban par grags pa da
194b1(rnying rgyud): naro/ das kyi slob mar gyur cing / bka' bab dang po phyag tu zan po'i ye shes pa rang dbang banyis gang drud rje thams cad la mkhyen pa che/ khyad par bad mchog la dram bcing / lho brag mar ba ma rnaMs pang pa'i 'o tu ga 'dzin gyi ga
194b2(rnying rgyud): spyi tsha'i mthar mi nyag rgyal pos spyan drangs te rgyal khams deng be ti rgyal po la dbang bskur bdum sogs dang phan pa gyi chen po mdzad/ de nas kyi nyan gyi rgyal pos kyang bye ga drangs te da du chas mdeng bas rgyal khams thams cad rdzo
194b3(rnying rgyud): chos bzhin byed du bcug/ rgyal po'i gtses dra ma rnams la bde mchog gi dbang bskur mdzad cing yi dam du phog pa thams cad kyis bsgoms pas dngos grub sna re ma thob pa med par grags/ de nas rgya mtsho'i gling zhig tu gyon pa na swa dang 'od la sogs
194b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i ltas chen po byung nas gshegs pa'i tshul bstan/ de nas bar do gzhan ma byung bar yab kyi spyi bor bzhugs nas yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa yin gsungs te/ bdag nyid chen po 'dir sku skyo ba bzhes pa yin no// dam pa 'di mdo khams su
194b5(rnying rgyud): 'bor skad du gtogs pa 'bri chu'i 'gram du rje phag mo grub pa dang yum mched du gyur pa ste rje bag gru me shong 'bal mor da lha gser zang du brjod pa der 'khrungs pa yin pas rje 'di lang de dang mi ring ba zhig tu 'khrungs pa yin nye 'ong / gang ltar gdung rus skra yang gtsang ba dpal
194b6(rnying rgyud): grags/ yum gtsang mo rin chen rgyan gnyis kyi sras su chu bo stag gi lo 'khrungs/ 'di rje khams pa chen po'am ngag gru lo bcu gsum pa'i chu stag de yin/ bcu bdun la dbus su byon/ 'phan yul du bla ma byang chub seng ge las rab tu ru
194b7(rnying rgyud): mtshan shes rab seng geng gsol/ nags kyi mkhan tshan las smad 'dul gyi rgyun las bsnyen par rdzogs shing 'dul phyogs la mkhas par sbyangs/ zur sgo phug pa chen po'i thugs sras 'jam ston 'gro ba'i mgon po bya ba las/ sgyu 'phrul gsang
195a1(rnying rgyud): snying gi kor dang sems phyogs sogs gsan pas de dang de la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu byed/ je n+do phug pa dang / thog pa'i bar la bla mag cig 'azhugs pa dang na/ ba min pa ga na chod par
195a2(rnying rgyud): gis bro phrag pa la thug par gsungs/ 'jam ston pa zhes pa ni yul gyi ming nas btags pa ste/ ji ka rma ba dus mkhyen gyi rnam thar la dpyad dkam tho gnas dang nye bzhig yin par phub cing / der nyid kyi slob ma rtogs ldan zhig gis sa
195a3(rnying rgyud): pa la 'jam phye ba gsum pa zhes grags pa dang / gzhan yang 'dzam ston sangs rgyas bya ba dang / 'dzam gyi spang phug tu bzhugs pa'i btsun pa zhig gis rje dus mkhyen/ spyan ras gzigs su mthong bas 'dzam yul tsam na rnam bzang bar grags pa so
195a4(rnying rgyud): kyi lo rgyas byung ba dpa' bo gtsug lag pas kyang de dang mthun par bkod 'dug cing / da la 'ga' zhig gis 'dam sang daphug ces brjod pa'i yul de yin no// rA lo'i slob ma ka ma lo tsA las bde mchog rgyud chen bcu sogs dang / cog re lo rje las
195a5(rnying rgyud): phag m-i bru~M mdang sdom 'byung / ka mtshas kyi ye shes las dgyes pa rdo rje'i skor/ 'gos lo tsa'i sgrub marjod ston rdo rdo snying po dang po d+hi zhang rten las 'dus pa/ de gnyis ka 'gro ba ma la stong dpal gyi dbang phyug las sbron pas la sde bshad pa dang gshing zhar/
195a6(rnying rgyud): re dus mkhyen las 'khor lo ba dmachog ge dbang bskur gyi rim pa dang / phyag rgya chen po/ rdzas drug gi man la sogs pa rnams gsan/ jed bu se'i thugs kyi sras mchog tu ma da cing phyir yang bdag nyed chen po 'di'i rtse ba du mar 'jam pa
195a7(rnying rgyud): dbyangs kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen mdzad pas shes bya thams cad la chags thogs spangs pa'i thams cad mkhyen par bzhugs shing mdo sngags spyi dang khyad par rdo rje theg pa snga phyir bod kyi ljongs su 'gyur ba tsam la gsan bsam ma mdzad pa med pa lta bu dang / 'dzam
195b1(rnying rgyud): na mardzam rnags pa'i gnasasas nas rgya babumananasanams 'du na mang can rgya ma mas bcan papang bstsal dumargyas bas
195b2(rnying rgyud): ga la thob ma pal du nga gang du par 'dad bas na la / da ga na sadu
195b3(rnying rgyud): la mi gaka' dra ba'i thags mas kyim gron par byas pa'i gargya lag blang gangs ban dzin tsa ga la gnas pa jog bla na dbus brlags das sung rtan mad sa da brnams pa dzad slong gsus bya rjeb dang byed pa
195b4(rnying rgyud): sa na
195b5(rnying rgyud): dpal lha mos bsrug khang gi zug brdibs nas slob pa de'i ste rnam pa'i phyag gis mthum bris pas bawang brgyad sleb bya ba yin/ de la sogs pagrub pa'i rtags ma tshan pas sa gyis mi khyab pa dang bcas pas kyis gzhi bta ba nas bzhugs sha sa mdo
195b6(rnying rgyud): la tshun chad/ tsha ba rang dang blo mon tshan gyisgrub ma rnams 'dus pa la gtso bor rdzogs pa chen po dang / sgra 'phrul gsang bsnying po'i bshad pa'i bka' dang dbang bka' bsgrub pa sogs rgya bod kyi 'grel pa ga che chung thams cad la dpal ldan cu
195b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i bka' bram gyi thun da ma dgangs pa 'dus pa ma chags la du bzhinas gsusagazhan nga la mad ma rnaMs sa dang phyogs sus rgyal brtsams pa ga sung can rnam dang byang chu se mas dpa'i rjod pa 'dug pa zigs shin sa
196a1(rnying rgyud): sa dang sngagangs su rlo thugs shes lta 'dzin/ dang pa gab ga sa klung rlom nas
196a2(rnying rgyud): nyid la 'phags pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni gshegs bzhugs me mnga' bar dus thams cad du mi dang mi lab pa bzhin bzhugs shing mdzad pa thams cad lung ston pa zhig yod la/ sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa dang / bde ba can dang / sman gyi bla ma'i zhing mams sogs
196a3(rnying rgyud): ni rtag par gzigs/ sgyu 'phrul gi khro dang/ bdes rtog d+hug cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpal bri ga'i dkyil 'khor nAngs kyang nam bzhed la gzigs shing / de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga sogs las chos gsan pa dang / byang chub sems
196a4(rnying rgyud): dpa' rnams dang chos mi gtum mdzad pa dang bru'i skye ba'ang nyid kyi 'og tu bdi ba can du byang chub sems dpa' blo gros snying po zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs shings brgyad pa'i mngon rtogs ba skyes pa dang / ma 'ongs pa nang skal bskar ma bkram pa ga/ bul bde bar gshegs
196a5(rnying rgyud): pa che dpag tu med par 'gyur ba'i srung bldan pa rnyes shing mdor na skyes bu 'di nyid kyi rlogs ni thun mong gi snang der sprul pa'i sku 'jig rten du bzhugs pa la grongs bdus gsum kyi bde par gshegs rnams dang byer med pa nyes skyes bsam par mi nus so// de nyid
196a6(rnying rgyud): rgyal cha bag nang ldan pa na bzhin gshegs pathams cad kyi drugs mi brtsod pa'i rnam par phrul ba las 'jigs pa'i yul dum par bdag ma pa'i thugs sus ca gang byag ng+gAgs kyapar byar cing tho ba da dulas pa na ldan bus nas bsgoms pas byag
196a7(rnying rgyud): bka' gnas pas mi tshu/ nga ma na pa/ sdigs ma brtan papa theg pasags su mthugamathar la ma na na rkyen na 'anas rdzo/ gtunam gathogs gas kyam mdzun pani
196b1(rnying rgyud): slo sa la na du rlon la sa gas
196b2(rnying rgyud): na ston pa ga nidzadu gyi pa/ ga sa sa/ nam mgrub// nam na du rnam pa med// yang sa pa brnyen pa na/ gas du
196b3(rnying rgyud): sgrubs btsa 'grus rlung ba yin// d-i/ ba grogs kyis btags pa'i na/ ma bzung pa gzil ba byin// rgyus tshul mardol du nas pa yin// zhes 'gyu bar phyir// dpung la bcu badru par tham pa par gshags pa ma del nas thos gsan/ da
196b4(rnying rgyud): sa da
196b5(rnying rgyud): nga d+han pa shig rgyas gang pa'i nang du 'od men pa bltar myi bzod pa shig 'dag pa la ci yin nas par byes pa co dang khyo byis po'i da byas la gnas pa'i gdan pin zer byung / de khyod panigs sa/ de tsam dadapa pa ho dra gding bzhi bcwan gnyis
196b6(rnying rgyud): kyi dkyil labar rnams gcigs/ dpal sa mo dug padzin pa ya ngas rgya tu gathogs/ dpung song drug pa ragatsug gi ganganas phebs/ med rgya sems gsum gyi bstan pa snga ma'i sha'agro' bgan byungs/ 'di dmas su sems
196b7(rnying rgyud): dpa'i rtse kyi sras thag pas gakhron ga rin ba cig cang ston pa de sman pa shin tu mams ci phra ga yin nas danings pa btang bas smin med pa'i nas mkha' na bu'i 'ad sngon pa'i gagal pas yang chen pa zhig gi nang na langs spyod rdzogs pa'i sa tshogs mang po bzhugs pa
197a1(rnying rgyud): gsal ba dang / rin po cheg tsang ston pa ba zhugs pa'i hud nas yang 'a'od 'dog tu tshogs pa'i phung po bsam mas mi khyab pa gzigs pas 'di sangs rgyas len par 'dug dgongs nas de rgyab tshugs pa ma
197a2(rnying rgyud): gsang sngags rnying ma'i he ru ka mang po zhal gzigs/ mnal la ma du rin po che sna tshogs las grub pa'i ri chen po dpag par dka' ba zhig gi dngos su sran sna tshogs skyes pa la mi mang po sran dru zhing 'du/ ringong rtse mon lo smon pa gzhal
197a3(rnying rgyud): khad chen po zhig gi dbus su bla ma kaHthog pa 'od kyi rang bzhin du bzhugs 'dug/ dud dkar po chen po 'bud mi med par rang grab tu grags pa las/ dung dpag tu med pa 'phros te thams cad kyang rang grag tu phyogs thams cad khyab par ti ra ri 'gro ba gzigs
197a4(rnying rgyud): khong gi snyan pa phyogs med du 'gro bar 'dug gsungs/ de'i phyis su ka/ thog tu byon nas rin po che gtsang skyon las sgyu 'phrul gyi dbang bskur bzhus pas mkhyen pa'i ye shes phyogs med du sad par gyur/ kaHthog bzugs dam rdzogs pa chen po la mnyam par bzhag pa'i
197a5(rnying rgyud): tshenam mkha' ltar ci yang mi snang ba dang / nub gsum la ni khro'i lha tshogs dpag tu med pa gzigs pa sogs dag snang bsam gyis mi khyab pa shar gsungs/ de yang rin po che 'di nyid kyi thugs rgyud kyi yon tan rnams gtsang skyo ni rin po che'i byin rlab kyis sad par mdzad
197a6(rnying rgyud): la/ de nyid kyi yon tan rnams kyang sbom phrag pas gzigs pas dpon slob de dag gi mngon rtogs ci 'dra yin soms shig/ lan gcig mi bskyod pa'i zhing khams gzigs pa zhig la 'khor gyi sems dpa' rnams kyis chos kyi ji 'di la byang chub sems dpa' nor bu'i snying po
197a7(rnying rgyud): zhes pa'i sgra ti ri ri sgrogs shing spu skye ba de'i 'og tu bde ba can du de ltar 'gyur ba yin gsungs/ yang zhing khams de nyid lan gcig gzigs par ston pa mi bskyod pas rigs kyi bu nor bu'i snying po khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer rab tu 'phro ba zhes bya bar
197b1(rnying rgyud): po yin te/ rje btsun me hA dze kis slob ma so mdog la
197b2(rnying rgyud): do rgyam po na padur gyis ma myos par med de/ tha na snyi tha ma ze rigs kyi dag slong ngan zhes pa tham can thab mangs pagaso ba kyis ma mthugs mang da shes
197b3(rnying rgyud): mtha mad sa du da
197b4(rnying rgyud): sum su
198a1(rnying rgyud): mkhan po dang / spyan snga ma grub bsod nams 'bum pas las slob mdzad dag na pa bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos por bsgrubs te thub pa rnal chab tu mang 'gas la/ mtshan chos bu tha mar gsol zhing snga nga
198a2(rnying rgyud): dang rdzogs chen gyi dbang dang gdams pa'ang gsan/ dgung gi grangs don bzhi'i bar bstan pa dang 'gro ba'i don mdzad nas chu bri lor gzugs su'i bkod pa bsdus shing de'i 'og tu dpal ldan 'bras spangs su byang chub sems dpa' kasal b+hi zhes par gyur pas/
198a3(rnying rgyud): na des sa su bde ba can byung du ba sa sa spyad phyo su sgrubab sa zhes bya brjes kyi gyi mtho bar bathag sa ge sems can mthu smras pa'i da sa sa nga ma bya sa bachen pa ba ba ma sa
198a4(rnying rgyud): pa dkrung grangs sum cu bzhes pa gdanasar bzhugs/ mdo ste 'brul rdzogs rten gtso btud rlung bstun pa bsnyungs/ re gcig pa la gshegs/ de nyid kyi rgyas cha byed du 'ad ye shes 'bul gang po stag la bu'i thangs/ nye dgral gdas
198a5(rnying rgyud): pa bas tu 'i sdig samig pang bya sa kyim pang sa ma na pa sgra nga sun sa kyang lha dugs pa da ra snru pas 'dun pam sa yim pa lasanas
198a6(rnying rgyud): ga 'did me sa/ sna bathugs thogs zlums dus bye pa bzhin sa cig ga maphyog sa da dag gis na par gyu / de smra gas pa ci sa su 'dzin/
198a7(rnying rgyud): sa sun ma nan mas ba ga na na ldan ni kyigs sa na / dag tshi sa la bcu sa/
198b1(rnying rgyud): saskabs ye shes pa dbab pas slar rnal du gnas par mdzad pa'i ngo mtshar bstan/ kaH thog pas 'phags pa rin po che la sgra 'phrul zhi khro'i dbang bskur ba mdzad cing tor yul du theg/ sgra chos kyi rje hor yul du gzugs srubasgras/ 'phags pas bong bu kyi don
198b2(rnying rgyud): sumachod rten lem thog tshad gsum dang ting chen po bdun tshar sogs ka/ thog tu dbul bar mdzad pa dalta'ang yod/ de dag gi tshul sa s+ya baN+Di'i rtog pa brjod pastan dag gi bstan bcos chen po dge dbang gnyis pa rin spangasas stod dag dbang 'jigs me grags pas mdzad
198b3(rnying rgyud): bzang legs lam du/ 'bri chur rdzas bod bdud kyi gyi// btung ba thams cad legs byas su// 'gro ba'i rgyun gyis nyer 'tsho rnams// bde dang 'byor bas byug gzigs nas// kye ma mal srid pa yi// rnam 'gyur yid long rtsom pa las// rten 'byung tshogs
198b4(rnying rgyud): brtag par bya de rgyal gyur gsungs// de nas rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi yi 'degs 'jog re la chos 'khor mtshan ma brgya// 'god bzhin spro bas rgyal ba'i go 'phang la zhon 'dzin du byon la de bzhin du// gsang sngags rnying ma'i snying po'i rnal 'byor grub pa yongs mdzad shar gyi gshog//
198b5(rnying rgyud): 'od ye shes 'bum ste gzi byin nyi ma 'bum phrag 'gongs dang lhan cig tu// brten balha yi snang brnyan 'ga'// gsar du bsgrubs la kaHthog pas// bgegs rnams bskrad pa'i drag shul gyis// lha sku rnams kyang ring du song // dam tshig sems dpa' de ya rab// gang du sa s+tha ba/
198b6(rnying rgyud): chen mthus// skad cig la bkug ye shes kyi// sems dpa' brjid ldan lhag gnas bsal// thabs shes bdag gi nga yir med// ye shes sgyu ma'i rang mtshan las// mchog chos grub pa'i rol rtsed kyis// phreng ba mnyam nyid bsham mo che// theg pa rim pa dgu yi mgon// de yis
198b7(rnying rgyud): 'phags par sgyu 'phrul dbang // bskur ba'i dril chen sgra bzhin du// rna ba brgyad mar dbyangs su len// dngul gyis gzhis 'dzin can// yangs shing dar ba'i ku mud dang // 'khrul las zla ba'i 'jig rten ni// dga' ba 'khyil ba'i thad brgyud do// zhes pa
199a1(rnying rgyud): la sogs kyi sa rjod byed stan cing mdzes pa'i rgyan dang / brjod pa don kyi lus rdzogs par gyur pas stan dang gra sla ba gzhan byas chatsam yang bathun du med pa nyid du mthung nga/ je bu 'od pa'i rgyal thob byang chub dpal pa dag zang
199a2(rnying rgyud): bzhi par gdanas dbyon/ 'di'i dus su bar khrod dang / spring khrod/ dam drug rnams su phung po 'od sbyar dengs pa mang dubyung / khang pa shings na bas su las byed dmas kyis bya ng+ge lug ming po bsad nas ga pags paso sa thal ba la zung nas pa nas ga tra/
199a3(rnying rgyud): par mdzad pas thams cad co dir gyis mkha' spyod du song bar grags/ dgung po ri bzhi pa la gzhan don du gshegs/ de'i rgyal tshab bsod nams bzang po dgung long gsum pa la gdanas daphebs/ gzhi sgyu 'phrul dang rdzogs chen gyis bzung zhing 'di dgas man
199a4(rnying rgyud): nyang dang chos dbang sogs gter chos sngon ma sngon ma rnams cung bad dang bar byung / re gsum pa la gnan don du gshegs/ rgyal tshab kun dga' 'bum pas kyang na bzhin du bstan pa bskyangs/ de nas dbang phyug dpal ba dkrur grangs sa brgyad ra gdanas
199a5(rnying rgyud): mdza cing 'di skabs bshad pa pagatsam las skyeb gakhon gtso ba ba da cing thugs dam pa rtse gcig tu bzhugs pa la/ rngus gzhung rig tu 'jang rgyal pos dmag dpung can byung bar teganas kyis dam gtung bas tsug drag zus par 'od nyid kyi gtu rnam pa mang po lpags nig
199a6(rnying rgyud): gsungs// de bzhin du byas pas kha ba chen po babs nas dmag rnams phyir log/ slar zhabs su btud de gser gyi thub pa'i sgra dang / bso las bcos pa'i ga la'i bkod pa/ da lta'i gtsug lag khang gi rtse'i gardzir che ba 'di rnams phul/ de nyid dkung grangs gsum pa la gzugs rba
199a7(rnying rgyud): bsdus// rgyal po b+h+yo kos 'bum bzhe gsum pa la gdanas mdzad/ 'di'i slob ma chu gsor nam mkha' 'bum sogs grub parnyes mang po byung / zurang 'ug pa lung dang gsang sngags gling rnams su par skabs su bstan brtag phra bar gyur pa la mdo gyu 'phrul sogs dang ba
199b1(rnying rgyud): mdzad cing dbus gtsang khams gsum du bstan pa la phyug dus cha/ ralnga par gzhan don du gshegs/ rgyal tshab blo gros seng ge dgra mo so drug par gdanas mdzad/ bka' ma snga dang rnams kyis gzhi bzung nas gter ma'i skor yang 'don pas ka dar byas su ma dang dran/
199b2(rnying rgyud): drug cu ba la gshegs/ rgyal tsha byang chub blo gros kyis kyang sngon gyi rgyun de ka dang zad par sgyu 'phrul rje bzhi dang lam rnam bkod la'ang bshad pa mdzad/ raM rtsibs dang bar khrod sogs su spang ba bsam gtan gyi sde'ang shin tu rgyas/ de nyid kyi rgyal tshab byang chub se
199b3(rnying rgyud): ge dang byang chub rgyal mtshan gnyis kyis kyang bka' gter gyi 'chad nyan sgom gsum shin tu rgyas par mdzad/ byang chub rgyal mtshan gyi slob ma bu 'bor mkhas gru badz+ran ke tu ni gtags ye shes gzhon nu'i rnam 'phrul du lung gis bstan cing mdo sngags spyi'o la ma rim thams
199b4(rnying rgyud): cad la mkhas/ khyad par mkhas grub chen po bra'o chos 'bum las 'dus pa mdo dang sgyu 'phrul zhi khro'i dbang dang bshad pa sgrub thabs sogs ma lus par gas na/ bla mde las mog ston rdo rje dpal bzang gis 'dus pa mdo zhus shing / de las sems dpa' chen po
199b5(rnying rgyud): dang lung pa rdo rje rnam rgyal gyis zhus/ rgyun de las 'dus pa mdo khams lugs su grags pa dbus su bab pa yin te slar 'chad do// mkhas grub ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis gsang ba snying po ca 'grel rnams dang / mdo gongs 'dus/ rdzogs chen sems klong man
199b6(rnying rgyud): ngag gi sde gsum so so'i bka' srol gyi rtsa ba rnams slar yang nyi ma ltar gsal bar mdzad cing bshad srub kyis bstan pa khyab gdal du sbrel/ zhi khro dang phur ba bka' ma'i 'grel pa/ gsang ba snying po la 'grel pa/ sa bcad/ bsdus don/ lam rnam bkod la Ti ka dang
199b7(rnying rgyud): mtshan bu/ spa khab dang thugs thig la mtshan 'grel/ dmachog gsal bkral 'grel pa gsal ba'i me long / zhi khro'i phyag rgya ba cing thabs kyi yi ge/ dam parin po che'i theg pa spyi cing gi 'grel la/ chog kye 'khor lo'i rnam pashad sogs bstan bcos shin tu mang bar mdzad/
200a1(rnying rgyud): dza nyid kyi ba mkhab dka ba byadas ma kha rgyam no/ kun dgar ba/ phyogs med byangasams/ lwab skyon nam mkha ngan chen sogs mkhas shing da sa grub brtas pa kho na 'ang yang du nang pas bab dkar po
200a2(rnying rgyud): gsang skyeng spyi don dang / sa bcad/ bsus don/ lam rnam bkod le Ti ga sogs mdzad/ mkhas bub chen po nyid klu che'i mthar 'phags mtshor khyod du sgrub pa kho na la gdol zhing bzhugs nas phung por dang 'a bdakar ba/ 'ang san chad cigadul bya dpag tu
200a3(rnying rgyud): med pa'i don mdzad nas mkha' 'gro ma las kyi dbang mo ches khyod drug rtsi ri bzhi'i dus 'di nas tshe 'phos nas byang gi phyogs su 'gro don rgya cher mdzad/ de nas bde ba can du byang chub sems dpa' bde ba'i myu gus sangs rgyas kyi zhing sbyangs zhing dag pa'i bskal pa yon tan
200a4(rnying rgyud): bkod par bde ba'i snying po zhes bya bar 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan pa'ang thob/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis zhal gzigs shing thun mong gi spyod yul du'ang bla gos nyi zer la bkal ba sogs mkhas pa dang thub pa'i rnam thar
200a5(rnying rgyud): la byas ma gyis mi khyab po// 'di yan chad ka thog bla rabs bcu gsum zhes rigs gsum mgon po'i rnam 'phrul zam mi 'chad du byon cing / snga 'gyur gyi bstan pa bshad sgrub gnyis ldan gyis bsnyungs pa yin no// yang dam pa ba dang gshegs
200a6(rnying rgyud): gyi slob ma rong po thos cho ga rnam gsum zhes/ shes rab rgyal mtshan dang / shes rab dpal ba/ shes rab rdo rje gsum ste dbang rnon cig car gyi gdul bya ji bzhin par nges shing dam pa rin po che'i chos gsungs pa'i sgra thos pa tsam gyis chos
200a7(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi gteng sleb pa'i grub pa'i dbang phyug chen por gyur/ khong gsum nyid kyis shar rgyal mo rong du bstan pa spel ba las da lta'i bar bstan pa rin po che mnyam shing dar ba 'di ka byung ba yin no// yang ka dam pa'i slob ma'i mchog
200b1(rnying rgyud): lung bstan bu bzhir grags pa las/ 'bru tsha skang pas bum rong bzhag gsum kha ba dkar po yan chad du dgon gnas brgya rtsa brgyad btab par grags shing bstan pa khyab gdal du spel ba'i phyag rjes rje/ bA spyan sA nam mkha' dza
200b2(rnying rgyud): sde dgon pa 'debs par mdzad/ khong gi slob ma drung thugs rje ye shes/ ston pa dbang 'byor sogs las sgyu 'phrul dang rdzogs chen byi skor rnams dbus su babs pas khams lu gla zhes pa de byung / rmog ston 'jam dpal seng ge sang dri rgyud du dgon pa mdzad
200b3(rnying rgyud): cing bstan pa dang sems can gyi don rlab po che bslabs/ khong las grub thob rmog rabs bcu gsum du grags pa'i rgyun rnams byung / grub thob ma Ni rin chen ku ru chos kyi dbang phyug gi thugs rje chen po yang snying 'dus pa'i rtsa ba'i chos kyi badrag por dos bzung zhing
200b4(rnying rgyud): khong nyid kyi sras mo kun grol 'bum dang lhan cig kaHthog tu sngags kyi lung bstan mdzad kyang ma Ni rin chen rab byung gi brtul zhugs las ma 'das pas rten 'brel cung zad 'phyags/ 'on kya gong ma rnam gsum gyi gdung 'bum sogs kyi zhabs tog mdzad pa'i las
200b5(rnying rgyud): zin ma zag de nyid du bla gos kyis gshog pa ltar mdzad nas nam mkha' la bya bzhin 'phur nas par ka'i ri rtser bab/ der zhabs rjes kyang yod/ de nas rag cog tu bzhugs shing ring por ma thogs par skra 'di phung du yal lo// bla rabs bcu gsum gyi
200b6(rnying rgyud): rjes su drung rabs bcu gsum byon nas rim gyis bka' gter gyi bstan pa bsrungs mod/ 'on kyang bka' ma rnams phyis rim gyis nyag phra ba bzhin gyur/ smos ma thag pa'i bla rabs rnams kyi dus dge 'dun khri phrag bco brgyad du longs pa'i bstan pa
200b7(rnying rgyud): dang rgyas byung zhing rgyu mtshan nyid kyi bshad gra dang 'chad nyan kyang yod par 'dug cing / slob gra dang bsgom gra sogs so sor byung / mdor na shar rgyal mo rong / lho tsha ba rong dang mon/ nub kong po sogs dang dbus gtsang man chad du snga 'gyur gyi
201a1(rnying rgyud): bstan pa bshad srub gnyis ka'i phyogs nas ba tshabs dbus gtsang du ba skabs su mdo dang su 'phrul sems phyogs sogs kyi bstan pa nyag za par gyur pa'ang 'dri ga'i rgyun gyis gsos shing dang sang ga bar du dbang nub dang / bsha
201a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i grol/ man ngag gi klan/ lung she bachud pa rnams ma chad par yod pa 'di ka yin no// de'ang 'dus pa mdo dang sgra 'phrul gnyis kyi dbang lung man dge 'byung ngo'i chu bo bab lcags phyogs gcig ni/ ngam gtsang byams gsum nas/ tsa lnga sman bams
201a3(rnying rgyud): mkha' rdo rje/ drung thugs rje ye shes/ ston pa dbang 'byor/ rje btsun dpal 'bar ba nam mkha' rdorje/ ston pa mgan bral/ yang khrod tshul khrims rgyal mtshan/ bra'o chos kyi 'bum pa/ bu 'bor ba mkhas grub ye shes bral mtshan/ bzhagaH/
201a4(rnying rgyud): mkhas grub ye shes 'bum pa/ de las mon ka/ thog pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan/ ka 'thog pa rnam grol bzang po/ kaHthog pa chos kyi seng ge/ lha po ba chos kyi dbang po nas rim par/ rje sman lu pa blo mchog rdo rje nas der sang gi bar du gyur ma chad par byung
201a5(rnying rgyud): ba yin no// yang mdo dpa kha mas lugs zhes pa ni/ bar skabs der/ skol chen bas ma 'grub rdo rjes/ zur yang dben pa shAkya 'byung gnas lham sring gnyis la gnang ba las/ zur mo dge 'dun dbu ma las brgyud pa ste/ bu ba d+mo 'di don la
201a6(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin gyi rnal 'byor ma yin mod/ rnam pa gzhon dus nas 'khor ba'i skyon dang bral bas sku btsun/ bskyed rdzogs gsum ka la sbyangs pas mthar son/ gnas lugs rtogs shing ting 'dzin gyi sgo dum las dbang 'byor pas mkhas shing grub pa mo

202a2(rnying rgyud): mdor na bla ma 'dis lugs tha dad pa mang po gsan cing / sgyu 'phrul gzhi lam 'bras gsum gyi snod thun dang / lam rnam bkod kyi Ti ka brtsams/ des ste mdo thams cad gzigs pa zhes grags par bshad cing / des kyang snying rdeg dang / lam rnam

202a6(rnying rgyud): rong ba na dpal gyi rin po che'i sras/ dong ba na rin chen tshul khrims zhes bya ba des rgyu'i dus kyi mngon byang lnga'i cho ga byas pa las/ phyogs kyi glang po'i shes rab/ dbyig gnyen zhabs kyi thos pa/ tsan+d+ra go mi'i brjod pa/ chos kyi grags pa'i

202b1(rnying rgyud): byon nas mdo khams kyi sa'i char rgyud 'ga' zhig gi 'gyur yang bco ste/ tha ga nA'i mtshan brjod kyi 'grel pa la sogs pa gsang sngags kyi 'grel pa dang / 'jam dpal gsang ldan la sogs pa'i sla zangs meng par bgyur/ sgrar bstan
202b2(rnying rgyud): 'ga' zhig kyang mdzad nas mya ngan las 'das pa gang gi de ma thag pa'i sku'i skye ba yin par grags/ bka' 'gyur mdo mangs kyi lung rgyan la skr-i ti dang breng chags su 'dren pa ni dpyad gzhar 'dug/ le mas tsar phral ring mo zhes rna ba'i bani rta gcig
202b3(rnying rgyud): su byon/ gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa la sogs bskur bshad mdzad nas 'das pa de nyid kyi skye ba yin par yang thags/ sku gzhon nu nas lhun gyis grub pa'i shes rab chen po mnga' bas nyang skad du 'gar ston tshul khrims dazang po la

202b5(rnying rgyud): 'khrid par bya'am zhus pas/ 'gar ston chen pos/ de skad ma zer / chos thams cad khos go nas yod pa yin gsung skad/ lo bcu gcig pa la mtshan nyid gas na/ chos dbang la gyis pa'i rtse sar yang slob dpon gyi gsung tshad shar re lo
202b6(rnying rgyud): pas/ chos thams cad tshar re gsan pa kho nas tshig gcig kyang ma nor bar thugs su chud pas 'jam dpal gyi sprul par grags/ bcu gsum lon pa'i tshe gsan pa rdzogs pa dang 'dra bar byung zhing / shes bya thams cad la ma rmongs pa byung / nying
202b7(rnying rgyud): kyi zhal nas kyang / bdag zos pa chung ba yang ma yin te/ chos thams cad ma thos pa med do// thos pa che ba yang ma yin te chos thams cad tshar ri las ma dgos so gsung skad/ skyes bu chen po 'di ni shes rab myur la zab pa/ rgya tshe la
203a1(rnying rgyud): dri mdang bral ba spobs pa mchog tu dge bas mdo rgyad dam bstan bcos la sogs pa'i rgya gzhung brlung ba sngur ma gzugs pa mtha' dag char bye 'am/ gtas tshun chad gzugs pas tshig dang do mam lus
203a2(rnying rgyud): thugs la zin cing mi brjed pa'i gzungs thob par grags pas/ theg ma nyid nas ha cang ma 'bad par saM s+thi tA dang / skad rigs kyi bye brag gzhan mang po la'ang ma rmongs shing / phyi nang gi rig pa'i gnas dang / gtsug lag thams cadul tho
203a3(rnying rgyud): pa med pa'i blo gros kyi tsher ma rno bas/ bod kyi skad nyid la'ang 'di ni don 'di tsam la 'jug go zhes ston pa'i khyad par phra mo'ang gzhan las ches lhag/ tshang ma'i bstan bcos dang / rig byed kyi bstan bcos dang / don du 'gyur ba'i tshigs

203a5(rnying rgyud): pu tI la brtags pa tsam gyis mkhyen pa la tshogs ma byung / zan dud 'gro'i bana'adang skad kyi rim pa'ang mkhyen par grags/ swa sgo la sogs pa'i 'grel ba dang bstan bcas kyang mang du mdzad/ blo gros kyi mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pas phyir chos la mos
203a6(rnying rgyud): ze'i mi rnams dang / chos kyi gang zag dang / khyad par du rdo rje theg pa la zhugs shing / gsang sngags kyi las dang dngos grub sgrub par 'dod pa dag la phan gdags pa'i dgongs pa zab mo mnga' bas/ phyin ci ma log pa'i gdams pas nan tan tu 'doms
203a7(rnying rgyud): shing gan thags par mdzad/ mngon par shes pa'i cha dang ldan gang sems can 'dul ba'i dus dang gnas skabs mkhyen pas/ 'gro ba phal bzlo bsgyur shing / chos la gnas pa rnams de'i 'gal zlar gyur pa las ldog pa'i phyir/ 'byur shing 'bri

203b2(rnying rgyud): dang thugs dam la nor bu rin po che dang srog gi dbang po ltar gces spras mdzad cing gzhan yang de la 'god/ dam pa'i chos rtsom pa na glegs bam bsdu zhing gzigs pa la sogs pa'i rtog dpyid kyi sgo dogs mi dgos par/ chos kyi tshig don la thogs rdzag med
203b3(rnying rgyud): par 'jug pa'i spobs pa'i gter chen po brgyad grol zhing bstan bcos rnams kyang don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ brjod pa ma 'dres pa sha stag 'byung bas/ ston pa drang srong chen po'i gsung gi gsang ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyir gzhan mkhas par
203b4(rnying rgyud): grags pa gang gis kyang cod mi nus shing / des mdzad pa'i gsang sngags kyi man ngag rnams la slob pa'i rgyung du byung ba'i gang zag/ lung ma thob kyang yi ge las byung ba bzhin sbar ba las byin rlab ma byung ba med ces grags pas bde bar gshegs pa'i sprul
203b5(rnying rgyud): sku nyid du'ang gleng / gnas lnga rig pa'i paN+Di ta mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa rdo bo a ti sha dang bdag nyid chen po 'di mjal ba'i tshe/ jo bo'i zhal nas/ gya gar gyi A tsaH nag po spyod pa de nyid tshe 'phos pa rdo ba 'di kho na yin te/ kho bos 'di dang chos
203b6(rnying rgyud): gau tam bye ba ga la thub ces rtsod med du grags par gsungs/ spyir gtam du'ang / 'dul ba mtshur skyon dbyig gi mkhas// cho ga skyigs bzangs kyi ye grags mkhas// skra dang tshad ma rong pa mkhas// thams cad 'jom pa a ho rang // chos grags
203b7(rnying rgyud): rang zer skad/ spyir bla ma mang po las mdo sngags so so'i brgyud pa'i phreng chags mthud pa tsam yod mod kyi/ khyad par du snga 'gyur rdo rje theg pa'i chos skor las/ slob dpon chen po parla'i gdams pa rnams ni sman ma rdo rje bdud 'joms/ mkhar
204a1(rnying rgyud): chen dpal gyi dbang byug/ dom a tsa dpal matog/ smon rje gzhon nu/ zhang dang yon tan thags/ rang ban yon tan/ rong ban tshul khrims rin po che las nyid kyis gsan to// bair tsan man ba rnams/
204a2(rnying rgyud): yu s+pha/ des bla chen dgongs pa gsal/ des grum shing blag can/ des gnubs dpa' brtan/ des ya ze bon ston/ des kun mkhyen ror zo ma la bshad de sems sde'i brgyud pa gcig go// yang slong thar slob mar a ro ye shes 'byung gnas
204a3(rnying rgyud): ba'i grub pa'i skyes bu zhig byung ste/ de la rgya gar bdun brgyud dang / rgya'i slob dpon bdun brgyad kyi gdams pa mnga' zhing / des cog ro zangs dkar mdzod khur dang / ya zi bon ston/ des nyid la'o// 'di la rdzogs chen khams lugs
204a4(rnying rgyud): sa zer/ yang po ma las nyar ting 'dzin bzang po la gsungs pa dang / bi ma las rma rin chen mchog dang / gnyigs dz+nyA na ku mA ra la gsungs pa'i man ngag kyang / gnyis kas khu byang chub 'od/ khyung po dbyig 'od la brgyud nas rim gyis
204a5(rnying rgyud): zom la mnga' bas gsang sngags snga 'gyur gyi bstan pa'i bdag po 'gran zla spangs pa zhig ste 'di nyid la'ang bstan pa'i chu mgo gcig gnas so// gsang snying 'grel pa rong lugs kyi mgor/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rang bzhin byang chub sems// /
204a6(rnying rgyud): sa yod pas dkon cog 'grel zhes ming du thogs la/ kun mkhyen chen po'i 'grel pa phyogs bcu mun sel theg rgyal gyi lugs su bkral zhing zhal gsal/ kun mkhyen dong pa'i 'grel pa 'di dbyings che bar bkral bas sgrom che zhing kha dam par
204a7(rnying rgyud): nga ste/ bod 'grel gyi gtso bo 'di gnyis yin par shes na blo gros la nus pa chen po ster ba yin no// de'ang sku gzhon nu'i tshe mdo ston seng ge bya ba la snga 'gyur gsan pa'i tshe/ re zhig na mnal lam du/ gsang ba snying pos bran byas/ sangs
204b1(rnying rgyud): sa mnyam sbyar gyi tshod ma byas nas gsol gyi na 'dug pa mes/ de slob dpon la brjod pas/ shin tu ngo mtshar che/ chos de khong du chud pa'i rtags yin/ khyod kyis 'grel par gyis gsung da/ der bla ma'i dgongs rdzogs dang gyur/ @
204b2(rnying rgyud): b.rin po che gsum la brten pa'i man ngag gsum mdzad de/ lhag pa tshul khrims kyi bslab pa'i don gyi nges brjod dam tshig mdo rgyas/ lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi bslab pa ston pa 'grel tshul 'dri yan dag bco pa/ lha gang shes rab ji bskyab pa ston pa
204b3(rnying rgyud): chen po'i lha sgol man dag/ mnyam stor gyi 'brel pa/ de bzhin du ngan song skyong rgyud/ 'jigs byed la sogs pa'i 'grel pa dang lan drag mang po/ de dag gi nang nas kyang theg pa chen po'i tshul la 'jug pa'i bstan bcos la sogs pa
204b4(rnying rgyud): gzhung gtid zab la gdon slongs che ba brjod bris mi lang ba dang / mdongon mdo sde dang / rgyud sde dang / bstan bcos kyi bye brag la thugs su myi rnyed pa bya ba shes byal srid par ma kyang pas thams cad mkhyen por gnas pa rang gir mdzad de zar
204b5(rnying rgyud): jig rten pa'i zhing las dang / phyugs skyong ba dang / dkAr shwe ji ltar bsgrub pa tshun chad kyi bsnyen bac+doMs kyang mdzad pas/ dus de'i tshe bod du bzhi'i mkhas pa thams cad kyi dang por brtsad pa'i bya ba la lhags pa'ang / slang skyob dpon
204b6(rnying rgyud): kyi grags pa'i brtul zhugs kyis gang dang gang gi spobs pa'i 'khri shing nya mnyes par byas nas nga rgyal gyi gdengs ka la brgyang nul dra ba'i skabs byung ba yin te/ 'di ltar shab kyi yang byed bla ma/ mar pa do pa/ 'u yug pa mda' ston/ mdo'i
204b7(rnying rgyud): byung po hUM steng / se khrom rgya mtsho 'bar/ mtshams ston go cha/ sang ka dar chung / 'gos lhas btsas/ rgya rgyal tshul la sogs pa'i mkhas pa thams cad kyis bod du skyes pa'i gang zag gis bstan bcos 'di tsam rtsom pa zhes dpyas
205a1(rnying rgyud): gdags/ sun 'byin pa'i rig pa bsams te/ khyu mchog rwa brdar ba la phyogs pa bzhin du skyes bu chen po de'i gam du song song ba na/ lung ga 'thad pa dang / rig pas dpyad bzod pa dang / gtan tshigs dang bla mas
205a2(rnying rgyud): bstan pa dang mi 'gal zhing sa ston dang / don skyon la sogs kyi 'gal kwa'i phyogs thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i mkhyen rab kyi stobs pas tshar bcad/ bstan bcos ri mchong zhing / de'i don la ro myangs pas thams cad de mtshur skyes nas ban snya
205a3(rnying rgyud): ri mar mdzad/ glu mar mdzad pa sha stag yin zhes grags/ de skad du go rub lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab ces bya ba zos pa mang po'i gzungs 'dzin pa de nyid kyis kyang dang por dpyas gdags/ bar du bla ma rnyong pas mdzad pa'i theg pa chen po'i tshul la
205a4(rnying rgyud): 'jug pa'i po ti gzigs pas gus pa chen po skyes/ tha mar zang zing mang pos bsnyen bkur te mi 'chab par byas nas/ rjes su gzung bar gsol ba btab / 'jam dpal gsang ba'i rgyud la sogs pa'i chos mang dugs na/ gsang rgyad kyi skabs na ma
205a5(rnying rgyud): paN+Di ta chen po'i zhal nas/ 'o sol la da lta rgya dpe yod par gyur na 'di ltar 'gro ba yin te/ rgyad dpe med pas da lha bcos su med gsungs pa la/ go ru ba lo tsA bas de blo la bzung ste phyis jo bo kr-it+ta zhes bya ba'i baN+Di ta las rgya dpe byung nas de la mnyan pas
205a6(rnying rgyud): dong pa paN+Di ta'i gsung bzhin byung nas shin tu mos pa thob par gyur te/ kr-iShA ba las byung ba'i rgya dpe gcig dong pa nyid la phul nas/ slar yang gas na skad/ de bzhin du mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug la sogs pa'i lo tsA ba dang / mkhas par
205a7(rnying rgyud): grags pa'i glo rtsal can mang pos kyang zhabs la btud/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po many+dzu shI warma dang / many+dzu hrI dz+nyA na dang / upA ya shI mi tra dang / bud+d+ha A ka ra b+ha dra dang / de bA kar tsan+da dang / pa ra me sh+le dang / a mo g+ha badz+ra la sogs pa paN+Di ta mang po bsten nas/
205b1(rnying rgyud): de dag gi lo tsA ba mdzad de/ rdo rje 'jigs byed dang / gshin rje dgra nag gi rgyud dang / 'jam dpal gsang ldan dang / bde mchog rtsa rgyud la sogs pa mang du bsgyur/ 'gyur shin tu bzang bas gsar 'gyur gyi dper 'is/ 6gar gyi N+Di ta kun tra ra
205b2(rnying rgyud): b+ha dra khyod chos mang po rtsoms la 'gro ba rnams skyobs shig/ khyod kyi yon tan gzhan lta zhog/ sgra tshad kyi lugs 'di'i gsum cha tsam las mi shes pas kyang rgya gar na chos rtsom pa yin na/ khyod ci'i phyir mi brtsam zhes gsung skad/ de lta bu'i yon tan
205b3(rnying rgyud): phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan yang / gcom bsnyungs pa dang // khengs pa stsol ba lhur mdzad pas/ rgyal ba klong chen pas rgya 'grel las mngon par 'phags par brjod pa'i rang nyid kyi 'brel pa bzang po dkon mchog 'grel lta bu'i gsham du'ang / mkhas
205b4(rnying rgyud): dang 'phags chen rnams kyis mdzad pa'i gzhung la'ang / sgo skar dpya bar byed na bdag gzhung cis mi rmos/ zhes 'phags chen lag na rdo rjes bsdus pa'i rgyud la'ang mun pas sprul pa'i shes rab kyis gzhung brtag byed pa yod na/ bdag gi 'grel pa smos
205b5(rnying rgyud): ci 'tshal zhes slob dpon zhi ba lha'i rnam par thar pa bskyangs nas dang gis dge ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa can du sten/ grub pa'i rnam thar la gzhal na/ brag chen gzar po me long lta bu'i ngos la'ang rdzu 'phrul gyi spyod pas gshegs pa dang / zag la pur
205b6(rnying rgyud): pa 'debs pa dang / nam mkha' la 'phur ba dang / bod kyi lha 'dre phal mo che'i gnas dang spyod pa thugs su chud pa'i mngon par mkhyen pa mnga' ba sogs mang du yod mod kyi/ 'di lta bu'i lta ba mchog tu gyur cing / so so yang dag mig 'di'i sa thob pa
205b7(rnying rgyud): dag la skye bo phal pa yid brtan par byed pa'i mngon rtags phyin pa yi ge'i lam du 'dren pa mtshor ba ma yin no// de ltar sprul pa'i skur rtsod pa med pa'i paN+Di ta chen po de la gnas skabs de tsam byon pa'i mkhas pa thams cad kyis mngon pa ma spyad cing ste

206a5(rnying rgyud): ba'i gtamamang rjid/ del ga na pa slob dngan panan kyi ma sa ma gabs pa brgyad de/ phur brgyam po khrigs sa ga nga / ngo ma jugs dang / ma grags dang / dang / da

207a3(rnying rgyud): sa/ 'i ma rnam gyi dngas rmag na zlan gyi'i jig ldan nupa sheg bsngal pa rgyal la stsogs pa'i gnas des myed du sgrub la yod ze bathos/ der na la mtha ba la gser mang po bslar nas sbom dbang ga tsun khom man sa // / rdzar
207a4(rnying rgyud): pas sugs su mags di/ slob dzin pa nga sa kyi thab sa na bu dang polas sa pa shAd de/ nga rigasu brgyad sa mam ma chad pas kyi rnams lanags pas des smra mayang gyur pas
207a5(rnying rgyud): spyad rten pa m+b+ha ma can kyil tshogs pa dang / ga 'i chung thub dang / kau sa tan ba cwag nyi nas bsdus pagasu mngon rten gyinong gtags las bgrad rnal DUr ba na// des bu'i dpe las la na rtags brnyes pa
207a6(rnying rgyud): sa mi ba pa zhig byung bas rnams cad bskyed par mi nus la/ chad par ltar bA la lang la ba byung do shes kyi ba de gzhan nanase pa sa dang thas/ pa tsunan mas kyis rje btsun pa la mji ltar thos pa bzhin du shin tu ma thug pa byung bas/
207a7(rnying rgyud): a rbangs thugs kyis ma bzod nas phur po'i man ngag las gnad du zab pa'i sgor byen te sgrub pa byas nas pa spun rnams cad ba cing/ de la grags pa chen po 'bal na'ang sngon gyi sbyin 'bras dbul bas 'khor ba'i lug byed cing mang can/ dgang sa
207b1(rnying rgyud): dram nA bdes nga thung dang 'arjo ba shin tu byung / tha~Md kyi thad pon tshe dbus dbang med du 'dud dgas pa yin/ de ltar ma bgyis na long gis gshin rje'i brag sngags kyis sgrol bar grags/ de la dum pa chagang khrom gyi gshin rje'i sgor rnga'i rtsom grangs
207b2(rnying rgyud): nas phyung ste/ tshe bdag sdig pa snying 'dzings la sogs pa phyed tsam las ma bshus pa rnams/ rwa lo'i spyan du son pas/ rang nyid kyi gshed skor la lhan thabs su byas/ de la rgya gar gyi khungs dang 'gyur bcos/ de bzhin du dus thang gi gte
207b3(rnying rgyud): mang po'i khrod nas kyang mthu gtad ser gsum/ rnam sras/ dza ma b+ha la/ tshogs bdag la sogs pa man ngag zab dang / byung bas gsar 'gyur gyi gshin rje las mtha' mngal myar bar song / mar ba'i sras dang ma mdo sde la sogs pa byang chub sems da
207b4(rnying rgyud): bcu gsum dang / gnyen lo tsA ba sogs rang mnyam gyi lo tsA ba bcu gsum bsgral ba'i sngags mkhan de/ 'khor de'i sar chos 'khor la byon pas lang lab kyis phyag ma bcol/ mi thun po gcig yin par 'jug dgongs pa la/ slar lang la ba
207b5(rnying rgyud): nyid thos nas/ 'o na kho la do rung kyi tshe las med kyi sgrar zer/ drag shul gyi las brtsams pas/ dgug 'dren gyi bden pa padar dang po'i tshe khong dpon slob la cang phur gyi char babs nas/ rdo h+ye'i gre ba rnams slas/ ba ra ba la phyogs bcu kho bo'i dkyil
207b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor za gsod dang bcas pa'i lcags phur gyi char babs/ tha ma'i tshe mad pung dang 'ur smras gang ste nam mkha' la bltas pas/ lcags bsregs lta bu'i rdo rje gzhon nu ri do tshad tsam pa rwa lo'i thog tu rngams rngams 'cha' 'cha' ltar 'dug pas skrag par
207b7(rnying rgyud): kyar te/ bzod gsol byas/ phyag dang 'bul bas bsnyen bkur/ gshin rje mkhan po phur po la thugs zer ba de nas byung / phur pa'i bud las la dngos grub parnyes pa mang du byung ste/ smad las la rtsal shugs 'di las zon pa ma byung bar grags
208a1(rnying rgyud): sa sa mngon sa par gyur brtan mogs ba rgyal khrims/ mngang sa ni ba thes/ dganang bar tham / bsun rnam pa'i nag / delas kyang byung sribs kyang bya di tshon byaba'a'angang nga dag
208a2(rnying rgyud): baspun gyis 'phrogs/ rtso bshin tu 'phel te lang la bal dur bzhus pas zlab dgung lta bsnyer gyis/ de nas pas lpags shes gsum / ba gnyis sbubs cig/ don 'thu po gsungs/ de sa byas pas nus pa shid bcin/ 'i dz+ra na'i yang po nyim dang
208a3(rnying rgyud): zhing drug pa sa bltas pas/ thams cad dgra du ma gyur pa myi 'dug nas/ phur pa kyang la ba rdzogs pas mang 'gyel/ thams cad kyi mra'i la me du bkod pas kyi kyang rje yang grags pas mtshon nus bya can sha phrag zung ste yi ge phyir mi la de/ yar rung
208a4(rnying rgyud): 'di nus pa mchog tu che bar zhugs pas/ sri bring dpon chen po tsutsun gyi nags la me shor bal gdengs pas nag song chung / bi ma las gang+gA len du 'gyur ba lnga gdengs pas gang+gA yan man du chad/ bil po hA lu ma N+Das thag mkhang gong can la gdengs pas tha'
208a5(rnying rgyud): ri drim bur nyel/ jo ma mthar chen bzas sbyang gi'i rjes sA la btab pas srung gi rbab la 'dril/ men thal ba'i snying pos bya rog gis phreng ba khyer bal brdegs pas bya gzung la smyung / long bal kyi hU~M gros kyis dmug gi bla khyim la thebs pas mon
208a6(rnying rgyud): dmig rgyas la phebs/ de la sogs tu dngagags gnyis pa slebs pas ma thal rlobs byo ga gis pang rjebar sa nas/ rkang dunyan mangs dus la bas pas mchog mi dngas thubathob pa dpag tu med babyung // yang gta
208a7(rnying rgyud): 'i phyogs 'ang mas bslad pa shin tus mad/ mang rgyags gas pa bathob pa can pas brtson pa la dbang rgyud gdams pa dang cas gnang nas/ rgyam the ma ga na rgya da yod pas pa srung ga zab la sa
208b1(rnying rgyud): pA/ drug pa'i dbang phyug 'dang rlabs ngos rtag rgyal gyi grug pa spong mar bsgrub pa spyang da pas ba sngon chen po dang dngos su ma sa/ brlab rba bcu grangs zhig gsungs pas bzhin du mdzad/ dang nang rangabazhin nub na la sbyor ba bdas
208b2(rnying rgyud): phebs te chos gsungs/ skub de bzhin srin po 'dul du 'gro na sa ni zer la bcibs te bzhud/ de'i tshe yer ba'i se lung nas mtshan mardzas kyi phur ba gter gas gyu'o/ wasa'i tshong dus du 'byas ban+da/ rlung 'tsho chen pos khom 'thong ba byung // de nas
208b3(rnying rgyud): gtsang du byon cen/ sa pa gyid thong du 'byon pa dang gnas khang gcig tu 'jom/ 'dir byar zhal 'chos pas sgrib rda kyili gyi l-i ya zhes bgrangs bsas pa'aM kyis/ dri ma dag/ badz+ran me sngal ya zer ba yin gsungs/ dweng 'ad kyang thug
208b4(rnying rgyud): yus nas/ sngags ma dag cung 'di bzhin byed pa yi na gsungs nas brag la phung ba tham tha ma bca' bas 'jim pa la thus pa bzhin song / slar Ta pA tshur la gdus zin khyen pas dpal nus ci zungadags/ dengs pa'i sa grang rdzob tu shes nas/
208b5(rnying rgyud): mu stegs pa dang rtsod du 'gro bas de'i rim sgor 'phyon dgos gsungs/ zung gsungs nas lhan cig tu byon/ skyed grong du phebs pa na/ rgya gar gyi lugs bzhin bstan pa gang rgyal ba'i ru mtshon du btsugs/ sa paN dang 'phrog byed dga' bo gnyis
208b6(rnying rgyud): nyim bcu gsum gyi bar rtsod pa'i g.yul ngol zhugs pas/ mthar sa paNacong pa las rgyal yang / grung rtags 'gan rjer 'phrog kyi dka' bo nang ba'i bstan pa la 'jug tu ma nyan/ des mu stegs des ral pa rgyang tu bstAr/ lag pa gshog pa
208b7(rnying rgyud): lur byas te nam mkha' la 'phur bas/ saM paN gyis rig sngags kyi mthu las gzhan gyis me thal bar gzigs te badz+ra kyai li rtsi la rgyags shog ces 'dang phyir thos/ de rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos mu stegs kyi grib ma'i snying gar/ oM
209a1(rnying rgyud): kyi li kyi lA ya hU~M phaT/ ces phur pa btab pas/ mu stegs pa bya la rdo btags pa bzhin du sa la lhungs/ de nas sa paN gyis rtsod pa las rgyal ba'i dpa' rtags su 'phrog byed dga' bor tu masrung bar khring byon pan/
209a2(rnying rgyud): slob dpon chen pos bod la mu stegs pa srung bar bka' bsgos pas brtan ma bcu gnyis kyi chad pas bcad de nyid grong dang bod kyi so mtshams su mu stegs de kha nas khrag skyugs nas lnga pa'i lam du btang / lar gyi rol pa'i grub mtha' 'dzin pa tsam bod la brdar mi
209a3(rnying rgyud): mngon par lhagAs srid kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dngos kyi rgol ba byed nus pa'i blo stobs can mi 'ongs pa yin/ 'dis mus srad du byon nas gtsug lag khang gi rten gtsor phur ba 'di bzhag/ slar rim gyis gyur nas da lta ser bur mjal zhes zer
209a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i rgyun can 'di byung ngo // / da ni gter kha gong 'og gi gtam bshad par bya ste/ rgya cher rol pa las/ brjed pa med pa dran pa'i gter dang / blo gros rab tu 'byed pas blo gros kyi gter dang / mdo sde thams cad kyi rnam pa khong du chud
209a5(rnying rgyud): pas rtogs pa'i gter dang / thos pa thams cad kun tu 'dzin pas gzungs kyi gter dang / legs par bshad pas sems can thams cad tshim par byed pas spobs pa'i gter dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrung bas chos kyi gter dang / dkon
209a6(rnying rgyud): mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyan mi gcod pas byang chub kyi sems dang / mi skye ba'i chos la grub pa thob pas sgrub pa'i gter te/ gter chen po brgyad thob par 'gyur ro// zhes bshad pa'i gnas gang yin pa de gdod nas skul ba'i skur byang chub pa'i ye
209a7(rnying rgyud): shes dam pa'i spyod yul du gyur la/ rnam pa tsam du yang rang don du mchog gi dngos grub chen po'i go 'phang le 'dzegs te/ gsang gsod dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi yan lag rgya mtsho lta bu la dab par byor pase rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'i sa la bzhugs
209b1(rnying rgyud): shAg gzhan gan du bstan pa'i bya brtan ma la ches pa dang / sems can gyi khams rgyam tshos du 'dul bya thabs la mkhas par ston pa na sprul pa ma pa tha~Md dag tu yon masas// de gA' cagags btang rjer ba'i phyogs thams cad la sgra rlu
209b2(rnying rgyud): byed pa ni lce lazor gshol lnga ba rgyas rmod pa'i las yin no// gter du btags pa rnam pa thams cad pa'i tshal ni kho bo cag gis kyang dag gi slab gnyis kA bya ba ma yin te/ rgyan las/ mi rigs pa yi gzugs la'ang mi ri lda na/ za bom pa ba'i tsho la mo /
209b3(rnying rgyud): zhes dang / rangs na/ dge ba yin na bzang po ste// sdig pa byed pa'ang sdig palta'o// zhes de dang de'i 'bras bu mi 'chol ba'i phyir ro// 'on te rnam pa thams cad nas rdzas 'gal ba mthong ba'i chos su gtan la phebs pakrung yang des ting la'i bstan pa
209b4(rnying rgyud): thams cad nyam nyes par mi blta ste/ dper na dge slong lha chen po dang / sde snod 'dzin pa gzhon nu sde bdud kyis khebs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab chud gsan pa lta bu'o// des na chos ma yin pa chos su brdzus pa'am/ gter ma yin pa sher mas
209b5(rnying rgyud): bzlas pa deka sde tshan gcig tu 'jog par 'os kyi/ gsang sngags kyi rgyud sde chen po'i brjod bya dang brjod don mnor shing / 'bras bu grub pa la bsrub med pa 'di dag las chos dang rdo chos zhes skur ba byed pa ni bdud kyi las su 'gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyis/
209b6(rnying rgyud): bdag bstod gzhan la sdod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni// bdud kyis yongs su bslus shing blo rlung rig par bya// zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro// de la lha brgyad po sror rje brtan drar yang ring gi man ngag srel ba'i sla dang byon pa mnga' ba dang / nying nyi la 'od zer
209b7(rnying rgyud): nI/ yul lnga brog pa ltam shul ces bya bar/ ya to pos 'khor dang / yus pa thab kyil gyi sras su shing 'brug gi yol bltams/ sku gdon dunapa po mtshar bsam gyis me khyab cing / mkha' 'grom rigs bzhi/ rje babyen skal ma/ thugs
210a1(rnying rgyud): can po/ ba dpan d+mal sogs pa'i gzhug gas gong chos la bkral/ rangag lab las gus na pa mang bu 'ad/ dpung po bkra gsum pa la thugs can pa dang lung bgrub tapang dbu'i zag la cag ga
210a2(rnying rgyud): kyi rjes dang / zangs kyi phur pas rta skad mngon sum du 'chir babyung / ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro mas blag rdo rje rtse lnga 'dra bar song zhig ces spra bo'i ri lung bstan/ 'jal 'dzin rgyal sras/ kham bu yang le/ luT rdzob sogs las gas nyid
210a3(rnying rgyud): go chos mang po dang / khyad par gru thob dngos grub las stan ras gzigs dang / bka' brkyang bka' ma'i dba'i lung yongs su rdzogs/ spra bo'i ri la grub pa mdzad kyin yod can/ bu ltos shig b+hu ba'i sra zhig byung / bskas can rnal 'byor rus
210a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyan can zhig 'dug/ nang du bos nas tshab drangs pas de na re/ da ni nam mkha'i rnal 'byor pa// dbang phyug rdo rje bya ba yin// bu khyod las dang skal bar ldan// pakras dbang dang lung gis kyob// gsang sngags zab mo'i chos rnams kun//
210a5(rnying rgyud): da lta mkha' 'gro'i lag na yod// gsol ba thob la myung du longs// zhes kha byang yang gnad yig gsum gtad de 'ja' skar lal gra pa mngon shes dang shag gi ster ston gyis kyag babyang spyad/ dzud par mkha' 'gro la shes 'tsho rgyal gyi sprul
210a6(rnying rgyud): pa saM stag b+ha tshas gter gyis gang ba gting bas mkha' 'gro'i sbub skor sog su man dag mang po byung / mkho mthe gri gnas yig lha'i phyag mdzud chad pa yong bas khyer te phul ba las sgom gya sgom spug gnyis nas bde gshegs 'jus pa rgyal ze'i slang pe
210a7(rnying rgyud): dang / rta mgrin/ bka' srung sgor gyi mtshon te chos gter dang byin chub kyi rten dpag tu med pa byon/ bde gshegs 'dus pa'i spyan bsgrub mdzad pas spyan me lha mos mdur tshon pa phul/ ye shes mtsho rtsal dang dngos su mjal nas dngos grub
210b1(rnying rgyud): ci 'dod gsungs pA la/ chos 'dod zhus pas mkha' 'gro lung bstan gyi skror dang zhulan bkrargya dpe gtang / ngur zad bsal ba'i tshal du mtshan sum par zad nas/ der slob dpon chen po dang mjal/ bu tshangs pa lha'i matog/ slo pam gsung
210b2(rnying rgyud): nas keng rus kyi khri la bzhag/ sgrub chen dgu'i bka' spyi dang bye brag gi dbang thams cad rdzogs par gnang / yi dam gyi lha dang gnyis su med par gyur nas chos skyong bran du 'khol/ phrin las nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam par song nas dus de can
210b3(rnying rgyud): gsang sngags 'chang pa'i gzugs su gnas pa gnyis lam du 'dri smod pa la'ang khyod cag gter kha gong 'og gang gi lugs yin zhes 'dri ba byung / bstan pa'i bya ba dang rdzu 'phrul gyi nus pa bsam gyis mi khyab ste rnam thar grags che bas 'di tsam gyis mtshan pa
210b4(rnying rgyud): nus/ slob ma ni/ gnyis grags rgyal/ zhig po bdud rtsi/ sras mi bskyod rdo rje/ sman 'on pa/ sa ston khri mchog ste bka' babs kyi buM lA/ sras chung ba mnga' bdag 'gro mgon nam mkha' dpal ni sprin grol yongs rdzogs kyi bka'
210b5(rnying rgyud): dpas gtad pa'i bstan pa'i bdag po yin/ dgung lo de dgu pa shing po byi ba'i lo la rdzu 'phrul gyi bkod pa rgya chen po dang / khyad par thugs ka nas hrIHyig dkar po zhag bde ba can du gshegs par bstan te mu'i bkod pa bsdus/ spar bu'i sprul pa rgya gang
210b6(rnying rgyud): shar phyogs su bkod pa sna tshogs ston pa'i rnal 'byor pa gcig/ gsung gi sprul pa gu ru chos kyi dbang phyug/ thugs kyi sprul pa yul nyer bzhi la spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa gcig ste/ gsum cig cer du 'byung bar yung bsten/ lo sdeb tshig gis
210b7(rnying rgyud): gdung ba zhubs me sbar bar ma nus/ slar ston pa mchog ge phra gdung bzhin mi rang byung ngu 'bar/ de las 'ja' tshon byung bcub phyogs su thugs/ gzung khang na khye'u gzhon nu rus pa dang rin po che'i rgyan can nyi ri ni sa sgrog pa mkha' 'gro la mang po'i
211a1(rnying rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pa kun gyis mthong / lha sa'i bcu gcig zhal gyi thugs ka dang gdung khang gnyis 'ja' dkar pos tal mar 'brel ba byung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams cad kyi sra gsung sngags mi zad pa rgyan gyi
211a2(rnying rgyud): yon tan grub pa'i rtags su/ thugs ljags dang dbu sba la zhugs kyis za bar ma nus zhing / rten dang ring bsrel mthar yas pa gyon to// de nas sras 'gro mgon yab kyi dgongs pa rdzogs pa'i bya ba la lags te// mu'i rten rigs gsum sems dpa
211a3(rnying rgyud): mi tshad dang mnyam pa ni pa la'i yul du bskrun nas spyan drangs/ gsung gi rten du mdo mangs dang rgyud 'bum gser bris ma/ thugs kyi rten du sku 'bum mthong grol chen mo bzhengs/ rab tu gnas pa la kha che'i bsod snyoms pa chen po ma hA paN+Di ta shAkya shI
211a4(rnying rgyud): snyan drangs nas chos 'khor yang btsugs/ sras 'gro ba'i mgon po nyid kyi gtsug phung wA/ 'on yang phrin las 'di ka che gdungs nas rab tu 'byung bar ma gnang / gser ka rdo rang blugs pa'i 'bul ba dang zhab rtog tu nom pas bsti stang du sa/ skar
211a5(rnying rgyud): paN+Di ta gshegs nas kyang lho brag dang mon yul gyi 'du ba mang pos gser gyi 'bul ba rgya chen po byung ba rnams khri phur 'bul du byon pas/ paN+Di ta na re/ mchod gnas rang gnas su ldog nas kyang 'bul ba slar skyel ba jo sras mi bzang gsungs nas mnyes tshor chen
211a6(rnying rgyud): po mdzad skad/ sras 'gro mgon nyid spyan ras gzigs kyi mjal par lung bstan/ rdzu 'phrul shin tu che bas dgongs rdzogs su dmigs nas sham po'i mdun gyi rdo rnams nam mkha' la lug khru bzhin du ded/ gzhan gyi snang ngor gang nas byang cha
211a7(rnying rgyud): med par sgyid chu'i 'gram du rdo sgra chag de chags pa la rdo ba'i chu rags mdzad/ sbar rdo rnams rigs ma nor bar yod zeng / bal res kyi phreng ka zog tshad ma brtse dang brgyad kyang bgengs/ mthu rgyal dang nus pa shin tu tshe zhing chos sbyor thun du 'khol bas
211b1(rnying rgyud): thog ser la sogs pas sku dgrar gyur pa dag ma dus lam smos par nyi ma'i sa kyi las btsan thabs su bachags par ma ngad pa sogs kyi la chus dum yod/ thugs rje bsam gyis mo/ khyab bas gra rnga chos dbang sogs thul ba'o smra'i slob ma yang mang du nga //
211b2(rnying rgyud): 'di'i sras mnga' bdag blo ldan 'jam dpal gyi skal ba dang / de'i sras mnga' bdag bdud 'dul phyag nor gyi sprul pa ste/ nying rin po che'i gdung brgyad pa rigs gsum mgon po'i sprul pa 'byung bar lung bstan pa yin no// chos kyi 'chud la la
211b3(rnying rgyud): sras brgyud dang slob brgyad gnyis ka'i lugs yod do// / gtem ba 'og mar grags pa'i bdag nyid chen po gu ru chos kyi dbang phyug gi gdung ni/ bstan pa snga dar gyi che bo na gnye' rings bya bas btsan po khri srong la thog phab ste bkrong bar khas tha
211b4(rnying rgyud): pa na/ slob dpon pad+ma dang / bi ma la/ bi ro gsum ka'i slob mar gyur pa sdang rje btsan khram bya ba'i sngags pa nus pa can zhig gis/ bon pos thog mda' lnga dus gcig phab pa sdigs mdzub kyis blangs te bon po'i grong la rang gshed du btang nas
211b5(rnying rgyud): brlags par byas/ btsan pos de la bya dga' chen po mdzad/ de la sras spang rig 'dzin snying po zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ des yang 'dul gyi lha khang bzhi'i mchod gnyer mdzad/ lo skor re la mchod pa la 'byon pa las kho mthing du byon pa'i tshe la yag
211b6(rnying rgyud): rdza bar gyi dpon chen smad pas nor gnyis mang du phul/ tshe snga ma'i yul yin gsungs nas bdag gir mdzad/ de'i sras kun mkhyen shes rab rgyal po nas mkhyen ldan nus pa can bar ma chad du byung ba'i spang ston grub pa'i snying po zhes bya ba des bla ma sangs rgyas
211b7(rnying rgyud): ste sgom la bdag tshangs par spyod par zhus pas/ dge slong gi sde brgyad las byang chub sems dpa' gcig 'gro don che bas byang chub sems dpa'i gdung ma bcad gsungs/ de'i khyim na bzhugs pa'i tshe mkha' 'gro gar gyi dbang mo la jo mo gyis shig zer ba'i lung
212a1(rnying rgyud): bstan byung / slar nam mkha' la gya gyur 'gro ba'i bu thob kyi baspyad pa dkar bza' mgon sgyid yin par shes nas bdag gir bzung ba las/ zhums su zhugs pa'i tshe nyi zla la sgor rdzi khor thim pa dang / lhums nas
212a2(rnying rgyud): med kyi yi ge'i lha yang yang sgrog pa dang / mda' dar gtad de tshigs su bcad pa sogs rtags khyad par can byung / gle ru l-i dpying re'i bcoM ma'i nyi shar la bltams/ mtshan brjod gser ma zhig bri zhing yod pa'i tshig mtshams la rten 'brel brtags
212a3(rnying rgyud): chos kyi dbang phyug chos kyi rgyal/ bya ba dang thug nas mtshan der btags/ mig mthong mkhan dag gis kyang lha 'dres mchod par 'dug ces zer/ yab kyis 'bri gung 'jig rten mgon po la phur brtsa rgyud nyan pa'i tshe/ khyod kyi bu tha chung gcing
212a4(rnying rgyud): la chos slobs shig/ des phrin las 'byung ngo zhes kyang gsungs/ de bzhin du ma la ka ba can pa na re/ dge bshes lto pa kho de mda' lnga dang / gzhugacig chags kyis dang / dgra po'i snying la phog pa'i mda' gcig 'ong zhes gsungs
212a5(rnying rgyud): zhang rin po ches kyang dge bshes lho chung pa khyod kyi bungs bya'am/ ku re yin khyod la nga 'dra ba'i bu gcig 'ong gsungs pa la sogs lung bstan mang po thob/ lo bzhi nas yab la bris klog bsgrubs/ sgra sgo mtshon cha/ rig klag sde lnga/ bi bta chen
212a6(rnying rgyud): mo sogs sgra'i bstan bcos bcu gsum/ skye bo gso thig sogs lugs kyi bstan bcos bcu/ nag rtsis dang / spyan dpyad bka' gter/ rgyal rabs sde bdun/ lde rgyud chen po'i srung 'bum sogs glu gar gyi bsnyun bcos brgya dang bzhi/
212a7(rnying rgyud): bon gyi gzhung chen bdun cu don lnga/ mdos gzhung chen po brgya phrag gsang ljags phyi nang gi thig rtsa mang po/ phur pa'i skor pod chen bzhi la sogs pa thos pa mang po mdzad/ bcul gsar ma'i phyag rdor lugs drug gisan te bsgrubs pas
212b1(rnying rgyud): bum chu khol/ gshin rje'i gshed dang phur pa la bstan pa tshad du bstsal/ bcu gcig pa la su 'phrul gyi dbang rgyud man rag thams cad rdzogs/ bcu gnyis la ka ka ni rmAH/ sgrub thabs bcu rtsa sogs mthen par mdzad cing yig
212b2(rnying rgyud): bsgrub pa mdzad/ bcu gsum la yang dag dang ma gshin/ thugs rje chen po lugs gnyis dang rta mgrin la sogs gsar ting mang po gas na zhing bsgrubs/ bcu gsum pa'i dus nyams ldang la jo mo sgrol mas shel mkhar cig gi rtser
212b3(rnying rgyud): sa rdo rje sems dpa' dang mjal/ de na mkha' 'gro ma gdong pa bzhi pa gcig 'dug pa'i mdun zhal dkar po nas/ sangs rgyas bstan pa khyod kyis zung / g.yas zhal ser po nas/ dam chos dar ba khyod kyis kyis/ rgyab zhal dmar po nas
212b4(rnying rgyud): dge 'dun dbu 'phang khyod kyis stod/ g.yon zhal sngon po nas/ dus ngan gdul dka' khyod kyis thul// zer nas mda' dkar po sgro lnga pa gcig gtad/ dgung lo bcu bzhi par ti se gro gyang gsar bar/ tshad ma dang / mngon pa kun la
212b5(rnying rgyud): btus/ spyod 'jug/ dgyes rdor la sogs pa'i gzhung chen po dang / phyag rdzogs zhi byed chos drug la sogs pa'i man ngag nyan/ mtha' skor ba la dbu ma bden chung / mtshur ston yab sras la a ti'i skor sogs mdo sngags gsar rting gi
212b6(rnying rgyud): bshad sgrub/ yab las zhi byed phyag rdzogs gcod yul/ gdams ngag do sprod/ bstan srung drag sngags mtha' dag nyan cing nyams 'og tu chud par mdzad/ bcu bdun pa la mnga' bdag 'gro mgon dang mjal te nyang rin po che nyi ma 'od zer gyi
212b7(rnying rgyud): gter chos mtha' yas pa'i bdag por gyur/ bco brgyad pa'i tshe sa pa Na la gnas gzhi sgang por sems bskyed pa dang / chang gsar du chos 'brel/ lha lung gi mchod rten rtsar rab gnas thob/ de nub mnal lam du gya nag ri bo rtse lngar
