213b5(rnying rgyud): ngas sa nasu chu chu 'i ma sa sa sa su gyus shing
214a1(rnying rgyud): la dmigs kyang gter ston chos rtsa ba'i chos kyi gzhung ma bsrangs par phrin las kha khyer du btang bas go mchod du song / chos byas na chos skyong zhor la yod/ mthu yang ma bslabs par 'ong ba yin/ de chos stong nga
214a2(rnying rgyud): dam bca' yin pas so// blo rtsa ba rtsub ma mang bar bla rdzogs thugs gsum gyi nyams len la 'bungs shig/ mnga' ba dag nyang yab sras mis 'khur ba 'di khos thugs rje chen po bsgrubs pas byung ba yin/ gter ston gyi mi thugs tsam de kho yin//
214a3(rnying rgyud): ngas lo drug gong nas 'gro byas pa'i dus chos dang zla ba gnyis tsam nas sle ba yod/ mi tshos gter rngur yin zer yong ste rtog pa de mi dgos/ nga yan chod kyi spang mi rabs bcu gsum song ste nang gi grubartags ma byung ba med/ nga yang zhan shos mi
214a4(rnying rgyud): tsam 'od gsung skad/ der mnga' bdag 'gro mgon gyis gter gyi nyams nga che gsungs nas gzigs pas mchog tu mnyes/ lung bstan las hor dmag 'byung tshul yod pa slob dpon mtha' skor bas mthong nas/ hor da lha yul na med pa
214a5(rnying rgyud): lnga zer skur pa btab pas/ thugs chad nas gdams pa slar lba bar sems pa na/ bu mo gnyis kyis rta dkar gshog pa can la bsgon nas rnga yab dpal rir khrid/ u rgyan chen pos gsad pa yongs rdzogs kyi dbang rdzogs par bskur nas/ lam
214a6(rnying rgyud): gyi lam mchog gzhan don yin// 'di la skyed lugasas skyes pa// de yis byang chub rgyang thag ring // zhes sogs zhal gdams bslab byas dbugs phyung / gnas 'dir ma zhen cig/ zhen na skye ba 'pho ba'i nyen yod gsungs pa'i
214a7(rnying rgyud): mod la 'od phub lta bus btegs te skad cig la slebs/ shing pho byi ba'i lo hor dor rtog gi dmag gis sleb pas ma 'ongs pa mngon sum du gtan la phebs/ btsan po khri srong lde'u btsan gyi phyi ma lha'i bu 'od mtha' yas su skyes pas na rem par mngang
214b1(rnying rgyud): pa bya brgyags ma thal lo ngan ba ma 'dam pa las la sam pa brta gtug nga slos zla bzhes pa dang / datad ba jugs rang tho' du'i phyi 'das pa la 'a byung gros rung bangasam nyid da sa/ 'byu ngan bang nga /
214b2(rnying rgyud): dungos su mthong / gsung thos pa tsam gyis rtogs pa shang/ than gcig dbang mdzad par chargyan gyis cir mthong gsungs/ yidam dngos su mthong gus pas/ 'on tshogs gtor gzhan ni 'bral sa nyi gsungs nas gdang phyi sa da kyi
214b3(rnying rgyud): 'i tshogs rdzas rnams skad cig gis bzhes/ yang dacing mthong gsungs/ sangs rgyas dngos su gda' lags zhus pas/ 'o na dbang bsgyur bya'o gsungs nas mchod rdzas bsdus/ dkyil 'khor bshigs/ shul du mo brdungs/
214b4(rnying rgyud): med pa'i spyod pa dang / rdo rje'i dam tshig chen po'i gnas la klag par mi 'gyur ba'i las can gyi slob ma'i khams dang bsam pa mkhyen nas rdo rje lus kyi dkyil 'khor chen po nas rnam par snang mdzad dri chen lha snrums kyi sgo nas phyung ste dbang bzur bas/ d+ha ro
214b5(rnying rgyud): la lus sbal shun dor ba lta bu'i nyams shar/ de bzhin cu rdugasang ba'i myur la ma nas rdzi chu don yod grub pa lce thog tu byud pas zag med bye ba chen po'i ye shes thod rgal du 'bar/ lteng gar gi mdzub btsugs nas/ dazab 'ang ngos zung zhig
214b6(rnying rgyud): gsungs pas tshul gyi 'dzin pa than myong de bzhig/ nga mthong don lam yengs shig/ de la sgom nu smra tsam med// gsungs pas rdzogs chen byathal de sna med kyi rtogs pa rtag gar dang / ngas shes khyad par can gyis nas du rnyings gsum
214b7(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas byon kyang dbang bu lham pa me ga dang / chu gar du 'gro zlos pa yang chong zhus pa'i/ 'khor bar mi 'gram pa'i sangs cas byung nasu stegs pa yin/ khyod cagang dulang la tham rked na tham tshol/ slob pa nyin sgo'i mtsho ma gas
215a1(rnying rgyud): sa/ 'a da nga/ ya sas ga du pa nas 'du/ na byas dus
215a2(rnying rgyud): sa slo gsu 'i drugs pa ngas gzugs cus 'byo ba sa na pa'i dkyi du na pa langs gagablusangs mya gas ba yas
215a3(rnying rgyud): rnam zeng / nga 'drab mi 'thad na 'jigs byas pas/ myo nga 'byab drag sungs nas kyi ba'i gzugs partan ma rdzar ba'i na mdzad pas 'gyesar nam nga/ byas na 'de 'dra ba 'angs sasus nan 'a thong bas sapa dang sa nyam dpa
215a4(rnying rgyud): e nga'i tshong rgya ba'i mthu las gzhadu mi byung / 'di pa zung 'gyur song bas gnas spar ba yin/ gzhan mi lus thob pa ni shin tu dka'/ srog bcad pa'i sdig pa ni mtha' yas/ gcig shi bas mchog de'iga'akhor thams cad drug
215a5(rnying rgyud): kyi ma 'i bya mam /
215a6(rnying rgyud): 'dug pa'i chu mden mang gsum ya drug sangs bar/ zhes pasteb rgyan pa 'das mi sang ma dadu/ mas 'i sra sadag cu'i ngas rnam por nis pa rjod kyang drugapas nas 'bar ba mabang sa du me du pa
215b1(rnying rgyud): gsad gso'i nang nas kyang ngo mtshar che ba gcig yin/ bal wa d+har ldog khar gsar wa drug tu tham pa phul nas rgya bal du ldog pa la bar chad med pa'ang wa byas pas/ gser gyi dang bsres nas sbyin bsreg mdzad/ ser sna'i mdzad pa tsa ba nas grol/
215b2(rnying rgyud): 'di dkon mchog yod par yid ches par ston pa'i mdzad pa ngo mtshar can yin te/ gtong ba la goms pa rnams kyis kyang dkon mchog la dmigs nas rdzas dngos med du gtong ba la rnam pa'i cha nas yid gnyis yod pa ltar mi ston yang / don dngos por
215b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i dge ba'i phyogs la dga' bar byed pa 'di ka cung zad blo la 'phrigs chags pa yin no// der d+ha rol sbyin sreg gi thal ba 'phangs sems ma byed par chu la skyong / lam du zas ster ba cig 'ongs/ de bdag gar gyis shig gsungs pa ltar
215b4(rnying rgyud): byas pas bu mo gcig gis nyung ma zhig byin/ de ku rba la phul bas ras kho ba la tshos shig gsungs/ slar lhor rgya gar du 'gro ba la skyel thung mdzad pas yang gser zho gsum phul/ der ku ru'i zhal nas/ me la bsregs pas mkha'
215b5(rnying rgyud): 'gro mnyes na/ chu la gtor na de bas kyang dgyes mchi gsungs nas gser de chu la gtor/ sras kyi dam par gyur pa pad+ma dbang chen dang / gnyal du 'khrungs pa'i nyi ma 'od zer sogs sras brgyad dang / snod ldan gyi bu dgu la sogs
215b6(rnying rgyud): pa smin grol du mdzad/ chu zhal mgur gsum la sogs pa'i bla chen dang mi chen mang pos zhabs la gtugs/ gtso bor ma Ni 'ba' zhig gis phrin las mdzad de bod yul thams cad la thar pa'i sa bon rgya chen po btab/ khyad pad ka thog pa grub
215b7(rnying rgyud): thob ma Ni rin chen ces bya ba las khams su thugs rje chen po'i phrin las rgya cher 'phel/ bcu byin dang nyi zla'i lha'i bus kyang mchod pa stod byas/ bod kyi lha 'dre thams cad kyis bla mar bkur zhing snyan grags kyis 'jig rten g.yogs/ 'gro ba'i
216a1(rnying rgyud): sa rnams zasags pa'id dang/ 'dus 'drangs dos pa dang / bcos lung pam ga bar bang ma ma gsus dunan pashad yanam
216a2(rnying rgyud): pa tsam gyi byin rlab can du grags pa'i bstan gtso'i ldang brtan dang por 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis ri btang bzung nas spyan drangs/ bar du slob dpon chen pos sngabastod sa zam yang dben nas phyung / he de'i gangs la rtsas dka ba 'di dpung po bdun pa
216a3(rnying rgyud): sa pho 'brug gi lor spyan drangs te 'gro ba'i don du bzhugs su gsol/ ma 'ongs pa na klu yul du spyan 'dren par bshad/ de lta bu'i thugs rje dang phrin las bsam gyis mi byung bas 'gro ba'i don mdzad nas mdzad par brtul ba nye 'dzib sa kyang
216a4(rnying rgyud): phyag la// sems can rnam rtog tha dad kyis// la la chos dbang bden dga'// la la chos dbang bde yis dogs// zhes dang / chos dbang sems nyid de dogs thal// chos dbang sems la bud rngu med// bden dga' tshor gyes
216a5(rnying rgyud): mdzod// chos dbang zug rngu spang ba med// sdug na dag 'tsho dgyes par mdzod// chos dbang sems la skye shi med// shi lis ngogs tsho dgyes par mdzod// chos dbang sems nyid chos dbyings shi// ma'i ngogs tsho dgyes par mdzod
216a6(rnying rgyud): chos dbang sems nyid 'pho 'gyur med// rtag tu ro tsha dgyes par mdzod// chos dbang sems la rang bzhin med// rtag gis ngogs tsho dgyes par mdzod// ces ro dogs rtsa ba nas zad pa'i rdul 'byor gyi dbang po chen por bzhugs/ rang gi
216a7(rnying rgyud): bzhengs pa'i lha khang 'bad pa don ldan du 'gyur ba'i phyir/ zhabs tog dgos par gdams shing / gtsug la gnyams rkyen bu yis byas kyang zon// lce khang zhabs tog spang pos byas kyang thar// zhes dang / kun bzang bde chen chos dbyings
216b1(rnying rgyud): nas padas// rnas pa da pa slo// sa sa na rnags na// du gyud 'i ngas na ga sa nga dunas / na na
216b2(rnying rgyud): shes kyang bye nan thong pa'i rtag pa// zhes dang / bdin gis rgyas men cing sung 'o// myur ba thams cad lam 'gran can bathong // rkyen pa la sogs pa'i dal kyi gdams pas byung me pa da
216b3(rnying rgyud): bang na // ga pa la sapa brgyad du sa kyi / sa nas ma da pa po shA dgas pa
216b4(rnying rgyud): sa
216b5(rnying rgyud): rje zhengs ma zu cing/ bka' gnyi ci brtan rgyam gyi'i mnga' bdag tugyur pa de dang / sram 'gro sa marnam pa can gyisas sa sum phrag ga yol bu brtsams/ mtshan pa tang bang rgyal ba btags/ dbang po bcad pa la sto dag
216b6(rnying rgyud): tugs byung ba rnam pastan byings / 'du du / sa mchogs rdzogs pa pa yang nga /
216b7(rnying rgyud): ga datha na la rgya'i 'bra' ba/ bsung gi 'dis byeng/ sras dun ga pa sa pa zhig rgya bdud nga tu/ dpa 'dub ma sogs pa'i 'ang brangs bu byed ba drung
217a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshem khas pa mang po'i dbus su gzhung bsgyur gyi bshad pa mdzad/ bla ma gsang 'dus dang / gru 'jal zhikhro/ rtswa mgrin la sogs par bsnyen bsrub mthar sbyin/ lha mo dud solams zhal yang yang bstan
217a2(rnying rgyud): gru mtshan gyi thog mar shA log chen po zhig byung ba la phur pa gdengs pa tsam gyis nam mkha' la thog so bdun tsam 'khyil zhing bzlog/ de bzhin du gtor chen 'phangs pa'i chos steng sa nas su gang tsam 'phags pa yang byung / dpe ba ce
217a3(rnying rgyud): bzlas mdzad pas ga d+ha rnaM gyi sgra sgrogs bzhin par mthong / dgung lo bcu bzhi nas bka' brkyang dang ma gshin la sogs pa'i sgrub srin mang du bslabs shing bzlas skom gyi la gros/ de nas lo brlan kyi bar dzA gcod yul dang ngo snyoms mdzad/
217a4(rnying rgyud): dang / chu rdal me tog la sogs pa'i bcud len kho nas dka' sprad kyi phang la bshar/ zo me spangs kyi dam bca' logs ma/ ngag bcad kyi dam btsa' lo gsum sha khrag gi zas la shin tu snar zhing / srung gnas dang / gso
217a5(rnying rgyud): la sogs mang du mdzad pas spyan sa gzigs lan bdun du gzigs/ lo gcig tu bla ma gsang 'dus kyi gdams ngag la nan tan mdzad/ nam mkhas bur mang po las mdo ljags chos kyi bdud rtsi ngoms pa med par 'thungs shing / khyad pa
217a6(rnying rgyud): dul ba las mdo dbang dang / phur pa/ sgub chen bka' brgyad la nan chags chen po mdzad/ grub pa brnyes pa'i rnam thar yang / gsung las/ thag dmar gyi mtsho la rdo snyoms byas// sbyin nags kyi rgyal rjog pas 'arjes/
217a7(rnying rgyud): lung gi zag la mkha' ltar sdings// ba ga ma can thag la byi ltar 'dzul// mgo bo can thag gi log la rmugs/ grogs sher seng dang sher dpal rgyal bzang gsum// byang rgyal dang bla ma rin seng ba// skyes pho mo 'ga' gu bathob
217b1(rnying rgyud): grub tho ba zer// deng gra thob kyi go bang mi len// chos nyams blangs kyi nyams snang thob tsam yin// don 'pho 'gyur bral ba ma rtogs na// lus sgyu ma'i cho 'phral bya gyis ston// zhes thu ba rtags kyi mthang thug togs pal ngo su 'dzid/ bcu
217b2(rnying rgyud): lo la dam bca' brgyad mdzad de/ dge 'dun la mthong phyag byed pa dang / pha yul du zhag bdun las mi bzhugs pa dang / dben pa 'ba' zhig la blo gtod pa dang / rgyal po'i sgo khang lan gsum las mi 'gram pa dang / tshong khe dang bral 'go
217b3(rnying rgyud): pa dang / ro cho ga dang dbu gtso mi byed pa dang / 'tsho ba bsod snyoms la bsten pa dang / bsgrub pa dang thos pas ma 'ba' zhig byed pa rnams so// slob dpon nor bstan bzung po las yang yang du bsnyen nas 'dul ba dang mdo sde'i rkang dang /
217b4(rnying rgyud): jo bo bka' gdams/ nA ro mkhas spyod ma snyan brgyad pas ma mi khyab dang bcas pa zhus/ skyid grong du 'phags pa wa ti mjal bas gsung pyon/ sku tshe snga ma'i sngon gnas mang po rjes su dran/ dkrung lo bcu dgu par pha yul du yig zug gis
217b5(rnying rgyud): 'gro don mdzad/ nyi shu la byams chos lnga/ phar phyin/ tshad ma/ dbu ma rtsa she/ bzhi brgya pa dang / bslab btus/ spyod 'jug dngos brgyad don bdun du sogs gzhung lugs chen po brgya phrag gcig khong du chud/ nyer gcig
217b6(rnying rgyud): 'jam dbyangs chos skyong dang / sdom brtson tshul khrims dpal la sogs par gshed dmar la sogs pa'i dbang sgrub gdams pa gas no zhing bsrubs pas zhag bdun na gshed dmar dngos su mthong / nyi shu rtsa gnyis par yab kyi drung ngu ste
217b7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur bka' gter la zhun thar legs par bcad/ bka' brgyad kyi sgrub pa mdzad pas bdud rtsi khol/ mar me chung ngu zhig gis zhag gsum thub/ de'i tshe yab kyi gzigs ldang nyid kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ bu khyod tshel bar chad ma byung na

218a2(rnying rgyud): rnams tham dang// 'am mgo ngapa sa chung da mags dang // rnal mas dpang che po bya pas dang / rnas mi sa pal kho nam dzad// nan ci lag panam thas su sa da pa// sangs pab so sa
218a3(rnying rgyud): dam pa sangs rgyas byor bi mul// u rgyan yab su ma rgyal po khri srong dang // ma gcig sa ba smon gang bar sa chen pa// khams pa na lo rgyag pa ldan rnams// gnig la gcig pa 'angs shing bzang papa// bran kyangang de pad+ma
218a4(rnying rgyud): gA zhing thams cad khyod la thim nas song // zhes pa snar yin/ nye gsum pa la bo la rje bar lam 'thas tshogs pashad dang / spyong bshang gas/ nyer bzhi pa'i tsheyadu rgyar gcig 'gyur/ nyer lnga ba'i / bsam tha'i

218a6(rnying rgyud): gzhir bzhag la/ nam bsod dang / 'phags pa rin po che'i las chog gi bshad byar dang bcas rdzog/ gsum gyis bsten par rdzogs pa'i dngos por bsgrubs/ mkhan slob de rnams las chos kyang mang du nyan/ nyer drug pa la shes
218a7(rnying rgyud): na ba 'brug sa la sogs pa dban par/ chos gos gsum dang / glegs pam/ la ba gsil/ wang bzed las pazhin pa'i lo byang thams kya grangs te sgo gcig pa'i brtul grags bzang / ston pas bcas pa'i gnang na
218b1(rnying rgyud): dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis la grwa bzhin par gnas pa ni sras bu chen pa 'di dang klong po rgod cang pa sna tshogs rang grol gyi rnam par thar pa mthong ba'i chos la gnas des pang shes/ gzhan dus langs pa la sngags te rtags dang chog ma
218b2(rnying rgyud): pa'ang ngaji snyed cig yod srid gI de dag la bskrun pa la dga' ba'i lha rnams dang lhan cig rjes su yi rang byer byas so// skur ljongs rgyu ba'i brtul zhugs kyis mnga' dis kyi gnas rten rnams kyang mjal/ theg pa ched po'i bas pa pa ma'i rigs la
218b3(rnying rgyud): 'da' ba ma yin pas chos kyi sbyi du 'ang ci rigs su brtsal/ bo mkhyen chen las/ dgrag dong / 'jigs byed/ gshed dam nI/ gsang ba 'dus pa la sogs pa mang dregs na/ mngan po dang / gug pa na rnam thul dpa
218b4(rnying rgyud): bzang / 'jam dbyangs zlos dpal mgon rnams la grwa dang / zad ma/ brtag gnyis kyi bshad pa/ gsang sngags kyi dbang dang man ga kyang mngang tanA/ sle dang da / nyi ma dang / khom pa sogs pa'i gnas tan nga
218b5(rnying rgyud): nas slar glo bo dbyon/ drang po ter zhon nas bzang po las byang gter mang dugs na/ mdor na bad kye gsang gsum/ ma gshin gyung pa/ bka' bcang gas shing / yang phur rta gsum/ rdo rje grar/ gsung 'dus ye shes zhabs
218b6(rnying rgyud): grags/ bad mchog zhan gyis/ u ne ga dril gsum/ bong zhal can/ dbul mgon nal zlum/ dus 'khor 'phrul chen/ phyan rjo brgyad bskor/ u tsa ya/ ras chung snyan pa skyed/ phrag chen sbyor drug/ u rgyan bsnyen
218b7(rnying rgyud): 'phrub/ yang dgan pa'i tshu/ nga gter yongs rdzogs/ ma tha~M bal sanas tegs cing bka' ga ti bstan gyis/ ma na zhi sa ni rnam pa thams cad la dzang dra la tsun sa sa kyi phrug kyi mags kyi la 'a
219a1(rnying rgyud): te/ skyes shA las/ ma tshogs pa grangs yang bcul nas ni// 'chim n+ta thug gi bar drung mdzes brtul// zhes pa ni skyes budam pa 'das tha yan pa pa tub pa yin/ bAsu ga rgyang man pa dang gal
219a2(rnying rgyud): bsnyen pa ma song ba med pas/ deng snga 'gyur ba tshos bka' brgyad dang / gsar ma pa rdo rje phreng ba tsam gyis bsnyen pa rdzogs pa'ang dkon pa'i dngos por gyur na/ 'di lta bu a la la/ dam pa'i chos 'tshol zhing bya btang sgo gcig pa'i brtul zhugs kyis ba
219a3(rnying rgyud): yul shing kun/ bya rung kha shor/ bal po pham mthing / yal bu'i tshal/ yang le shod la sogs pa thams cad du gshegs shing de dag tu bal bod kyi bla ma mang po bskyen/ gnas 'brel dang thugs dam 'ba' zhig mdzad/ dag pa'i sdang ba
219a4(rnying rgyud): mtha' klas par shar/ yi dam dang chos skyong mang po'i zhal gzigs/ mkha' 'gro mas slob dpon a b+hu ka ra'i skye bar lung bstan/ lo chen dkon mchog skyabs kyis rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang la dogs cha mdzad pas/ mtshan lam na 'khor lo rdzom
219a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo paN chen pad+ma dbang rgyal gyis mdzad cing 'dug pa'i sgo drung nas mkha' 'gro mas khong bkag nas ma btang bas slar 'gyod de gnang / zhar la lam 'bras gsar ma'ang thob/ so brgyad pa nas gsar rnying ris med pa'i chos kyi
219a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo rgya chen po bskor/ de nas dbus gtsang gi phyogs la gsar rnying gi chos rgyun nyams pa dag gso ba'i thugs bskyed bla na med pas/ yab dang glo bo'i sde bdag kun la gnang ba zhus/ rim bzhin zang zang brag/ bkra bzang / byang dam
219a7(rnying rgyud): ring rnams brgyud de khyo na/ bad grol du mes ston nam mkhad rgyal mtshan dang / sngags 'chang shAkya bzang po gnyis mjal/ de nas gzung legs ldan kyang lhan cig pas dbus la byon/ chos tshigs sprul pa'i rdo rje gdan lha sa'i gtsug
219b1(rnying rgyud): lag khang dzo shAka rnams kyis gtses pa'i rten brten po rnams mjal/ jog chos dang khri phyed la thugs 'dun drag po yod pas rje btsun ma dang / dpal lha'i sprul pas brkor lum du 'grogs nas lung bstan/ lung zang du phyug mdzad mdang / @
219b2(rnying rgyud): glegre zhing du jog bsod nams bstan 'dzin las rdo ba dkyil rnams legs por nod/ gro thad du zhalu lo chen chos skyong bzang po las gshed dmar skor sogs gas na/ bsam yas su byon pas sngon patsan po khri srong lde'u btsan du gyur pa'i bag chags du ma sa /
219b3(rnying rgyud): bar khang du bde gshegs 'jus pa'i dkyil 'khor ba zhengs nas sgrub mchod dang smon lam mdzad/ lho brag gu rub sogs la chos kyi bdud rtsi mang du bkye/ kaHthog pa chos rje bsod nams rgyal mtshan sogs bshes gnyen ma ngadag dang chos byas
219b4(rnying rgyud): 'gre ba res mdzad/ phreng po u rgyan chos rdzong du kong chen nam mkha' dpal ldan las tha ma dgongs 'dus gsan/ yang rjong dang mchims phur thugs dam mdzad pas rtsab gsum gyi lha tshogs mang po'i zhal gzigs/ chos dbang gi gzung
219b5(rnying rgyud): rabs brgyad pas sgo brag tu spyan drangs nas/ mkhar chu/ bsam 'grub bde chen/ lha bro dang / spra bo cog/ gro bo lung la stsogs par byon/ mnga' bdag nyang la u rgyan chen pos lung bstan pa bzhin/ paN chen 'dis chos brtsa
219b6(rnying rgyud): nyams pa gso bar gsungs pa'i bden pa'i rnga bo che sgrog pa'i dus la babs te/ nying gi gdung sgar zur la rang lugs kyi bshang nyan rgya chen po mdzad/ sdig can 'ga' zhig la gnas khror mdzad pas 'ja' 'od kyis bar ldang bkang / zha stod dang
219b7(rnying rgyud): bcan gro sogs su bsgrub chen bde gshegs 'dus pa'i smon bsrub dang skye bdun gyis 'gro don mdzad/ spyir gyes bu chen po 'di chos la gnas 'jog shin tu che zhing khyad par sngon gyi smon lam las bde gshegs 'jus pa la don gter chen po dang
220a1(rnying rgyud): ldan pas rang gi yab dzel sogs par bka' brgyad bde 'dus tshar nyi shun ljagasan pa'i phyi mkhangs 'atsun zhing yid rton par nus pa de lto brag dgon dag sa nanam
220a2(rnying rgyud): las nyed pas gsan yig tu'ang bsngags pa chen po mdzad cing / dgongs pa mthar thug pa rdzogs pa'i tha tshig kyang gsal/ skar zhe jug par bsam yas su tsun nas bka' 'dus phyi ma rig 'dzin yongs 'dus kyi chos tshor rnams rnams
220a3(rnying rgyud): sgom nas mun drangs/ lha mor dgongs 'dus kyi slab chen bgrogs/ phung por ngo cher bde 'dus la 'chad nyan mdzad/ ngor dang gser mdog car nga dag zung slong gi las chog yang du gzhan ya ngo chos 'chad tan la sogs pha
220a4(rnying rgyud): chen po mdzad de 'i ring chung brag rdo rje zhes pa 'dir zhag gcig gdan chags pas dri tsho'i rten 'brel 'grigs/ zag chen phur pa zhes pa'i dpyad las brtsed rdzogs kyi bstan pa zin pa'i brda 'don dgongs pa bzhen/ nga po pa der zhing rgyas pa'i
220a5(rnying rgyud): kun gzigs theng po gter chen shes rab 'od zer ta shIr bkur nas gnas 'dir yun ring por dgon pa bcas nas gtan chags/ gsung rab mang po'i sgrar byang du'ang thub bstan rdo rje theg tu sbyar ba'o zhes ming gi mnga' gsol/ de nas paN chen
220a6(rnying rgyud): rje ma nyid phal che rlabs ma las pra dz+wal du gtan chags/ byams raglang du thabartson bstod nams rnam kyil las sangs rgyas mnyam stor gas na cing / yar zab c+doMs ma kha tsho ting tig gi dbang 'des lus pa hral nas thugs yid gci
220a7(rnying rgyud): kya 'dzes/ 'on sngon thang du'ang sku mched lhan cig pas yun ring bar bzhugs/ gsung rig 'dzin legs ldan pa de lugs gnyis ka'i mo gro yangs pas 'bri gung pa rin chen phun tshogs bsamams su gdan drangs nas dpon slong gsum ka
220b1(rnying rgyud): byasamams shA ba gnas bar tibang khams can du bang ba na 'brel bzhis/ 'dinas nga smos ni rkyen na tshogs rnams kyi ma par bya na la dang sabyas rten 'brel po dra rgya nyi na su
220b2(rnying rgyud): rigs pa'i paN+Di te chen po/ mdo sngags gas parjing ris med pa'i bstan pa yongs rdzogs kyi dge ba'i gshes gnyen chen po/ bzhon pa dang 'jol bar la sogs pa'i chos brgyad yongs su grangs pas shAs thub ba'i rjes grags pasod snyoms pa
220b3(rnying rgyud): mog dang dka' srung bang pyod pas bya ha nas 'byor bye bang bcan pa/ rlig pa dang brel bar rtobs pa pasnam gyis mi thab pas byung chub sems pa'i dge 'dun man po ngas ngos kyilas nas bstan pa dang sems bya kyi na na med pa mdzad/
220b4(rnying rgyud): 'gyer gyud 'bum rin po'i sgo tshe 'byed pa'ang rnam dpyod 'di kho na che zhing / lung gi rgyun la'ang bka' drin bsam gyis mi khyab/ tshig nyung la don shin tu mang ba sdom pa bsam gyi rnam par nges pa'i bstan bcos la sogs te/ rnamatha
220b5(rnying rgyud): mtha' yis dag gis brgyung nas bstan 'gro'i don blan mtho ba'i cho ga mdzad du 'on sgron thong nas zangs mdog dpal gyi'i bor gshegs so// / dran slob dpon par tsan+da sngar yang rigs krol gyi sprul pa'i sgra 'phrul la zugs pa ban
220b6(rnying rgyud): mthun shes rab 'od zer gyi gtam bshad par bya hU~M/ bdag nyid rten po 'di ni byang nga mtshon gyi sa'i tshad khri bsdam gnyis kyi tsho 'brang las sa po phyag lo chu stong zla ba'i chos bcur mngal gyi bsgo las grol/ zhums la zhugs pa'i tshe byas tha sa

221a4(rnying rgyud): denam ma ga nga sanas/ byis pa'i dbasen gyi segs dang / mdo na kyi ldan pan kyi tshus du 'don pa dang / sgeg par gnon tu 'ad byed des rgyu ga can N+Dir nas pacang byu 'ang drung bral ba dang /

221a7(rnying rgyud): ngos 'dzin mdzad pas 'o shes rabathod nal bzhig zung zhes mtshan shes rab 'ad bar dru gtugs/ gser mdog can pa'i slob ma'i mchog pa/ chen dor rgyal ba las rab tu byung / de nas klag pa thos bsam gyi thar zhugs nas/ dgang

221b8(rnying rgyud): gnyis car la mkhas pa'i slob dpo na gcig yod pa las lugs gnyis ka'i sbyangs pa mthar sam/ khyad par gsang ba 'dus pa la btsong khab chen po'i yig cha'i steng nas dgongs pa ji bzhin du longs/

221b11(rnying rgyud): bla ma dam pa'i Ti ka'i steng nas gzabs
222a1(rnying rgyud): bshad rnams dogs pa'i mtha' dpyad nas nyan pas/ slob dpon des/ dge ba shes shes rab 'ong bar 'das chos kyi gnad la bkar nas jishes par 'jug samyal dpa gnyengs dbab
222a2(rnying rgyud): la gri mcha ster dgos pa byung / rin po mdzor rgyal ba de las spyir mdo sngags kyi gzhung 'grel da lta 'chang nyan yod pa mtha' dag// de bzhin du gser mdog can pa dang / sa sra bka' 'bum yongs rdzogs mnyan nas/ phrin than bsar
222a3(rnying rgyud): mdzad/ lhag par gser mdog can pa'i yig cha la mchog tu 'dris shing grub mtha' ba 'dzin/ skyes bu dam pa 'di g.yag sde paN chen gyi de ma thag pa'i skye ba yin pas lu gzhon nu nas gsal snang shin tu che zhing khyad par pu ta med de la slob dpon nyen
222a4(rnying rgyud): pos seng gdod ma'i gdams pa pu tir longs pa zhig bstsal ba dang nyams su bstar/ gzhan slor ma 'chun dogs nas mya ngan las 'dul khar a waM rdo spyil du rgyas btab pa dus 'dir phyag tu son mod/ 'brug pa rin po che rje dkar po 'ang snyamal
222a5(rnying rgyud): snang zhig la the tshom skyes pas/ phyis chad/ de ni a khu mtshan nyid pa'i khrod du phyin pas len par 'dug ces gsungs pa bzhin rten 'brel gzhan dbang du song / gras de dang thal 'gyur gyi mgrin rnga ldir ba'i rigs ga gang dang gang nga cod pa'i g.yul
222a6(rnying rgyud): rdol lhags pas blo gros bsam gyis mi khyab par song ste/ bod 'grel rnams kyang rgya yan du bzhag/ rgyan drug mchog gnyis kyi gzhung 'grel kho na la brten nas/ brgal ba dang / brtag pa dang / rigs pa gsum gyi lha
222a7(rnying rgyud): rnga chen po kun nas kun tu yongs su brdungs pas/ gleng spad slobang po na na re// khyed slob gsar ba lta bu yin kyang 'di lta bu'i rnam dpyod kha ma che/ kun mkhyen rong po la po dor pa'i dge bshes gcig gis/ ci mkhyen zhus pas/
222b1(rnying rgyud): bos par byin zhes gsungs/ 'o na 'dul ba la ma gnang zhus pas/ de los shes phar phyin gyi spyod pa yin gsungs/ yang dbu tshad la dris pas/ de bzhin du thA ma la lta ba dang / tshad ma la rig lam yin gsungs pa skar
222b2(rnying rgyud): byed kyis dbu pha la brtan nas bstan pa'i sgom 'tshol lugs/ de las rig lam gyi thub mtha' 'cha' lpags la dpags na/ dge ba shes zer na 'di la zer zhes tshogs pa'i khong dang du bstsags pa brjod pas de byin nas dge ba shes shes rab
222b3(rnying rgyud): zer zhes grags/ rtog ge'i rig pa la tsher ma lta bu'i blo gros mnga' yang / 'di skar skyes bu mchog tu gyur pa rnams ni de tsam la brten nas grags pa dang / rting pa bsgrub pa'i lhagon rtsom pa ma yin pas/ sro shas dang nges 'gyur
222b4(rnying rgyud): drag pos rgyang brlan nas grub pa nan tan gyi 'khor lo yid la sems shing / de'i ngang tshul slong dpon zhi ba lha dang rdo bo rje'i rnamathar la snying thag pa nas smon cing dad pa'i skabs cig na/ 'dri gung pa rin chen phun tshogs sgo gud la zegs pa'i e we
222b5(rnying rgyud): ha cang mi ring pa'i sa thang sbyar sgrar phab pa gzigs su gyon pas/ sgar gra tshang sum brgya tsam la spyi chos su spyod 'jug gsung ba dang thug/ sher le'i/ don dam blo yis spyod yul min// zhes pa nas sha lo kA gsum la jo 'grel gtso bo
222b6(rnying rgyud): dkon/ 'grel pa grags che ba khA yang na yams su byas/ rig lam gyi skyor bas kyang brgyan/ bka' thu pa'i nyams lon dang yang bsun gyi na bshad pa yam pa gcig gsang ba mthong bas/ rje btsun dam pa 'di 'i thugs rje co ma rngan
222b7(rnying rgyud): gyis snying la btab/ zang zing gi nye bar dpyad pa sbo ma'i dud na shong bcom zhig yod pa khang thog nas bsgyur/ chas par bsams pa na/ grogs mched sman dpyad shes pa zhig yod pas re zhig bkang // 'di bus dpung lo bco brgyad pa yin/
223a1(rnying rgyud): lung thos thadam pa'i nying gapas dang man lamathaM ban pa zhan nga gas rje ba nus pa pa yin pas smra ba smra pa'i sa gnas mkhar la 'phrob ba'inadu/ thas baspya/ rigs saspyad pangs/ yang
223a2(rnying rgyud): chags byed pa btang nas/ des ngan ston pa'i tha ba dang / dban pa 'bar zhig yid la bsams nas dri dag kyinang nas shor ba bzhin du thos/ 'phan yul bu phebs pa dang 'bru lung yang ri ba'i rtogs ldan ga la ba sogs dag
223a3(rnying rgyud): bsod snyoms la gyon pa drang 'grogs/ dus de tsam na 'bri gud pa lugs gnyis ka nas rnam dpyor tshe zhing / zil gyi khri thog tu bzhugs nas spyan rdza chos kyi grags pa'i spyan ltos sgrogs srol legs pa dang / tha dpon kyi 'jo 'i das
223a4(rnying rgyud): na lha sras 'bri grang pa rin chen phun tshogs mthong na mi mthun pa med pa'i zhal sbyin can de'i phyag 'bul la lhags pas/ mtshon nyid pa'i ha ma thul yul bud/ mi phyed pa'i dad pa gting nas g.yos/ spyan chab lhag par shor/ mtshan nyid
223a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i rig lum dgag phrag kho na'i e 'thus phul gyi thun pa bzhin du dor/ cha 'di phyi na gyi thog tu dasu snyam byung gsungs/ re TIg na thos bsam sna dri mo la zhi ba cu gnang / la bka' byung pa 'di la 'jig rten gyi dpal 'byor yod
223a6(rnying rgyud): gri 'jug sgo 'gag dam zhing mig ltos legs pas/ slob gsar ba rnams cog za'i sdigs stsol ngam por 'jug pa la/ rje'i zhal nas chos khrims par/ e waM pa'i dge bshes 'di yon tan can zhig 'dug// sdigs lam 'jar ra
223a7(rnying rgyud): sru / rang gi bsag/ spyang yin dgongs nas zla ba gsum gyi bar du nan tan mdzod/ 'khor po sdom pa dril bu zhwa lnga'i dbang / phyag chen lhan cig skyes sbyor gyi khrid/ bka' rgyud gser phreng / dgongs gcig rje ljin ci khrid rnams gsan/
223b1(rnying rgyud): dam gcig gi gcod yul la 'dris par byas/ cho glos btang gi bya btang phyogs bral ba zhig byed dgongs nas spyan du gsol ba na/ khyed gang du'ang ma 'byon par 'di khar bzhugs/ gcong la'ang nged 'dris che ba yin gsungs nas thugs kyi
223b2(rnying rgyud): re ba bskung / dpon slob gnyis lan mang por mdo sngags dang khyad par gsang sngags gsar snying gi lugs so so'i dgongs pa 'grel rgyol don la rton mi rton gyi 'bel gtam dri sbed mang po mdzad/ gcig la gcig thugs ches/ dag
223b3(rnying rgyud): bshes kyi ming ma nor zhes rnam pa kun tu bsngags shing / bkur mthong chen pos gzengs bstod kyang snyems chung kho na lhur len/ der 'gri gung pa'i dgongs par/ 'di 'dra ba'i gang zag mkhyen pa rlabs che shing / bya ba btang ba/ phral
223b4(rnying rgyud): tshugs kha bzang ba sogs gang la dpags kyang ngo mtshar che snyam du dgongs pa'i tshe/ slob dpon chen po'i lung bstan byung bas/ lan cig khyed mdo sngags gang la brda' bstan pa tsam gyis khong du chud pa dang bcas kho bo'i 'khrul snang la lo chen
223b5(rnying rgyud): tsanas byin gyis brlabs pa'i gang zag gsang sngags snga 'gyur gyi chos la bag chags che ba zhig tu sems pas/ khyod slob dpon pad+ma la e dad gsungs/ slob dpon pad+ma la sangs rgyas dngos kyi 'du shes byis pa'i dus nas yod/ gang zag
223b6(rnying rgyud): phal la rtog pa chung zhing de'i stobs kyis chos la'ang 'dris chung zhus pas/ 'o na gsol ba thob mdzod/ sku'i snang ba dang lung ston pa thag chod gsungs/ yang ri sbang pa'i chos khrims mdzad dus bstan pa la phyag bzhes shin tu
223b7(rnying rgyud): pas/ legs par gsungs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dul ba'i bca' khrims la sras kyang 'da' bar mi nus/ lan cig rje 'bri gung pa'i gsung gis/ dge bshes kyis sang tshogs khrod du dgongs gcig la bshad pa byed dgos gsungs/
224a1(rnying rgyud): wA rang 'dra ba'i ba'ang rtsol mi 'dug kyang / dgos pa'i skad yin/ bla ma'i bka' ldog tu mi nung ba snyam nas sang tshogs dbus su zhabs zung tshogs dbul byon/ zil gyi mkhan slob chos slob dang /
224a2(rnying rgyud): skyob chung / yang ri sbar pa dang bcas pa'i tshogs pa rgya mtsho'i dbus su/ lnga ldan la rtsa bar byas/ rdo rje'i gsung brgya lnga bcu pa chos tshoms su bcad/ dgongs gcig lugs gsum gyi grub mtha'i rkang bzang / mdo ljags kyi chos 'khor bstan pa
224a3(rnying rgyud): yongs rdzogs kyi tshul du bshad/ skabs don tshor swa par+Na gyis bkag pa rnams rang stobs kyi sgrub byed rnam par dag pa dang bcas bshad pas thams cad bla na med pa'i ngo mtshar skyes/ sad sna zung na bcar bas dbu la phyag gis byil yang / ngas
224a4(rnying rgyud): snga chos kyi grags pa dang / mnga' ris pa Na chen gyi legs bshad slob ma kun la bshad pa yin yang / phal che bas dgongs gcig 'bri bung pa kho na'i chos skad dang mtshan par gleng bskrad byed/ de 'dra byas ni don gyis ston pa'i bka' dang mi
224a5(rnying rgyud): mthun par 'gro/ khyod kyi bshad pa des lnga ldan mdo sngags gnyis ka'i nyams len gyi rtsa bar song / dgongs gcig de'i rgyu ba chos yin pa las lugs pa'i phyogs snga spangs pa'i dgag sgrub gnad thog tu 'gro ba byung bas snying tshim/ de
224a6(rnying rgyud): bzhin re nas kyang byas pa yin/ re ba las lhag gsungs/ 'di la yig cha zhig kyang mdzad snang ste khams pa'i gra pa zhig gis zin bris khyer bas rgyun chad/ der bka' brgyad lcags srol chen po dgu/ bdud ce sman pa grub kyi phyag bzhes/
224a7(rnying rgyud): nyid ma bka' gter gyi gshin rje rigs lnga/ dgongs pa yang zab/ mkha' 'gro'i snying tig brgyad pa gzhan las ches 'phags pa/ byang gter mdzod lnga/ pad gling chos skor rnams dang / 'bri gung phyogs kyi bka' brgyad bka'
224b1(rnying rgyud): 'bum la sogs pa'i dbang khrid lung gi bshad sbyar mang po gsan/ khyad par snga 'gyur gyi grub mtha'i gzung srong tshul/ tha ba rnga rje'i slob dpon mnga' ris paN chen rin po che de'i mkhyen rab la mtha' med/ de'i bka' las/ ting ma lugs mthun
224b2(rnying rgyud): zhig byed na gsang sngags lnga 'gyur rang gi bstan pa'i babal/ bka' gnyer zung gcig yin pas/ bka' ma ni/ sodo lha sems gsum la rdza 'gyur bka' babs kyi chu bo bzhi'i sgo nas bshad rgyan rnam par dag pa bzhin bshad pa lag len dang
224b3(rnying rgyud): bcas pa bka' ma ltar byed dgos/ chos kyi zab gnang rnams brgyad pa dang chos la sel med cing mkha' 'gro'i kha rlangs tshil le bde gter ma yin pas gter chos chad lhan ltar byed dgos/ de ltar byas na rting ma lugs dang mthun pa gcig yod
224b4(rnying rgyud): phebs byung bas/ khyed rang yang nyan 'dod no kho bos de rnams zos pas bshad chog/ brjed gso tsam du'ang 'gro gsungs nas/ bskyed pa mthu yog tan+da sde bco brgyad kyi rtsa ba sgyu 'phrul gsang ba snying po la 'grel pa phyogs bcu mun sel gyi
224b5(rnying rgyud): lugs gtso bor bton/ lung a nu log mdo dgongs pa 'dus pa mdo 'grel chen mo'i dgongs pa dang / rdzogs pa chen po'i a ti yo ga kun byed rgyal po ma sogs pa'i mnangag dngos stobs kyi 'grel pas bkral nas bshad/ de bzhin
224b6(rnying rgyud): gsar rting gnyis ka'i rgyung 'bum/ rgyal ba klong chen pa'i ngal gso skor gsum/ mdzod bdun/ sgyid tig ya ba'i/ rab mo yang hU~M// rgyud bcu bdun bi ma la'i Ti kI dang bcas pa/ man ngag brtsa bcu dgu rnams byas /
224b7(rnying rgyud): pa dpo khang du ched kyis bzhugs nas so so'i yig chal bas ma byung gi shes rab rnam par dag pas dpyad ba na/ chos kyi zab gnad rnams nyid mkho na la sdang zhing / khyad par snying tig la yod par nges shes gting nas 'jongs/ daso
225a1(rnying rgyud): pa gnams mdzan na tan mas pa rgyags gsar pa'i ma khas pa mas lan ga sasas kying byung byas thags pan/ ngas nga dang na ga pang
225a2(rnying rgyud): ba tso khor ni 'khor lo gsum pa yin/ de 'i ba bdag shegs pa'i ste po'i grags pa dgas la por bstan/ dgongs pa 'phral bas/ rje rang zla ba cos thugs rgya tham kyi chags pa/
225a3(rnying rgyud): mkhyen mod can pa rnams shin tu mkhas shing mthun pas yin grubs la la ying ban par gyis gagags / ban rkyen na me ti ga rkyen gas ma na sbyi pa thamam tha bya dzis rjes pa'i rnas pa da pas pas nga
225a4(rnying rgyud): bgan sa chen dag shi dbang ba dang gag ma cig pa gnyis grang ma'i'i das 'dzin sa rnam sa pa la/ kyil pa'i 'ang / banag tan can mdzin
225a5(rnying rgyud): pa chen pa'i ska ba'i mthar brag dbu ma thal 'thar ba dang mabyings pa pan gyis 'chis pa yin/ sems tshugs kyi swA ba las ldan nga bral ba la mag skye pa chos pa'i po 'jigs ma ts+tsha pas ngobazhin par khas ldan te/ gad / de sang
225a6(rnying rgyud): gangs can nA lpags de thos na snying 'gas nas srog 'dor bar byed pa dgA mA na/ de dag dang dgag grub kyi gakyi pa gzengs bstod nas lhur len par mdzod cig/ khro ba cag ni chos bzhi po de ltar du khas len pa la rlon nyid nas spobs par gyur to//
225a7(rnying rgyud): yangs rnam spyod bras gsum po ni mu ba dang zigs med gnyis ka'i shing rta'i grol bathang cig tu brjod/ zhes dang / de bzhin du cig gi brjod pa tsam du nga gi zas pa'i mtha' lal kho mchog la bye ban nam rnam pa tsam la so/ don
225b1(rnying rgyud): de dag gang yang min pa'i 'dod pa'i lta ba ya ma zung gsar byung ba g.yangs su sgrub dag gi 'dod pa'i gting dpyis phyin pa dgongs mas 'di skad du/ deng sang gangs can gyi klog pa bdag ni/ gsar ma las kyang ches gsar mar gyur pa'i grub pa'i mtha' dag/
225b2(rnying rgyud): glo pa la zhen cing byung bar byas nas/ tshig gi brjod pa la kho bo cag ni rdzogs pa chen po'am/ phyag cha ba'am/ bka' gdams pa'am/ sa skya ba yin no zhes smra ba dag mang ba'i phyir ro// zhes gsungs pas so// de nas skyes bu
225b3(rnying rgyud): dam pa 'di kha che'i paN+Di ta shAkya shrIs/ bong btsun rnams kyis 'dul ba nas bshad pa'i rab tu byung ba de mi 'ong ba 'jug/ rje btsun mi la des rtags dang cho ga byas na rab tu byung ba mtshan nyid pa zhig 'ong ba 'dug gsungs pa des thugs drangs/ grub
225b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i mtshan ma zhig ma brnyes pa re la/ 'jig rten tshes brgyad la dor/ gang dben gyi gnyan khrod du sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis la gnas bzhin pas mchog gi dngos grub grub par dgongs/ chos gos gsum dang / lhung bzed/
225b5(rnying rgyud): zhal lcogs nam las yo byad ci yang ma bzung / 'tsho ba bsod snyoms kyang g.yeng ba'i rgyur dgongs nas/ sran mkhal bzhi la bza' ba dang / de btsos pa'i khu ba las btung bar byas nas grogs ri rin chen spungs pa'i mgul sle ba dpon chen po
225b6(rnying rgyud): lhub zug tu de mi 'bab pa'i dam bca' sngon du 'gro bas man ngag mkha' 'gro snying thig gi bskyed rdzogs/ rtsa rlung gi lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa lag khrid du 'debs pa'i gdams pa 'bri gung pas bla ma lnga tsam las gsan pas man ngag yongs su rdzogs pa'i
225b7(rnying rgyud): tshig brgyad dam pa 'di la gdams pa gang gis ma nog chos su mdzad nas lo gsum 'di'i ring stan thog gcig tu bsgrubs pas/ mngon rtags bsam gyis mi khyab pa shar/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mtha' yas pa brnyes/ de nas dgon gnas kyi bka'
226a1(rnying rgyud): bkod ji lta bu lobs kyang num g.yeng gi dbang du gyur dogs nas rang sa rang sar dgongs pa bsangs nas gnas gang dben dang / dben pa 'bra' zhig tu lo brgyad dkrugs/ de'i tshe 'di lta bu'i gang ba
226a2(rnying rgyud): mthon po la zhugs pa dag ni chos kyi gter la longs spyod pa mdo sde zab mo'i dgongs pa yin pas de grang lo sum cu pa'i tshe/ mkha' 'gro ma mon mo'i cha lugs can zhig gis/ khyod kyi bslab pas bcings pa'i bre btang 'di nyams de bgang / 'di
226a3(rnying rgyud): dang zer nas chung bse phor gang byin/ twen 'brel de las me mo lug gi lo'i cho 'phrul zla ba'i tshes bcu'i nyin 'od dkar po zhig gi rkyen las thig le chen po'i dbus su slob dpon chen po pad+ma rgyal po'i cha lugs su zhal gzigs/ rjes su gdams
226a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i gsung gis dbugs dbyung bas grog ri rin chen spangs pa nas pad+ma'i zhal gdams grol tig dgongs pa dang grol gyi gter shog 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i shing shun kha dog ljang rgya mtshon gyis mi shigs pa kha shas dang / lha gsung thugs rten gyis mtshon
226a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i zab gter rgya mtsho la mnga' dbang bskur/ khyad par lha sa'i gter 'byin pa la dgongs pa zhus pas/ 'bri gung pa'i slob ma bla ma gtsang nas dang bcas grogs su rdo dag nang / lha sa'i sku gnyer gyis rnying mabs gter bton yong zhes
226a6(rnying rgyud): blon pag byas kyang thugs dam gsol 'debs tshugs pa'i mod la lug nyar rnams ra ro tha ma'i gnas su song / nor ba stag sa ba/ bas ma yas kyi me'i gnod pa bsrung ba'i dugashog gsam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsel/ mtsho rtsal gyi
226a7(rnying rgyud): rloms/ lo rgyus zhog ser/ srung grol a rgya can/ spong pad+ma rAga'i dpyad pa rnams dang / khyad par bdud rtsi 'khril pa'i khrag nas chos rgyal gyi sku 'don par brtsams pa na gter bdag ming po phre chu srin gyi mgo can sa 'og nas mngon
226b1(rnying rgyud): sa mya thon/ gnyen po rdo rje yod pa mgo thog tu bzhag nas/ slob pon gyi dmachog rjes su dran par gyis shig gsungs pas rang sar zim/ de'i 'jigs zil gyis gnyid drug su ba rnams gang shod/ tham gtsang gnas kyis dngos gnang /
226b2(rnying rgyud): mthong / bstan skyong ma shin tu 'gro bas lam du dre'u'i skad dang thug chom yang yang byung / der 'bri gung rin po che yang dbu skra bsil te spyan 'dren la phebs/ na bza' phyag bris ma 'dod gsol can de phul/ shog ser rnams dpon slob lhan cig
226b3(rnying rgyud): pas phab pa sogs 'di lta bu'i gter gyi rnam grangs dang nges shes 'drongs pa gzhan du ma gyur pa lta bu yin te gter zung lo rgyas kyis shes so// de nas zing ba stag mgor gter srub la bzhugs pa'i tshe/ nub gcig spang ba thams cad gru tal le pa'i
226b4(rnying rgyud): dang / bud med gcig na re/ do nub slob dpon chen pos tshes bcu gnang gi yod/ khyod dang chang 'di 'thung / sha 'di nal byi'i dur khrod na bram ze skye ba bdun pa'i sha 'dug pas tshogs shar blangs pa yin gsol dang nus pa tshad mad/ nam
226b5(rnying rgyud): mkha' la 'phur yang thub zer/ chang de 'thungs/ sha de dmar tsar re 'dug pas yid 'phrigs se ba gcig gis ngang nas zos pas/ de na re/ khyed rnal 'byor pa 'dra po man/ da ste slob dpon mjal du 'dod zer ba'i mod la sha'i nus
226b6(rnying rgyud): pas nam mkha'i lam la gya gyur khrid nas zangs mdog dpal ri'i bkod pa skyin po'i yul gling dang bcas pa ngo mtshar can gzigs/ slob dpon yab yum ku ru bde ba chen po'i rnam pas dbang bskur/ rjes su gdams/ zhal gdams dang bsla
226b7(rnying rgyud): bya mdzad/ zla ba gcig gi yun du bzhugs pa'i snang ba byang / dgu sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang las bod yul gyi gdul bya rnams dran par gyis zhes mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis bskul bas/ rmi la ma sad pa bzhin song / sngar thos bsam gyis dpya
227a1(rnying rgyud): gzhi byas pa'og myong rtags pa'i thog tu 'byor pas bstod pa stan pa'i slad blangs lha yi rol mo dgrags pa 'di mdzad/ de nas bya ba las kyi 'khor lo la zhugs te/ rje 'dipa snying po'i sras su ba nagatugs pa
227a2(rnying rgyud): kun mkhyen chen po'i ring lugs bzing pa stag mgo'i bla mar dam tshig la bkar nas bsko bzhag gnang bas/ der chos kyi char phab/ re zhig na skar mangs bsam yas su phyags phebs pa las theng por dgongs 'dus kyi chos bdag nyi mtshal mtshan
227a3(rnying rgyud): dpon slob gnyis kas dgongs 'dus dang / gter phran pong bcu gnyis com gsan/ phreng po bas nan gyis zhus pa'i ngor/ bas ma yas dang phreng po gnyis kar rgyal tshab tu mnga' gsol/ bar skab nas khwa 'brug gi rdo me sgrol ma la bud med
227a4(rnying rgyud): kyi rgyan gsol bas rab gnas nyams/ slar bsgyur bar pradz+nyA'i zhabs ched du bstsal yang sde srid kyis bkag/ des rten 'grel log ste dpon blon nang bshags pa'i chings la 'bri gung pas gshegs dus 'phyod rgyas zhabs drung hor bsod pa'ang
227a5(rnying rgyud): dad pa shin tu thob/ rje 'bri gud pas dam pa 'di'i bsngags pa brjod de mchod yon gyi lung bstan/ dpag par dka' ba'i yon tan gyis blo phrogs nas dkar po pa bstan 'dzin nor bu'ang slob mar gyur/ de nyid ring por ma lon par gsheg
227a6(rnying rgyud): skabs/ bsam yas gtsug lag khang sde dang bcas pa rje btsun 'di la gnyer du gtad pas/ lo gsum gyi bar gtsug lag khang gi zhabs tog/ bar skor zhig gsos/ 'bras pa'i gu shan gso ba dang / dkar me'i 'du 'god
227a7(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa'ang bdag gir bzhes/ chos rje mnga' bdag pa sku mched sogs 'dus pa phyed nyis brgya tsom la lhan cig skyes sbyor gyi khrid dang / rgyab chos su mdo mdzangs blun/ dgongs pa nges 'grel sogs bsngal/ mchog ldan mgon
227b1(rnying rgyud): po'i sras rgyal sras bstan pa'i 'byung gnas/ me long rdo rje'i gdung bgyur/ mdo sngags gling nga/ khyad par du gsang bu'i chos rje ston chag pa zhes dus de tsan dge ba'i bshes gshen rig pa che bar grags pa de rnams la grol thig gi chos
227b2(rnying rgyud): bskor bas/ dmapa' dis sngon 'gro'i skabs su mdo'i bshad pa/ dngos gzhi'i skabs su gud sde'i bshad pa/ khyad par gter chos 'di pa'i rang skad chud sde chen po'i grub pa'i mtha' la gnas pa de'i gdon slongs nas bshad pas/ sngon chag
227b3(rnying rgyud): pa chen po na re/ nga lta mdo sdigs la kho bo las sbyangs stobs che ba med snyam pa yin te/ skye ba brgyad nas sbyangs pa dang mi 'dra ba 'jug/ rje btsun dam pa pradz+nyA ra sI dang kham che gsungs/ de phyin nas ting nge 'dzin khon la dril/ de'i stan
227b4(rnying rgyud): pas sa s+ya bdag po mtshan pas kyang 'chi med sku gsum 'dus pa'i sgor gas na zhing thugs yid 'dres/ de bzhin du bya rgod gshongs su sde 'khrugs chen po sras kyang mi 'dums pa byung ba'ang blang dor ston pa'i lung bstan gyis zhi bas paN chen 'bum
227b5(rnying rgyud): phrag gsum pa'i yul sgyur yid chas/ rtse gdong pa sku mched rnams kyis kyang dbang chos mang du gas na de nas je 'bri gung ba zas ngan gyi sbyor bas bstan pa na/ dam pa 'dri la thugs shin tu bca bas zhal gdams mang du gnang
227b6(rnying rgyud): lce phul mnyes thabs kyi ngang nas khams 'phos/ phyis 'bri gung phyogs kyi gdung brgyad rin po ches gtses bu chen thams cad 'dir 'dus/ dgongs pa yang zab ming tsam du 'gro nye'i srog mthung / thub bstan rdo rje thag tu lo gsum
227b7(rnying rgyud): kyi bcad rgyang bzhugs dus/ slob dpon chen po pad+ma rgyal po'i cha lugs seng ge laM bcibs pa zhig zhal gzigs/ deng sang 'din lta ba ma 'khrul pa'i khyad par 'byed shes pa khyod las med pas de'i gnas gsal bar ston cig gsungs
228a1(rnying rgyud): pas 'di gnyis gsal thon gas chogatud par namo ba ma dang / 'jug du 'dabod stortogs sa song sngags sa ston la mas bstan pa thams cad ma 'dres yongs sa rdzogs pa gas
228a2(rnying rgyud): mdzad/ skad zhabs drang snor bsod nams dang rgyas kyis 'gyod zas su spyan drangs/ pha dang bu zad pa lta ba'i dkyus pa chen pos kyi zer bathar/ grol tig la sogs zab ma'i gdams pas rjes su bzang / mi 'gra dgran dga'adab
228a3(rnying rgyud): dang / sbrul sku zla ba/ zhig po gar gyi dbang phyug sogs dang yang thugs yid gcig tu 'dres shing chos kyi skyes rgya chen pos phan tshu'angoms res mdzad/ byung bdag po bkra shis stobs rgyal dang yang mjal bas thugs shin tu ches/ re zhig na phreng bong
228a4(rnying rgyud): sku srun pa zhig byung bas rkyen byas/ shAn+ta pu ri'i zhing khams kyi mchod rten la nang gzhal med khang / mkha' 'gro'i grong khyer 'bum tsho gsum gyis bskor ba/ gawAl yas khang gi khri 'phang mthon po la dpa' bo chen po thod pa'i dum thu rtsa la na
228a5(rnying rgyud): tshong bco lnga pa/ sgra mdog rdzo bsangs shangs zhar dkar po/ da rang nga rin po ches brgyan pa/ dpa' bo dang / mkha' 'gro dang / rab byung dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dpag tu med pa'i 'khor la theg pa sna tshogs chos
228a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor bskor ba gcig gzigs shing / ma 'ongs pa na dam pa nyid de'i thugs kar sprul pa bsdu bar lung bstan thob/ des skye ba'i mtha' yang chod/ gyib sdu phyi'i gdul bya'i go mthung cho ga babyung gsungs/ karma pa dbang phyug rdo rje phreng
228a7(rnying rgyud): por phebs pa dang mjal/ dag snang mtha' yas pa gzigs/ 'phel gtam mdzad pas thugs lhag par ches/ dge ba shes rin po che de mkhyen rab bsam gyis mi khya bzer bde bden par 'dug ces 'phros don la'ang bsngags pa mdzad/ sprul
228b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i mu dkon mchog san lag dang mngal dus/ drung dam mon pas gsar nying gi spyad la rogs slong mang po mang pa l+la/ lan ga pal byengs rgyab 'ab zhig gi byas btab pas/ dza gral grol nas zhabs drung thul pa'i grwa'i gsung nas drung dab dang /
228b2(rnying rgyud): gang zag khyad par can de la so so lho bos rgol ba byas na ljang me nus pa de 'dra 'ong zhes gsung skad/ 'brug pa rin po che chos kyi stan ldan pa d+ma dkar po dang lnga phyir mjal/ sa paN gyi dgongs gtang dbu ma rang rgyud par 'dug pa dang / dge ldan
228b3(rnying rgyud): glu lus kyi ldang nang ldang sogs kyi 'bel gtam zhib byas sku gnang / thugs yid gcig tu 'dres/ lan gcig sprul pa'i bu khyed lta bu rtog ge'i chos lnga dgus pa mi 'gab/ dge snying po'i chos kyi 'phel rgyas khon pa dgongs pa da
228b4(rnying rgyud): rigs hral zhus pas thugs la shin tu zhugs/ grol tegs chos kyi bdag por gyur zhing chos skor bal mar gas nA nga yin/ 'jug pa rin po che nyid kyi rnam thar du'ang / phreng po nas gter ston dge ba shes rin po che dang mjal/ dz+ran
228b5(rnying rgyud): ka shIn tu nye bar byung zhes snang / ris zhig gang gi skyob ma rin po che lha che ba lnga ldan gyi khrid bskul/ tshe ring po zang pa rdzog stengs rnams su 'grod kyis zhabs rdung / bde chan gled pa/ sbrul phu mdo sngags rtsal sras rin po chernams
228b6(rnying rgyud): lagrol thig dang / mkha' 'gro nying tig/ dgongs pa yang rab rnams kyi bshang grub mdzad/ grol dbang la me stong zab bdun btsun tshogs pa sha stag dang / me tog gi char 'ja' 'od la sogs pa 'dra byung / dom khar du sgru pa rba rgyal

230a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i bca' khrims dang / gzhi gsum gyi cho ga'i phyag len la gnas pas phyi ru 'dul ba'i kun tu spyod pa nyams su bstar zhing / nang du gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i sprin grol rab 'byams las grub mtha'i gzhung rgyal ba klong chen po'i shing rta chen mo rtsa 'grel gyis

230b1(rnying rgyud): bzhed kyang / sde dpon phan tshun mi mdza' ba'i kun slong gis gsel ba'i spyan gzhis lo gcig gi khang du zhi bar mnal bas bstan pa mtha' rgyas kyi rten 'brel la cung zad gzhar/ de lta na'ang don gyis theg pa'i ma dgu'i grub mtha'i rnam gzhag dbyis
230b2(rnying rgyud): pa rgyal ba klong chen pa'i gzhung gos slong zhing / rnal 'byor du bya ba'i gnas la yo ga gsum ka'i zab cing rgya che ba'i ngo bo ma 'khrul zhing mi bsrub gter kha gong 'og/ bla ma dgongs 'dus/ grol ba'i thig le la sogs pa dang / rig pa rang shar
230b3(rnying rgyud): rgyud don la bye brag tu 'jug pa dgongs pa yang za ba rnams mdo sgyu sems gsum ka'i rgyud sde la don gyis rton pa sangs rgyas pad+ma'i ring lugs ma nor ba zhes bya'o// zhabs dung 'phyong rgyas pas sems nyid ngal gso rtsa 'grel par gyi sgo 'phar phye ba'i gtam la'ang /
230b4(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba lha dang bcas pa'i ston pa dpal kun tu bzang po de nyid kyis rang gis bdud rtsi brnyes pa'i go 'phang la gdul bya rnams dngas sam brgyud pas bkri bar bzhed nas/ rgyu dang 'bras bu'i theg pa ji snyed cig gsungs pa de thams cad kyi don snying por dril ba ni mdo
230b5(rnying rgyud): sngags thams cad gang zag gcig 'tshang rgya ba'i lam gyi lus yongs su rdzogs par ston pa'i bstan bcos 'di nyid kun mkhyen ngag gi dbang pos ched du spel bar mdzad pas/ spyir rgyal ba'i bstan pa la zhugs so cog dang / khyad par lnga 'gyur
230b6(rnying rgyud): par khas 'che ba rnams kyis bskyed rim tshig rgyang tsam dang / rdzogs rim sna re'i nyams myong cung zad kyis yid tshim par byas na/ de dag lam ltar sdang dang yang dag pa yin min kyang mi shes shing / brgya la rang gi rgyud la myong ba rnal ma zhig smras
230b7(rnying rgyud): na'ang lkugs pa'i rmi lam ltar gzhan la 'doms pa'i mthu med pa dag gi sa gas rnying gi bstan pa mtha' dag nyams dmas pa la/ mkhas shing grub pa rnams kyis 'khu zhing gshung ba dang / gal te mdo sngags kyi gzhung lugs rgya chen po la slob pa ni
231a1(rnying rgyud): snyigs ma lnga bdo pa'i dus 'dir gshis kyis dka' ba la dgongs nas 'di ni mdo chud dang chu gzhung rtsod pa dang bral ba rnams kyi lung ji lta bar bkral bas/ blo gros dang ldan pa dag gis rkang tshugs pa'i rtog pa
231a2(rnying rgyud): kyi mig zhib mos go ba'i gting phyin par bltas tshe/ dpyad pa yongs su rdzogs pa na lam gyi rim pa 'di nyid la nges pa gting nas 'drongs shing / de'i tshul la gnang du bsnun nas nyams su blangs na chal bsras dang bcas pa dgyes pa'i 'phra ba med
231a3(rnying rgyud): rgyud pa ma mthar mang dbyung basbyi dzub dus pa myur pa'i gapa ges byas lan mig sa yin par bshad pal brten nas/ chos ma myo ba mi dati mabs dngalasasu bya gas pas/
231a4(rnying rgyud): bskang ba dang / lnga 'gyur gyi bstan pa rin po che 'phel rgyas kyi phyir/ 'khor lo gsum la lhur byed pa'i dge 'dun gyi sde btsugs shing / de dag gi 'tsho ba bla nas sbyor ba dang / smin grol lam gyi cha lag tshes bcu chen mo'i phyag bzhes

231a6(rnying rgyud): rtsa 'grel dang / gsang ba'i snying po/ 'grel pa phyogs bcu mun sel sogs blo la 'doms par byed pa'i rgyun da lta'i bar du'ang gnas pa tsam mo// de ltar dgon gnas bskrun nas yun ring ma song ba la/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bdud sdig

231b2(rnying rgyud): rnams rang sa gi bstan pa gzung nas mnub par gyis la grib mar tshon/ gtso bor thos pas ma sgom pa la 'bad 'brangs thon/ thal bya ba gang thongs rang kyis/ dka' thab 'dis dal rten chud 'dza' bas 'tsho brtse na na ma bsnyen/ sdom pas

231b4(rnying rgyud): grol dang / be bum gyi man ngag rnams la nyams len mdzod/ ces gdams/ dag pa'i gsal sdang dpag tu med pa gzigs/ khyad par nyin gcig dus kyi 'khor lo'i mngon dkyil rdzogs par gnang nas dbang mdzad pas/ dge slong 'bri

232a2(rnying rgyud): pas/ sangs rgyas kyi sku tshe'i 'du byed ni btang / 'tsho ba'i 'du byed ni bsrings pa bzhin du 'o na zhag gsum bsdad do gsungs nas tshes bcu gsum gyi snga zhogs kun gyis mthong bar nam mkha'i dbyings nas 'ja' tshon chen po sna lnga'i dra bas sbrel/ sa

232b2(rnying rgyud): dbang gtang rgya dang bcas gnang ba'i tshe bla chen bres gshongs pa gnyigs ston chos rgyal rdo rje chung ngu zhig yab mngar ba pad+ma bdud 'dul gyis khrid de rdzogs par gsan/ gyis gong ra lhun grub rdzings su lo chen gzhan phan rdo rje dang / gtsang theg mchog
232b3(rnying rgyud): gling 'dus pa dang lhan cig rdzogs chen pa nam mkha' 'jug sgra bzang po la'ang gsan cing / 'di ni mnga' ris 'od gsal mchog/ gong ra lo chen/ lha btsun nam mkha' 'jigs med gsum rtsa ba'i bla mar 'khrur zhing / de sogs bla ma dam
232b4(rnying rgyud): pa mang po bsten nas gsan pa rgya che/ rten tshangs spyod grub pa'i dbang phyug chen po'o// des rong sku'i sham thar du sku mtshams dam por bcad de yang tinag po'i khrid mdzad pa'i zol gyis gsang khog tu sman ldang ba chen po nyang ston blo mchog rdo rje nyid la tshig brgyad
232b5(rnying rgyud): du mdo dbang gtad rgya dang bcas pa gnang / de'i gong du lo chen gzhan phan rdo rje la'ang sgrub chen dang 'brel bar rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor du gsan cing rtsa ba'i bla ma mchog tu 'dzin/ spyir mdo sngags rig gnas dang bcas pa mkhyen cing / khyad par
232b6(rnying rgyud): chos dbang gi gter chos la mkhas/ rgyal mchog lnga pa chen pos ti shrir bkur ba sogs mkhas grub mang po'i gtsug rgyan no// des snga 'gyur bstan pa'i mnga' bdag rdo rje brag rig 'dzin mchog gi sprul pa'i skur mdo dbang gtang rgya man ngag phyag
232b7(rnying rgyud): bzhes dang bcas pa mtha' rgyas su bstsal zhing / dam pa 'di ni snga na ma rdo rje bdud 'joms kyi yang srid rig 'dzin rje'i skye ba sprul pa'i sku ste/ mo na mkhar rnam sras gling du bya nag gi rigs las sde pa karma phun tshogs dbang po'i sras su lcags mo srul
233a1(rnying rgyud): sabyu ga po 'dzin gsas pa ga pas dpang pothag pa la nangs su sna rgyus da/ gzung gas ga
233a2(rnying rgyud): rgyags myed par mthon/ na mthenan ma mchag sgrub can par gcus gyungs te/ mnan san yang ba sbyin las smrab la/ kyis geg sa nga nga bsten par dgas shing babanyis yang drag pan/ sa
233a3(rnying rgyud): dbyings dang krol/ mnan pa bsod nams mchog ldan phyogs mkhas rbab n+de tha ma mang rngu bsten nus/ gas rnying gi dbyung khrid bshad yang man gsog sa tshas bka' maba' yas pa zhig dam pa med par gas na cing / bas mthung gis gtan la ra
233a4(rnying rgyud): pas thogs pa med pa'i mthun rab cas/ grags yang rjod/ n+ya ma'i/ gdanas la sogs par nom pa'i shes rab kyis nyams cu bzlas pas bskyed rimal brtan pa thog/ rdzanas ma sa nasal dbang 'gyur bas mkhas sub chen por thar /
233a5(rnying rgyud): mkhyen ba nas pa'i ldan las bas zlab las gsum sel bar ma las rnam par mig lal ba dang / zad par kun mgrin \u0f7fla ba lnga pa mchog gi sang gis bskal te 'dus pa yod 'a ba phyog dkyil 'khang cu coM'i 'jug sogs gas tha ba'i bka' tsam dang
233a6(rnying rgyud): ma dab bar mdang pa dgasugs kyis mad byastan pa la ldan pa pa stor thar cing/ dbyung bangs bdun du dun rtse pa dang nyed brtan 'ad kyin posang bka' cos pa ga gnyis phyogs pa brdzun pa'i sman la bye
233a7(rnying rgyud): bdagasum ma na pas/ sa ba ma'i rgyang ba'is pa pa mye tshogasasapas sa/ gsus pa pas da na/ la can kyisas sangs sa gyu/ 'ang spyod nam pa'i rjem brje
233b1(rnying rgyud): ni gro la ma pa yab sras gnyis ka'i bslab rdzogs kyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig ste/ 'jam dbyangs bas mgru ba rdo rje gshegs pa'i mchod 'bul la bu chen gyi mchog tu gyur pa'i bla ma rnams kyis dbu mdzad pa'i cho ga gra bcu bzhi tsam bsrubs pa'i bu chen 'dren dus sra ma cung chen
233b2(rnying rgyud): padang / tha mganam ldangs pa dang / zhes rnamathar du bzangs pa yin/ khyad par 'dod bang gta thab gad pa gdam sang ga dang bcas bsras sangs rgyas rin can la bdi can grom ma gsan/ rgyung yang ma ga grang ste dang bcas pa thams cang la
233b3(rnying rgyud): mangs/ hanAg gnamadzangs kyi skrag pang dranyams len lagatso por baspel bas rlung sems la brtan thAH/ bzung rdzogs kyi dgongs pa mngon pa thA/ phrin las pa ni la bang 'byor bas gdul ba'i di ma dang / dris ma khas grub da
233b4(rnying rgyud): mtshan la gnam rdzangs dpal gyi b+hab khang dung dbang bsra zhing bshang pa gdams ngag dang bcas pa gzug dben gnas pad ldan du thub pa la bzhugs pas bsrud rim la brtan pa thob ste las bzhi thogs med du 'grub/ rdzogs rim gyi mas rtogs
233b5(rnying rgyud): mabyur sbyin/ bshang grub gnyis ka tshogs nas bstan pa'i don mang da // des rig 'dzijinags 'jug rdo rje lnga ba chen gyi gru ba gnas pa 'dzus pa mda'i dbang gtad rgya dang bcas pardzogs par bslar zhing / bshad pa dang gdams ngag kyang #
233b6(rnying rgyud): 'on nga rje sogs ngas pa gargyas rnams dang gtsob g.yas can na gage sa chos dkon dugams len la tshig rmyil gyis pazhugs pas tham sgrub chen pa zhes thung ma tshan du gags/ nyams rtogs mthar byin pa brnyas/ byin brlabs mdzad pa tsam
233b7(rnying rgyud): ra ga don las grol bsogs ma thu slo bas nus pa'i rtsal dziH/ dgra lo yang shin tu srin pa na pa zugs ted dbe par nyams pa da dang sbags nas nar 'dzod cigadus cag la ldan rnams smin grol la 'ag par mdzadzan// des gtugs nasas pa 'i
234a1(rnying rgyud): bum pas thabs cos nul ma can ba lta bang po la 'das pa la rtsub rigs kyi bang gtad rgyu byung pa gang mas dug tug sus dang su bas/ dun na cang gsus tsaso/ gag par du ldangag 'gasas
234a2(rnying rgyud): 'thungs/ chung ngu nas tha lhung kyi rig pa rnams tshigs med par mkhyen cing / byed pa gas rig la mkhas/ gzhon gyi'i dus sde pa gdang par pa'i zhabs phyir bzhugs pas mtshan dadang khar rachi byeng du zag/ der la dung dran
234a3(rnying rgyud): sad de rab tu byung nas/ mchen rdo rje 'chang thugs pa rin chen/ yongs 'dzin dag dbang grags pa/ pad gling thugs sras blang rgyal mtshan/ gter skyon zhig po gleng ba/ sku lus ma spangs par mkha'i spyod tu gshegs pa rdo rje seng ge sas
234a4(rnying rgyud): mkhas thub kyi bla ma dam pa du ma'i zhabs la gtugs te/ chos kyi sgo mtha' yas pa zhig ngom pa med par gsan/ de yang gsan lo tsam du ma bzhag par sgro 'dogs tshong par mdzad nas/ 'du 'dzing nga g.yeng bas me 'phrigs par nyams pa zhes la 'bad pa
234a5(rnying rgyud): thos bsam sgom gsum cig car du grub/ de'i mthus nyams rtogs dang mkhyen rab kyi klong nang nas brdol te/ mdo sngags kyi gzhung ljags spyi dang khyad par snga 'gyur bka' gter gyi chos gang la'ang thogs pa med pa'i mthun rab rgyas/ rdzogs pa chen
234a6(rnying rgyud): po rang sdang res med kyi dgongs pa shar/ rtsa chung thib le'i 'gros dbu mar them/ rmi lam snod khrel sbrul sgur la dbang 'byor pas dag pa'i zhing bgrod nas sangs rgyas dang blang sems mang po'i zhal mjal zhing lung bstan thob/ nus pas bod 'phung
234a7(rnying rgyud): byed kyi'i byung po dang mtha' dmag gdus pa can rnams car gtsad pa dang / bsu zhing bzlog pa'i rtags thal tu thon pas tan grags kyis can tu ba/ sru tso'i slad la nyang spad byed drug tu bzhugs nas thod gas la rdo rje snying po'i dgongs pa las ma g.yos
234b1(rnying rgyud): bzhin du dbang bshad lung zab khrid sogag gdul bya'i dbang po dang 'tshams pa'i chos 'chad spel rgyun chags su mdzad pas so so'i re bskong zhing rnam bshad srub yig cho ga 'phrin phyag bzhes chos 'byung rtsod lan sogs kyi sdom pa dang / gser pod kyi chud bcu bdun/ bi/
234b2(rnying rgyud): ma snying thig/ bde 'dus sogs kyis mtshon bka' gter gyi glegs bam du ma bzhengs pa la sogs te bshad sbub las gsum gyi phrin las rlabs po ches snga 'gyur gyi bstan pa gsal zhing rgyas par mdzad/ 'dis 'chi ba brtags ba spu'i yi ge de dgung lo bdun cu don
234b3(rnying rgyud): gsum pa la mdzad par gsal bas sku tshe yang ring por bzhugs par mngon no// des gong ra lo chen gzhan phan rdo rje la 'dus pa mdo'i chu bo bzhi rdzogs kyi dbang gtad rgya bshad pa gdams ngag phyag bzhes dang bcas pa gnang zhing / dam pa 'di ni gnubs khro phu ba'i
234b4(rnying rgyud): gdung rigs rtogs ldan chos nyid rang grol gyi yang tsha lo chen ngag gi dbang po'i gzung dpon chen zhes pa'i sras su shing pho rta'i lo la 'bras yul bkra shis gling du 'khrungs/ byis pa'i dus thugs rgod cing brtul zhugs che bas su la'ang mi 'jigs pa'i spobs pa mtho/
234b5(rnying rgyud): chung ngu nas chags bral gyi rten la 'dun pa ltar zhwa dmar chos kyi dbang phyug gi drung du dgung lo bcu gnyis pa la dge tshul dang / nyer gcig pa la bsnyen rdzogs pazhes nas su btsun pa'i mchog tu gyur/ rang gi khu bo zhwa dmar ba'i rig gnas kyi slob dpon du spyan drangs pa'i
234b6(rnying rgyud): phyags phyir 'brangs te/ s+tha ka lA pa/ snyan dag me long / sdeb sbyor/ skar rtsis/ rgya bod kyi yig rtswa sogs brda sprod yan lag dang bcas pa la mkhas par sbyangs/ chos rje nyid dang rin po che sgra ser sogs las mtshan nyid kyi gzhung ci rigs pa'ang slob
234b7(rnying rgyud): par mdzad cing chos gsungs pa rnams kyang zhar chos su gas na/ khyad par rang gi khu bo lo chen ngag gi dbang po/ mkhas grub blo gros rgyal mtshan/ gsung sbrul tshul khrims rdo rje/ lci phu ba rig 'dzin snying po/ rtse le pad+ma legs grub/ kaHthog pa pad+ma blo gros/
235a1(rnying rgyud): 'ad gas can na sa gas na / gas tu ma na gas nga san sa smra sa ngas rgyangs rgyas ga
235a2(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten chos brgyad kyi 'du 'dzes mgos pas rjes su bzang ba thams cad kyang dam pa'i chos la dang gis sbyor/ snying macud 'gram tshar gagral shing sa 'i po nyis pasan rgyun pa dgangs ngas 'ams dang gong yul du grol bar mdang bas ma mnan podon nus pa la thag ba sogs
235a3(rnying rgyud): gnag mau krol zhed med rgyang grubapa ng+ge ngas po zhug par gtod/ tid nang kyi 'du gang de 'i'adis sa khams pas mapas bstan pas 'i/ spyod rjegs ga ga sadang lamatha cad gr-I sasungs tha'i brdzogs pa mdza cang /
235a4(rnying rgyud): rnams la 'chobs cang rtag tu myong / mdon mkhas btsun pa pang gsum gyi yon na gyis ma dang / bshad grub las gsum kyi na las rnams kha' da mnyas pa'i dang nas/ dbang po rig cig nas pa dgang shig gi tog can shing byings sa gshegs so// des gnas
235a5(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas ye shes kyi yang srid gsang bdag zin las spun grub la bad+mad de/ 'di ni yab smos nyon mkhas thub chen po maud sngags brtan 'dzin gyi sras su lcags ma lag gi so la chag byang chub gling du 'khrungs/ dpung lo lda nas kyi klog gnyis ka zung bar mcher/ brkyang la la brdol
235a6(rnying rgyud): rgya nga ge bsnyen sgom pa gsan/ man ldanana'i la dugasol/ de nas rnamaso na ba thag le gyi song mi can nas pa mthun chen po'i gsang rab rnams dang / rmAkyis sogs pa gang la 'ang sbyangs pas kyi gas kyi ma thob// dzad par yab rje las na
235a7(rnying rgyud): rigs thugs gsus su brda kyang sogs bka' ga 'bye dbang 'a bshang srang mags cing bas pa sgos kyis gtan pa men/ rjes can btsug lag rgya tshe las rang tu byung shing macan zirnams spad thung dpal bzang por brtsas/ gsung chos kyang
235b1(rnying rgyud): gsan/ gzhan yang gsung sbrul tshul khrims rdoH/ lo can gzhan par / rtswa btsun sun bzang nam rgal/ rdzogs can pa 'brug klu bzang pa/ bon lung ba tshul khrims cal mtshan/ thang chos dbying sA rang thol/ 'khrul zhig tong byothos pakan sogs nyid grags dang /
235b2(rnying rgyud): rgyal tshab grags pa mchog dbyangs/ mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan sogs gsar ma ste/ gsar ting gi bla ma dam pa sum cu lhag com bsten nas mdo sngags kyi chos mtha' yas pa ngom pa med par gsan cing / bye brag 'dus pa mdo'i dbang ni/ dgung lo bachad pa la rdzan
235b3(rnying rgyud): 'chang kun bzang dpal 'byor byang chub gling du spyan drangs te yab rje dang ldan du cur lugs dang khams lugs gnyis gsan/ nyer gcig pa la lha btsun kun bzang rnam rgyal la khams lugs kyi yi ge'i steng nas gas na/ nyi shu rtsa dgu pas yos hor zla bzhi pa la gong
235b4(rnying rgyud): ra ldan grub sdings su ma hA lo tsA ba gzhan phan rdo rje'i drung du 'dus pa mdo'i rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dkyil 'khor thams cad rdul tshon gyis bzhengs par/ gnyal ba bde legs pa'i yi ge'i steng nas chu bo bzhi'i dbang gtad kyi sgom rim man ngag dang bcas pa sgrub chen gyi las
235b5(rnying rgyud): rim dang 'brel bar zhag bcu bdun gyi khongs su rdzogs par gas na/ gong lo de nyid skal ldan 'chos sbyin lhag par bstsal ba las/ 'am bu chos mi 'tshong gsungs nas su'i yang chos yon mi bzhes par phyir klog par mdzad na 'ang / rje 'di'i dbang bum grwa tshar dgu
235b6(rnying rgyud): phul ba mnyes mnyes kyis bdag gir mdzad ces grags te/ dbang gi chu bo'i snod du gzigs shing bstan pa spel ba'i rten 'brel smrig byed kyi brda' thabs bstan par mngon/ de ltar thos bsam gyi sgo 'dogs yin lugs su bcad nas/ dben pa'i gnas du mar snying po'i
235b7(rnying rgyud): lam srol ji bzhin pa thugs nyams su bzhes pas/ ma dag pa'i snang ba 'gog nus pa'i bskyed rim gyi gsal snang la reg mthong gi mtshan ma thob ste/ phrin las gang brtsams thogs med du 'grub/ rdzogs rim ka dag gzhi rdzogs 'pho 'gyur med pa'i gnas
236a1(rnying rgyud): lugs rje lta nyid rtogs pas/ 'khor 'das bden 'dzin gyi 'khri bachang / ltung phreng lhan grub 'dugs pa kyi grong du dngas pas yi ma gyi la du ma'i gzigs srung shar zhing lung bstan thob/ rang don med byeng kyi 'dzin pazhag pas gzhan pha nam pal
236a2(rnying rgyud): thugs rje rtsol med shugs 'byung gi sgo nas/ thar pa dor gnyer gyi skal ldan mchog dman mang por bshad sgrub kyi chos 'khor rgyan chags su bskor bas bstan 'gro'i phan bde rgyas par mdzad cing // khyad par gru gsung thugs kyi sras mchog gter chen chos kyi rjel zang
236a3(rnying rgyud): kyi chos thams cad tshang sngags su brtsal te rgyal tshab tu mda' bsrur nas/ dgung lo nga gnyis pa chu stag dbo zla'i nyer gnyis la dbug tsug phyar bur 'phar ba las zla ba'i zil pa skye tshil li ba dang spros dud lta bu'i rlangs pa 'phro bzhin du gzugs su'i bkod pa chos kyi dbyings
236a4(rnying rgyud): bsdus so// des lo chen chos rgyal bstan 'dzin rjes su bzung ste/ 'di ni e 'dam sngon po grod slad du lcags lug la 'khrungs/ sku tshe snga ma'i bag chags gsal bas gla rigs rnams kyis bdag spad de dwags stong gling sogs gong ma'i dgon pa rnams su spyan drang
236a5(rnying rgyud): pizlog dang cho ga phrin rnams tshogs med par thugs su chung nas/ 'gyod rgyas dpal rlig tshang du thugs gnyer la 'gyon/ gang nas pa bsod nams rin chen las rab tu byung zhing / mtshan chos rgyal bstan 'dzin du gsol/ dbang sung yang tshe rigs pa gsan/
236a6(rnying rgyud): dgongs 'dus la sogs pa'i cho ga'i tshig 'dzin dang / de dag zi thig bcas dbyangs sogs nas brtsams te/ kun mkhyen chen po'i bstan bcos sems nyid ngal gso rtsa 'grel rnams la sbyangs/ der gnubs ston grags pa dbang po la yang bzlog dang lo kyai sogs drag
236a7(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi lag len dang rtsis dkar nag kyang bslabs/ dgung lo bco brgyad pas pho byi ba'i lor gA sa'i dge bskos mdzad pas non che ba'i dper 'jog pa byung zhing / lo de'i nang du rig 'dzin phrin las lhun grub 'phyong rgyas dpal rir spyan drangs te/ sprul pa'i la
236b1(rnying rgyud): mchog phrin las num rgyal gyis dbus skrag cang yongs rdzogs la 'dus pa mdo'i dbang bskur gdams ngag gtad rgya dang bcas pa rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor du glab chen dang 'brel bar zur lugs dang / war bung dben slob kyang 'dus la ras bris kyi steng nas khams
236b2(rnying rgyud): lugs gnyis sbal ba'i tshe lhan cig tu gsan cing / phyis su'ang gnas dus ci rigs par bka' brgyad bde 'dus/ dgongs 'dus/ bi ma snying theg/ zhig gling gi gter chos sogs mang du gsan/ gzhan yang lha btsun nam mkha' 'jigs med/ gsung
236b3(rnying rgyud): sbrul tshul khrims rdo rje sogs mkhas grub kyi bla ma dam pa mang po bsten nas bka' gter gyi dbang lung khrid bka' dum dang / rgya dpon pa'i lung gis bskul bas gong rar thegs te/ nyid ston blo mchog rdo rje la/ sma ka lA pa dang / lhan dag/ sdeb sgor sogs brda
236b4(rnying rgyud): skrod yan lag dang bcas pa gsan te mkhyen par mdzad/ de ltar gsan pa rdzogs rjes e mthong glon dang mtshe mar steng du'ang ci rigs bzhugs shing / gtso bor dwags stod gleng gi dgon par ltan 'jigs te sbas tshul gyis bsnyen grub la brtson par mdzad pas nyams
236b5(rnying rgyud): rtogs bzang po 'khrungs/ spang ma las la khol ba'i mthu rtags nar mar 'ong bas yul de dag gi grong pa rnams kyang bla ma gling pa'i bka' dang 'gal na chos skyong gi bka' chang 'ong zhes 'jigs par byed/ khyad par dgung mo so gnyis pa chu stag lor dang gling du
236b6(rnying rgyud): songs te rje 'gyur med rdo rje las pad gling gi chos bka' 'ga' zhig gsan/ de dus yab rje nas gsan pa'i mdo'i dbang rgyan phyag bzhes dang bcas pa rnam par dag pa 'dug par mkhyen te/ phyi sa gad na sar spyan 'dren gnang ba
236b7(rnying rgyud): ltar byon nas rje gter chen bla ma la mdo dbang 'bul bar mdzad pas/ snga 'gyud kyi bstan pa la phan pa bla na med par gyur/ dgur po don brgyad pas bye hor zla bzhi pa la dwags stod gling gi dgon par bu gshegs so//
237a1(rnying rgyud): !da'ang bka' ma'i phyogs su thar mes dpon gsum las slob ma'i rnam grangs ji ltar mtshang pa bkar gyis btab pa dang / de dag las mchad pa' 'grangs med pas gang ga rang la da dkyus su mdzad pagasang bdag skyo phrag pa chen po dad nga
237a2(rnying rgyud): ri'i thod na gsang ba'i bdag po sngags kyi bstan pa spel ba'i slad du byon to zhes pa de'ang grags pa don dang ldan no// dus phyis ni gdul bya rdzogs pa ltar gyur nas snyigs ma'i chung pa stobs su gyur pas lnga 'gyur gyi bstan pa bags kyis nyag phra ba'i ston gyi rgya bran bzhin
237a3(rnying rgyud): bstar mi mngon pa'i gnas skabs su gangs can pa rnams kyi gtsug rgyan sgrub dpon chen po bor tsan dngag suM sra snying po'i thugs bskyed phrag par khyer bas phyog mtha' dag nas gdams pa'i chu kun grA mo thams cad bsdus te bstan pa'i chu gter chen po mi 'ju bar 'gyel bas mdo bu sems
237a4(rnying rgyud): gsum gyi ring lugs mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan chen po gsar du spong bar byed pa ni gter chen chos kyi rgyal mo 'gyur med rdo rje dang lo chen thams cad mkhyen pa dag dbang chos dpal yab sras slob ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa ste/ de la rje btsun gter chen dam pa 'di ni/ rang ga
237a5(rnying rgyud): gab rgya can gyi lung bstan lasaHbai ro khyod ni phye mtha'i byang sems te// khyod kyi 'di gong skye ba 'das pa niHskabs ma brjod 'das ye shes snying po'i donaHsems can sangs rgyas mnyam nyid khrab gang la yaHkhams gsum 'gro ba'i 'dren par
237a6(rnying rgyud): chos!/ shAg thub nye gnas An nA zhes dang \u0f7frgyal po dza dang shAn+tiM gar+d+ha dang \u0f7fbod 'dir sam+bo Ta sogs dag pa yiHskye bde tsam snang gi ma dag pa'iHphye tshul brjod du long ba'i gnas ma yinaH/ de ltar dag pa'i phye ba de dag gisaH'gro la snying rje

237b1(rnying rgyud): las 'phro mdag skye ba len mi sridaH'on kyang sems bgyid smon lam bzang po yis/ mtshams skyor mtha' yas dgro ba'i dpal nyid duHdbang phyug 'ab dang dgas rdo rje glingaHkun skyong gling dang mdo sngags gling pa sogasaHpad+ma bdag gi zab gtar bdag
