237b3(rnying rgyud): ldan rgyal po dza dang / lo ts+tshab chen po po ro tsan dang / thur po che shAkya 'byung gnas la sogs pa gang la gang 'dul gyi gu'i bkod pa mtha' yas par bstan nas don mdzad pa ste/ de yang gas ma lnga ba do'i dus 'dir bstan 'gro'i dpung gnyen du rtse sred bzung ba'i tshul ni/
237b4(rnying rgyud): gru tshe snga ma'i sku rten 'chi srid 'od gsal gyi dbyings su bsdus pa las/ rig gdangs mkha' 'gro'i glus gzhan don du bskul ba'i rkyen gyis/ ye shes kyi lu he ru ka'i rnam par bzhengs nas lhums su zhugs te/ yab gtos ston gsang bdag chen po phrin las spun
237b5(rnying rgyud): grub dang / yum rje rig lha 'dzin dbyangs can sgrol ma'i sras su me khyi'i lo dbo zla'i tshes bcu las g.yo zhing 'ja' 'od 'khregs pa sogs ngo mchor ba'i ltas dang bcas te/ grwa nang dar rgyas chos gling du sku bltams/ btsas ma thag yab rjes blo rno ba'i rten 'brel dang /
237b6(rnying rgyud): bar chad bsrung ba'i dbang bskur byin brlabs du ma mdzad/ de dus kyi yul dang bya spyod kyi rnam pa dang / de nas bzung ste lo gsum gyi sar dzo ki sngo sangs thor tshugs can zhig dang / bud med mdzes ma gnyis kyis rgyun du sri zhu byas pa'i dngos gnas rnams phyis
237b7(rnying rgyud): kyang thugs la gsal ba'i dran shes khyad par can mda'/ pang du 'tsho ba'i dus nyid nas ting nge 'dzin la dbang 'byor pa'i rnam 'gyur dang gzhon nu rol rtsed kyi tshe yang rgyal ba'i rigs sang pa'i ngang tshul dge bas blo ldan rnams dang bar mdzad/ dgung lo bzhi'i
238a1(rnying rgyud): thog yab rjel bka' brgyad gsang rdzogs kyi dbang gsan pa'i tshe yul snang thams cad la dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor los rgyas thebs pa'i gtso bo dang bla ma dbyer med du gzigs shing dbang bzhi'i sa bon thugs rgyud la thabs pa nyid/ bcu
238a2(rnying rgyud): lug gi ston bde 'dus kyi dbang gsan dus 'od gsal gyi snang bar slob dpon chen po pad+mas dbang bskur zhing byin gyis brlabs pa'i nus pas 'phel te bum dbang gi nyams myong yul snang sgyu ma lta bur gtan la phebs/ de yan chad du bri klog dang / rang lugs kyi srub da
238a3(rnying rgyud): dbang rjes gnang rab gnas lung sogs cho ga phrin rnams kyi tshig 'dzin dang / phyag bzhes thams cad tshegs med du chub ste/ de nas brtsams te ya ba rje'i sku che ba mdzad nas phrin las kyang ci rigs pa myong bar mdzad/ dgung lo bcu gcig pa la dpal ldan 'bras srungs su
238a4(rnying rgyud): khams gsum pa'i gtsug gi nor bu kun gzigs rgyal ba lnga pa'i drung du gtsug phud phul te/ mtshan dag dbang pad+ma bstan 'dzin du bstsal/ sgyid grong gi rang byung 'phags pa thog mar phebs pa dang dus 'grigs pas gong nas rten 'brel bzang zhes dgyes pas dbugs dbyung
238a5(rnying rgyud): zhing / de dus 'phags pa'i zhal zhi 'dzum chags pa'i nyams gsal ba'i thugs ka nas 'od zer nyid kyi yu la thim pa dang / bcu bdun pa la bsam yas su rje rgyal ba'i dbang po mjal ba'i tshe spyan ras gzigs kyi rnam par gzigs/ rim par kun mkhyen rgyal ba'i dbang po
238a6(rnying rgyud): lnga pa chen po dang / yab rje gsang bdag phrin las lhun grub gnyis ni/ sku dngos kyis rjes su bzung ba'i bka' dri na phul du byung bar ma zad/ phyis ye shes kyi skus kyang byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnad kyis bka' drin mtshungs pa med pa'i rtsa ba'i bla ma rnam pa gnyis dang /
238a7(rnying rgyud): gzhan yang sprin grol zab lam gsan pa'i bstan 'dzin chen po bcu drug/ zab chos sna tshogs gsan pa'i yongs 'dzin sum cu rtsa lnga rnams bsten te/ yul dus ci rigs par yongs rdzogs dge bsnyen/ byang sdom bka' srol gsum/ sngar thos pa ltar bka' brgya
238b1(rnying rgyud): ma
238b2(rnying rgyud): rje bzhi ni du chub sa sa dare re dri yin she bu hu trahU~Mtsa 6Sh+Ta myo t+yAgyi.e ye hri khye'i wi u sde yang tha tu ba tu thachu rdzar phrug mamakha'i ya zung tha'i ma khye Sh+yoSh+Ta
238b3(rnying rgyud): brim sa mams 'jig gas pa na
238b4(rnying rgyud): ma la mam sa
238b5(rnying rgyud): tha b+ta b+hi ma
238b6(rnying rgyud):  mam
239a1(rnying rgyud): nas dbang gang mas ngag bshad lung dang bcas pa mtha' rgyas grags na cing / gsang ma can gnyis kas 'gyur mdong rje rtsa la jugaso pa/ snron lam gyi 'phrul pa sad pas zab gter gyi bka' bab tsal kyang / dpung lo bco ba rgyang brgya thos
239a2(rnying rgyud): lnga pa'i chos bcul g.ya' ma lung nas reg 'dzin thugs thig/ nyer gnyis pa me lug khrums bla'i chos brgyad la rdzu 'phrul gyi bkod pas shel zag nas gshin rje gshed dregs 'joms/ so gcig pa me 'thag stag d+hA'i nyal oM dkar thag nas gur drug dang rdor sems
239a3(rnying rgyud): a rkor/ so lnga ba sngags sbal chu song tha ba'i dpral gzag stag go nas thugs kyi chen po de dgashegs can 'dus kyi chos gor thom ga du can 'dren par mdzad cing / de dgagi sa gyi tsi rigs par thag dam marnams ca/ g.ya'am snang sogs za pa ga
239a4(rnying rgyud): rkyen ngo mtshar can rnams dang / gdanas gas ting gi gzim chung / gzim sgril 'odagasal rtse dang bsam gtan rtse sogs dben pa rnams su su mtshams lo spel ma dang / zla drug ma/ zla gsum/ zla gcig gis mtha' brten pa yan gyis/ thA 'di drag
239a5(rnying rgyud): rdor sems/ bka' bkyang / thugs rje chen po/ yang phrar/ gshin rje gshed/ ha mgrin/ mkha' spyod ma sogs yi dam gyi lha sum cu rtsa lde tsam gyi bsnyen lhab dang / rdzogs pa chen po khregs chod kyi nyams bzhes la snying por dril nas/ thod rgal dang
239a6(rnying rgyud): rlung sbyor sogs kyang dus gnad dang bstan te thugs nyams su bzhes pas/ ma dag pa'i sdang ba 'gog pa'i bskyed rim la brtan pa thob ste/ las bzhi gang yang thogs med du grub/ rdzogs rim rtsa rlung thig le'i 'gros d+hA ting dag pas zhu ba de'i ye shes phyogs brkyar
239a7(rnying rgyud): 'bar/ rdzogs pa chen po rang lngang ris med kyi dgongs pa lablangs pas gzung 'dzin gyi mtshan ma rangs dgrol/ 'khor 'das thams cad gzhi med rtsa thal mnyam yangs khyab gang sa chen por byang chub/ mnyam dzes ris med 'dogs la khong sug gi ting
239b1(rnying rgyud): 'dzin la dbang 'byor/ snang kyad thams cad la shes kyi rol par dashA bas/ slob pon chen po pad+ma dang / bims/ waMm dang / sangs rgyas gas pa/ bor can/ 'tshonas/ 'ang ras/ spyanas thun mas rgyasogs na med kyag zab rdza ma 'al shes ma
239b2(rnying rgyud): mngon du sdang bas sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor spros te/ rang gter gyis mtshon pa'i bka' gter du ma'i dbang bskur zhing zab lam gyi gdams pa'i gnad thams cad lhag par bkral nas ston pa dang / rdo rje gzhon nu/ rdor sems/ yang dag/ thugs rje chen po/
239b3(rnying rgyud): zhi khro/ rnal 'byor ma sogs yi dam gyi lha du mas kyang zhal bstan te dbang bskur/ byin gyis brlabs pa dang / bde ba can dang rnga yab dpal ri sogs dag pa'i zhing khams mang por bgrod pas zhing yongs su 'byangs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la dbang 'byor pa dang / mkha' 'gro
239b4(rnying rgyud): chos skyong rnams kyis las thogs med du grub cing lung ston pa sogs ngo mtshar ba'i gzigs sdang mtha' yas/ chags thogs med pa'i mngon shes mnga' bas dus kyi 'gyur ldog sogs kyi lung bstan pa rnams kyang phyis thog tu bab pa'i yid ches kyi gtan tshigs mang du
239b5(rnying rgyud): ste ma spros so// de yang dgung lo so gcig pa yan chod du sngar thugs chung la smin byed kyi sa bon thebs pa nyid rim gyis 'phel bas bum dbang gi nyams myong yul ljang thams cad gsal stong sgyu ma lta bur gtan la phebs pas/ shas cher sku'i 'gro don spyod pa'i dus yi
239b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir/ shod chen skyi lung sogs lho byang gi yul tha dad pa du mar che bas bskyod nas sku'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis ris med kyi gdul bya bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyud la rnam grol gyi sa bon bzhag ste 'khor ba mtha' can du mdzad pa dang / so gnyis
239b7(rnying rgyud): bzhes pa me sbrul dbo zla nas bzung gsang dbang gi nyams myong rang rig gsal stong du shar te gzung 'dzin dbyings su grol bas/ gsung gi 'go don la gtso bor spyod pa'i dus yin pa'i phyir/ mchog dman bar pa'i skal ldan tshogs la zab rgyas kyi chos 'khor
240a1(rnying rgyud): bar med du bskor bar mdzad pa dang / so brgyad bzhes pa chu phag zums zla nas pho nya'i lam gyis khu ba de'i dpes mtshon pa'i don gyi ye shes rig stong bde ba chen po lhan skyes mi 'gyur ba'i dga' bzhi thugs rgyud la 'khrungs pa'i nyams
240a2(rnying rgyud): myong rim gyis 'phel bas thugs kyi 'gro don la shas cher spyod pa'i dus yin pa'i phyir/ de phyin chad spyir chos bka' ris med du gsung ba yin na'ang / khyad par zab khrid kyi gdams pa nyid chud thog tu ci smin 'debs par mdzad pas skal ldan rnams dang byung gi ye
240a3(rnying rgyud): shes zhal blta ba la btsan thabs su bkri ba'i mdzad pa kho na gtso bor bdag gir gzhes pa dang / de ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje gsum dang ro mnyam pa'i bdag nyid du gyur pas phrin las kyi 'gro don mnyam yangs khyab gdal du spyod pa'i dus yin pa'i phyir/ mdzad
240a4(rnying rgyud): spyod thams cad rang don yid byed kyi 'khri ba las rnam par grol nas/ bstan 'gro'i phan bde 'ba' zhig thugs su gcags pa'i snying stobs chen pos bshad sgrub las gsum gyi phrin las rnam par dkar bas dus 'da' ba ste/ de la 'chad pa'i phrin las ni/ gtso
240a5(rnying rgyud): bor kun mkhyen rgyal mchog lnga pa chen pos snga 'gyur rgyud 'bum rin po ches mtshon zab rgyas kyi chos skor ji snyed pa zhig gsan nas ti shrir bkur zhing / des mtshon tes phag 'bri rta ga sogs chen po'i go sar bzhugs pa'i skyes mchog du ma dang / dpon chen dpon l+ya sogs
240a6(rnying rgyud): mi che na/ bstan pa gsal bar mdzad pa'i bshes gnyen sku'i sras mched rnams dang / gsung gi sras dam pa mang pos mtshon dbus gtsang khams kong lho mon mnga' ris sogs nas dang 'dus kyi skal ldan mchog dman mtha' yas pa rnams so so'i blo dang 'tshams pa'i rdza
240a7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur bka' gter dang ljags gsar ma mdo phyogs skor sogs kyi dbang khrid bshad lung gi chos rgo du ma zhig rgyun chags su stsol ba'i 'chang phrin 'gran zla med pas bstan pa gsal zhing rgyas par mdzad pa dang / bstan pa yun ring du gnas pa'i phyir sgyu 'phrul dra ba zhi ba'i grub
240b1(rnying rgyud): bas ye shes char 'bebs/ dkyil cho ga rin chen phreng ba/ khro bo'i sgrub thabs bde chen char 'debs/ dkyil cho ga rdo rje'i phreng ba/ 'dus pa mdo'i grub thabs dngos grub char 'bebs/ dkyil cho ga dri med 'od phreng / sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor rigs bsdus kyi sgrub thabs bde
240b2(rnying rgyud): chen 'dod 'jo/ dkyil cho ga kun tu bzang po'i zhal lung / dbang cho ga byin rlabs char 'bebs/ dpal he ru ka zla gam dgu pa'i grub thabs bde chen thig le/ dkyil cho ga bdud rtsi'i nying khu/ dbang cho ga bde chen 'jug ngogs/ tshe dpag med lung lugs kyi thub
240b3(rnying rgyud): thabs/ na rag dong thugs kyi cho ga 'khor ba kun sgrol/ dong skyugs pad+ma brgya ldan gyi cho ga bde chen lam bzang sogs dang / bka' brgyad bde gshegs 'dus pa'i las byang bde ba chen po'i rnam ro la sogs bka' gter gyi grub dkyil khrid yig rnam bshad zhal
240b4(rnying rgyud): gdams sogs legs bshad kyi bka' rtsoms kyang bod chen bdun du longs pa mdzad/ sgrub pa'i phrin las ni/ rje nyid mnyam rjes 'khor yug gi ting nge 'dzin las ma g.yos bzhin du sgo ma khrid 'bogs pa rnams go yul tsam du ma lus par mngon sum rig thog tu ngo sprod cing /
240b5(rnying rgyud): dbang dus su ye shes kyi byin slob ma'i rgyud la dngos su phebs pa dang / bsnyen sgrub kyi las rab 'byams thams cad kyang bshad pa tsam du ma lus par phyag bzhes su thebs par mdzad pa yin no// bya ba las kyi 'khor lo'i phrin las ni/ gong zhabs yas phyin sogs kyis bla
240b6(rnying rgyud): nas bstsal ba dang / dad ldan rnams kyis phul ba'i dngos po rnams mdzod phugs ma'i sgo lcags mi bsdom par/ sdom pa gsum gyis chung bsdoms shing bshad grub kyi bya bas dus 'da' ba'i 'dus sde o rgyan sprin grol gling pa dge 'dun sum bkyang nye ba tsam gsar du bsdu bar
240b7(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa la rung ba'i rnyed bkur gyis mi brel bar rgyun chags pa dang / de dag gi gnas mal dang rten gsum mchod cha/ dus bzhi'i grub mchod kyi yo byad dang rnyed pa/ gzhan yang bris 'bur gyi hu brtan mang po dang / gser dngul gyi bka' 'gyur gyis mtshon pa'i glegs
241a1(rnying rgyud): pam lnga brgya brgal ba dang / snga 'gyur gyi 'brel bshad cho ga phrin la sogs pa'i bar mang po/ sku 'bum mthong grol chen mos thog drangs pa'i thugs rten du ma rnams bzhengs par mdzad cing / gtong ba phur sum chags pas ris med pa'i mdzod
241a2(rnying rgyud): sbyin gyi yul rnams la tshogs gnyis kyi zur lhag par gtong ba sogs bstan 'gro'i phan pade rgyas pa'i mdzad pa rlabs can pon bdag gir gzhes pa ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i rnam thar ro// de ltar dpung lo btu tsug nas drug tu dgu'i bar chos kyi phrin las brkyang
241a3(rnying rgyud): 'i bar dang pongs cang bskyed pa'i rnas pa smras pa hA sa das pang nga dadams pa'ala'ang ngas khyim pa'i bus bcas la/ drinas mgapasarjemadu nas pa rnams kyi spa ba kyis sa sa ma 'a ba mamengs nga
241a4(rnying rgyud): phra shin tu snyan pa rgyan chags su byung zhing de mtshungs gapur lta bu'i dri dad kyis gzims chung gyi nang thams cad khyab pa'ang byung / shar phyogs su go ma pa bdun 'gro dgos yod gsungs bzhengs te zhabs go ma bdun spos nas skyil krung gis bzhugs te/ ljang grag rig
241a5(rnying rgyud): gsum lha sngags chos gru'i ngang // mu dang ye shes rol par 'byams klas pa// zab gsang rnal 'byor chen po'i nyams len la// dbyer med thugs kyi thig ler ro gcig shog/ ces 'da' ka zhal chems kyi tshul du gsungs te/ shing rta tor zla gnyis pa'i chos gnyis kyi
241a6(rnying rgyud): nyi dros la da skye mkha' 'gro'i bslu ba yang phung po gsung ste/ phyag gnyis dril 'grol ba'i brda dang spyan lha sbyangs dang bcas skad cig la mkha' spyod du gshegs so// thugs kyi sras dang gsung gi sras kyis mtshon pa'i bu slob gter lung nas bshad pa ni/ dam ldan
241a7(rnying rgyud): chos bdag slong rgyan/ dga'i mnga' bdag yang sras sogs/ sa tho brje 'bangs skye ba'i mtha' 'gro don nus pa sum cu s+dzaHdang don thub pa brgyan brgyad/ chos kyis 'brel ba sto'i tshe gnyis/ smon lam 'brel khri phrag lngaHlas kyis 'brel pa drug kyi
241b1(rnying rgyud): bdunaHgdugs thogs bdun gyis zhabs nas 'degasaHmi chen gsum gyis mnga' thang spelaHzhes pa ltar/ gsung gi bdud rtsi bzhes pa'i zhal slob kyi gtso bo ni khams gsum pa thams cad kyi gtsug gi nor bu phyag na padra rnal dang thams cad mkhyen
241b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i sku zhabs dang / 'jam dpal mi skyong chen po'i rnam rol sde srid rin po che sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mchod yon nyi zla zung gcig dang / sku mched thun mong gi slob ma che longs tsam zhig 'og tu gsal lo// g.yu spa'i rnam 'khrul bstan pa'i nyi ma kun mkhyen d+harma shrI ni
241b3(rnying rgyud): gter gzhung las/ g.yu s+tha'i rnam 'phrul blo ldan d+harmA'i mingaHbyang sems dang brtson snying stobs ldan pa 'byungaHzhes lung gis bstan pa ltar gter chen rin po che'i gcung ngu shing po rta'i lo la sku 'khrungs/ rje gter chen bla ma'i zung nas khyabs gsum
241b4(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa'i dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa nod cing mtshan bstan 'dzin 'jam dbyangs dbang por gsol/ dgung grangs bco lnga pa la rje thams cad mkhyen pa lnga pa chen po las rab tu byung ste/ mtshan dag dbang chos dpal zhes bstsal zhing dge tshul gyi sdom pa dang / dgung kra
241b5(rnying rgyud): shu par slar yang mkhan po de nyid las bsnyen par rdzogs/ phyis kyang gong ma'i lung gis bskul ba bzhin kha rab zhal snga nas dkon mchog bstan 'dzin las snga 'gyur spad 'dul gyi sdom rgyan rnam dag bzhes/ rje gter chen bla ma las bka' grol
241b6(rnying rgyud): gsum gyi byang sdom thugs bskyed dang sngar dgung grangs bcu gnyis par rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor du rig 'dzin thugs thig gi dbang gsan pas thugs kyud smin par mdzad cing rjes su thob pa'i so byad kyi sdom pa gnyis po de yang snga ma'i sngags kyi tshul khrims las phye ba'i
241b7(rnying rgyud): de dang de'i sdom pa'i ngo bor skyes pas thugs rgyud legs par bsnams/ yi ge 'bri glog dang chog srin rnams byang chab par mdzad/ dkrung grangs bcu drug par gung thang pa chen ba zes gnyen nam kyal las sma ka lA pa dang lde' sbyor lod tshogs kyi bshad pa/
242a1(rnying rgyud): a lja nga wa d+hal sogs yig rigs rnams dang sum rtags kyi bshad pa'ang gsan te/ brda spong yan lag dang bcas pa la mkhas par byangs/ sum po don 'grub dbang bral gyi drung nas kyis dkar nag dbyangs 'chad rnams mthar \u0f7f
242a2(rnying rgyud): par mdzad/ stag lung smra ba las sa ra swa tI'i ri mo dang / tsan+d+ra pa'i yi ge bsdu ba dang ting mtha' sogs kyi bshad pa dang sdeb byor yang ba'i bya ba rnams gsan/ gter chen bla ma'i drung nas stan ngag me long gi bshad pa gsan/ snga 'gyur rang lugs kyi gang thig
242a3(rnying rgyud): dbyangs gsum rnams kyang dbyis phyin par mdzad/ gcen rgyal sras bstan pa'i nyi ma las 'dul ba'i lag len dang brda chad la mkhas par mdzad/ sems nyid ngal gso dang 'dul ba lung rig gter mdzod la sogs gzhung phal cher bzung ba tsam gyis go don thogs med
242a4(rnying rgyud): ra/ gter chen chos kyi rgyal po'i drung du snying po'i 'grel pa spar khab dang g.yung Tika sbyar ba'i gsung bshad gsan pas rgyud dngos sbas kyi don thams cad gting slebs/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen sangs rgyas chos dang las 'dul mngon phar phyin rnams kyi bshad pa
242a5(rnying rgyud): zhib tu gsan/ gung thang pa Na chen las dbu ma'i stong thun dang 'dul ba sum brgya pa'i bshad pa/ mkhas grub chos skyong rgyal mtshan las zab mo nang don gyi bshad pa rnams dang / rje bla ma'i zung nas chos rje kun mkhyen chen po dang / zur ba yab sras/ rod rlom chen po
242a6(rnying rgyud): rnams kyi gsung rab rnams mang du thos pas chud grol te thos bsam gang byas kha phyir bltas su ma song bar rgyud thog tu dril thub pa'i bka' drin thob pa yin no// zhes gsungs// khyad par gter chen bla ma las sde 'gyur mdo skye sems gsum sogs rgyud sde dang sgrub sde'i
242a7(rnying rgyud): dbang bka' bshad lung man ngag gi bka' bzhugs so cog dang / gter ma'i skor la gter kha gong 'og gis gtsos gter ston grags che ba phal mo che'i gter chos kyi dbang lung man ngag ji snyeng pa dang / de dag gi rtsa bar gyur pa rting ma rgyad 'bum gyi lung yongs rdzogs
242b1(rnying rgyud): dang / dgyes rdor nA ro mkha' spyod sogs gsar ma'i chud sde mang po'i dbang lung dang / rig 'dzin pad+ma phrin las las dus 'khor yongs rdzogs kyi dbang dang sgyu 'phrul zhi khro'i dbang gis mtshon pa gsar rnying ris bral gyi yongs 'dzin bcu phrag gnyis las so so'i/
242b2(rnying rgyud): bka' so la tha dad pa'i chos tshul rgya mtsho tsam la gsan bsam bsgom pa mdzad pa'i tshul spos kyis mi lang zhing / bstan pa la dgongs pa'i bsnyen rdzogs kyi sdom pa gnang ba'i dge slong bzhi brgya dang zhe bdun/ dge tshul tshig stong nyis brgya go brgyad/ dgun
242b3(rnying rgyud): grangs zhe brgyad nas bzung drug cu re bzhi'i bar dbyar dgun gnyis su skal ba mchog dang ldan pa'i blo gsal rig pa 'dzin pa'i dge 'dun drug cu skor re la gsang ba snying po'i rgyud kyi chos 'khor chags med du bskor/ sdom gsum rnam nges/ phar phyin/ 'dul bsogs
242b4(rnying rgyud): gzhung chen mang por yang bshad pa mdzad/ sgyu 'phul zhi khro'i dbang kho na'ang tshar brgyad/ mdo dbang tshar gsum/ dong sbugs tshar lnga la sogs pas mtshon pa'i bka' gter gsar rnying gi dbang lung sprin khrid gdugasan thams cad lan grangs gsum bzhir ma
242b5(rnying rgyud): 'chad par med pa lta bu dang / khyad par dpal ldan sa s+ya pa bdag chen dag dbang kun dga' bkra shis la gter gsar gyi dbang lung yongs rdzogs dang / bug rje chen po'i sprin khrid/ phur pa spu gri'i dbang sog chos bka' shin tu mang ba gnang / dgung grangs de dgu pa chu 'brug lor mdo khams
242b6(rnying rgyud): chab mdor spyan drangs pa bzhin phebs te 'phags pa lha rgyal ba rgya mtsho dang / zhi ba bzang po dang / ngag dbang srul sku bcas la gter gsar skor gyi dbang lung khrid dang bcas pa/ bla ma gsang 'dus/ nyang gter drag dmar/ phur pa spu gr-i/ na rag dong sngags/
242b7(rnying rgyud): thugs rje chen po rgyal po lugs kyi dbang khrid sogs gsar rnying ris med kyi dbang lung man ngag gi bdud rtsi mang pos thugs rgyud smin cing grol bar mdzad/ sgra snyan sdeb sbyor sogs tha snyad rig pa rnams kyang don gnyer so so'i blo dang 'tshams par char lnga drug re ma 'chang
243a1(rnying rgyud): pa med pa sogs mdor na dam pa 'di nyid kyi su tshe ril por ma bas tshul gsum gyis bstan pa'i bya ba ma chen po mdzad pa'i dang nas rdzogs pa chen po rang snang ris med kyi dgongs pa mngon du gyur pa'i 'phags pa'i sa chen po la gnas padun
243a2(rnying rgyud): cod pa med la/ bstan pa yun re du gnas pa phyir mdo dang sku 'phrul gyi dgongs don 'brel ba'i shing chen po sngon med pa'i bstan btsas/ rgyu 'phrul na cung gas pying la jigags bdag dgongs can/ skrod na gsang bdag zhal yang / dkyil 'khor pos
243a3(rnying rgyud): bsangs kyi nam gzhugags la thun cu 'grel/ mdod pang rnam pa ga sang rig ma nga ga giganadugs kyang sngon ma/ yan lag myal 'khod rnams kyi thub dkyi la dang sa chub 'ang 'a / klung dang man ga gis lkog ci dril ba'i dbang cag rdo rje'i thebams
243a4(rnying rgyud): lcag pog rin chen 'od kyi snang ba/ zur 'debs dpag pas ma nye ma/ thugs rje chen po bde gshegs kun 'dus kyi rnam pa shad dang kho na nyid snang ba'i 'od/ sdom gsum rnamangs kyi 'grel pa legs pa shang ngo mtshur dpag bsam snye ma sogs dang / gzhan yang
243a5(rnying rgyud): sngags phyi nang gi sgrub thabs/ rjes gnang / dbang / bsnyen yig/ khrid yig/ tha snyad rig lam gyi bstan bcos sogs legs bshad phun sum tshogs pa'i gter chen por mngon sum du gyur pa'i bu sta ka drug tu longs pa bzhugs/ u mched lhan cig pa'i gsung gi
243a6(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi myangs pa'i slob ma'i tshogs kyang / sa s+ya bdag chen kun dga' ba la shis/ 'phags pa lha rgyal ba rgya mtsho ston 'khor/ gsung sbrul ngag dbang kun bzang rdo rje/ thugs sras srul su/ rgyal ba'i sras mchog pad+ma 'gyur med rgya mtsho/ yid bzhin legs
243a7(rnying rgyud): prab/ rin chen rnam rgyal/ 'od mchog sbrul phra/ thang 'brog sbrul sra/ bon srang sbrul cu/ yon do sbrul sku/ khams pa sbrul hU~M kun dga' brtan 'dzin/ dris pa sprul phra/ dpal sbrul sra/ zangs la mkhar sbal sra/ nga la'i bu chog tu ba
243b1(rnying rgyud): dbang bshad sgrub rgya mtsho/ rong pa rdzogs chen pa/ khams pa rdzogs chen sbrul sku/ kaHthog rgyal sras/ kong po rbag sku s+ye/ sna bo gdung brgyad/ me rag bla ma sogs dang / gzhan yang lung rig sba ba'i mkhas pa dang / nyams myong ldan pa'i grub pa can
243b2(rnying rgyud): dgrangs kyis mi lang bas zhabs la gtugs shing bka' srol gyi brgyad pa 'dzin nus pa'i bshes gnyen kho na'ang shin tu mang po byung bas deng sang gi dus su snga 'gyur bka' ma'i phyogs la bshad sgrub kyi sgo ma nub tsam dang lung gi mtha' brten pa ma chang tsam du thos bsam byar yod pa
243b3(rnying rgyud): 'di ni/ dam pa 'di dag gi bka' drin kho na las byung ba yin par lnga 'gyur rjes zhugs da lta dang / slad kyis 'byon par 'gyur ba thams cad kyis shes par bya dgos shing sku mched 'di dag gis mdzad pa'i bstan bcos rnams kyang ngo bo'i sgo nas 'phags yul nas
243b4(rnying rgyud): bsgyur ba'i sngon gyi slob dpon chen po rnams kyi bstan bcos dang khyad par dmigs su med pa'i legs bshad che ba'ang mngon sum gyis grub cing rang lugs bstan pa mun pa ltar mi gsal ba'i skabs su sdang byed kyi sgron ma sbar bas 'chi ka ma'i bdud rtsi lta bur gyur pa'i
243b5(rnying rgyud): phyir kun bzang rdo rje 'chang dang rdo rje chos sogs rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras kyi gsung dang dbyer med pa'i rim gro bskyed par 'os pa'i phyir/ nga lam 'dir yang snying po'i 'grel pa dgongs rgyan dang / spyi don zhal gyi lung rnam pa gnyis po sgyu 'phrul gsang snying gi skor dang rtsa
243b6(rnying rgyud): grel stabs gcig tu bkod pa'i rgyu mtshan kyang de yin no// yang rje btsun gter chen de nyid kyis 'o bran dpal gyi dbang phyug gi zlos gang du gter lung gis zin pa ltar chos bdag tu ngos 'dzin gnang ba da la'i hu thog tu ngag dbang bshad sgrub rgya mtsho zhes rig pa dang grol
243b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i grogs pa can yang dag pa'i lam gyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen por gyur pas khong nyid kyang dbang rnon chos kyi rjes su 'brangs pas gter kha gong 'og gis mtshon pa'i gter chos rnams kyi dbang lung man dag yongs su rdzogs par gter ston rin po che dang / mkhan chen lo
244a1(rnying rgyud): ba dang / rgyal pa'i sras mchog phra mched rnams kyi zhabs la gtugs shing bum pa grang byo'i tshul gyis gsan bsam rgya chen po mdzad/ bsgoms pas drod tshad brnyes shing mngon shes dang las bzhi la rang dbang pyor pa'i grub par/
244a2(rnying rgyud): go 'phang mthon por gshegs/ byang phyogs kyi skye bo thams cad snga 'gyur zing ma bka' gter gyi gdul bya'i zhing du mdzad pas deng sang gi bar du phyogs der rgyal ba'i phrin las nges don mchog gi 'bab stegs cung zad mchis pa ni rje de nyid kyi bka' drin khon las byang
244a3(rnying rgyud): ba yin cing rnying chud tshang ma skra chos su bzhengs pa dang / gter chos gang gas na thams cad kyi glegs bam bzhengs pa rnams kyang bstan 'gro'i mchod sdong chen po 'ba' zhig tu gyur to// yang / gang thog tu bar skabs su bu 'bor ba bkra shis rgya mtshos zhig po ring
244a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i drung du bla ma zhig gtong bar zhus pas gcong ba pad+ma rgyal mtshan mngags shing ka/ thog tu bzhugs/ de'i slob ma stag bu re khe 'bri rgyad du 'khrungs pa pad+ma bla gros zhes grags pa zhig mkhas grub chen por gyur nas dbus su gong ra lo tsA ba dang / g.yung sbrul tshal khrims
244a5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje/ zur chen chos dbyings dang grol sogs gyes chen mang po dang thab chos kyi bdud kyi stob res mdzad cing / dbus phyogs su rgyan dkon pa'i chos bka' du ma nyams pa'ang gsos/ khams phyogs 'dir snying thig ya bzhi dang / bung mchongs pa'i yang
244a6(rnying rgyud): tig nag po sogs chos rtsub chen po du ma spel ba sogs rnying ma'i bstan pa la su drin mchog tu che zhing su tshe grub pa kho nar dril ba'i bya bral 'ba' zhig pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa sogs mkhas btsun bzang po'i pha rol tu byon pas kun mkhyen klong chen pa'i sprul par grags/
244a7(rnying rgyud): bstan bcos kyang yang tig gi chub chos don gsal me long sogs pod chen gsum du longs pa mdzad/ de nyid kyi dpon brgyur stag bla'i rabs kyi phreng ba mang du byon pa thams cad kyang mkhas shing dngos grub brnyes pa sha stag byon/ khyad paras bla sangs rgyas rdo rjes
244b1(rnying rgyud): grong ra lo chen par hi ta'i drung nas ning chud pal che ba'i dpe lung gnyi ga'i rgyan blangs te phyogs 'dir srel/ der mchod pa rnams phyis kun bzang khyab gdal lhun grub kyi rigs dpon kun bzang rnam rdul dang / kun pazang blo gros su mched kyis sbyin gling dang tu
244b2(rnying rgyud): rin po che'i khabs la gtugs te dpe rnams tshang ba dang / bka' lung rnams kyang rgyal ba'i sras mchog yid bzhin legs grub las lus shing dpe lung gnyis ka'i rgyan phyogs 'dir tshang bar mdzad pas bstan pa la phyag rjes shin tu che/ rgyun de nyid las rdzogs chen
244b3(rnying rgyud): srul pa'i bu rin po che 'gyur med theg mchog bltan 'dzin gyis bka' luta dang glegs pam bcas thugs rtsol chen pos grub par mdzad cing / bdag cag gi 'dren mchog mtshungs pa med pa de nyid kyis kyang smin gling rgyal ba'i sras mchog rin po che rnam rgyal gyi dngos
244b4(rnying rgyud): zhal slob stag bu sbal su mdo rgyud rgya mtsho'i sde zhes bstan pa yongs rdzogs kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po de nyid las/ glu 'jal zhi khro// na dag dong lkugs/ yang dag zla gam dgu pa/ sangs rgyas mnyam gyor/ 'dus pa chen po mdo'i dbang rnams gter
244b5(rnying rgyud): chen su mched yab sras rnams kyi chos khrigs kyi yi ge legs bshang rmad du byung ba'i steng nas gsan pa dang // gsang ba snying po'i 'grel pa dgongs rgyan dang zhal lung gnyis lhar gyi bshad pa ga den rnams kyang legs par dpyis phyin par mdzad/ gyad 'bum spyi'i srang yang
244b6(rnying rgyud): tshang migs na cing gzhan la la na gsum bzhir 'chang khrel mdzad pa sogs kyis phyogs 'di gsang ba sngags kyi bsam nyin mo ltar skar yang gas pa pa mdzad pa yin no// / khyang par snyigs mi las kyang ches snyigs mar gyur pa'i dus kyi mtha' ma 'dir bka' gtar
244b7(rnying rgyud): gyi brtan pa spyid dang rgyad par mchog khab pardzogs pa rtson pa snyi theg 'dags pa sbying ba'i btan bdus kyi chung pa tu ra ma mngon pa ltar gyur ba slang yang gzhi bzhengasas pa spong ba mang da pa zan/ tha ma dgengs pa 'dus pa'i lung bstan ga rgyam las/
245a1(rnying rgyud): ma 'ongs pa'i tshe lung zin thams cad la mi 'gyur ba'i brda rtags gsum gyi gzar yong ba de nyid las/ gang yang ma 'gyur brda rtags gsum dang ldanaH/ lus la swA sde snying gar sha mtshan raHngag ni ldan 'gyur sngags chog rtsol ba

245b1(rnying rgyud): ma'i tshul gyis bstan pa'i sgor zhugs par mdzad nas/ sdom pa gsum gyi bdud rtsis thugs chung legs par gtams shing bka' gter gyi chos tshul spyi dang bye brag la gas na bsam rgya chen po mdzad pa na rgyal ba'i sras mchog rnams kyi tshad med pa'i snying rje chen pos gzhan
245b2(rnying rgyud): don kho nar dgongs pa'i spyod pa rlab po che skyes pa'i rabs thams cad du bapyangs pa'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i smon lam dang / rigs kyi sa bon dus su sad pa las srid pa'i ngang tshul ltar snang ji ltar legs kyang sdug bsngal gyi yo lang 'ba' zhig tu gzigs pa'i blo shes
245b3(rnying rgyud): dang nges 'byung tshad med pas drangs pa'i thugs kyis chos sde de gar lo gsum du snying po'i sgrub pa la rtse gcig tu gnas pa'i bcad rgya mdzad pa'i tshe/ slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang 'jam dpal bshes gnyen 'od gsal gyi ngang du mjal te/ brda don smos pa
245b4(rnying rgyud): med pa'i dbang mang po bskur ba'i mthar rang nyid la thim par gyur pa'i nyams snang byung bas de tsam nas rtogs pa byang rgyal tu skyes/ nyams kyi 'dzin stangs dud/ las zung dbang du 'dus/ sdang ba'i rdzun lugs rdi pa/ rig pa brtul zhugs kyi gdeng dang ldan par
245b5(rnying rgyud): gyur nas sngon gyi skye ba dran pa sogs dag pa'i snang ba kho nar 'byams klas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen brten nas tha snyad dang gzhung lugs rnams la sbyang brtson gyi ngal du sa brten ma dgos par rngon kyangs kyi rang stobs ston pa'i rtsa la rdzogs pa'i rig pa phyogs med du grol zhing
245b6(rnying rgyud): yongs spyod 'khor lo'i mdud pa dbyings su zhig pas/ rtsa rlung gi rgyu ba rnams yi ge'i sprin du spo bas grag pa thams cad chos tshig gi sgra dbyangs su dang rdol du gyur pas snang ba thams cad dpe char shar zhing byas tshad man ngag tu go bas bla ma dgongs pa dbus pa'i cho ga'i rma

246a1(rnying rgyud): zhig la chos sgra ye shes kyi DA ki ni mngon sa mdu mngal zhing shing gi za ma tog gcig phyag tu gtad de/ dag pa'i 'khod kyi snang ba laHkhyod ni khro srong ste thu btsan yinaHma dag gdul bya'i drung ngo duHkhyod nI se ge'i ras pa yin

246a4(rnying rgyud): sku'i stan du gsol nas dngos gter ram dag snang dgongs gter gyi tshul gang rung 'byung bar som nyi bral mod kyi/ 'on kyang re zhig gsang ba ga la che tshul gsungs bzhin thugs las chung ngu'i ngang nas lo bdun gyi bar du rlung phyogs tsam du'ang ma bsgrags par rtog med
246a5(rnying rgyud): kho nar mdzad do// de nas dgung lo so gcig pas yos lor dpal gyi mchims phu bre gu dge'u 'og lhun grub rang byung gi phug par lo gsum du snying po'i srub par rtse gcig bzhugs pa'i tshe/ mgyon bde gshegs snying po ri rab mar me'i rgyal mtshan kun mkhyen
246a6(rnying rgyud): bsam yas pa dag gi dbang po'i ye shes kyi su lan gsum du mjal ba ste/ de dag kyang lan dang pos brjod bya don gyi rgyud dang / rjod byed tshig gi brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i don rgyud kyi dgongs pa 'pho bar mdzad pa sku'i byin rlabs dang / gnyis pas mdzod
246a7(rnying rgyud): chen bdun dang shing rta gsum sogs kyi bstan pa gtad nas de sa ngon mthar thug gis grub mtha' bzang po 'di nyid 'dzin cing / gzhan la'ang rgya cher ston pa'i sgo mi nub pa'i phyir 'chad pa dang rtsom pa rgya chen pos gzhan don phrin las la dbang brnyes pa'i kun mkhyen chos kyi
246b1(rnying rgyud): grul po nyid kyi don gyi rgyal chab tu dbang bskur zhing rjes su gnang ba'i gsung gi byin gyis brlab pa dang / gsum pas brjod du med pa'i de khon nyid rig pa rtsal gyi byin rlabs 'pho ba'i dbang bskur nas don kyang rtogs pa'i bdag por rjes su gnang zhing thugs kyis byin gyis brlang
246b2(rnying rgyud): pa'o// de'i tshe bstod pa dpyid kyi rgyal mo'i rgyang glu bya ba mdzad/ kun mkhyen chen po'i gdams pa rnams kyi don thugs la shar ba bzhin man ngag gi yi ge kun mkhyen zhal lung sogs than thun mdzad/ gu ru chos kyi dbang phyug gi gter bya na dge bsnyen mkha' ri'i zhus lan du/

247b6(rnying rgyud): dbyung na dga' sun padre ma sgri ma mched kyis stan drangs pa ltar dbal ldanas su'i thom pa kyang gi gtsug la gakhang du meng sa/ sa s+ya bachen po zhu mched la phreng rdzob dang zhwad nas brnyas pa'i thar ba'i dbang na/ klod chen snying gi cig po dbang sang dang mnangs
247b7(rnying rgyud): slong ba'i grogs kyi tshu kyi kyis thags cung 'gas par gnyims par dzus pa bangs med da gangs su dag pa'i man pa las / de sa bla mardzogs canapal ya dag pa nga lus / nga bas yang dag pa
248a1(rnying rgyud): h+yanachul drangs pa da nas nam rmu thugasar tha bar ma rgyug mnan// gzhan yang yang dag grogs sa ba cos na ti sa rnams sa nyams pa gsas pa nogs phyogs dang bstan mgro dan rgya cha bajam stab bar mang / gzhan
248a2(rnying rgyud): ron du mtsho lnga dgon ci thul lus sman drangs shing phyogs de'i gyi bo rnams kyang mthong thos don ldan du mdzad/ gnas can rnams sa mchod pa dang / bdud ci sman gyi grub pa spang par can dum mdzang/ zhal ba dang ldan pa'i slob ma rnams la gdas sa dang
248a3(rnying rgyud): dri dang / dbang srang dums smin par mdzad/ bas ma las ri mthi la/ kha 'jug/ shel zag/ song ba can par sgo rnams sa bdud ci bsrub pa dang / zhe nus dbang drag gi sbyin pa sreg/ tshogs mchod/ gtor ba zlog sogs pas na 'gro ba
248a4(rnying rgyud): thabs du ma dang / gnas chen gsum gtso bor gyur ba'i chos rgyal mes dpon gyis bzhengs pa'i gtsug lag khang rnams sa mchod pa rtswam/ baH/ stob/ khri'i bar lan grangs shin tu mang ba dang / srog pasgra khon 'ang ba grangs kyis mi lang ba/ ring po
248a5(rnying rgyud): tshe'i tshwa tshogs pas bslab pa'i phragasung thugs kyi rkyen ldang par du 'phags padu ma dang / mtshang ba'i yo byang rgya dngos phun sum tshogs pa kho na las bsgrubs par mdad nas dbul sbyor mdzad pa sogs 'khor lo gsum mo phrin las kyis dus 'da' bar gyur cing /
248a6(rnying rgyud): na/ 'ab ga/ na gyi mye dug dang / tha~Ms sas par rlom pa'i marnas pa dang / slob pa ladril pa'i sgrub pa pa na na/ rang ba'i kyi bstan pa la grugs pa'i bcwa thags pan cung byang rje 'do kyi yum gakhon dan
248a7(rnying rgyud): kau nga de dag rnam la gang la gang 'thams kyi 'jug pa'i chos dka' da ba srang / sber byed/ dge rjeg 'dug rdzogs bsrab cu dang bcas pa sgo ji snyed pas mngon mthong ngangs legs kyi gnas srabakri par mdzad pa'i tshul mtha' dag pa ni spos kyis mi yang gi/
248b1(rnying rgyud): masas dang gas can das pa rnams kyim pa gas sa das/ thal ngas myu nas thubs tshang / nga tho ra thor ba ga du dang bya ba u mags yangs sa /
248b2(rnying rgyud): gyiche ba mdzang / baspyan bcas snang kyad ma gsas dang 'brel pa'i brjod pa dang rje byed can sa mtshogs ning srang rin man gagig nas rgya zer 'bres pa smras ma thag pa rnams gtsa bor gra dpa'i sa bcwagacig tu yangs pa tsam pazhugs byed / dga'i dus su rje
248b3(rnying rgyud): theg pa'i bstan pa 'dren kyang thel ba'i chos kyi myo ba rgya chen po bskor basbyin pa dang / dadang yang bskal byalas bgrel pa par brtan 'tha bang gan dang lagag cig par 'jig pa med pa jig pa gdugs kyi sgras gzugs shing ba pa kyi 'i
248b4(rnying rgyud): thun me 'chid par ga shAr gsol ba 'debs sa / 'di thas pa/ de nyid rtsal pa chos mdod thung bas srid pa 'du 'a byu / 'a ba'o// bstan pa na rdzun nga ma dang sA mas 'ang bzhin ma byung ba'i// yin tun bgrangs lasu 'dzi zhi gas
248b5(rnying rgyud): srin tho'i bya ba'i 'bras rdzogs pa'i// dam pa'i dpag pas ma dga' tsha 'o ba'i ma pa gsumanal bzlomathos pa rnamatho par rkyen cing // bas mas pas dang kyi da the ldag mthal yon// bsgobs pas thub tus 'dod dgung 'dro ba ngas sa
248b6(rnying rgyud): bu'i dang pornam pa rnams ces// thos pa'i mtha' can thas pa'i rgyas nyi / 'ang bzhan gnas pa dab tu thobs byar pas// rnam pa'i chos na tu bang bzhinadu/ gzigs pa'i spyan dus ba bdang bal bas// mi bad pan tig dres son shes byal bad //
248b7(rnying rgyud): smos pa'i tshul gyis dri skyed ma khye gyur bas// nam 'gyur sangs rgyas tshogs bas gtsugan// cig car 'chang ba'i me yang ba'i bgyur/ khri na rgyag ca dru tho drig byed bral// ma spang byud 'bab ba deb na // 'drug gas /
249a1(rnying rgyud): 'dzin sde snod mtho ras klung // dgongs brda brgyud pa'i ral par bsgyings pa la// 'phags yul mkhas dang grub pa'i rna ba la// nye bar babs shing thugs kyi bum pa ru// legs par 'khyil ba'i bdud rtsi gangs can 'dir/
249a2(rnying rgyud): drang srong du ma'i mgrin pa'i rgyan gyur pa// nam dag grub mtha' shing rta'i grol brgya yis// phyis pa'i lam bzang ldang byed 'jig rtenan// nyi ma lta bu'i khyu mchog pa zhes rnams kyi// dang tshul 'di la mi bsngags shes ldanaH// gang gi namathar
249a3(rnying rgyud): bsil zer gyis reg pas// 'dir sdang dga' ba'i chu skyes nyams byed cing // des 'byang chu yis rab brlan steng 'thung dkar// zhi ba'i phyogs su grol ba'i 'dzum dkar ston// mun pas byugs pa'i gling 'dir dam chos kyi// bstan mchog zla ris sdang
249a4(rnying rgyud): byas bka' brin mtha'// 'chi med gnas las nges par brgal ba yi// mtha' yas yon tan brjod pas ci zhig longs// 'on kyang chu thig gcig gis chu gter bzhin// rab tu dang ba'i blo yis phyogs tsam zhig/ bsnyad pa des kyang dpag dka'i rnam thar gyi//
249a5(rnying rgyud): gnas su blta ba'i spobs pa thob par 'gyur// dkar min las kyis 'khor par dam bcings pa'i// brnag dka'i sdug bsngal gyis gtses bdag 'dra yang // dam pa'i rnam thar 'di lta'i rdzas bslab ste// 'dren mchog rnams dang mdzad pa mtshung
249a6(rnying rgyud): spyad shog/ bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa thams cad kyi snying po rig pa 'dzin pa'i sde snod rdo rje theg pa snga dgyur rgyud sde rin po che'i rtogs pa brjod pa lha'i rnga bo che lta bu'i gtam las bstan pa de nyid 'jig rten du ji ltar bamyangs pa'i tshul rags
249a7(rnying rgyud): btsam bshad pa'i skabs te gnyis pa'o// /

249b2(rnying rgyud): sa
249b3(rnying rgyud): gus gro mdze mo na rmog
249b4(rnying rgyud): pa na

249b6(rnying rgyud): byang chub phyogs su mdza' ba ma yin nam gnon pa
250a1(rnying rgyud): ma rgya
250a2(rnying rgyud): m+b+ha rgyu
250a3(rnying rgyud): pa tan
250a4(rnying rgyud): bstan mchogs chen mngon rlom stobs ldan las bcad nas/ mi bdag 'di yi legs byas dpung pas rnam par 'dzin//
250b1(rnying rgyud): sa bdag 'ga' zhig rdzas ni du ma glu dang rol mo'i mngon sbyor la yang god par 'gyur// 'ga' zhig chud zos mi bdag ro yi yul la sred pas chos kyi bya ba la ma byin// rdzas rnams gang zhag sdig pa'i slad du zad par byed pa de ni de yi sgeg pas bcings// de phyir po/
250b2(rnying rgyud): mchog rnams kyis gzhan gyi phyir du nor rnams ma lus par ni sa dang ba mdzad// yang des sems ni snying rje'i chus bkrus pas// dpag dka'i yon tan du ma'i gzugs 'dzin pa// de la zhi ba chen po'i phyogs 'dzegs pa'i// mngon mtho'i lam yang them skas
250b3(rnying rgyud): bzhin du snang // grags pa'i me tog dar ba'i mdzes spug gis// 'apung po kun gyi brtan pa 'phrogs pa bzhin// chos ldan rgyal srid kun gyi snying sdug pas// zla ba bye ba'i khengs pa tshar gcod bzhin// bsod nams gser gyi khams las grub gyur pa'i//
250b4(rnying rgyud): sde bzhi'i snying po rab mthong gi bcu'i rtsibs// yang dag smon lam brgya yi khor yug can// las kyi byed pos lha 'di'i sug par gtad// yon tan dri bzangs rgyas pa'i gter// gtong ba'i ge sar 'khrigs gyur pa'i// mi bdag dang tshul pad+ma la// kun dga'i spang
250b5(rnying rgyud): rtsi rab tu mngar// e ma rin chen du ma yi// 'byung gnas gtom gyi bdud rtsi'i gter// cha shas lhung ba'i rna ba yang // legs byas ro yis lci bar byed// gang du'ang phyogs su ma lhung ba'i// nyi ma lta bu'i rgyal bstan yang // bsod nams 'bab stegs
250b6(rnying rgyud): mngon mtho ba'i// sa skyong 'di dang nye snyam bgyid// dam pa'i rang bzhin brtan ldan cing // spyod tshul dag pa'i shing gis 'khril// sbyin pa'i grib bsil rgya che ba'i// dpag bsam sar pa 'di phyud do// gsum pa bstan pa de nyid las deng sang grangs
250b7(rnying rgyud): ri'i ljongs 'dir ji tsam snyed pa dag phyi mtha'i bar du mi nub cing 'phel ba'i btsas su mi'i dbang pos chos sbyin mi zad pa'i phyi mor bsrubs pa'i tshul bshad pa la gsum ste/ sngon gyi dus su byung ba'i log par bltas pa'i phyogs bsal ba dang / rnam dkar byed pa
251a1(rnying rgyud): po'i lo rgyas 'chad pa dang / de dag gi bya ba dngos so// dang po ni/ de la 'phags pa 'jam dpal dbyangs kyi rnam 'phrul gangs can gyi lha bcan po 'i slong lden bcan ma thugs partsed phul du blang bas pa kha bcan pa'i gdal ba rnams
251a2(rnying rgyud): bsod nams dam pa'i bgo skal du brgyad pa gsum las babs pa'i gsang sngags bla na med pa 'od gsal rdo rje'i snying po la sogs mchog tu zab pa'i rgyud rje mkha' 'gro dang rig pa 'dzin pa du ma'i thugs bcud thun mong gi spyod yul du mgyur pa mang po zhig bod 'dir grub pa'i
251a3(rnying rgyud): slob dpon chen po mtsho skyes zhabs dang / bi ma la mi tA sogs kyi byin rlabs las byung mod kyi/ de dag la rjes su yi rang bar byed pa dang sngon gyi chos rgyal dang sprul pa'i lo ba Na chen po rnams kyi rnam par thar pa la phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa yin te/ 'di ltar bstan
251a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i gzugs brnyan tsam yang med pa'i gdol spyod mun pa'i gling gnas skabs kyi bde 'bras com re ster ba'i 'tshe ba chos su slab la gtan gyi skabs su re ltos 'cha' dgos pa'i skal ba ngan pas nyams nyes par gyur pa la sprul pa'i rgyal pos chos kyi sgron me spang bar
251a5(rnying rgyud): brtsams pa'ang nag phyogs kyi 'byung po marungs pa rnams 'khrug pa'i cho 'phrul 'thor drung drug po mi bzad pas gzhan dbar du gyur par nye ba'i cha slob dpon chen po pad+ma'i zhabs kyi thugs rjes lha srin gdug pa can du gyur ta tsug btul nas bod rnams chos ci bder byed chog/
251a6(rnying rgyud): pa mdzad/ gtsug lag khang dang chos 'khor ba zhengs/ sngon chang ma grags pas chos skad tsam slob pa la'ang blo bu chung ba'i bod nams la 'bad pa chen pos chos kyi srol btsugs/ rab tu byung ba btub 'am mi btub thog mar nyams sad pa nas brtsams
251a7(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa rin po che thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam gyi mang gzhi bzhengs su bting / sde snod gsum dang gsang sngags kyi chos tshul rgya mtsho tsam sprul pa'i lo paN rnams kyis 'gyur/ 'thor ba bsdus/ gcus pa bsrangs/ gzhi gtan la bab
251b1(rnying rgyud): la nyams 'og tu bcug/ nyan bshad bsgom gsum gyis gtan la phabs nas rgyal khams dkar 'jam du btang nas thar pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam la bag yangs su sung chog pa 'di sngon byon pa'i mkhan sa 'a chos rgyal sprul ba'i lob Na de rnams kyi bka' drin yin pas ma// de /
251b2(rnying rgyud): gyir phyis 'gyur ba la grub mtha' 'dzin pa'i mkhas pa dang lo tsA ba rnams kyang sngon gyi chen po de dag gis lam grol btod pa'i ba shul du dka' ba med par 'jug tu yod pa dang / rang gi blo gros de'i sngon mar song ba la ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin pa'i khar sngon gyi rgyud 'ga' zhig tu gar na med pas
251b3(rnying rgyud): bod du byas par bsgrags pa sogs phrag dog gis dbyen bcos pa shas shig byang mod kyi/ rgya gar na med pa tsam gyis kyang yang ngag ma yin par mi 'grub ste/ rgya gar du yod pa'i rgyud rnams rgya gar rang nas byang ba ma yin cing lha klu gnod sbyin mkha' 'gro la sogs pa'i gnas dang /
251b4(rnying rgyud): 'dzam bu gling gi cha shas za hor dang / sham+ba la dang / sing+ga la'i ri ma la ya dang / oM rgyan dang / 'gro lding gi yul sogs gnas chen po gzhan dang gzhan rnams nas grub pa'i slob dpon chen po rnams kyis spyan drangs nas der byon pa yin pas rgya gar na mi bzhugs pa tsam gyis chung
251b5(rnying rgyud): yang dag min da'i khyab pa med la/ gal te yul der bgrags pa 'ga' re yod srid kyang lan de tsam byin pas mthong mi nus te sngon gyi sprul pa'i lo pa Na 'phags pa'i sa la bzhugs pa rnams yul nyer bzhi la sogs par rdzu 'phrul gyis byon pa yin na der so skyes 'bagod par mi nus pa'i
251b6(rnying rgyud): ro// nA mtshan da dag namang ma can pa ma shas kyang chos kyi gtumami thus par ga grangs pa'i mkhas can par thamapas gas sngags rdza 'gyur la gyis 'gyur ba rnams las byung par dra 'phags pa'i che btsun mad nas gsungs te/ dang po ldan drer yon padadag
251b7(rnying rgyud): nga rI/ sde 'gyur gyi yon pa dag 'phags pa rigs gsum mgon po rnam pargyal po'i tshul bzung ba mnga' bdag mes dpon rnam gsum yin pas phyi 'gyur ba rnams kyi yon bdag dang mi 'dra/ gnyis pa gang du bskur zhing gtan la phab pa'i gnas ni/ sngon sprul du'i/
252a1(rnying rgyud): smra sa su tun kun sa sa
252a2(rnying rgyud): sa sa pa sa sa
252a3(rnying rgyud): na sa nga/ na sa tshun pa mangs pas rdzu sa yi
252a4(rnying rgyud): gra nga/ la na nas thal tegs pa cos yin/ dgam cananas gci nga gnyis tes da sems pa / rkyen rgyam kyi pa / rlom gas sa rgyas ba tham sadus khye/ dgas /
252a5(rnying rgyud): byangs na ma dus /

252b1(rnying rgyud): 'o brtan pa gyid dkyi ba gabs der rnam rig srin zhing gser cung zad yod pa thams cad rgyabal du 'gro ba'i zol zhig dang / mtha' gcig tu bstan pa dang sems can gyi ched du yin na rjes su yi rang bar gyur la/ 'di ltar phrag dog gi kun klong can phal cher zhig ni mkhas da /
252b2(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa dang / gzhan gyi rnyed bkur la chags pa dang / grags pa don du gnyer ba dang / rang gi bla ma dang skal mnyam gyi bshes gnyen la 'gran sems phrag dog gi dbang gis rkang pa'i 'khor lo bskor ba'ang mang ste med pa'i phyag dpe rnams grogs kyis chul dor ba'i rnamathar kyis shes
252b3(rnying rgyud): par nus la/ de'i phyir kun mkhyen rong pas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa gra ma nyams pa'i dus su/ sprul pa'i lo tsA bas bka' 'gyur ba med par gtan la phab nas/ shes bya dngos po'i 'jug tshul 'bebs shing / de rdzogs par byed pa'i thabs du mas brgyan pa'i chos dang / dus
252b4(rnying rgyud): da lta'i lo tsA thun po che sngon gyi 'gyur la bcos ma sna tshogs byas nas/ 'gyur nga bzang / khungs nga btsun zer nas/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang / bla ma'i gsung la ras tshed byas nas/ mi res chos re bcos/ gcig skyon gcig la 'gel/ pha'i chos la bu'i dpe mi
252b5(rnying rgyud): btub pa'i chos dang mi 'dra zhes gsungs pa 'di shin tu'ang mad/ dngos grub brnyes pa o rgyan pa rin chen dpal gyis/ bod kyi lo tsA ba kha cig rgya gar na ting ma bskur rgya mi 'dug zer/ de la chag lo stob bdag rang gi dbang zhus kyi tha ma yin yang / rgya gar na nyid ma'i
252b6(rnying rgyud): rgyud basbyar rgya mi 'dug zer/ de 'dra khong dang blo chung gi gtam yin/ lo tsA brgya gar shar phyogs su yug re las ma phyin pas rgya gar na gang yod cha ci chod/ de las bod na gang yod kyi cha yang mi chod/ spyir yang rgya gar tshad khungs che bas/ rgya gar gyi dpo rnams
252b7(rnying rgyud): bral ba mang / sangs rgyas kyi bka' la tshang gzung med pa la/ bod kyi lo tsA ba rnams kyis des khungs ni chod/ ngas nub phyogs u rgyan gyi yul la phyin pa yang / mu dang mtha' mchod/ de yang dang po'i rgya pe rnams dus phyis bal po na mang ba yin/ de bas bal po
253a1(rnying rgyud): ta ra gtsug lag khang gcig na/ rnying ma'i rgyud rnams kyi rnam grangs rang yang bsam gyis mi khyab par bzhugs 'dug/ ngas bod kyi rnying ma rnams langs rnying ma'i rgyad pe dang / paN+Dita tshwa dgrag/ khyed dang rnams mang yung
253a2(rnying rgyud): sgying grong du 'dong / ngas lo tsA ba byas bsrung zir ba byas te ma grub/ rnying ma'i 'gyur da rung bya du yod pa la/ yang bod kyi shes par 'dod pa 'ga' zhig na re/ rting ma'i dgongs pa 'dus pa bod kyi sngags rgan chos bcos pa yin mi dag zer/ de 'dra yang 'os su
253a3(rnying rgyud): me 'gro ba'i gtam yin/ shes nang 'dra ba'i chos dang re tshe yang 'chos dang de las legs rgyu ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' la'ang med/ ces pa dang / de bzhin du jo bo'i rnam thar na/ yang jo bo'i thugs dgongs la/ mi yul du bzhugs pa'i gsang sngags la
253a4(rnying rgyud): las mkhas pa med snyam pa'i thugs rgyal mnga' ba la/ gyi sa bod du byon nas be har gling gi dkor mdzod gcig sgo phye nas rgya dpe gzigs pas/ jo bos de gong du ma gsan ma gzigs pa mang po bzhugs 'dug nas/ theg pa chen po gsang sngags 'di la mi shes pa med
253a5(rnying rgyud): sgyum/ DA ki mas kyang nam mkha' nas gzhal yas khang dpag tu med pa bstan/ rgyad sde mang po bstan pa yin pa la/ 'di rnams mi gda'/ theg pa chen po gsang sngags 'di la mtha' yod yong mi 'dra gsungs thugs rgyal chags/ bod ci rgyal po la
253a6(rnying rgyud): rjes su yi rang ba mang po phul/ bod du bstan pa dar nga 'dra ba rgya gar du yang ma byung ba 'dra gsungs/ zhes dang / slob dpon pad+ma rdo rje 'chang gnyis pa de'i drin las rgya gang na yongs su ma thags pa'i mkha' 'gro'i gsang mdzod mang po bsgyur nas bsam yas be tad gyi
253a7(rnying rgyud): dkor mdzod na bzhugs so// zhes pa 'di dang / rje btsun tA da nA thas/ 'gro lding gi gling na sngon bstan pa rnal ma med pa las/ slob dpon pad+ma 'gyud gnas kyis dang por btsugs/ mar me mdzad bzang pos kyang byon/ de nas brtsams te lo brgya tsam gyi bar
253b1(rnying rgyud): du ma gad+ha dang / u D+yan dang / kha che la sogs pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa mang ba byon te/ sngags kyi theg pa lhag par rgyas pad mad/ sngon rgyal po d+harma pA la'i skabs su sbas te/ phyag du nub pa'i rgyud kyi rigs dang / ar yA na nas ldan drangs pa'i rigs kyi nang rgyag
253b2(rnying rgyud): nA med pa mang du yod/ ces legs par bshad pas thugs gzu bor gnas pa rnams kyi rnam par dastod pa 'di dag gis 'phags yul du mi 'dug dang ma dag zer ba'i rdzun gtam dang bzang brda'i mtshangs thams cad dus gcig la brtol bar snang ste sdang zhugs kyis smras pa de dag
253b3(rnying rgyud): gis rang nyid chos spung bar 'gyur ba'i zha 'gro thob dman cing bsod nams chung ba'i 'gro ba gdan dge tho tshom bskyed pa'i phyir dge slong lnga chen po'i snod tshul gyis bstan pa me dbyen tsam du 'gyur bar sgyid kyi de las bsam pa satha thug pa'i lam dum song ngo // yang nyes
253b4(rnying rgyud): pa bus su 'gyur gyi tshul 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bulas zhen dang / nyang gter mgon po phyag bzhi sogs la nyams bzhes dang / ku du mthan brgyad zhal bstan nas lung bstan batshul sogs dngos bstan ltang yin na rnying ba'i rgyad rnams btang snyoms su gsungs pa'ang dus
253b5(rnying rgyud): skabs de'i grub mthabi kha 'dzin gzhan gyi rol dgongs par mngon te tshal pasi tu sngon lam rdo rjes gangs can du 'gyur ro cog gi gsung rab rnams bzhengs pa'i khu ngag la khong nyid kyis byon par mdzad pas/ rting ma mdo skye sems gsum dang sgrub sde'i sgor bcas bka'
253b6(rnying rgyud): 'altar gyi rgyud 'bum khrod du bzhugs par mdzad pa'i phyir dang / de yang gdong nas thub pa'i rgyud dag zhung du tshad mas grub pa'i phyir zhag pa yin gyi gsar ma'i ngali so gnyis yo sa rdzogs dang / gnyis med rnam rgyal sogs mang po sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin par bsgrubs nas dor bar mdzad
253b7(rnying rgyud): bsos// pargya chen gyi lung pa shAkya mchog ldan gyis sdom gsum pa 'ad kyi'i dgongs pa dngos pastan drang don du gser gyi thung mas 'chad pa na gang zag tho gas ma byang ba rnams nem nur bskyed cing / thun po phyogs lhung can rnams kyis rgyab ton du 'gyur ba zhig drung
254a1(rnying rgyud): rgya gyis 'a des dung/ bya mamam ma na pa bas pa rna ma shA na/ ma sa dpa sa lag susam la/ rna /
254a2(rnying rgyud): dang tsha rdza mdumatshan nonapa yang bong dru kyang bams ma mngon pa dngas pa sanangasas par 'gyur // mgacags rnabs namang chud rnamathas ma ngon pa sa man rgyas 'dun/ dang 'brang 'a pad
254a3(rnying rgyud): sa pa
254a4(rnying rgyud): sbyin pa pa rgyu chu sa/ ma sa zugs #rlu mas kyi
254a5(rnying rgyud): spyod pa chu ngas nga/ rdo rjeb sa ma pa gnyis pa brta tha sa thung pa sa brgyas pa dang gshes ba rnam pa'i mas dang palagags su gyung pa'i na dru gag dupa pa ni/ da theg pa rjod da bla sa sa
254b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir du/ gang dang 'tshams pa'i lha dang sngags dang lta ba'i rim pa rnams gsungs pa dang / de'i don slob mas tshul bzhin nyams su blangs pa dang / de las grub pa'i sa brnyes pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa mang du byon pa dang / de dang mthun pa ji snyan brgyad dang dgongs pa yi ger ba/
254b2(rnying rgyud): pa la brten nas rnying mar grags pa'i chos rnam par dag pa 'di nyid byung ba yin la/ 'di dag la'ang yang dag par na bstan bcos kyi mtshan nyid tshang ba yin te/ ji skad du/ gang zhig rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'ba' zhig gi// dbang byas rnam g.yeng med yid can gyis bshad//
254b3(rnying rgyud): ces sogs kyi mtshan nyid de tshang ba'i phyir/ slob dpon pad+mas gsungs pa'i bstan bcos ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang khyad par yod pa ma yin te/ thar pa thob pa'i lam dang rjes mthun pa// de yang drang srong bka' bzhin spyi bor blangs// zhes gsungs pa'i phyir/
254b4(rnying rgyud): dper na rje btsun byams pa'i chos lnga dang / dus kyi 'khor lo bsdus pa'i rgyud dang / de'i 'grel pa dri ma med pa'i 'od la sogs pa bzhin no// yang / rdzogs pa chen po'i gshis la bya ba dang bral ba'i grub mtha' chu rkyen 'dus byas kyi khams su mi gnas
254b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i ye shes des don mthar thug pa drang zad du ston pa'i skabs dkar nag dang rgyu 'bras 'bad rtsol gyi byas chos la ltos 'cha' mi dgos par bshad pa la bod 'ga' zhig gis spyod pa'i phyogs spangs pas ha shar dang mthun par thal lo zhes skyon mthong ha las las tsam
254b6(rnying rgyud): byed pa byung mod/ lar bde bar gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo gsum bskor ba'i rim pa dang po dge mi dge'i rgyu 'bras mi bslu bar ston pa de yang 'jig rten gyi ro la ltos nas bstan pa'i phyir drang don du bzhag pa yin/ bar pa dang tha ma gnyis rnam thar sgo gsum gyi
254b7(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid du don gyis mi mthun pa med la/ nges don zab mo'i gnas lugs ston pa la zab pa dang ches zab par khyad par tsam yod/ drang nges kyi don de yang 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi sgo nas 'byed cing brjod bya de dag shas che chung gi sgo nas dbye ba yin
255a1(rnying rgyud): pad mkhas pa kun la grags shing yub man/ da ma nyid kyis ro zhig bka' bar par rnam nas kyis bsdus pa'i chos thabs cad rang gang nas stong par khas blangs nas de ngas don du chad pa' thabs/ gang la dmigs pa
255a2(rnying rgyud): ba thams cad dang bral ba/ rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa/ gang la blang bar bya ba dang / dor bar bya ba'i chos su mi dmigs pa ste mdong na gzung 'dzin gyi chos rnams las yang dag par 'das pa'i 'dus ma byas kyi gnas lugs gang yin pa
255a3(rnying rgyud): la rnam par thar pa gsum gyi mtshan nyid kyang gnas pa'i phyir rdzogs chen pas gzhi'i dus su 'khor 'das mnyam pa nyid du blta bas rgyu 'bras tha dad du mi 'byed/ lam gyi dus su ci la'ang rnam par mi rtog pas blang ba dang dor ba'i mtha' mi dpyod/ 'bras bu
255a4(rnying rgyud): dus su thob bya re dogs dang bral ba'i gdeng chos kun zad sar 'khyol ba la grub mtha'i snying por byed de/ kun byed rgyal po las// yog shin tu rnal 'byor rdzogs chen la// rgyu dang 'bras bu yod zer smra byed na/ de ni rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i don mi ldan// don
255a5(rnying rgyud): de ma kun rdzob gnyis su smra byed na// sgra dang skur pa 'debs pa'i cho ga len te// de yis gnyis su med par rtog pa med// dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyis rtogs pa yang // gnyis su ma mthong rnam gzhag gcig tu rtogs// zhes gsungs pa bzhin no/
255a6(rnying rgyud): de lta bu'i grub mtha'i 'cha' lugs chen po 'di ni gnyis su mi gsung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi nges don zab mo'i mdo sde rnams kyi dgongs pa'ang de kho na nyid du gnas pa yin te/ tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis zhus pa'i mdo las/ chos thams cad kyi rang
255a7(rnying rgyud): bzhin de gang zhe na/ chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin can te dmigs pa dang bral ba'o// chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa'i rang bzhin can te rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'o// chos thams cad ni smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin can te blang ba med pa/
255b1(rnying rgyud): dong ba med pa/ bsam pa med pa/ nus pa med pa shin tu ba nyid dang bral ba yin te/ de ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o// 'khor ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa da mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin yin no// mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin gang yi
255b2(rnying rgyud): chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin te/ de'i phyir sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o// zhes gsungs pa ltar ro// de'i phyir lta ba khas blangs dang bral ba/ bsgom pa yid byed dang bral ba/ spyod pa blang dor dang bral ba/ 'bras bu de dogs dang bral ba
255b3(rnying rgyud): bzhi po des rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi mtshan nyid nyams len rjen par de las gtan du ci zhig phab/ khyed nyid kyis tshad mar khas len sor bzhag gi rgyud sde du ma'i rdzogs rim man ngag gis 'chad pa na grub mtha' 'khor 'das dbyer med ces pa 'di la ngos ma bzung na
255b4(rnying rgyud): rtog ge'i blos bzhag pa'i grub mtha' dang ni 'di gnyis gcig tu mdza' ba'i skabs mi 'thung ngo // don tre lta ba'i ldog pa nas de ltar yin kyang spyod pa'i phyogs dor bas sa zer na/ lha ba don dam pa'i bden pa ma 'khrul ba'i gnas lugs mthong ba la bzhag nas
255b5(rnying rgyud): sems dang sems kyang gi go na gnas pa'i bslab pa sogs 'dus byas kyi dge rtsa sogs byas chos dkar nag gi 'ching grol las 'dus pa'i phyir glang dor med par grub cing de sngon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid du gnas pa/ 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa 'od srung gis
255b6(rnying rgyud): zhus pa'i mdo las/ gang 'dus ma byas pa de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rigs so// 'phags pa rnams kyi rigs gang yin pa de la bslab pa yang med/ bsgrub pa las 'das pa yang med do// gang la bslab pa yang med bslab pa las 'das
255b7(rnying rgyud): snga yang med pa de la rgyu ba yang med mi rgyu ba yang med/ rab tu chub yang med/ gang la chu ba yang med/ mi rgyu ba yang med/ rab tu rgyu ba yang med pa de la sems kyang med/ sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang med do// gang la
256a1(rnying rgyud): sems kyang med/ sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang med pa de la las kyang med/ las kyi rnam par smin pa yang med do// gang la las kyang med/ las kyi rnam par smin pa yang med pa de la bde ba yang
256a2(rnying rgyud): med/ sdug bsngal yang med/ gang la bde ba yang med/ sdug bsngal ba yang med pa de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rigs te/ 'phags pa rnams kyi rigs gang yin pa de la ni las kyang med/ las mngon par 'du byed pa yang med do// zhes
256a3(rnying rgyud): pa dang / de la dge ba yang stong la/ mi dge ba yang stong / dge ba yang rnam par dben la/ mi dge ba yang rnam par dben/ dge ba yang mi dge ba dang mi 'dre la/ mi dge ba yang dge ba dang mi 'dre zhing / dge ba dang mi dge bar mngon par zhen pa
256a4(rnying rgyud): rgyu dang rkyen yang med do// zhes pa dang / dgyes rdor las/ bsgom med sgom pa po yang med// lha med ljags kyang yod ma yin// zhes pa la sogs kyis bstan pa rmad du byung ba'i sgra ba spags pa 'di yang hA shang gi lugs su 'gyur ram soms
256a5(rnying rgyud): shig/ spyir yang shes rab phyin ci ma log par rtogs pas thabs de'i yan lag tsam du gyur ngapa ni sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa ma nor ba yin te/ slob dpon 'phags pa lhas kyang / tshul khrims la ni nyams bla yi// lte las de lta ma yin no// zhes
256a6(rnying rgyud): bshad po ltar lta ba ji bzhin par rtogs nas spyod pa ci la spyad kyang mi 'ching bar ma zad grol ba'i 'bras bu 'thob pa rgyal ba'i sras kyi gzhung lam chen po nyid du gnas mod kyi/ rdzogs pa chen po'i lam 'dir ni chos nyid mnyam pa chen po'i klong du blang dor med
256a7(rnying rgyud): par bzhag pas don 'grub pa las spyod pa la tshod 'dzin gyi spyod pas ma bsgribs par ni khyad par gyi chos te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dam pa las/ rin byin gyis spras pa/ 'dod chags ma spangs shig/ zhe sdang ma gzhil cig/ gti
256b1(rnying rgyud): mug ma bsal cig/ rang gi lus las gyen du ma bskyod cig/ mi dge ba spyod cig/ lta ba tshar ma gcod cig/ kun tu sbyor ba rnams ma ston cig/ phung po rnams yongs su zung zhig/ khams rnams ril por gyis shig/
256b2(rnying rgyud): mched rnams la spyod cig/ byis pa'i sa las 'da' bar ma byed cig/ mi dge ba la rtogs shig/ dge ba spongs shig/ sangs rgyas yid la ma byed cig/ chos ma sems shig/ dge 'dun la ni mchod pa ma byed cig/ bslab pa dag yang
256b3(rnying rgyud): sa
256b4(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya la sogs sku la sgrib pa yin// phyag rgya mi bsgyur bsgyur na rin chen brlag par 'gyur// 'khor ba mi spang spangs na sangs mi rgya// sangs rgyas grad na med pas rig pa nyid las gang yang med// 'khor ba gud na med de rang gi sems
256b5(rnying rgyud): su thams cad 'dus// 'du byas dge rtsa mi bya byas na'i ching bar 'gyur// mchod rten lha khang la sogs 'du byas dge rtsa spang // byas pa'i chos mi zin bzhag na zin par 'gyur// bya ba btang ba'i rnal 'byor mi spong spangs na de bzhin
256b6(rnying rgyud): gshegs/ yang dag sangs rgyas lam ni de bzhin kun la shes par bya// zhes gshes la bya ba thams ca dang bral ba'imos nyid mnyam bachen po'i don la gdeng du gyur pa'i lta bas zin pa'i rgyas du byas pa'i dkar nag gi las kyang mnyam pa nyid du
257a1(rnying rgyud): ji bzhin par bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chung du/ dge ba byar med sdig pa spang du med/ dge sdig gnyis dang bral ba'i rig pa chos kyi sku/ dge ba mi bya byas na sangs rgyas med/ sdig pa mi spang spangs na
257a2(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas 'grub mi 'gyur// zhes so// de yang gangs can na lugs de thos pa nanan gyis 'gog par byed pa dag mang mod kyi/ de dag gi rang bzhin khong du ma chud pas blor ma shongs pa la khag med de 'di ltar 'phags pa don dam dang kun rdzob
257a3(rnying rgyud): da sa b+ha pa dam gyi smras / ba da ba pa pa nga sa sa dunatum nga nas sa marnam med la ba ga dang
257a4(rnying rgyud): par na de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / shin tu mi skye ba gang dang mnyam pa/ don dam par na lta bar gyur pa rnams kyang de dang mnyam mo// zhes sogs gsungs pa bzhin no// de ltar bstan pa nyid kyis spyod pa'i phyogs
257a5(rnying rgyud): rnams yal bar 'dor bar mi 'grub ste// rang lugs sems sde'i rgyang chen po rda la gser zhun du// bde gshegs ma lus yum du gyur pas rgyal ba kun gyi lam gcig pu// tshul khrims la sogs pha rol phyin lam spyod pa rgya mtsho'i gzhir gyur
257a6(rnying rgyud): pa// zhes shes rab kyi yan lag tu gyur pa'i thabs spyod pa'i phyogs mi 'dor ba'i grub pa'i mtha' chen po 'di yod bzhin thabs la mkhas pa'i phyir gnas skabs su kun rdzob bden pa 'dor ba ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang gnas lugs bdes
257a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i chos nyid ma 'khrul pa rang gi ngo bo mngon sum rtogs pa'i tshe bden gnyis res 'jog phyogs su ma ltung par pha rol phyin pa bcu sogs byang chub phyogs su gyur pa'i lam bden gyi chos rnams kyang 'di nyid du 'du ba'i tshul ni/ rig pa rang sher chen po'i chud la
257b1(rnying rgyud): spun gyis grub pa'i chos su nyid// gsal 'grib snang ba'i mun pasangs// rtag chad gnyis kyi mtha' las 'das// mun snang gnyis kyis gzung du med// gcig dang du ma'i chos las 'das// snang dang mi snang chos las 'das// skye dang 'dzin
257b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshig dang bral// gol sgrib bdag tog ga la yod// bsam pa nyid la bsal du med// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mtha'// rig gsal chos kyi lha la 'dus// bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa'i mtha'// sngon mchog bzhag dang du
257b3(rnying rgyud): 'dus// brtson 'grus pa rol phyin pa'i mtha'// tog med rang byung don la 'dus// bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i mtha'// snang bzad kar garbod la 'dus// tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa'i mtha'// grogs med gcig pur 'dug la 'dus
257b4(rnying rgyud): sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i mtha'// 'khor ba'i 'dzin chags thod la 'dus// smon lam pha rol phyin pa'i mtha'// snang ba de dogs med la 'dus// thabs kyi pha rol phyin pa'i mtha'// rig pa cog bzhag dang du 'dus// stobs
257b5(rnying rgyud): pha rol phyin pa'i mtha'// 'khrul snang rgya yis thebs la 'dus// ye shes pha rol phyin pa'i mtha'// rkyen dang bral bar snang la 'dus// de bzhin pha rol phyin pa'i don// rang bzhin kun khyab ye shes so// zhes gsungs pa bzhin dang //
257b6(rnying rgyud): de dang mtshungs par/ tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis zhus pa'i mdo las/ gang mi 'dzin pa ni sbyin pa/ mi gnas pa tshul khrims/ ma bsrungs pa bzod pa/ mi brtson pa brtson 'grus/ mi sems pa bsam gtan/ mi dmigs pa shes rab bo// zhes pa
257b7(rnying rgyud): dang / de bzhin du kun byed las/ don gyi snying po nal ma byang med la// rnal 'phyor chen po rnams kyis mthong ba ni// ye nas rang rgyung dag pa'i dkyil 'khor la// rgyu las 'bras bu lha yi dkyil 'khor de// bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi yis rdzogs byas te//
258a1(rnying rgyud): 'a nyid ldan thu ga // zhems// gatshas rnams ste gnas su gdu da sa sa sa su pa san 'a rgya rgyab na
258a2(rnying rgyud): banam mdags pa med pa da na na u sa su 'dub nam 'byu la sa dang yang 'ad skye ni min pa nim pas
258a3(rnying rgyud): m+b+ha sa sa ma 'dren pa da sa ga byu sa pa 'phrus chung 'a ba pang 'dul byed 'bral ba sa /
258a4(rnying rgyud): pa mamang ba'i sa kyi rdzog pa sa dag sa ma nag cung na gyigs pa ma / rgyam can rdo ba sgred par sa byas pas da ma ban sa napa nas thugs cad pa
258a5(rnying rgyud): ma gnas pa'i gling ma na 'phrin pang srung tsun pa taman pa dag sa pa ma na ma / gas bu nas sa / nga ni sa / ga
258a6(rnying rgyud): po nga byu pa// dus ma ma byung// rdzo sa smra/ sa na byu dz+riM// migs snan / pa sa sa
258a7(rnying rgyud): byag rgyags ma ma bci pa / sa dang pasas byung chul khrig gas// zhes pa nga/ 'i du du rdzog/ kyi rigs pa das// badrin pa ga pa da/ da bang migasas
258b1(rnying rgyud): dri med blol gnong ba yod ma yin// zhes dang / zhi bltas kyang / ji sring rkyen rnams tshogs gu na// de skrod sgyu ma'ang 'byung bar 'gyur// rkyen rnams rgyun na cad pan// kun rdzob tu yang mi 'byung ba// gang rgya 'bral ba yang minan// kun rngab gang gi dmigs bla nga
258b2(rnying rgyud): zhes pa la sogs kyis bshad pa bzhin no// de ltar dbub pas rdzogs pa chen po 'di dag spyong mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes du ma rogacig chen po'i ngang dul bzla ba'i dbang du 'gyis na/ gzhi'i dus su yi shes kyis kun rdzo brdzun par rtogs pas 'dus byas kyi dgartsal ma
258b3(rnying rgyud): shes rab la sbo ma btags/ rnam shes kyi ldog pa la blang dor yod pas thabs la sbyang ba ma btab/ lam gyi drus su yid la byed pa thams cad rnam par rtog pa las ma 'das pas bsgom par bya ba rdul tsam med/ 'bras bu'i dus su sems dang sems las byung
258b4(rnying rgyud): cad rgyun 'gug na kun rdzob gang la sdang bar 'gyur/ gnas 'di bka' 'khor lo gyi ma gnyis kyi dgongs pa'i zhe phug mthar thug pa 'phags pa'i yul dang gangs can gyi khrod 'di bde ba gshegs pa'i bskrun pa ma 'khrul ba gzung ba rnams kyis legs par bshad
258b5(rnying rgyud): pa tshul ma med pa yin no// de lta yi pa brjon pa kyi pon pa nal yan chad kyi klog pa pa mangs pa rnams dang byas ma gtan pa 'khrul med thams cad kyi yig char 'di bzhin bshad pas s+ho// snying ba dang cag gi ston pas rnam shes kyi rol dgong pa nas thang dor dang
258b6(rnying rgyud): kyi rnam gzhag rmi lam gyi yul du de'i rgyu 'bras tshad mar gyur pa tsam zhig bstan pas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes su kun rdzob tshang mar grub pa'i go ba zhig la glo ba zhe na/ rgyu des stod pa'i phyogs mu zhen pa a 'bras ko 'bras su song bas 'phags pa'i shes rab dang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
258b7(rnying rgyud): la nus byed pa zhig byung / des zab ma'i gnas byin gyi ma mag pa'i thub mtha' la'ang ying ches dag / zhing dag gis bde bar gshegs pa'i bran las rbang pa che yin rgya kyi kyogs la byas byed do/ mnyam gzhag gi che na yang yid /
259a1(rnying rgyud): mi byed pas twa shang gi skom du 'gyur na/ khyed cag gis dbu ma'i gzhung chen por 'dod pa'i slob dpon b+ha bya'i dbu ma drin chen sgron ma las/ shes bci la yang mi gnas/ cir yang mi rtog/ tsi la yang sems pa med pa/ zhes dang / 'ja
259a2(rnying rgyud): pakri'i dgongs pa jo bos bkral ba las/ rtog dpyod bral ba'i mnyam gzhag gi zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa'i tshe shing gnyis drag tu drung ba'i me'i dpe dang bcas pas bshad cing / shes pa gang la'ang mi rtog/ cir yang mi 'dzin/ dran pa dang yid la byed pa thams
259a3(rnying rgyud): cad spangs te/ zhes pa la sogs pas rgyas par bshad cing / de dang mthun par kA shi'i sgom rim gsum kar yang bshad pas dbu ma rang rgyang pa rnams la grags pa'i gtam zhig yin ni yin/ de hA shang dang mthun dung mi mthun drung mthun pa bas blangs zin pa de yin/
259a4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs chen gyis rang byung gi rig pa lhag mthong gi ngo bo de nyid so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes su nges pas de nyid sgom gyi rten du byas nas tog dpyod bral ba'i chos nyid la mnyam par gzhag pas rnam par mi rtog pa'i nga der mtha'agrol chen po'i gnas lugs byin cim log par gnas pa yin
259a5(rnying rgyud): thal 'gyur las/ rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po'i mtha'// chos rnams rang sang bzhag pa ste// sdang shes chos nyid zung 'jug pas// ye grol cog bzhag nyid lathug/ dgongs pa zlo las 'das pa dang // mtshan bcus rang sa dag pa dang // stong dang ngo bo'i mtha' grol dang /
259a6(rnying rgyud): 'gyubang rtog pa med pa dang // blo zad yid las 'das pa'o// zhes so// 'di ltar martogs pas rtog dpyod kyi 'du 'gro ba zhig pas lhag mthong gi chos nyid la mdag cing sems dang sems byung gi ldog pas bzhag pa'i stong pa 'ba' zhig ltar snang ba la dmigs pa'i der 'dzin/
259a7(rnying rgyud): s+ye dang bcas pa'i 'don sbyangs kyis bsgribs pa ni mi zad pa dang skye ba'i bdag nyid can gyi lta ba chen por 'gyur te/ 'od srung stong pa nyid du dmigs pas stong pa nyid la rton pa de ni nga'i gsung dab 'di las nyams rab tu nyams zhes bshad de/ 'od bu gang thag tu lta ba ri btsam la
259b1(rnying rgyud): gnas pa sla'i/ mngon pa'i dargyal stong pa nyid du blta ba ni de lta ma yin na// zhes ston pa nyid kyis gsal bar gsungs pa'i phyir ro// de lta na'ang re zhig bu'i zhabs kyis// tha spyad la ni ma bden par// dam pa'i don ni togs mi 'gyur// zhes bshad pas
259b2(rnying rgyud): dgag srub kyi rnam dpyad la brten nas rtogs dgos par gastan pa'i phyir zhe na ma yin te/ lung de'i go ba ni don dam pa'i bden pa thog mar brjod bya rjod byed kyi tshul la brten nas rtogs dgos par bstan pa tsam las mtha' gcig tu rtog ge'i rig pas dpyad nas rtogs /
259b3(rnying rgyud): par gsungs pa ma yin te/ de phyir de ni rtog ge ba// ro dang 'dra bas rnam par brtags// zhes rnam grangs du mas smad par mdzad pa bzhin rtog dpyod kyi 'phang la gtugs/ dgag sgrub kyi thag ri la bskor ba byas nas rang gnas kyi ye shes sgro skur gyi lam du sbyar/ blos
259b4(rnying rgyud): dpyad pas mtha' gnyis bsal bar rlom pa srin bu'i kha chus dang nyid bcings pa ltar chos nyid yin lugs kyi steng du phab pa shin tu dka' ste chos nyid ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir tha snyad kyis mtshon du med la/ tha snyad ni rtog btags kyi ngo bor gnas pa ste/ dgongs pa
259b5(rnying rgyud): des 'grel las/ so so rang rig mtshan nyid spyod yul te// brjod du med cing tha snyad yongs chad pa// rtsod dang bral ba don dam chos yin te// de ni rtog ge kun las 'das mtshan nyid// ces gsungs pa'i phyir/ 'dir ni rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po'i 'dug stangs gsum
259b6(rnying rgyud): gyis gzed bsdam/ lta stangs gsum gyis gan sag rgyan/ sgron ma drug gi lam nas chos nyid yid dpyod dang bral bar mngon sum du mthong ba'i phyir lam khyad gnams lta bur yod pa yin te/ sgra thal 'gyur las/ dam pa'i don ni blo bral nas// dbang po cig car rang
259b7(rnying rgyud): gro sa nas// mngon sum mthong ba'i gnad kyis ni// rang gi grub pa'i mtha' zhig nas// gang la zhen dang 'dzin med par// yang dag chos nyid ro myong nas// khams gsum 'khor ba'i rten med par / mkha' la mkha' nyid thim pa ltar// rnal 'gyod mchog kyang de bzhin
260a1(rnying rgyud): par gyur ta re// de pyir chu ludu dz+nyAn mi gcod// ces pa la sogs kyis bde bar gshegs pas seng ge'i sgra bskyon med par bklags pas thag dog gi gdon chen po'i gzhan dbang du gyur bas gtan tshig med pa'i dbang
260a2(rnying rgyud): dang / sngon tu ma myongs snang bathugs pa rnams pa g.yod pa 'dod / mad nas marnam smin pas na gi ni latheg pa dang byub ma ba rnam gnag rnam nyid bsam gyis mi tha ba pa'i gas bzab mal gis nga sa ma
260a3(rnying rgyud): dpyod rnon po'i rtog dpyod ltar snang dang ma mthun kyang bde bar gshegs pa ni thams cad mkhyen cing gsung ba yin pa'i phyir gang zhig 'khor ba spong zhing thar pa dang myang 'das kyi lam du 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid gang la gnas pa de nyid sangs rgyas kyi grub pa'i mthang
260a4(rnying rgyud): bzang po ma nor ba yin par shes dgos te/ rje btsun ma pham pas/ khams gsum dag na nyon mongs spong byed gsungs// zhi ba'i yon tan brjod par mdzad pa gang // de ni drang srong gsung yin ldog pa gzhan// zhes pa la dran pa nye bar
260a5(rnying rgyud): ma bzhag na chos khams rgya mtsho'i gting thug pa ni sangs rgyas kho na'i yul las 'phags pa rnams kyis kyang rtogs pa'i skabs med na gangs ri'i khrod kyi mkhas su re ba'i phyogs 'dzin can dag gis spyod yul du gyur pa lta ga la yod de/ legs par ma rtogs
260a6(rnying rgyud): pa dang / drang don kho nar 'chel ba dang / phyogs 'dzin gyi lam du rung ba dang / rang mnyam gyis phrag pa dog pa dang / rnyed bkur dang grags 'dod kho na khong du bcug pa'i kun slong gis srur ba btab pa 'di rigs bden pa'i
260a7(rnying rgyud): don la reg pa rdul tsam med de/ 'di ltar slob dpon klu sgrub kyis theg chen bshad pas nyan thos rnams kyis mgon po gru rtsub la lung bstan ngan pa bcos shing gsung rab tu bcug/ theg chen bka' ma yin par bsgrags/ 'phags pa
260b1(rnying rgyud): ba'i mang tsam yang ma bstan par skam pa pa kho nas bcos par smrab sogs kyis bstan pa dag pu ma yin pa'i lam du 'dren pa'i skabs kyang byung 'a/ rnam par 'dus mthus pa'idab+h+ring sum phyag ca'i mtshan gyis gsungs te/ sangs kyis thams cad kyi la
260b2(rnying rgyud): las 'jug pa ye shes snang ba rgyan gyi mdo las/ kun dga' bo chos kyi phyag rgya de ni chos thams cad kyi phyug rgya ste/ phyag rgya med pa yin no// ma byas pa'i phyag tu yin no// dbyed med pa'i phyag rgya yin no// kun dga' ba/ gang dag
260b3(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya des btab pa de dang de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po yin/ rigs btsun pa yin/ mi'i seng gi yin/ zhes pa la sogs gsungs pa dang / slob dpon ye shes grags pas de kho na nyid 'jug par yang / yum shes rab kyis
260b4(rnying rgyud): rol tu phyin pa nyid kyi mtshan gzhan ni phyag rgya chen po ste/ de ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// zhes pa la sogs pas rgyas par 'ashang ba'i phyir/ mdo'i dngos bstan du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la skabs 'gar phyag rgya
260b5(rnying rgyud): po'i skyes smos par mdzad cing sngags su de nyid bde ba chen po'i thabs kyis bsgrubs pas bde stong phyag rgya chen por 'gyur ba'i phyir mdo sngags kyi khyang par tsam las mdo'i theg par phyag rgya chen po gtan nas ma bshad par sla ba 'ang zung mi legs te bde gshegs
260b6(rnying rgyud): snyi po ste tsal zhig mdo'i lam du bstan nas shin tu rgyas pa'i tshul rnams sngags su bstan pa dang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro// de bas na drang don kho na'i phyogs su 'chel ba dang / tha snyad kyi rnam gzhag tsam la zhen pa dang / tshig gi rjes su 'brangs pa rnams
260b7(rnying rgyud): kyis dang 'dod phyogs lung gi lung bsngags pa de dag gi thugs bkang dang dgongs 'grel gyi bstan bcos dums gtibs shing / 'ol tshod kyi mun mda' blo mchod tsam dum song bshin tu mang bas rigs de la tshad mas 'gog nus pa gang yang med
261a1(rnying rgyud): pa 'a rlom gyis kya 'artson nas su// yang byeng ma bzla'am ma dab nga rgyu theg pa gsums pang bad kyig ga zangs bung du btag sa na/ dang ba dgas tu ston pas// da
261a2(rnying rgyud): thag smra bstan// 'do pa 'dud bzhin no// de des rnal 'byor spyod pa sbyid// de yi rjes pa bum parnya nA~M// thugs kyi ma pa kun shes nas// de rjes kyi ya bstan// zhes theg pa ri ma gyi pa 'dug pa dang 'thun par bshad pa
261a3(rnying rgyud): bzhini dir sdigs lam du theg pa kun gyi gzhung la mtshang bar bstan pas theg dam nas zang bas ma sbyong byang chub sems kyis zin pa na theg chen so thang drug nas 'gyur bas yon tan kyang ngog ma las khyang par 'phags pa bzhin/ rgyu'i thag pa bsum sngags /
261a4(rnying rgyud): pa gyi ba rinapa so rings 'i yi spya nu las kyang pa du 'angags pa dang ng+ya mang du byur ba gyi dan ci 'bad pa mang ba na ni yong ba ma 'ang bya brgya gyi ba ngangs bdun kyang sram rtsubapas/ des byed gang ba'i rgyas mas
261a5(rnying rgyud): smra ga/ / rdzog nga ba nga nga ma rnam pa pa ga
261a6(rnying rgyud): ga ba 'dzums spang ba'i stsal banas rgyal du la dab babyu bar gyi bcid tham du'i sathus byed ni zlapa 'inabras byas gas pa m-inanan 'du 'gas rnam srid bang byed 'jug pa'i la bdang sa sa rgya tshad du
261a7(rnying rgyud): mings pa brgya na mang chub sems su sa mas ba badzin pashegs pa mas sa byas dris pa sangs dpa du ba ba pa 'dang can 'dang gas pa byed pa
261b1(rnying rgyud): don du lam gang du 'jug pa de'i lha sgom spyod 'bras la dbang du byed pa'i thabs sangs rgyas kyi byin rbab la dbang gi brda btags pa yin te/ 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo sde las/ blo gros chen po gzhan yang byin gyis brlabs panyi
261b2(rnying rgyud): gyis byin du brlabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhabs la gtug cing 'dri ba yongs su 'dri'o// byin gyis brlabs gnyis po gang gis byin du brlabs zhe na/
261b3(rnying rgyud): lta ste/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi byin du brlabs dang / sku dang / zhal dang / phyag thams cad kyis dbang bsrur ba'i byin gyis brlabs so// de la blo gros chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
261b4(rnying rgyud): chen po rnams sa dang po las sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du brlabs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin theg pa chen po rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par 'jug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byang chub
261b5(rnying rgyud): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin theg pa chen po rab tu snang ba la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis zhal bstan te/ sku dang
261b6(rnying rgyud): zhal dang gsung thams cad yang dag par bstan pas blo gros chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang / yon tan de lta bu'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dbang chen po gzhan dag la ji lta ba bzhin du
261b7(rnying rgyud): byin gyi rlabs mdzad do// blo gros chen po de ltar sa dang po la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par byin gyi rlabs rab tu 'thob po// bskal pa brgya stong kun tu bsags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis
262a1(rnying rgyud): mthar gyis sa'i phyogs dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi mtshan nyid rtogs par khong du chud pas byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin la brdo chen po'i gzhal med khang du stan la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rdzun
262a2(rnying rgyud): po rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyi sa brgyan pa'i cod pan can/ de dang mthun pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba la rgyal ba'i phyag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten nas byung ba/ ba p+pa dang / gser dang /
262a3(rnying rgyud): tog tsam pa ka dang / zla ba'i 'od zer dang / pad mo 'dra bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo chen po'i gzhal med khung na stan la 'dug pa de la dbang byed pa dang / 'khor los sgyur ba dang / dbang po'i rgyal po ltar lci po nas da
262a4(rnying rgyud): bsrur ro// sru dang zhal dang phyag thams cad kyis dbang bskur bas byang chub sems dpa' de dang byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni phyag gi dbang bskur ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du brlabs pa zhes bya'o// blo gros chen po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
262a5(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs gnyis te/ byin gyi rlabs gnyis po des byin du brlabs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhal du blta'i/ de lta ma yin na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
262a6(rnying rgyud): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la blta bar mi nus so// blo gros chen po gzhan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ting nge 'dzin dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / bstan pa'i rnam par gang ci spobs kyang de dag thams cad
262a7(rnying rgyud): kyis ngas rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs gnyis kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o// blo gros chen po gal te yang byin gyi rlabs med par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spobs pa 'byung na ni/ blo gros chen po byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis kyang spobs
262b1(rnying rgyud): pa'abyung ba 'tha du/ dpa'i bya zhen/ 'dug te/ na rjes ma ba bas pa 'dun/ sum tshan du dang dgal pa dang / lhag na da shing nga // ral ma'i mthang nam pa/ rgyags dang / bla
262b2(rnying rgyud): khang pa dang / khyim dang / gzhal med khang gi gnas dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sgra 'byin na blo gros chen po sems yod pa dag lta ci smos/ blo gros chen po lugs pa dang / 'on pa dang / long ba dag kyang rang gi nye
262b3(rnying rgyud): pa las rnam par grol te/ blo gros chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ni de ltar yon tan gyi bye brag che'o// blo gros chen pos yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
262b4(rnying rgyud): rnams byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dgal ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par gnas pa'i dus dang khyad par gyi sa la dbang bskur ba'i byin gyi rlabs ci'i slad du mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdud rtsi las dang nyon
262b5(rnying rgyud): mongs pas mi 'khrugs pa dang / nyan thos kyi bsam gtan dang sar mi lhung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa so sor dgis rig par bya ba dang / 'thob pa'i chos dang / khong du chud pa rnam par 'phel ba'i phyir blo gros chen po
262b6(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag la byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du rlob par mdzad do// blo gros chen po byin gyis ma brlabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa
262b7(rnying rgyud): mas dpa' chen po dag ni mu stegs can dang / nyan thos dang / bdud kyi bsam par lhung zhing blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang mi \u0f7f ste/ de ltar de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag de ba den/
263a1(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa dag brtsam pa pang dag pa dgasu pa smras na surnams kyimangs sa brgya ba nan// des 'dind ces / ma'i dbang ba dzinanapasa'as// rang sa nyid du su dag sa
