263a2(rnying rgyud): sngon lam dag gis rnam sbyangs pa// dang po dang ni bcu par 'byung // zhes pa sogs kyis rgyas par gsungs pa bzhin tshun mtha'i byang chub sems dpa' dbang la brten nus 'tshang rgya dgas par bshad pa de la bsngon du med pa'i phyir gan dang byung rjems
263a3(rnying rgyud): mkhyen pas pa nga la marna pas pasgom pa dadabang pa dang / ba 'gru zhis ma ba sas kyis ni pa'i margyun dru ga sa kyang thams na can bang gA bang thos pa'i spang bya badra byung ba ga sa dpa na 'ad
263a4(rnying rgyud): 'chang thabs la mkhas shing thams cad mkhyen pa'i phyir de skad gsungs pa yin la sa med kyi dbang gong ma gas ma la ma brten par sngags kyi pa'i rgyud kyis rdo rje 'chang gri go 'phang mi 'thob par bshad pa'ang don gyis 'dir mthun cing mdo lam du sbas te 'od zer chen
263a5(rnying rgyud): po'i dbang ngas byin na bcab dru gsungs pa'i phyid do// yang / 'gos lus bcas chos rje zengar pa'i drung du chos thu byung byin pa mthab pa'i gling nad la brten long rgya gang du byin pas nyid ma'i rgyud rnams drug ngan med par bsngags shing / da
263a6(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i snying po la ston bani sogs kyi ban ka bkod par byas pa la bong 'ga' zhig gis skyong zlos de byed pa'ang thung med/ khong nyid cag bu yin pas yul phran shas shig la ma thags pas lnga 'gyur med par mi 'grub cing / rdzogs pa chen po sogs ches
263a7(rnying rgyud): zab pa'i chud sde rnams zhal nas snyan du brgyad pa cheg bcud tsam ma gtogs dpe yang mi snang bar mdzad/ gdams pa shul du bzhag pa tsam yang med na bong du kyi dang kyil yan chad la gas sngags thom chos byed pa'i grol 'di lta bu rgya gar du med pas
263b1(rnying rgyud): khong gis ma mthong zhing ma thos pa bden mod kyi/ 'on kyang ngo bo lha gcig dI yai ka ra lta bu'i 'phags yul tsam na sngags su mkhyen pa che bar grags pas kyang bong du be har dkor mdzod gling gi rgya dpe rnams gzigs pas khong nyid kyis sngon chad gsanA kazigs
263b2(rnying rgyud): mamyong ba'i rgyud sde mang po bzhugs pas sngags la mkhas pa'i thugs rgyal chags pa'i lo rgyus ngo bo nyid kyi rnam thar du gsal na khong lta bu'i so gyes ma mthong ba la khag med cing der ma zad nub phyogs u rgyan gyi yul tshun tshad chu bzhin nyul ba'i gzhan snang zil gyi/
263b3(rnying rgyud): gnon par nus pa o rgyan pa rin chen dpal lta bus kyang mi yul du byon pa'i sngags kyi mtha' ma gzigs par gsungs pas mtshon nus shing rgyas par 'og tung chad par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gsang ba snying po bor mar bsgrags pa'i rdzun phugs bcom ldan ral gri/ @
263b4(rnying rgyud): chen shAkya shrI/ thar pa lo tsA pa/ 'gos lo gzhon nu dpal ba/ sha gad lo tsA sogs kyi phyag tu rgya dpe dngos ma son pas gtibs shing khyad par gyis 'gyur tsam la mkhas pa'i mchog bstan pa'i byi dor ba chen po rig pa'i ral gris gsang spring sgrub pa las 'di
263b5(rnying rgyud): ljad gsungs te/ 'di chud yang dag pa yin pa'i rgyu mtshan ni/ dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i 'grel chen slob dpon bi shwa mi tras mdzad pa las/ ye shes sems dpa' gang reg pa// zhes pa'i 'grel par/ gsang ba snying po las/ 'og
263b6(rnying rgyud): min gyi gnas mtha' dang mu med pa na gzhi tshad med pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gsal ba la/ ye shes rin po che 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang / rgya phyogs bcud yongs su ma chad pa zhes bya ba dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad du su gsur
263b7(rnying rgyud): thugs sna tshogs par kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba dang / mchod rten sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// pho brang gnas shes bya ba yin// / zhes pa'i 'grel par/ rtse mo gyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa thams cad kyang so
264a1(rnying rgyud): rgyu dan ga ga zhugs du smras// sa
264a2(rnying rgyud): mun gyi gsang // skye ba med las thams cad kyis// skyes pa nyid ni skye ba med// ces pa dang / gsang ba'i don 'chad pa na/ gsang snying las rang bzhin dang / gab pa dang / sbas pa dang / mi bstan pa'i gsang ba zhes 'gyung /
264a3(rnying rgyud): pa dang / gsang snying las/ dbang lnga 'byung / zhes bya ba dang / mthing ga dkar po ser le brgan/ zhes pa dang / mtha' dbus med par ldan gyis grub/ ces bya ba'i bar dang / gsang snying las/ de kho na nyid gsum du 'gyung/
264a4(rnying rgyud): b+hA ba la sogs pa thams cad la gsang nying gi mtshan smos nas drangs so// log pa'i gyon bzhi la sogs pa spang ba ni/ 'di skad bshad pa ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung thams cadas bcub pas kyang 'asdu bar mi nus pas sangs rgyas nyid kyis bdu pa
264a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i lugs yin te/ gsang 'dus kyi 'grel pa slob dpon mtsho skyes kyis mdzad pa'i gsang bgrub pa las// slob dpon phal cher 'dri sad brjod// dpal ldan 'das pa mdangs chen gyi// rgyad kyi bsdus pa byed papo// dpa'
264a6(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten dbang phyug zer// bla ma'i zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis// dpal ldan 'dus pa'i sdud pa po// gzhan dag yod pa ma yin zhes// bdag nyid 'ba' zhig smra bar byed// rgyud mdzad pa ni thugs rdo rje// zhes bshad pa bzhin
264a7(rnying rgyud): gsung mkhan nyid kyis bsdus pa'i lugs yin/ gzhi tshad med pa ni chos mngon pa nas kyang thog min la tshad med par bshad pa yod do// dus bzhini be shra mi wa'i 'phel men nas kya / dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid du de bzhin reg par bya/ zhe
264b1(rnying rgyud): pa dang / phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i mgon po kun gyis/ zhes gsar ma nas kyang bshad la/ sangs rgyas gsang bas bsal pa bzhi la bshad do// rdo rje sems dpa' dbus su 'byung ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo 'pho bar b+ha ba gsar ma nas
264b2(rnying rgyud): kyang bshad do// tig ni shes rab ming du sgra// zhes pa ni gsang ting gi rgyad pe las/ swa tri prAn+d+ha tI ka Sh+ya ti bya ba yod de/ spu hri thig gi rgya skad yin/ nyi 'od seng ge'i 'brel pa nas kyang thig la bshad/ tig gan skad yin/ rgyud gzhan
264b3(rnying rgyud): byab 'phangs pan+de/ dkris pa rno la sogs pa gyis gsungs pa thams cad kyang dang po dgrasangs pa'i de nyid bsdus pa pa la'aphangs nas yod do// zhes pa la sogs kyis legs par bshad pa ltar 'phyags yul du yongs su grags pa'i bsan
264b4(rnying rgyud): chen por rgud 'di nyid kyi lung drangs shing sngar spros pa'i slob dpon de dag rnams kyis 'grel pa'i rnam grangs du ma dang bcas pas 'chad nyan gyis gtan la phab pa mngon sum du gyur bzhin rang gi blo gros dang grags pa zod mar gtong ba'i skyon tam gyi rgya bskyed lugs
264b5(rnying rgyud): la ltos shig/ 'on kyang paN chen shAka mchog pas// ting ma'i chos rnams 'phags yul nas// bsgyur bar 'bad pas bsgrub mi dgos// slob dpon sprul pa'i sku nyid kyis// gsungs pa nyid du grub pas chog/ 'phags pa'i yul
264b6(rnying rgyud): nas phyis bsgyur ba'i// sngags dang brda skad ma mthun kyang // mchog dang thun mong grub pa la// mi bslu 'grub phyir de tshad ma// dper na yul chen so so nas// grub pa mchog rnams kyis blangs pa'i// chos kyang glegs bam so so
264b7(rnying rgyud): las// 'phags pa'i yul du bsgyur ba min// rdo rje sems dpas gnang thob pa'i// bka' yi bsrub po nyid kyis// yul khams so so'i skad nyid du// bshad par chog par gsungs pa yin// rting ma'i chos lugs 'phags yul
265a1(rnying rgyud): rgyu sa smras sas smras sa dun nas // sa su
265a2(rnying rgyud): gyur min gyi// bod kyi yul du sngon byon pa'i// chen po rnams kyis der bshad pa'o// zhes rig par smras pa 'di ni drang por gnas pa'i rtog dpyod kyis shes bya rig pa'i gtan tshigs su snang zhing / snyir rgya gar nas byung ba kho nas rgyasade
265a3(rnying rgyud): zagangs che ru mi 'gro ste bstan bcos rnams kyang yul gyi sgo nas bzang ngan 'byed par mkhas pa rnams la ma grags shing mdzad pa po gang dag grub pa'i sa la bzhugs pa zhag yin na des mdzad pa'i bstan bcos rnams kyang tshad mar byed dgos pa'i phyir rgya bod gang
265a4(rnying rgyud): du byung rtsab byad med par grub pas skabs 'gar rgya gar ba'i bstan bcos las bod kyi bstan bcos bzang ba'ang yod de/ rgya baN so skyes sgra tshad la byang ba khon tu mtshan du byas te brtsams pa dang bod kyi yul brjes sam rnams kyis mdzad pa de dag las rgya/
265a5(rnying rgyud): mamatshan par bya dgos pa nyid de/ snga bakhyud kyi rgyud dang rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa chen por bzhugs pa de dag gis mdzad pa'i man ngag la brten nas nyams su blangs pas mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub me bslu bar 'grub pa bong 'dir yang mngon sum du
265a6(rnying rgyud): gyur pa rdzogs pa chen po klong sde'i gdams pas spang mi pha ma mgon po'i slob bcud bdun gyi rim pa dang / nyang ting 'dzin bzang po nas ldong ma sogs bdun brgyud du 'od gsal snying thig gi lam nas 'ja' lus 'pho ba chen por gzugs sku dengs pa sogs
265a7(rnying rgyud): rnga snyed byung ba dang / zur mes dpon gsum sogs shib klong nus pa'i btul thugs dang / sru de nyid kyis mkha' la mi snang bar gyur pa'ang du ma byung ba dang / 'phags pa'i blo gros kyis bde bar gshegs pa'i chos tshul zab mo'i gnas
265b1(rnying rgyud): 'dal ba la bsnyes pa mi mnga' ba'i 'dzam gling mdzes pa'i rgyan mchog pu thogs sbrum gnyis lta bu'i go 'phang la zhabs stegs bkod pa rong zom chos kyi bzang po dang / kun mkhyen chos kyi rgyal po klong chen rab 'byams pa sogs mang du thos pa rgya mtsho'i
265b2(rnying rgyud): rol du son pa'ang ji snyed byung bar gyur la/ thun mong du'ang stsal ba'i lo tsA ba po ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'i sman gyi rgyud bzhis kyang 'gro ba mtha' yas pa la dbugs 'byin chen po ster ba dang / gzhan yang zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang dang / drag
265b3(rnying rgyud): po ste phrin las bzhi po'i spronas las 'byams sgrub pa la thabs zab pas gangs can gyi ljongs 'di tsam du'ang jigs pa chen po dag gis nyam nga bar gyur pa na tha 'gyur rjes 'brangs dang bcas pa la dngos dang brgyud pa'i sgo nas skabs su 'chol dgos par blang bas pa
265b4(rnying rgyud): kyis 'phrog byed dga' bo dge pas pham par nus kyang nam mkha' la 'phur bar brtsams pa na 'dag phyar bas phur pa'i rig sngags kyis bcings pa lta bu mngon sum tshad ma yin na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can gzhan la snyan pa 'ba' zhig yin pas
265b5(rnying rgyud): mngon mtho dang nges par legs pa'i phrin las can gyi bstan pa de nyid phyogs gang du 'phrul bsam par bya dgos so// tshul de la dgongs nas mkhas mchog 'gos 'o sto ba gzhon nu dpal gyis/ snying na dad mas bstan pa bsgrubs nas lo bdun cu lhag cig gi
265b6(rnying rgyud): bar du dbus gtsang na rab tu byung ba ni gcig kyang med/ rnying ma bA'i sngags 'chang mang du yod pa rnams kyis yul so sor srub pa khyad par can gyis bkra shis par mdzad cing / khyim pa rnams kyis kyang de dag la dad cing zas gos sogs kyis mnyes par
265b7(rnying rgyud): bum dbang tsam de blangs shing / rgyud rim gyis smin pa la brten nas/ klu mas la sogs pa'i dbus gtsang gi mi drug gam brgyad du grags pa rnams gyon pa'i tshe/ yul dang yul phran rnams su gtsug lag khang dang dge 'dun
266a1(rnying rgyud): ci'i ba sa ma pa 'dranan tu sa 'byur ba dga'abadun sa marnams la mnyams padus sa d+hangs dag brgyad/ mangs pa dang bla pa'i shes tham da byung ba lta ya
266a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i grub thob brdung ba las byung ba yin no// zhes bshad pa ltar 'phags yul gyi slob dpon in+d+ra ba d+hi dang / ye shes zhabs dang / rta rob sogs kyis mdzad pa'i rdzogs chen gyi man ga zang thong bod du byung ba tsam las thub zo gzhan gyis mdzad
266a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i bstan bcos sngogs che ba bod du ma 'gyur yang slob dpon 'di dag gsang ba bsung ba la thugs brtan pas mchog tu zab pa'i man ngag rnams shul du bzhag pa'ang med na thun mong du 'chad pa lta zhog dpe tsam yang mi snang bar rgyas btab pa mang ba'i phyir mchog gi skal ba dang
266a4(rnying rgyud): ldan pa'i slob ma gcig tsam la shin tu gas nas bstan pa sring pa tsam ste/ dper na med pas med tsam ma thos pa'i na mkha' spyod pa ma mthing ba la grags pa bzhin no// de bzhin du data chen shAH shrIs slob dpon chen po dngos las rdo rje phung ba thos pa dang /
266a5(rnying rgyud): dam pas rdzogs chen la thugs dam kyi mthil du bzung ba'i lo rgyas kyang yod/ dus gyis grub chen zhi bzlas pas slob pon brgya ngos las drung sne du ma'i bshad bka' dbang bka' man ngag gi bkur sogs gsan nas 'gro lding gi yul sogs gzhan pa'ang
266a6(rnying rgyud): spel ba'i la thus zab dpon nyid kyi thobam pa du byed pa rnams kyis gsungs pa dang / 'ang ga gramag pas smrab ngan chen pa dang / bad+his// bi mal rnams pas dang sugs na pa'i rdzogs rgyan pod/ rje brtan ma las thob ma
266a7(rnying rgyud): gnas su lung paM las rdzogs chen sems sde gsan pas rig thog tu mnyan bangam bzhag pas re zhig chos dang gang zag snga jol bltar gyur kyang mnar rje sgo zag pa'i gtum mo'i chu byas nas rdzogs pa chen po blo zang chos zad kyi lam nas grub pa brnyas pa yin na
266b1(rnying rgyud): na na na su na du sa na / sa sas su smras
266b2(rnying rgyud): ma sa sa ma pa sa
266b3(rnying rgyud): pa sapa na// sa sa sa sasu sa
266b4(rnying rgyud): pa na phrus sa // sgru nga pa ma sa
266b5(rnying rgyud): sa na
266b6(rnying rgyud): du/ pa ma/ sa 'ad sa rnam na
266b7(rnying rgyud): sa su su sa
267a1(rnying rgyud): rin po chel ma 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i gdams cag 'di yang thog mar ston pa'i sa ba dpa na gyis dpa mabyung byas pa'am bstan du byin kyang ba chung dang sangs sung 'gyur ba las 'phyag pa dog bas sam gang gyur sngon zung po dadadi d+ha
267a2(rnying rgyud): cig tsam ma yin par du ma'i dgongs pa bsdus pa yin tshul zhig ni 'chad la/ de las rgyud 'di dang 'di'i man ngag yin rtsa ba 'di yin zhes ngos bzung rgya ma byung zhing bod du phyis 'gyur ba'i rgyud sde dag gi khrod du ni gdams ngag 'di'i tshig zin tsam yang mi 'byung
267a3(rnying rgyud): lnga/ rgyu mtshan des rje 'gos kyis kyang / mi thub zla ba'i slob ma rgya gar shar phyogs kyi dge slong prati in+d+ra ru tsis 'brog mi lo tsA bar gsang sngags kyi dbang bsrung / rgyad bshad/ man ngag rnams rgya cher gnang / rtsa ba med pa'i sam 'bra
267a4(rnying rgyud): zhig rkyang gnang / zhes gsungs la/ don du ni snga 'gyur yang dag thugs kyi rgyud he ru ka gal po las dngos su bstan pa'i/ dbang bzhi/ sgrib pa bzhi/ lam bzhi/ grub mtha' bzhi/ bdang ka bzhi/ 'gros bzhi/ spang
267a5(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa'i rnam gzhag rnams kyi rdzogs rim bshad pa 'di nyid du grub pa'i phyir rgyud 'di nyid kyi man ngag tu tshad mas grub pa yin no// yang lho brag grub chen nam mkha' rgyal mtshan nam las kyi rdo rjer grags pa gsang ba'i bdag po las dngos kyis lung len nus
267a6(rnying rgyud): pa zla ba gang yin lung ston pa zhig yod la/ de la phyag na rdo rjes snyan brgyad du byin pa'i rim pa gnyis kyi man ngag rnams rdzogs pa chen po'i lam dngos rkang tshugs par yod de/ je btsong kha pas yang dag pa'i lta ba zab mo la dogs pa gcod par grub
267a7(rnying rgyud): chen la gsol ba btab pas/ khong gis gsang bdag la khrus shing des bstsal ba'i zhus lan bdud rtsi sman mchog las/ yab kun tu bzang po'i dgongs pa/ yum kun tu bzang mo'i steng gtam/ rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag gi gsang tshig zag
267b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i yang / stan rten pa'i sgrubapa la gsas zhing 'dugs pa zang cad gsungs pa dang / lus dang / reg mamadu man pa nan sa kyangam bcas pa/ rgyu ma dpa/ rkyen mdadu/ yig dang ma nas gnas pa yin gsangs
267b2(rnying rgyud): la bca' bcos ma byed par kho dang gang 'dug gi steng du zhog dang go las de ka dag gi klong du sangs rgya ba yin gsungs/ de bzhin du rang bzhin dod gsal ba 'di/ ye nas stong pa dang dbyer med du lhun gyis grub/ de'i gsal thugs rje 'gag med/
267b3(rnying rgyud): shar kyang rang bzhin gyis ma grub pa gsum gzung 'jug chen por shes par gyis dang / dbyed med du sangs rgya ba yin gsungs/ zhes pa la sogs dang / phyag na rdo rje'i bskyed rdzogs bdud rtsi'i thigs pa las/ ye shes lnga'i zhal nas/
267b4(rnying rgyud): med blo 'das chos kyi dbyings// 'gag med spos bral cing yang snang 'khor 'das gnyis med ka nas dag/ rang snang ste med dbyings su thim// zhes gsungs pa dang / dngos 'dzin 'khrul sdang ma zhig na// stong zhing bsgom pa
267b5(rnying rgyud): gol ba'i gnas// stong nyid blo dang mthal na// gnyis snang chos kyis grol mi nus// sru lnga bsgrub byang 'dod pa dang // dug lnga spang byar 'dod pa dang // sangs rgyas thob byang 'dod pa dang // 'khod pa spang byad 'dod pa sogs// dgag sgrub der 'dzin mchod na/
267b6(rnying rgyud): yang dag snying po'i don mi rked// dmus long nam mkha'i mtha' 'tshol 'dra// nam yang 'khor ba'i gnas su 'khyams// blo 'das tsam la grol na sdang // blo byas chos kyis grol mi nus// don dam blo yi spyod yul min// glo zang
267b7(rnying rgyud): zad theg pa'i rtse// rang sems chos su dngos med la// rig pa'i ming 'dogs ma mdzad cig/ blta du med pa'i byang chub sems// stong nyid snying rje'i snying po can// spabs ma brjod med dang la zhog/ blolas 'das pa'i dngapa
268a1(rnying rgyud): cad ma la jug pa na/ sa san/ ga nga rnam sa pa nga ba dam nan can kyangs / dgas rngub sa
268a2(rnying rgyud): ya // ljin tshogs mkha' la dengs pa 'dra// nam tog ma spangs rang sa dngag/ lang ni lta sgom sdod 'bras bzhi// lha bzhi 'dod med pa gyis// sgom pacwa sgom 'dzin bzhig/ snong bzar med sgren mad myong // 'bras
268a3(rnying rgyud): blos spu dang chaskal// gzhan nas bsgrub 'dod yid sngon dod // brgyad khri bzhi stod theg pa'i chom// rgyud 'grel man ngag brjod mi lang // de drag thams cad 'dus pa'i bcud// mar gyi yang ldan wA d+ha mr-i// mun dag bdud
268a4(rnying rgyud): tsizigs pa 'di// bcung mchog seng ge'i 'o ma dan// snod mchog gsed dum ma tha y-i/ ya kya rje maud la byin// zhes pa la sogs thogs can gyitsha pa gang bub mtha 'a grazhan dang ma 'dres par yod pa phyir lam 'dzi nyid kyis bu
268a5(rnying rgyud): pa rnyes par mdzang / nga baba'ang nga bad kyi thubyab pa'a'ang bsgrub pa ma gtogs rnam sa bzhes ca gdogs nga mthar tshul rje zung chu gas ldan dngas pa 'i thogs kyig ba shad ci do du 'dug chen la la ba zla 'dags brjod
268a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyas ldan bdad ci ldan mchog tu bsdus pas shes nus so// de ltar min thong khab thu skad kyi gnas la mthen cheb 'i byung gi bram gyi / btsam la grub chen bsnyen mi dgos pa'i phyi / de bzhin du patu chen rdzo bzang rgyal mtshan
268a7(rnying rgyud): rdzag chen gyi khrid yig tu/ rdzogs chen phyag chen datham dang // lam 'bras gcod yul ni byed sogs// so so'i ming 'dogs mang na yang // nyams len can gyi rnal 'byor pas// dpyad na dgongs pa gcig tu 'bab// ces 'dir
268b1(rnying rgyud): nyams bzhes kyis ldog pas spyi tsam du de ltar gsungs pa rtog ge'i rig pa las bla ma'i man ngag la zan du lta ba rnams kyi tshod la dpag na rjes su yi rang ba bskyeng ba'i gnas so// rde pha wang kha pa dpal 'byor lhun grub ni rang gi yab rje rig 'dzin tshe dbang nod rgyas dang rang
268b2(rnying rgyud): grol nyi zla sangs rgyas la brten nas rdzogs chen snying thig gi lam la brtan pa thob pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po yin cing phyag rdzogs dbu gsum spyi khyab tu ngo sprod pa'i khrid yig sogs dang / snying thig la gsal byed kyi yi ge la shas kyang mdzad/ rje 'di las
268b3(rnying rgyud): gong ma lnga pa chen pos rdzogs chen gyi man ngag rnams gsan/ spyir lnga pa chen po ni chos rgyal khri srong lde'u btsan sprad yang pod 'bad kyi bde skyid spel phyir thugs bskyed smon lam dus su babs nas byon pa ste/ gangs ljongs 'dir ris su ma chad pa'i bstan pa dang chos
268b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor rnams la sri zhu bla lhag tu mdzad cing bye brag gsang sngags snga 'gyur gyi phyogs su rgyu mtshan mkhyen pa'i dbang rnon chos kyi rjes su 'brangs pas bka' gter gyi gsan pa kho na'i rnam grangs kyang pusti gsum du longs par bzhugs shing / log par smras pa dag kyang tshar
268b5(rnying rgyud): bcad pa'i rig lam gyi dgag srub lhung ba zhes pa dag kyang gas na yig gang+gA'i chu rgyan gyi glegs bam bzhi pa'i rnying rgyud skor du gsal ba bzhin yin/ de bzhin du rting ma gter ma'i phyogs kyang sngon 'phags pa'i yul du grub thob sa daha pa dang / dga' rab rdo rje/ bi
268b6(rnying rgyud): drub/ rta mchog/ klu sgrub/ pad+ma 'byung gnas/ mtsho skyes/ rol pa'i rdo rje/ spyod 'chang dbang po sogs kyis spyan drangs par bshad pa'i rgyud sde rnams kyang don du gter gyi chos yin te de'i go ba yang re zhig dbang po'i mngon sum du mi snang ba'i
268b7(rnying rgyud): lkog gyur zhig la bshad pa'i phyir ro// de'i phyir mtshon byed yi ge'i rgyud rnams re zhig bstan pa'i snod ma gzigs pas mi mngon pa'i dbyings su rgyas btab nas mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis gnyer byed cing bsrungs pa la grub pa'i skyes bu de dag la lhag pa'i lhas lung
269a1(rnying rgyud): bstan cing dus la bab pa na o can gyi gnas d+harma gany+dzi sogs sngags kyi pho brang chen po rnams su mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs kyis gnang ba byin cing dbang bskur/ gtad rgya bkrol nas rgyud kyi glegs pa mkhyen pa na rang gi
269a2(rnying rgyud): nyams su bstar/ sdod ldan gyi slob ma gzhan la'ang cung zad de bstan pa yin/ de bzhin du bod kyi dbang du byas na slob dpon thams cad gzigs pas phyi rabs kyi gdul bya'i sdang tshul ji lta bar mkhyen nas zab cing cha che ba'i rgyud sde rnams las sgrub
269a3(rnying rgyud): thabs las tshogs man ngag sogs lam gyi cha rkyen tshang ba de mdzad cing shog ser tshig rgyud du bkrol nas ri'i sul/ brag gi sgom/ g.yang zhag gi mtsho la sogs par gter bdag mi ma yin so so la gnyer gtad nas ma 'ongs pa ni las skal dang ldan pa'i
269a4(rnying rgyud): gang zag 'di nyid la dbang ba des thob par shog cig pa'i smon lam gyi gtad rgya dang bcas pas mi snang bar sbas pa dus kyis skal ba dang ldan pa'i skyes bu la smon lam gyi mthu sad/ dus rtags dang lung bstan 'jom/ slob dpon chen pos dngos su zhal
269a5(rnying rgyud): bstan cing dbang bskur/ mtshon gyi don gyi ye shes rgyas btab cad gtad rgya lung bstan dang bcas pas dbugs dbyung pa la brten gter ba dag bka' srung rnams dam tshig dang brtul zhugs kyis zil gyis mnan nas chos dang nor gyi gter ci rigs pa gter
269a6(rnying rgyud): ston gyi phyag tu son pas bstan pa dang sems can gyi don rgya chen po sgrub pa ni rgyal ba'i phrin las rlab po che phyogs gcig yin te/ 'phags pa bsod nams thams cad sdud pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mdo las/ dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid chos 'dod pa'i byang
269a7(rnying rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa gus pa dang bcas pa rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na 'dug kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams zhal ston par mdzad cing chos kyang thos par mdzad do// dri ma med pa'i gzi brjod
269b1(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpang sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos kyi gte ri dang / ri'i yul dang / shang dag gi nang du bcug pa dag yod de/ gzungs dang / chos kyi sgo mtha' yas pa glegs pam du byas pa dag kyang lag tu 'ong ba dang shA
269b2(rnying rgyud): ro// / dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid chos 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ni sngon sangs rgyas mthong ba'i lha rnams spobs pa sgrub par byed do// dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid chos 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
269b3(rnying rgyud): chen po rnams ni tshe zad na yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / lha rnams kyis tshe dang stobs sgrub par byed de/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / lha'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de dag 'dod na lo stong du'ang 'khod do// zhes gsung ba dang /
269b4(rnying rgyud): chos yang dag par sdud pa'i mdo las/ kun dga' bo/ gang gi chos yongs su gnas par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dag glegs ba ma la bris te gter du sbas nas mchod na/ des de nyid thob pa bcu thob ste/ gang zhe na/ sangs
269b5(rnying rgyud): spyan rab tu thob pas sangs rgyas mthong ba'i gter dang / lha'i rna ba rab tu thob pas chos nyan pa'i gter dang / phyir mi ldog pas dge 'dun rab tu thob pas dge 'dun mthong ba'i gter dang / rin po che'i lag pa rab tu thob pas zad mi shes pa'i gter dang / mtshan
269b6(rnying rgyud): dab dpe byad yongs rdzogs pa'i gzugs kyi gter dang / g.yog mi phyed pas g.yog gi gtwe ra dang / spobs pa rab tu thob pas dam pa'i gter dang / phas kyi rgol ba tshar gcod pa mi 'jigs pa'i gter dang / sems can rnams nye bar 'tsho bas
269b7(rnying rgyud): b.rasnod nams kyi gter dang / zhes sogs dang / chu grung rol pa'i mdo las/ nga yi bstan pa'i chos kyi gzhung // thugs nas thugs kyi gter du spos// yang nas yi snying por bya// ci phyir mu stegs can mgo rgod// nges don dbug
270a1(rnying rgyud): par gyur ta re// de phyir chu klung rgyun mi gcod// ces pa la sogs kyis bde bar gshegs pas seng ge'i ska ba skyon du med par bsgrags pas phrag dog gi gdon chen po'i gzhan dbang du gyur pas gtan tshig med pa'i dbang
270a2(rnying rgyud): dang / spyon ham kho nas lung bsgrags pa rnams bag yod par mdzod cig/ mdor na sangs rgyas kyi phrin las rlab po che'i yul theg pa dang grub mtha'i rnam gzhag chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gsang ba zab mo la shes byas gzhal ba'i thos bsam gyi rnam
270a3(rnying rgyud): dpyod rnon po'i rtog dpyod ltar snang dang ma mthun kyang bde bar gshegs pa ni thams cad mkhyen cing gsung ba yin pa'i phyir gang zhig 'khor ba spong zhing thar pa dang myang 'das kyi lam du 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid gang la gnas pa de nyid sangs rgyas kyi grub pa'i mthar
270a4(rnying rgyud): bzang po ma nor ba yin par shes dgos te/ rje btsun ma pham pas/ khams gsum dag na nyon mongs spong byed gsungs// zhi ba'i yon tan brjod par mdzad pa gang // de ni drang srong gsung yin ldog pa gzhan// zhes pa la dran pa nye bar
270a5(rnying rgyud): ma bzhag na chos khams rgya mtsho'i gting thug pa ni sangs rgyas kho na'i yul las 'phags pa rnams kyis kyang rtogs pa'i skabs med na gangs ri'i khrod kyi mkhas su re ba'i phyogs 'dzin can dag gis spyod yul du gyur pa lta ga la yod de/ legs par ma rtogs
270a6(rnying rgyud): pa dang / drang don kho nar 'chel ba dang / phyogs 'dzin gyi lam du rung ba dang / rang mnyam gyis phrag pa dog pa dang / rnyed bkur dang grags 'dod kho na khong du bcug pa'i kun slong gis srung ba btab pa 'di rigs bden pa'i
270a7(rnying rgyud): don la reg pa rdul tsam med de/ 'di ltar slob dpon gru grub kyis theg chen bshad pas nyan thos rnams kyis mgon po klu sgrub la lung bstan ngan pa bcos shing gsung rab tu bcug/ theg chen bka' ma yin par bsgrags/ 'phags pa
270b1(rnying rgyud): thogs med kyis bka' tha ma rgyal tshab chen po'i dgongs pa bzhin bkral bas rjes 'brangs dang bcas pa theg chen gyi nang nas phung / rgyal po d+ham pA la'i skabs theg dman rnams kyis he ru ka'i dngul sgrub shigs nas rnyed pa byas/ sngags kyi
270b2(rnying rgyud): glegs bam rnams me la bsregs/ theg pa chen po dang gsang sngags bdud kyis byas par bsgrags pas rgyal po'i chad pa phog par slob dpon ye shes zhabs kyis bslabs pa'i lo rgyus yod/ grod du'ang rjen 'od gzhon nus mdo las bshad pa'i
270b3(rnying rgyud): gnas lugs phyug chen bstan pas dag po'i rtog chos zhes sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ma yin pa tsam du byed/ kun mkhyen dang byung rdo rje dang chos grags rgya mtshos bka' tha ma'i dgongs pa tshul bzhin bshad kyang gyis mi bskyod rdo rje sogs kyis lta ba de mi 'dzin/
270b4(rnying rgyud): slob dpon dol po pas don dam bden pa rtag brtan du gsungs pas bod rnams kyis mu stegs grang can tsam du brtsi/ rje btsong khabs kun rdzob tshad grub tu bshad pa la gyis kyi mkhas pa rnams hUM dub phaT rub brgyab/ parda chen zi lung bas dab pya drang
270b5(rnying rgyud): por bshad pas sa skya ba'i khrod nas bzhengs dgos pa de byung / kun mkhyen lnga pa chen pos yang dag pa'i bstan pa phyogs su ma lhung bar gsan bsam mdzad pas dge ldan pa'i khrod du mtshud pa lta bus mtshon log pa'i ngag de la yid ches su bzung nas log par
270b6(rnying rgyud): bltas pas chos spang bar 'gyur ba'i sgrib pa ni tshad med de/ bstan pa la ma zhugs pa'i khyim pa'i skye bos sdig pa'i las mi zad pa bgyis pa yang zab mo'i gnas la dmigs pa tsam gyis zhi bar 'gyur ba'i skabs yod na dam pa'i chos la srung ba'am spangs pas de
270b7(rnying rgyud): ltar ma yin te/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo las/ 'od srung 'jig rten na gang zag rnam pa gsum gyi nad ni shin tu gso ka'o// gang zhe na/ theg pa chen po la skur ba dang mtshams med pa lnga byas pa dang / log sred can te nad rnam
271a1(rnying rgyud): pang drigs sa ni 'jig rten na shin tugaso kAr ste/ kun thos dang / rangs dus rgyas dab byang chub sems dpas kyang gas rgyas pas yin no// zhes gsungs pa dang / byang chub sems dpas
271a2(rnying rgyud): mchos nus pa'i mdolas/ 'jig rten chos rnams mi shes ning // dadu shes gnyis la gang gnas pa// 'di bden 'di ni can no nas// mamakhas de dag tsud par 'gyur// 'di ltar 'jig rten ces rnams kyi// yang dag rgyam da pa
271a3(rnying rgyud): shes pas// nga ni 'jig rten dam su dang yang / rnams kya rtsod par mi byed do// rtsod pa med pa'i chos 'di ni// sangs rgyas bran gyis bshad pa ste// 'jig rten mnyam pa nyid shes na// 'di la bden pa ma brdzun pa med// bdun pa'am
271a4(rnying rgyud): yang na bden pa khrig/ bstan pa la ni nang gyur na// mthar 'dzin par ni 'gyur te// mu stegs cand pa byed par med// gang gyid chos rnams yang dag min// badren pa dang ni brdzun pa med// de phyir 'jig rten 'das pa'i chos// ngas/
271a5(rnying rgyud): 'di gnyis su med par ba dang // 'jig rten chos nyid ji la bang // gang gis 'jig rten 'di shes pa// mkhas pa de dag bden pa'am// brdzun pa'i lta bar mi 'dzin to// nam mkha' sna bub rnam dgapa// gang gi 'jig rten rje/
271a6(rnying rgyud): shes pa// thugs pa chen po 'jig rten gyi// snang ba lta brur 'gyur ba yin// zhes sogs rgya cher gsungs shes/ gzhan yang rgyal tshab chen po ma pham pa 'i kyang / slong dman phyir dang dkar po'i chos bral log pa'i dargyal la brten/
271a7(rnying rgyud): spyid// dam chos spong ba'i sgrib pa dag phyir dang don de nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir// da la banam phying ltab dbang phyir chos sun 'byin pa bstan pa'i phyir/ chos 'dzin de sbed phyir mos pa dman gyi dgra bcom rnams kyis chos spong byed// dzi
271b1(rnying rgyud): zab mo'i chos nyams de bzhin mkhas pa rnams kyang me dang ni// mi zad phul dug gshed ma dang ni thog la'ang 'jigs mi bya// me sbrul dgra dang rdo rje'i mes ni srog dang bral ba tsam byed de/ de las mnar med rnams kyis 'gro ba shin tu 'jigs
271b2(rnying rgyud): sar 'gro mi 'gyur// gang zhig gang yang sdig thogs brten pas sangs rgyas ngan sems ldan gyur dang // pha ma dgra bcom gsod gang bya ba mi byed mchog tshogs 'gyed pa'i mi// de yang chos nyid nges par bsam pas myur du de las thar 'gyur
271b3(rnying rgyud): g+hi// gang zhig yid ni chos la sdang ba de la thar pa ga la yod// ces gsungs pa bzhin dang / dkon mchog brtsegs pa las/ 'od srung nga'am nga dang 'dra bas chos dang gang zag gi tshod bzung bar rung gis/ gzhan dag gis ni ma
271b4(rnying rgyud): yin te log par ltung ba'i phyir ro// zhes sogs rnam grangs du mas gsungs pa'i don la bsam par bya dgos te chos dang gang zag gi gnas la bden pa mthong ba'i chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa ma thob pa de srid du 'di ni log pa'o// 'di ni ma dag
271b5(rnying rgyud): pa'o// 'di ni bcos ma'o// zhes blo myur gyis shan 'byed pa ni mi zad pa'i las so// smras pa/ snang mdzad chos kyi nyi ma 'od 'bar ba// rnam dpyod yangs pa'i mkha' la rtag 'chang mong// phyogs 'dzin sprin gyis bsgribs pa'i gangs can
271b6(rnying rgyud): pa// mAng zhig nyin kyang mtshan mo'i lam du rma// zhes so// gnyis pa ni yul dang rigras dang yon tan gsum gyi sgo nas bshad pa la/ dang po ni/ 'dzam thus mtshan pa'i gling 'di nyid chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'di
271b7(rnying rgyud): star sems shin tu gzugs pa'i ma ni bu gcig pu la rtag tu mi sems pa ma yin pa de bzhin du snying rje'i dbang du gyur pa/ snying rje chen po ni kun nas rgyas pa/ snying rje gzhan gyis ldog tu med pa'i go cha chen po bgos pa nyid kyis 'khor ba'i rtsa
272a1(rnying rgyud): bo las pha rol du 'gro ba ni su zhig yod/ su ni pha rol du bkri/ su ni legs pa dang bde ba'i gnas su gzhag par bya snyam du dgongs nas sems can rnams byang chub la gzhol/ byang chub la bab/ @
272a2(rnying rgyud): la 'bab par 'gyur ba'i phyir bskal pa bzang por rnam par 'dren pa skyong gi phreng ba byon dang 'byon par 'gyur ba dag gi mdzad pa thams cad kyi nang nas/ gtso bo dang / rab dang / phul dang / mchog dang / gya nom par gyur pa bla na med pa mchog
272a3(rnying rgyud): gi bdud ci mngon du mdzad pa'i gnas byang chub snying po rdo rje gdan gang yin pa de 'dir yod pa'i phyir gling gzhan las khyad par du bsngags pa'i me tog gi char chen po 'jig rten kun tu byung bar gyur pa yin no// de la'ang rgya gar / rgya nag/ bod/ lI/ shalpa ka/
272a4(rnying rgyud): ki lA sha ste yul chen po drug yod pa'i gsum pa'i khab can gyi ljongs 'di thog mar mtsher gyur pa rim gyis bri nas nags tshal byung zhing de nas mi'i 'gro ba rim gyis chags pa ste/ 'jam dpal rtsa rgyung las/ rab can du mtsho the nas// sA la'i nags ni 'byung
272a5(rnying rgyud): bar 'gyur// zhes lung bstan pa dang / lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od lung bstan pa'i mdo las/ gdong dam pa can gyi yul zhes gsungs pa'i ljongs 'di'i 'gro ba rnams ngo skol gyi ston pas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyis
272a6(rnying rgyud): gdul byar rjes su gnang ba bzhin 'phags pa nyid rgyal po dang / blon po dang / rab byung dang / khyim pa dang / sems can phal pa dang / bems dngos yan gyi rnam par rol pa bzung nas kye ma ma la bdag gis 'dul bar zla ba'i sems canas
272a7(rnying rgyud): zhig lam chi stegs dang / lam dang / lam gyi 'bras bul bkod par byas/ dgod par bya/ 'god par 'gyur snyam du dgongs nas nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du gzigs shing srung bar mdzad pa'i zhing 'di nyid sa chen po la
272b1(rnying rgyud): bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dang gzhan sde bzhi'i dpal 'byor zad mi shes pa'i go 'phang mchog la rkang stegs bkod par gyur pa'i chos kyi rgyal po chen po'i tshul bzung ba rnams dang / mkhas shing grub pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i slob dpon
272b2(rnying rgyud): chen po du ma dang / bde bar gshegs pa dngos kyi zhal sbyin 'phrul snang shAkya mu ni sogs bzo sprul sku grangs kyis mi lang ba dag gis byin gyis brlabs shing phyi ma'i dus su rgyal ba'i bstan pa byang nas byang gi phyogs su rgyas par 'gyur ba ston pa nyid kyis lung
272b3(rnying rgyud): bstan pa bzhin snyigs ma las kyang ches snyigs mar gyur pa'i dus 'dir/ thub pa mchog gi bstan pa gnas 'phos pa lta bus 'phags pa'i yul las kyang kha ba can gyi ljongs 'di nyid khyad par du mas 'phags par shes dgos so// de la bod de dang pod chen
272b4(rnying rgyud): po gnyis su grags pa las phyi ma 'dir gnas pa'i skye dgu rnams rang bzhin gyis drang zhing g.yo dang skus ba slu ba shas chung ba/ dge ba la dkar zhing dkon mchog la mos pa brtan pa dang / rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che sgrub pa'i phyogs kyis gsal ba phyed pa
272b5(rnying rgyud): sogs yon tan gyi 'byor pa du ma dang ldan pa mdo khams smad du grags pa la chu bzhi dang skyang drug gi sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bye brag shar dang lho'i mthar krung chen po gnyis gya gyur 'bab pa'i bar du chud pa la gleng zhes bya ba'i ljongs chen po/ yul dang / yul
272b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ri 'ong ba mang po dag dang / gtsug lag khang dang / chos kyi gzhi dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dang / tshong 'dus dang / me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing dang /
272b7(rnying rgyud): nagus tshal dang / sman dang / me tog dang / mtsho dang / bkod ma dang / chu klung dang / dga' bar 'gyur ba'i kun dga'ang ba dang / dga' bar 'gyur ba'i tshal dang / dga' bar 'gyur ba'i rdzing bu sogs yid dga' dga'
273a1(rnying rgyud): gar 'a sha pa/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde bdung / rigs pa dang / ma dang ma mang bas byung ba/ 'bab mad/ khas d+hag dang / dang / nang thu dang / 'thod pa dang
273a2(rnying rgyud): chom rkun med pa/ sgo mo ba brgyas gang ba/ dbus pa'i skye bos brten pa/ mtha' 'khob pa'i skye bos spangs pa/ nor dang 'bru phun sum tshogs pa/ sngon gyi dus su go 'phang mthon por gshegs pa'i rgyal ba'i sras po mang po bsams bzhin thaM
273a3(rnying rgyud): nyebA bzung zhing de dag gis bshad sgrub kyi phrin las bzang pos rgyal ba'i bstan pa ches cher gsal bar mdzad pas 'byung po dkar phyogs la mngon par dga' ba rnams kyang bgyi ba de dag la mgu ba'i sems kyis bsrung zhing bskyab pa lhung byed pa sogs bsngags par ngos
273a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i yon tan du ma dang ldan pa'i yul gyis dbus bu chos dang mthun pa'i gtsug lag khang dang / dri gtsang khang dang / dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba dang / mchod rten dang / dpod pa'i 'dra ba dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dag/ bsim
273a5(rnying rgyud): khang dang / khyams dang / ska zung dang / mthongs khung la sogs pas mdzes pa/ bzang po/ bstan sdug pa'i khang chung brgya phrag du mtshar du dang rab/ gyi nang kun tu rig pa 'dzin pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun mang pos rdo rje theg pa'i sde
273a6(rnying rgyud): gtso bor gyur ba dag klog pa dang / kha tron du tha ba dang / rnal 'byor la rtag tu gnas pas sbyin pa dang bsod nams bya ba'i yul bla na med pas khyad par du byas pa dpal lhun grub steng gi chos kyi sde chen po nyid yod de/ de'ang snyigs dus su nye ruka
273a7(rnying rgyud): ga sa rgya 'dun dag sa du theg pa'i sasang rdzu kyi nga tshul yang dag par 'doms pa la tha med pa'i kyim kyi'i lagebs pa da god pa mapa na na dag sa shing / rje 'chang sangs rgyas pa tshogs/ batsham na
273b1(rnying rgyud): la'i mtshan can/ thams cad mkhyen pa dpal ldan chos rtsod/ sems dpa' chen po mi 'gyur tshul mtshan sogs dka'i bar rtul khab chen po'i mchod gnas dang dge 'dun gyi the chen po 'di dag gi bgo tu rnam pa 'a changad par bklags pa yin pa/ de
273b2(rnying rgyud): pabar rgyal po'i pho brang chen po srid pa'i 'byor pa rgya chen po'i khab tu zhi ba mchog gi go 'phang mngon par sgrub pa'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi rten mchog rin thang bzhal du med pa'i tshogs grangs kyis mi spyod pas rgyas par ba rnams shing chos dang don dang 'dod
273b3(rnying rgyud): dang zad pa ste sde bzhi dang / mi dge ba'i phyogs kun zil gyis gnon pa'i dge ba bcu'i 'byor pa dar ba'i rgyud du byung ba chos kyi rgyal pos chos dang ldan pa'i chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed do// gnyis pa/ mi'i dbang po 'di'i rigs chud kyi khyad par ni/ mdo
273b4(rnying rgyud): khams kyi phyogs 'dir mi rigs chen po lnga yod pa las sgo lha ste dkar po'i rigs su chad pa la rngu chen rgyal mo tshe bco brgyad kyi ya rgyal 'gar gyi rigs las byung ba 'gar chen ye shes bzang pos slang mdo drug gis ma la dbang bskur/ gcung dam pa chos sdings pa ni rgyal
273b5(rnying rgyud): ba 'bri gung ba 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po brten nas grub thob chen por gyur pa phyis spu bor byon te phu lung dgon pa rin chen gling 'debs par mdzad/ de nyid kyi dpon brgyud khams nas yar song ba rnams kyi mi brgyad la phu lung sde pa thog ka ba zhes thags pa byung /
273b6(rnying rgyud): ye shes bzang po'i skyes gnyis las bsod nams rin chen gyis 'gro ba'i mgon po chos rgyal 'phags pa'i zhabs la zug ste gsol dpon gyi las ka bzung / se tshon rgyal pos 'ja' sa sogs chen po'i las ka byin/ sku tshe'i mthar sa dmar yang
273b7(rnying rgyud): dkon du tshogs pa stong phrag tsam chos kyis bsrungs// de'i dpon po nu mu ru la sras dgu 'khrungs pa'i nang nas snying dpon tha ba bzang po la gong ma mchod yon gyisas dmar stong dpon gyi gos gnang // de'i sras chu rgyal ba bzang po'i sras pad+ma bstan srung /
274a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ dang sras dkar chen byang chub 'jam/ de'i sras rgyas kyi min ga tsug rdorje gdan byon te mkhas grub ye shes rgyal mtshan bzhin nas gsang grags snga 'gyur ci nga lcags la zas bsam bsgom gsum mthar rtsid bar ba 'dang
274a2(rnying rgyud): mkhas shing grub pa'i dbang phyug tu gyur/ mchod ya bde chen bsod nams bzang po yum 'das pa'i dgongs rdzogs grub pa dag thog tu byon nas phyir ma phebs par/ dge 'dun rtsal mtshan sogs mched gzhan rnams kyis rtser 'bod par mdzad pa na/
274a3(rnying rgyud): pa chos thags su mtsho dang / rnga chos kyi rdo rje gnyis nas lung bstan pa ltar phyir ma phebs par rim gyis lugs rang glings skyong bdag drung gi gram du phebs nas las thugs kyi mnga' thang chen po bdo ba'i 'go tshugs shing sde dge zhes pa'i mtshan yang 'di skabs shes
274a4(rnying rgyud): bar mngon/ de la sras bzhi byung ba'i po thad du grags pa des grub thob zang sgog rgyal po spyan drangs ste spun grub steng du grags pa'i chos kyi rje 'di nyid thog mar tshugs/ de'i sras gnyis kyi bla ma dpal ldan seng ge dang / rgyal mtshan 'bum gnyis te kye ma 'a
274a5(rnying rgyud): sras a swa zer ba la sras bdun tsam byung ba'i nang nas rgyal 'phel gyi sras nam mkha' rdo rje/ de'i sras lhun thub/ de la sras drug byung ba'i/ dang po ni rig 'dzin chen po rgod ldem can gyi rnam 'phrul grub thob kun dga' rgya mtsho ste/ gter ston 'jas
274a6(rnying rgyud): snying po'i chos kyi bdag por lung gis zin/ sngags rnying ma bka' gter la brten pa'i dngos grub parnyes shing / mngon shes dang rdzu 'phrul la dbang 'gyod/ khyab 'jug chen po sogs sde brgyad rnams bran ltar khol/ 'di nyid la rig 'dzin chen po ba
274a7(rnying rgyud): dul rdo rjes su chung ngu'i dus skyabs 'gro'i sdom pa sogs gsan cing bstan pa'i sgod thog mar 'jug pa'i bkang drin che ba'i bla ma gcig tu 'dzin par mdzad/ gnyis pa dpon gru 'phel gzhis kar bzhugs shing / gsum pa bla ma byams pa phun tshogs
274b1(rnying rgyud): ni stobs kyi dbang phyug chen po'i gnas la dbang byed pa'i smon lam gyi 'bras thu bdo ba zhig ste rgyal srid kyi zla ba gtso bor mdzad pas dka' ba med par rdzong sgo du ma'i bdag por gyur pas mda' ris rgya che ba la rang dbang bces/ bzhi pa'ang gzhis dkar bzugs/
274b2(rnying rgyud): pa za ma lha srung dang / drug pa b+h+ra ma karma bas ma 'grub gnyis ni chos kyi bya ba dang thugs dam kho nar sgril bar mdzad/ dpon gru 'phel gyi sras rnams las dpon chen kun dga' phun tshogs kyis khu bo bla ma phun tshogs gshegs nas rgyal srid kyi bya ba thogs
274b3(rnying rgyud): shig mdzad/ de'i sras su cotsog ro lu'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprul par gter lung du ma nas zin pa khri chen bla ma sangs rgyas bstan pa gdan sa phebs nas ris med kyi bstan pa thams cad la rim po che zhing / yun bub steng gi gtsug lag khang chen po bzhengs par mdzad
274b4(rnying rgyud): pa sogs rnam dkar gyi phyag rjes che/ gter chen chos kyi rgyal po klong gsal snying po dang rig 'dzin nyi ma grags pa sogs dang mchod yon du gyur nas bstan srid yun ring du brtan pa'i legs tshogs lhun thub du 'phrigs/ de nyid kyi rjes su bla ma bsod nams phun
274b5(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyis gdanas bskyangs shing / de nyid kyi mched ya pon dbang chen mgon po'i sras mi yi dbang po bstan pa tshe ring ni tshe rabs grangs med par bsags pa'i rnam dkar gyi bgyib rgya chen po'i 'bras bu dus su smin pas lte ba 'dir yang bsod nams kyi gnas dpag
274b6(rnying rgyud): par dka' ba mang po zhig dka' ba med par 'grub pa'i 'phags pa'i yul gyi rgyal po d+ham a sh+lo ka'i dpe blang 'os pa zhig ste/ rgyal srid kyi khri la bzhugs nas bzung bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi rten rin po che'i dngos po 'ba' zhig las bsgrubs par mdzad
274b7(rnying rgyud): padang babangs kyis mi lang bakho na dang / gangs can gyi rdzongs 'dir rgyal ba'i bka' 'gyur ro cog chos sbyin mi zad pa'i phyir bar du bsgrubs pa dang / res su ma chad pa'i chos gzhi dum rten brtes dang bcas pa ngo mtshar can mang po gas dadu bskrun par mdzad pa sogs
275a1(rnying rgyud): chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi rgyal por grags pa don dang ldan pa nyid dra 'thams la/ de nyid kyi sras gsum la/ dang pos skyong bsod nams mgon po gnyis kar bzhugs/ gnyis pa/ sA rkyod tha ma phran tshogs bstan
275a2(rnying rgyud): gzir bzugs shing rgyal srid kyi bya ba mdzad pas bstan bcos 'gyur ro 'tshal gyi bar bzhengs pa sogs chos srid gnyis kar mdzad pa rgya che/ de'i rjes su sa skyong blo gros rgyal mtshan lham dral gyis rgyal srid mdzad cing yab mes kyi dus bzhin chos srid gnyis ldan gyi
275a3(rnying rgyud): dpal 'byor grong 'phel du gyur/ de nyid kyi sras sa skyongs dbang bzang po ni rgyal thab kyi khrir bzhugs nas bstan srid snga ma rnams bzhin bskyang ba'i mur sku tshe ring por malon par gshegs/ de nyid kyi sras mi yi dbang po tshe dbang rdo rje rig 'dzin dang sras
275a4(rnying rgyud): mo rta mgrin phrin las dbang mo lha ma dral da lta phan pa de'i rtsa lag dam par bzhugs bzhin pa 'di'o// bye brag rnam dkar 'di nyid kyi bdag po'i rkyen du gyur pa'i khur ba zhes mkhan sa skyong dbang mo tshe dbang lha mo 'di nyid ni rus chen bzhi'i nad tshan skra zhes bya ba las
275a5(rnying rgyud): mthu stobs kyi dbang phyug a gnyan pa shi zhes pa gong ma se chen rgyal po'i lung gis bla mar bkur zhing nag po chen po zhing skyong stobs 'phrog dbang po bran ltar khol ba'i rnal 'byod gyi dbang phyug chen po de nyid kyi rigs las chad pa yul 'phos pa las deng sang skra rjer grags
275a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i sde dpon gyi brgyad las 'khrungs shing / de'ang dpal ldan sa rgya ba chen po bdag chen rdo rje 'chang dag dbang kun dga' blo gros kyis ste dge sa dbang bzang po de nyid chu tshe ring por mi bzhugs pa'i mtshan ma gsal bas dgung grangs bcu drug las mi 'gyung bar
275a7(rnying rgyud): btsun mo bzhes dgos pa dang de'ang stod smad rgyang ring nas mi 'gab par mnga' khul 'di nyid rang nas khab pa zhes mdzad na legs tshul gyi bka' yang yang phebs pa bzhin rigs dus phun sum tshogs pa du ma'i nang nas dus gsum la chags thogs dang bral ba'i ye shes
275b1(rnying rgyud): ma ga sa sa na pa sa 'as na/ na sa tsugs nga/ cug ma rgya sa // tu
275b2(rnying rgyud): nib phyogs sugs tha shig babs 'ju pa ma yin nam / ma mnan po'i gags 'dzin sgom mapa shis thab ma yin/ 'as tshul bzang pa tha~M ge rgya sa rgya ni 'a shi na/ dngaman tan bye pa ga y-i
275b3(rnying rgyud): byin pa dang bu rnye khang par byu nga gtam po'i chab srid kyigags tshugs tha' ba'i shing 'akyog paganyis yin ces par/ rjed rtson pa'i ba thag na ni ma gang pazhid mu ga kyi nga zhig ga rna pa sa sa yang sa
275b4(rnying rgyud): dan+ya grub ma'i tsheg zhigs ma dpa 'di nyid 'gas med du la thun du bgyis na lags pa'i bka' mchi dakhebs shing / gsung 'byam rnams rgyal kha' 'di dbang drab zhi dbang mdad pa'i bar byeng du dza / spyad pa 'grags pa'i na phrul brnyan
275b5(rnying rgyud): mchog gang gi sA yi 'gal rkyen can nga/ cong pal ma shes rang snang sngags bcung rgyas/ thugs kyi bzhid don de bzhin yongs 'gra' shos/ ces sngon pa bdu bcub pa dang / de bzhin nu rkyong zad dus pa'i khyim pas bub de sa
275b6(rnying rgyud): ldan zugs gted rgya mtsho'i mnga' bdag kun mkhyen pa sa med mi pa'i grong byin rnying gi thig pa'i gnang byang thugs kyi kyimathums/ dang tshul po meng rgyal mo brgya dbangs phyug sa 'da' tha e rkangs chos cing bsnyen pa'i migs tshogs rje
275b7(rnying rgyud): gsas 'ang/ dang nyi pa rgyam ma pa'i phrul pa dab dzin pa ma ngab rgya kyi 'acu mngan nam ci bas par 'a sun badras tu pa dzin mthags
276a1(rnying rgyud): par mdzad pa sags rim gro lhag tu bskyed pa 'ang yin na/ de la byas mtshan rtogs ma'i dus sutha med pa'i 'dzin mchog dam pa du ma'i lung gis zin pa'i thun mong ma yin pa'i yan tan gyi chags mang ba la dbang byed pa na// gas
276a2(rnying rgyud): pa/ thun mong gi spro/ ru gyur pa'i yon tan bsngags par 'os pa dag kyang ngo bstod med par brjod na/ bskal pa mang por bsags pa'i legs byas rgya chen po la goms pas gzhon nu'i dus nas tha ma dang pha ma sogs bgrang bar 'os pa rnams pa rim po dang
276a3(rnying rgyud): zhes che ba dang / gcig tu dge ba'i phyogs la dgyes shing / dkon mchog gsum gyi rten la gus shing zhabs tog che ba dang / gnas skabs su bdag nyid rigs gzugs dpal 'byor gyis mngon par chags pas gtan gyi bde ba la ci mi lham du med pa gyis pa
276a4(rnying rgyud): rnams dang nam yang mdzud pa'i skabs med pas dbus gtsang gi gnas chen rnams su dka' ba khyad du bsad nas phyag dang bskor bsogs lus ngag gi bshags kyang dang / zang zing gi mchod pa sogs tshogs rgya cher bsags shing gzhan yang su gsung thugs kyi rten bzhed
276a5(rnying rgyud): ba dang / dge sbyong dang / bkres pa dang / phongs pa dang / nad pa dang / nye du dang / gnyen bshes dang / zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la zas dang / gos dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / nad kyi gsos ldan dang / yo byad rnams stob pal
276a6(rnying rgyud): dga' zhing yongs su mi skyo ba dang / dad pa bzang ba/ dge ba'i bsam pa can/ bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan par zhugs pa/ snying rje'i bdag nyid can chos 'dod pa dang / skye dgu rnams la byams pa sogs rigs khyad par can
276a7(rnying rgyud): gyi ngang tshul bzang po ma gtang bzhig pas rgyal thabs 'dir 'khod pa na'ang / 'di lta d+mo sdes bcu pa las/ sa dang po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni phal cher 'jam bu'i gling gi dbang por gyur cing / dang sdug chen po la da /
276b1(rnying rgyud): rab tu thob pa dang / chos rjes su bsrung ba dang / gtang ba chen pos sems can rnams sdud pa'i gtso bor gyur cing / sems can rnams kyi ser sna'i dri ma bzlog pa la mkhas pa yin/ gtong ba chen po rtsom pa la yongs su dub par ma 'gyur ba yin
276b2(rnying rgyud): do// sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don spyod pa dang / don mthun pas las gang ci rlom yang rung ste/ de thams cad sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang / chos yid la bya ba dang / dge 'dun yid la byed pa dang / byang chub sems
276b3(rnying rgyud): dpa' yid la bya ba dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba yin te/ ji ltar na sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur/ gtso bor gyur/ phul du 'gyur ro//
276b4(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs pa ltad dang / 'phags pa'i yul du rgyal po mya ngan med kyis sa'i steng gi dge 'dun rnams la gser 'bum de phul ba dang / dge 'dun la rgyal srid ltos pa med par phul zhing / gangs can gyi ljongs 'dir chos rgyal khri dbang can gyis braH
276b5(rnying rgyud): dang po dge 'dun la phul/ gnyis pa ni rgyal po/ gsum pa ni blon po/ zhes gsungs pa dang / rab byung de la 'bad mi khyim bdun bdun phul ba sogs sri zhu dang bsti stang ji ltar mdzad pa'ang / rigs dang / gzugs dang / lang
276b6(rnying rgyud): tshe dang / dpa' ba dang / brtul phod pa dang / stobs dang dpung pa dang / nor dang / grags pa dang / mda' thang dang / longs spyod dang / 'khor 'bangs phun sum tshogs pa sogs srid pa'i dpal dbyor mtha' gcig tu bde ba ma yin pa/
276b7(rnying rgyud): sdug bsngal gyi chu 'ba' zhig/ rnam par 'gyes pa/ mi rtag pa// 'byor gud ris mos pa/ skye 'chi'i bar lag can/ snying po gang yang med par bdag cag rnams kyi ston pas rnam pa kun tu bka' stsal pa gzegs shing rtogs pa'i nges
277a1(rnying rgyud): 'byung gis thugs cud baphrul bas med rje'i 'ching ba ma tha' dag bcang cingab sadunams ma yin pa'i gnas las mgus mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshogs sa yang dag pa sugs pa la dgyes pa d+he/ grang bshes pa nga
277a2(rnying rgyud): pa las/ ser sna g.yo lha chags dang snyom las dang // mngon pa'i nga rgyal 'dod chags zhe sdang dang // rigs dang gzugs dang thos pa lang tsho dang // dbang thang che ba'i rgyags pa dgra bzhin gzigs// zhes sogs rgya cher gsungs pa skar
277a3(rnying rgyud): na gyis bdag rgyang chu sa pa rjod tshul yongs su dag pa rnams kyi rims thag sa da pas gas mamanam tha ra bya shA nga bangs pa dang dregs par gyur bas bkrung song pa rnams 'asrisum srid par gyu bye thugs sa cang 'du
277a4(rnying rgyud): pa lta bur gnas pa'i dam pa'i spyod tshul ma spad par gyur pa ste/ klu sgrub zhabs kyis/ gzhon yang rgan pa'i nye bar zhil dga'// mkhas par gyur kyang shes pa'i nga rgyal med// gzi brjed che yang bzod dang nges pa'i ngang // je mthong byin
277a5(rnying rgyud): yang nga rgyal dregs pa med// ces dang / slob dpon ma ti tse tras/ dga' bar bgyid pa'i yul rnams dang // rgyags par bgyid pa'i lang tsho dag/ bdag gi rang dgar smod pa de// kun tu don med bgyid pa'i sgo// phung ba
277a6(rnying rgyud): pa de gsum spangs// mkhas pas dam pa brten pa dang // dbang po dul dang shes rab kyi// stobs mtha'i nyams ni smad nas spyad// ces gsungs pa ltar ngo // bdog pa'i tshogs kyis shin tu 'byor zhing bdo bar gyur pa las kyang ru
277a7(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi rten bzhengs pa rgya che la rnam grangs mang ba rgya dngos gtsang zhing phun sum tshogs pa sha stag dang / gtsug lag khang dang / dge 'dun gyi chos gzhigs du 'jug pa dang / de dag nyams pa gso ba dang / dge bdun gyi 'du 'o dang /
277b1(rnying rgyud): dgan ma thag mchod pa'i lha ba nang 'as par mang dpa dang / chu bas ma sa ston man pa bya gag kyang ba rdus na thong bras thamasams canarnams ston dang srog lachud basbyin pa thun pa mi'i gzugs can rgyags pa blarnapa ma sun pa rnams
277b2(rnying rgyud): la'ang mtho ba sbyin pa dang / gtam sbran par slab sogs kyis phan pa nub pa la thas kyis bkod cing / ning pA dang / gas pa dang / phongs pa dang / bags pa 'i bye rnams la stan dang / zas dang / gos dang /
277b3(rnying rgyud): nye bar mkho ba sbyin pa sogs nam smin dge ba'i gru 'bra' khrig par zad du 'dug pa'i gtong ba'i phyag ring por rkyong bal goms pa ni/ 'dul ba ga zhi'i rgyal po nor bzang gi rabs las/ lha dang mi yi nang dag tu// bdag gi 'byor ba mthong nas nr-i//
277b4(rnying rgyud): gis phun sum thob pa yis// sbyin pa sa zhig sbyin mi byed// gang gis skyes thab rgya phrag thibs mnan cing // ser sna dag bor gyun pa thib mnan nas// 'jig rten pha rol 'jigs pas sbyin gtong de// bdag ni dpa' bo'i dpa' rab yin par
277b5(rnying rgyud): sems// gang zhig lag na mtshon zag g.yul ngor 'jug// de ni dpa' bo min+da zhes thub rnams gsung // gang la 'jigs pa med par byin gtong ba// de dag dbang po yin zhes kun mkhyen gsung // zhes gsungs pa dang / rgyal po zla ba
277b6(rnying rgyud): spangs pa las/ sa bdag de ltar 'apyong ba'i dus// da rjid dus nas sbyang btang rnying// yongs su bstobs gter drus// tshang di dag cig las gzhan dpag med// ga kyirnas seng ldang // khengs pas gzegs na che bgyi mchis// zhes
277b7(rnying rgyud): bshed bzhin gsog/ 'jog maM hacang sred par mi mdzad des skyong chen po gnang po'i dus kyi bus mchod ji ltar mchis so cog rnams gong 'phel gyi steng dru gsang ba ci rigs pa dang de bzhin du gas rting nges su mchad pa'i chos sdo ma tha thams cad du
278a1(rnying rgyud): chos khyad par can gyi srub mchod kyi thebs sbyor ba dang lo star du zab mo'i rnal 'gyor la goms pa'i dge slong gtso bor gyur pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa du mar chos dang mthun pa'i yon bstabs nas lhag pa'i lha du ma'i nA sngagapa dang brtsen pa ba
278a2(rnying rgyud): rgya kho na'i khongs su bsag tu 'jug pa dang / rang nyid kyis kyang gsang rnying ris med bka' gter gyi rtsa ba gsum sogs lhag pa'i lha mang po'i bskyed rdzogs nyams len bzlas brjod 'char can rnams dang yang ngo mngar ngo'i tshes bcu byung res kyis tshogs dang gtor ma
278a3(rnying rgyud): mchod sogs zhal 'don dang / tshogs bsags kyi drim pa la brtson pa rgyal srid kyi byabs mi bshol zhing / dus kun tu nges 'byung dang byams snying rje zab mo'i gnas lugs kyi de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor la goms par mdzad pa sogs dang mi 'bral zhing mdo
278a4(rnying rgyud): na phal pa'i spyod yul las ring du 'das shing dam pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par du ma dang ldan pa zhig go// gzhan yang slob dpon ma ti tsi dzas/ ci ste rgyal po blon po dag/ dkyil che snying rje'i bdag nyid ni// rtag tu nyon mongs med pa yi// las kyis rgyal srin
278a5(rnying rgyud): bya bar rung // 'jig rten 'di na blo gros kyis// nyam chung gyur dang mgon med pa// bya ba ma yin byed pa la// gdon mi za bar 'jug par 'gyur// de bas ji srid sa de las// myur du ma brgal bar du ni// blo mthun bskyed phyir mkhas pa dang /
278a6(rnying rgyud): bsdu bar dgyes lnga nan tan mdzod// ces gsungs pa ltar/ rgyal srid kyi bya ba byed pa'i blon po dang / dmag dpon dang / yi ge pa dang / pho nya sogs bstan bcos nas ji ltar bshad pa bzhin gyi rgyal po'i yan lag rnams kyang ma tshang ba med cing
278a7(rnying rgyud): gtso bor chab srid ni rgyal po'i mdzad pa'i rjes su 'gro ba zhig ste 'di ni rang bzhin gyis dkyil che zhing gting mi rtogs pa dang blo myur zhing tshig btsun pa dang / brtse ba'i sems kyis mnga' 'bad chab mi 'tshal bar bde bar skyong zhing / drang por spong ba'i
278b1(rnying rgyud): thugs kyis phyogs su ma lhung bar lce bo kunul snyoms pa'i khrims kyis gnon cing / mnyes shing gshin pas gya g+ha'i spyod tshul mi mnga' ba/ g.yo dang sgyus gzhan mi bkru zhing / bya ba thams cad la legs par btags te bag yod pas nyams mi dab
278b2(rnying rgyud): spyod pa sogs sa gzhi legs par sbyong ba'i tshul rnams kyang tshang bar mnga' ba ste/ rgyal po ka niSh+ka la springs pa las/ pha yis bu la ji lta bar// khyod kyis 'khor la byams bgyis na// bu yis pha la ji lta bar// khyod kyi zhabs 'bring dga' bar bgyid//
278b3(rnying rgyud): phal rnams rang bzhin bzang na ni/ khyod kyi dgongs pa bzhin du 'gyur// phal rnams rang bzhin ngan na ni// khyod kyi dgongs pa bzhin mi 'gyur// gal te gzhung lugs bzang ba zhes na// gong nas gong du 'phar bar 'gyur// ci steng ngan pa'i spyod mdza/
278b4(rnying rgyud): na// 'og nas 'og tu ltung bar 'gyur// dam pa'i las la gnas na ni// khyu mchog dang ni khru lta bur// rjes su 'tsho ba'i skye bo'i tshogs// 'di kun rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur// khyod ni gya bru la zhugs na// gya su kho na'i rdzas 'brangs pas// skye dgu khye
278b5(rnying rgyud): mdzad rjes 'brang ba'i// skye dgu de ni nyams par 'gyur// de bas bdagra gzhan bsrung slad du// thugs kyis rab tu bsgrims nas ni// gnang rgyal drang srong rnams kyi lugs// nyams pa gsar par bcos mu gsol// gna' yi rgyal
278b6(rnying rgyud): po'i spyod pa las/ gang dag bzang ba de mdzod la// mi rigs pa ni glang lugs de// smad par mdzod la sbrang du gsol// sngon gyi bka' khrims skyon chags pa// gna' nas mchis kyang rgyun chod la// rgyal po ka ni rnaMs mtshan
278b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i// khrims su bca' ba gsar pa mdzod// ces bshad pa bzhin no// chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe chos dang ldan pas chos kyi rjes su 'brangs nas rgyal srid byed pa dag la ni 'jig rten pa'i dpal dang 'byor pa thams cad dang gis phun sum tshogs shing 'jig
279a1(rnying rgyud): rten las 'das pa'i dge legs rnams kyang zad mi shes pa dag ma na gnas pa dang / mi ma yin pa rnams kyang de la dus rtag tu dga' zhing mgu ba'i sems kyis mthun pa'i rkyen ji ltar 'dod pa dag sbyor zhing mdza' ba'i grogs su dang
279a2(rnying rgyud): bzhin gyis 'gyur bas 'bad rtsol mi dgos par yid la bsam pa mtha' dag gegs med par lhun gyis 'grub pa dang / btul ba med par pha rol gyi rgol ba dang / dgra'i phyogs su gtogs pa rnams kyang mtha' dag par ngang gis nyams pa'am 'dud pa lhung byed
279a3(rnying rgyud): cing mnga' 'badra rnams kyang phun sum tshogs pa'i dpal la longs spyod pa zhig pas gna' bo'i dus su byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po'i sha tshugs can rnams kyi tshul ji lta ba'i go 'phang mchog gi mthar 'jogs par 'gyur la/ spyod tshul de las phyir
279a4(rnying rgyud): ldog pa rnams le ni ma yin te/ 'di ltar nor bzang du skyes pa'i rabs las/ rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba yul lnga len par rgyal po gnyis byung ste/ byang phyogs kyi lnga len dang / lho phyogs kyi lnga len pa'o// de la byang phyogs kyi lnga len pa nor can
279a5(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba grong khyer glang po'i khyim zhes bya ba na 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa/ skye bo mang pos gang ba/ 'thab pa dang / khrag 'khrug dang / 'gyed pa dang / chom rkun med pa/ nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/ 'bras sA lu dang / bu dam
279a6(rnying rgyud): shing dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa na chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa dang / chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed do// grong khyer de na yang mtsho chen po me tog sna tshogs dang bya sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa yid du 'ong ba yod do// mcho de ni klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs
279a7(rnying rgyud): pa zhes bya ba gnas te/ des dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab pas sa gzhi lhag par lo thog phun sum tshogs par gyur to// yul yang bza' ba dang btung ba shin tu mod la/ 'jig rten yang sbyin pa dang / mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur dang ldan pas dge
279b1(rnying rgyud): myong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang phongs pa rnams la kha zas sbyin par byed do// lho phyogs kyi lnga len pa'i rgyal po ni chos ma yin pa la lhag par gnas pa/ gtum pa/ gzu lums can/ spro thung ba zhig pas chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed
279b2(rnying rgyud): dang / rdeg pa dang / 'tshogs pa dang / gsod pa dang / 'dzi pa dang / 'ching ba dang / su mi 'dod dang / khong skyil dang / gnod pa sna tshogs kyis yul na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams rtag tu skrag par byed do// des chos ma yin pa la lhag par gnas
279b3(rnying rgyud): pas lhas kyang dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par mi 'bebs so// de nas skye bo'i tshogs de 'jigs pa dang yi chad pas rang gi srog la yang mi blta bar yul yongs su spangs te byang phyogs lnga len gyi rgyal po'i yul du dong nas gnas so// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na
279b4(rnying rgyud): gas lnga len gyi rgyal pos rang gi yul stongs par gyur pa dag mthong nas blon po rnams la chu cis zhes dris so// blon po rnams kyis kyang phyogs lnga len gyi rgyal po nor can gyi yul du mchis so// ci'i phyir/ smras pa/ lha byang phyogs lnga len pa'i rgyal po ni chos bzhin
279b5(rnying rgyud): gyis rgyal srid bgyid pas/ de'i yul 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa sogs snga ma bzhin dang / g+ha ni gtum pa/ gzu lums can sogs ji ltar gyur pa snga ma bzhin bsnyad pas/ skye bo'i tshogs slar 'ongs nas gnas par 'gyur ba'i thabs lta yod dam/ blon po
279b6(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis smras pa/ lha gapa ta byang rdzogs kyi lnga len pa'i rgyal po bzhin du chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid mdzad de/ byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / thugs brtse ba'i sems kyis yul bskyangs na ring por mi thogs par skye bo'i tshogs de skar
279b7(rnying rgyud): sa nas l+r-ing rdal dang / grong khyer 'di rnams su gnas par 'gyur lags so// rgyal pos kyang byang phyogs lnga len pa'i rgyal pos ji skar byed pa bzhin du bkyi bar khas grangs te/ yul de sdang bzhin gnas pa'i thabapa la 'bad par byas pa'i lo rgyas rta bus gas
280a1(rnying rgyud): bar 'gyur zhing mi'i dbang po 'di nyid kyi byin gi blon pa dang / yig pa dang / sman pa dang / dmag dpon dang / mdzod srung ba dang / spun ze dang / phyag zang ba dang / gor mang dang / khram gyi dru bapa dang /
280a2(rnying rgyud): dang yul mi rnams kyang rgyal po'i bya ba chos dang ldan pa'i rjes su 'brang zhing rjes su mthun par chos la stod cing / sbyin pa dag gtong / bsod nams dag byed pa dang / dge bal nye bar gnas pa/ spyod tshul yang dag par blangs pa kho na mang po dag pa/
280a3(rnying rgyud): sa pa rnam dkar gyi bya ba dngos bshad pa la bzhi ste/ brtsams pa'i dgos ched dang / bzhengs pa'i dus dang / gyi mo bsngags shing zhu dag bgyis pa'i tshul dang / bzhengs tshul dngos so// dang po ni/ gangs re'i ljongs 'dir gna'
280a4(rnying rgyud): dus su sprul pa'i chos rgyal chen po khri srong lde ba tsan gyi thugs bskyed las/ rang dang gzhan gyi grub pa'i mtha' rgya mtsho lta bu'i pha rol du byon cing sa chen po la bzhugs pa'i mkhan slob lo tsA ba chen po du mas lus dang srog la ci mi snyam pas 'phags pa'i yul nas
280a5(rnying rgyud): 'bad pa chen pos btsal zhing bod kyi rgyal khams kyi skye dgu rnams mngon par mtho ba dang nges par leg pa'i phyir mdo dang sngags kyi sde sdong bgrangs kyis mi lang ba zhig bsgyur ba las nang pa bskyed rdzogs gsum ni 'phags pa'i yul gyi sngags pa rnams kyis ji ltar nyams su
280a6(rnying rgyud): blangs nas gsang ba bzhin du sprul pa'i rgyal po gsang ba bsrung ba la thugs shin tu skam pas lkog chos kho nar mdzad nas bsgyur cing gtan la phabs pas gdul bya thun mong du spyod pa lha ci mtshan tsam shes pa 'ang dkon pa'i phyir skabs de dbang bskur ba la'ang
280a7(rnying rgyud): dadrang byung zhing gagacig mi nga byeng / gzhan nang thung dang / mang 'dis/ khams gang sumanamags sum pa rnas pas mo drun pas kyis phrab cid pa'i zhag tu bsnor nyan pa shad bas par phyogs su dad pa mang dang / desung du /
280b1(rnying rgyud): sbyad ba ma po gnyis pa las/ gsang sngags kyi chung rnams gzhung gis gsang bar bya ba yin te/ snod du ma gyur pa rnams la bshad cing bstan du'ang mi rung la/ bar du bsgyur zhing spyod par gnang gis kyang / ldem po'i ngag tu bshad pa ma khrol nas/
280b2(rnying rgyud): ji bzhin du 'dzin cing log par spyod pa dag kyang byung / sngags kyi rgyud kyi nang nas zu zhing bod skad du bsgyur ba dag kyang byung zhes bzlas kyi/ phyin chad gzungs sngags dang / bla nas bka' stsal te bsgyur du bcug pa ma gtogs pa/ sngags kyi rgyud dang /
280b3(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi tshig su zhing bsgyur du mi gnang ngo // zhes bshad pa bzhin dang / slar yang chos kyi rgyal po sad na legs mjing yon gyi snga ring la lo tsA ba dab la brtsegs dang / chos kyi snying po dang / lha dbang dang / dpal gyi lhun po sogs kyis 'phang thad ka
280b4(rnying rgyud): med kyi gtsug lag khang gi gsung rab rnams the ma byang du btab pa las dkar chag 'phang thang ma zhes bod du rgyal ba'i gsung rab rnams phyogs gcig tu sdigs pa'i thog ma de yin la/ de'i rjes su lo tsA ba dpal brtsegs dang klu dbang srang sogs
280b5(rnying rgyud): stong thang ldan dkar gyi pho brang na bzhugs pa rnams la zhus chen mdzad nas dkar chag ldan dkar mar grags pa mdzad mod kyi/ gsang sngags nang rgyad sde gsum ni bka' gnyan pas 'dir ma bkod do// zhes nang pa bgyid rdzogs gsum gyi rgyud sde rnams ni
280b6(rnying rgyud): gsang ste ma bkod par sngang la/ de'i rjes su btsan po ral pa can gyi bu ring la po brang 'on cang rdo dgu thog mar nyi dog gi mkhan po rgyal ba'i bshes gnyen dang / lha dbang byang chub dang / tshul khrims dbang po byang chub dang / sbyin pa tshul khrims dang /
280b7(rnying rgyud): byang chub ba shes gnyen la sogs pa dang / bod kyi lo tsA par k+Sha dak+Shi ta dang / chos nyid tshul khrims dang / ye shes sde sogs kyis sngar 'gyur ba'i gsung rab rnams skad gsar bcad kyis gtan la phab ste sngon gyi yab mes kyi dus chos skad thod la ma grags pa
281a1(rnying rgyud): gsar du btags pa rnams bla'i gzhung dang myi mthun pas 'das dka' ba rnams sa sor phul te bris/ rkang kyang ba bshad mi 'tshal ba rnams sgra'i lugs bcan par bgyis par/ don gyi dbang bcad par bzhes nas dang
281a2(rnying rgyud): btags shing gtan la phab pa'i skabs su'ang nang cud sde gsum gsang nas spyod pa 'ba' zhig yin pa'i phyir khyab gdal du mi sgrog par bkas bcad pas skad gsar bcad kyis bcos kyang ma phog la glegs bam du mar yang ma 'phel bas gdams ngag gi dpe rnams shang
281a3(rnying rgyud): lo rlung khyer lta bus srang kha 'brim pa dang / gsang 'a grom du khyer ba'i skabs ma byung bas chu de dag gis byin rdzab dang nus pa lakhrud pa dang g.yel bar ma gyur pas sgrub pa po mchog rnams kyis rang rang gi thub gnas rnams su nyams su blangs shing dngos grub brnyes
281a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i gsang chos dum bu dum bud yul phran khol bu rnams su mi mngon par ci rigs su bzhugs pa las mtha' dag par phyogs gcig tu 'dril ba dang / dkar chag sogs 'debs par ma byung la/ gyis su bu ston rin po ches tshal pa bka' 'gyur du yo ga gsum gyi
281a5(rnying rgyud): rgyud sde gtso bo gtso bo dag nges pa 'dren pa'i slad du bkod par mdzad pa las yongs su rdzogs par ni bsdu ba'i skabs mazung la/ zung 'ug rgya lung du chud dag rim tsam bzhugs shing khams phyogs 'dir ka \u0f7fthog tu sngon nying chud rdzogs par gser las bzhengs pa bzhugs
281a6(rnying rgyud): skad 'jug kyang dus kyi chud pas zag 'byor du sor bas dreng sang tshang bar ni med cing / pad skabs su gter chen dat+na gling pa yab sras kyis dpe dang bka' lung gnyis ka'i rgyun thugs rtsol chen pos btsal nas bzhengs pa zhun 'gug pho brang du bzhugs pa dang / phyis
281a7(rnying rgyud): sug tsang rong gong ra lo tsA ba gzhan durdo rdo rjes bstan pa'i btsas su thugs bskyed rgya chen pos ji snyed pa tshar gsum bzhengs nas dbus gtsang dang / khams kong rnams su chos kyi sbyin pa rgya che dngartsal zhing / rkyen de las khams phyogs 'di rgya med 'phel
281b1(rnying rgyud): mod kyi/ dar mtshang ba rnams kyis sbyin gling gter chen rin po che skra mchod kyis thugs rtsol chen pos phyag tu 'byor ba rnams stag za'i yul gyi mkhas bub chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa kun bzang rnam rgyal dang / kun bzang blo gros rnam gnyis kyis mchen
281b2(rnying rgyud): brtson chen pos mdo khams su spyan drangs pas phyogs 'dir rgyud 'bum rin po che dpe dang bka' lhung gnyis ka'i rgyun ha lam tshang bar gyur pa yin no// 'on kyang snyigs ma'i dus 'dir bstan pa la zhugs pa'i gang zag rnams kyang gal chung chos la
281b3(rnying rgyud): byed pa'i dbang gis legs smon dang 'jigs skyob kyi ltar snang tsam las tshul bzhin spyod pa ni nyi ma'i zil gyis non pa'i chu skad lta bur gyur pas rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che bags kyis 'grib cing rjed dang grags pa la sogs chos brgyad la snying por dril
281b4(rnying rgyud): pas bstan pa zin par rlom pa'i chen por khas 'che ba rnams kyang don bzhin du thos bsam bsgom pa la rang nyid 'jug pa dang gzhan dag de la spyod pa lnga zhog/ bklag lung tsam gyi rgyan la'ang ci mi skam pas 'bad rtsol dor ba zang zing gi dngos po phra mo
281b5(rnying rgyud): tsam la'ang dbang shes rtsal sngags su bsgrims nas gtan gyi bde legs pa lus pa'i rtsa lag gsung rab don du gnyer ba la yid stong por byed cing bgyi ba'i tha shal du brtsi ba'i dus kyi 'gyur ba'i bag la bltar mi mngon par zhi bar cha bas bde bar gshegs pa'i
281b6(rnying rgyud): phrin las tshad med pa'i gnas chung gsan cing sngon gyi rgyal blon byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis lus srog nor gsum phangs pa med par theng la bor nas bka' bas btsal/ dkon pas bsgrubs pa'i mdzad pa rmad du byung ba'i phyag ris dang / thug
281b7(rnying rgyud): bskyed bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i grub 'bras chung 'dza' ba la ring por mi thogs pa gzigs nas blol khur du mi bzod pa'i gdung ba dang ngal ba chen po skyes par gyur te sngon med pa'i legs byas 'di lta bu zhig grub par gyur na ci ma rung snyam du dus ring mo nas thugs
282a1(rnying rgyud): la brdag par mdzad pa la 'phrul gyis sad pa'i rkyen ni/ pAN chen bi ma la'i ye shes chen po'i rnam rol rdzogs pa chen po'i lam nas thub pa'i mngon rtags rig pa rgyad phabs mngon du gyur byas phyag na bad+ma lA badzin pas
282a2(rnying rgyud): bsngags pa'i me tog char du bsnyil ba rdzogs chen pa pad+ma rig 'dzin gyi thugs kyi sgras mchog gsum gyi ya gral/ ji skad du/ thang yig las/ mi la lus chas ya ma zung du 'ongaHbstan pa'i chos kyang ya ma thung du 'gro \u0f7fdge rgyas bris pa'i

282a4(rnying rgyud): sogos nas sgra gsung thugs yon phrin las kyi gteng ba ched po lnga'i mtshan tha ti ma dug na drangs pa'i gtes ston nyi ma grags pa'i sprul pa'i ub dz+ra theg mchog bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes snga 'gyur bstan pa'i nyin byed chen po de nyid byon/ rje de nyid kyis khams
282a5(rnying rgyud): dbus kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen nyi shu rtsa lnga tsam la btsun nas tshul ba'i bstan pa res bu ma chad pa la thos bsam bsgom gsum tshig tsam ma yin par mdzad pas kyi so thar gyi sdom pas su btsun/ nang byang chub sems kyi sdom pas thugs rgyang grong
282a6(rnying rgyud): gsang ba rig pa 'dzin pa sngags kyi sdom pas sku bzhi'i sa bon legs par yin/ lam rim pa gnyis kyi nyams bzhes mthar phyin pas rtsa ba gsum sogs lhag pa'i lha rab 'byams kyis zhal bstun cing gsung gi gsang ba thob/ mdo sngags kyi
282a7(rnying rgyud): dang bye brag nyid ma bka' gter gyi thub mtha'i rtsa ba slong nges pa'i gzhung lugs chen po rnams 'chang spel gyi phrin las kyang rgya che/ khams dpas kyi gdan pa gnyis kyi gcos bstan pa dang 'gro ba'i don la dngos dang bzhud nas 'gyur ba'i bya ba las kyi 'dzar
282b1(rnying rgyud): rgyang tu gas kyi na dang / dadag mchad pa'i 'a pa nagrus nga chab bathungs/ mdu na ma gas brdzun pa 'a ba ga kun du/ mthan pa g+sa ma sa du byug nga shA 'du
282b2(rnying rgyud): badzin gyi 'dzin pa.athun pa sangs rgyas gnyis pa ni chos kyis pa gang padung dbang dri gyu pa ma'i gted mi myang bdag dgenalan tha ma cing pa'am/ dba' bo las sa rdul skyes pargya mthong ba dbyangs pa da byi ngas pa 'o
282b3(rnying rgyud): drug dado nas ngongs su srab bachos kyi dbyings su ma ngan las 'dus pa'i 'khor 'das sde mnyam chen por ro gcig gang drang ba'i don tsam du dag pa'i rnam rol cing yang 'char ba chos nyid kyis bdag cag gi ston pa'i drung du shes rab ca rnams kyi bachag nyon
282b4(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten du thub pa'i rtsal tshwab gnas brtan chen po bcu drug gir mgro ba dge bsnyen d+hamatha/ rib cu 'dzin nas 'phags pa las d+haN+Da s+yawa dang / nyi the le bcang ma stan drangs pa'i rgyal po thabs nga'i ponye dge bsnyen gyi 'dzi da
282b5(rnying rgyud): kyibyin pa can du thogs pa/ slob dponas ng+yas nas gnyis pa'i thugs pas lang sro dkon mchog 'byung gnas/ rje btsun pazad pa rdodza'i thugs mas dan rjod ngas pa po 'gro ba de mgon po pa dam pa bsod nams
282b6(rnying rgyud): mdzan/ mnga' bdag gsung sprul grwa chos kyi dbang phyug gi rigs sras pa d+ma bang chen/ chos kyi rgyal ba'i dbyung po dang byung rdorje/ chos rgya ltar rmed pa/ a mkhang rdzogs ldan kan zin pas sogs bsgyun pa dang gangs bya

283b3(rnying rgyud): drag gi las rab 'thams gang la 'tshams byed dus kun tu sgrub par mdzad pas thab bstan na bu gling sa chos gzhis rten brten pa dang bcas pa brtan papa ma da pa sogs pa dngag rgyan tshad med pa bcar/ sa myong da'adri mong srid pa la bye'i pa 'a dri

283b5(rnying rgyud): sa sbal mar phyogs mtha' gnas chen rnams su 'gyod cing zing mdzang gi zug nag bad ba chen po nas a mr-i ta phyug tu son/ ti la blo zag nas chos rgyal dang gling bas yang gted dugs pa'i gyu pa padz+ra thA su dngasa'
283b6(rnying rgyud): rkyen brgyang sags pa lag du bcug nas rang gnas su phabs/ bar ka bsas gnas dus kyi 'byur ba rko basmras rbang bas thugs 'byung steg ter byin stong kyi 'gro na rnams ga bu brtul bar dgangs pa med da phyogs pan dang chung smras pa'i rnam
283b7(rnying rgyud): ma myong dbang mo dam pa 'dod kyim bzhin bkring rgya na bsngal zhing thugs su sring pa'i thub yang sang mang dpas legs chags sa na par ma yang dbyabang ma dang/ bar yod rtes ga kyi pasta pa'i phyi pa gas grags nga theg pa rdzag
284a1(rnying rgyud): de las khyad par du gyur pa pog gsum po'i rgyud sde rnams te dus kyi chud pas rim gyis 'chad nyan dang dpe'i mtha' brten pa nyag phra ba ltar gyur pa 'di nyid 'jig rten gyi khams su mi rung gis rngas ring por
284a2(rnying rgyud): gang la brten nas thos pas ma bsgom pa'i gzhi glegs pa ma zad mi shes pa 'byung ba'i phyi mo gcig la brten pa'i thabs las gzhan med par dgongs/ de ni stobs kyi dbang phyugs rkyong chen po'i thugs rje bskul ba'i mthu las gzhan gyis ze mi sogs
284a3(rnying rgyud): gags te/ thugs bskyed lhag pa'i bsam pa bzang pos drangs pa'i dngos pa'i 'byor tshogs yod dgu rtsa la sbugs lta bus dngul srang stong phrag gi rin thang du bskor ba zhu rten du phul nas bskul ma zhus pa ltang spro ba chen pos zhal gyis bzhes te bkyi ba 'di

284a7(rnying rgyud): rgya ba'i mdzad pa bstan cing lo de'i chu stod can gyi nya la lnga sde bzang por rim pa dang po'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas lo grangs nyis stong bdun brgya nyi shu/ dba' bo lcags 'brug lo'i nag pa zla ba'i nyal zla ba bzang po'i ded dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i thad
284b1(rnying rgyud): bskrun nas sa ga zla ba'i chos bco lnga'i tho rangs gzugs su yi bkod pa bsdu ba'i mdzad pa bstan nas nyis stong drug brgya bdun du don bzhi/ shing spel sangs rgyas gnyis pa pad+ma sa ma b+ha ba'i mtshan dpe'i dkyil 'khor zhing 'dir thog mar gas
284b2(rnying rgyud): ba'i tshul bstan nas nyis stong drug brgya bdun cu/ sa ldel ma la ya'i ri bo ga nam lcags 'bar ba'i rtser gsang ba'i bdag pos rigs can dra ma lnga la rig pa 'dzin pa'i sngags kyi sde snod ston pa dang / sa ho ra'i rgyal po in+d+ra bu d+hing khang par sde
284b3(rnying rgyud): sdod chen po bco brgyad kyi glegs bam chang ngu babs nas nyis stong drug brgya bzhi bcu rtsa drug/ shing glang lta bu sems lhag can slar yang mi'i yul du theg mchog rdzogs pa chen po spel ba'i slad du sprul pa'i skur snang ba slob dpon chen po dga' rab rdo rje
284b4(rnying rgyud): bltams nas nyis stong sum brgya sum cu/ lugs stag zan g.yang mi 'gyur lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang bzhengs nas tshig stong bzhi bcu rtsa gcig rnams sngon du 'das shing / bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'bras bu'i dus gsum dang /

284b6(rnying rgyud): dang / 'dul ba'i dus gnyis bsdoms pas lnga brgya dang bdun cu don gsum yod pa/ sngon gyi drang srong chen po dag gis A nar+tha zhes brjod cing / ljongs 'dir kun dga'ang 'bod pa/ rgya nag po'i yul du b+hi yin te shing pho stag gi mo/
284b7(rnying rgyud): tor lugs kyi zla ba gnyis pa/ rgya nag po'i dpyid bla 'bring po ste yos kyi zla ba/ 'phags yul ba'i dbo zla ba/ dkar phyogs bzang po gsum pa'i tshes/ res gza' lha'i bla ma rgyu skar rgyal gyi lha mor rtse ba/ 'chi med grub pa'i sbyor ba/
285a1(rnying rgyud): 'phrong chen mdung / spyor bskal bzang / rten 'brel 'du byed/ nyi ma lcags sbrul/ spang kha kho na/ sme ba gcig dkar sogs rgya dkar nag gi 'phrod sbyor nyi dus phun sum tshogs pa'i nyin ji skad du slob dpon bus/ dam

285a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i bsod nams kyi mthu mi dman par bdo bas legs byas 'di lta bu sgrub pa la zhum pa med pa'i snying stobs dang / mi dgyes pa med pa'i spro ba dang / dam bcas pa brtan cing 'gyur ldog med pa'i blo gros sogs kyis thog mar yi ge 'bri ba sogs kyis

285b2(rnying rgyud): der/ rnge zlu ma kun bzang rnam rgyal dang / gzungs chen sangs rgyas ye shes kyi rnam do la rdo rje dpanga' bos bzhengs pa'i rgyud dag rim dang / dpal spangs su bzhugs pa'i rag rim rnams dang / go 'jongs mang bsod lus bzhengs pa'i rgyad kyi
285b3(rnying rgyud): cha tshad sogs phyogs 'dir bzhugs pa phal cher spyan drangs/ de rnams su mi bzhugs pa'i sems snga dang ma hA yo ge'i skod gyi rgyud 'ga' zhig rje bla ma rig 'dzin 'jigs med gling pa'i zhal snga nas kyis bgengs par mdzad pa'i rgyud 'bum nas nas/
285b4(rnying rgyud): yang mtsho sngon po'i phyogs su gsang sngags snga 'gyur gyi bstan pa'i snad byed gcig pu par gyur pa de la'i chu thog zu dag dbang bshad grub rgya mtshos dbus su bzhengs par mdzad pa'i rnying rgyud skya chos pod sum du skor phyogs de'i skye dgu rnams bsod nams
285b5(rnying rgyud): mngon par 'phel ba'i slad du spyan drangs te bzhugs pa dang lugs bstan pa'i nyin byed ze chen sprul pa'i sku rin po che ldan rgyas kyi thugs brtson chen pos bka' gnang bzhin a mdo sgo mo'i sa char 'khrungs shing / bslab pa gsum dang bskyed rdzog
