285b7(rnying rgyud): 'byor pa rnams sgo bsun tezhu chen mdzad pa po ni/ sgra dang / lhan dngags dang / mngon brjod dang / sdeb sbyor dang / rtsis kyi gtsug lag dang / yi ge'i rnam grangs du ma sogs thun mong gi dag pa du ma la mkhas pa'i pha rol du son cing / sdom pa gsum dang / @
286a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ rdzogs rnab pas thugs chud legs par gtams pa'i yang dag pa'i lam gyi bshes gtan dmapa/ rig pa dang ma dag pa rnam par 'byed pa' blams kyi mig phung por byang rdzo / brdad bya dang rjod byed kun sun chags
286a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i legs bshad smra ba'i dbang phyug chen po'i gnas su dbang bsrung ba brnyes pa/ thun mong gi spyod yul dus skyed chen po'i rgyal srid kyi yi ge ba dkyus ma'i tshul gyis 'khod pa snga 'gyur ring lugs su zhugs pa'i mtshan pad+ma rnam dag ces bla dgas su 'dod pa gang
286a3(rnying rgyud): sa dpyad pa gsum gyis legs par dpyad pa la zhugs pa dang / rig par smra ba'i blo gsal gzhan dag gis kyang 'bad pa chen pos mi bcos su mi rung ba 'ga' zhig legs par bcos shing dag par bgyid pa'i bar skabs su kho bo cag la'angs spyod dbang mos bka'
286a4(rnying rgyud): rtse bstsal pa ldog ma nus pa dang shing yos kye lor sngon zla ba'i rdzogs pa dang po'i chos la rtsa ba gsum dang chos kyong srung ma'i tshogs la gtor ma dang tshogs kyis dgyes pa bskyed cing gnang ba zhus nas zhus dag gi khur blangs pa yin no// de yang spyir rnam shes las klog
286a5(rnying rgyud): gyur cing tu 'grus la zlo ba'i rdo rje'i gsang tshig chen po rnams ni mtha' drug dang tshul bzhis dpyad pa'i gnas su gyur pa las chos nyid kyi don la rnal du ma 'byor pa'i rtog ge'i rig pa ltar snang dang tshig gi cha la de zhig dpyad bzod pa tsam N+Da mtshan du byas nas rgyad dbugs/ lung gtsus
286a6(rnying rgyud): nadag gang ba'i rdo rje'i gnas chen po rnams la don ma nges bzhin du rtog dpyod kyis bzo chos pa ni shin tu yang yang ba'i gnas su mthong ste/ don gyi byin rlabs kyang zhud pa'i phyir ro// de lta na dang snga 'gyur gyi rgyud rnams sngon bsgyur ba'i skabs thog sbas pas bod rnams
286a7(rnying rgyud): kyi brdal blo gros kyi sgo ha cang dog pa dang / lo baN skad brda 'phrod dka' ba dang / sngon ma grags pa'i brdagasang du btags dgos pa kho na'ang shin tu mang bas sprul pa'i lo tsA ba chen po rnams 'phags pa'i sa la bzhugs pa 'ba' zhig pas gsung rab kyi byings
286b1(rnying rgyud): don 'dal ba la 'phags pa'i mkhyen brlab che bas tshig 'jeb mi 'jeb sogs kyi spros pa ma lus pa dor nas go sla ba gtso bor mdzad nas yul skad so so dang sngar 'dris shing rgyas yod pa'i ming dang brda sogs su bsgyur ba dper na rtag pa'i don la/ g.yung drung dang /
286b2(rnying rgyud): gzha'u gsang lta bu bon gyi brda yang skabs 'gar mdzad pa lta bus mtshon pas don 'gyur 'ba' zhig mdzad pa yin no// ngang gzad pa yul las rgya nag tu chos dang bslabs dus skabs de'i snga rol du'ang bya'i mkhan pa ma hA ya na la sngags pa lta btsan pos stan drangs
286b3(rnying rgyud): bong du thos 'ga' zhig bsgyur bas rgya nag gi skad la byang ba yod chod nas skad shan sbyar gyi gapas 'ag hwa shar 'bar na'i skad du sogs tu nag gi skad dang shan sbyar ba'ang 'byung ba ni skad rigs la ma rmongs pa'i che ba dang dgos pa gzhan yang yod la/ de ltar bsgrar
286b4(rnying rgyud): yog sde gsum ni shin tu gsang nas deng du sbas pa'i ngangal sra sbyor bam po gnyis pas skabs dbye ba'i lo pa/ rnams kyis skad gsang bcad kyi dag zed kyang ma thog/ don gyi ldog pa ladri ma mi mnga' bas rjod byed mdzes mi mdzes dang / tshig grims mi grams la ltos mi
286b5(rnying rgyud): dgos par rgyal ba'i dgongs pa ni don pa nyon pa nyid du gnas pa'i phyir gsang sngags mos pa dang don la sems pa nyid kyis 'grub pa nis par+Na dang 'dang phyang pa'i lo nus kyis kyang shes par nus la/ chu de dag gis snga 'gyur gyi rgyang sgo'i lam pa brten nas dngos grub gnyis chags
286b6(rnying rgyud): med du thob pa mang du byon pa'i byin chub kyi chu bo ma 'bri ba'i dun nyams pa med par yud dang yul zan rnams su gzugs pa 'chog gi ca nas smon ni 'ang dang chos skad pa 'chang deng sang grags chung ba dbang gis gan skad dang yul skang sa chags gang la 'dug mi 'jug mnges pa'i dra thang
286b7(rnying rgyud): dka' ba mang po dang/ phyis kyi yi ge'i rgyud rnams kyang so kye'i rnam shes pas su mi chung la chos nyid yin pas gzu lums can gyis yi ge bri nyes dang 'arde dag gya tsom du gyur pa du ba'i son gnas kyi steng du slar yab kha 'gengs su gyur pa mang po rim gyis bsabs pas ches ma
287a1(rnying rgyud): dag pa'i dun pa rtson gyis las padag gis gdon gyi ya pya dbus dang dkang cag 'dabs pa chogs gang yang mabyung ba'i tsun gyis lag pas bapa pon shin tumang bas dri na rgyun 'byams dang / ham shor nga pa gang yad byad dkar
287a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshig chad dang phreng chad mang po dang / tshigs bcad dang sde tshan gong 'og 'khrugs pa du ma dang / yul skad shan shor sogs dpyad bzod pa dang mi bzod pa brjod kyis mi lang ba lta bur gyur pas phyogs 'di'i rgyud kyi dpe rnams phal cher rten gcig tu song bas yid brtan 'pha
287a3(rnying rgyud): ba'i skyon se nus pa shin tu dka' zhing / da pa'i bu thog bu'i phyag dpe de skabs 'gar cung zad dag pa byung bas phan thogs re che byung zhing / tshig rkang gcig nas lnga drug gi bar chad pa dang / 'phreng chad sogs phal cher 'di nyid nas bsabs/ ded med pa
287a4(rnying rgyud): rnams gong 'og gi bab la dpyad nas bzos pa dang cha mthun gyi rgyud gzhan nas kyang blangs te bsabs/ tshigs bcad lcag gong 'og 'khrugs pa rnams ma 'khrugs par bkod/ le'u grangs dang rtog pa sogs 'khrugs pa dang chad pa rnams kyang de dang de'i 'gros la dpyad nas bcos/
287a5(rnying rgyud): spr-ings bcad dang bye brag mi mtshungs pa rnams kyang ming ga la bar bsdigs/ gsang ba 'dus pa dang / mnyam sbyong dang / dpal mchog dang po sogs slob dpon bi shra mi d+hA dang / btsa byin sdong po dang / kun dag 'bring po sogs kyi 'grel pas 'gyur dang

287b1(rnying rgyud): brda rnyi dam yul skad dang bur chag pa sogs gang yin ma nges pa'i/ kun gzhi la kun ki dang / 'gran med pa la bskyang du med pa dang / tshar bcad pa'i don la tshad du bton dang / gnas 'gyur ba lang log dang / phrin 'than/ mthar thug gams
287b2(rnying rgyud): snying po'i don la thus ka/ skye dgu pa skye 'gul/ khur bzod pa la rgya theb// bstim pa la gtems pa/ 'o bskol la 'ol gom/ chad pa bcad pa la chab brtsal ba/ gza' gtad kyi don la/ yul la gza' dang / chos la gza'//
287b3(rnying rgyud): zhes pa dang / gzhung gi don la klungs/ zor la gzor/ zhes srul tshig lta bu'i mtshon smos kyis mi lang bar yod pa'i don des shing blos dpog par nus pa rnams go dka' ba 'ga' zhig bcos/ go sla ba rnams sor bzhag bgyis/ blos mi dpog

287b7(rnying rgyud): pra kr-i ta dang / 'gro lding ba'i skad dang / mkha' 'gro'i brda skad dang bru sha'i skad dang / kla gro'i skad la sogs pa 'dres ma'i sde rnams ni dpe mthun shas che ba gtso bor byas/ spyir yang sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang khyad par gsang sngags su gyur tortog

288a2(rnying rgyud): rtag tu 'jug/ sems can rnams kyi mos pa'i sems kyi bang gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung gzhan sa// lung son dag la lha lus bkod pa'i sasogs song bdon gnyer rnams kyi bzhan// yul gyi ga dang zung chas ta las kyang // rnab 'byor
288a3(rnying rgyud): bye ge// rdul lo nges pa zugs pade// da sa blang sa 'ang ba byed// dod pa nyid rjel la dag tusarkyen po na mngag tshig tsun pa men// la gyi ma rnams kyi dwa gsapa//

290b2(rnying rgyud): pas rnam par dag pa'i bstan pa la mos pa rnams kyis yid rton pa'i gnas su rung bar yod dam snyam mo// bzhi pa bzhengs tshul dngos ni/ de'ang yi ge 'dus pa la ming/ ming 'dus pa tshig/ tshig 'dus pa la tshigs su bcad pa dang lhag pa sogs ga zhung tshogs
290b3(rnying rgyud): yi ge'i nyung du babapa ste/ de sa yig ni ming dang tshig gang yang rung ba gsal bar byed pa'i byer rjod byed thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyud pa yin la/ gangs can gyi ljongs su'ang ma dbul kyi sbrul bathon mis todza'i ma khyenang pyod kyi 'phrul las legs par thon pa pod sum gyi /
290b4(rnying rgyud): gsar du'i blangs pa nas pazung khyung pog su khris thig gi lamadug cung zhing mkhas pa gzhan gyis lhan thabs kyang mdzad pa'i kun las gdon babacu dang / gu ces so brgyad dang / chos nyi bya'i mtshan nyid nam par bshad pa'i lag khring kye d+han ji lta bar spyang ba da kyis khong du chud pas
290b5(rnying rgyud): sa skyong chen po'i gsung da bden po cha 'ab 'a zhig las bzhengs pa mang po dag sngar phan bzhugs pa rnams blo dang ldan pa'i mig gi bdud cing dgu dang kho na rabs pas yi ge'i lus mardzogs pa dang / 'brel ba dang / thub pa dang / mig zum pa dang / 'du srin gyi rjes lta bur byar

291a5(rnying rgyud): gnas la sdang ba dang / rnam par sdang ba'i sems dang / gdug cing shin tu gdug pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis phrag pa dog pas kun tu 'khrug pa'i sbyor ba drag shul gyi cho ga dang / chub mo ma yin pa'i 'jam po'i sbyor ba'i baspu brid kyis bshol thabs sogs legs blas rgya chen po'i
291b1(rnying rgyud): ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa dang / nad kyi rigs nas dang / rdo 'khor na gnas pa dang / byad 'tsho bad / gdon thams cad kyang sngags bdag mo dang thab 'jug can pa sogs ldang mdzan pa rnams kyis bsrungs shing yang
291b2(rnying rgyud): padang / rab tu smra bar byas pas legs byas rgya chen po 'di nyid mthu dang byin rlab kyi tshan ka mnyams pa'i phyir sdang par sogs su bkod pa sta'i stegs pa mdu bzhengs pa na'ang bka' gtan cing 'tshub che sogs sgo dri ma nas yid rtab zab po gyur kyang 'dzub
291b3(rnying rgyud): ljongs sogs su mngon pa cha tsam yang ma byung ba dang / snyigs ma'i dus kyi mtha'i 'byung po ma rdungs pa'i kha rlangs rdo rje'i tshang mas mi'i 'gro ba ji snyed cig gi srog la dus kyi chad pa 'bab par byed pa'ang zug rngu dang bral ba'i dngos por bsgyur nas phyogs 'di dag gis mtshan
291b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i dgrob mang po zhig la sman chad bro 'tshal ba de dag gis mi 'jigs pa'i srog byin pa'ang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge legs ma lus pa'i 'byung gnas dam pa'i chos te de dag gi nang nas khyad par du mas 'phags pa rdo rje theg pa'i sde snod rin po
291b5(rnying rgyud): che chos sbyin zad pa med pa'i phyi mo gsar du bskrun pa 'di nyid kyi mthur shes par bya'o// de ltar srub byed kyi bris brkos las tshan rnams la byas pa shes shing dran du gzo ba'i phyir yon 'bul gyis tshim par bya ba ni/ rab tu gnas pa'i rgyud las/ gyen rnams
291b6(rnying rgyud): ma lus pa yis ni// phyi nas bzo bo rnams la mchod// gang drag de la grogs byed pa// gzhan dag kyang ni mchod par bya// zhes gsungs pa ltar/ nad ma'i bza' btung gi phyogs dang / las tshan so so'i yon dang par shing gi den bcas gsol ras
