298b7(rnying rgyud): ma 'khod pa/
299a1(rnying rgyud): byang chub kyi sems bkra shis mi 'gyur bar gsal bar gnas pa'i rgyud le'u bcu pa rgya gar gyi mkhan po pi ma la mi tra dang / skra sgur gyi lo tsA ba chen po g.yu skra snying pos 'grel pa dang bcas pas bshad pa/ byang chub sems
299a2(rnying rgyud): kye mni ngag rin po che'i phreng ba bang mdzod 'phrul gyi lde mig le'u drug cu gcig pa rdzogs so'i mtha' can/ yang 'gyed 'phrul gyi lde mig le'u bcu bzhi pa tshig le'ur byas pa rdzogs so'i mtha' can/ pad mdzod 'phrul gyi me long le'u bcu pa ma tshang ba kha skong 'jog po'i
299a3(rnying rgyud): mtha' can rnams 'gyur byang ma 'khod pa/ 'khor lo rdo rje'i rgyud le'u bzhi pa/ rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta na gar+b+ha dang / bod kyi dge slong be ro tsa nas bsgyur ba la phyis skad gsur bcad kyis kyang bcos pa/ byang chub kyi sems rin chen 'khor mo'i hud leT zlal nga
299a4(rnying rgyud): byang ma 'khod pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che rgyas pa zhes bye ba rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud le'u bco lnga pargya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA nag d+ha dang / bod kyi dge slong ba ro ci nas bsgyud cing gtan la phab pa la phyis skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos pa/ rin po che 'khor lo
299a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i hud le'u 'acu ga sum pa 'gyur byang ma 'khod pa/ byang chub kyi sems nya mo 'gal nyal gyi rgyud le 'dug pa'i ro'i 'gyur/ rin po che snang byed kyi rgyud le'u bcu dgu pa'i mal dang g.yu skas bsgyur ba/ byang chub sems rma bya mi ring bsngol gyi rgyud le'u thug pa/
299a6(rnying rgyud): chos chen po rma byung ba lde'u hU~M thu pa gnyi gyur byang ma 'khod pa/ rdzogs pazen po chos nyi byang chub kyi sems rin pa rje bkod pa rnam pa ra bye ba'i rgyud 'i chu lnga pa bya gang gyi mthun po spyi le mi dang / dred kyi'o/ ba dang gsal rabang gis 'byur bye cus tegatan
299a7(rnying rgyud): pa'ang / bying chub kyi sems mad byung ba le'u sum bu mya dgub/ byang chub kyi sems mad du gyung ba'i gyud le'u du gcig pa gnyis 'bru brang ma 'khod pa/ bkra shis pa'i dpa'i rig pa'i 'a thug gi hud le'u bdun pa shrI se ha dang bod kyi lo slo ba po ci nas 'byung ba/
299b1(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa chen po sgrub ye shes gteng rdzogs kyi rgyud le te bu rtswa bdun pa sa rnama'i slob dponan na gnas mo rgyan gyi myob dpo na ma hA ba rnyil bshad nas An dran pa'i ye shes kyis bod yul du brnams nas byon pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' thegs pad phreng po jo
299b2(rnying rgyud): rgyud 'i 'ubacu gnyis pa/ byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i rgyud le'u bcu gcig pa gnyis 'gyur byung ma 'khod pa/ rdzogs pa chen po kun tu bzang po ye shes gsal bar ston pa gsang sngags lam mchog 'dus pa'i rgyud le'u lnga pa/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po se
299b3(rnying rgyud): deni sring dbyu kyis brgya pa/ cing chuba'ims pa ma mnol ga brgyan me med pa bya byang ma ma tho pa/ thags kyi thun spring grung sa 'i tha mthos pa zhes na mang 'gyur/ sems sa can mo dgas
299b4(rnying rgyud): ji med pa zhes garten da chen gyi 'i rnga ba gzugs sus ras rnas yon ma rgyad kyi da patshul ga dang khrus shing btan la bab pa/ na pa rgyas pa'i da 'i thag tu gcig pa 'i se na dang bang ba nas babyu ba/ ngadzin gnyis pa dang ma
299b5(rnying rgyud): oM ga~M la/ snying rgyud lung nyir gcig/ mdob cu/ lung gi mi ge bdun nu sogs mang du sna la/ de yang rgya ba'i mdo ba'i/ mtha' drug gsal bar byed pa'i rgyud drug/ dkon chud bcu gnyis rnams kyi rim pa la/ thog mar rtswa ba'i mdo bzhi las
299b6(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs gsang pa'i ye shes don gyi snying po thob rje'i rigs kun 'dres reg pa'i mngon pa 'byor grub pa'i rgyud le'u su ma n+taH gsum pa 'gyur byang ma la 'od kyang rgya gang gyi mkhan pa dri med pa shes gnyen dang bod kyi lo tsA bachen po cog ro na'i rgyal mtshan gyis
299b7(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs gas pa'i me shes rang kyi phreng po rdo rje shod rdzal grong grum pa'i byang na 'dus rig pa'i ma da thig pa chen po mngon par rtogs chos kyi nam mangs rnam par 'anod pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i mdo
300a1(rnying rgyud): sde'u 'dun nudon srapa/ rtswag kyi ma ban blonam pani dang/ ring lugs pa chen pornyan tud/ gtsu sul chub rgya tsun rgyas kyis thu shathol ge las na sha' lus sa mamang 'gyur cing gtanas
300a2(rnying rgyud): de'adzin gshegs pa thams kya ga gsang 'im nga dben pa kyi son na/ gas tsuni can zla pa'i chud ye gas ma'i chog gi khor logs pa theg pa chen pas dpa' #
300a3(rnying rgyud): praN+Di ta dzi med pa shes gnyen dang / oM tsA bcog ro gA'i rgyal mtshan gyis bskur ba// hA pi lA/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba dur khrod khu byug rol pa'i rgyud ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
300a4(rnying rgyud): le'u bcu bzhi pa/ byang chub kyi sems lung rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud theg po chen po'i mdo le'u bzhi bcu lnga pa ba gor bai ro tsa nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ gnyis pa mtha' drug gi rgud la/ lta ba thams cad kyi rgyal po kun tu bzang po che ba rang la
300a5(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'i rgyud le'u bcu drug pa man chad le grangs med pa rdzogs so'i mtha' can 'gyur byang ma 'khod pa/ dbang gi rgyal po dbang bskur rgyal po'i rgyud le'u bcu pa rdo rje yang dbang gter gyi man nga gting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyal po nyid 'dzin mchog gi rgyud le'u bcwa
300a6(rnying rgyud): gcig pa 'gyur byang ma 'khod pa/ phrin las thams cad kyi rgyal po skabs sbyor bdun pa'i rgyud rdo rje yang dbang gter gyis bsgyur ba/ spyod pa thams cad kyi rgyal po brtson pa don ldan gyi rgyud le'u thug pa 'gyur byang ma 'khod pa/ bar 'dir dam tshi
300a7(rnying rgyud): bkod pa'i rgyud yod dgos kyi gyi mo dag pa ma rnyed pas bzhag la slar dag nges sbed tshe 'jug dgos/ zhi ba lha chud chen po le'u dgu pa rgya gar gyi mkhan po pra ma sa twa las/ lo tsA ba pad+ma ru tses bslar ba/ chos nyid zhi ba'i lha rgyud le'u grangs med pa paN+Di ta bi ma
300b1(rnying rgyud): da nang kyi lan gnags pa susungs pa cu coMng zus to gtan sapa pa/ rmang can mashes bya ba 'ang bdun pa ga nyid kyis gagyu / 'o na ga pa mangs med pachagasas 'amatha na su mangs pa dang / thad
300b2(rnying rgyud): chen po'i gtor me dang sha khrag rus pa'i gtor rgyad chen po le'u zhe gsum pa rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+ma sa~M b+ha ba dang / bi ma la mi tra dang / lo tsA ba ga nubs nam mkha'i snying pos bslang ba las phyis ba su d+ha ra dang sangs rgyas ye shes kyis gus gtugs pa/
300b3(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor nang pa'i tshogs rgyud chen po la'u drug pa 'gyur byang ma 'khod pa/ dpal 'bar khro mo'i rgyud le'u med pa skyob dpon rdo rje gro lod rtsal dang / lo tsA ba zhang drung gis bsgyur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rak+ta dmar gyi rgyud le'u btsa
300b4(rnying rgyud): lnga pa gro yod rtsal gyis bsgyur ba/ rin po che me lha zhi bar gyur pa 'bar ba'i rgyud le'u n+de drug pa/ rdo rje ngur mo'i tat+t+wa zhes bya ba khro bo'i phyin sreg le'u bcu pa'i mtha' can gnyis 'gyur byang ma 'khod pa/ hUM mdzad chen po'i rgyud le'u ba tu
300b5(rnying rgyud): gcig pa slob dpon rdo rje rmi lod dang / lo sngo ba rdo rje zhang dung gi 'gyur/ bla gsang chen po'i mdo le 'u nyer lnga pa 'gyur blang ma 'khod pa rnams so// to ba laM/ gsum pa bskyed pa ma hA yo ga la/ rtsa bar gyur pa sgyu 'phrul dang / bshad pa dang
300b6(rnying rgyud): mthun gyi rgyud tan+t+ra sde bco brgyad/ srub sde bka' ba rgyad dang gsum gyi dang po sgyu 'phrul sde brgyad las/ sems dang ye shes rang snang du ston pa rdo rje sems dpa' smra 'phrul dra ba dpal gsang ba snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po le nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa thog
300b7(rnying rgyud): mar slob pon chen po pad+ma'i dang 'gyur/ rdo rjes mo chen po ro dang rma gzhags gsum gyis bskur/ phyis thar pa lo du bzhi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos thar pa gling gi gtsug lag khang du 'gyur ba/ gud kyi rgyal po chen po 'di'i rdeka mol lam gtsung
301a1(rnying rgyud): na / na sa sa sa
301a2(rnying rgyud): 'khrugs pa'i byes chen dam su nga/ na pa kyi rtog pasadon 'dunatha pa 'i ga yangs pa shes 'anas kyigs dbye da kyi byu p+ta gamigasas dang dgas na
301a3(rnying rgyud): sngon nya du ma dang yang ldan pa'i bye dus kyi 'chong ma'i 'grel ba dri ma med pa'i 'od sa sogs pa bzhin te/ rje btsun byams pas/ gang zhig rgyal ba'i bstan pa'ab zhig ste// dbang byas dam g.yeng med 'ad can gang bshad// byed pa'o 'a pa
301a4(rnying rgyud): sa man// de ni dang mod paka' bzhin tu 'ong dang // zhes btan pa na dzin pa 'tshan pa gsungs pagang kyi ma'i dus suga' dang ldan dang gtu la smad cad na 'jug pa bya nga ba rje drebs gci tu dod padi
301a5(rnying rgyud): la// gsang bdag sa nga gis/ sku 'tha 'dun pa 'a tha 'a pa/ 'phags pa'ang mdapal kyi dz+nyAn yang dgeg par 'arjod pa bu'i tha nichu phrus shi badz+ra pa 'du ldan
301a6(rnying rgyud): lhag le sogasas pa rnams 'gyur bya' ma la 'od pa/ bsha sung sde bzhi'i grol la mjug par smon pa'i drud tu 'phrul la ba chen skyed la skye thugasal ba/ thabs la ma'i kyi rtson pad+ma bru' gyur gyi da sa ju bu
301a7(rnying rgyud): bya bul tha ma 'i nu bcu gsam pa/ dngan khyim nu 'phrul dra pa thab ga sa ma ni the rjo dang rkyen byin mchog she 'byer/ du phral tham 'a du gsus pa/ dpal brjid gsar ba snying pa po
301b1(rnying rgyud): pa'adug sanyis snyanas 'grang thang ma mngon / bshA nun sde bzhi'i grol la ma ma kyis ston pa na 'bru rngub gsang bubabasaso mong girgyad rgya rnag pa na bya nga zhugasan nas nga/
301b2(rnying rgyud): cad rgyam mnyis dang sa tshun nam mtha'i b+h+ring bas byur/ thabs lamacig tu sbyin pa'i rgyad 'phral bal pa'i ter drug pa 'thar kyang ma mthod pa/ zhe bachen pa gas kyin la 'byod de bang b+hag du ze pa'i rdza tha ba
301b3(rnying rgyud): pape mal dang ngos paslang ba/ khro bo chen pa rgyags kyi rlung rgyal len med pardzogs po'i mna' can/ gnyis pa bshad pa dIng mamathun gyi krung thA sde bco brgyad la/ bskrag sung thugs yon tan zin la gi skad lalasad+ha'i rnyed sangs rgyas sa
301b4(rnying rgyud): cad mnyam par myor 'a mkha' 'gro rgya ma bde ba'i rgyud mchog ces bya brtog pa bcu gcigapa/ zhan na rtog pa rnams cad 'dus pa sangs rgyas mag ma skyong mkha' 'gro snyam bde mchog gi rgya dkyipa'i nyim dang bcas pa'i rtog pa nyir gsum chag
301b5(rnying rgyud): slob dpon sa chagasang ba dang / zad kyil rtsi ba 'brog mid pal gyi ye shes kyis 'gyung ba/ gsung gi spyad grags pa thig le le'u lnga pa man we grangs med pa rdzogs so'i mtha' can rgya gang gi mkhan po dang sa thu ba dang / brjed pa la brtsegs
301b6(rnying rgyud): kyis bsgyur ba/ thugs kyi rgyud gsang ba 'dus pa le Ta 'bru bdun pa'i ma la dang mardo bslab dpal brtsigs kyis bsgyur ba/ de'i rgyud gyi ma le'u bco brgyad pa slob dpon tha ga rgya dang 'brog mi shwakra yaM zhes kyis bsgyur ba/ yon tan gyi
301b7(rnying rgyud): rgyud dpa me mchog dang po rdzogs chog ba cu gsum pa ca gang sem sa na ba sangs byas gas ba dang mdzin chen mchog gis bsgyur po/ dpal mchog dang po sngags kyi rtog pa'i dum thung ti rkyen 'o ma T+Ta kAl sha dang lha ba can po dge slong zhi ba 'od kyis btung /
302a1(rnying rgyud): phrin las kyi rgyud ka rmas lA le'u dgu paslob dpon tam shrI pra thA dang A ts+tshar+ya bi ma la sogs pA las maHams zhus pa/ khar+d+ha na sgrub pa'i lag len ston pa'i byad stsal las/ hre dra ka
302a2(rnying rgyud): rol pa'i rgyud ni ma rnyed/ dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po le'u sum hA pa paN+Di ta badz+ra ra tra dang lo tsA ba rdo rje dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur ba/ thugs kyi rgyud dpal snying tshe rol pa le'u gcu ba bid+yA kar si d+hi dang bi shwa mi tha las lo tsA ga ba d+hin btsun
302a3(rnying rgyud): pa mchog gis bsgyur ba/ yon tan gyi rgyud chen po dpal bdud rtsi rol pa rim par phye ba brgyad pa brim pa mi tha dad dz+nyA na ku mA ras bsgyur ba/ phrin las kyi rgyud phur pa bcu gnyis kyi rgyud le'u nyer bzhi pa'i kyar byang ma 'khod pa rnams so// spyod pa'i
302a4(rnying rgyud): yan lag tu 'gro ba'i rgyud sde lnga las gzhan dran po a nu'i skabs su song / glang po che rab 'bog gi chud le'u nyer brgyad pa kyi gar gyi pa ti ta pi shwa mi tra dang lo tsAb 'ding gsal 'bar gyi 'gyur/ mtshang ba la rgong pa'i rgyud gnyis las/ 'bas ci zhags
302a5(rnying rgyud): pa d+mo'i phreng ba le'u zhe gcig pa bi ma la mi tra dang lo tsA ba gnyags dzA na ku mA ras bsgyur ba/ sa pa ma/ tan+da'i le lag tu gtogs pa dri med bshags pa'i rgyu le'u bcu drug pa paN chen bi ma la dang gnyags dz+nyAn ku mA ras bsgyur ba/ rdo rje gzi ldan 'bar ba'i
302a6(rnying rgyud): grangs med pa 'gyur byang ma khod pa rnams so// gsum bslab sde'i phyogs la gter byon dang bka' ma gnyis kyi dang po la'ang bla ma dang yi dam gnyis las/ dang po sbrul sgra sangs rgyas gling bas bu'i phug rje tshe nas spyan drangs pa'i zab chos snga ma dgongs
302a7(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i skor la/ rgyud 'chang thabs dang rgyud kyi che ba bstan pa le'u grangs med pa/ gyu pa spong brtsegs pa le'u ner gcig pa/ skra rgyad shel gyi ngo bo le'u sum cub/ gsung kyad rin chen 'brag sgra le'u bcu gsum pa/
302b1(rnying rgyud): thos nas pa gang pa ngan can na ma na pa thog shing nas dang rdzun na / ngas kun ga dung na pa ma gas
302b2(rnying rgyud): ram le'u lnga pa/ mkha' 'gro'i gsang rgyud bka'i lde mig le'u brgyad pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sras gcig pu le'u drug pa rnams so// gnyis pa ni mnga' bdag nyang nyi ma 'od zer gyis lho brag mkhon mthing lha khang nas spyan drangs pa'i bde gshegs
302b3(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa gter ma'i skor la/ rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ bde gshegs 'dus pa phyi ma'i rgyud/ bde gshegs 'dus pa phyi ma'i phyi ma/ ma tshang ba kha skong ba'i rgyud/ 'byed par byed pa sde mig gi rgyung/ 'byed lce kho bo'i skabs/
302b4(rnying rgyud): zhib 'dus partsa ba'i rgyud/ tshe mchog 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud/ kha bi ma/ khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud/ gshin rje 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud/ dbang chen 'das pa rtsa ba'i rmad/ phrin las 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud/ ma mo
302b5(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud/ rig 'dzin 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud/ mchod bstod bsgrub pa rtsa ba'i rgyud/ 'di ga nyis dog dkang srung skabs yod dam/ drag sngags 'dus pa rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud rnams so// bde gshegs 'dus pa'i rgyud/ bka' brgyad gsang ba 'dus
302b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyud/ gnyis pa yi dam sgrub pa bka' brgyad bye brag gi skor la/ 'jam dpal sgra/ pad+ma gsung / yang dag zugs/ bdud ni yon tan/ thar pa phrin las/ ma mdzod gtong / bstan srung
302b7(rnying rgyud): mchod bstod/ drag sngags sgor dang brgyad las/ dang po 'jam dpal sku'i sgor la/ 'phags pa'i yul du'angam dpal khri drug snang bzhugs par grags pa las sod kyi ljongs 'dir ye shes dang las kyi rgyud drug cu rtswa la? 'gyur
303a1(rnying rgyud): par grags pa las/ dpal bla gsang nag po dregs pa tshar gcod kyi rgyud le'u lnga btung brgyad pa 'gyur byung ma 'khod pa/ 'jam dpal gshin rje gsang ba de kho na nyid kha thun nam 'jam dpal gsang chud
303a2(rnying rgyud): gyi mar grags pa le'u brgyad pa 'gyur byang ma 'khod pa/ zla gsang nag po dan sngags thams cad kyi rtsa ba'i rgyud le'u don bzhi pa nam mkha'i snying pos sin+d+hu'i nags tshal du bsgyur ba/ 'di ma gyi gcig las ma rnyed pas dbang mi bzod pa mang yang
303a3(rnying rgyud): kun rab mas nas bkod/ ma po la/ zla gsang me lce phreng ba'i rgyud le'u bdun du don gsum pa lo tsA ba gsum gyis lan grangs gsum du bcos pa/ drag sngags zla gsang nag po shan pa spu gri'i rgyud le'u brgya dang gcig pa
303a4(rnying rgyud): bal po'i rgyal po ba su d+ha ra dang / gnubs kyi ban chung yang dbang gter gyis bskur pa/ drag sngags zla gsang nag po le'u bcu bzhi pa/ 'jam dpal dri ma med pa gsang ba'i rgyad le'u zher drug pa/ dpal gshin rje nag po
303a5(rnying rgyud): nang sbyin 'dang 'jug pa'i rgyud lalung gsum pa/ gshin de gshen nag brkyen po gas pa'i klung la mo bzhid/ 'phags pa'angam dpal gus dang byung kyi tshul 'og nga gi btag pa'i bu'adun pa na pas gzung med 'jogs 'i
303a6(rnying rgyud): mthon can/ khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rtsa ba'i rtog pa le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'i mtha' can/ tshe bdag nag po phrin las kyi dgongs pa thams cad rdzogs pa'i rgyud chen po le'u su mi tu pa rnams 'gyur byang ma 'khod pa/ sdig pa snying 'dzings
303a7(rnying rgyud): 'di rgyud le'u bco lnga pa ba su d+ha ra dang gnubs sangs rgyas ye shes kyi 'gyur/ drag po sngags rgod sdig pa snying dzings kyi rgyud 'gyur gong 'dra/ drag sdigs mtshon cha nag po'i rgyud le'u dgu pa/ tshe bdag nag po'i rgyud drag
303b1(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi de kho na nyid srog dmar len spu gri'i rgyud le'u bcu gnyis pa rnams 'gyur gong 'dra/ 'jam dpal las bzhi'i 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud le'u bcu bdun pa 'gyur byang ma 'khod pa/ tsaM pa le/ gshin rje'i rgyal po sdig pa stobs
303b2(rnying rgyud): chen gsang ba'i rgyud le'u nyer gcig pa rdo rje khri gtsug gis bsgyur ba/ gshin rje nag po gsang ba de kho na nyid kha thun rgyud le'u brgyad pa'ang ma dpal nas yang dbang gter gyi bar rim gyis bka' babs pa/ de'i rgyud phyi ma le'u lnga pa/ tshe bdag dag po
303b3(rnying rgyud): drag sngags mngon du phyung ba'i rgyud le'u nyer gcig pa/ 'jam dpal khro bo steng gzer gsang ba'i rgyud gdug pa klu 'dul byed le'u bkod pa'i mtha' can/ drag po phung byed mchod rten nag po'i rgyud le'u nyer gcig pa/ dan sngags gtsug lag gi rgyud
303b4(rnying rgyud): phyi ma le'u brgyad pa rnams 'gyur byang ma 'khod pa/ 'jig rten gsum gyi shes pa bskul ba'i rgyud le'u brgyad pa ba su d+ha ra dang gnubs sangs rgyas ye shes kyis bsgyur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa khro bo 'dus pa'i rgyud le'u
303b5(rnying rgyud): dku pa lo pa Na de nyid kyi 'gyur/ gnod sbyin gdong gsum pa chu thigs sngon mo'i rgyud le'u bco brgyad pa 'gyur byang ma 'khod pa/ gnod sbyin gdong gsum pa'i rgyud rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can dang 'gos lhas bcos kyis bsgyur/ 'di zung pa'i mthu
303b6(rnying rgyud): byung nas 'gos dpon slob dmar bshal gyis bskrun pa bzlog pa'i ched du bsgyur skad/ 'di la 'char ka nag po bzlog pa'i rgyud dang / 'chi bdag b+he ba swa to'i rgyud dang / gA hu nag po rngam byed kyi rgyud dang / gshin rdo 'char ka nag po gnod sbyin gdong
303b7(rnying rgyud): gsum pa'i rgyud rnams zhes gsan yig tu so so lta bur mdzad 'dug kyang rgyud 'di'i mtshan gyi rnam grangs yin nam snyam zhing 'di dpe shin tu ma dag pas 'chos dka' bar snang yang dpe lung gi rgyun la bsams nas bkod/ ngan sngags phyir bzlog pa'i rgyud
304a1(rnying rgyud): 'u bdun du/ 'jam dpal mdu tsa mchod bzhi'i rtsa ba'i sngags kyu lang dgra / 'dum dpal gas brgyad kyil len badran pa dbang phyug tson pas pastod pa kyi ma'i phyim dang bcas yod pa/ gnang
304a2(rnying rgyud): sbyin mye rtse mo langs gsang ba'i rgyud le'u brgyad pa rdzogs so'i mtha' can/ ma du ne'i sngags rgyad le'u bdun pa/ dregs pa po mo'i las rgyud le'u bcu bdun pa rnams 'gyur byangs 'khod pa/ gnyis pa pad+ma gsung lo kyang la
304a3(rnying rgyud): rje mtsho gra rdol ba'i rgyud le'u nyis brgya dgu pa lce ku ku rA dzas bsgyur ba/ dbang rgyal rta mchog rol pa'i chud chen po le'u drug cu pa o rgyan chen po dang lo tsA ba gnyigs ku mA ras bsgyur ba/ tsho ba la pad+ma dbang chen drags pa spang rdzog yon tan
304a4(rnying rgyud): kyai rgyang le rba dgu pa 'i blas thu bu dang mo n+ti bi Sha che zhen rjes bgyung ba/ badz+ra dang chen dreg pa can gzhan la 'dengs bzhin skr-i le'ub cu gnyis pa la ba ga 'ang/ badz+rad pang rkyen dregs pa gnad sengs kyi rgyud le'u bcu gcig pa/
304a5(rnying rgyud): dbang chen dregs pa dbang sdud kyi rgyud le'u bcu gsum pa gnyis 'gyur byang ma 'khod pa/ dbang chen 'dus pa'i rgyud dmagal po'i rgyud du grags pa le'u so lnga pa rgya kar gyi mkhas pa rak+Sha sid+d+hi dang pod kyi ban+de ku ku rA dzas bsgyur ba/ dbang chen bsdus
304a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i tan le'u drug cu gnyis pa 'gyur byang ma 'khod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa lung bstan pa rnal 'byor chen po'i gsang ba rnam par bye ba rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa rdo rje phreng ba'i rnam par brjod pa rta mchog rol pa'i lung chud
304a7(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi snying po le'u nyer bzhi pa slob dpon pad+ma dang / lo tsA ba Ta sang shi ta dang ngan lam rgyal mchog dbyangs cog ro rnams kyi 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa khro bo 'dus pa bde gshegs sgo dril rta mgrin rngog ma ye
304b1(rnying rgyud): brgan mi rgyud le'ubacu bdun pa oM D+yan chen po dang la kun cu po ngogasas kyi 'gyur/ dpya tu mthon las rgyud mo rnam cu gcig pa rgya rgyan dang rgyal ba mchog dbyangs kyis bsgyur ba/ pata bang can rdzogs pa ca ga cad 'i da len nyer dgra pa padz+ra d+ha
304b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i rang 'gyur/ pad+ma dbang chen yang gsang khros pa'i rgyud le'u bcu gsum pa slob dpon gyis mnga' bdag la gdams pa bai ro'i 'gyur/ gter ston gsum gyis so ba lung nas spyan drangs pa/ rta mgrin dpa' bo gcig pa gsang ba phrin
304b3(rnying rgyud): las kyi rgyud le'u nyer gnyis pa gnam skas brag nas rat+na gling pas bton pa/ phyir bzlog stobs chen rta mgrin gyi rgyud le'u drug pa oM rgyan chen po dang 'dan ma rdze mang gis bsgyur ba/ rta mgrin nA ga klu 'dul gyi rgyud le'u so bdun pa 'gyur byar
304b4(rnying rgyud): ma 'khod pa rnams so// gsum pa yang de gzugs kyi rgyud la/ he ru ka'i gal po zhi khro 'bum rgyud le'u bcu drug pa 'gyur byang ma 'khod pa/ 'di dpe rgyan shin tu ma dag pas 'chos dka' bar 'dug yang rgyun la bsams nas bkod/
304b5(rnying rgyud): he ru ka thugs kyi rgyud gal po le'u dgu pa pad+ma saM b+ha ba dang nam mkha'i snying pos bsgyur ba// dzo pa la/ khrag 'thung gal po che rgyud lung thams cad kyi rgyal po brtag pa nyer gsum pa 'gyur byang ma 'khod pa/ dpal he ru ka gal po dur khrod mngon par 'byung
304b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyud gyim/ he ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud le'u gcig gis rdzogs pa shrI se d+hi dang bai ro'i 'gyur/ rdo rje rigs kyi sgrub lugs khro ba br-iN+Da rI ka'i rgyud sgrub lugs nyer gcig pa/ de bzhin rigs kyi sgru ba lugs gsang ba me dpung gi rgyud le'u gnyis pa
304b7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur byang ma 'khod pa rnams so// bzhi pa bdud ci yon tan gyi rgyud li/ thams cad bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin dngos grub nye ba'i snying po bdud rtsi mchog gi lung bam po brgyad pa 'gyur kyang ma 'khod pa/ thams cad bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin gyi rgyad rdzogs
305a1(rnying rgyud): rgol ba shA byung ma dang/ ci mal shes gas dpa 'amam ma du rgyu ga sgru bsgyur byang ma ma da/ rba bdu na pas das nga
305a2(rnying rgyud): bdun brgya gar gyi ma phan po bi ma la dang / bod kyi la ts+tsha ba granyags dz+nyAn su mA ngas bsgyung ba/ thams cad bdud rtsi lnga'i dang bzhin rin po che thang ba'i drung len bcu bdun pa 'gyur gong 'dra/ bdud rtsi bde'i chen po'i rgyud me bcubapa 'du ga
305a3(rnying rgyud): 'dra/ thams cad bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin du 'khrungs shing skye bar byed pa 'bras bu rin po che 'od ltar 'bar ba'i rgyud le'u nyer bdun pa 'gyur grong 'dra/ 'di yig rgyun ma dag pa mang yang rgyun la bsams nas bkod/ bdud rtsi las rgya mtsho'i rgyud
305a4(rnying rgyud): le'u nyi shu pa 'gyur gong 'dra/ thams cad bdud rtse lnga'i rang bzhin dngos grub chen po nye ba'i snying po'i mchog gi rgyud le dra bco lnga pa yang dbang gted kyis sku legs pa'i smon mi la gtad pa/ bdud ci chen po chos nyid gsang ba'i rgyud le'u dug pa 'gyur ro/
305a5(rnying rgyud): 'dra/ bdud ci 'khyil pa 'chi med tsho'i rgyud le'u bcu bzhi pa'i ma la dang 'jid gsal 'bar gyis bsgyur ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdud rtsi ye shes 'od ldan gyi rgyud le'u drug cu pa mang 'budag nying gis spyan drangs pa rnams so// lngang phrin la
305a6(rnying rgyud): gyur pa'i skor la/ rdo rje bros pa phur pa rtsa ba'i rgyud le'u 'bru bdun pa slob dpon pa dang dam 'bre sA le'i 'gyur/ thugs ji zlos partsa ba'i rgyud kyi bshad pa le'u bcu gsum pa dngos grub brnyes pa'i rje btsun rdo rje sems ma dang lo tsA ba 'gar shes rab 'byung
305a7(rnying rgyud): gis spang ba/ rdo rje lu dbugasang pa'i rtsa ba rnal 'byor chen po yang dag pa'i rgyad le'u'i bub khyi ma dang bcas papa rje 'byung gnas dang brang nying yad k+Shi ta'i 'grar/ rdo rje phrang ba'i bshad tung ji med 'od ldan le rtse ge bzhi pa 'gyur byang ma 'khod pa/ phrin
305b1(rnying rgyud): las phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyud karma gu ru le'u bco lnga pargya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la mi tra dang bod kyi lo dzA ba gzhags dzA na'i 'gyur// zhab la/ phur pa phrin las karma las kyi rgyud le'u bcu bzhi pa slar yang slob dpon chen po mkha' 'gro'i
305b2(rnying rgyud): gnas nas byon pa las dong zom gzhon thos bskyar ba/ rdo rje phur pa zhes bya ba drag po las kyi rtog pa le'u bco brgyad pas los bsgyud zer ba/ rdo rje phud pa chen po gtor ma'i rgyud le'u bdun pa gtan tshigs dang bcas pa/ phur ba za byed ya k+Sha 'bar
305b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyud le'u bcu gcig pa gnyis 'gyur byung ma 'khod pa/ rdo rje phur bu chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud le'u nyer brgyad pa slob dpon b+ha Shi ta'i 'gyur/ sku dang ye shes thams cad 'dus pa sangs rgyas 'dus pa'i rgyud le'u bco lnga pa dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang po ro'i 'gyur/
305b4(rnying rgyud): yan lag gi rgyud bcu la/ khro bo n+yai kA da'i rgyud le'u lnga pa/ rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud le'u bdun pa/ dbyug pa sngon po'i rgyud le'u lnga pa/ gshin rje gshed po'i rgyud le'u bzhi pa/ mi g.yo mgon po'i rgyud le'u lnga pa/ rta mgrin gyi rgyud le'u drug pa/
305b5(rnying rgyud): gzhan gyis ma~M thub pa'i rgyud le'u lnga pa/ bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i rgyud le'u drug pa/ khams gsum rnam rgyal gyi rgyud le'u bdun pa/ stobs po che rgyud leT lnga pa rnams 'gyur byang ma 'khod pa/ rdo rje phur pa me long gsal ba spu gri dag gcod 'khor lo
305b6(rnying rgyud): rtsibs kyi rgyud le'u bdun pa 'gyur byang ma yod pa/ rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal 'jig rten snang byed le'u nyer bdun pa rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang lo tsA ba pa gor be ro tsa nas bsgyur ba// phur pa dam pa gsang chen rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje phreng ba'i rgyud le'u bcu drug pa 'gyur gong
305b7(rnying rgyud): 'dra/ dpal rdo rje bkod pa rnal byad chen po'i rgyud la thubaco snga pa shrI d+ha na'i 'gyur la dpal kyi ye shes kyis bcos pa/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rtse mo'i spyad le'u lnga bcung gnyis pa/ rdorje bu dpa chos thams cad kyi gsang bden byings
306a1(rnying rgyud): dang bri shes gnyis su med pa'i rgyud 'bu lnga pa gnyis bgyur byung ma 'khod pa/ sras pa gsang brlab mamadu ci'i rgyud len dbu brtanag nadang ba cana'i 'gyur/ don byung ba mdung rtse dmang po'i rgyud la ba nA dag pa 'dru thung gdang /
306a2(rnying rgyud): dz+nyAn su mA ra'i 'gyur/ bse sbom dmar po'i rgyud le'u bzhi pa pa rnyes lha sras lham sring la gtad pa/ shon dkar nag gi rgyud le'u bzhi pa 'gyur byang ma 'khod pa/ rdo rje phur pa phrin las 'khor lo gab pa gsang ba'i rgyud lizhu bcu gnyis pa rdo rnga zong phreng rtsal dang
306a3(rnying rgyud): lce ku ku rA dzA dang brang tI dza ya rak+Shi tas bsgyur ba/ rdo rje 'bar ba gsang ba'i rgyud ka lpa dum bu phyi ma le'u bcu dang bcas pa 'gyur byung ma 'khod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lha gsung thugs kyi gsang mchog dam pa gsang chen rdo rje 'bar ba'i rgyang le'u bat+ya
306a4(rnying rgyud): pa rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gtu dang ba ro'i 'gyur la/ slad yang rin bzang gis gus pa/ khro ba la/ rdo rje phung pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen po le'u bzhi bcu bzhi pa 'gyur byang ma 'khod pa/ kI la ya gsang ba'i dgongs rgyud chen mo le'u brgyad cu lha gsum pa oM tan gyi mkhan po rdo tha~Md
306a5(rnying rgyud): phreng dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba mad yul gyi lo tsA baSh+pe ku ku rA dza dang brang trI dza ya dak+Shi tas bsdur cing gtan la phab pa/ zhe sdang yongs su dag pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po leT nyer gnyis pa slob dpon nag po'i zhabs dang lo tsA ba hrI d+ha la ku bad+han de bas/ phur pa gsang ba'i sngags d+hA
306a6(rnying rgyud): po mur la zin las rdzogs pa le thu btu drug pa kye su ku dA dang blang ti dza yang kyi tas bsrur ba/ phur pa gsang ba gang mas dag can gyi rgyud le'u bco brgyad pa/ phung pa gcuganyis dbyung ba'i byud rlung du le'u bcu gnyis pa gnyis 'grang byang ma 'khod pa/ phur pa bcu gnyis kyi d+han
306a7(rnying rgyud): dme kI lar bcu gnyidas kyi ta d+ha le'u bcu gnyis pa oM D+yan gyi slob dpon rdo rje thod phreng rtsal dang bod kyi lo tsA ba mang yul gyi lde ku ku rA de dang bad te dze yar b+hi tas bsgyur ba/ 'ug pa ma mo tha~Md gtong gi skor la/ yum dazungs ma'i dngos bub chen po'i byu ma mo srid par shA
306b1(rnying rgyud): chen mo// de'i rgyud phyi ma dang bcas pa le'u gsum pa 'gyur byang ma 'khod pa/ srid pa'i chung lcang gi rgyud phyi mkha' bar nag mo las / rgya mtsho'i rgyud le'u dgu pa/ ma mo lam rgyud lung zhes bya le'u bcu gnyis pa gnyis 'gyur byad ma 'khod pa/ ma mo 'brum gyi ti ka sngags kyi
306b2(rnying rgyud): ma dpal e ka dza Ti'i rgyud de'i phyi ma dang bcas par le'u go drug pa rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+ha na saM skr-i ta dang 'brog mi dpal gyi ye shes dang / gdubs kyis bsgyud pa// 'o ba la/ ral gcig ma chos dbyings bdag mo spu gri ya ma'i rgyud le'u nyer lnga pa d+ha na shI la dang yang dbang gte
306b3(rnying rgyud): gyis bsgyur ba/ e ka dza Ti sbas pa nag mo'i rgyud le'u lnga pa/ e ka dza Ti za byed spyad rgyal nag mo'i rgyud le'u so gnyis pa gnyis 'gyur byang ma 'khod pa/ mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ma'i rgyud le'u nyer bzhi pa mkha' 'gro dom ba ka dang cog ro klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis zhus pa/ he s+yAd 'bar
306b4(rnying rgyud): ma re ti mched bzhi'i rgyud le'u bcu gcig pa 'gyur byang ma 'khod pa/ las kyi mkha' 'gro ma de kho na nyid gsum 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i rtsibs kyi rgyud le'u bzhi pa shAn+tiM gar+b+ha dang / lce bkra shis kyi 'gyur/ srid pa mtsho bzhi'i rgyud bstan ma las rgya mtsho le'u nyer gnyis pa/ ma mo 'dus
306b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyud dam gsang ba gtan tshigs kyi rgyud le'u brgyad pa gnyis 'gyur byang ma 'khod pa/ ma mo srid pa zla gsang thig le'i rgyud le'u bcu gnyis pa paN+Di ta gu h+ya gsad pa dang / 'brog mi dpal gyi ye shes kyis bskyar ba/ bstan pa srung ba'i man ngag thugs kyi yang snying ma mo 'bum tig gi
306b6(rnying rgyud): rgyud le'u zhe brgyad pa/ de'i phyi ma ma mo byang chub kyi sems gsang ba'i rgyud gong gi 'phros le'u zhe dgu nas brgya zhe gcig pa rdzogs so'i mtha' can 'gyur byang med pa/ ma mo snang srid thig le'i rgyud lung byang skor gyi rtse rgyud le'u so gnyis pa gzubs nam mkha'i snying pos bskyang ba/ gyang sgo
306b7(rnying rgyud): kyi rgyud phyi ma le'u bcu gnyis pa/ 'phags pa lha mo rdo rje nag mo dbang phyug ma'i sngags rgyud le'u bcwo lnga pa/ de'i rgyud kyi ma le'u bcu gnyis pa/ de'i phyi ma'i phyi mchog rkang yongs su gcod pa le'u bdun pa/ 'phags pa lha mo nag mo'i sngags rgyud le'u bcu gcig pa/
307a1(rnying rgyud): ma'i rgyung thu rna nga/ ma / zugs rdzothog zhu gsu brgya rnams 'thu byu ma byudang / nga ga/ la bu'i rgyu na dpa/ la 'i du ba du
307a2(rnying rgyud): bkol ba'i rgyud drug pa'i gdong can le'u nyi shu pa/ dbyings gsang ba 'khor lo'i chud le'u dgu pa/ phra men byang ki las kyi rgyal mo'i rgyang le'u nyer bzhi pa/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyung las srid pa phra men rgya mtshos bsdus pa srid dang rdo rje mkha' 'bo rba me nA las rgyud le'u nyer bzhi pa rnam
307a3(rnying rgyud): la 'gyur byang ma 'khod pa// ya bal/ bdun pa bstan srung mchod bskyod dang / brgyad pa drag sngags skor la/ dregs pa 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud le'u bcu gcig pa slob dpon pad+ma saM b+hA ba dang lo chen po ros bsgyur ba/ drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i nyid le'u bcu gcig pa 'gyur gor 'dra/
307a4(rnying rgyud): dpal mgon po gsang ba snying gi 'khor lo dngos grub chen po 'byung ba'i rgyud le'u bco lnga pa gzubs sangs rgyas ye shes kyis bsgyur ba/ dpal nag po chen po me lce phreng ba'i rgyud le'u zhe lnga pa d+ha na sa~M skr-i ta dang bi do co nas bsgyur ba/ dpal nag po chen po dur khrod nag po'i rgyud btag pa
307a5(rnying rgyud): bcu gnyis pa bla ma nag po ro 'dzin dang gyi ljang dbu dkar gyis bsgyur ba/ nag po chen po man ngag brtsegs pa gri gug gi rgyud le'u nyer gcig pa dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba/ nag po chen po sku gsung thugs khros pa'i rgyud le'u bco brgyad panyang gi gter byon
307a6(rnying rgyud): mgon po nag po dur khrod mngon par rol pa mtshon cha 'khor lo'i rgyud le'u sum du rtswa drug pa bram ze gsal ba'i rgyan dang bal po'i rgyal po ba su d+ha ngas bsgyur ba/ nag po chen po drag po'i brtag pa dur khrod chen po'i rgyud le'u bcu pa snun ma rdo rje bla mas bsgyur ba/ nag po chen po gzugs
307a7(rnying rgyud): can gcer bu'i rgyu le'u bcu gnyis pa/ rnal dpyod dbang phyug chen mo ral gcig ma'i rgyud le'u bcu bzhi pa gnyis la 'gyur byang ma 'khod pa/ ma mo srid pa'i bem chen mo le'u so lnga pa man chad mi gsal ba gu ru 'phrul gyi gshog rgod rtsal dang ban chung yang dbang gter gyis bsgyur
307b1(rnying rgyud): ba/ las kyi mgon po gyi dog gdong can gyi thud be 'u co wu padz+rA nam gyis bsgyu ba/ kang po// ti'i bad+mo ting ga tur nag pa'i d+hA la bu rtsol pa 'gyur byang ma 'khod pa/ ska 'a to shi pa'i byad 'a 'u gas pa 'gyur byung mu' ba dang / ngarnams kyi man bad migs byed pa'i bas shes yangs pa'i grong rje
307b2(rnying rgyud): 'dug pa'i mdo dang bcas pa bzhugs so// de nas gong gi go rim du gyi mom 'byor bas skabs 'din rgyud 'di 'dzud ces bris pa rnams kyis 'byod pa phyogs gcig su pa rmongs su bkod pa'i glegs 'am// rab la/ rdzogs pachen po rmed byung don gyi ston la byung pa por lo tud le ga nyer bdun pa
307b3(rnying rgyud): dang gtags kyi 'gyur/ rdzogs pa chen po kun du bzang po pa shes gas pa pa ston pa'i byem gsang pa'i rlung ba ba nis/ smad d+hi ma'i phye mam nga zug gi rgyud leT bzhib/ brtan pa thams cad kyi snying posams can thams cadang sangs rgyas chas su bzhugs pa lerje brgyad pa'is dzin na pang ra
307b4(rnying rgyud): gtad pa/ rgyal ba rdo rje sems dpa'i dgo sa bstan pa thams cad kyi phragacig du le'u brgya dang 'gyur go dr-i/ man ngag snying gi dgongs brgyal ba'i bka le'u bcug tum pa 'gyur byang ma 'khod pa/ thig lags pa'i brda brgyad le'u bcu dgu babi ma la dang gnags d+ha na ku pA ras bltung ba/ sku gsum gyi snang ba gas la
307b5(rnying rgyud): baspyang pa spyod bzhi'i rgyud ge zubargyad pa 'gyur byung ma 'khod pa/ sdug sung thugs rjo rdzapa thams car rdzogs pa'i mo lnga bslob ston chen po rje 'ab lagrogs gsum la padams pa/ theg pa thams cad kyi d+hi nga lta bzong can yangs pa'i bu la bcu rgya gsum pa rdo rje gling nges spyan drangs pa/ rin po che gradams dgas tshogs
307b6(rnying rgyud): 'khror mo'i rgyud le 'u bzhi ba rje bangs gnyis kyi mnog chos yin zhes pa dang / de'i rgyud sbyi ma le'u ban drug pa 'gyur byang ma 'khod pa/ kun tu bzang po gas pa'i snying po bde 'a chen po su gri bad+ma la gri 'bod 'i'i drud pe rtse drug pa tI sita dang po ro'i 'gyur/ la blo gas pa'i 'khor mo le'u bcug cig pa/ rje brten dam /
307b7(rnying rgyud): ni chen kun 'dus// khams gsum sgron ma rnams tshogs su bcad pa 'gyur byung ma 'khod pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che bram be rgyas pa le 'u bcu drug par gyur byang ma 'khod pa/ byang chub kyi sems cad du byung ba le'u zhe ga nyis pa tI si d+ha dang pode'i 'gyur/ chas thams cad sems nyid ye shes kyi rgyal po dngos bu
308a1(rnying rgyud): nya na la ldabacu drug rngur yang kyad 'ad+mo dang 'ang min 'dug pas nan
308a2(rnying rgyud): dang byung du sa nga du na pa'i da pa ga sa sa nga shAng ma bdang/ na na pa lang bu chu na d+hA na la byang bas dang/ nga pa du
308a3(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' cha rgyas pa rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud le'u bco lnga pa 'gyur byang med pa/ rma bya mjing bsnol phyi mtha'i mun sel chen po le'u lnga pa 'gyur byang ma 'khod pa/ kun tu bzang po che ba dang la gnas pa le'u sum cug ceg pa/ su gdung 'bar bsA ts+tsha mchod rten gyi rgyud le'u dgu pa slob dpon rdo rje gro 'od dang lo tsA bgang drung gi 'gyur
308a4(rnying rgyud): dun du bzang mo klong gas la 'bar ma ny+dzi ma'i gsang rgyu dad sring ba'i gter byen/ rdzog chen tshig chod kun grol ra gling pa'i gter byod// ma ba ba/ gyung sde rin po cheng rtog pa brjod pa lha'i po che lta bu'i tam dang cas sbe bam gyi phreng babacu phragag nyes 'jug gis lhag pa nyid 'dra bar bzhugs so// / rmar yang smras pa/ zags pardad du
308a5(rnying rgyud): ro yi ga ter gyur chos don gang+gA'i lha mo ni// snyigro ma'i spyod tshul nga la bar 'argyan las rnam 'byed na la ldan shing rta 'dis// chags ldang mongs pa'i las gsum rgyud 'bang lus can drug bri'i kra kye du// smon lam ba zab brtson pa'i rim gros legs skad tshangs pa mgulas zung // 'di 'bad nam pa kun tu do yod pa'i// zhagrabs kyang chen
308a6(rnying rgyud): mi'am ci lol// rab btab nem mkhyen rtse dga' cher rgod pa'i// blo ldan nor bzang gnon nu'i sun zla dis// chos rnams kun pa tshad ma'i gter gyur pa// rkang gnyis gtso ba'i zhal gyi chu skyes las// ltung ba rga shi 'jo brab sman gyi mchog/ thar pa'i bcud du len la mthu che ba// sred pa'i mthar yang zhi ba'i bdud rtsi yis//
308a7(rnying rgyud): bgo skal bzang pos 'khyud pa mi gtong bar// dogs pa bral ba'i dge tshogs 'dzum rlab brgyas// srid gsum snang byed zla ba 'di bskrun pas// byang chub ri mo snying la rdzogs pa'i khams// yid srubs stong gi sbyor bas mi shigs pas// dpag dka'i yon tan shing gi grib bsil du// mngon par
308a8(rnying rgyud): ba'i chos kyis dga' bar 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa thams cad kyi snying po rig pa 'dzin pa'i sde snod/ rdo rje theg pa snga 'gur rgyud 'bum rin po che'i rtogs pa brjod pa lha'i rnga bo che lta bu'i gtam las rgyud kyi bzhugs byang dkar chag dngos lags par bshad pa'i skabs te bzhi pa'o//
308b1(rnying rgyud): lam yig brgyag sum na rdzun kun dza sa ster dag
308b2(rnying rgyud): mas man na tu ma
308b3(rnying rgyud): mamam rgyuman mamamamamam
308b4(rnying rgyud): sangs padam na ti chen po'i rgya ba tan po dang rig pa / 'o' bar grus yon tan ma rtog sarnam byed grus pa chog/
309a1(rnying rgyud): mnan chu
309a2(rnying rgyud): sa @
309b1(rnying rgyud): gang zhig brten na mchog gi gnas 'thob cing // cung zad rjed pas legs pa'i dngos kun ster// thos pas sdig pas bcings pa lhod por byed// dam pa'i chos kyi rgyus mthu brjod mtha' yas// legs pa min pa'i phyogs kun 'joms pa la// zhugs
309b2(rnying rgyud): dang 'gror rlung rdo rje'i rjes 'gro zhing // phan pa'i dngos kun ster la nor bu dang // sman dang sngags kyi nus pas mtshon min pa'i// dpal gyi mgung nus yan lag drug cu'i sgra// zhi bsil khams su rdzogs pa'i gdangs gcig gis// yid srungs
309b3(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten khams kun mya ngan gyi// mi zud mun pas kun tu khebs byed cing // gang du legs byas chu klung byung brgya'i// 'jug ngogs dmigs pa'i phyogs pa rab dngas las// rtog bral byang chub sems kyi rin chenagyi'abyung gnas kun mkhyen
309b4(rnying rgyud): yongs bsngo'i rgya mtsho'ang yin// lnga pa/ de ltar bsgrubs pa'i phan yon dang bsngo sngon gyi rim pa la/ dang po ni/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'gro khams rgya mtsho'i rdul snyed kyi mthas mi dpogs pa'i
309b5(rnying rgyud): sems can ji snyed thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam la gzhol/ thams cad mkhyen pa lang ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa la 'bab par 'gyur ba nyid kyi phyir thabs la mkhas pa'i drin las tshad med pa'i gsang ba chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi rten lugs
309b6(rnying rgyud): su lkugs pa dang / 'bur du btod pa dang / ri mo dbris pa sogs kyis legs par bsgrubs shing de la bsod nams kyi zhing du byas pa'i phan yon ni bsams pas gzhal du med pa'i tshul mdo rgyud thams cad nas bka' bstsal la/ khyad par bde bar gshegs
309b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i chos kyi sku ni bstan bya dang rtogs kyi gnyis kyis bsdus pa'i snga ma zhib mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyogs brjod byar gnas pa'i gsung rab las gzhan du ma gyur pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos yi ger 'dri ba dang / bzung zhing bcangs pa dang / bklags shing kun chub par byas
310a1(rnying rgyud): na na san rgyu na du turgyun ma na
310a2(rnying rgyud): na kyi sa
310a3(rnying rgyud): chu tu
310a4(rnying rgyud): su/
310b1(rnying rgyud): ches mang 'phrul lo// kau shig stong gsum sa gang man par 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin ga shegs pa'i mdzod du kyis yongs su bka ga nagan/ kau shika steng gsum kyi stong chen pa'i 'a garkyen pa khams na/ sems da du
310b2(rnying rgyud): pa de dag las sems can re des/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyad dpag tshad spyod pa sha stagabyas te/ de dag la dam
310b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lhardzas kyi phreng ba dang / sangs kyi spos dang / lba rdzas kyi thug pa dang / zhardzas kyi bye ma dang / lhangs kyi chos gos dang / ldardzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang
310b4(rnying rgyud): lha rdza swa kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur spyir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas pa bas/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
310b5(rnying rgyud): bris shing bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / bklags pa dang / kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang ma bral bar byas te/ de la me tog dang / phreng ba
310b6(rnying rgyud): dang / spos dang / b+ha ga pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dung du byas/ mchod par byas na/ de nyid bsod nams
310b7(rnying rgyud): ches mang du 'phel lo// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de de lags te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa ri mthong bgyis pa dang / bkur sting bgyis pa dang / phu du dadu
311a1(rnying rgyud): rjes dang pa na/ stor pa dang / smra ba gas pa sgyus nga sgyu sa smra /
311a2(rnying rgyud): snying bgyis pa dang / phu dung du bgyis pa dang / mchod pa bgyis par 'gyur ro// zhes pa la sogs kyis rgyas par gsungs shing / de'i 'grel bar/ slob dpon seng ge bzang pos/ gtso bong chos kyi sku'i de bzhin gshegs pa nyid shes rab kyi
311a3(rnying rgyud): b.rol tu smin pa yin no// drabs du rtson par byed pa'i rgyal ba'i blam la mdzod na rnams cang mkhyen pa ye shes kyi chos kyi yul mchod pa'i phyir bsod nams mang dubye bayin no// gzugs brtan gying bzhin gshegs pa pa mchod na mi byengad pa dadu phags
311a4(rnying rgyud): kyi skus ma bsdus pa yin pa'i phyir bsod nams chos mang du mi skyed pa yin no// bris nas mchod na bsod nams mang du bskyed par bstan nas/ 'dri bzhin pa nang nga dang 'dra'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ yang rigs kyi bung ma zhes bya ba sogs pa
311a5(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// zhes rgyas par bkra' zhing / spad pa tshogs su band pa las kyang / la las bde gshegs yongs su mya ngan 'das pa yi// mchod rten rin chen bdun lus mas shing mtshang byed la// bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag gat+ta yai/
311a6(rnying rgyud): ma skyed kyis bye ba phrag sdong zhing bkang ste// yongs su brtag bzung zhing rnams bye ba mtha' yas na// sems can snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis// las gzhan mi byed lha yi me tog spos rab dang // byug pas dus gsum bskal pang mi dbus lhan/
311a7(rnying rgyud): named do// gang zhig gang las rnaMm 'dren skyobs bcu 'byung 'thung ba// bde bar gshegs kyi yum 'di glegs pa ma la bris to// 'cha zhing me to gzug pas pa sti stang byed gyur na// mthong rten byas mtshad pas nams des ni kyang mi thod/
311b1(rnying rgyud): rjes dang / la las gad+hA'i klung gi kyi sted zhing rnams na// sems can ji skyed 'khyod kun dgra bcom nyid btul bas// gang gis shes rab rol byin 'di yig bris te// sems can mchog la blags byan bsod nams khyad par 'a phags//
311b2(rnying rgyud): phyir zhen sgra mchog de dag 'dir bsgrubs nas// chos rnams mtha' dag stong pa nyid du 'dir ston byed// de thos nyan thos myur lam rnam par grol la reg/ rang rgyal byang chub dang ni sangs rgyas byung chub reg/ rjes gsungs pa dang / de bzhin du zab mo'i/
311b3(rnying rgyud): chos kyi tshul sna gcig tsam yang thos pa dang 'chad pa dang / 'dzin pa'i phrin yon kho na la 'du mtha' gzung bar mi nus pa'i tshul/ blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa'i mdo las/ snod chen po yi 'jig rten khams 'di ni// gser gyis bkang sde bde gshegs
311b4(rnying rgyud): phul ba bas// gang gis chos kyi mdzod 'di zos nas ni// mos pa'i bsod nams 'di ni khyad par 'phags// gang gis 'jig rten khams khri rin chen bkang // de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phul ngabs// gang gis mdo sde 'di la 'jug
311b5(rnying rgyud): byas pa// bsod nams de la snga mas bskyed du med// gang gis 'jig rten khams ni stong phrag bcu// rin chen bkang ste sbyin pa byin sabs// gang gis mdo 'di bton nas ston pa yi// bsod nams de yi cha ni snga ma min// zhing ni bya ba
311b6(rnying rgyud): khrag khrig stong gi rnams// rin chen bkang ste 'jig rten slob dpon kyob// sangs rgyas rnams la dbul bar phul ba bas// gang gis tshul 'dir rab tu sbyong ba dang // phyogs bcu rnams phug da'i bye ster zhing // rin chen bkang ste rgyal la phul
311b7(rnying rgyud): babs// ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du gang gnas pa'o// bsod nams de la mnyam sa yod ma yin// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dang chos 'dzin dang // chos dra bang dang pog chags rjeg// chos pani 'di dag bsod nams mtha' yas te/
312a1(rnying rgyud): de dag mtha' ni bde gshegs mi gsung ngo // nam mkha'i khams dang de bzhin sems can khams// sangs rgyas ye shes dang ni byang chub sems// chos bzhi 'di dag dpag tu med pa ste// mkhas pa rnams kyis
312a2(rnying rgyud): de thos dogs mi bya// dkon mchog chos 'di rab tu bshad pa na/ phyogs bcu'i zhing ni bye ba g.yos par gyur// snang ba byung zhing me tog char yang bab// sil snyan brgya dag ma dkrol sgra yang byung // byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa de dag kun//
312a3(rnying rgyud): ma gu nas ched du brjod pa ched du brjod// chos bstan 'di 'dra 'di thos bdag cag rnams// 'tsho ba don yod rnyed pa legs par rnyed// gang dag 'di 'dra 'di ni thos gyur pa// sems can de dag rnyed pa legs par rnyed// gang dag byang chub sems ni mi
312a4(rnying rgyud): brjed pa// de dag de bzhin gshegs pas shin tu bzung // phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas stong phrag bye ba rnams// phyag ni g.yas pa rab tu brkyang mdzad de// yon tan rgya mtsho'i spyi bor bzhag nas ni// shAkya seng ge'i bskul ba legs zhes gsungs//
312a5(rnying rgyud): lha dang klu dang lha min mi 'am ci// dri za gnod sbyin mkha' lding lto 'phye che// brgya byin tshangs pa 'jig rten skyong ba rnams// nam mkhar gnas te ched du brjod pa brjod// shAkya seng ge 'di dang dge 'dun dang // mdo sde 'di 'dra ba ni 'dzin byed pa//
312a6(rnying rgyud): chub sems dpa' dpa' bo ring gnas gyur// legs gsungs chos ni gzha de la de nub mi 'gyur// gang dag chos kyi tshul ni 'di 'dzin pa// de dag la ni bdag cag bsnyen bkur bgyi// bdag cag thams cad dgus dang bcas par ni// kun tu srung zhing sba bar
312a7(rnying rgyud): sprobar bgyi// zhes gsungs so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i rten gzhan las gsung ngab kho nar mchod pa dang gzung ba'i phan yon khyad par du bsngags paci'i phyir zhe na/ seng ge bzang pos bshad pa'i lung gong du drangs pos kyang shes par
312b1(rnying rgyud): gyur bdun ma thad/ rnamapas/ kau shig de bas na dgas kyipa'am sa sa s+ho// dban dag glegs pa dgra ba tum pa yang dag pa dgas pa'i sangs rgyus rnams pa martog dung / byang ba dang / dang/ thub dadang / da
312b2(rnying rgyud): nA bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis mngon du rim gror bya bar 'dod pa dang / bkur stir bya bar 'dod pa dang / phud du du bya bar 'dod pa dang / mchod par bya ba da 'dod pas// shes rab
312b3(rnying rgyud): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te/ mye tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bzang dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / badran dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rimagror bya'o// bkur stir bya'o// phu dud
312b4(rnying rgyud): dubya'o// mchod par bya'o// ko shi kang sa don de nyid kyi dbang yang dag par mthong ho/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'di snyim ste/ gang zhig li bdag gis rimagro dang / bkur g+hi dang / phudu dang /
312b5(rnying rgyud): mchod pa bya ste/ brten cing rnam par spyad par bya snyam na/ kau shi ka de la ngas 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / mi dang lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang nang
312b6(rnying rgyud): dang 'dra ba 'am/ lhag pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong nas/ de yangs 'di snyam du bsams te/ de ltar yin na bdag gis chos zhi ba bzang po gang bdag nyid kyis/ mngon par sangs rgyas pa de nyid la/ rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang /
312b7(rnying rgyud): mchod pa cwa ste/ brten cing rnam par spyod par bya'o// lha mdubarnams so// kau shika chos de'ang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yin te/ kau shi ka de lta nga nyid kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la/ rim
313a1(rnying rgyud): gror byung / bsang stir byed/ dud byed/ mchod par byed / de skad rim mo dang / bkur sti dang / phudung dang / mchod pa byas shing rnam pang stod/ shag rigs kyi tha'amarig tu da drang
313a2(rnying rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / b+hag pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / bral mtshan
313a3(rnying rgyud): ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/ rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba lta ci smos/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi
313a4(rnying rgyud): bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan dang / sil nyan
313a5(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs kyis/ rim gror bya ba dang / bkur sting bya ba dang / phu dung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so// byang chub
313a6(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' las byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las byung ba ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams
313a7(rnying rgyud): so// kau shi ka de stabs na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo'am/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la/
313b1(rnying rgyud): tog du/ thung bdang / sa dang / thug pa dang / zlum dung / na bza' dang / gdugs da/ rdul mtshan dang / bdun dang / sel spyan du tshogs kyis/ rimagrar b+h+ya// bkur sbyar na'o// bdung \u0f7f//
313b2(rnying rgyud): par bya'o// de ltar de la slob pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
313b3(rnying rgyud): ro// nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob po// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi thegs pa rnams kyis kyang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// zhes gsungs
313b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du glegs pam bris pa'i phan yon kyang / nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ rin chen sna bdun la sogs la// rgyal ba kun gyi rang bzhin gyis// ma lus bsdus pa'i ngo bo nyid// sku gsuMng thugs nyid bris pa
313b5(rnying rgyud): yin// debs rgyal ba kun bris pa'i// che ba'i yon tan bas ma mi khyab// ces dang / de bzhin du bzung ba'i phan yon kyang // de nyid las/ grog shing shun la sogs la// gsang ba'i rgyud 'dir ba bris nas// rin chen khri la legs bzhag ste//
313b6(rnying rgyud): gus pas mchod cing rab bzung na// ji srid gnas par bsam pa yis// dga' ba'i bsam pas 'dzin byed par// sangs rgyas thams cad bzung ba yin// zhes gsungs pa ltar/ mdor na sangs rgyas kyis legs par gsungs pa'i chos ni thog ma'i
313b7(rnying rgyud): dge ba/ brang du dagle ba/ tha mang dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba la sogs pa'i brjod bye bzang po gnas shing rngod byed ming tshig yi ge'i ngo bo gnas pa'i
314a1(rnying rgyud): chos hrIn mgrungs 'di las zan 'ang tshigs su bcad pa shA lo kA gcig tsam zhig nyan pa dang / bos pa dang / 'chang ba'i phan yon kyang / 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi stobs bskyed pa'i cho 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa bstan/
314a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i mdo las/ gang yang 'dzam bu'i gling 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi mchod rten rin po che sna bdun las byas pas gang bar byas te/ lha'i phreng ba dang / thug pa dang / me tog dang / rin po che'i gdugs dang / sil snyan dang / rgyal
314a3(rnying rgyud): mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyis lo 'bum du bkur sti byas te rjed cing mchod pa bas/ gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / gzhan dag la yang dag par rab tu bstan na de
314a4(rnying rgyud): bas 'di ches bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can dag 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la 'jog cing / bzhag nas kyang lha'i lo stong du yo byad thams cad kyis mi brel bar rjed cing mchod pa bas/
314a5(rnying rgyud): gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa tsam yang nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir bcug pa dang / gzhan la rgyas par byed na de bas 'di ches bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// zhes gsungs pa dang /
314a6(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan pa'i mdo las/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang gis bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du thabs la mkhas pa med par pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad pa bas/ gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di som nyi dang bcas pas zos na 'di
314a7(rnying rgyud): depos ches bsod nams mang du bskyed na gang gis som nyi med par thos pa lnga ci smos/ gang gis yi ger 'dri ba dang / lung nod pa dang / 'chang ba dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa lta ci smos/ zhes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
314b1(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba'i mdo las kyang / kun dga' ba byang chub sems dpa' gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang / glegs bam du byas te 'chang ba des 'di snyam du bdag gis drang
314b2(rnying rgyud): nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// de ni ji ltar da ltar nga bzhin du lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya ba'i 'os dang / mchod pa'i 'os yin no// zhes gsungs pa dang / de bzhin
314b3(rnying rgyud): dugasang sngags kyi sde snod glegs bam du bris shing bklags pa dang / bcangs pa'i phan yon ni de las kyang khyad par du mas 'phags par shes dgos te/ rin po che spungs pa'i rgyud las/ de yi phyir na gsang ba'i rgyud// 'di nyid 'dzin pa'i skyes bu ni/
314b4(rnying rgyud): rang rig rnams kyi dbang thob ste// rgyud 'di bcangs pa tsam gyis ni// rdo rje 'chang gi sprul par 'gyur// rgyud 'di su yis bklags pa'i mi// lta ba'i don kun sems la 'chad// 'di nyid su yis bris pa'i mi// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung la rol//
314b5(rnying rgyud): zhes pa dang / a ti bkod pa chen po las// 'di nyid gang gis bzung ba de// bzo dang sgyu rtsal thams cad dang // bstan bcos kun dang sgra rnams ni// ji ltar 'dod bzhin shes par 'gyur// gsang mchog bla na med pa 'di// mchod dang baspong
314b6(rnying rgyud): pa bkur byas na// mchog dang thun mong dngos grub rnams// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'byung // 'di nyid bcangs pa tsam gyis kyang // lung dang man ngag 'dzin par 'gyur// zhes pa la sogs rgyas par gsungs so// gzhan yang dam pa'i chos
314b7(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten du gnas pa zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa'i chos 'phags bzhi'i thugs rgyud kyi mngon par rtogs pa brjod bya'i tshul dang / de rtogs byed kyi thabs su gyur pa lung gi chos rjod byed kyi tshul du gnas pa mdo dang rgyud kyi sde sdod ming tshig yi ge'i ngo bor gnas pa gang zhig
315a1(rnying rgyud): shAH/ de glegs bam du bris pa med na de la brten pa'i klog pa dag pa nyon logs thos pas ma byed pa mi 'byung / named par spong ba nyams len kyang mi 'byung ste/ bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa dam pa' mas yongs su 'dzin da/
315a2(rnying rgyud): rtsa ba ni 'di nyid 'ba' zhig tu gnas pa'i phyir/ mdo rgyud kyi rnam grangs re re 'dri ba dang / bzung ba'i phan yon kyang dpag tu med na phyi mo gcig las glegs bam mang po phyi mtha'i bar du rgyas par 'gyur bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab thams cad kyi snying
315a3(rnying rgyud): theg pa'i lung rtogs kyi bstan pa 'jig rten gyi khams su yun ring por gnas par byed pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po la tshad bzung ba lta ci/ phyogs tsam zhig kyang bsgral pa bye snyed mang por bsam pas mthang gtugs par nub pa ma yin no// de'i phyir chos kyi rkyen
315a4(rnying rgyud): pa ni sbyin pa thams cad kyi mchog dang / rab dang / yul dang / gtso bo dang / gya nom pa dang / bla na med pa ste/ yum las/ kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
315a5(rnying rgyud): kyi bu bo la las/ bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de de snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i
315a6(rnying rgyud): bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo sang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol
315a7(rnying rgyud): dpa'adi'i glegs pam/ sdug pa dang / thi ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir/ gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'brel lo// daci'i phyir zhen/ kau shig de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi ma rol ba byin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams cha cher
315b1(rnying rgyud): bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'dug pa// 'jug par 'gyur ro// myur du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob pa// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig
315b2(rnying rgyud): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bros bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par
315b3(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'dug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa
315b4(rnying rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
315b5(rnying rgyud): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid
315b6(rnying rgyud): dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa
315b7(rnying rgyud): stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
316a1(rnying rgyud): sa ku na na tshunan du na sa sa spyad
316a2(rnying rgyud): babyud pa dang / 'bugs pa'i bden pa pazhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dpu du/ rnam par thar ba'i nad ba tid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / ston pa med pa dang / mngon par shes
316a3(rnying rgyud): da / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyabs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sa skyo yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brdang rgyad dang / byams badzin
316a4(rnying rgyud): bdang / snying rje chen pa dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btu snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos cad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya char bstan to// kau shi ka na ma grangs des kyang/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bum ga gis/ shes rab gyis
316a5(rnying rgyud): byin pa thegs pa ma du bris shing / klog pa dang / thib dang / brtan du bya ba'i phyi gakun byinan/ debs 'di'i bsod rnams ches mang du 'brel bar shes par // nas sogs ca cher bstan pa bzhin // dge rdzob ci blags pa ga na
316a6(rnying rgyud): sbyin par byin pa de lang rten pas thos pas ma ba sgom gsum gyi byed pas 'jig rten du/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yun ring por gnas shing / klu de las skye dgu rnams kyang gnas skabs drang mthar thug gi bar phyid sgo thams cad nas 'grel ning thug par dgyur ba'i phyir/
316a7(rnying rgyud): btsun pa dang sems can 'angs kyi rtsa lag gcig pur gyur ba 'di lta du ni rnam par dgar ba'i bsad nams kyi ngas pa 'du bgyid pa gzhan gyis canas tsam yang bsngon du med par shes par bya ning/ lhag par rtogs ma ldang ba'i skyebo rnams kyi snying la 'a kyi bungs
316b1(rnying rgyud): shing bye ba phrag brgya'i dbang phyug la dbang sgyur ba'i bdag pos byang chub phyogs su mdza' ba ma yin pa'i bslu 'drid kyi sbyor ba 'jam pos bltar mi mngon pa'i gnas mal chen po bcas shing sems can su zhig ni ngan 'gror gzhol/ ngan 'gror babs/ ngan 'gror 'bab
316b2(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur ram snyam du sems kyi las byed cing de dag gi byin gyis rlabs kyi 'bab stegs su 'dod chags bdo ba dang / zhe sdang 'do ba dang / gti mug bdo ba dang / nga rgyal bango ba dang / phrag dog bdol sogs kyis bsod nams ma yin pa'i gnas 'ba'
316b3(rnying rgyud): zhig tu spro zhing bgyi ba lhur len pa la zhugs pas dam pa'i chos rin po che 'jig pa la zag ha cang mi ring bar mngon du phyogs pa'i deng gi dus su 'di lta bur bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa rin po che dus ring por gnas pa'i phyir thabs 'di lta bu'i rtsom pa la zhugs nas 'bad pa chen pos
316b4(rnying rgyud): bsrung zhing bzung ba ni lhag par phan yon khyad par 'phags shing sa chen po la bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba'i sras mchog rnams kyi spyod pa'i tshul bla na med pa ste/ snga 'akur puN+Da rI ka'i rgyud las/ srid pa las dang rkyen gyi dbang gyur te// gang dang gang du dam chos 'jig pa
316b5(rnying rgyud): der// me tshogs spu gri'i so yang brgal nas ni// phyi mthar thug gi bar du dam chos bzung // zhes pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo sde las/ gang dag phyin chad mdo mchog 'di 'dzin pa// de dag rtag tu nga dang
316b6(rnying rgyud): mthun pa'i sras// sangs rgyas bye bas de dag bsngags brjod kyang // de dag bsngags pa mthar ni byin mi 'gyur// zhes dang / 'jig tshe rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung ba// mthu dang stobs dang ldan zhing brtson 'grus ldan// mi dman pa rnams kun du rnam
316b7(rnying rgyud): par gyu// sangs rgyas brgya stong dag la bsnyen bkur byed// 'jig che rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung bas// mchog tu rab mdzes gzugs ldan shes rab ldan// mi yi 'jig rten mchog tu bsnyen bkur byed// rgyal po mkhas pa mdzangs pa rnams kyis bsdigs
317a1(rnying rgyud): na na gan
317a2(rnying rgyud): nyen du dpa/ nams da/ da/ sa rgyanasapa/
317a3(rnying rgyud): 'ag // byen pa'i 'istanupa su byed pa/ sa mas// don sa nga ba gyi ba dang com sung zhing / kyis ba 'a mi / rnams kyang thug pa mi 'gyu /
317a4(rnying rgyud): na /
317a5(rnying rgyud): kyi 'thob 'gyur shing // me 'on babyung po ma lus padapa nga// bcu rgyal ba mtshan gatshas brji bas// dbang nanam mtha' sa mas yongs gang ltar// rtag rgya kyis gnang byas pa dang / rab rgya chog ldan pa
317a6(rnying rgyud): ga bdun nan
317b1(rnying rgyud): rten mchog tu bsten bkur 'gyur// rgyal po mkhas pa mdzangs pa rnams kyis bsngags// 'jig tshe rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung bas// mchog tu gzugs mdzes pa lha na sdug pa dang // skyes pa bud med lha rnams dga' ba dang // bde zhing
317b2(rnying rgyud): mkhas la bsngags shing shes rab ldan// ston pa stobs bcu mnga' ba lha yi lhas// gang gi mdun du mdo 'di rab bshad pa// mi de'i lag tu mdo sde 'di 'dra 'di// phyi ma dus kyi tshe na thob par 'gyur// zhes pa dang / de bzhin du blo gros rgya mtshos
317b3(rnying rgyud): nus pa'i mdo las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam chos gang 'dzin pa// de dag phan yon rnam pa mang 'gyur te// de las phyogs tsam yongs su brjod par bya// dper na rgya mtsho'i chu las thigs pa bzhin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/
317b4(rnying rgyud): de ni de bzhin gshegs la byas gzo yin// rgyal ba rnams kyis mdzod 'dzin yid brtan zhing // phyogs bcu rnams su sangs rgyas mchod pa yin// sangs rgyas spyan gyis gzigs pa'i zhing mang po// rin chen bkang ste de bzhin gshegs la phul// zang
317b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i dus na ji ltar chos 'dzin ltar// bsod nams phung po de tsam 'phel ma yin// 'jig rten zang zing rgyal la bsti stang byas// 'jig rten byed las nam yang grol mi 'gyur// 'jig rten 'das pa'i chos ni gang tshol ba// mkhas pa de ni 'jig rten
317b6(rnying rgyud): chos las 'da'// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa// rgyal ba rnams kyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur// lha dang klu dang mi 'am ci rnams dang // bsod nams ye shes kyis ni yongs su bzung // de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos
317b7(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa// dran ldan blo gros ldan zhing blo ldan 'gyur// shes rab rgya chen kun nas ye shes ldan// mkhas pa bag chags bcas pa'i nyon mongs spong // de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa// de la bdud kyi skyon chags rnyed mi 'gyur//
318a1(rnying rgyud): de la bgyod dpa de bzhin dogs pa med// dal bcing med sgrib pa cung zad med// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa chos 'dzin pa// zhing stong dag tunam yang steste// bre ba kun tu das ni rgyal ba mthong // mdzang
318a2(rnying rgyud): nas de la dad pa rab tu 'thob// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa// chos kyi bdag nyid chen po skye dran 'gyur// yang dang yang du rab tu 'byung ba 'thob// spyod pa yongs dag sgrub pa snying por byed// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos
318a3(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa// tshul khrims thos pas 'phags pa'i chos spyod pa// mkhas pa mngon shes lnga la myur du reg/ ma spang bsam gtan rnam par thar pa 'thob// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa// de ni zab chos rtogs par khor du chud// sangs
318a4(rnying rgyud): rgyas spyod yul stong nyid the tshom med// sems can bdag med par yang mos par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/ de ni so so yang dag rig pa 'thob// 'jigs med shes rab rno zhing chags med dag/ de ni srog chags kun gyi
318a5(rnying rgyud): the tshom gcod// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa// mkhas pa de ni gzungs rnams 'thob par 'gyur// bskal pa brgyar yang gang thos chud mi za// spobs dang ldan zhing chags pa med par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i
318a6(rnying rgyud): chos 'dzin pa// de la mkhas pa rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur// lha dang lha min mi ci'i yid du 'ong // de la sangs rgyas bu gcig bzhin du bstod// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa// brgya byin tshangs pa de bzhin 'jig rten skyong // 'khor los
318a7(rnying rgyud): skur dang me yi rgyal por 'gyur// bde dang yid bde byang chub de 'tshang rgya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa// de lus sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan ldan zhing // mkhas pa yan lag spad pa med par 'gyur// de la lta bas ngoms par
318b1(rnying rgyud): yong mo 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa// gang dag chas kyi phyag tu ba ston pa'i// dge ba'i bshes gnyen dal dkon mi 'gyur// chos mdzod zad mi shes pa ldan par byed// nab der gshegs pa'i dang rgyas badzin
318b2(rnying rgyud): sum dang ngasha dang yid kyang rnam par dag/ tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab rnam par dag // nang grol ye shes shin tu rnam par rdzo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin de// de ni byeng chub sems brjed 'gyur ba med// pha ro bgyin pa dun
318b3(rnying rgyud): 'ga' 'byur// dag ba brgyarnams kyis kyang rab tu btsung // de dag rnamam kyi lan tan na yo rnams// bskal pa rgyun mi 'chad par ra ba brjod cing // dem chosna ban pa'i phyin ya nang de dag ni// brjod pa sa mtha' ma byin par mi 'gyur ro/
318b4(rnying rgyud): zhes sogs rgya cher gsungs pa bzhin no// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i tshe mcho par byed kying / da'i gsung rapa la mos pa chen ros sri 'u byed pa sogs kyi phan yon dang / phyi ma'i dus 'dir sku gsung thugs kyi rnarnams
318b5(rnying rgyud): mamam rnams bsags pa'i phan yon mnyam par sung du te/ me tog brgyags pa'i gzungs las/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs ra'i sangs rgyas 'a'o gcig gis myo cwa'am po rkyong bar drung ste/ ngan pa'i byed
318b6(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyis brten pakur byas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs su mya ngan pas 'das rnas rten rnams lam rtog 'ga' 'phrul bam/ zhwanyim pa gang 'dzer ngam/ thug pa'i thig la 'dzing ma/ mnyag be tapA ti la byug gam/ thug par du
318b7(rnying rgyud): 'am/ spos 'bula'om/ 'dun thos 'bum las/ mar me tho' pas/ spang nas dga' ba'i sems kyi gos pa'i skabs ga ra te/ sang rgyas babyor ldan das 'bya 'che' 'o zhes smra ba da dag ni/ song gnas par brjo ba bka
319a1(rnying rgyud): ca'am/ bskul ba byung nga 'argal ba brgya na tang du yang dun 'a ga par bu shAnas sa 'a gar 'gyur ba na gnas myong// zhes pa lasogs pa gsus gyu/ dung 'dzin da nga
319a2(rnying rgyud): khyab pa'i bdag nyid can gyi phyi lo rnams gang du bzhugs pa'i sa phyogs der yang nyams nyes par 'gyung ba'i phyogs thams cad gi zhing srid pa dang zhi ba'i dge ba dang legs pa'i chags mtha' dag pa rnams rang bzhin gyis phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'ang / byang chub
319a3(rnying rgyud): dpa byams pas dam bcas pa'i tshul bdud rtsi brjod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo las/ bcom ldan 'das spang ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lbu brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i 'jig pa'i dus la bab cing / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'jig par 'gyur ba 'jig pa chen pas 'jig
319a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i dus la bab pan bdag gis myos kyi rnam grangs 'di skyes bu dam pa de dag la rab tu bstan par bgyi'o// de dag la gzi byin sbal bar bgyi'o// yul gang na mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa de lta bu dag gnas pa'i yul der bdag gis dus ma lags pa'i ser ma dang /
319a5(rnying rgyud): char dang / mu ge dang / bro nad yang ba dang / mi ngas dang / yams kyi nang dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// yul gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / glegs bam dud kyis
319a6(rnying rgyud): pa'am/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor btags pa la mchod pa bgyid pa'i yul der bdag gi byin gyis brlabs kyis pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad dang / chom rkun dang / srin po dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i yang ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// gang
319a7(rnying rgyud): dag na chos sla ba 'di lta bu dag dang / mdo sde 'di 'chang ba'i yu la der bdag gi le tog dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / me tog dang / lo ma dang / 'bras bu thams cad phun sum tshogs pa dang / bde ba thams cad 'byung bar byin gyis brlam pa
319b1(rnying rgyud): kyang / na dang / gamar 'dadam pa man dang ba'i rgyal pa lang/ btsun pabacom ldan 'das rnam mi'i rgyas bstag ma 'dza dadam pa mad 'i dbang pa rgyal pa sa nyan byas nas/ ma nga na da ma nang 'dun pa dang gdun dang /
319b2(rnying rgyud): thams cad las kun tu bsrung bar bgyid/ yongs su skyabs pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa dang / yongs su snang bar bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal ba chen po bzhis/ mi'i rgyal po de'i tshul thams cad du gnas pa'i ma
319b3(rnying rgyud): can rnams kun tu bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bsrub pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bsrung ba nga / kwi bdang ba legs su 'gyur ba ba gyi'o// zhes dang / blo thos rgya mthos sus bu'i mad las/ grang chos kyirnam grangs
319b4(rnying rgyud): gnas par 'gyur ba der sangs rgyas byung bar blta'o// gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod par 'gyur ba deng chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar blta'o// zhes gsungs pa dang / chos thams cad kyi dang bzhin shes rab kyi rol tu ston rdo zla pa chen po gnas/
319b5(rnying rgyud): lugs ston pa'i nges don gyi sna snod rin po che 'di rnams gnas gdu 'dri ba'am/ klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du yi la byed pa der bdud dang bdud kyi ris su gyur pa rnams kyis glags blta bar mi nus te/ yum las/ shang d+ya te re phyogs bcu can
319b6(rnying rgyud): gyi bam ga na/ sangs skyes bco nyan 'das ga cig thugs shing / 'babyung ba dang / chomaston pa drug gi mangs ca / byung chub sems deb sems dpa' chen no/ shes rabya bya rol sbyin pa 'a ma di 'dra ba dang /
319b7(rnying rgyud): dang / son pa dang / kha ton du byang ba dang / tshul bzhin du yi la byed pa dang / sgom pa de dag la bdud drig tocan gyis par chang bya bar mi nus so// zhes gsungs shing / de bzhin du dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag del da ba gshegs pa sa
320a1(rnying rgyud): dang ba mar bcas pas srung rtag tu dgongs shing byin gyis rnabs pa lani na ma yang gsol ba mom dud tu/ nga nyid dang/ rigs kyi tha mdangs tho grom gang shos rang byam sa btsun pa ma ma'ad da ba da/
320a2(rnying rgyud): na cid paton byed pa dang / rdul bzhin du mid la byung cing sgom pa dag ni/ shA thugs dang / byugs dang / nubatsugs dang / byung phyogs dang / byang shar bya phyogs marnams dang / shang to'i phyog mtsham dang/
320a3(rnying rgyud): rgyags mtshams dang / rtsub byung gi phyags mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gaphyogs kyis ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das chad med grangs med pa de dag gis mkhyen to// sangs rgyas sman gyis gzigs shi thugs sa chu da // zhes sags pa
320a4(rnying rgyud): 'ad / ngas na bye ma sna bab ma rnams pang du bathugs shing sngal pa dang / mtshar ba byud ba'i gnas dmin ri gyi bdag bcangs pa dang / gyi dang / ga rgya zung ba ni pa kyis mang sa brgya/ dge' ba dang / mtha
320a5(rnying rgyud): kyi smas pa / gyi'i ma bang bas thun batha bcan pa mang dang / dadus bcig na sum mags // sdu 'ang 'a bya ba thu
320a6(rnying rgyud): bde ba lo gnas pa tshad ma mchis pa btang ste/ grang dang / zong khyer dang / thong dpa dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khar dang / rgyal ba'i bzang la bar gang dang gang nams kyi rnamathangs 'di rab tu rtsod pa dang dadag the bdag mas nyan pa'i ma
320a7(rnying rgyud): bar martsi drabagyi'o// mchis nas kying chos smra ba de dag chos dang ldan pas bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / bsgrub par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / brgya byin dang / mangs pa dang /
320b1(rnying rgyud): rten skyong ba dang / 'khor los sbyar nga'i rgyal po rnams ni 'di las byung ba'i slad bu'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal ba chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal pa chen po bzhi pa bdag cag dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos
320b2(rnying rgyud): chen po de dag dang bdag cag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / bslab pa la brtson par bgyi'o// bdag cag gis 'khor gang dag sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mdang ba de dag kyang /
320b3(rnying rgyud): nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa bsrung ba'i slang du btsun par 'gyur bar ngad par bgyi 'o// zhes pa dang / gser 'od dam pa mdo rje'i dbang po'i rgyal po las snang / bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gang gi yul du mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong
320b4(rnying rgyud): smrab de dag mche bar 'gyur ba'i yul de dag tu gser 'od dam pa mad gA'i dbang pa'i rgyal ba 'di yang bsten par 'gyur ro// btsun pabacom ldan 'das rna ma mi'i rgyal pos gser ring dam pa mad sde'i dbang pa'i rgyal po 'di mnyan na thos nas mad sde'i dbang pa
320b5(rnying rgyud): 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong de dag kyir rgol ba de dag las kun tu bsrung bar bgyid/ yongs su skyob pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa dang / yongs su spong bar bgyid na/ bsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis mi'i rgyal po de'i yul thams cad na
320b6(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'i sems can rnams kun tu bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bsgrub pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das me'i rgyal bas nam dge slong ngam ngan slong ma'am dge bsnyen ma
320b7(rnying rgyud): mdo lnga'i dbang po 'dzin pa la bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis mi'i rgyal po de'i yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bde ba dang yo byad thams
321a1(rnying rgyud): cad kun sum tshogs par brgya/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnam mi'i rgyal pas dag spangangs/ dag spang ma'am/ dge bsnyen nas/ dge bzhinam ma pa'i dang mdzad 'dzin pa yang nyis bcad/ thamar nga
321a2(rnying rgyud): gror dpyid cing mchod na btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis mi'i rgyal po chen po de la/ rgyal po thams cad pas ches bsti stang du bgyi/ ches bla mar bgyi/ ches rim gror bgyi/ ches mchod par bgyi ste yul thams cad du yang rab tu
321a3(rnying rgyud): kyi'o// zhes sogs rgya cher gsungs so// gnyis pa bsngo smon gyi rim pa la/ bsgo ba'i rnam gzhag/ badz+ra dgos pa'i rgyu mtshan/ tshul ji ltar bsngo ba/ bsngo sngon gyi tshogs su bcad pa dngos so// dang po larnga sdo za'ar ba/ des tshor/
321a4(rnying rgyud): gsum las/ dang po ni/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam kar gyi bgyi bar gtogs pa'i dngos po thams cad yong su mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sar rnam par dag pa'i phyir blo'i stobs kyis yongs su bsgyur ba'i 'dun sems sa bon dang bcas
321a5(rnying rgyud): pa'o// de ltar yang / mngon par rtogs pa'i kun las/ yongs su bsngo ba khyad par can// de ni byed pa mchog yin no// zhes so// ngas tshig ni pa riHtasta yongs su bstar ba 'am yongs su spel ba la bya ste/ 'jig rten pa'i lam gyi dge rtsa rnams/
321a6(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge rtsa ba bsgyur ba'am/ rkyen gzhan gyis 'dza da pa' ma 'jom par 'gyur ba'i dgra tu mi zad par spel ba'i phyir de skad du brjod do// gsum par bye ba la gnyis te/ yongs su ma dag pa dang dag pa gnyis su dbye ba'i/ dang ba ni/
321a7(rnying rgyud): yum las/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtshan ma'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su shes na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
321b1(rnying rgyud): byang chub tu sangs sub slab ma yin na// 'dus pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dri byud bar dag tungamatshan mam yin/ mtshan ma'i yul ma yin na zhes pas nyid lta sems na la'am than sa byud pa yin pa/ dag pa'i bya ba dadag kan ma bu yang dang /
321b2(rnying rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba ma yin te/ de ltar na de'i 'du shes byin ci log tu 'gyur ro// sems phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro// lta ba phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro// zhes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
321b3(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni/ dmigs pa'i 'du shes can dang / mtshan ma'i 'du shes can gyi yongs su bsngo ba don che bar ma gsungs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yongs su bsngo ba de ni dug can/ zug rngu can te/ 'di ltar dper na/ kha zas bsod
321b4(rnying rgyud): pa/ kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa zhig yod kyang / dug da 'dres par gyur na/ kha dog dang / dri dang / ros yid du 'ong ba yang yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang dug can du zad na/ de la skyes bu byis pa'i ngang tshul cen/ shes rab
321b5(rnying rgyud): 'chal ba'i ngang tshul can ni/ bza' bar sems te/ des de zos na yang kha dog dang/ dri dang / ngo zhim par tshor mod kyi/ sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal gyi rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du 'di la log par rig pa dang / log par shes
321b6(rnying rgyud): pa dang / log par bslabs pa la ladon ma rtogs mi shes shing 'di skad du ston te/ zur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'das pa dang / ma gyon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sems can

324a1(rnying rgyud): kyisa'am rigs kyibu ma la la zhig gis/ nam 'cha ba'i b.radun pa pa dang / bsad snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi chen gyi dang / ma byung mang ba dang / 'dab thams cad kyis ram kar byas/ b.rung /
