326b1(rnying rgyud): dang po pa'i gang zag gis 'khor gsum tha dad du 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa la mi gnas pa'i glos sngon gyi rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rnams kyis ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa de bzhin du yongs su bsngo ba'i 'dun pas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi bde gshegs sras dang slob mar
326b2(rnying rgyud): bcas pa bsngo ba'i dbang por gsol te nam mkha'i mthas gzugs pa'i sems can gyi khams rgya mtshor kun la khyab pa'i snying rje bltas te/ de dag rnams bla na med pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang bslab par bya ba'i phyir rang nyid kyis bsod nams mngon par
326b3(rnying rgyud): 'du byas pa dang / byed bzhin pa dang / bya bar 'gyur bdag gis mtshon nas bsngo bar 'os pa'i legs byas su gyur to cog thams cad gcig tu bslus shing bsdoms te rjes su yi rang ba rgya chen po dang bcas pas bla na med pa byang chub mchog gi go 'phreng rnam pa thams
326b4(rnying rgyud): cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i gnas su dmigs pa med pa'i tshul gyis sgyu ma lta bu'i blos yongs su bsngo bar bya ba ste/ 'jam dpal dpa' bos ji ltar mkhyen pa dang // kun tu bzang po de yang de bzhin du// de dag kun gyi rjes su bdag
326b5(rnying rgyud): slob cing // dge ba 'di dag thams cad rab tu bsngo// zhes pa lta bu'i bsngobs 'khor gsum yongs dag dang rjes mthun du 'gyur ba yin te/ sdud pa rin po'i tshigs su bcad pa las kyang / 'das dus sngon gyi sangs rgyas bye ba zag khrig gang // snying ma /

332a2(rnying rgyud): chen po// mtshon dang g.yul gyis bda' ba med cing sngo ba med par rab babs nas// chos ldan rgyal po'i chos kyi srid kyis bas ma kun rdzogs par byed gyur cig/ 52// lA lar nags sum+b+ha yi sgril bur ku sha'i gdan dang 'bras bu'i zas//
332a3(rnying rgyud): gtsang btung ba shin shun gos ston nal byor 'ba' zhig la gnas dang // la lar khengs bral slong mos 'tsho zhing phyag dar khrod pa'i gos kyis mdzes// sems ni rab grol zhi ba'i gzugs kyis b+h+rUM dgra'i 'dod pa 'ang gyur cig
332a4(rnying rgyud): bzhin gnas rigs de bzhin nyid dbyings ngo bos srang pa mkha' lta bur// glo bur med snang sgrib gnyis sprin tshogs myur ba de'i lam gyis yongs sbyangs te// bral srin yon tan bye ba'i 'od 'brar sgra bzhi'i bdag nyid nyin mor byed// dka' ba med
332a5(rnying rgyud): par mngon du byed las rnam rol zer brgya spro gyur cig/ bab// mtho ris nas 'phos gzigs pa lngas gzigs yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa dang // dga' ba'i tshal ba ltams gzhon nu'i rol rtsed nges par 'byung dang dka' thub dang // byang chub snying por
332a6(rnying rgyud): mngon sangs rgyas dang rim gsum chos 'khor bskor la sogs// rmad byung mdzad pas srid mtshor blings pa'i sems can ma lus sgrol gyur cig/ paH/ pags pa'i mtshan ma yid 'ong gyur pa mu tig phreng ba ltar dkar bas// phyogs kyi 'khor lo nges par
332a7(rnying rgyud): brgal ba'i gsung rab glegs bam rgyas pa'i ma// rin thang bral ba'i rin chen gyis gtams nor bu'i shing rta bkram 'dra ba// sa gsum sgra dgu'i mchod sdong gcig pur dus kyi mthar yang nyams med shong / 52/ gang gi mthu yis 'jig rten kun tu
332b1(rnying rgyud): ku sus // ran na pa ma na// ba gas gsu sa ga smra// btsun nga du du dang/
332b2(rnying rgyud): sa sa du skye
332b3(rnying rgyud): mong kyang mi zlog par 'grothar / bdag da mnapa'ang gas par gasbyong ba pa'i brjod ces rab mas nga/ bsdus pas ge skye ba skyes pa'i ba sa byung chub 'i sbyo tho sa 'o
332b4(rnying rgyud): brnam ldan gyid cing/ ma bshA thugs pa shi ti byems bca pa sa nyid pas pas byung san 'a migs sbyi yin pasas pa sa nga // da ga pa rnam sa kyis ni ma ngon pa po
332b5(rnying rgyud): gas pa dag bdun na sa
332b6(rnying rgyud): sa
332b7(rnying rgyud): sa sa sa bya sa
333a1(rnying rgyud): lha'i rnga bo che lta bu'i gtams las legs byas rgya chen po bskrun pa'i phan yon bsngo smon dang bcas legs par bshad pa'i skabs te lnga pa'o// // de ltar
333a2(rnying rgyud): bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab thams cad kyi snying po rdo rje theg pa snga 'gyur rgyud 'bum rin po che'i rtogs pa brjod pa deng sang gangs ri'i ljongs 'dir ji tsam snyed pa glegs ba ma
333a3(rnying rgyud): zad mi shes pa'i phyi mor bsgrub pa'i tshul dang bcas pa legs par bshad pa skabs lnga'i bdag nyid can 'di ni bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa'i bdag nyid mi yi dbang mo
333a4(rnying rgyud): sa skyong ba nyid kyi bka' stsal pa lhur blangs te/ chos kyi rje kaHthog pa'i 'bangs kyi tha shal du gyur pa shAkya'i btsun pa 'gyur med tshe dbang mchog grub nges don bstan 'phel
333a5(rnying rgyud): dpal bzang po zhes bgyi bas bdag cag gi ston pa kun mkhyen nyi ma'i gnyen gzugs sku chos dbyings su bsdus pa'i tshul bstan nas bgrang bya nyis stong drug brgya bdun cu ngon
333a6(rnying rgyud): brgyad pa me sbrul gyi lo dbyug gu zla ba'i dkar phyogs kyi rgyal ba gsum pa'i chos bzang por chos dang srid kyi dpal 'byor mngon par mtho ba'i lhun grub steng gi rgyal khab chen po
333a7(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi nyin ny-i na ma kyi sa chen pos rgya ra gyur cig/ sarba surnams la /
